1b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs
1b2(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang /
1b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
2a1(rgyud 'bum): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi ri la byang chub sems dpa' sems
2a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po'i tshogs mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem
2a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po spun ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ gos tshags bcos nas pus mo
2a4(rgyud 'bum): sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
2b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das bdag la sprul pa du ma chen po'i tsan ngan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po smon cing / bgyi ba
2b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mngon par 'grub par bgyi ba mchis te/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos bdag gis
2b3(rgyud 'bum): bshad par gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad/
2b4(rgyud 'bum): du bshad par 'tshal lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni gzi byin chen po'i mthu
2b5(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po dang / yid bzhin gyi ljon shing bzhin du smon pa thams cad yongs
3a1(rgyud 'bum): @su rdzogs par bgyid pas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs//
3a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyod kyis snying brtse ba'i phyir sems can gyi ched du 'di ltar zhus
3a3(rgyud 'bum): pas na/ khyod thogs pa med pa'i gzungs 'di bshad par gnang bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de
3a4(rgyud 'bum): ltar gnang ba dang / langs nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas slar stan la 'dug ste/ sems rtse gcig tu 'khor 'dus pa dag la rnam par
3a5(rgyud 'bum): bltas nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sngags 'di smras so/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa/
3a6(rgyud 'bum): ya ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra pa ti tsin+ta ma Ni ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha te/ badz+ra b+ha ra/ A ki rA ye hUM swA hA/ 'di ni lus
3b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi sngags so/ / oM pad+me/ tsin+tA ma Ni/ ma hA badz+ra b+ha ra hUM/ 'di ni snying po'i sngags so// oM b+ha ra ta pad+me hUM/ 'di ni snying gi snying po'i sngagra lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
3b2(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / sa chen po'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
3b3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i khang khyim rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang shin tu skrag cing 'jigs
3b4(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po skyes par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po'i gzhal med khang yang rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ gnod sbyin dang 'dre srin ma rungs pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang du ngang zhing skrag pas gdong bkab ste
3b5(rgyud 'bum): sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad phye nas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnam par thar te lha'i bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i
3b6(rgyud 'bum): me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur/ lha'i rol mo rnams kyang bar snang la sgra sna tshogs byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas
3b7(rgyud 'bum): par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ rigs kyi bu
4a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod sems can la brtse ba'i phyir gzungs 'di bshad pa nyid kyis sems can rnams kyis phan yon chen po thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa
4a2(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi
4a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di'i cho ga shod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu 'am
4a4(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gzhon nu gang la la zhig gis tshe 'di nyid la rnam par smin pa mngon du myong bar
4a5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal na/ gdugs mtshan sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis gzungs 'di mi spyad par bgyis te/ gdugs dang dus mi 'dam par gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste/ g.yar ton du bzlas par
4a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur na bgyi ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/ / ci'ang rung ste don du bgyi zhing gnyer ba zhig mchis na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na don brgya stong du ma 'grub par 'gyur bas/ rig
4a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags gzhan gang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di dang bskrun par bzod pa gang yang ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'das pa dang da ltar gyi las ngan pa dang sgrib pa lci ba rnams rab tu 'joms pas so//
4b1(rgyud 'bum): gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal bar lhung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs dag kyang thar par 'gyur la/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang
4b2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur na/ las ngan pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / bro nad gzhan thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang dag rims nad nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang /
4b3(rgyud 'bum): nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin mtshan du bro 'tshal ba 'am/ rlung ngam/ mkhris pa 'am/ ban kan la sogs pas bro 'tshal ba dag la rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis par gyur na thams cad 'byang zhing sos
4b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur lags so/ / gang zhig drug dang byang stems kyis phog par gyur tam/ ldog pa 'am/ g.yan pa 'am/ mdze nad dam/ phol mig gam/ rlung nad dam/ smyos pa 'am/ klad pa bro 'tshal ba
4b5(rgyud 'bum): 'am rna ba dang / sna dang / mchu dang / lce dang / mid pa dang / kha dang / gdong dang / gtsug dang / klad rgyas dang / brang dang / rtsib logs dang / snying dang / lto ba dang / rked pa dang / rgyab dang
4b6(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa dang / lag pa la sogs pa thams cad bro 'tshal bar gyur na'ang thams cad sos par bgyid/ ji tsam du lus kyi bro nad ci mchis pa thams cad kyang sos par bgyid lags so// gno sbyin dang /
4b7(rgyud 'bum): srin po dang / bi na ya ka dang / bdud sdig can dang / 'dre gdon dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// mtshon cha dang / dmag tshogs dang / chab dang / zhugs dang / rlung dang
5a1(rgyud 'bum): char pa dang / ser ba ma rungs pa dag gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// dgra dang / chom rkun dang / rgyal po ma rungs pa dang / rkun po ma rungs pa dag gis kyang gnod
5a2(rgyud 'bum): par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ / blo bur du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa rmi bar mi 'gyur/ rtsangs pa dang / sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / srin bu gyi med dang
5a3(rgyud 'bum): rkang mangs dang / gcan gzan gdug pa ma rungs pa dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / spang ki dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// g.yul ngor 'thab pa'i tshe thams
5a4(rgyud 'bum): cad du rgyal bar 'gyur lags so/ / gal te bla'i bgyi ba dag gis rtsod par gyur na'ang 'i dum par 'gyur te/ gzungs 'di lan cig bzlas na gong du bstan pa de dag thams cad yid bzhin
5a5(rgyud 'bum): du 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ / gang la la zhig gis gdugs re gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di
5a6(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs shig/ ci zhig smon cing ci zhig yongs su gnyer bar byed/ thams cad khyod la sbyin no zhes bsgo bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyang
5a7(rgyud 'bum): sku mngon du ston par 'gyur/ mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bkod pa'i dngos po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi byang chub
5b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri bo
5b2(rgyud 'bum): Ta la'ang mthong bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur bas/ rtag par rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos byams shing
5b3(rgyud 'bum): bkur bar 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing pad+ma'i steng du skye bar 'gyur/ bkod pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'gyur/
5b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nam yang ngan 'gro rnams su mi ltung zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur lags te/ 'di ni sdig pa'i las thams cad rnam par
5b5(rgyud 'bum): 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bgyi ba lags so/ / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas byang chub dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
5b6(rgyud 'bum): phyug sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ yang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po'i gzungs gsang ba'i cho ga bstan pa su'ang rung ba gces pa'i don grub pa zhig mchis na/ thams cad rang zhi bar
5b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur lags so/ / de'ang rnam pa gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi nor dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gang lags pa'o// de la 'jig rten pa'i nor ni gser dang dngul la sogs
6a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rin po che rnams so/ / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi bkod pa rnam pa gnyis dang ldan zhing / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / skye'o
6a2(rgyud 'bum): mang pos byams shing bkur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang / byams pa'i sems rgyas nas blo dang ldan pa rnams bde ba stsol ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel
6a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing mthu stobs rtas pa gang lags pa'o/ / gsang ba'i mdzod kyi spyod yul 'di ni gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o// gang la la zhig bdag gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dngos grub
6a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog thob par 'tshal na/ sems rtse gcig tu dus thams cad dang gnas thams cad du gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste/ rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na nongs pa ci'ang ma mchis pas bzlas
6a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming dang / yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi ming dang / gang zag de'i ming na
6a6(rgyud 'bum): brjod de/ gal te rgyal po 'am/ rgyal bu 'am/ btsun mo 'am/ sras sam/ rgyal po'i bu mo 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gdol pa 'am/ skyes pa
6a7(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gzhon nu ma 'am/ mu stegs sna tshogs dag la brten cing mdza' bar 'tshal na/ de dag gi ming nas brjod de rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe bzlas pa'i grang
6b1(rgyud 'bum): tshang bar bgyi'o/ / gal te dngos grub mchog gnyer zhing rgyal po la brten par 'tshal na/ dgung zhag bdun gyi bar du rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na mjal bar 'gyur lags
6b2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / gal te btsun mo la brten par 'tshal na lan dgu brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// rgyal bu la brten par 'tshal na lan brgyad brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// slas dag mthong bar 'tshal na lan bdun brgya
6b3(rgyud 'bum): bzla bar bgyi'o/ / rgyal po'i bu mo la brten par 'tshal na lan drug brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// bram ze la brten par 'tshal na lan lnga brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// rgyal rigs la brten par
6b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal na lan bzhi brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ / dmangs rigs la ni sum brgya'o// gdol pa la ni nyis brgya'o// dge slong dang dge slong ma la ni khan brgya'o// dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la
6b5(rgyud 'bum): ni lan dgu bcu'o/ / khye'u gzhon nu dang bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni lan drug bcu'o// 'di ni brten cing mdza' bar bgyi ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ste/ nor dang / bran dang / rta dang / bde ba'i yo
6b6(rgyud 'bum): byad thams cad 'byor par bgyid lags so/ / gang la la zhig snying du sdug cing mdza' ba dag ring po na mchi ba dang mjal bar 'tshal na/ yid la bsams pa bzhin rlung bzhin du mchi bar
6b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur lags so/ / ci bgyi'o 'tshal bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar gyur na don de dag 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
7a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug mthong bar 'tshal na lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong zhing bsam pa thams cad rdzog par bgyid lags so// gal te
7a2(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na bzlas brjod lan khri bgyis na lus mngon sum du bskrun nas/ de la brtse zhing pas bu la byams pa bzhin du sems kyi smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur
7a3(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / gal te sangs rgyas dang 'khor 'dus pa mang po mthong bar 'tshal na lan khri sum stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur lags so// gal te gdugs mtshan
7a4(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang rnams mngon sum du ston cing / so so nas rang rang gi sngags kyi mthu ci mchis pa gang de la stsal nas yongs su
7a5(rgyud 'bum): srung bar bgyid de/ zhag bdun pa la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po rnams 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas de'i smon pa rnams stsol bar
7a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyid do/ / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga gong du bstan pa bzhin du bgyis na smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i
7a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzod las/ thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las// thams cad byams
7b1(rgyud 'bum): shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse
7b2(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ gang gis mthong ba dag byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman sbyar nas lus la thogs te 'gro na mchog tu mngon par 'grub cing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i cho ga bstan pa
7b3(rgyud 'bum): gi'u wang dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / dzA ti pa la dang / li shi dang / ka ko la dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / gser gyi gyim pag rnams cha
7b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par bgyis te brdungs nas sbrang rtsi dkar pos smras te/ snga ma'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lus la bdugs sam/ gos la bdugs sam/ mig la bskus sam/ dpral
7b5(rgyud 'bum): ba la thig le bgyis sam/ lus la byugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / blon po rnams dang / bran rnams dang / skyes pa dang / bud med la sogs pa byams shing dag pa dang / lam gyi chos la
7b6(rgyud 'bum): bkur zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lus kyi zho sha dang nor rdzas dag 'phangs pa ma mchis par gtong zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur te brjod kyis mi yang lags so// ji ltar 'i zla thams cad kyis
7b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar mos pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i don rnams 'byor cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ / gang la la zhig sman 'di thogs par gyur ma khan mtho ba'i sgrib pa rnams su byung nas bgegs thams cad
8a1(rgyud 'bum): las thar bar 'gyur lags so/ / rgyal po'i mthus nan gyis 'phrog pa dang / chab kyis ded pa dang / zhugs kyis tshig pa dang / mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dug dang / 'ching ba'i
8a2(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur lags so/ / bsam pa thag pa nas sman a ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di bgyis na thams cad kyis byams shing dga' bar 'gyur lags so// sman 'dis bdugs
8a3(rgyud 'bum): pas bab col du g.yar khar stsal bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan
8a4(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/ gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman a ka ta sbyar ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// /
8a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman khar mur ba'i cho ga bstan
8a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur kum zhib mer btags te gi'u wang dang bsres nas gong du bstan pa'i sngags rnam pa gsum re rer yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te chab gtsang mas sbyar nas
8a7(rgyud 'bum): ril bu che chung shing 'go stong gi 'bras bu tsam du bgyis te/ yang sngags gong ma gsum lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grib ma la bskams te/ gdugs dang rlung gis ma phog par bgyis nas ril
8b1(rgyud 'bum): bu re re la'ang gong ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum lan bdun bdu gyis btab ste/ ril bu gcig khar mur nas rgyal po 'am/ blon po nye phan nam/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag la gtam bgyis par 'gyur na/
8b2(rgyud 'bum): bkur sti bgyis nas nor dang / rin po che dag 'phangs pa ma mchis par ci dang ci 'tshal ba thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/ tshig tu smras so 'tshal thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ bsgo ba
8b3(rgyud 'bum): zhig mchis na'ang thams cad nyan cing bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ / khar sman mur ba'i tshe rtag par sngags bzla 'tshal te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid
8b4(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du spos chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi chu zheng khru bzhis 'khor ba gcig bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang
8b5(rgyud 'bum): du rtsi shing gi me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ci 'byor pa bkram zhing / tsan dan dkar po bsregs nas sman gyi ril bu snga ma blangs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bzhag nas/ rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs shing /
8b6(rgyud 'bum): sol ba dang bla re dkar po bris te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma dkar po bzhi'ang bris te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyis lags pa'i rjes la snying po'i
8b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang / snying gi snying po'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bgyi'o// lus kyi sngags kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas tsan dan dkar po bsregs te me tog gtor na/ de'i tshe smon
9a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang na mchis pa'i sman blangs te lus la btags na phyogs gang du mchi'ang rung ste/ ci dang ci gnyer ba thams cad
9a2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ tshig tu smras pa thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ don du sgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so// sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma
9a3(rgyud 'bum): gtogs te/ 'di ni yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las/ sman mur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las
9a4(rgyud 'bum): sman mur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir skye bo mang
9a5(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad kyis mthong na byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/ sman shing ri ka ku shu dang / pad+ma le brgan dang / pad+ma sngon po dang / rgya mtsho'i chab kyi dbu ba dang / wa rkun nag po'i rus pa dang
9a6(rgyud 'bum): ba bla dang / ka kun ban s+ya dang / gi hang dang / gur kum dang / rgya'i gur kum dang / bi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / bca' sga rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te/ brdungs nas zhib mor btags te sman snga ma srang
9a7(rgyud 'bum): gcig mchis na/ gla rtsi dang ga bur srang phyed stsal nas zhib mor bdar te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du sbyar ba bgyis lags pas/ snga ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re'ang lan stong rtsa brgyad
9b1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas/ sman de dag byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa'i drung du gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la
9b2(rgyud 'bum): reg par bgyis nas 'khar ba'i thur mas blangs te mig tu stsal na mig dang klad pa bro 'tshal ba dang / ling tog gis bsgribs pa thams cad dang / sprin dkar dang / mchi ma 'dzag pa dang / sprin dmar dang /
9b3(rgyud 'bum): long nad dang / klad pa bro 'tshal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur lags so// rtag par gdugs re bzhin du sman 'di mig tu stsal na mig nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// gdugs gnyis
9b4(rgyud 'bum): sku la na lus kyi bro nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ / gdugs gsum stsal na spro ba'i bro nad rnam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// gdugs bzhi stsal na phyi nang gi sgrib pa thams
9b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur lags so/ / gdugs lnga stsal na dgra dang 'thab pa na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gdugs drug stsal na sdig pa'i las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lci ba bzhi dang / mtshams
9b6(rgyud 'bum): ma mchis pa lnga dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / byad stems thams cad rnam par 'joms shing / ngan 'gro rnams su nam yang ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so// gdugs bdun stsal na rgyal po dang / blon po chen po
9b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / skye bo mang po thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing bkur sti bgyis nas yid ches shing byams par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du stsal na rang dbang chen po thob par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun
10a1(rgyud 'bum): phrag gsum gyi bar du sbal na rgyal po dang blon po chen po dag mdza' bar 'gyur ro/ / zhag bdun phrag bzhi'i bar du stsal na gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rim gro bgyid par
10a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / zhag bdun phrag lnga'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag drug gi bar du stsal na nam mkha' lding dang srin
10a3(rgyud 'bum): po mthu chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yongs su srung bar bgyid pas/ byang stems dang 'dre gdon rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag
10a4(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyi bar du stsal na lha nag po chen po dang / 'dre srin sde brgyad rnams nye bar lhags nas rjes su 'brang zhing g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du stsal na an trad nar
10a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / zhag bdun phrag dgu'i bar du stsal na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin gyi khang khyim gyi sgo rang bye nas/ de na ci mchis pa thams
10a6(rgyud 'bum): cad mthong bar 'gyur/ 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig gi bar du stsal na sman zhugs ltar 'bar ba ji snyed pa thams cad mngon sum du
10a7(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar 'gyur bas/ tshe ring bar 'gyur 'tshal lam/ mthu chen po dang ldan par 'tshal na'ang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du stsal na drang srong
10b1(rgyud 'bum): mang po rnams kyis rin po che'i gter rnams phye ste nye bar bstan nas yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ / zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum gyi bar du stsal na klu'i gzhal med khang rnams sgo rang bya
10b2(rgyud 'bum): nas lta ba dag la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ / zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du stsal na 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag sgo rang bye bar 'gyur bas thams cad
10b3(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / zhag bdun phrag bco lnga'i bar du stsal na mtshan mo mun nag gi nang du'ang gdugs bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu drug gi bar du stsal na sa'i 'og gi
10b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun gyi bar du stsal na gling bzhi po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ji snyed mchis pa'ang
10b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i mthu'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang thar par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bco brgyad kyi bar du stsal na gang zag de nyi ma
10b6(rgyud 'bum): lta bu'i mthu thob par 'gyur ro/ / zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu'i bar du skul na lag na rdo rje'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// zhag
10b7(rgyud 'bum): bdun phrag nyi shu'i bar du stsal na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ / zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa
11a1(rgyud 'bum): gcig gi bar du sprul na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi sgo rnams rang bye nas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro//
11a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// lo gcig gi bar du stsal na yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga 'thob
11a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur lags so/ / gang la la zhig spyod pa'i cho ga 'di mngon par 'grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des bstan pa 'di la shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyis zhing sems can la snying
11a4(rgyud 'bum): brtse bar bgyi ste/ the tshom ma mchis na gong du bstan pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te the tshom 'tshal bar gyur na cho ga rnams grub par dka' ste/ 'di ni spyan ras
11a5(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gi tsan+da dan nor bu'i 'khor lo las/ migu sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sems kyi 'khor lo las/ mig
11a6(rgyud 'bum): gi sman gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir sgrub
11a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa dang / las ngan pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ dgra thams cad 'dul ba/ bi na ya ka khro ba'i sems b
11b1(rgyud 'bum): ar zhi nas skye bo mang po la gnod pa mi byed cing byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba/ sbyin sreg ho bkra shis kyi cho ga bstan gdog sa brkos te zhugs thab khru gang gru bzhi pa gcig bgyis nas/ me tog
11b2(rgyud 'bum): man le na tsa su dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / chab mar cha mnyam par bsres te/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / shing dri can so so nas srid du sor bcu gnyis zheng du sor gcig mchis
11b3(rgyud 'bum): pa gtubs te thab tu bsred par bgyi zhing / sman nyung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags btab ste zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam
11b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'joms shing tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par 'gyur lags so/ / zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par ho gyi cho ga bzhin bgyis na tshe lo stong thub cing lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//
11b5(rgyud 'bum): zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du cho ga bgyis na rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po nye phan dang / skye bo phal ba rnams kyang skyabs su mchis nas bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun
11b6(rgyud 'bum): phrag gsum gyi bar du cho ga bzhin du bgyis na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nyi zla'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa'ang nye bar lhags nas yongs su srung bar
11b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes kyang dngos grub chen po stsal bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smon pa chen po rnams yongs su skong bar 'gyur lags so// gal te yul
12a1(rgyud 'bum): khams su char dkon par gyur na/ yungs kar dang chab mar la sngags 'dis btab ste/ gdugs gsum gyi bar du zhugs kyi nang du bsregs na char pa 'bab par 'gyur/ gal te
12a2(rgyud 'bum): char ches te mi 'khums na thab de'i thal ba de blangs nas sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste/ gnam du gtor na char pa 'khums par 'gyur ro// gal te ser ba ma rungs pa babs sam/ rlung
12a3(rgyud 'bum): drag po glo bur du langs par gyur na'ang thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ sprin mchis pa'i phyogs su gtor na zhi bar 'gyur lags so// sngags 'di rtag par bzlas brjod
12a4(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na mthu stobs mthu bo che dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas/ lus 'di spangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi
12a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tsan dan gyi snying po'i
12a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bdag gis bstan pa bzhin du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig gis lan cig 'chang bar
12a7(rgyud 'bum): bgyid na gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur bas the tshom gyi bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ / yid la bsams pa'i don thams cad thob par 'gyur bas shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing tha
12b1(rgyud 'bum): chom skyed par mi bgyid/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod kyis snying rje chen pos yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi cho ga gya nom pa
12b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di yang dag par bshad de/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar byas pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do// gang la la zhig gis sems bskyed de
12b3(rgyud 'bum): kha nas bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod kyis ngas bstan pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang nas yang du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis
12b4(rgyud 'bum): rjes su bstan nas/ dngos grub thob par bya ba'i ched du lus nye bar ston la/ nga'i tshig dang 'gal bar ma byed cig dang / nga'ang rjes su yid rang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems
12b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis sems can la rjes su ston
12b6(rgyud 'bum): cing / rtag par yongs su bsrungs nas dngos grub sbal bar lags pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen cing dbang du gyur pa lags so// sems can rnams kyi slad du yid bzhin gyi 'khor
12b7(rgyud 'bum): lo'i gzungs 'di bshad pa lags pas/ gang la la zhig gis len cing 'chang ba dang / rtag par bdag nyid bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis na smon pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/
13a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su skyab par bgyid pa lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
13a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu dga' nas mngon par yid ches pas yang dag par blangs te spyod
13a3(rgyud 'bum): par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/ sbyin sreg hau gyi cho ga sman sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// /
13a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// /
13a5(rgyud 'bum): zhun chen gyi mkhan po dang lo tsa ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
13a6(rgyud 'bum): / gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la
13a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa'i ngang las snying rje'i shugs kyis byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed nas/ pad+ma dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gdan la hri'i 'phro
13b1(rgyud 'bum): 'du las zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ dang po gnyis thal mo sbyar ba/ g.yas 'og ma na bgrang 'phreng mu tig dkar po// g.yon 'og ma na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ sku mdog dkar po//
13b2(rgyud 'bum): zhabs rdzogs pa'i skyil krung bcas pa/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ ma lha mo drug ma dang / yab nor bu rin po ches brten pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
13b3(rgyud 'bum): dang sems ma rab tu mang pos bskor te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos sngags 'di lan cig tsam brjod dam/ dran zhing yid la byas sam/ bris nas lus la
13b4(rgyud 'bum): bcangs sam/ mos shing gus par byas na mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las thams cad byang zhing / ngan song gsum dang / mi khom pa brgyad dang / sdug bsngal dang
13b5(rgyud 'bum): bcas par mi skye'o/ / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / gcan gzan gyi 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// nad dang gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/
13b6(rgyud 'bum): zhes brjod pas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur zhing / tshe 'phos nas kyang bde ba can du skye ste/ 'di la the tshom mam/ som nyi'am/ yid gnyis ma za zhig/
13b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs rdzogs so// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la
14a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di brjod kyis
14a2(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha sa ne/ ni pa sa ne/ ta pa ta pa ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ne/ tsa la tsa la ne/ pUrba yo ga sma ra pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ gang gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya
14a3(rgyud 'bum): stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po rdzogs so// /
14a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ pad+ma mu ku Ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal
14a5(rgyud 'bum): med khang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sgo kun 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting
14a6(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i zhing gi rdul la reg pas/ reg ma thag tu bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis la mchod nas/ 'od zer de bcom
14a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub bo/ / nub ma thag tu thugs rje chen po phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa/ sku mdog gangs kyi rtse la nyi ma shar ba ltar dkar ba/ zhal bcu gcig gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar
14b1(rgyud 'bum): posteng gi zhal dbus ser ba/ g.yas ljang khu/ g.yon dmar ba// steng gi gsum nag po// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu ni byu ru bcag pa lta bur gyur te 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ thugs rje chen po'i bdag po
14b2(rgyud 'bum): / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gzigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thal mo sbyar te// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// sku dang sngags dang
14b3(rgyud 'bum): las rnams dang / / khyad par cho ga bstan par gyis// zhes gsol ba btab nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas bka' stsal pa//
14b4(rgyud 'bum): sku ni rnam pa 'di lta ste// thugs rje dag pas chu shel te// mnyam par bzhengs pas 'gro don mdzad// chu shel mdog 'dra zhal gsum dkar// ljang khu'i mdog can nag po che// ser po de bzhin bcom ldan dmar
14b5(rgyud 'bum): / drang srong dag tu ri dgas brgyan// zhi ba 'dzum dang bzhad pa dang // khros pa'i zhal mnga' spyan gsum mdzes// bcu pa sems dpa'i rtags can te// bcu gcig bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag/ yon tan
14b6(rgyud 'bum): nor bu mu tig 'phreng / / 'phrin las sna tshogs smad dkris pa// dang po'i phyag ni thal sbyar te// g.yas pa rin chen 'phreng ba 'dzin// g.yon pa dri med pad+ma 'dzin// g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa'o//
14b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa ril ba spyi thugs te// g.yas pa 'khor lo rab tu 'dzin// g.yon pa na ni mda' gzhu ste// lhag ma mchog sbyin spyan ldan no// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de cod pan
15a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis nas rin po che rab tu 'phro ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng du rigs lnga 'byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang
15a2(rgyud 'bum): mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa dang / mi bskyod pa'o// khang bu brtsegs pa'i rin po che de'i nang du seng ge dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / nam mkha'
15a3(rgyud 'bum): lding dang / glang po che'o// de dag ni cod pan las byung ba'o// yab yum gyi sku mdog sngon mo ste// pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i steng // tshad med bzhi ste phyag bzhis mdzes// sems dpa'i rgyan dang ldan
15a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / mnyam pa yi ni skyil krung bcas// yab ni sku mdog ser po ste// pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i steng // thal sbyar nor bu bgrang 'phreng 'dzin// rgyan rnams yongs su 'dzin pa'o// yang ni 'od zer
15a5(rgyud 'bum): rab bkye ste/ / zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i// nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma ni// gzhon nu ut+pal mchog sbyin mdzad// zla ba las skyes nam mkha'i mdog/ cung zad khros pas rdo rje can// dkar po gangs
15a6(rgyud 'bum): ltar dkar ba ste/ / nyi zla'i steng na pad+ma 'dzin// drag po gnyis dang hrI yig las// gnyis med tshul gyis 'bras bu rdzogs// ha ya grI bas khams gsum sdud// khro gnyer can gyis 'phrin las
15a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / gshin rje'i gshed po gter 'dzin cing // khams gsum rnam rgyal bdud sde 'joms// 'khor lo dkar po dag pa'i steng // gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// dang po dkon
15b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog rab dad cing / / tshad med bzhi ni yongs su rdzogs// byang chub yan lag rdzogs pa dang // chos kyi rang bzhin stong nyid do// gleng gzhi dang sku bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// /
15b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas gsang sngags bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i zhing khams thams cad du 'od bkye nas gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas yang gsungs pa/ oM hrIH
15b3(rgyud 'bum): hUM hrI aHna mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA ya/ b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te/ samyaka saM bud+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ ar+had b+h+ya/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo
15b4(rgyud 'bum): ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ i ban+d+he ban+de/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su ma ba re/ i li mi li/
15b5(rgyud 'bum): tsi ti dzA la ma pa na ya swA hA/ sngags 'di rnams kha ton byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos lan cig brjod dam/ dran zhing yid la byas sam/ lus la bcangs na mtshams med pa lnga dang /
15b6(rgyud 'bum): de dang nye ba'i las 'byung zhing sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mi skye zhing / mi khom pa brgyad du sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro// gcan gzan dang /
15b7(rgyud 'bum): srin po dang / mi ma yin pa dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// oM rak+Sha rak+Sha/ zhes pas kyang bsrung bar bya'o// oM a kA ro mu khi sar+b+ba d+harmA NAM/ A d+ya nuta pan+na tAH/
16a1(rgyud 'bum): ces pas gtor ma'i chus yi dgas la mchod par bya'o// oM AHhUM/ zhes pas so// de rnams srung ba'i sngags so// oM ma Ni badz+re hUM/ zhes pas so// 'dis ni rigs gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur
16a2(rgyud 'bum): te/ phan yon ni 'di'o// chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku'i thugs rje chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga Shad+b+ha le pU dze me g+has su rba s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pe pU dza ma gras mu dras ra Na sa ma ye hUM/
16a3(rgyud 'bum): oM na maHsarba ta thA ta ga ta A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na baHsarba ta thA ga ha nai wi d+ye pU dze me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta
16a4(rgyud 'bum): shab+da pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta maN+Da la pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas mchod pas yang dag mchod// stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan pa'i// hrIHyig dkar po
16a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ / sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / las dang cho ga bstan pa'i phyir// dang po zhi ba'i las bsgrubs nas// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu// dkar po dag pa gsal dus su// dri zhim chu
16a6(rgyud 'bum): yis legs byugs te/ / me tog dkar po dgram byas nas// khrus dang kha zas phyogs 'thun pa'i// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste// bum pa dkar po tsan dan dkar// dris bkang gos
16a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis legs par dkri/ / maN+Dal dbus su legs par gzhag/ hrIHlas byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma bsnams// zla ba'i gdan
16b1(rgyud 'bum): la legs bzhugs pa/ / hrIHlas 'od zer spro ba bsgom// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas// hrI yi 'phro 'du gsal ba ni// bzlas pa rab tu gsal ba ni// gsang sngags 'di
16b2(rgyud 'bum): ni brjod par bya'o/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sa ga ra bai tsa nA ya b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ ar+ha b+h+yaHsamyaka saM bud+d+ha b+h+yo/ na ma ar+ya a ba lo ki te
16b3(rgyud 'bum): / shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ye/ a mi tA b+ha la che ge mo shAn+ti ku ru swA hA/ zhes bzlas pa bya'o// bruM/ rnam par snang mdzad bum pa'i chu// gang dag legs par khrus byed pa// dri ma thams cad
16b4(rgyud 'bum): yongs dag nas/ / 'bras bu bde ba bde thob gyur// 'jigs pa kun las rnam grol nas// myur du chu skyes mthong bar 'gyur// de nas rgyas pa sgrub 'dod na// nags tshal shin tu mtho bar ni// dri zhim chu yis legs
16b5(rgyud 'bum): byugs la/ / 'bras bur bcas pa'i me tog dgram// rgyan rnams yongs su btags nas ni// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste// rin chen sna lnga 'bru sna lnga// rin chen ga'ur blugs par bya// maN+Dal dbus su legs
16b6(rgyud 'bum): par gzhag/ hrIHlas byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma bsnams// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku ni bdun bsams nas//
16b7(rgyud 'bum): / mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod// hrI yi 'phro 'dugasal bar bzlas// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA nA sA ga ra/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te/ samyaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ na maH
17a1(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ a rbad b+h+yaHsamyaka saM bud+d+ha b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ rat+na kun puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ bang mdzod stong pa'i thog
17a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhag na/ / 'bru yis yongs su khengs par 'gyur// de nas dbang gi las byed na// sdud par byed na chu klung 'gram// pa la sha dang a shwat+tha// me tog dmar po'i ril bu byas// bse ga ba dmar po'i nang
17a3(rgyud 'bum): / du bdug/ me tog dmar pos rab tu mchod// hrIHyig las byung sgron ma'i sku// ljang khu phyag na lcags kyu 'dzin/ phyag sto spyan yang de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas// mchod pa lnga yis
17a4(rgyud 'bum): / mchod byas te// hrIHyig 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/
17a5(rgyud 'bum): ar+had b+h+yaHsamyaka saM bud+d+ha b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a ma~M g+ha b+ha smi ku ru/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mo g+ha b+ha smi ku ru swA hA/ rdzas kyi lde gus lus
17a6(rgyud 'bum): byugs na/ / byugs pa de yis khugs par 'gyur// de nas 'phrin las byed 'dod na// dur khrod shing gcig dag tu ni// ba yi lci bas legs byugs nas// me tog sngon po nim pa yi// spos kyi tshom bu
17a7(rgyud 'bum): lnga steng dgram/ / byang du 'dug ste las 'di brtsam// gcan gzan steng du chu shel te// hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i// mdog dkar ral pa'i thor tsugs can// zhal gcig spyan ni gsum pa ste/
17b1(rgyud 'bum): ridags pags pa 'dzin pa'o// drang srong khros pa'i cha byad can// phyag bzhi dang po mchog sbyin pa// g.yon na pad steng ral gri can// g.yas pa ltos 'gros brgyan pa'i mdung // rtse gsum
17b2(rgyud 'bum): dkar pos brgyan pa'o/ / g.yon na thod pa dkar po ste// dri zhim me tog dag gis bkang // rgyal po chen po rol ba ltar// cung zhig zur gyis gzigs pa'o// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin stong //
17b3(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas te// pad+ma'i 'dab mar legs zhugs pa'i// rgyas pa'i sku ni legs bsams nas// hrIHyi 'phro 'du las byung ba'i// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya// na mo
17b4(rgyud 'bum): rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ b+hA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa mya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ aR+shad b+h+yaHsa myaka saM bud+d+ha b+h+yo/ mam aR+YA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya
17b5(rgyud 'bum): bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ka te ni ka te/ ka ta ka te ka ro te ka ri ta bIr+ye swA hA/ oM karma a mo g+ha badz+ri sau he nI dA hUM phaT/ dri 'am byug pa dag la ni// btab la lus la
17b6(rgyud 'bum): byug par bya/ / me tog sngon po mgo la gzhag/ maN+Dal chu yis lus la byugs// nyi shu rtsa lnga bzlas pas ni// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas bzhi ka sgrub 'dod na// bkra
17b7(rgyud 'bum): / shis dus su rdzogs dus su// ri bo yid 'ong gnas dag tu// sa gzhi chag chag legs btab ste// maN+Dal legs byas me tog ni// dri zhim dkar pos yongs gtor te// gtsang zhing dam pa'i rdzas
18a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dgram/ / gtsang ma bram ze byas te gzhag/ khrus dang ku sha'i steng gnas te// hrIHlas byung ba'i chu skyes ste// chu skyes mdog 'dra zhal gsum yang // 'dzum zhing
18a2(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i cha byad can/ / ljang khu bzhad pa zhal gsum pa// nag po khros pa dmar ser sla// ser po'i zhal nas 'dzum pa ste// dmar po bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu// ri dgas pags pas stong
18a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yogs can/ / sna tshogs sham thabs bsnams pa ste// zhabs gnyis mnyam por bzhengs pa las// g.yas g.yon dang po thal mo sbyar// bar ma bgrang 'phreng pad+ma bsnams// tha ma
18a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog sbyin spyi thugs 'dzin/ / bum pa rnam snang lha mo ni// la se ma le girti ste// nirti nang gi lha mo'i bdag/ zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i// gsang
18a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra/ bai ro tsa na ya/ b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aH te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ arbadab+hU
18a6(rgyud 'bum): samyaka saM bud+d+ha b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te Te bar+the Te/ tsa le tsa li/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/
18a7(rgyud 'bum): ku su me ku su ma ba re/ i li mi li tsi ti/ dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/ bum pa'i tshu la legs bsgrubs nas// lus la byugs na 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga gsang sngags grub pa'i le'u ste gsum
18b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / de nas thabs kyi rim pa ni// gro ga ras sam shing shun la// ra pi 'o mas bris pa'o// chom bu lnga yi 'khor lo la// dbus su sku yi sa bon te// lnga pa yi ni
18b2(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa ste/ / shar du de yang bri bar bya// bzhi pa'i lnga pas dbus su mtshan// lho ru de ni yang dag dgod// lnga pa'i dang po bzhi pa'i gsum// nub du de ni yang dag dgod// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la// e yi
18b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sbyar ba ste/ / byang du de ni yang dag dgod// dbus su thugs kyi sa bon te// shAn+tiM ku ru mtshams su'o// swA hA dbus su dgod par bya// de ltar 'khor lo gsal bkod nas// dngul lam dkar po'i
18b4(rgyud 'bum): ga'ur gzhug/ thams cad las kun zhi bar 'gyur// lung ba'i chu yis legs par bri// puSh+TiM ku ru mtshams su'o// kham phor ser por legs par gzhug/ rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/
18b5(rgyud 'bum): pa la sha yis legs par bris// ba shiM ku ru mtshams su dgod// kham phor dmar por legs par gzhug/ dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// nim pa'i chu yis legs par bris// mA ra ya ni
18b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su dgod/ / lcags sam thod par yang dag gzhug/ 'phrin las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// tsan dan dkar po dri zhim zhing // zhi bas de ni me la sreg/ 'bras bu dmar por bcas pa'i shing //
18b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pas de ni me la'o// dbang ni pa la sha yi shing // de la bsregs na khugs par 'gyur// nim pa'i shing la tshar gcad pa'i// bsreg pa 'phrin las 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo'i le'u
19a1(rgyud 'bum): ste bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas las kyi rim pa ni// dur ba'i rtsa dang 'bras kyi 'dab// til dang yungs kar ci ce la// gsang sngags bzlas na grub pa ni// nga li'i shing
19a2(rgyud 'bum): la legs bsregs nas/ / thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// ku sha star bu shug 'brum dang // stag pa'i me tog dmar po la// gsang sngags bzlas pa rab byas te// tsan dan shing la legs bsregs
19a3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ rgyas par bya ba'i las 'grub cing // nus pa'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur// pA la sha yi shing dag dang // khre dang ci tse mon sran la// gsang sngags bzlas pa rab byas te// pad+ma ka yi shing la
19a4(rgyud 'bum): bsregs/ / nus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur// thams cad dbang du 'du par 'gyur// gro dang so ba 'bras dang ni// bra bo mon sran til nag po// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas te// kha ti ra yi shing
19a5(rgyud 'bum): la bsregs/ / nus pa ldan te las rnams ni// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// pra ha kha tsha'i shing dag la// lo ma 'bras bur bcas pa dang // rdo rje'i shing la sngags bzlas nas// mya ngan
19a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshang gi shing la bsregs/ / nus pa thob nas myur du ni// mi rnams thams cad dbang du sdud// ldong ros pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang // mu la pa tra'i shing dag la// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas// a ru
19a7(rgyud 'bum): ra yi shing la bsregs/ / 'khor lo'i 'og tu bcug pa'i sa// rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur// ba la sha yi shing dag la// ka ra wI ra 'bras dag la// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas//
19b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam bu'i shing la rab bsregs nas// ral gri'i 'og tu bcug nas ni// yul dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur// tshe rabs brgya ru lon pa'i dus// mtshon gyis bsnun pa'i rus pa dag/ gsang
19b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas/ / skyer ba'i me la rab bsregs te// lcags kyu'i 'og tu rab bcug na// glang po dbang du 'gyur bar byed// ba le ta dang te le sha// kha ti ra dang d+ha ti ma// dur khrod shing
19b3(rgyud 'bum): la rab bsregs na/ / stag la sogs pa dbang du 'du// nas dang 'bras dang so ba dang // sman dang rin chen sna tshogs dang // maN+Dal zlum po legs byas te// rgyan rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
19b4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ pad+ma chu shel las skyes pa'i// chu shel mdog dang 'dzum dang bcas// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas bzhugs// ku sha'i stan la shar du 'dug/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcas pa yis// byams pa'i
19b5(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis dbul bar bya'o/ / nad dang rims dang 'brum bu dang // shu ba g.yan pa me dpal dang // nad dang gdon dang thams cad zlog/ mtshams med lnga dang mi dge lnga// 'bras bu sdug
19b6(rgyud 'bum): bsngal thams cad zlog/ me'i las kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa yi// maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la// tsan dan dkar po'i dris bsgos te/
19b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod yon me tog bkang ba dang // ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa yis// rgyal po lta bu'i gzugs la mchod// sdig pa thams cad de mdun du// bshags nas myur du skyabs su 'gro// gro ga dag
20a1(rgyud 'bum): gam shin shul la/ rgyal po dag gi gzugs byas te// yig 'bru lnga yis btab pa yis// tshon sna lnga yis rab tu bcing // byams pa'i sems kyis chu bo la// bskur na rgyal po'i
20a2(rgyud 'bum): chad la thar/ / oM hUM trAM hrIHa sho na ha ri ma ka to// sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA// gcan gzan 'jigs pa 'ong ba'i tshe// maN+Dal dkar po legs byas las la// me tog dkar pos rab tu gtor //
20a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa lnga yis rgyal po mchod// sdig bshags myur du skyabs su 'gro// 'bru sna lnga dang rin chen lnga// tshon sna lnga yi phur ma las// byas pa lus la btags pa la// gcan gzan su 'jigs
20a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las/ / myur ba nyid du grol bar 'gyur// chom rkun dag gis 'jigs pa la// rdo rje sngon po rdo rje can// mthing nags gnon phyag rgya can// mchod nas bdag nyid skyabs su 'gro// oM
20a5(rgyud 'bum): ak+Sho b+h+yaHta ka ka ra Na ga ra kha ti pa/ swa d+hi tsa kri ta ya/ ri ka tse tsa tra ti nA du dan+ta sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ sbrul gyi gdug pas 'jigs pa la// bal po se 'u'i lUg ma la// bram ze'i gzugs kyi rgyan
20a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms nas/ / rin chen 'byung ldan skur bsgoms te// spyi bor mu tig byu ru dang // me shel pad+ma rA ga dang // in+d+ra nI la dung g.yas 'khyil// gser dang dngul dang ngur ba dang // rin chen rgyan dang
20a7(rgyud 'bum): 'bru snar bcas/ / ku sha gla rtsi tsan dan dang // bal lu skyer pa ut+pa la// gur gum dri zhim lus byugs la// oM rat+na saM b+ha ba// sa ti bi sha sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ lce 'bab pa yi 'jigs
20b1(rgyud 'bum): pa la/ / stag dang 'brug gi rus pa la// 'khar ba'i phye ma lcags phye dang // zangs phye ra gan phye ma dang // gser gyi phye ma gro bar gtum// snang ba mtha' yas skur bsgoms te// byams pas
20b2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs mtshams kun tu bstan/ / dug rnams sna tshogs dud pas bdugs// oM a rmi ta badz+ra dz+wa la badz+ra dz+wa la/ gardza gardza/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra swA hA/ me yi 'jigs pa dag la ni// 'brug
20b3(rgyud 'bum): rus sen da wa sha dang / / tal dang sA lu tsi tse dang // nas dang gro dang rgun 'brum gyi// thang phro ma dag la sngags btab ste// me yi phyogs su gtor bar bya// oM bai ro tsa na pra b+ha/ dzA la dz+wa la
20b4(rgyud 'bum): sar sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ snum par snang mdzad skur bsgoms la// me la gtor na sa yis gsod// chu bo dag gis 'jigs pa la// mdze can pho mo'i thod pa yi// ra dang khyi dang phag gi khrag
20b5(rgyud 'bum): sa bdag sde brgyad gzugs dang bcas/ / nang du bcug ste chu bor dor// don yod grub pa'i sku rugs la// oM a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ oM ka bai tA ra Ni sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ phyag stong spyan yang
20b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin te/ / thugs rje chen po'i kha dog ni// so sor gsal zhing bsgoms par bya// byams pa kun la rab tu blta// 'jig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa kun srung ba'i
20b7(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste drug pa'o/ / / sku gdung me tog dkar pos mchod// sa gzhi dri yis chag chag btab// snying po gzungs dang bcas pa 'am// khru gang tshad kyi mchod rten la// legs
21a1(rgyud 'bum): par bstod cing mchod par bgyi/ / stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// thugs rje'i gzugs kyi rten du shar// rdzu 'phrul tshad med bzhi dang ldan// byang chub phyogs ni yongs su
21a2(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs/ / dri med dung 'dra dkar po ste// rgyal chen bzhi yang de bzhin no// byang chub chen po'i mchod rten ni// khri 'phang bcu gsum tog dang ldan// lha yi rol mo char du 'bab// chos sgra rgyun mi 'chad
21a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gter/ / rin chen lnga yi bdag nyid de// phur bus gdab cing yongs su gzung // sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs che// de yi bsod nams rab bstan pa// mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu// nyon
21a4(rgyud 'bum): mongs dbang gyur sdig pa rnams/ / skad cig tsam gyis dag par 'gyur// shin tu gtsang ba'i gnas dag ni// byams ldan snying rje can gyis byas// bram ze'i rigs las byung ba yi// 'dri mkhan snying rje
21a5(rgyud 'bum): can gyis byas/ / rang bsam rnam par dag pa yis// mdun du bdar te mchod par bya// tshad dang kha dog yongs gsal ba// yid du 'ong ba dag la'o// zas dang yid du 'ong ba yi// dkar gsum spags
21a6(rgyud 'bum): pa spangs pa yi/ / sha dang sgog pa la phug dang // zan dang chang ni shin tu spangs// shel 'phreng pad+ma'i snying po dang // bo d+hi tse dang mu tig shis// g.yal dang sbrid pa mi tshig gis// nam yang chod par mi bya'o//
21a7(rgyud 'bum): yo byad dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // las rnams sna tshogs sgrub byed pa// po ti'am lugs ma ras ris la// brten nas bdag ni byams sems ldan// muM
21b1(rgyud 'bum): las 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni/ / dmar gser ut+pal po ti 'dzin// mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// bum pa kha dog ser po ni// rin chen lnga dang 'bru snar bcas// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/
21b2(rgyud 'bum): d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ in+ne baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me/ man da re/ mi li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma ba na ya swA hA/ lan bdun yongs su bzlas byas na// ga ti mug thams cad zhi bar
21b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur// ras ris mchod rten la rten nas// maN+Dal dri zhim me tog dmar// ka ra mngar gsum dag dang ni// 'bras dang til dkar yungs dkar dang // pad+ma'i rtsa ba dkar
21b4(rgyud 'bum): bopo la/ / ril bu rgya shug 'brum bu tsam// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ni// hrIHlas byung ba'i sku mdog dkar// phyag na pad+ma mchod sbyin mdzad// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// dad+ya thA/
21b5(rgyud 'bum): oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu rba d+hA ru/ in+d+ra ban+di/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me man da re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swAhA/ ril bu dag la sngags btab ste// byams pa'i sems
21b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pas bza'/ / srid pa'i 'dod chags zhi gyur nas// rab tu bde ba thob par 'gyur// maN+Dal sngon po legs byas nas// ut+pal po sngon po nim pa dang // a ka ru dang tsan dan dang // dri yi chu yis
21b7(rgyud 'bum): bum pa dgang / / phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can// sku mdog ljang sngon cung zhig khro// rdo rje dril bu phyag na bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha rad+ha ra/ d+hi ri ti ri/ d+hu ru dru ru
22a1(rgyud 'bum): in+d+ra ban+de/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me mnad re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma ba na la swAhA/ b+h+rUM bskyed phyag na rdo rje ni// bum pa'i rgyu yis khrus byas nas// zhe sdang
22a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu zhi nas ni/ / bzod pa chen po thob par 'gyur// dug rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / ras sam grog shing shun la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/
22a3(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pa'o// srung ba lus la gdags byas na// nad dang gdon dang rims dang ni// 'jigs za'i nad dang gdon las thar// bde ba yongs su rdzogs
22a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / skud pa dag ni dkar po la// mdud pa dag ni rab byas te// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad ni legs bzlas nas// srung ba'i dam pa 'di byas na// srung ba yi ni dam pa
22a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dis/ / srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ba'o// mu tig rin chen byu ru gser// ga pur gur kum gla rtsi dang // a ka ru dang du ru ka/ phur ma snying khar gdags par bya// tsan dan gla rtsi gur kum dang
22a6(rgyud 'bum): gu gul nag po bsregs pa'i phye/ / ba yi 'o mas lde gu bya// gnas gsum dag tu byugs pas ni// gdon dang nad kyis 'jigs kun las// byugs pas de ni srung bar 'gyur// srung ba'i
22a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i le'u ste dgu pa'o/ / / ser ba yongs su srung ba la// seng ldeng lhang ti'i phur bu la// gzungs sngags bzlas pa dbus su ni// hUM las byung ba'i sku bskyed do//
22b1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bzhir khro bo chen po ni// shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal ni// sku mdog dkar po me dpung 'bar// rdo rje 'khor lo sdigs mdzub mdzad// oM pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita ha na ha na hUM phaT// lho ru gshin rje
22b2(rgyud 'bum): gshed po ni/ / dmar po la ga na be con 'dzin// oM ya mAn+ta kr-ita tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ nub tu rta mgrin dmar po ni// me dpung rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin// oM ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ byang du khro gnyer can
22b3(rgyud 'bum): sku ni/ / ljang sngon ral gri 'dzin pa ste// oM a mo g+ha ka b+h+r-i ku ti ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ phyogs bzhir phur bu dag la ni// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// gcan gzan dri ma yungs kar bsres//
22b4(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags bzlas shing mkha' la gtor// oM badz+ra kro d+ha hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ser ba srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom
22b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ / phyag stong dang spyan stong las 'od zer 'byung ba 'di lta ste// dkar po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang / ljang khu dang / ser po ste/ 'od zer de dag gis
22b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba ris drug po de dag thams cad la khyab ste dbugs dbyung ba mdzad do/ / de nas rgya chen bzhi dang // sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thub bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
22b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od chen dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang
23a1(rgyud 'bum): tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang /
23a2(rgyud 'bum): 'og min la sogs pa'i lha de dag gis mchod pa'i sprin gyi char phab nas/ lha'i bus tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i sku// phyag stong nyon mongs grol ba'i phyag
23a3(rgyud 'bum): spyan stong shes rab 'od gsal te/ / 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sku de mi snang bar 'gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
23a4(rgyud 'bum): par gyur to/ / de nas lha'i bus gsol pa/ 'di la phan yon ci zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig rgyud 'di yid byed na/ nad dang rims dang gdon dang ni//
23a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po gcan gzan 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // mtshams med sdig pa mi dge kun// rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur/
23a6(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba ngan song sdug bsngal dang // mi khom brgyad las rnam grol te// nyan dang 'chad dang sgom par 'gyur// dri med nam mkha' dkyil lta bur// bcom ldan 'das kyang mthong bar 'gyur// zhes
23a7(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas/ legs so/
23b1(rgyud 'bum): legs so zhes bya ba gsungs nas stan la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag lnga stong dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
23b2(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bstod do/ / pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang / lo tsa ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
23b3(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar skad du/ lo ki shwa kalpa/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
23b4(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten mgon po'i rtog pa ni/ mdor bsdus 'dir ni brjod bya ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyun chen po// 'dod
23b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don kun ra ba ster ba/ / dang por re zhig rig pa 'dzin pas gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ hUM gis dag par byas pas nye bar 'dug cing pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma
23b6(rgyud 'bum): kohaM/ zhes brjod la/ thams cad stong pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o// de'i rjes la/ oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+haM ka ro mi/ de ltar brjod la/ sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bsgoms nas/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i
23b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o/ / zla ba'i steng du hrIH'i sngags gyur pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu bsgom par bya ste/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa// phyag gnyis pa/ mdog dmar ba/
24a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan du ni gos dkar mo/ de la 'khyud pa/ pad+ma dmar po kha 'byed cing gar gyi tshul can/ khab kyi phyag rgyas kha 'byed par bsgoms la/ 'di brjod par bya ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po ni/
24a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags skyon gyis mi gos shing / de bzhin sna tshogs bag chags skyon// khams gsum rnam par dag pa'o// dbu rgyan la 'od dpag tu med pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas 'di brjod par bya ste/
24a3(rgyud 'bum): / oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya bAk+Shit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ de ltar bsgoms nas phyogs brgyad du lha mo rnams bsam mo// oM bi lo ko ni/ a ba lo ki ni/ a ba lo ka ya swA hA/ shar gyi 'dab ma la ni
24a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par gzigs ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o/ / oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ lho'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma pa la sha'i 'dab ma lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o//
24a5(rgyud 'bum): oM b+hu ri Ni ma hA tsakra birta ni hUM/ nub kyi 'dab ma la b+hu ri Ni zhes bya ba'i lha mo ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM b+h+r-i ku TI tA re tu ta ma tA hUM/ byang gi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can zhes bya ba
24a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lha mo pad+ma ser po bsnams pa'o/ / oM ma hA shri ye ma Ni pad+me hUM/ 'di ni pad+ma'i gos can shar phyogs kyi mtshams su btsod lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM badz+ra pad+me shwa ra ma ra pad+me hUM/
24a7(rgyud 'bum): lho phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o// oM bi shra pad+me hUM/ 'di ni sna tshogs kyi pad+ma ste/ nub phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma nag po bsnams pa'o// oM bi shwa bak+She hUM/ 'di ni sna tshog
24b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhal can te/ byang phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM hrIHpad+ma narte shwa ra hUM/ ze 'bru'i dbus su 'dod chags chen po'i bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// de ltar
24b2(rgyud 'bum): gang sgom pa dang ldan zhing ting nge 'dzin la goms par byed na dngos grub brtan por 'gyur ro/ / des sangs rgyas nyid dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ster ro// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub cing /
24b3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin no// 'jig rten kun gyi bde ston cing // so so rang nyid rjes su sgrub// sangs rgyas nyid ni byab sems nyid// rang rgyal nyid kyang de bzhin no// yid 'ong sangs rgyas go 'phang ni// /
24b4(rgyud 'bum): spyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dang ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar dang rab sbyar te// rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas kun gyi bcud len yin// sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis
24b5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ bcud kyis len ni bde ba yang // 'grub 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po yi// gzhon zhing nad med dam bde zhing // tshe dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // skal bzang ye shes bla na med// skye ba 'di la
24b6(rgyud 'bum): 'grub pa'o/ / ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang // gsad dang bskrad pa la sogs pa// rengs dang phur bus gdab nyid dang // nam mkhar 'gro ba de bzhin no// sa bcu'i dbang
24b7(rgyud 'bum): phyug thob 'gyur zhing / / ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur// de phyir ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// rdo rje dam tshig de yi ni// rig pa dang ni bcas pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten mgon por 'grub par 'gyur/
25a1(rgyud 'bum): oM hrIHpad+ma narte shwa re hUM/ rtsa ba'i sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na nyin mo dang nub mo byas pa'i sdig pa nyams par 'gyur ro// yang na lnga brgya bzlas brjod byas na nad thams cad las
25a2(rgyud 'bum): grol bar 'gyur ro/ / yang na stong bzlas brjod byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro// yang na stong phrag gnyis bzlas brjod byas na thams cad kyis mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro// gzhan
25a3(rgyud 'bum): yang stong phrag gsum bzlas brjod byas na skal ba bzang ba dang g.yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang stong phrag bzhi bzlas brjod byas na dbul ba med par 'gyur ro// yang na stong phrag
25a4(rgyud 'bum): lnga bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad kyi snying 'khrug par byed do/ / stong phrag drug bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro// stong phrag bdun bzlas brjod byas na bdud bzhi las mchog
25a5(rgyud 'bum): tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / stong phrag brgyad bzlas brjod byas na rig 'dzin ma 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag dgu bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin mo 'grub par 'gyur ro// khri tsho gcig bzlas brjod
25a6(rgyud 'bum): byas na lha dang / klu dang / mi'i bu mo rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag nyi shu bzlas brjod byas na bar snang la 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag sum cu bzlas
25a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas na bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / stong phrag bzhi bcu bzlas brjod byas na nam mkha' la spyod pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// stong phrag lnga bcu bzlas brjod byas na
25b1(rgyud 'bum): ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / stong phrag drug cu bzlas brjod byas na grub pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// stong phrag bdun cu bzlas brjod byas na sa gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// stong phrag
25b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad cu bzlas brjod byas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na rang dga'i
25b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs su 'gyur ro/ / bzhi cha dang bcas pa'i 'bum phrag bzlas brjod byas na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro// bye ba phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na thams cad du rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i nus pa
25b4(rgyud 'bum): can spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta bu 'grub par 'gyur zhing / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyang byin gyis rlob bo// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das gsung rdo rjes gsungs pa'o// oM paN+Da ra ba si ni ba ri de hUM/
25b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni gos dkar mo'i sngags te lan cig brjod pas sdig pa'i rigs kyi tshogs sreg par byed do// nub bdun gyi nang rol du rgyal po blon po dang bcas pa mdun na 'don dang / skye 'gro'i tshogs dang / btsun
25b6(rgyud 'bum): mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bzlas pa tsam gyis phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i rim pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na gang yang sangs
25b7(rgyud 'bum): / rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nus pa mnyam zhing / dngos su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ro// oM baM lo ki ni a ba lo kA ya swA hA/ 'di'i sbyor ba ni stong phrag bcu bzlas
26a1(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas na me long dang / mtheb chen dang / nam mkha' la sogs pa kha gsal po pra dbab pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang sngon byung ba dang yang da ltar dang byis 'ong ba de ston par byed do//
26a2(rgyud 'bum): yang na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par bsngags par byas la/ nub mo nyal ba'i dus su so shing 'chos nas mi smra bar nyal na dgos pa gang yin pa rmi lam du ston par byed/ de'ang 'khrul pa med par
26a3(rgyud 'bum): ston no/ / oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma 'di 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na 'jig rten gsum grub par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu mo dang / klu'i bu mo dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi
26a4(rgyud 'bum): bu mo dang / mi'i bu mo ste/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas gang 'dod pa de'i chos 'byung du gur kum dang / rgya skyegs dang / rang byung gi me tog dang / byang chub kyi sems dang yang dag par ldan pas rtsibs drug pa shin tu rno ba'i
26a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo dmar po 'khor bzhin pa rnam par bris pa bsam la/ / chos 'byung de sgrub pa pos ri sul chu ngogs gsang ba'i gnas su bsam par bya'o// de'ang myos shing sgrub pa po'i steng du lhung ba'i rnam pa
26a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya'o/ / de bkug la rang la chu shing nor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur bar blta'o zhes bya'o// yang na lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang /
26a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba dang / blon po dang / skyes bu 'am/ gang 'dod pa de dmar por rnam par bsams la/ de'i snying khar rdo rje lcags kyu 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug pa'i lcags kyus 'bigs bzhin
26b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / zhags pas rked pa nas bcings la 'gugs bzhin pa 'dod pas myos par gyur pas rab tu gsal por bsam par bya'o// bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa 'gugs shing dbang du 'gyur ro zhes
26b2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / oM pu ri Ni ma hA tsakra brti ni hUM/ 'di'i sbyor ba ni dri chen dang rdo rje chu la sogs pas dkyil 'khor byas la/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gis mnyam par mchod la// de na gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos
26b3(rgyud 'bum): gling ngam/ / gling gzhan dang / grong khyer dang / grong dang / yul 'khor gyi rgyal por bsam zhing bzlas par bya'o// des bdag po nyid du 'gyur zhing longs spyod pa la longs spyad nas bde ba can gyi 'jig
26b4(rgyud 'bum): / rten gyi khams su skye ba thob par 'gyur ro// oM b+h+r-i ku TI tA re tu ta ma ta hUM/ lha mo khro gnyer can zhes bya ba 'di ni/ dgra'i rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs la/ dug dang / tshwa dang / ske tshe dang / khrag dang / chu bo'i
26b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gram gnyis kyi sa dang dri chen rdo rje chus bsnos la gzugs brnyan byas la/ mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin gyi phur bus tshigs dang gnad kun la btab la/ thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag ste dur khrod kyi
26b6(rgyud 'bum): me la gdung bar bya'o/ / zhag bdun du sbyor ba byas pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gal te sems la sdig pa med par gyur na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro// oM ma hA shri ye ma Ni
26b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+me hUM/ / lha mo 'di la dri dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / bsod snyoms kyi zas kyis so sor mchod la bzlas pa byas na thams cad du bsrungs par 'gyur ro// yul chos kyi rtsod pa las rgyal
27a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / spun ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mnyam par 'gyur ro// nor chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro// yang na pad+ma stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro//
27a2(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra pad+me shwa ri ma ra pad+me hUM/ rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma 'di yid kyis bzlas na dbang dang dgug pa la sogs pa byed do// la na bdun mngon par bsngags te gtsug pud mdun na rang srung zhing rims
27a3(rgyud 'bum): dang lkog nad dang / nad thams cad dang / mtshon dang / me dang / rkun po dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / sbrul dang / 'ching ba dang / rgya mtsho dang / sha za'i nad stong phrag gcig bzlas
27a4(rgyud 'bum): pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / lan cig gi las kyis brjed byed kyi gdon dang / zad byed dang / skyug pa dang / bri bar dka' ba dang / sgom par dka' ba'i gdug pa can gyi sems can thams
27a5(rgyud 'bum): cad nyams par 'gyur ro/ / 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na lus 'phel zhing skal ba bzang ba dang / lus gzhon zhing nad med par byed cing dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba nyams par byed do// yang na klu
27a6(rgyud 'bum): thab khung du bris la der dug dang / ske tshe dang / tsha ba'i sbyin sreg bya zhing / klu'i ming dang spel bas 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na char chen po phab nas mu ge med par 'gyur ro// oM bi shwa
27a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+me hrIH/ sna tshogs pad+ma 'di ni rmongs pa dang / rengs pa dang / mnan pa dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / phur bu dang / mig 'phrul dang / ngo mtshar dang / mi mtho
27b1(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pa dang / phug tu 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / lcags sgrogs gcod pa dang / ril por dgug pa gang dang gang yin pa rgyud las bstan pa dang / rgyud gzhan dang yang dag par
27b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i las thams cad byed do/ / lus dang / ngag dang / yid gsum gyi dngos grub ster te/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub cing gang 'dod pa'i las
27b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o/ / oM bi shwa pad+me hUM/ sna tshogs rdo rje zhes brjod pa'i lha mo 'dis ni ngag gi dngos grub ster ro// tshigs shad mkhan du byed cing gzhan gyi ngag rengs
27b4(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / rang nyid srung ba dang gzhan yang srung bar 'gyur ro// rang skal ba bzang zhing gzhan yang skal ba bzang po'i rang don dang gzhan don byed do// ji ltar 'dir ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
27b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug sems can gyi don la spros zhing brtson pa de bzhin du/ 'dir bcom ldan 'das mas dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar
27b6(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnams la ma nyid kyis srung ngo zhes thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de ltar rtog pa'i rgyal po bsdus pa rab tu bstan to// sems
27b7(rgyud 'bum): brtan rtog pa med pa yi/ / blo dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig spyod lam bstan pa yi// sangs rgyas kun rgyu ji lta bar// de ltar 'dir ni rab sbyar nas// de nas rtag pa'i go 'phang 'grub// ji ltar
28a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod par gnas byed cing / / kun la longs spyod kun byed ltar// ji ltar 'dod pa'i snying rjes spyod// ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyod pa yis// 'dug pa 'am ni langs kyang rung // 'chag pa
28a2(rgyud 'bum): 'am ni gang dang de/ / rgod pa 'am ni brjod pa 'am// gang de ji ltar don bzhin no// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'am// sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa yang // rang mos lha yi rnal 'byor bdag/ bsod nam
28a3(rgyud 'bum): chung ba'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ / 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// thams cad mkhas pa nyid dang ni// thams cad rdo rje 'chang nyid kyang // skye ba 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// yang gsung
28a4(rgyud 'bum): pa rnal 'byor dag ni gzugs brnyan gyi/ / bcos ma'i sku las 'gyur ba min// byang chub sems chen la brtson na// rnal 'byor dag ni de lha yin// khrag chen po dang ga pur bcas// tsan dan
28a5(rgyud 'bum): dmar dang bsres pa ni/ / tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na// kun las mchog gyur bcud len no// sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni// bcud kyis len ni sla ba ru// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe bzang dang //
28a6(rgyud 'bum): nad med bde ba bzang po 'thob// grub pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin pa dang // gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin 'grub// bde ston thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // rang nyid so so
28a7(rgyud 'bum): rjes su 'grub/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid kyang // sangs rgyas kun ni rab 'grub 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor gyi spyod
28b1(rgyud 'bum): pa byed par 'dod cing sems yongs su dag pa med na de'i tshe thang sku'i sgrub pa bshad de/ / bsnyen gnas dang ldan zhing smyung bar gnas pa'i lha bzos/ tshon sna ma 'dres par ras gsar pa de'ang rang rang gi kun tu khru
28b2(rgyud 'bum): re'i tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ sna tshogs kyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ ze'u 'bru'i dkyil du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das mdog
28b3(rgyud 'bum): dmar ba/ mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal gsum pa/ zhal gyi gtso bo ni dmar ba ste 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi phyir ro// g.yas pa gnag pa ste zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi phyir ro// g.yon pa dkar ba ste gti
28b4(rgyud 'bum): mug chen po nyid kyi phyir ro/ / phyag drug pa bya'o// g.yon pa'i phyag gcig gis gos dkar mo'i mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa dang / pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa dang / g.yon pa gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhu
28b5(rgyud 'bum): bsnams pa'o/ / g.yas pa gsum du khab kyi phyag rgyas pad+ma kha 'byed pa dang / me tog gi mda' dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas par bya'o// shar gyi 'dab
28b6(rgyud 'bum): ma la rnam par gzigs ma mdog dkar mo pad+ma dmar po dang rdo rje phyag na bsnams pa'o/ / lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la lha mo sgrol ma ljang khu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi lo ma dang rin po che phyag na bsnams pa'o//
28b7(rgyud 'bum): nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la b+hu ri ni ser mo ut+pal sngon po dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can pad+ma dkar ser lta bu pad+ma ser po dang ral gri phyag na bsnams pa'o//
29a1(rgyud 'bum): shar phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma'i gos can ma gser lta bu'i mdog btsod lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// lho phyogs kyi mtshams su rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma nam mkha'i mdog can
29a2(rgyud 'bum): dkar po pad+ma dang shel gyi 'phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ / nub phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs kyi pad+ma ston ka'i zla ba lta bu dkar ser gyi mdog pad+ma nag po dang po ti phyag na bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi mtsham
29a3(rgyud 'bum): su sna tshogs rdo rje ma sna tshogs kyi mdog can du byas la/ / sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang sna tshogs kyi pad+ma bsnams pa'o// de ltar pad+ma la bkod cing bris la/ sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni mtshams su'o// dzaHhUM baM
29a4(rgyud 'bum): hoH'i yi ge las yang dag par byung ba'i lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu rnams ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su'o// yang thang sku gzhan brjod par bya ste/ ston ka'i zla ba
29a5(rgyud 'bum): lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das g.yas na skud pa dang / dbyug pa dang / rtse gsum dang / mchod sbyin pa'i phyag can/ g.yon na pad+ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / zhags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen
29a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dam tshig gi po ti bsnams pa'i phyag can/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs 'chang ba/ sbrul mchod phyir thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan la 'od dpag med bzhengs pa 'am skyil krung byed pas
29a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa dbu rgyan du byas pa'o/ / de'i g.yas phyogs kyi cha ru sgrub pa po mchod yon gyi snod dang bdug spos kyi snod lag pas gzung bar bya'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das phyag gnyis pa ri gru 'dzing
29b1(rgyud 'bum): la gnas shing seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ g.yon pa sa la gnas shing zhabs g.yas pa pad+ma'i steng gi gdam stengs su bzhugs pa'o// phyag re re na 'phreng ba bsnams par sems pa pos 'phreng
29b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'og tu 'dren pa'i tshul 'dis bsam par bya ba ni sems pa lta bur gnas pa zhes bya'o/ / cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das dkar zhing dmar ba phyag bcu pa ri dgas seng ge'i gdan la pad+ma'i steng du
