29b3(rgyud 'bum): skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ g.yas na 'phreng ba bsnams pa'o// seng ge dang / glang po che dang / me dang / sbrul gyis 'jig pa rnam las grol ba'i cha byad can no// g.yon na pad+ma dmar po sdong bu gnyis
29b4(rgyud 'bum): pa steng du po ti can te/ rku ma dang / lcags sgrog gis bcings pa dang / mtshon dang / thog chen po dang / sha zas za ba rnams sgrol ba'i cha byad can no// gnas de brgyad du sgrub pa po rgyan thams cad kyis
29b5(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ sngon bzhin du langs pa'am 'dug par bsam par bya'o// gzhan yang cho ga ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs
29b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzugs 'chang ba/ dbu bcu gsum pa/ spyi bo'i mgo bo ni ljang khu'i rta zhal lo// yang na zhi ba sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal lo// phyag brgya pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sna tshogs kyi
29b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshon cha bsnams pa'o/ / yang na zhal brgya po phyag stong pa'ang bya'o// kha cig tu rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas pa 'am bzhengs pa'ang bya'o// tsam pa lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das so//
30a1(rgyud 'bum): thang sku de kun gyi g.yas phyogs kyi bar du sgrub pa po me tog dang / mchod yon gyi snod dang / bdug spos kyi snod lag pa na gzung bar bya'o// de rnams kyi dbu la dbu rgyan du 'od dpag med
30a2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'am/ chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten bri bar bya'o// 'di ni thang sku'i cho ga'o// thang sku'i mdun du rtsa ba'i sngags ji lta ba 'dod pa de bzla zhing bsam gtan yang byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la/
30a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod yon snod dang / yongs su gang ba'i bdud rtsi lta bu'i zas dang / sgron ma'i zas la byas nas mchod yon byin te sngags gang 'dod pa de bzlas pa byas na/ de la gsungs pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// gsang ba po
30a4(rgyud 'bum): ni sngags 'di nyid/ kha cig la yang mi sbyin no// blo ldan sems can don brtson pa'i// sems brtan pa la sbyin par bya// mchod rten las byed nyid la ni// blo ldan 'bad pas sbyin par bya// rang nyid dang ni nor dag
30a5(rgyud 'bum): gis/ / bla ma la rtag gus par bya// rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor la// mchog tu gyur pa'i yon yang dbul// gang dang gang ni gtang dka' ba// mchog tu gyur par 'dir ni sngags// chung ma sring mo dang yang ni
30a6(rgyud 'bum): bu mo dang ni tsha mo dag/ bu mo rgyan kun brgyan par bya'o// glang chen rta dang shing rta dang // phyogs dang grong khyer rgyal srid dang // yul 'khor rgyal srid ldan pa dang // rin chen sna tshogs dag kyang ni// gzhan
30a7(rgyud 'bum): yang rdo rje slob dpon dbul/ / rdo rje slob dpon dgyes gyur pa// thams cad rab sbyin dbul bar bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzem+b+ha la dang
30b1(rgyud 'bum): bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ / @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang
30b2(rgyud 'bum): po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la
30b3(rgyud 'bum): dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du mas yongs su
30b4(rgyud 'bum): bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.ya
30b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs
30b6(rgyud 'bum): pa zla ba bla ma'i 'od las blangs pa kun tu bzang po'i gzungs yang dag par ston par 'tshal te/ gzungs de thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag
30b7(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang sel to// longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs pa'ang yongs su 'dzin to// lus rnam par dag pa'ang
31a1(rgyud 'bum): 'thob bo/ / ngag rnam par dag pa'ang 'thob bo// sems rnam par dag pa'ang 'thob bo// pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// gzungs rgya mtsho thams
31a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang 'thob bo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mnyes par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// dpa' bar
31a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ / rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ 'bar ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang
31a4(rgyud 'bum): thob/ mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
31a5(rgyud 'bum): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdag la mngon sum du gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das des na bdag de ltar dran pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/ blo gros 'di lta bu dang ldan/ chags pa ma mchis
31a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan zhing / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i don mchis par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag thos pa don mchis/ gzungs 'di thos pa'i don
31a7(rgyud 'bum): mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad cing 'khor bzhi po de'ang yongs su dgod du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dag pa de'i dus la dbab par shes
31b1(rgyud 'bum): na smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor bzhi po 'di ni byin gyis brlabs zin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skad cig
31b2(rgyud 'bum): thang cig yud tsam de nyid la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzungs 'di smras so/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
31b3(rgyud 'bum): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ kha ga me kha ga me/ tsak+Shu kha be/ shro tra kha be/ g+hA Na kha be/ dzi hA kha be/ ga la ya kha be/ ma na kha be/
31b4(rgyud 'bum): sa ra kha be/ sa ra kha be/ sa ra kha be/ shU na tra kha be/ a na mit+ta kha be/ a pra Ni hi ta kha be/ sa mA d+hi kha be/ pA ra mi tA kha be/ bo d+hi kha be/ sa ra sa ra sa ra/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ti/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra
31b5(rgyud 'bum): d+harma a d+hiSh+Thi ta/ ka la ka la ka ya/ saM g+hA a d+hiSh+Thi te/ na mo dra na ba tI nAM/ bud d+ha ko Ti NaM/ a d+hiSh+ThA na du man/ tsa ta sra pa ra sha do A yur ba kha tsa da dan du/ tad+ya thA/ su ra b+hi su ra b+hi/ ma hA su ra b+hi/ mu ni
31b6(rgyud 'bum): mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sa mri dAn du man/ sa man+ta b+ha dra d+ha ra Ni swA hA/
31b7(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag
32a1(rgyud 'bum): ni gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to/ / gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/ nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
32a2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phongs par gyur pa'i tshe lan bdun yid la bgyis na thar par 'gyur ro// rims nad thams cad
32a3(rgyud 'bum): la rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / rlung gis zin na mar dang 'bru mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te bsku bar bgyi'o// so na na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su
32a4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te bca' bar bgyi'o/ / rna ba na na ras bal gyi sa bon 'bru mar dang lhan cig tu bskol ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zangs kyi snod kyis rna bar glugs par bgyi'o// klang
32a5(rgyud 'bum): pa na ba la 'bru mar ro/ / lton pa la byab par bgyi'o// gdon gyis btab pa la tshon skud sna lnga la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te mgul du gdags so// mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis
32a6(rgyud 'bum): btab na 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te gshis thams cad du byug go/ nad thams cad la byab par bgyi'o// 'di ni sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i cho ga'o// ci ste sangs rgyas dang
32a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin ma thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / mi snang bar bgyi ba dang / mig bslu ba dang / ldong ros la sogs pa sgrub par
32b1(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal na/ des sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor bgyis te bum pa gang ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzhag la/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bres
32b2(rgyud 'bum): te/ me tog sna tshogs kyis chal par bkang la/ tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / kun tu ru'i bdug pas bdugs te/ mar me brgya rtsa brgyad bud cing mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ tshangs par spyod pa
32b3(rgyud 'bum): gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis mtshams gcad par bgyid do/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa
32b4(rgyud 'bum): yam hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ti li ban d+ha mi/ mi li ban d+ha mi/ tsi li mi li ban d+ha mi/ sI mi ban d+ha mi/ bdag gi mtshams las su'ang 'da' bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ chu la lan nyi shu rtsa
32b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig yongs su bzlas te phyogs bcur mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ / gang gis 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di dag kyang thog mar brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba
32b6(rgyud 'bum): lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li tsi le li/ i hi b+ha ga bAn/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya swA hA/ 'di ni bdag
32b7(rgyud 'bum): gi snying po bshad pa ste/ des bdag la dgug par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung ste/ nya'i bar du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/
33a1(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi/ dus gsum du khrus bgyi/ dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi'o// de nas tshes bco lnga la mchod pa chen po bgyis te bzlas brjod dpas
33a2(rgyud 'bum): tu ma mchis par bgyi'o/ / 'on tang nam gyi gung thun la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi kha dog gi lus dang ldan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa
33a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / lus las 'od zer bye ba stong 'byin cing mchi bar 'gyur ro// de la rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyid cing brtan par bgyis na mthong ma thag tu sa thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs/
33a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// lho phyogs su rin chen tog dang / nub phyogs su 'od dpag med dang / byang
33a5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rags pa'i tshul gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'di
33a6(rgyud 'bum): nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnamasu skye bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal
33a7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
33b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
33b2(rgyud 'bum): pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/
33b3(rgyud 'bum): skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya nI la kaN+Tha nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nI la
33b4(rgyud 'bum): kaN+Tha zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag
33b5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag
33b6(rgyud 'bum): nges par shes rab chen po'i mig thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// bdag nges par sems can thams cad yongs
33b7(rgyud 'bum): su skyob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzig
34a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag nges par myur du shes rab chen po'i grur zhugs par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can
34a2(rgyud 'bum): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par rdzu
34a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ri la
34a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzeg par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'jug par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras
34a5(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag nges par myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag ral gri'i ri la mchi ba na ral gri'i ri de rang nyil zhing zhig
34a6(rgyud 'bum): par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag me ma mur gyi nang du mchi ba na me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du mchi ba na sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin
34a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis stongs par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba na yi dgas rnams rang tshim par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi ba na de dag gi sems
34b1(rgyud 'bum): rang dul bar gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag dud 'gro rnams su mchi ba na de dag ye shes chen po rang thob par gyur cig/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/
34b2(rgyud 'bum): ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba ban d+ha na/ ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ sarba pA pa sa mu dron+d+ro Sha Na ka rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma ni ka rA ya/ sarba i t+yu pa dra ba/ bi nA sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye Shutra
34b3(rgyud 'bum): NA ya/ ta s+ya na ma skr-i taM/ i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ta ba nI la kaN+Tha/ na mA pa ra ma hr-i da yaM/ a brta yi Sh+ya mi/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nAn/ shu b+ha tse ta nAM/ sarba bud d+ha nA ma/ pA pa mA ra ga bi sho d+ha kaM/
34b4(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ A lo ke/ A lo ka/ A d+hi ba tI/ lo ka ti/ krAn+te/ e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he pre ya bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA kA ru ni ka/ hr-i da yaM e h+ye he Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya pa ra ma mai tri tsit+ta
34b5(rgyud 'bum): kA ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ru/ karma sA d+ha ya/ sA d+ha ya/ bi d+hAn/ de hi de hi mi/ a raM ga maM ga ma/ bi haM ga ma/ sid d+ha yo gI shA ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bIr+yan+te/ ma hA bIr+ya n+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra NI shwa ra/ tsa la tsa la/
34b6(rgyud 'bum): bi ma la mut+te/ Ar+ya a ba tsaki te shwa ra/ kr-iSh+TA dzi na/ dza nA mu ku Ta/ A laM kri ta/ sha rI ra la ma ba/ pra lam+bi ba laM ba/ ma hA sid d+ha shud d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba ya/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ mahA ma la/ tsa la tsa la/
34b7(rgyud 'bum): mahA tsa la/ kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha kriSh+Tha bA sha nin+na ta na/ he pad+ma hAsta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ni shA tsa re shwa ra kriSh+ThaSh+Ta sarba kri ta ya dzI pa bI ta/ e h+ye hi ma hA bi ra/ ma hA ba rA ha mu kha tri pra ra/ da ha ne shwa ra/ nA ra ya NA/ rU pa ba la be sha d+ha ri/
35a1(rgyud 'bum): e h+ye ti nI la kaN+Da/ e h+ye he ma hA hA la hA la/ bi Sha ni rdi ta lo ka s+ya rA ga bi Sha bi na sha na/ dwe Sha bi Sha bi na shan/ mo ha gi bi NA sha na/ hu lu phu wa/ ma hA hu lu ha de/ mthab
35a2(rgyud 'bum): nA b+hU/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bu d+ha/ bu rgya la te yon sa mi ta ba nI la kar+b+ha e d+h+ye ti/ bA ma s+t+rai ta ma hA si ta su Sha/ ha sa hA sa/ muny+tsa sur+tha/ mahAT+Tar+tha ha sa/ e h+ye ne D+ho d+ha ma hA sidaH/
35a3(rgyud 'bum): yo gI shwa rA/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bA tsa na/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ brnyan/ s+phAr s+pha ra tA ma b+ha ga thaM/ lo kA nu bi lo ga sa~M/ ta thA ga tan/ de hi de hi/ me dA ra/ sha na kA ma s+ya/ da sha naM/ pra sA d+ha ya swA hA/ sidaH
35a4(rgyud 'bum): ya swA hA/ ma hA sid d+hA ya swA hA/ sid d+ha yo gi shwa rA ya swA hA/ nI la kaN+DA ya swAhA/ bA rA ha mu khA ya swAhA/ si ha mu khA ya swAhA/ ma hA na ra sa~M ha mu khA ya swAhA/ badz+ra hastA ya swAhA/ sid d+ha bi d+ha
35a5(rgyud 'bum): ya swA hA/ ma hA sid d+ha bi d+ha d+ha ra ya swAhA/ pad+ma hastA ya swAhA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba ti ta ya dz+nyo ba pi ya swA hA/ ma hA mA la wa saT d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsakrA yu d+ha d+ha rA ya sAt+ma/ shaM kha shab+da ni rI nA da na ka rA ya swA hA
35a6(rgyud 'bum): bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/ bA ma s+thi ta kar+N+Na de sha kr-iSh+Na dzi nA~M ya swA hA/ b+ha g+ma tsarma Ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/ lo ke shwa rA ya sAhA/ ma hA yo shrI shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid d+hi shwa rA ya sAhA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM swAhA/ ku ru ra//
35a7(rgyud 'bum): mudz+dzinA~M swAhA/ na ma ar+ya ba a pa ma kau te shwa rA ya~M/ bo d+hi se twA ya/ mahA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid d+ha nu me man+t+ra pa dA ni sAhA/ 'phags pa nI kaN+Da'i gzungs rdzogs so//
35b1(rgyud 'bum): @bod skad du/ snying rje mi bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo// bya
35b2(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ gnod pa thams cad las thar par mdzad pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/
35b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po thams cad nges par bzlog pa/ sems can mo khom pa brgyad du lhung ba rnams yang dag par sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
35b4(rgyud 'bum): gis bshad pa'i gzungs thugs rje chen po mi bshol ba zhes bya ba 'di brjod kyis/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba bdag la dgongs su gsol/ 'di lta ste/ oM dze ta dza ta/ dzi ti dzi ti/ dzu tu dzu tra/
35b5(rgyud 'bum): ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dus pa rjes su dgongs te gshegs su gsol/ tsa ta tsa ta/
35b6(rgyud 'bum): tsi ti tsi ti/ tsu tu tsu tu/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sprin du rjes su dgongs te thugs chen po mnga' ba myur du gshegs su gsol/ ra la ra la/ ri li ri li/ ru lu ru lu/ bsam
35b7(rgyud 'bum): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzhi las bzhengs su gsol/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsa lu/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ e hi e hi/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/
36a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pas bzhengs su gsol bzhengs su gsol/ byams pa chen pos 'byung po thams cad bzlog tu gsol
36a2(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis bdag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ d+hun d+hu na/ bi d+hun bi d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra tha ma pra tha ma/ bzhengs su gsol bzhengs su gsol/
36a3(rgyud 'bum): tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ las sbyang du gsol/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ pad+ma A sa nA ya swA hA/ shwe ta
36a4(rgyud 'bum): madz+nyA u pa bi tA ya swA hA/ ka ri ti ne swA hA/ shU la ne swA hA/ tsakra Ni swA hA/ badz+ra Ne swA hA/ ti Ne tri ya swA hA/ tri Na tre ya pra haM ru pA ya swA hA/ A kA shA ya swA hA/ shi shi ni swA hA/ pra tsa pa ta
36a5(rgyud 'bum): ye swAhA/ ya ma ye swAhAM/ ya ma b+hud ya sAny+dza/ ar+d+ha dze b+h+yo b+h+ya te b+h+yaHswAny+dza/ dza ra yu dze b+h+yo b+he te b+h+yaHswA hA/ saM swai da tshe b+h+yo b+hU te b+h+ya/ oM pa pa tu ke b+h+yo b+hu te b+h+ya/ bi ti ka b+h+yo b+h+ra d+hib+h+yaHswAhA/ bai d+ha ti ki b+h+yo b+h+ra d+hiSh+TaH
36a6(rgyud 'bum): swAH/ khyAm+b+ha ts+tsha dza~M b+h+yaHsaH/ sa ni nA pa~M tsi ke ts+tshag+h+nAhrIb+h+yaHsaH/ sarbarbA ni b+h+ya swAH/ b+ha sa lan ri Ni tsi b+h+yo Sh+T+rI d+hi b+h+yaHAt+ma/ 'dis ste/ tha maT/ dzi/ n+yaNAH/ bdag 'jigs pa
36a7(rgyud 'bum): tsa dang 'tshob thams cad las srungs shig saH/ za sems/ ma mam pa/ bram pa tham pa/ han can/ de bad ta~M/ btsab tsa/ nam a myab mgau ti shwa ra madrA pa ya ti nAH/ rnying rje
36b1(rgyud 'bum): bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / rgya gar skad du/ si ha nA da tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ seng ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das parba/
36b2(rgyud 'bum): gsung gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug tu bsgyur te rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/
36b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / lam rnams ji ltar sbyang / e ma ho sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i
36b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog spyan ras gzigs seng ge sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ des smon lam sbyang ba dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsags par yid la byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i
36b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug langs te gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a
36b6(rgyud 'bum): ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka TaM ka Te/ ka ro Te/ ka ro kaM Ta/ bIr+ye swA hA/ oM AHhriH/ sa~M ha nA da hUM/ bruM AM dzI khaM hUM/ oM AHhUM/ oM ba li nai b+hu/ dzA dzI ba puSh+pe d+hU pe hUM/ sarba ar+m+ma te hUM/
36b7(rgyud 'bum): oM ba ta yi/ ma hA ba li/ hUM hUM hUM dzaHswAhA/ oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha sa ma ya tiSh+Tha dzaM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ta pra te hUM phaT/ sid ti ka ra hUM phaT/ oM ba ru Na A gats+tsha ya/ A gats+tsha ya/ ma hA nA ga gi sa ti sarbe
37a1(rgyud 'bum): b+hur/ phuHphuHphuHswA hA/ oM b+ha ga ba ti shru ti s+thi ti sa ma ba ti/ sa ra ma ti sid d+ha swA hA/ oM AHhrIHhUM swAhA/ puHhrIH/ oM si ha nA da hUM phaT phaT/ nA ga du ba li mA ra ya phaT/ dz+wA la dz+wa la ts+tsha
37a2(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ oM a big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hUMH/ oM ag+na ye a ti bya/ a b+hi sa ma ya ya sha/ ma hA kri ye ha bya/ ka bya ma hA ni ya swAhA/ oM b+ha ba ga ag+na ye/ shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ AHhrIHsi ha nA da badz+ra tsakra brti lo ki ka nr-i bruM tra~M
37a3(rgyud 'bum): lo kot+ta ra Ni si ha nA da bruM bruM bruM hUM na hUM na siM ha nA da bruM bruM bruM hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di ni maN+Dal gyi bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'o// gsad dang / phyir ldog pa dang / gdug pa dang / bcing ba dang / zhi ba'i las
37a4(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ nang par ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas maN+Dal byas te/ mngar gsum lag pa'i mthil du mnyes pas klu'i zhe sdang zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni klu'i sde dpon zhes bya ste/ seng ge'i steng du zla ba la/ rgyal po
37a5(rgyud 'bum): rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs/ / g.yas na thod mtshan rtse gsum la// drag po'i rgyal rigs dbang du bsdus// pad+ma'i rtse la thod pa ni// 'phrin las bzhi ldan ku mu da// shes rab sbyor ba'i ral grir bcas//
37a6(rgyud 'bum): dka' thub ldan pa'i sku de la// rig sngags rnam par rgyan pa po// gsum dang lnga ni mdun du 'phyang // rtse mor 'od dpag med pas brgyan// seng ge'i cha las byung ba yin// 'dam skyes dmar po'i lo ma gnyis//
37a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma bzhi la sngags bzhi ldan// rang lus 'og gnas thal mo sbyor// sku la 'dud cing 'phrin las byed// rdo rje'i gdan la mi bskyod pa'i// thugs ka nas ni sngags 'od 'don// spro ba gsum du ldan pa'i
37b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags/ / nyi shu rtsa gcig gdon par bya'o// gsang ba'i bdag po rgyud 'di la smod pa'i sems can de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smod pa yin no// gsang ba'i bdag po
37b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud 'di nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tha na 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag la rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / tshangs pa'i bu dang / tshangs chen
37b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba ba dang / kun tu rjes su 'brang bar byed/ de bas ches lhag pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bu la mas srung ba bzhin du srung bar 'gyur
37b4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ bdud kyis bar du gcad par mi nus so// gang shi 'phos nas nub phyogs bde ba can pad+mo las skye bar 'gyur ro// mngal gyi sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di ma dang chu'i 'jigs
37b5(rgyud 'bum): pa las thar par 'gyur ro/ / 'dir ni mdo tsam smos su zad kyi/ de ma yin pa gang 'dod pa thams cad bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang rgyud 'di la gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / tshul
37b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed na/ de la lha'i bu dang / klu'i bu khyed rnams kyis srung bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag rab tu dga'
37b7(rgyud 'bum): nas tshul bzhin du khas blang bar byas so/ / de nas gzhan srung ba'i phyir bdag sa dkar po la lan du mar bsngags na bar chad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// seng ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba
38a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta pradz+nyA kA rA dwang / bod kyi lo tsa ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis nus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//
38a2(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rI ya si ha nA da na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge smra
38a3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri po
38a4(rgyud 'bum): po Ta la'i rtse mo na/ rin po che'i khang bzangs rin po che dang / mu tig dang / nor bu dpag med kyis spras pa/ 'od kyis stong gsum khyab pa/ me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan
38a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sa phyogs de na byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med dang / nyan thos chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu la sogs pa dge slong rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor zhing / bcom ldan
38a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das seng ge'i gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ / 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de rang gi stan las langs te
38a7(rgyud 'bum): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gabar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
38b1(rgyud 'bum): to/ / bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi ba 'khor dang / btsun mo dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa las/ rgyal po de la mdze dang / phol mig
38b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / dbugs mi bde ba snying nad 'bar ba byung ste/ de ji ltar bsal bar bgyi/ bcos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal sngon 'jig
38b3(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams 'di nyid na 'jam dpal khyod nyid byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po zhes bya ba yin la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa'
38b4(rgyud 'bum): snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis stong gsum du sems can gyi don la gshegs pa la seng ge dkar po gcig dbang du bsdus te chibs pa byas/ sku la
38b5(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal thogs nas phyin pa la/ rgya mtsho chen po la rgal ba'i dus su seng ge bzhag nas 'khur
38b6(rgyud 'bum): res byas shing byon pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po khyod nyid ni grogs la phan pa'i sems kyis rang gi ral gris rang bkum mo// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog gi
38b7(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa la steng 'og par snang gi klu dang lha la sogs pas bsad dam snyam nas btung ba'i snod bram ze'i thod pa lag na thogs/ tri shU la rtse gsum pa lag na thogs/ seng ge dkar po
39a1(rgyud 'bum): la zhon/ mya ngan du ral pa thod du bcings nas steng gi lha la bsdigs te/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas// rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig/
39a2(rgyud 'bum): pubu lus// lha rnams kun gyis nyes na chad pa'i las// grong khyer 'joms shing lha rnams 'gums par bgyid// ces smras te lha rnams la tri shU la gdengs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi
39a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / khams gsum gyi lha dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/ lha'i me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / tsam pa ka la
39a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa phul te thod pa bkang ngo / / de nas par snang gi lha dang // klu dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / grul bum dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa la bsdigs pa/
39a5(rgyud 'bum): tri shU la gdengs nas/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas/ rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus// sde brgyad tshogs kyis nyes na chad pa'i las// grong khyer 'joms shing sde brgyad
39a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gums par bgyid/ / ces smras te sde brgyad la tri shU la gdengs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug na rin chen dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha ma yin gyi
39a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po thags zangs ris dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can dang / grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang
39b1(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste seng ge la rin po che'i rgyan phul lo/ / de nas sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i klu la bsdigs te/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas// rang gi grogs pos spangs nas
39b2(rgyud 'bum): gcig pu lus/ / klu tshogs rnams kyis nyes na chad pa'i las/ grong khyer 'joms shing klu rnams 'gums par bgyid// ces smras te rgya mtsho chen po tri shU las dkrugs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa
39b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa// lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'bum phrag drug
39b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa 'dus te dga' ba'i mdangs phyung nas/ klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas phyag 'tshal bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' snying
39b5(rgyud 'bum): rje can/ / khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// klu rnams kun gyi mgon mdzod cig/ nyams na klu yi gshed ma mdzod// ces smras nas tri shA la lan gsum dkris/ kha byang chub sems dpa' la bsgyur//
39b6(rgyud 'bum): phuHphuHzhes brjod cing gus pas kha nas khrag 'byin cing gnas so// klu'i rgyal po gzhan rnams kyang thal mo sbyar nas bskor ba lan gsum gsum byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can/
39b7(rgyud 'bum): khyod la bdag cag skyabs su mchi'o// klu rnams thams cad skyabs su zung / nyams na klu yi gshed ma mdzod/ ces smras nas klu chen po brgyad sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas tshangs skud la
40a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khris so/ / klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang bdag cag ni bran bgyid do// ci bka' stsal pa nyan no zhes smras nas klu rnams so so'i gnas su dengs so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems
40a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' de ni snying rje klu 'dul zhes bya'o/ / snying nad sel ba zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal de ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po de 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge khyod nyid yin no// de'i dus kyi
40a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog de ni da lta'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra klu'i ded dpon chen po 'di nyid yin no/ / 'jam dpal ngas rgyal po chen po de'i don du thugs rje chen
40a4(rgyud 'bum): / bopo'i sngags brjod par bya'o// yid la zung zhig/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka taM ka Ta
40a5(rgyud 'bum): ka ro Te/ tsi ti dz+wa la ka ro ti bIr+ye swA hA/ gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cus gsungs la/ da ltar nga nyid kyis brjod pa'o// 'di'i cho ga ni mi dgos pas las thams cad 'grub pa'o// bcom
40a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i sku lugs ma 'am/ bris sku'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas so sor ma 'dres par maN+Dal brgyad byas te/ maN+Dal re re la me tog tshom bu
40a7(rgyud 'bum): lnga lnga bkram ste/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / phye ma rnams kyis mchod nas/ maN+Dal re re la gzungs lan bcu gsum bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlas la lci ba de bsdus te/
40b1(rgyud 'bum): lci ba lhag ma la sngags shing nad pa la byugs na nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// lha dang klu la sogs pa'i dug gi nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la grub par ma gyur na/
40b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal thugs rje chen po nyid kyis mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa yin no// 'jam dpal thugs rje chen po nyid kyis dam bcas pa'i tshig go/ 'jam dpal rgyal po chen po'i gnod pa ni
40b3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'dis snying nad 'bar ba las grol nas skye ba phyi ma la bde ba can gyi zhing khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal nyon cig/ sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la sogs pa sangs rgyas bye ba
40b4(rgyud 'bum): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus snying po 'di gsungs so/ / oM AHhrIHsi ha nA da hUM phaT/ da ltar nga nyid kyis brjod de/ rig sngags kyi snying po 'di lan cig brjod pas sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur ro//
40b5(rgyud 'bum): srid pa nyam ngar 'gro mi 'gyur// lus la mtshon gyis tshugs mi 'gyur// dgra dang chom pos mi tshugs shing // klu la sogs pas 'tshe mi 'gyur// rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// bud med
40b6(rgyud 'bum): lus su mi 'gyur zhing / / rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// shi nas bde ba can du 'gro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang /
40b7(rgyud 'bum): log par dad sel dang // gser thub dang / 'od srungs kyis kyang gsang sngags 'di gsungs la/ da ltar shAkya thub pa ngas kyang brjod pa ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ha ya grI bA ya/ na mo ma
41a1(rgyud 'bum): ke shwa rA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+hIHku lu yu lu nI la kaR+Sha/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ hA hA hA hA/ badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hrIHhUM phaT/ 'jam dpal
41a2(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid pad+ma ha ya grI ba'i sngags yin te/ lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi/ sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing / ngan song sgo rnams gcod par 'gyur/
41a3(rgyud 'bum): klu sogs gdon gyis 'tshe mi 'gyur/ byad dang dug las grol 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yin no// bye ba grangs me mthu las byung // de yi yon tan dpag tu med// lan gcig bklags
41a4(rgyud 'bum): na sdig pa sel/ / lan gnyis bklags pas dpal dang ldan// gsum gyis tshe rnams ring bar 'gyur// 'bum phrag bcu yis zhal mthong 'gyur// pad+ma can gyi zhing der 'gro// 'jam dpal
41a5(rgyud 'bum): mi gzhan dag la ni/ / khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / rlung dang grang ba las gyur pa dang / klu rgyal rigs kyis zin pa dang / klu bram ze'i rigs kyis zin pa dang / klu gdol pa dang dmangs
41a6(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyis zin pa ni snying mi dga' ba dang / snying na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lto rgyab tu na pa dang / klad kor du na ba dang / gzhogs phyed du na ba dang / ma zhu ba dang / lbos pa dang / zha grum
41a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis btab pa dang / sbrum pa lta bur na ba dang / srog chags su na ba dang / tshigs dang sha khol bur na ba dang / za khu can dang / lud pa glo can dang / rul khol du na ba dang / 'phres pa dang / zha ba dang /
41b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge mi bde ba dang / zor ba lta bu'i nad dang / sman can dang / dmu chu can dang / 'bras dang / me dpal dang / lhog pa dang / gag pa dang / chu thig can dang / grang lhang lhang dang / tsha tsag tsag la
41b2(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i mdze rigs can dang / phol mig dang bcas dang / lha dang / bdud dang / tshangs pa dang / gshin rje dang / brag srin dang / sems 'khrug gi gdon dang / zab gzhob dang / mtsho
41b3(rgyud 'bum): sman dang / klu la sogs pas zin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za'i gdon rnams kyis zin pa dang / nad sna tshogs 'byung ste/ de'ang mi dge ba las
41b4(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal 'byung ba yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal nyon cig/ snying po gzungs kyi cho ga 'di// dang po thugs rje chen po
41b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ / gus shing dad pa'i sems bskyed nas// snum pa'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya// lci la drir bcas byugs nas ni// tshon rtsi kha dog sna lnga yis// dkyil 'khor pad+ma lta bur bri// bum pa gang ba lnga dag kyang
41b6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag/ gang ba'i gtor ma lnga yang bshams// seng ldeng phur bu lnga yang dgod// dar gyis dkris pa'i mda' bzhi dgod// tshon skud lnga yi dra ba bre// 'phags pa spyan ras
41b7(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ / khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo//
42a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na la phyag 'tshal lo// a hrIHhrI baM ta naM/ yi ge drug pa'i sngags 'di ni// brjod pas sdig pa sdug bsngal sel// swA hA/ sangs rgyas
42a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod la brtsod par bya/ / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phye ma dang / rgyan thams cad kyis mchod
42a3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ seng ldeng rgya shug me btang la// tshon skud bcang zhing 'bru rnams sreg/ rma bya smug shad lcug ma yis// klu yi dug rnams sel bar byed// hrIHnA ga le le/ nA ga dum ba le le/ nA ga phud phud/
42a4(rgyud 'bum): ha le ha le/ hA la hA la/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ nA ga khrol khrob shig shig swA hA/ klu dang log 'dren thams cad kyi yid kyi dug dang / mthong ba'i dug dang / bcings pa'i dug dang / kha rlangs kyi dug
42a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / reg pa'i dug dang / dug thams cad phyir phud cig swA hA/ dug 'dir ma 'dug zhig/ sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song zhig/ 'dzin pa'i nang du song zhig/ me'i nang du song zhig/ chu'i
42a6(rgyud 'bum): nang du song zhig/ zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/ 'jam dpal 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o// hrIHbruM aM hUM khaM/ rigs lngas dbang bskur ba'o// rdo rje srung ba'i mchog
42a7(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gyur/ / bkra shis lha mo dpal dang ldan// bsnyen gnas la ni gnas gyur nas// dkon mchog rjes dran sems bskyed nas// bum chu dag pas las sgrib sel// lus ngag sems kyis dag pa thob//
42b1(rgyud 'bum): pha rol phyin drug gnas gyur cing // sangs rgyas sems can mkhyen par gyur// ting 'dzin thams cad mngon du 'gyur// bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi// skud pa dkar po sum sgril la// bzlas brjod
42b2(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu brgyad bzlas nas/ / mgul du btags na nad las grol// nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la// gzungs sngags bzlas shing btab gyur na// nad rnams kun las grol bar 'gyur// chu la
42b3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs sngags mang bzlas na/ / klu nad khong du sel bar 'gyur// lo tog za ba kha bcing na// bye ma sa dang thal bas sel// ha cang char ba ches pa na// lha la phul ba'i rnying pa la// kham
42b4(rgyud 'bum): phor gsar pa'i nang du yang / / me tog gtsang ma blangs nas ni// bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur// ser ba drag po 'ong ba na// thal chen nyung kar bzlas brjod kyis// ser ba nya lcibs
42b5(rgyud 'bum): lcug ma dang / / lhum po btags te btsugs gyur na// ser ba 'chad par 'gyur ba yin// lha klu dri za la sogs pa'i// gdon ni gnod par gyur pa la// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la//
42b6(rgyud 'bum): bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste// sman sbyar chus ni gang ba la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// slob ma gos zas dkar por sbyar// dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhug/ bum pa'i chu yis
42b7(rgyud 'bum): bkru bar bya/ / nad dang gnod pa kun las thar// klu sogs gdon rnams dpag med kyis// glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// bus pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa la// gi'u wang gis ni srung
43a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bri/ / yungs kar dag dang bcas te gdags// byis pa gdon dang nad las thar// lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na// thu ba g.yas pa'i gos kyi grwar// bzlas brjod bdun byas mdud
43a2(rgyud 'bum): ba bor/ / song na bde zhing don yang 'grub// rta la sogs pa'i phyugs rnams la// chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la// bzlas nas gtor na bde bar 'gyur// mi nad phyugs nad thams cad la// yungs kar
43a3(rgyud 'bum): dang ni bum pa'i chus/ / bkru zhing btags na i nad zhi// a smA ri yi gzungs sel ltar// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems
43a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal rgyal po 'di'i khong na klu'i dug gis gang nas 'dug ste/ 'di ni klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na 'di yis klu thams cad la dbang byed pa yin pas 'dis dbyung bar
43a5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po tak+Sha ka la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas
43a6(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / klu'i rgyal po pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po dung skyong la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan la phyag 'tshal lo//
43a7(rgyud 'bum): klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ba ru NA ya swA hA/ oM a nan+ta ya swA hA/ oM bA su kA ya swAhA/ oM tak+Sha kA ya swA hA/ oM karko Ta ya swA hA/ oM pad+ma ya swAhA
43b1(rgyud 'bum): / oM ma hA pad+ma swAhA/ oM shaM kha pA lA ya swA hA/ oM ku li kA ya swA hA/ klu yi gzugs ni mang po yang // dkar gsum mngar gsum 'bras zan la// legs byas kha dog bsgyur byas la// me tog spos
43b2(rgyud 'bum): dang byug pa dang / / mar me zhal zas sgra snyan dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan me tog 'phreng // tshangs pa'i skud pas mnyes par bya// rtsa ba lo ma sdong bu dang // me tog 'bras bu sman gyis
43b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod/ / rma bya gzugs mo me long gis// rgyal po khong gi dug thon cig/ rin chen rma gshad mchod pa'i rten// mi ldog pa yi rdzas su chongs// bum pa gter gyis gang ba mdzes// srog chags
43b4(rgyud 'bum): yid 'ongs gzugs kyis mchod/ / zhi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// klu yi rgyal po 'jog po yis// zin kyang skad cig gcig la thon/ 'jam dpal 'di gzhan gyi mthu ma yin te// 'phags
43b5(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i mthu'o/ / stobs so// byin gyi rlobs so// thugs rje dang ldan pa 'di'i yon tan brjod kyis mi lang yang bdag gi cha shas tsam zhig brjod na// oM bcom
43b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das/ bya ba byas shing byed pa byas// khur bor bdag don rjes su brnyes// srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad// yang dag bka' las rnam par grol// sems dpa' dbang sgyur thams cad kyis//
43b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu pha rol phyin thob pa// srid las brgal zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs// AH/ gzhan la phan brtson thugs brtse can// sems can kun la mchog tu byams// khams gsum kun gyi
44a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyen gcig pu/ / mtha' yas sems can sgrol la mkhas// hrIH'gro ba nyam thag kun tu skyob// dri ma gsum spangs pha rol phyin// mngon shes drug brnyes n+ya gro bu// skyes
44a2(rgyud 'bum): bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/ / sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes// sku mdog shel gyi kha dog 'dra// gangs ri nyi shar lta bur mtshan// sku tshad che la 'od zer
44a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar/ / rigs lnga sangs rgyas sku la 'phro// dbu skra thor tsugs gyen la mdzes// dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs// klu rnams thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// rtse gsum sbrul gyis rab tu
44a4(rgyud 'bum): dkris/ / rigs gsum mgon po'i byin rlabs 'dzin// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod la bstod// skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma bsnams// shes rab phun sum ral gri 'bar// nyon mongs dag pa bram
44a5(rgyud 'bum): ze'i mgo/ me tog dri zhim tshogs kyis bkang // klu rnams kun nas dbang bsdus pas// sbrul gyi tshangs skud mdzes la bstod// siM ha/ pad+ma dag gi gdan la bzhugs// bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon
44a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa/ / seng ge dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs// 'dod pa'i don rnams sgrub pa'i phyir// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// ba spu nyag ma re re yang // sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur//
44a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal thugs rje can la bstod// dam chos rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba// lha mo sgrol ma rjes su 'breng // 'jigs pa brgyad skyob sku mdog ldang // gnod pa sel ba mi 'jigs sbyin// ut+pal
44b1(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ / btud de sprul pa mang po 'gyed// hUM/ gos dkar ma ni bka' bzhin byed// yid bzhin 'khor lo bde bar bskor// 'dod pa'i don yod sdug bsngal zhi// 'jigs pa
44b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad po sel la bstod/ / phaT/ ha ya grI ba khro bo'i sku// 'phags pa rta mgrin bdud bzhi 'joms// kro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa 'dul// klu bdud 'dul mdzad hUM gis bstod// nA nam mkha' klu rgyal ba ru
44b3(rgyud 'bum): Nachu lha ston pa'i zhal mthong zhing / / bstan la rab dga' klu rnams 'dul// sa dang po yi bden pa mthong // bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin// klu rgyal byang chub sems la bstod// oM tA re tut+tA
44b4(rgyud 'bum): re tu re swA hA/ / oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka taM ka ra swA hA/ gang gis bstod cing zlos pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par
44b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyuraro/ / gsang sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong gi bar du ngan song du mi skye'o// bud med kyi lus su mi skye'o// su zhig nang bar langs nas chu dri zhim pos khrus byas te gtsang
44b6(rgyud 'bum): sgra la gnas nas/ / thugs rje chen po seng ge sgra'i spyan sngar gzungs 'di klog gam/ 'dri 'am/ 'chang ngam/ klog tu 'jug gam/ kha ton du bton nas snying po dang gzungs sngags zlos na ni/ de'i
44b7(rgyud 'bum): lus la mdze dang / shu ba dang / phol mig dang / 'bras dang / bas bsngags dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / ldog pa dang / gag pa dang / ltos pa dang / dmu chu dang / skem pa dang / mkhal
45a1(rgyud 'bum): ma rdol ba dang / don snod du 'dus pa dang / byad kyi dkyil 'khor la nad sna tshogs 'dus pa dang / glo ba na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa tham
45a2(rgyud 'bum): cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal gzungs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// su zhig gam rgyal po des gzungs 'di glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba
45a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po yul 'khor dang bcas pa 'am/
45a4(rgyud 'bum): gtsug lag khang du glegs bam 'di 'chang na/ dpal nag po chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang / klu chen po brgyad rnams slad bzhin 'brang zhing / dpag tshad
45a5(rgyud 'bum): stong tshun chad du slar rgol ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang / log par 'dren pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// sgom nyes pa
45a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / bri nyes pa dang / sngags nor ba dang / phyag rgya nor ba dang / bshad nyes pa dang / mnyan pa nor ba'ang gzungs 'di bklags pas dag par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'dis su la bsrung ba byas
45a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa byas pa dang / bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su byas pa de la mtshon dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad dang / gshed ma dang / rims dang / gnod pa thams cad
45b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / dus ma yin par 'chi bas mi tshugs so// gnod par byed pa tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang /
45b2(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phag
45b3(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / // kha che'i yul dur khrod 'bri sa ka rang byung gi mchod rten rtsar dngos grub brnyed pa'i rje btsun
45b4(rgyud 'bum): ma rdo rje sems ma dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba 'gar shes rab 'byung gnas zhes bya bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / na mo rat+na
45b5(rgyud 'bum): tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a kaTe/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka TaM ka Te/ ka ro Te/ ka ro Te bIr+ye swAhA/ bcom ldan
45b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas so sor maN+Dal brgyad byas la/ maN+Dal re re la lan bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlas la/ lci ba lhag ma la sngags bzlas te nad pa la nye bar
45b7(rgyud 'bum): byugs na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te nyi ma bdun nam/ bcu gsum mam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub ste/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa ni ma yin no// de ltar ma grub
46a1(rgyud 'bum): na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro/ / seng ge sgra'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgyag kyi mkhan po ngag gi dbang phyug dang /
46a2(rgyud 'bum): glog skya shes rab brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shA ra yA nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kan/ bod skad du/ 'phag
46a3(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
46a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri po Ta la'i rtse mo na me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu na dI'i gser gyi kha dog dpa'adra ba/ rin po che sna
46a5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kun tu 'bar ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang /
46a6(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod cing bkur stir byas
46a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ yongs su bskor nas mdun du byas pa la chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yongs
46b1(rgyud 'bum): su dag pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su gsal ba/ tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
46b2(rgyud 'bum): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ bya ba byas shing byed la mkhas// khur bor bdag don rjes su brnyes// srid pa sbyor ba yongs su zad// yang
46b3(rgyud 'bum): dag bka' la rnam grol sems/ / shes rab shin tu rnam par grol// klu chen po ni cang shes po// sems la dbang sgyur thams cad kyis// mchog tu pha rol phyin pa thob// ye shes tshogs ni yongs
46b4(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs/ / srid pa'i dgon pa rab tu brgal// gzhan la phan pa mdzad la brtson// thugs rje dang ni 'brel ba'i thugs// skye dgu kun la mchog tu byams// bde bar brtson pa byam las byung //
46b5(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas sems can grol la mkhas// bde bar gshegs pa nyid las skyes// bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi bka'// khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig pu// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
46b6(rgyud 'bum): med/ / dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs// rig pa gsum gyi pha rol phyin// mngon par shes pa drug kyang brnyes// n+ya gro d+ha ni lta bur zlum// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan// /
46b7(rgyud 'bum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kyang // sku ni rnam pa kun tu brgyan// sku mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra// sku tshad che la dkar sham po// na ga ge sar gzhon nu ltar// cung zad dmar ba 'dra ba'i mdog/
47a1(rgyud 'bum): dbu yi thor tsugs dag dang ldan// zor tshugs mang pos nye bar g.yogs// dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs// 'od zer dag ni rnam par 'gro// 'od 'phro 'dom gang rab tu 'bar//
47a2(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi ri 'dra grags pas khyab// gzi brjid dag kyang rab tu che// shar gyi ri la 'char ba yi// nyi ma'i gtsug gtor dag dang ldan// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba yis// se ral khar ni sku phyed brgyan
47a3(rgyud 'bum): sa dag la ni rab tu mkhas/ / pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams spyod// tshul khrims ma nyams ral pa med// mthon ka seng ge'i ral pa 'dra// sku ni 'jam zhing ldem bag can// gzigs shing
47a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa khyu mchog 'dra/ / g.yas su 'khyil ba'i dung yang 'dra// dpral ba zla ba kham pa 'dra// dpral ba'i dbyibs kyi rgya yang che// smin mtshams par yang yong ma chad// shangs kyi dbyibs
47a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang cung zad mtho/ / mgur yang bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra// dpung pa dag kyang rab tu zlum// phyag sor rnams kyi tshigs kyang ring // sor mo 'jam zhing cung zad dmar// phyag sor rnams kyi bar
47a6(rgyud 'bum): 'brel ba/ / phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil rnams la// 'khor lo dag gis rab tu brgyan// ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra bar mdzes// sku mdangs 'jam shing shangs kyang rgyas// gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs
47a7(rgyud 'bum): ltar snyan/ / yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur// blta na sdug cing mdangs dga' ba// pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma 'dra// pad+ma dag las kun tu skyes// pad+ma dag gi gdan la bzhugs// phyag
47b1(rgyud 'bum): na pad+ma bzang po bsnams/ / ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams// khri snyan sa le'i pags pa mnabs// dbyug pa dang ni bgrang 'phreng 'dzin// bkra shis dag gis gtsang mar gyur// snga nas
47b2(rgyud 'bum): gsung zhing gsong por gsungs/ / bdud rtsi'i char ni rab tu 'bebs// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra// sems can thams cad dga' bar mdzad// bzang po snang ba'i ljon shing ltar//
47b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun gyi gsos su 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa lags// bde bar gshegs pa'i cha lugs mnga'// bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin// ba spa nyag ma re re yang //
47b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams kyi gtso bor 'gyur// bsod nams mdzad cing dge ba mdzad// bshol ba med cing nges par mdzad// rab tu drag pa'i brtson 'grus can// 'khor ba dag las rab tu brgal//
47b5(rgyud 'bum): dam chos rgyal mtshan mnga' gsol ba// yid bzhin 'khor lo dge ba sbyor// don yod zhags pa sdug bsngal 'dren// ha ya grI ba bdud bzhi 'joms// kro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa sel//
47b6(rgyud 'bum): lha mo sgrol ma rjes su 'brang // khro gnyer can ni bka' bzhin byed// rgyal ba can ni tshul dang ldan// mthu chen ldan zhing dbang dang ldan// yon tan ldan zhing byams dang ldan// shes rab ldan zhing
47b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal dang ldan/ / tshul khrims ldan zhing don dang ldan// don rnams kun ni rig pa po// the tsom thams cad gcod pa po// chos rnams thams cad smra ba bo// 'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa
48a1(rgyud 'bum): po zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra/ / sku smad rin chen kun gyis brgyan// gser gyi mchod sdong 'dra bar gnas// 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag/ tshangs pa la sogs phyag bgyis//
48a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis gang zhig bstod pa byed pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// dkyil
48a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ / gsang sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong gi bar du'ang ngan 'gror mi skye'o// mnar med par mi 'gro'o// su zhig nang
48a4(rgyud 'bum): par langs nas klog gam/ klog tu 'jug gam/ kha ton du 'don na mi de'i lus la mdze dang / shu ba dang / glo na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad thams cad las thar par
48a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / skyes so cog tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// gar skyes kyang
48a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' bar 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par
48a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro// bstod pa 'dis bstod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed la mchod pa byas par
48b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / rnam par smin pa'ang de dang 'dra bas na bye brag med do// rgyal thams cad kyi ring bsrel rin po che za ma tog ces bya ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya
48b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
48b3(rgyud 'bum): phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus nu/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras
48b4(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri gru 'dzin gyi rtse mo me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs bkram pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser kha dog bzang po ltar snang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs snang ba'i sa phyogs
48b5(rgyud 'bum): na bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag
48b6(rgyud 'bum): khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas te mchod cing rjed nas/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// /
48b7(rgyud 'bum): tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag
49a1(rgyud 'bum): bar rab tu ston to/ / de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa mdzad pa/ mdzad
49a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu mdzad pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su brnyes pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su bsal ba/ yang dag pa'i mkhyen pas thugs shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang mkhyen pa//
49a3(rgyud 'bum): glang po che chen po dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba/ gzhan la sman pa/
49a4(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje dang 'brel ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ skye dgu la mchog tu mnyes gshin pa/ bde ba rab tu stsol bar mdzad pa/ byams pas zhugs pa/ sems can mtha' yas pa sgrol ba
49a5(rgyud 'bum): la mkhas pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po/ srid pa gsum gyi rtsa lag gcig pu/ 'dod chags mi mnga' ba/ zhe sdang mi mnga' ba/ gti mug mi mnga' ba/ dri ma gsum
49a6(rgyud 'bum): spangs pa/ rig pa gsum gyi pha rol tu gshegs pa/ mngon par shes pa drug brnyes pa/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/
49a7(rgyud 'bum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/ pags pa srab cing mdog ser ba/ sku ring rgyu bzang zhing dkar ba/ sku shing gi me tog gsar pa dang dmar rengs lta bu'i dbu thor tsugs mnga'
49b1(rgyud 'bum): bang srung po 'khyil pa mang pos dgu khebs pa/ 'od dpag med kyis 'od zer btang ba/ 'bar ba'i 'od 'dos gang gis gser gyi bo ltar ldan par grags pa/ kA'i badzin g
49b2(rgyud 'bum): zugs 'char ka'i ri lta bu gtsug tor mnga' ba/ nor bu rab tu 'bar ba mchod phyir thogs pa sku la se ral du thogs pa/ sa rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i zhabs
49b3(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims ma nyams pa/ tshul khrims ma zhig pa/ seng ge ltar thong ka phel ka che ba/ sku 'jam zhing mdzes pa/ gzigs pa dang gshegs stabs khyu mchog gi dbang po 'dra ba//
49b4(rgyud 'bum): mkhur ba g.yas su 'khyil pa/ dpral ba che zhing zla ba kham pa 'dra la thig le mnga' ba/ phyag pus mor bsleb pa/ smin ma bar ma chad pa/ shangs mtho ba/ mgur bum pa'i mgrin pa
49b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba/ phyag sor mo dang tshigs ring ba/ sen mo 'jam zhing zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba/ phyag bar dra bas 'brel ba/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los brgyan pa/ ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra ba/
49b6(rgyud 'bum): sku 'jam zhing rgyas pa/ tshangs pa ltar dbyangs zab pa/ yid du mchi ba/ sdug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ nyams dga' bar bgyid pa/ 'od pad+ma 'dra ba/ pad+ma las 'khrungs pa/ bad+ma
49b7(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag na pad+ma mnga' ba/ phyag na rol pa spyi blugs bsnams pa/ ri dgas nag po'i pags pa mnabs pa/ phyag 'khar bsnams pa/ bgrang
50a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i nor bu bsnams pa/ gtsang ba snyungs pa/ gsong por gsung ba/ bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu/ blta na sdug pa'i shing 'dra ba
50a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad mos par mdzad pa/ dga' bar mdzad pa/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sku mnga' ba/ bde bar gshegs
50a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin pa/ ba s+phu re re skyes pa/ sems can gyi snying po/ bsod nams mdzad pa/ dge ba mdzad pa/ nges par mdzad pa/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba/ 'khor ba las shin tu 'das
50a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dam pa'i chos la rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba/ sgrol ma zhabs drung na gnas pa/ khro gnyer can bka' bzhin bgyid pa/ rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/
50a5(rgyud 'bum): mthu rtsal che ba/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang ldan pa/ zhi ba dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ skal ba dang ldan pa/ don dang ldan pa/ don rnams thugs su chud pa/ the tshom
50a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams gcod pa/ chos rnams gsung ba/ 'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas pa/ sku rked pa'i phyogs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ gser gyi mchod
50a7(rgyud 'bum): sdong lta bu/ sku nyi ma stong pas lhag par mdzes pa/ tshangs pa'i dbang po la sogs pas phyag bgyis pa lags so// gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan
50b1(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa sgrub pa byed pa de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// de la gsang sngags thams
50b2(rgyud 'bum): cad grub par 'gyur ro/ / bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshams med par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// su zhig nang par langs nas 'don tam/ klog gam/
50b3(rgyud 'bum): kha ton byed na de'i lus la mdze dang / rkang shu dang / lud pa dang / mi bde ba mi 'byung zhing nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs so cog tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// lha'i
50b4(rgyud 'bum): bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ / 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs so cog tu 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur
50b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// dpa' bar 'gyur/ skad snyan par 'gyur/ skal ba bzang por 'gyur/ bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med
50b6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// bstod pa sgrub pa 'dis bstod pa byas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi bye ma snyed dag la mchod pa byas par
50b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ rnam par smin pa mtshungs shing bye brag med par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel
51a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi la ma tog ces bya ba rdzogs so/ / @rgya gar skad du/ san+na nA tsir yang ka aSh+NI nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 2
51a2(rgyud 'bum): ba lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// na mi bi phul bi ma na su pra toSh+Tha tI sa sang zha ya/ sAH sha
51a3(rgyud 'bum): sa ha sra a ti re ka te dza/ pra b+hA a ba b+ha si ta mUr+t+ta ye ma hA ma Ni mu Ta kuN+Da la/ a laM kA ra d+hA ri Ne b+ha ga bA te pad+ma pA Na ye/ sarba lo ka a pa ya sha ma nA ya/ bi bi d+ha khu kha sa ma bA sha a
51a4(rgyud 'bum): biSh+Ta/ sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+hu ra b+hu ba swA hA/ ma hA A lo ka ka ra Na ta ma sti mi ra pa ta la bi rA sha ka/ rA ga dwe Sha ma hA mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka/ sha sa ka ra rak+Sha ka/
51a5(rgyud 'bum): sarba a pa ya durga ti pra sha ma ka/ sarba satwa sa ma shwA sa na ka ra/ sarba A shA pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ha na ka ra/ he he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ ba ra ba ra dA ya kA/ paR+Ya A lo ka saM b+ha ta/
51a6(rgyud 'bum): mahA kA ru Ni ka/ dza Ta mu kuTA/ a lang kri ta shi ra/ ma Ni ka na ka rA dza/ sha ta badz+ra bai TuR+Ya a lang kri ta sha rI ra a mi tA b+ha dzi na ka ma la a laM kri ta/ pra b+ha ra Na rA dzA na sha ta sa
51a7(rgyud 'bum): sra A b+hi la sha ti ka ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/ bi nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya/ ma hA yA tra kle sha ka ba TA a ba ba d+ha bi bo d+hi satwa sa ra tsa ra ka pra ma thA na/ pu ru Sha pad+ma/ pu ru Sha
51b1(rgyud 'bum): n+yAka/ rba mu Sh+Ta m+mA kA ra/ bu rmyangasa~M te/ hrIh+na/ nga / s+yA dAn tA ba ri witA/ d+hAmA d+ham/ sam sa sa/ d+hu rud+harma/ za shas pa za shas pa/ tha d+han sa ma tha rtanas pa/ b+hi ri g+ho ra/
51b2(rgyud 'bum): d+hi ri/ bi d+hi ri bi d+hi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ bi bi ri bi bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ mr-i tsa mu tsa/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ gA ya ka/
51b3(rgyud 'bum): gA d+ha ya gA d+ha ya/ ha sa ha sa/ pra ha sa pra ha sa/ nA nA bi bi d+ha kle sha bA sa na/ ha ra ha ra/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ d+hu ru Ti d+hu ru Ti/ ma hA maN+Da/ a laM kA ra Na/ sha ta pra se ka/ a ba b+ha si tA
51b4(rgyud 'bum): ma hA bi Sha sha ma ka/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma'i lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs byang chub sems dpa'i khang bzang dam pa/ rdo rje chen pos
51b5(rgyud 'bum): legs par gsungs pa/ lha dang / klu dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / mi'am ci dang / lha ma yin chen pos bstod pa/ re ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed pa 'di sgrib pa chen
51b6(rgyud 'bum): bos bsgribs pa gang la la zhig nyan tam/ 'chang ngam/ 'don tam/ klog gam/ mthong nas legs par rtogs par byed na/ de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad
51b7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ / nang par langs nas lan cig 'don na lag na pad+ma phyir 'brang bar 'gyur ro// yid la gang dag 'dod pa'i dgos pa bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par
52a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gcig pu rab tu dben par 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba mngon du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma rjes su dran par byas la lan
52a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun brjod na dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de'i ngan 'gro thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ro// yud tsam zhig 'chag cing
52a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dug la yid la brjod na bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar bsags pa'i las 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'khor los sgyur ba stong gis bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po
52a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / tshe rabs tshe rabs su'ang pad+ma'i rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro// skye bo khyad par du 'phags pas bkur bar 'gyur ro// me tog dri zhim pos snyim pa
52a5(rgyud 'bum): bkang ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan bdun brjod na yon tan chen po stong thob par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po'i chos nyid snang ba'ang de la skye bar
52a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / dam pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na bcom ldan 'das zhal rtag tu bzhad pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
52a7(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur zhing / chos snang ba'i gsal ba dang po dri ma med par byed pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems
52b1(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par bzhag bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ / tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par byed
52b2(rgyud 'bum): pabar 'dod na/ tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nyab la sbyang ba byas la gos dkar po bgos te/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar pos dkyil
52b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bskus la/ dkyil 'khor de dang bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das dpa'aphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri zhim po'i bdug pa dang /
52b4(rgyud 'bum): mar me dang / spos kyis bsti stang byas te/ de nyid du 'dug la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ des sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa byed pa'ang sdig pa byang
52b5(rgyud 'bum): zhing shin tu yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
52b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis rtag par rgyun du ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / dbang bskur ba'i stobs dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang // ye shes khyad par can gyi stobs sgrub par mdzad do// gnam la
52b7(rgyud 'bum): gyen du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na char 'bab bo/ / sa la bltas te bzlas brjod byas na lo tog thams cad legs par 'gyur ro// 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu'i shul du bltas te
53a1(rgyud 'bum): @bzlas brjod byas na chu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / nad thams cad la lag pas khyab cing bzlas brjod byas na sos par 'gyur ro// dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na
53a2(rgyud 'bum): dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / bkres pa dang skom pa'i gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na phyid par 'gyur ro// mi ngas chen po byung na ras la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags te/ dpag tshad
53a3(rgyud 'bum): tshun chad mtshams bcad pa dang bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang /
53a4(rgyud 'bum): khru chen gyi lo tsa ba ban rje ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a b+ha ya pra dA nA ma a ba ra dza~Mta/
53a5(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
53a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
53a7(rgyud 'bum): bang byug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal las grol bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can
53b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi bcings pa gcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'jigs pa med pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
53b2(rgyud 'bum): gi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/ / las kun byed pa dge ba ste// 'byung po kun gyi 'jigs pa med// bdud rtsi'i las ni bdud rtsi 'byung // 'di ni las kun byed pa yin// /
53b3(rgyud 'bum): dgra kun 'jigs par byed pa ste// brjod dang de bzhin 'thab pa dang // gzhan yang dgras ni 'khor ba dang // rtsod pa'i nang du rtsod byed dang // rtag tu dgra dang phrad pa dang // rmugs par byed cing
53b4(rgyud 'bum): rengs par byed/ / rmongs par byed cing sdig pa sel// dug dang me ni dengs par byed// rims dang nyes sdig thams cad sel// chom rkun dang ni chu dang sbrul// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad sel//
53b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po thams cad zlog pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub 'dren pa dang // chos kun rab tu ston pa ste// 'di ni rig sngags mthu stobs can// gzhan gyis mi thub srin po 'joms// gang tshe
53b6(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'di 'chang ba/ / de nas 'di g.yo bar 'gyur// 'jigs med ldan pa zhes bya ba'i// rig sngags rgyal po bla na med// 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa ste// 'jig rten
53b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum po kun gyis mchod/ / de nas 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par byas nas/ rang gi snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa de bzhin
54a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'di smras so/ / oM ta ra ta ra/ tA re tA re/ ma ri ke/ tsan+na pra b+he/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ sUr+ya kan te/ he ma pra d+ha/ buR+sha prad+ha/ bo d+ha na/
54a2(rgyud 'bum): sarba pA pa pra sha ma ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bi Sha pra sha ma ni/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ sarba bi nA rA na ma kri te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru dru ru/ sarba ta thA ga ta b+hA Shi ta/ pa ra pa ra/ bi ri bi ri/ pu ru pur+ra/
54a3(rgyud 'bum): zad+hA bA ra mi tA/ ana? d+ha te/ ShaT pA ra ma t+ma/ pa ri pU ri/ ga ga na/ rdi ba lo k+Sho ba ma/ ta thA kA ta/ ba shi ta/ prA ti ka ri/ shu Tha ka ri/ pa bi u0f89u0fa4/ mang gu la d+hA ri/ sarba ba ta a d+hI ti/
54a4(rgyud 'bum): ma ho ra ga a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba kin na ra a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ a d+hiSh+Ti d+he pra sA d+ha b+ha Shi te/ in+d+ra b+hA Shi te/ tsa tur ma hA rA dza b+hA Shi te/ tsan+da sUr+ya b+hA Shi te/ oM ti ri ti ri/ tsan+na kA ri Ni/ ki li
54a5(rgyud 'bum): ki li/ sarba sha hUM bi nA sha ni hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa'
54a6(rgyud 'bum): mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
54a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du
54b1(rgyud 'bum): byung ste/ de las bdag gis 'di dag thos so// de las bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sems can thams cad la'ang bsnyad do// mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa gzhan gyis mi
54b2(rgyud 'bum): thub pa'i snying po 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang /
54b3(rgyud 'bum): 'od srungs dang / shAkya thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / gnyis ka srung ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer
54b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba dang / srog skyong ba dang / tshe sbyin pa dang / lag pa rengs par byed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang /
54b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog pa/ 'ching ba thams cad grol bar byed pa/ thams cad du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// shud d+he muk+te pra/ b+hA swa re
54b6(rgyud 'bum): shA te pad pA ra bA sa ni/ sarba duSh+Ta na dzaM b+ha yA mi/ stam b+ha yA mi/ mo ha yA mi/ oM sAhA/ sa bi tre swA hA/ shwe te sA hA/ shA te pa ta pra bi ti sA hA/ tad+ya thA/ ta re ra re/ ta ri Ni raH
54b7(rgyud 'bum): rak+Sha/ sarba ka li/ ka la ha/ bi gra ha/ bi b+ha ta/ duHswa ba na/ b+ha ye b+h+yaHswA hA/ rtag tu le lo med par ni// gang zhig gzungs 'di 'chang byed pa// de la lha tshogs thams
55a1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang / / dus kun tu ni srung bar byed// de ni 'jig par 'gyur ba med// de ni rtag srung lhan ner 'dug/ ji ltar nyi ma sa steng na// gzi brjid grags 'chang lhan ne
55a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / de la gshed byed byed stems dang // srul po dag gis mi tshugs te// de la dpal yon 'jug par 'gyur// kha dog dang ni tshe yang 'phel// 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'jigs
55a3(rgyud 'bum): pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
55a4(rgyud 'bum): / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal
55a5(rgyud 'bum): lo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza yA ba hi ni/ dza yota
55a6(rgyud 'bum): ta ri/ ka la ka la/ ma la ma la/ tsa la tsa la/ k+Shi na k+Shi na/ sarba karma/ A ba ra Na ni/ me sarba dz+nyA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ti ha sa pra b+ha d+ha/ sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ke ta tsak+Shu/ shro tra g+hA Na dzihra
55a7(rgyud 'bum): kA ya ma no bi rA dz+nyA na bi sho d+ha ni sAhA/ phu ru phu ru/ su ru su ru/ pu rA pu rA/ pra phu rA pra phu rA/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ d+harma d+ha tu gan+d+he swAhA/ a b+hA ba swA hA/ sarba d+harma a ba bo d+ha ni swAhA/
55b1(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong gi bar du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa thob
55b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro// tshe brjes nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas stong
55b3(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum nyi shu rtsa re re brjod na ci 'dod pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
55b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku gser gyi mdog can yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yul rnams la'ang mi phyed pa'i sems dad pa can du 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa phan yon tshad med pa
55b5(rgyud 'bum): dag 'byung ngo / / stong 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
55b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki ni/ pa lo ki ni/ pra b+hA lo ki ni/ dzI ba ha ba ri shod+ha ni/ d+hi da ni yag me/
55b7(rgyud 'bum): A shA pa ri sho d+ha ni/ sarba satwa ma nor the/ kA ya sid d+he shru ti d+hA ra NI s+thi ti d+hA ra Ni swAhA/ cho ga zhag bdun gyi bar du shing a ba marga'i so shing le lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te nang re zhing zos na/
56a1(rgyud 'bum): nyin gcig la sho lo ka brgya brgya lobs so// zla ba drug gi bar du byas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sho lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so//
56a2(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'gas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
56a3(rgyud 'bum): tad+yathA/ kha li kha li ba li te swA hA/ gdong 'khru ba'i tshe chu khyor gang la sngags 'dis lan gsum mam bdun bzlas te 'thungs na/ nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ka brgya lobs par 'gyur te/ sngon
56a4(rgyud 'bum): lobs pa rnams kyang brjed par mi 'gyur ro/ / sho lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
56a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bI re bI re/ ma hI te dze te dza ma ti d+ha ra Ni/ shru ta d+hA ra Ni dza yan ti
56a6(rgyud 'bum): bi dza yan ti ma ti d+hA ra NI swA hA/ sman bran hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te/ 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thungs na/ gdon mi za bar
56a7(rgyud 'bum): thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am/ bstan bcos kyang rung ste/ thos pa nyin zhag gcig la sho lo ka stong longs par 'gyur ro// sho lo ka stong lobs pa'i
56b1(rgyud 'bum): gzungs rdzogs so/ / / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
56b2(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ tri shwA tri shu la shA khi/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ ba ren bu ha la/ srid nA tu swAhA/ cho ga ni 'phags pa spyan ras
56b3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du dkyil 'khor byas te/ ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la/ chu la sngags kyis btab ste bzhag nas/ nang par chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te dro khar kha
56b4(rgyud 'bum): zas 'o ma dang spags te zos na zhag bdun lon na nyin gcig kyang sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ / yid ches pa'i rtags yod do// sho lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
56b5(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
56b6(rgyud 'bum): po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ ka ba tsa karna la la te swAhA/ tshu la lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkrus na skye bo thams cad
56b7(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i cho ga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu bzhag la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs la/ dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang spags te
57a1(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba de lta bur zhag bdun gyi bar du byas na nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ / sho lo ka stong longs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
