57a2(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
57a3(rgyud 'bum): thA/ s+thi ti ma ti ma ti/ te dz+wa bi dA/ d+hu ru me ha ra hu ru kr-iSh+Ta hu ru me swAH/ shu dag dkar po la sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// mi brjed
57a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / // rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+na
57a5(rgyud 'bum): tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sA la te/ s+kha la te/ ma ni te sAhA/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ khyor chu la lan gsum
57a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te 'thungs na zhag bdun nas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / shes rab bskyed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang // lo
57a7(rgyud 'bum): ba ban d+he klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA kA ra si ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa/
57b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA ba ra dzA ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/
57b2(rgyud 'bum): ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ e bi ba bi ba/ pradz+nyA ba ra d+ha ni/ dza ra dza ra/ me d+hA ba ra d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud d+hi bar d+ha ni swAhA/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ nang re zhing rtsab mo
57b3(rgyud 'bum): khyor gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// /
57b4(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yathA/
57b5(rgyud 'bum): smr-i ti ma ti ma te/ te dza bin+ya/ tsu ru me hu ru hu ru me/ gan+d+ha hu ru me swAhA/ shu dag nag po la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par
57b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / zos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga a d+hiSh+ThA na/ satwa A lo ka na/ bud d+ha k+She tre san daR+shan byA ha
57b7(rgyud 'bum): nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa
58a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i mdo/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na
58a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/ lha'i nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / lha'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya rtsam gyi dge slong gi dge
58a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang snying rje chen po'i shes
58a4(rgyud 'bum): pa la gnas pa thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / skye ba gnyis dang / skye ba gsum dang / skye ba bcu dang / skye ba nyi shu dang / skye ba sum cu dang / skye ba brgya'i bar dag gis thogs pa/
58a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang sa brgyad pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas pa sha stag ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / dri med tog dang / nor dpal dang / glog gi tog dang /
58a6(rgyud 'bum): dri med 'od dang / tsan dan dang bdud rtsi tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun brgya dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad kyang lung bstan pa dang ldan pa/ ting
58a7(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad kyang sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs
58b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i cho 'phrul mthong ba brgyad stong dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes thob pa/ lung bstan pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa/ dpe med ma dang / dri med 'od dang /
58b2(rgyud 'bum): 'od can ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dung can ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo chen mo brgyad cu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul
58b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / gang ba bzang po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi bar dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
58b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs par rig nas/ rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i rgyan dang / na bza' dang / me
58b5(rgyud 'bum): tog dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par byas/ ri mor byas so// kha cig gis ni lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te bstod
58b6(rgyud 'bum): do/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la dmig pa snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus
58b7(rgyud 'bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od kyis snang bar gyur cing / gzugs thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par gyur nas/ sems can dmus long gang yin pa de dag
59a1(rgyud 'bum): gis ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur to/ / 'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas sgra dag thos par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad dag dang bral bar gyur
59a2(rgyud 'bum): to/ gos med pa rnams ni gos dag thob par gyur to// smyon pa rnams ni dran pa thob par gyur to// lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni lus dang dbang po yongs su rdzogs par gyur
59a3(rgyud 'bum): to/ / dbul po rnams kyis ni nor dag thob par gyur to// sems can gang dag nor dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod med pa de dag ni nor dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod dag dang ldan par
59a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
59a5(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa de dag thams cad la'ang bskul nas/ chos thams cad mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ sems can gang dag lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag thams
59a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis ni lha'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag mi rnams
59a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang mi'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
59b1(rgyud 'bum): srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa so sor thob nas/ sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang /
59b2(rgyud 'bum): lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su mun pa mun nag gi nang du
59b3(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus yud tsam zhig dran pa so sor thob nas/ gcig gis gcig kun tu shes par gyur te/ de dag mun pa chen po de nas yongs su thar par gyur to// /
59b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad gcig la gcig byams par gnas shing nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshes chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/
59b5(rgyud 'bum): mtho ba dang dma' bar yang gyur to// de nas 'khor 'dus pa der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
59b6(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po kun tu snang zhing / 'dus pa chen po'i lnga ltas kyang kun tu snang la//
59b7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag lung ston pa'ang kun tu snang zhing / chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam chen po'i lnga ltas kyang kun tu snang ba las
60a1(rgyud 'bum): na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur zhing / ye shes chen po'ang 'thob par
60a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can thams cad la snying rje skyed la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya/
60a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bar gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus shig/ rigs kyi bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i che na/ sems can sdig pa byed pa/ dbul ba/ nyam chung ba/ lus mdog ngan pa/ rga ba
60a4(rgyud 'bum): dang na bas yongs su gzir ba/ longs spyod chung ba/ lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa/ tshe thung ba/ blo chung ba/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gzir ba dag
60a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba yod de/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi don du chos bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cig dang / rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis yun ring por sems can rnam
60a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / re ba thams cad
60a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dag byas par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
60b1(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dag yid la byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
60b2(rgyud 'bum): de/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na sems can rga ba dang
60b3(rgyud 'bum): na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan gyis non par gyur pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pas yongs su gzir ba/ nyam chung ba/ mdog ngan pa/ tshe thung ba/ longs spyod chung ba/ lus yongs su
60b4(rgyud 'bum): ma bsgoms pa dag 'byung ba mchis te/ de dag ni ser sna dang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems kyis gcig la gcig 'gums par 'gyur la/ gcig gis gcig gi nor dang / longs spyod dang //
60b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug dag 'phrog par 'gyur zhing / gad mo dang / 'jo sgeg dang / bro gar dang / rtsed mo dag gis mngon par rtse ba dang / mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du
60b6(rgyud 'bum): shes par bgyid lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag rgyu de dang gzhi des sems can rnams la mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis gtses nas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
60b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag gis de dag gi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs
61a1(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i bar dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bgyi ba dang / sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi
61a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mkhyen pa dang / ma rtogs pa dang / ma gzigs pa dang /
61a3(rgyud 'bum): ma gsan pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci'ang mi mnga' bas/ chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam nyan par 'tshal ba dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / shes
61a4(rgyud 'bum): rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyis byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
61a5(rgyud 'bum): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po mang po lhags pa 'di dag re ba ma mchis par gyur cing slar mchi bar mi 'gyur bar/ bcom
61a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang yan lag lngas phyag byas te tshig
61a7(rgyud 'bum): mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das legs par bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa legs par bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan
61b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa thugs su chud nas/ phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs te snyan cing 'jebs la yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
61b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzig
61b3(rgyud 'bum): shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ngas sngon dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snang ba kun tu ston pa
61b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i spyan sngar de thos so/ / rigs kyi bu ti nge na de'i ming thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba phrag dgu bcus de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thos par gyur nas/ thams cad kyang de
61b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan te/ ngas kyang lung bstan pa thob bo// rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mkhyen pas sngon de bzhin gshegs
61b6(rgyud 'bum): pa sum khris sems can thams cad kyi don du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad de/ thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
61b7(rgyud 'bum): khyod nyid dang / 'jam dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang
62a1(rgyud 'bum): dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa 'di dag gis kyang zos nas ri mo dang mchod pa dag byas te/ de'i 'og tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag
62a2(rgyud 'bum): gis lung bstan pa thob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dag kyang thob par gyur nas/ 'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang / re ba thams cad grub pa dang / nad rnams dang bral
62a3(rgyud 'bum): bapar yang gyur la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa dang / gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang /
62a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzod dang / bang ba rnams 'byor pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa
62a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa dang / tshe dang //
62a6(rgyud 'bum): kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / mthu stobs dang ldan zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ nam yang sdug pa dang bral bar ma gyur cing / sdug pa'i sdug bsngal med
62a7(rgyud 'bum): par gyur pa de dran te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos smra ba de la mchog tu gus pa'i sems bskyed de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yan lag lngas phyag
62b1(rgyud 'bum): byas shing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis legs par brgyan nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
62b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang / legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag ni yon tan
62b3(rgyud 'bum): mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la'ang yon tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang / nad rnams dang bral ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / blo
62b4(rgyud 'bum): brtan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / brtan pa dang ldan pa dang / rgyal po thams cad dang / rgyal po'i btsun mo thams cad dang / rgyal bu thams cad dang / blon po thams cad dang / dgra thams
62b5(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang / phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os par 'gyur ro// nor dang yo byad mang bar yang 'gyur ro//
62b6(rgyud 'bum): de dag gi kha nas tsan dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro// mig ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra bar yang 'gyur ro// de dag gis nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag
62b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/ / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa byas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad zad par yang 'gyur ro// de dag la lha rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// de dag 'chi ba'i dus na sangs
63a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/ / phrag dog med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang 'gyur ro// shi 'gro
63a2(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang bsnyen bkur byas te/ yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa
63a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / klog pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / ming tsam thos par gyur pa de dag ni ngas mngon sum du lung bstan par lung bstan pa yin te/ de dag gis nga mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byas/
63a4(rgyud 'bum): ri mor byas/ mchod par byas pa'ang yin pas/ de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la the tshom bskyed par mi bya'o// gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin
63a5(rgyud 'bum): par yid la byas la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ / de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs mi mdzes pa dang / longs spyod med pa dang / blo med pa dang / sred pa che ba dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang /
63a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal srid 'khrugs par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang / klad pa na ba gang yin pa dang / zan chad pa gang yin pa dang / gos ngan par gyur pa gang yin pa dang / lus dang sems la gnod pa gang yin
63a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / reg na mi bde ba'i mal bcas pa gang yin pa dang / spro ba gang yin pa'i las kyi sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa'i mthus yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// des kyang
63b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar sems bskyed par byas te/ bdag gis sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sems can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pa de dag so sor bshags par bya'o// bsal
63b2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / mi bcab par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i longs spyod kyi
63b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas dag dang / ba ma dag la sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags
63b4(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing / dbang phyug chen po dag kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i
63b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / dmus long du 'gyur ba dang / bud med kyi dngos por 'gyur ba dang //
63b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan gnyis par 'gyur ba dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba'i dbang gis gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag
63b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas
64a1(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sred par byed pa dang / de dag thams cad kyi yon tan dang re ba thams cad
64a2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / bde ba chen por byed pa dang / bsam pa dang 'dod pa thams cad yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang / las tham
64a3(rgyud 'bum): cad zad par byed pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar byed pa dang / tshe dang /
64a4(rgyud 'bum): mdog dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu che bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / rims dang / dug dang /
64a5(rgyud 'bum): me dang / chu thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / lung bstan pa'i bar dag thob par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag yod de/ de dag mnyan cing bzung ste bsnyen bkur byed
64a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yon tan de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshes
64a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa dang / ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor dag gis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang /
64b1(rgyud 'bum): byephye ma dang / byug pa dang / ras bcos bu zung dag gsol te legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag gang lags/ bcas
64b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he/ su bud d+he/ bud d+ha ma te/ lo ke bi lo ke/ lo ka a ti kr-i te/ satwa a ba lo ka ne/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+haSh+NI na a d+hiSh+Tha te/
64b3(rgyud 'bum): sarba A shA pa ri pU ra Ni/ d+yu ti d+ha re/ na ra de ba pU dzi te/ ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na da de/ ta thA ga tA a d+hiSh+Tha ne na/ sarba lo ka ma su khI b+ha ba tu purba kar+m+ma k+Sha pa ya tuM/ rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ ta thA ga ta
64b4(rgyud 'bum): a d+hiSh+Tha ne na swAhA/ kye rigs kyi bu dag gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// ngas kyang da ltar sems can
64b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spang dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bya ba'i phyir bshad de/
64b6(rgyud 'bum): grogs po dag gang la la zhig 'di snyam du bdag gis ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur snyam du sems pa des nang par sngar langs te/
64b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang / snying rje ba'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / 'chab pa dang / khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /
65a1(rgyud 'bum): rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te//
65a2(rgyud 'bum): gang 'dod pa yid la byas nas me tog la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa la re re nas dbul bar bya'o// de nas de'i re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur
65a3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// dam pa gang 'dod pa de thob par yang 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// shi 'phos
65a4(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / tshe dang / stobs dang / mdog dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad kyang de'i dbang du 'gyur ro//
65a5(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing bsams pa thams cad yongs
65a6(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
65a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam bca' ba mi 'jigs pa gzi brjid ces bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis te/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med bkod pa gzi brjid rgyal po'i
65b1(rgyud 'bum): spyan sngar de bzung lags so/ / bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bshad lags so// bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag gis mngon par 'tshal te/ gang gi rna lam du gzungs
65b2(rgyud 'bum): de grags par gyur tam/ gro bar chud par gyur pa de'i lus la nyam chung ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs sam/ zo nad dam/ rims sam/ lus bro 'tshal ba 'am/ sems gdung ba 'am
65b3(rgyud 'bum): dus ma lags par 'gum pa'am/ chab kyis 'jigs pa 'am/ mtshon gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa 'am/ dug sbyar mas 'jigs pa 'am/ mkha' 'gro ma dang
65b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung pos 'jigs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dgra rnams sam/ mi dang mi ma lags pa dag gis mtho ba tsam pa 'am/ rnam par gtse ba 'am/ gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba den
65b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas ma mchis lags so/ / de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang ba stsol cig dang / bdag gis chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa de dag gi don du nyan pa rnams dang /
65b6(rgyud 'bum): ri mor bgyis pa rnams dang / mchod par bgyis pa rnams dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam
65b7(rgyud 'bum): bca' ba'i phyag rgya dag stsal bar bgyi'o/ / na maHsa ma ta thAg tA nan/ sarba po gyis twA nAn/ a ri ha tran/ taH thA/ oM 'dzadzar/ badz+ra lA ya/ badz+rab la/ badz+ra te / rUd+de/ barba pA Ni/
66a1(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga ta A dwe lA ya/ s+pha ra pra ti d+h+waM/ sarba b+ha d+hi na sarba pA ba ni nA shA ya/ de hi me/ ya thai ba si tam pa ram/ yan ya me ba a b+hi pra ya ts+tsha me/ tan+t+ra ma pa sarba~M d+hi trA/
66a2(rgyud 'bum): he he/ tu ru tu ru/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ ma bi lam pa da ri sha ya/ badz+ra kA yam/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne swAhA/ gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to// gnod sbyin
66a3(rgyud 'bum): dang srin po thams cad kyang rab tu sngangs so/ / lha thams cad dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ sems can chen po rab tu grub par byed pa'i gzungs kyi
66a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bshad pa ni legs so legs so/ / legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
66a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'am/ nor dang / 'bru dang / longs spyod kyi dbang phyug gam/ rgyal srid kyi
66a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gam/ rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ tshe dang / stobs dang / mdog dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe ring po nyid 'tshal ba des snga nas bsnyen pa bgyis la/ dgung bla yar gyi
66a7(rgyud 'bum): ngo ches brgyad la tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje 'dzin pa rta gad du dgod cing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ snying khar sku gdung stsal ba sku gdung dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa/ rig
66b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par bgyid par bgyis la/ gtsang mas bdug spos kyis bdug cing / gdug mtshan gcig tu smyung ba bgyis la/ de nas tshes brgyad nas/
66b2(rgyud 'bum): tshes bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i gnas gtsang mar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ bum pa gang ba bzhi'ang gzhag par bgyi
66b3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bzhir yang ro dang ldan pa dang / dri dang ldan pa dang / skyems dang / 'o thug gi gtor ma dag skul la/ gos rin po che dkar po bgos te sems rtse gcig tu bgyis nas/ dus
66b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum du bdug spos dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa chen po bgyi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'ang mchod pa bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis nas
66b5(rgyud 'bum): sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing / re re nas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bgyi'o// de nas sgra skad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dog sa g.yo ba dang 'od
66b6(rgyud 'bum): zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de nas dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis las thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'grub
66b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur lags so/ / bro nad ma mchis pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur zhing / yon tan stong yang 'thob par 'gyur lags so// 'gum pa'i cha
67a1(rgyud 'bum): na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ / bdag mthong ba'ang stsal bar bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lag na rdo rje la
67a2(rgyud 'bum): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// phyag rgya 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ 'di la som nyi med pa dang / yid gnyis med pa dang /
67a3(rgyud 'bum): the tshom med par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams
67a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin
67a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis de las ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / mi
67a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / yi dgas rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sem
67a7(rgyud 'bum): dang sems las byung ba'i lhag par g.yo ba dang bral bar g.yo ba dag rab tu shes shing / / sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ste/ legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa/
67b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la dang ba 'thob par 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba ste/ nyes par spyod pa'i las byed pa/ sdig pa spyod par byed par shes
67b2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ sdig pa'i lta bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston par byed cing / sdig pa thams cad las zlog par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'god par byed pa dang / bsam pa thams
67b3(rgyud 'bum): cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / ser sna dag sel bar byed pa dang / sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la dang
67b4(rgyud 'bum): ba rab tu thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye zhing / nam du'ang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur la/ yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur bas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di ni
67b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ste/ 'di thos pa'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog
67b6(rgyud 'bum): par nges pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag lung bstan par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das dgra
67b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom pa nyid kyang dga' ba lags te/ bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags na/ de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po dang dka' ba spyod pa ci tsam
68a1(rgyud 'bum): zhig tu 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
68a2(rgyud 'bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
68a3(rgyud 'bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa gang yin pa dang / mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / lus dang / sdug pa'i bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / bran mo
68a4(rgyud 'bum): dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma 'dis ni/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa
68a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa'i sod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par
68a6(rgyud 'bum): ston par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchod pa byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin
68a7(rgyud 'bum): pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ / rigs kyi bu ngas kun chub par byas shing bshad pa'i chos de dag thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor
68b1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa gang yin pa de bas ni/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /
68b2(rgyud 'bum): yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / yang dag par ston par byed pa dang nyan par byed na/ de las bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du yongs
68b3(rgyud 'bum): su sdud par 'gyur te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /
68b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'i bsod nams ni de ltar dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu
68b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can gang dag sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bro gar la mngon par dga' ba dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par shes pa dang / 'dod pa dang /
68b6(rgyud 'bum): khro ba dang / gnod sems mang ba dang / mi bde ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / mtshon cha dang / spro ba dang / bsdigs pa dang / rdeg pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / shes
68b7(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sdig pa'i las kyi gzhi de dang mi shes pa des mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin cing / rga ba dang / na ba dang //
69a1(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan dang / 'chi bas yongs su zin pas 'chi ba'i tshe na yongs su gdung bar 'gyur te/ dmigs pa na so so nas dur khrod dang 'dra ba kho nar mthong ba dang
69a2(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i sems bskyed par yang mi 'gyur la/ dad pa mi phyed pa thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na/
69a3(rgyud 'bum): lung bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa dang / de bzhin shegs pa ma mthong ba dang / lung bstan pa ma thob pa dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod
69a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba dang / gzung ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / dad par yang mi nus la/ chos smra ba de la'ang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba
69a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / mchod par bya bar yang mi nus so// rigs kyi bu gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i yul der ni/ de bzhin shegs pa'i mdzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas
69a6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos smra ba de
69a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / chos nyan pa de dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas bsnyen bkur bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi zhing // bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang nye bar bsgrub
69b1(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi lags so/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang rgyas par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi ste/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par yang 'gyur lags so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
69b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis/ ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor rnams la rnam par gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// khyed cag gis de bzhin du gyis shig/ gnod pa byed pa dang
69b3(rgyud 'bum): brnyas pa dang / bshe ba dang / sdigs pa dang / mtshon 'byin pa dang / rgyal bar byed na'ang lus dang srog la mi blta bar byas nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ yi ger bri bar bya//
69b4(rgyud 'bum): yi ger 'drir gzhug par bya/ bklag par bya'o// chos smra ba de la'ang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro bya'o// yul phyogs de dang / gling de dang / grong khyer de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang /
69b5(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa dag las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la'ang rtag par rgyun du bsam par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
69b6(rgyud 'bum): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / bskal pa grangs med stong phrag ji snyed du// sangs rgyas 'byung ba lan 'ga' rnyed pa la/ phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar// rigs kyi bu
69b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams bag yod chos nyon cig/ yon tan nyan cing mngon par dad byed pa// de dag gis ni ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'// gang gis rkang gnyis gtso bo rnams la ni// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed
70a1(rgyud 'bum): du/ nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan// spos dang 'phreng ba byug pa phul ba bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di la dad byas te// nyan cing klog la yi ger 'dri byed pa// de la bsod
70a2(rgyud 'bum): nams tshad ni yod min te/ / bde bar gshegs pas de snyed tshad ma gsungs// rtag tu bag yod dgon par sten byed cing // sems gzhan med par bsam gtan rtag sgom dang // sdug pa'i bu dang
70a3(rgyud 'bum): bu mo sbyin byed cing / / lag pa rkang pa yongs su gtong ba pas// gang su mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa// de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob// mdo mchog 'di ni nor sbyin byed pa ste// 'di yis
70a4(rgyud 'bum): ngan song kun kyang rtag tu spangs/ / 'di ni nor dang 'bru sbyin byed pa ste// gang zhig mdo sde rnam dag 'di 'dzin pa// de la yon tan kun kyang mi dkon zhing // de la tshe stobs brtson 'grus mod ma yin//
70a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mthong zhing // ngas de sangs rgyas byang chub lung bstan na// de la nam yang sdig pa yod min zhing // bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams kyang mthong //
70a6(rgyud 'bum): de la rtag tu las gang 'byung 'gyur ba// sems gdung lus na ba 'am de bzhin du// klad pa na ba thams cad zad 'gyur zhing // de ni nams kyang rnam par lhung mi 'gyur// de ni mthong ba'i
70a7(rgyud 'bum): chos la'ang yon tan kun/ / ji ltar bsams shing 'dod pas 'thob par 'gyur// de ltar rtag tu dge slong pho mo dang // dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos rtag tu ni// mi yi dbang po de bzhin
70b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa ltar/ / chos smra ba la rjes su gus byas te// mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing // 'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya// spos dang 'phreng ba byug pa rnam dag gis// bsnyen
70b2(rgyud 'bum): bkur byas te yi ger 'drir yang gzhug/ phyi ma'i dus la rga nad gdung 'gyur la// 'khrug pa stong phrag rab tu g.yen 'phyo zhing // sems dmyal yi dgas rnams su yongs 'khyam dang //
70b3(rgyud 'bum): za ma ma ning smad par bya ba dang // dmus long nyid dang ro dang khyi yi dri// rigs dma' bud med rnams su skye mi byed// phrag dog che zhing rtag tu sdig byed la// khro bas zil non rtag tu ser sna can//
70b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas chos la gus par ma byas pas// de ni de 'dra'i rigs su skye 'gyur la// der yang sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing // de ni phyi ma'i dus la'ang gdung bar 'byur// de phyir gang
70b5(rgyud 'bum): dag 'dzin cing ston byed pa/ / de dag gis ni rtag tu mchod par bya// gang gis de la yongs su spro ba dang // smad cing brdegs la bcing ba byas gyur la// des ni nga yang yongs su spros pa yin//
70b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la phu dud byas na nga'ang byas// de'i phyir de dag gis ni chos smra dang // gang zhig 'di 'dzin 'dri zhing klog byed pa// de dag la ni rtag tu bsnyen bkur zhing // tshig 'jam snyan pa'ang
70b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyun du brjod par bya/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te//
71a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnam par lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis par rjes su dran
71a2(rgyud 'bum): te/ bdag gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ye shes tog ces bgyi ba'i spyan sngar de thos shing bzung lags so// de mnyan cing bzung la bcangs shing bklags te/ gzhan
71a3(rgyud 'bum): dag la'ang bsgrags shing bsnyen bkur bgyis nas yi ger bris sam/ yi ger 'drir stsal na phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
71a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ de ji ltar bsam pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang 'byung
71a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ bro nad rnams dang bral bar yang 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong bar 'gyur lags
71a6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi
71a7(rgyud 'bum): bu legs so legs so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zin gyis shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
71b1(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gis/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nan/ sarba A shA pa ri pU ra kA
71b2(rgyud 'bum): nan/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA rA Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha/ ma ma ma/ d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi ri/ shAn te pra shAn te/ sarba bA pa k+Sha yaM ka ri/ a ba lo/
71b3(rgyud 'bum): kI ya/ kA ru Ni ka/ bo d+hi tsi ta mi ma na si ku ru/ bya ba lo kA ya mAM/ sma ra sma ra/ yan tra yA pUrbe/ sa t+ya a d+hiSh+Ta na kr-i tan twe na/ sat+ye na sa te bA tsa ne na/ sarba A shA me pa ri pU ra ya/ bud d+ha
71b4(rgyud 'bum): k+She tram/ pa ri sho d+ha ya mA me ka sh+tsi be he dAM ka ro bud d+hiSh+Tha ne na swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ te dze te dze/ ma hA ti dzaM/ ya mA ma kA ya dush+tsa ri ta ma bA/ bAg dush+tsa ri taM bA/ ma no drash+tsa ri tAM pA/ dir d+ha ma bA/
71b5(rgyud 'bum): tata sarba dak+Sha pa ya/ a lo kA ya/ bi lo kI ya/ ta thA ga tA da ri sha nash+tsa/ a ha ma hi kAM k+Sha ma ya bo d+hi satwa da ri sha nam/ dru d+hu ma/ da dA swa me da ri sha nam/ sarba me ku sha la a b+hi ba ra d+hAn+tu/
71b6(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga ta nAn/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ sma ta pra ti dz+nyA ma ma hA satwa/ sid d+h+yan tu man+ta bA dA swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing /
71b7(rgyud 'bum): gzha'i sgra chen po dang / lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs
72a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / sems can chen po khyod sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed pa/
72a2(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad byang bar byed pa/ sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs 'di legs par smras so// bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang gzung bar bya/ bsnyen
72a3(rgyud 'bum): bkur bar bya'o/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag gang la la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrags pa'i yon tan de dag mngon par 'dod cing lung
72a4(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa dang / kho bo'ang mngon sum du mthong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / longs spyod dang dbang phyug 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas
72a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhing du skye bar 'dod pa des/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la lus legs par khrus byas shing gtsang la bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par byas la/ tshes brgyad nas
72a6(rgyud 'bum): brtsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa phyogs su spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / bum pa gang ba dag gis sa phyogs de dang / chos smra
72a7(rgyud 'bum): ba de la'ang mchod pa byas nas/ lus legs par khrus byas pa gtsang mas gos dkar po bgos te/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa sna tshogs
72b1(rgyud 'bum): dag gis mchod pa byas nas yi ger 'dri bar bya'o/ / 'dri ba'i tshe na nyin gcig bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bla ma dang gus
72b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems kyis nyi ma phyed tshun chad kyi bar de tsam du bri bar bya'o// tshes
72b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad nas brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa'ang de bzhin du bya'o// cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du byas te bris na/ de ma thag tu mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i
72b4(rgyud 'bum): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur/ brtson 'grus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang
72b5(rgyud 'bum): lus bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang srab mor 'gyur ro// des yi ger 'drir
72b6(rgyud 'bum): bcug nas kyang / sku gdung dang bcas mchod rten gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs sku
72b7(rgyud 'bum): gdung dang bcas pa zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/ tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/
73a1(rgyud 'bum): chos bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya zhing / gtsang ma kha zas dkar po za ba bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa
73a2(rgyud 'bum): yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa yid gcugs pa dang ldan pa/ nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna yongs su spangs pas nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/
73a3(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum du bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag kyang phul la/ dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad 'phags pa
73a4(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la dor bar bya'o/ / lag na rdo rje la'ang bdug spos kyis bdug par bya'o// phyogs bcur phyag byas la/ nub phyogs kyi lha mo 'jigs byed
73a5(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / shar phyogs kyi dpe med ma dang / steng gi phyogs kyi dung can ma la sogs pa la phyogs bzhir gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan dag
73a6(rgyud 'bum): kyang gtor bar bya'o/ / des na de la rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'jigs pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / sems 'khrul par yang mi 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad
73a7(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas la bskul bar bya'o/ / cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du sngar bsnyen pa byas la/ de nas tshes bco lnga'i nang par sa phyogs der bum pa gang ba
73b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bzhag la/ bdug spos dang / tsan dan dang / pog dkar po dang / ga pur dag kyang gzhag/ mar me kha bzhi me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
73b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / dar dang / ba dan sna tshogs dag dang / gser dngul gyi snod dag gis legs par brgyan la/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan dang / gzhan yang
73b3(rgyud 'bum): ci 'byor pa'i lha bshos dang / gtor ma dag kyang phyogs bzhir gzhag go/ sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod lan re byas la phyogs bzhir dor ro//
73b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod lan re byas la/ re re nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la bsnun par bya'o//
73b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzugs de 'gul bar 'gyur zhing sgra skad chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'od zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// de nas las thams cad
73b6(rgyud 'bum): dang dgos pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par yang 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyis
73b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag bya ba'i 'os su'ang 'gyur/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba rnams 'byor par yang 'gyur/ nad thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang tshe ring bar yang 'gyur/
74a1(rgyud 'bum): dgra thams cad dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams kyang de lta 'dod cing gces smras byed par yang 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'dod chags
74a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spang bar yang 'gyur/ nam du'ang sdug pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// brtan pa dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid
74a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / chos shes pa dang / 'chi ba'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
74a4(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang mthong ba dang / byams pa la gnas shing chos ston bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus bya ba'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
74a5(rgyud 'bum): ji lta bu 'dod pa dag gam/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs chen po 'am/ gang du rjes su dran par byed pa der skye ba dang / gzhan yang yon tan stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa
74a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas lags te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
74a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma mchis par mnyan par yang rngo mi thogs la/ gzung bar yang rngo mi thogs/ bklag par yang rngo mi thogs/ mchod par yang rngo mi thogs/ yi ger bri bar yang rngo mi thogs/
74b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ger 'drir stsal bar yang rngordo mi thogs/ dad par yang rngo mi thogs lags so// gal te mthong bar gyur na'ang nyan par mi 'gyur la/ gal te nyan par gyur na'ang de sems rnam par g.yeng bas
74b2(rgyud 'bum): nyan par 'gyur zhing dad par mi 'gyur/ bsnyen bkur bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// gal te bsnyen bkur bgyid par gyur na'ang nyon mongs pa dang gnod sems dang bcas pa'i sems kyis
74b3(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ / gal te yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir stsol bar gyur na'ang de gzhan dag yid la bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sngon
74b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i slad du de ni nyams su myong bar bgyid cing the tshom skye bar 'gyur lags so/ / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pas kyang lan gsum bsgrubs na/ re ba thams cad yang dag
74b5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'grub par 'gyur lags te/ de la nem nur ma mchis pa dang / yid gnyis ma mchis pa dang / the tsom mi bskyed par bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sem
74b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad
74b7(rgyud 'bum): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ / de nas gnod sbyin ma chen mo dpe med ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / spos
75a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / ras bcos bu bung dag gis mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
75a2(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sham bi na dbyangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sma
75a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam bcas pa brjod pa rjes su dran lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying po dag 'tshal lags so// de'i slad du bcom
75a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
75a5(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen ma rnams kyi don du bdag rjes su gzung du gsol/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ s+yAd ya thA dan/ hA hA/ hI hI/ hU hU/ sa ra sa ra/ la hUM la hUM/ shIg+h+raM shI g+h+raM/ ma hA bin+d+ha/ sarba bid+yA
75a6(rgyud 'bum): da ra Na saM s+thi te/ ha sa ha sa kyin+tiSh+Ta sa king gin+tiSh+Te si/ ka na ka bi tsa tra A ba ra na ba hu/ shi tang ge/ pa Ta pa Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sarba ar+thA na me swA hA/ sA d+ha ya/ tu ru
75a7(rgyud 'bum): tu ru anAn swA hA/ ar+than de hi me/ sam sa ta tA nAn sid d+hi/ sa hA hA/ pad+me pad+me/ ma hA pad+me/ bi sha de bi sha de/ ma hA bi sha de/ b+ha ba b+ha ba/ b+ha bod b+ha bA ya/ ta mA d+hu kro ra ta mA tsaN+De
75b1(rgyud 'bum): tan me bi bya ma pra yo tsa ya/ sid d+hi ku ru/ sarba A shA ma pa ri pU ra ya/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la yon 'tshal ba dang / nor dang 'bru 'tshal ba dang / sema?
75b2(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal ba dang / nor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal srid dang / rig sngags 'chang chen po nyid dang / bdag mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des/
75b3(rgyud 'bum): tshechos brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma gum pa skra ma stsal ba ri mo mkhan gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pas/ tshon rtsi sprin
75b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ma 'bags pa snod gsar pa'i nang du stsal bas/ dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags
75b5(rgyud 'bum): pa rdo rje khro bo gos dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad dang / me tog 'phreng dang / zla gam dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ rdo rje gsor zhing mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o// g.yon phyogs su
75b6(rgyud 'bum): ni gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan// sug pa na pad+ma thogs shing
75b7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/ rad pa dkar po
76a1(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal ba/ grogs dang ldan pa/ nus chan 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'tshal bas sngar bsnyen pa bgyis la/ tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang
76a2(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'i gnas gtsang mar dang po kho nar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang lag na rdo rje la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dag gsol bar bgyi zhing / phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / zho dang
76a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras chan dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / chang sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dag gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa bgyis nas/
76a4(rgyud 'bum): dus sum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum bgyis shing / re re nas gnod sbyin mo dpe med ma'i gzugs de la bsnun par bgyi'o// de
76a5(rgyud 'bum): nas zla ba nya ba'i tshes bco lnga gdugs la'ang cho ga 'di nyid dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag dang / bdug spos dang / ga pur dang / bog dkar po dang / tsan dan dang / shing mu sa dag kyang
76a6(rgyud 'bum): dbul/ 'bru mar dri bda' ba'i zhugs mar kha gnyis kyang dbul bar bgyi'o// des na bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ ting nge
76a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin 'thob pa dang / nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / lus mi snang bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal srid dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / gter lta 'tshal
76b1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / nor bsgyur 'tshal ba dang / pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi lags so// des kyang sems can thams cad la byams pa'i
76b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna yongs su spang ba'i sems su bgyi'o// mchod rten dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog pa yongs su spang ba dang / de bzhin
76b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnams la dad pa mi phyed par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa zhig gis kyang lan gsum bsgrub ste/ bdag gis ma bsams par gyur na/ bcom/
76b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gal te sangs rgyas la dad par ma gyur pa dang / yid gnyis su gyur pa gang
76b5(rgyud 'bum): lags pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bgyis nas 'gyod pa mi bgyid pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag la'ang bdag mthong bar
76b6(rgyud 'bum): stsal bar bgyi zhing / thob par yang bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin ma dpe med ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so legs so// sring mo khyod
76b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdig pa kun tu spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di lta bu dag smras shing / dam bca' ba'ang byas pa ni'ang khyod legs so// khyod snying rje
77a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'di lta bu 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god nus par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/
77a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas lha mo chen mo dung can mas bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas te bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs
77a3(rgyud 'bum): te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas
77a4(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi ba dang / chos smra ba de dag kyang srung ba'i slad du dam bca' bar bgyis shing / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyid
77a5(rgyud 'bum): lags kyis/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM sha khi ni de bi/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ tiSh+Thar+tha ne
77a6(rgyud 'bum): d+ha na dza ye/ bri bi/ bri ti ka ri/ d+hI ng+ging+gi ti ri/ nA nA/ bi bi d+ha/ be Sha ba tra a yu d+ha d+ha ri Ni/ yu yu A yuSh+Ta la ne/ ta thA ga tan/ sma ra bo d+hi tsi ta tan/ mA bi lam+ba/ de hi me ba ran/ shaM ka ni
77a7(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag lus la gnas par bgyis na de'i snyan pa 'phel bar gyur zhing / gzi brjid 'phel ba dang / longs spyod 'phel ba dang
77b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug 'phel ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / dgra rnams dbang du bgyi ba'ang 'phel bar 'gyur lags so// sa'i phyogs gtsang ma 'am/ lha'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i gtor ma phyogs
77b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhir stsal la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdug spos dang pog dkar po dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing zhugs mar dag kyang phul la/ dgung nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byams pa la gnas pa
77b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / nges par gnas shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ dam pa'i chos spong ba ma gtogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so// de nas
77b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das dang ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis/ lha mo chen mo dung can ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so legs so// yon tan mang po dang ldan pa'i
77b5(rgyud 'bum): dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so/ / sring mo khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin du gyis shig/ de nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed mas bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi me tog
77b6(rgyud 'bum): dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos smra
77b7(rgyud 'bum): bde dag dang / chos nyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag gi don du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/
78a1(rgyud 'bum): dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal srid dang / tshe ring bar bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad dbang du bgyid pa'i gsang sngags
78a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam
78a3(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen bkur bgyid dam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir stsol tam/ mchog tu gus pas ji skad gsungs pa'i sgrub par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bsrung bar bgyi/
78a4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskyab par bgyi zhing / dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod dang dbang phyug dag gis mi brel bar bgyi/ 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang
78a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khrug long dag las rgyal bar bgyi/ tshe phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ de'i yul dang grong khyer dag kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags kyis/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
78a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ sarba bo d+hi satwa nAn/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/ badz+ra pA Ni pra b+hA tI nAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA de bi/ b+hI me d+hI
78a7(rgyud 'bum): ma ma he/ dza ye dza ya ba he/ ya sho ba hi/ ya sho dzaM be/ te dza dzA be/ b+hA ka ra Na prAp+te/ sarba satwa a ba lo ka ne/ kri ba te dza ba hu le/ ta tha ga ta a nr-i dz+nyA taM bA lA ya/ s+pha ra pra ti d+h+we/ bud d+ha.a
78b1(rgyud 'bum): d+hiSh+ThA ne na/ de hi me ba ran/ sid d+hi ku ru/ de bi/ ma hA de bi/ sa t+ya bA tsa na de bi/ b+hI me/ sa t+ya bA tsa na pra tiSh+Thi te/ gu h+ya na bA si ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi
78b2(rgyud 'bum): don du/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs shing / de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar me tog
78b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa bgyis la/ phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dag stsal te/ ci dang ci 'tshal ba yid la
78b4(rgyud 'bum): bgyis shing / bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mchod pa bgyid na/ re ba de dang de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so// gang la la bdag gi rang gi gzugs mthong bar 'tshal
78b5(rgyud 'bum): ba des/ tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma 'gum pa/ skra ma mchis pa la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad yongs su bzung ba tshon rtsi sprin dang ma 'bags
78b6(rgyud 'bum): pa snod gsar pa'i nang du stsal bas/ dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
78b7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam ston pa bri bar bgyi'o/ / g.yon phyogs su ni lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan
79a1(rgyud 'bum): @thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ril ba dang bzang 'phreng thogs shing / yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas sngar/
79a2(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen pa bgyis la/ tshes brgyad nas/ bco lnga'i bar du mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i gnas su me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dag gis mchod pa bgyi zhing / phyogs
79a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhir yang 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan gyi gtor ma dag gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing lha bshos dkar po dag kyang
79a4(rgyud 'bum): phul la/ gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag stsal nas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems kyis sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la
79a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyi zhing / re re nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma'i gzugs de la 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing / dam pa ci 'tshal
79a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang skul bar bgyi ste/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang / nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / gter lha 'tshal ba dang / nor bsgyur 'tshal ba dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / dus ma lags par 'gum
79a7(rgyud 'bum): ba bzlog pa dang / bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu gzhom pa dang / bu mchis par bgyi ba dang / nor 'du bar bgyi ba dang / sems can thams
79b1(rgyud 'bum): cad la byams pa skye ba dang / gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba'i las dag kyang bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
79b2(rgyud 'bum): dag la the tsom du gyur pa gang lags pa ma gtogs par mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pa zhig lags na'ang / bdag gis re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par gyur na/
79b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sring mo legs so/
79b4(rgyud 'bum): legs so// sring mo khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni'ang khyod
79b5(rgyud 'bum): legs so/ / sring mo de'i phyir khyod kyis rtag tu dam bcas pa 'di dran par gyis shig/ de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing / lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab
79b6(rgyud 'bum): papa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so legs so// khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs
79b7(rgyud 'bum): bapar 'gyur ba'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
80a1(rgyud 'bum): gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / klog
80a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchid ston du bgyid pa des bsod nams ji tsam 'thob par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa
80a3(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i phyir de khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
80a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa la ni ma gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan pa 'am/ mi dgongs pa 'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol/
80a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang /
80a6(rgyud 'bum): 'don pa dang / kha ton du byed pa las bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dpes brjod par yang mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gos dang / rgyan dang / dbyig dang / gser
80a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas te rtser bcug kyang / sems can de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba
80b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur ba nyid yin zhing / mo 'bum du
80b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag sems can dmyal pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul dag las
80b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su thar par mi 'gyur ba nyid de/ sems can rnams kyi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan cing mchod pa byed pa dang yang dag par bstan te/ de'i don kyang mnyan cing nan tan gyis sgrub par byed
80b4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i
80b5(rgyud 'bum): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su thar pa kho nar gyur pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'di'i bsod nams kyi tshad kyi dpe mi mdzad do// rigs kyi bu gang
80b6(rgyud 'bum): gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / chos smra ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag gi phyir/ dbyig zhungs 'bru tsam yongs su gtong bar byed dam/ me tog
80b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig gam/ 'bras bu gcig gam/ ba dan nam/ rol mo'i sgra 'am/ spos sam/ gos sam/ rgyan gcig tsam zhig yongs su gtong bar byed dam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug
81a1(rgyud 'bum): gam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod par byed dam/ yang dag par ston tam/ bsnyen bkur byed dam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa gang yin
81a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa la lo 'bum du me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang /
81a3(rgyud 'bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gi mchod pas mchod par byed/ rjed par byed cing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / 'chag
81a4(rgyud 'bum): sa dang / skyed mos tshal dag byed du bcug gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa brgya'am stong byed du bcug ste/ de dag la lo 'bum
81a5(rgyud 'bum): du mchod pa dag gis mchod par byed pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchod pa byed pa
81a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / yang dag par ston pa de ni de bas bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du mchod pa byed pa de ni de lta ma yin la/ sems
81a7(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la sbyin pa byin zhing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug pa'ang de lta ma yin no// de lta bas na rig kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang /
81b1(rgyud 'bum): rnon po chen po dang / blon po de dag gis rtag pa brgyan du chos kyi nam grangs 'di mchod par bya'o// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog par byed pa dang / rjod par byed pa dang / don yang nye bar sgrub par
81b2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing / de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya//
81b3(rgyud 'bum): bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ yid la bya zhing / 'di ltar sems bskyed par yang bya ste/ bdag cag don med pa la don du 'du shes pa dang / mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug
81b4(rgyud 'bum): bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes shing / lam ma yin par zhugs pa la lam nye bar ston pa gang yin pa dang / bdag cag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
81b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam du sems bskyed par yang bya'o//
81b6(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang byug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa chen po mdzad pa pos yang dag par
81b7(rgyud 'bum): bshad lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ der yang dge slong dab
82a1(rgyud 'bum): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po snod du gyur pa dag mchod par byed pa/ 'dzin par
82a2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ klog par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dad par 'gyur/ yid ches par 'gyur ro// gal te byang dang / shar dang / nub phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par yang 'gyur na/ de na
82a3(rgyud 'bum): gang dag nyan par mi byed pa dang / dad par mi byed pa dang / yid ches par mi byed pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa dang / brjed ngas pa dang / bu smad dang /
82a4(rgyud 'bum): zan dang / bran mo dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / bzhad gad dang / 'jo sgeg dang / bro dang / gar dang / glu sna tshogs kyis rnam par g.yengs shing phrag dog dang / ser
82a5(rgyud 'bum): sna'i dran pas nyan par mi byed/ yid ches par mi byed pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi las la mngon par brtson pa yin te/ de dag gi skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
82a6(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /
82a7(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas kyi yul rnams las yongs su ma thar pa kho nar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bdag nyid ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar par 'dod pa
82b1(rgyud 'bum): de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya zhing / gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan par bya/ yid la gzung bar bya'o// khrag khrug dang / 'khrug long dang / rmi lam
82b2(rgyud 'bum): ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dag dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gnag nad dang / phyugs nad dang / mi nad dag dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa sna tshogs dag la'ang chos
82b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa byas te bklag par bya'o/ / rgyal mtshan la btsugs la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag gis mchod cing phyogs
82b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhir gtor ma gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dag gis phyag byas te 'jug par byas na/ der yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'gro ba'i nad thams cad kyang rab tu
82b5(rgyud 'bum): zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sngon gyi srid par 'dren pas legs gsungs shing // sems can thams cad
82b6(rgyud 'bum): rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ / da ltar ngas kyang khyod la bshad pa yi// ting 'dzin 'di ni zung zhig kun dga' bo// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog la/ gang gis khams
82b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum sbyin par byin pa bas/ mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byas na ni// sbyin pas de yi dper yang mi phod do// gang gis sangs rgyas la ni dad byas te// tshad med gtsug lag
83a1(rgyud 'bum): khang dag brtsigs pa bas/ / gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin pa gang yin pa// de ni de bas bsod nams mang por 'gyur// gang zhig me tog gcig tsam 'dor byed cing // sa
83a2(rgyud 'bum): dang 'phreng ba byug pa de bzhin te/ / ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen bkur byed gyur na// bsod nams tshogs char snga ma de mi 'gyur// gang gis mdo sde 'di la mchod pa'i phyir// kar sha pa Ni'i sbyin pa
83a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin byed cing / / byang chub phyir ni byams pa'i sems bskyed na// de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can la// ting 'dzin 'di bshad lung phog de
83a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / bla med byang chub phyir ni bkod gyur na// de yi bsod nams dper yang mi 'gyur ro// de ltas phan yon 'di dag thos nas kyang // sems can kun la de bzhin byams byas te// mdo
83a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di gzung zhing yi ger bri bar bya/ / bklag par bya zhing de bzhin bshad par bya// rga dang de bzhin na 'chis gnod gyur cing // sdug bsngal rab drag brgya yis yongs gdungs la// sems dmyal
83a6(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas rnams su skye ba na/ / phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par gyur ta re// 'chi ba'i dus na yid skrag 'jigs gyur la// yang dang yang du rngam pa 'don byed cing // bdag gi dpung gnyen skyabs su su
83a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhes/ / byis pa'i blo can phan tshun rtog ga re// gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchod cing // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun nor phrog pa// mi bzad gshin rje'i 'jig rten 'khrid
83b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / / phyin chad rtag tu skyabs gyur 'ga' yang med// bu smad yod min nye du rtsa lag med// yul 'khor yod min bzhad gad 'jo sgeg med// nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan// kun spa
83b2(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal yang dang yang mi bzad/ / ting 'dzin 'di la dad par ma byas pa// de 'dra'i sdug bsngal mi bzad myong 'gyur bas// sdug bsngal 'di la phan yon de thos na// byis pa'i tho yang su
83b3(rgyud 'bum): zhig dang mi skyed/ / dang phyir rtag tu dge slong pho mo dang // dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos 'khor zug tu// mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing // 'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya// de nas
83b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te// ston pa'i 'du shes kyis bcang
83b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi zhing / sems can thams cad la yang dag par bstan par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dag po gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang bstan pa mnyan
83b6(rgyud 'bum): te kun bzung ba de dag thams cad 'chang bar mi byed/ klog pa mi byed/ rgyas par mi byed kyang des ni khyod kyi nga la nyes pa byas par mi 'gyur zhing / gus par ma mnyan par mi 'gyur la/ nyan
83b7(rgyud 'bum): thos nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur gyi/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang bar mi byed/ klog par mi byed/ mchod par mi byed/ yang dag par ston par mi byed/ yid la gnas par mi byed na ni//
84a1(rgyud 'bum): des na khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par 'gyur zhing / gus par ma mnyan par yang 'gyur la/ nyan thos nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod
84a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis phud dud du byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o/ / 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
84a3(rgyud 'bum): chub kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na// srog chags drug khri len pa med par zag pa rnams las
84a4(rgyud 'bum): sems rnam par grol lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' bdun brgyus ni ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// lnga brgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par skye bar lung bstan pa thob par gyur to// srog
84a5(rgyud 'bum): chags dgu khri ni nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad spangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'
84a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na rigs kyi bu
84a7(rgyud 'bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo nyan par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
84b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan pa lags so// slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na sems can gang bzhad gang dang / 2
84b2(rgyud 'bum): sgeg dang / gar dang / zo dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dag la sna tshogs su g.yeng ba/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pa che ba/ rtsed mo la dga' bar 'du shes pa/
84b3(rgyud 'bum): mi rtag pa la'ang rtag par 'du shes pa/ phrag dog dang / ser snas yongs su 'dzin cing / mchod par mi bgyid/ ri mor mi bgyid/ dad par mi bgyid/ glo ba ches par mi bgyid/ 'cha
84b4(rgyud 'bum): bar mi bgyid/ klog par mi bgyid/ nyan par mi bgyid/ nan tan gyis sgrub par mi bgyid pa de dag ni/ dal ba 'di yid byung bar bgyis shing / sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de yongs su
84b5(rgyud 'bum): bas par bgyis nas/ sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba sna tshogs dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / der yang bskal pa bye ba brgya
84b6(rgyud 'bum): phrag du mar sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas/ yang slar sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags te/
84b7(rgyud 'bum): mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis yun ring por rjes su 'gyod par 'gyur lags so// de lta lags pas na lus dang / ngag dang / yid legs par bsdam par bgyi
85a1(rgyud 'bum): zhing / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la'ang dad pa mi phyed par bgyi/ sems can thams cad la'ang byams pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / ser
85a2(rgyud 'bum): sna dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang / khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi lags so// de nas ji ltar lhags so// de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i
85a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor de dag gis yang rang gi bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang /
85a4(rgyud 'bum): na bza' dang / rgyan dag dang / a la la zhes ca cod pa/ gzha'i sgra dag dang / lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dag gis mchod pa byas nas legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/
85a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// sems can thams cad kyi don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grang chen po 'di shin tu legs par bka'
85a6(rgyud 'bum): stsal labra so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar
85a7(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba dang / byang chub sems
