85b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i sa gnon pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'dus pa chen po zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la
85b2(rgyud 'bum): gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
85b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
85b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma dang / dri med 'od dang / 'od can ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / dung
85b5(rgyud 'bum): can ma dang / 'phrog ma la sogs pa de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad dang / zam
85b6(rgyud 'bum): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyed
85b7(rgyud 'bum): do/ / 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
86a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyag kyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / su rin drab d+hi dang / bu chen rgyal rtsa ba lan ni ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ ban rje klu'i rgyal mtshan gyim bskur
86a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ma Ni tsin+ta kalpa pra Ni d+hirba ba/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
86a3(rgyud 'bum): phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon
86a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob
86a5(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas
86a6(rgyud 'bum): brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la
86a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang gnod pa phyir rgol ba tham
86b1(rgyud 'bum): cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas
86b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig/ btsun pa
86b3(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems
86b4(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing / smon lam ji skad btab pa thams cad kyang myur du grub par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
86b5(rgyud 'bum): phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags
86b6(rgyud 'bum): pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta zhing / dam pa'i mchog gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la
86b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis 'jig rten dag na 'phongs shing
87a1(rgyud 'bum): nyam thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bgyid pa la mthu chen po thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa
87a2(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chen po dang / me dang / chu dang /
87a3(rgyud 'bum): rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang dag 'byung bas/ skye bo mang po nyam thag pa de dag zhi ba dang ma mchis par bgyid par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs
87a4(rgyud 'bum): rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas
87a5(rgyud 'bum): pha rol tu 'chi 'pho ba'i 'jigs pa chen po nye bar gnas pa na'ang / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum du mngon du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen po
87a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzad par gyur cig/ bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma spros pa chos bdag med pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems tshad med par
87a7(rgyud 'bum): brtan pa/ sems ma zhum pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho bar gyur cig/ tshe rabs thams
87b1(rgyud 'bum): cad du'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang
87b2(rgyud 'bum): phyug la sogs pa mnyes par bgyid cing ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig/ ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo lhun gyis
87b3(rgyud 'bum): grub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro gcig par gyur cig/ ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
87b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas
87b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig/ ji ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs
87b6(rgyud 'bum): rje'i bdag nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par
87b7(rgyud 'bum): gyur cig/ ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod cing mchod pa bgyis
88a1(rgyud 'bum): pas thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la'ang snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gyur cig/ ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i
88a2(rgyud 'bum): tshe/ de snyed bdag gi lus skyes par// de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing // de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog/ ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe// ji skad dag gi ngag skyes par// de srid mgon
88a3(rgyud 'bum): po'i mtshan brjod cing / / ngag gi sbyor ba'i tshogs bgyid shog/ ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na// de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba// de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing // yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur
88a4(rgyud 'bum): cig/ de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis// thugs rje'i dbang phyug brten bgyis pas// lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing // yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su
88a5(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung lags/ / rtag tu sbyor ba bgyis pas na// thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs// srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig pu// yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
88a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te// srid gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM
88a7(rgyud 'bum): tsakra birti/ tsin+da ni/ mahA bam+ba ru ru tiSh+Tha/ dz+wa la A kaR+Sha la hU~M phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags rdzogs so// / oM bar+sa tsin+da ma Ni tre la hUM/ sring po'o// oM brda pad+ma hU~M/ nye ba'i snying po'o//
88b1(rgyud 'bum): oM ma Ni badz+ra pa Ni hUM/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// sngags snying po bzhi 'byung ba dang / smon lam dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / sngags su bcas pa rdzogs so// / spyan ras
88b2(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag gis chos rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis ye shes meg ni
88b3(rgyud 'bum): myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis sems can thams cad myur du sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la rgyag
88b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dag myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur du shes rab gru yis sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs
88b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag ni myur du sdug bsngal mtsho las 'da' bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur du tshul khrims
88b6(rgyud 'bum): rkang gis lam thob shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje tsha la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag
88b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / bdag gis myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim phyin shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shog/ bdag ni
89a1(rgyud 'bum): ral gri ri la 'dzeg/ ral gri ri ni rang skyil shog/ bdag ni chu tshan phrad gyur na/ chu tshan me mur rab zhi shog/ sems can dmyal bar bdag song na// sems can
89a2(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba rang bskams shog/ bdag ni yi dgas gnas song na// bkres skom dag ni 'grangs ngoms shog/ bdag ni lha min gnas song na// ngan sems rang nyid dul bar shog/ bdag
89a3(rgyud 'bum): ni dud 'gro'i gnas phyin na/ / rang nyid shes rab che thob shog/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba
89a4(rgyud 'bum): ban+d+ha na tshe da na kA rA ya/ sarba pA pa sa mu drots+tsha Sha Na kA rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na kA rA ya/ sarba su bad tra bi na sha na kA rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye/ Shu trA NA ya ta s+ya na ma sl-i ta i daM/ Ar+yA ba lo
89a5(rgyud 'bum): ki te shwa ra/ ta pa nI la kar+N+Na/ na ma hri da ya/ mA bar+ha yi Sh+yA mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nan/ shu b+ha tsi ta na/ sarba satwA nAn/ pA pa mArga bi sho d+ha kan/ tad+ya thA/ a lo ki/ lo ki ma ti/ lo ka ga ti/
89a6(rgyud 'bum): e h+ye hi/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ hi bo d+hi satwa/ hwe ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ hai pri ya/ bo d+hi satwa/ he kA ru Ni ka/ sma ra hrid yan/ e d+he hi/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/ ba ra ma mai tri tsitA/ kA ru Ni ka/ ku ru
89a7(rgyud 'bum): ku ru/ karma satwAH/ sAd+ha ya bi d+yAn/ de hi de hi/ me a ri ka/ maM ga ma/ bi haM ga ma hA/ sid d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ hu hu hu hu/ bI ra yan+te/ ma hA bir yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra Ni shwa ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la
89b1(rgyud 'bum): ma la ma la mu te/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra dzi ni kr-iSh+Ta/ dza Ta ma ku Tu/ a laM kr-i ta/ sha rI ra/ laM b+ha pra laM b+ha/ bi laM b+ha/ ma hA sid d+ha/ shud d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ ma hA ma la
89b2(rgyud 'bum): dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA dzA la/ kr-iSh+Ta pak+Sha/ kr-iSh+Ta par+Na/ kr-iSh+Na pA sha/ nir+g+ga tan/ he pad+ma hasta dze ya ka ra ni shA tsa re shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Ta sarba kri ta ya dz+nyo ba bI ta/ e h+ye hi/ ba rA ha mu khi tri pu ra/ da ha ne sha ra/ nA ra ya na/ ba la rU pa/
89b3(rgyud 'bum): be sha d+ha ri/ he nI la kaN+Da/ he ma ha/ ha la ha la/ bi sha rin/ dza ta lo ka s+ya/ rA ga bi Sha nA/ dwe Sha bi Sha nAn/ mo hA bi Shan shan/ nir mo k+Shan/ hu lu hu lu/ muM dza muM dzaM/ mu hu lu mu hu lu/ ha la
89b4(rgyud 'bum): ha ra/ ma hA pad+ma nA b+ha/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bu d+h+ya bu d+h+ya/ bo d+ha yA/ bo d+ha yA/ bo d+ha yA/ ma ti ba nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye he/ nI la kaN+Da/ e h+ye hi/ ba mas+thi ta/ si ha mu kha/ ha sa
89b5(rgyud 'bum): ha sa/ muM dza muM dza/ ma hA Tan+da ha sa nirna di ni/ e h+ye hi/ b+ho b+ho ma hA sid d+ha yo gi shwa ra/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ba tsi sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya bi d+hA na/ sma ra sma ra/ tAM b+ha ga ban ta/ lo ko bi lo ki stan/ ta thA ga tan/
89b6(rgyud 'bum): da hI me/ daR+sha nA ma/ pra sa d+ha ya mi swA hA/ sid dA ya swA hA/ ma hA sid d+hA ya swA hA/ sid d+hi yo gi shwa ra ya swA hA/ nI la kaN+Da ya swA hA/ ba ra ha mu khA ya swAhA/ si ha mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra sa~M ha mu khA
89b7(rgyud 'bum): ya swA hA/ badz+ra hastA ya swA hA/ ma hA badz+ra hastA ya swAhA/ sid d+ha bi d+ha d+ha ra ya swA hA/ pad+ma has+thA ya swA hA/ ma hA pap+pa has+thA ya swAhA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo ba bi ta ya swAhA/ ma hA kA la ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsag+sa
90a1(rgyud 'bum): yu tri d+ha rA ya swAhA/ shang ga shab+da nin+da da na ka rA ya swAhA/ bod+ha na ka rA ya sAhA/ pha ma skan d+ha de shas+thi ta pa~MSh+Ta dzi nA ya swA hA/ bA ma hasta b+hAk+Sha tsarma ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/ lo ka shwa
90a2(rgyud 'bum): ya swA hA/ ma hA lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid d+he shwa rA ya swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mur+t+ti nAM/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Na
90a3(rgyud 'bum): kA ya/ sid d+h+yan+t+ra me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ bdag gis gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang // bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sme brtsegs lcags kyu can// stobs ldan shang ka ra dang sde brgyad dag/ btang nas rtag tu
90a4(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/ / bdag gis dbang phyug dang ni mthu chen dang // ku be ra dang ser skya'i bdag po dag/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis nor srung dang
90a5(rgyud 'bum): ni chu lha dang / / dge rgyas dang ni pa ri tsi ta dag/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis sar tsa dang ni ma ha ra// ku lan tan ta dang ni lngas rtsen dag/ btang nas rtag tu
90a6(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/ / bdag gis pa pa ka la'i rgyal po dang // dpal ldan pa ti dang ni sa ra ha ra// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis tshangs pa dang ni sam
90a7(rgyud 'bum): ba ra/ / gnas gtsang sde lnga dag dang mtsho ma dag/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum lha// spos chen dpal ldan dang ni sa da na// btang
90b1(rgyud 'bum): nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/ / bdag gis rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang ni// ma mo lha la sogs pa mthu chen 'khor// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gi
90b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang ni/ / mig mi bzang dang rnam thos bu dag kyang // btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis gser mdog rma bya'i rgyal po dang // sde dpon nyi shu
90b3(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad drang srong 'khor/ / btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis nor bu bzang po dag dang ni// sde dpon chen po sna 'dzin bu la pa// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin
90b4(rgyud 'bum): srung bar byed/ / bdag gis dga' bo dang ni bsnyen dga' bo// klu rgyal rgya mtsho dang ni e la'i 'dab// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis lha ma yin dang dri za dang /
90b5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye rnams// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis chu dang me dang glog gi lha// grul bum bdag po dang ni sha za dag/ btang nas rtag tu
90b6(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gi ched du gnod pa dang bgegs
90b7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/ / shin tu bsil ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang zhig ri dang 'brog dgon song ba na// stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan gtum po dang // rtsangs
91a1(rgyud 'bum): pa sbrul dang 'dre srin phrad gyur kyang / / gzungs 'di 'don pa thos na gnod mi nus// gang zhig chu bo rgya mtshor zhugs pa las// gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs dang // gnod
91a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin srin po nya dang rus sbal dag/ gzungs 'di thos nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur// gang zhig g.yul spyod dgra yis bskor ba 'am// chom rkun ma rungs nor ni 'brog pa'i tshe// rtse gcig
91a3(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ / de dag brtse sems bskyed nas ldog par 'gyur// gang zhig rgyal po'i gyod la thog pa dang // lcags sgrog khong sgril btson rang chud pa'i tshe//
91a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// rgyal pos brtse sems kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur// gang zhig byed stems dug ma'i khyim zhugs te// zas skom dug can gyis ni gsod pa'i tshe
91a5(rgyud 'bum): rtse gcig thug rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ / dug nyid zil mnan zas skom nyid du 'gyur// bud med sbrum ma bu ni btsa' ba'i tshe// bdud kyis bgegs byas sdug bsngal mi bzod de//
91a6(rgyud 'bum): rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// 'dre gdon byer nas bu ni btsa' bar 'gyur// klu gdon gtum pos gdug pa'i dbugs btang bas// tsha ba'i nad kyis btab nas 'chi
91a7(rgyud 'bum): nye tshe/ / rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// rims nad bsal nas tshe ni ring bar 'gyur// klu gdon rgyu bas gtses te skrangs pa dang // shu 'bras mi bzad rnag khrag 'dzag
91b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshe/ / rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// mchil ma lan gsum byugs pas spangs bzhi// sems can rnyog pas mi dge bskyed pas na// byang snyems sngangs dang dgras ni gtses
91b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshe/ / rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs pazlas na// stems gdon de kun gtong ba'i mi la 'du// sdig 'phel snyigs mas dam chos 'jig pa na// 'dod pa'i me chen sems ni rmongs log pas/
91b3(rgyud 'bum): khyo shug so sor gzhan la 'dod zhen nas// nyin mtshan log bsams rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshe// gang zhig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// 'dod pa'i me zhi log pa'i sems bsal 'gyur//
91b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis gzungs 'di'i mthu stobs rgyas brjod na// bskal bar brjod kyang mthar thug yong mi 'gyur// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtogs pa rdzogs so// /
91b5(rgyud 'bum): byaM/ rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka nA ma/ Ar+ya a ba lo ke te shA ra d+hA ra Ni/ a nu shaM sa sa ha ti sU traM ta saM gri hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje
91b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i gzungs pan yon mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
91b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das ri bo bo Ta la spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
92a1(rgyud 'bum): stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar zhing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ngal 'di lta bu'i gzungs yod// ming ni thugs rje chen po zhes zer/ sems
92a2(rgyud 'bum): can kun gyis mi dge ba'i sdig pa shin tu lci ba'i sgrib pa/ bdud dang 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu tshim par byed pa'i phyir ngas bshad do// bcom ldan 'das
92a3(rgyud 'bum): la bshad pa'i gnang ba zhus nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis thugs rje chen po'i sgo nas gzungs bshad par 'dod pa'i dus la bab bo// myur bar bshad du gsol/
92a4(rgyud 'bum): nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te dge
92a5(rgyud 'bum): slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mos 'don pa dang 'chang bar 'dod pas/ sems can rnams kyi ched du thugs rje chen po'i sgo nas
92a6(rgyud 'bum): thog mar 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis chos rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog/ spyan ras
92a7(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag gis ye shes mig ni myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis sems can thas
92b1(rgyud 'bum): cad myur du sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dag myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag
92b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / bdag ni myur du shes rab gru yis sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur du sdug bsngal mtsho las 'da' bar shog/
92b3(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur du tshul khrims rkang gis lam thob shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur
92b4(rgyud 'bum): du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg shog/ spyan ras gzigs dpa' thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim phyin shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la
92b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag ni myur du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shog/ bdag ni rang gri'i ri 'dzeg na// ral gri ri ni rang snyil shog/ bdag ni chu tshan phrad gyur na// chu tshan me mur rang zhi
92b6(rgyud 'bum): shog/ sems can dmyal bar bdag song na// sems can dmyal ba rang bskams shog/ bdag ni yi dgas gnas song na// bkres skom dag ni 'grangs par shog/ bdag ni lha min
92b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas song na/ / ngan sems rang nyid dul bar shog/ bdag ni dud 'gro'i gnas song na// rang nyid shes rab che thob shog/ de skad du smon lam btab nas// sems rtse gcig tu bdag
93a1(rgyud 'bum): gi ming nas 'don cing rjes su dran par bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang bdag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi mtshan 'don cing // de nas gzungs lan gcig
93a2(rgyud 'bum): gam lan bdun gyi bar du bton na/ / bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong ji snyed 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba rnams bsal zhing 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// gal te thugs rje
93a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'di 'don cing 'chang na/ / 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der gshegs nas/ phyag rkyong bar 'gyur bas bsams pa bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
93a4(rgyud 'bum): dang gang du skye bar 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i
93a5(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag/ gal te ngan song gsum po dag tu lhung bar gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi bgyi'o//
93a6(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen po'i reg sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag/ gal te ting nge 'dzin dang spobs pa tshad med pa ji snyed thob par ma gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs
93a7(rgyud 'bum): par sangs rgyas par mi bgyi'o/ / thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag/ gal te tshe 'di nyid la smon pa thams cad ji ltar smon pa bzhin du grub par ma gyur
93b1(rgyud 'bum): na thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs zhes mi bgyi lags te/ mi dge ba rnams dang sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs lags so// bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus
93b2(rgyud 'bum): la yongs su skyo nas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des/ thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs kyi tshig 'di 'don cing yongs su bzung bas/ gal te bud med kyi lus las
93b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob par ma gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// the tsom gyi bsam pa cung zad cig bskyed par gyur na/ gdon mi za bar
93b4(rgyud 'bum): gang smon pa'i 'bras bu de mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/ / de skad ces smras nas/ 'khor 'dus pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te drang por 'dug nas sems can rnams la thugs rje
93b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i sems bskyed de/ 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gya nom pa 'di dag smras so// snying
93b6(rgyud 'bum): po ni/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ gzungs ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ban d+ha na/ ched na ka rA ya/
93b7(rgyud 'bum): sarba pA pa sa mu dra uts+tshe Shan ka rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra shwa ma na ka rA ya/ sarba i d+ya u pa dra wa bi nA sha na ka rA ya/ serba b+ha ye Shu tra NA ya/ ta s+ya na ma s+thi taM i daM/ Ar+ya a wa lo ki te shwa ra ta wa ni la
94a1(rgyud 'bum): kaN+Da nA ma hri da yaM/ A wa ra ta yi Sh+ya mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha na/ shu b+ha tsi ta na/ sarba satwa naM pA pa mArga bi sho d+ha ka/ tad+ya thA/ a wa lo ki/ lo ka ma ti/ lo ka ga ti/ e h+ye he/ ma hA bor+d+ha
94a2(rgyud 'bum): satwa/ he bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he kA ru Ni ka sma ra hri da yaM/ e h+ye he/ ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ba ra ma mai tri tsit+ta ku ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ru/ karmaM sA d+ha ya/ bi d+yAM de hi de hi me/
94a3(rgyud 'bum): a raM ga maM ga ma/ bi ga ma hA sid d+ha yo gi shwa ra/ du hu du hu/ bir+yan+te/ ma hA bir+yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra ni shwa ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ bi ma la a ma la/ murti Ar+ya a wa lo ki te shwa ra kr-iSh+Ta a dzi na/ dza Ta ma ku
94a4(rgyud 'bum): Ta a laM kri ta sha rI ra/ laM b+ha/ pra laM b+ha/ bi laM b+ha/ ma hA sid d+ha/ shud d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ ma hA ma la/ dz+wa la dzA la/ ma hA dz+wa la/ kr-iSh+Ta pak+Sha kr-iSh+Ta warna kr-iSh+Na pa sha nir
94a5(rgyud 'bum): g+ha ta na/ he pad+ma hasta/ dza ya ka ra ni/ shA tsa ri shA ra/ kr-iSh+Ta sarba kr-i tA yadz+nyo pa wa ti/ e h+ye hi/ ba ra ha mu kha tri pu ra/ da ha ni shwa ra nA ya na/ pa la ru pa be sha d+ha ri/ he nI la kaN+Da he ma hA ha la ha la/
94a6(rgyud 'bum): bi Sha nir dzi ta lo ka s+ya/ rA ga pi Sha nA sha na/ dwe sha bi Sha nA sha na/ mo hA bi Sha nA sha na/ nir mo k+Sha na hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ mu hu lu/ mu hu lu/ ha la ha la/ ma hA pad+ma na b+ha/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/
94a7(rgyud 'bum): su ru su ru/ bu d+h+ya bu d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+h+ya mi ta ba/ nI la kaN+Tha e h+ye hi/ nI la kaN+Tha e h+ye hi/ bA mas+thi ta/ saM ha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ ma hA a Ta Ta hAs ni ra na di ni/ e h+ye hi/ b+ho b+ho ma hA
94b1(rgyud 'bum): sid d+ha yo ki shwa ra/ b+han na b+han d+ha/ wa tsam sA na ya/ sAHya/ bi d+h+waM swa rasma ra tAM/ he b+ha ga wan/ lo ka bi lo kA s+t+wa~M/ ta thA ga tA da dA hi me dar shA nAM/ pra sa twA ya mi swA hA/ sid d+hA ya swAhA/ ma hA ming na
94b2(rgyud 'bum): ya sAhA/ sid d+ha yo ki shwa rA ya sAhA/ nI la kaN+Da ya swA hA/ ba ra ha mu khA ya swA hA/ siM ha mu khA ya sAhA/ ma hA na ra sa~M ha mu khA ya swA hA/ sid d+ha badre d+ha rA ya sA d+ha/ pad+ma hastA ya sAH/ mahA bad+ma hastA
94b3(rgyud 'bum): swAH/ badz+ra hastA ya swaH/ mthu badz+rag stA yA swAH/ loSh+Thasarba kr-i ta la dro ba yai tA ya sA hA/ ma hA kA la ma g+ha Ta d+ha rA ya swAH/ tsal A thA/ d+ha nAr ma sAH/ sha la sha ldan panA pan kA na ya swA hA/ banan
94b4(rgyud 'bum): ka rA ya swA hA/ bi ma skan+d+ha de shas+t+raM ta kr-iSh+Na e dzi nA ya swA hA/ ba ma hasta bAm+ba tsa ra mi na wa sa nA ya swA hA/ lo ki shwa rA ya swA hA/ ma hA lo ki shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid d+ha shwa rA ya swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/
94b5(rgyud 'bum): ku ru ra/ k+Sha/ murti nA~M swA hA/ ni mo b+ha ga la te Ar+ya a wa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ sid d+ha nu me man+t+ra pA da ni swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
94b6(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs 'di bstan zin nas/ gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gi ched du gnod pa dang bgegs yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/ shin tu dang ba'i
94b7(rgyud 'bum): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / gang zhig ri dang 'brog dgon song ba las// stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan gtum po dang // rtsangs pa sbrul dang 'dre srin phrad gur kyang // gzungs
95a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di 'don pa thos na gnod mi nus/ / gang zhig chu bo rgya mtshor zhugs pa las// gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs dang // gnod sbyin srin po nya dang rus sbal dag/ gzungs
95a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di thos nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur/ / gang zhig g.yul sprad dgra yis bskor ba 'am// chom rkun ma rung nor rnams 'phrog pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na//
95a3(rgyud 'bum): de dag brtse sems skyes nas ldog par 'gyur// gang zhig rgyal po'i gyod la thogs pa dang // lcags sgrog khong sgril btson rar chud pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i
95a4(rgyud 'bum): gzungs bzlas na/ / rgyal pos brtse sems kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur// gang zhig byed snyems dug ma'i khyim zhugs te// zas skom dug can gyis ni gsod pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs
95a5(rgyud 'bum): rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ / dug ni zil mngar zas skom nyid du 'gyur// bud med sbru ma ma bu ni btsa' ba'i tshe// bdud kyis bgegs byas sdug bsngal mi bzod tshe// rtse gcig
95a6(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ / 'dre gdon byer nas bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur// klu gdon gtum pos gdug pa'i dbugs btang nas// tsha ba'i nad kyis nyen nas 'chir nye tshe// rtse gcig
95a7(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen po'i gzung bzlas na/ / rims nad bsal nas tshe ni ring bar 'gyur// klu gdon rgyu bas gtses te spangs pa dang // shu 'bras mi bzad rnag khrag 'dzag pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs
95b1(rgyud 'bum): rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ / mchil ma lan gsum byugs pas skrangs pa zhi// sems can rnyog pa mi dge spyod pa na/ byad stems sngags dang dgra yis gtses pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i
95b2(rgyud 'bum): gzungs bzlas na/ / byad stems gdon de gtong ba'i mi la 'dud// sdig 'phel snyigs ma dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe// 'dod pa'i me mched sems ni rmongs log pas// khyo shug so sor gzhan la
95b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod zhen nas/ / nyin mtshan log bsam rgyun ni mi 'chad tshe// gang zhig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// 'dod pa'i me zhi khog pa'i sems bsal 'gyur// bdag gis gzungs 'di'i
95b4(rgyud 'bum): mthu stobs rgyas brjod na/ / bskal par brjod kyang mthar thug yong mi 'gyur// gal te thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag chu klung ngam rgya mtshor zhugs te khrus
95b5(rgyud 'bum): byas pa las/ de na gnas pa'i sems can de dang de dag gis lus bkrus pa'i chus lus la reg par gyur na/ sdig pa'i las dang kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba thams cad yongs su byang nas/ zhing
95b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag pa gzhan dag tu pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur bas/ mngal dang / drod gsher dang / sgo nga las skyes pa'i lus len par mi 'gyur na/ kha ton du 'don pa dang 'chang ba la lta
95b7(rgyud 'bum): smos kyang ci dgos/ gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag lam du zhugs nas 'gro ba'i tshe/ rlung chen po langs te gang zag de'i lus dang / spu dang / skra dang / gos la bus pa'i rlung
96a1(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa de'i rjes phyogs su song ba'i sems can gzhan gyi lus la reg par gyur na/ de dag gi sgrib pa dang sdig pa'i las lci ba thams cad ma lus par yongs su
96a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ yang ngan 'gro gsum po dag gi rnam par smin pa myong bar mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur bas na/ 'don pa dang yongs su 'dzin pade
96a3(rgyud 'bum): dag gis thob pa'i phan yon ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po'i gzungs phan yon dang bcas pa zhes bya ba mdo las
96a4(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa rdzogs so/ / / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA mA
96a5(rgyud 'bum): te nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
96a6(rgyud 'bum): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer yangs pa can na 'khor chen pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas bzhugs te/ nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu la sogs
96a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dge slong lnga brgya dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan
96b1(rgyud 'bum): bshams pa la bzhugs so/ / 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de rang gi stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa
96b2(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
96b3(rgyud 'bum): to/ / bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi rig sngags chen mo gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da lhar byung
96b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs shing / da ltar gsung ba bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur te byang chub yongs su tshol ba dang / sems can tham
96b5(rgyud 'bum): cad rjes su gzung ba dang / don dang / byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi bar gyi phyir/ sngon gsungs pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi
96b6(rgyud 'bum): par gyur pa/ mar gyur pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen ma mchis pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen dang / mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur pa/ sdig
96b7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad zad par bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs de thos ma thag tu bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ rig sngags thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
97a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur te byang chub yongs su tshol ba na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
97a2(rgyud 'bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
97a3(rgyud 'bum): dpag med ces bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / 'khor de nyid na bram ze dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa thob par gyur pa
97a4(rgyud 'bum): zhig 'dug pa des/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di bram ze brgya stong mang po dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma la
97a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags bshad bstan te/ de dag thams cad kyis gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu theg pa ltung bar byed pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang skye ba dran par gyur pa ngas dran no// byang chub
97a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po de smros shig/ phyi ma'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can du sems can sdig pa byed pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
97a7(rgyud 'bum): phrag du ma'i sdig pa zad par 'gyur ro/ / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur ro// ngas kyang gnang zhing rjes su yi rang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
97b1(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal bas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rig sngags kyi gsang
97b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems
97b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yum zhes bya
97b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gzungs rig sngags chen mo'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag brjod par bya'o/ / bdag la rig pa 'di grub par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ tsi le me le/ kun tu le kun tu le/
97b5(rgyud 'bum): kun tu le si re/ si si re/ bai si re/ bi ra ya/ bi ra se/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ d+harma Te/ ma taM gi/ puk+ka si/ kaD+D+h+ya ya/ mA la tsaN+DA li/ hud+d+ha mA li ni/ hUM rbu d+hu mA li ni/ tsi le mi le/ grih+Na sau ma daR+sha ne
97b6(rgyud 'bum): ku ru tsan+d+ra mu li/ la g+hu mA na la ma te/ Ar+ya dik+Sha Na b+hu dze/ sar pad+ma nA ma/ pra sA d+ha ne/ sarba bid+ya nA ma/ I shwa ri swAH/ bklags pas 'grub pa'i gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ thos ma
97b7(rgyud 'bum): thag tu las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ngo // dus gsum du bzlas pa byas na/ zhag bdun gyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong
98a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyuraro/ / gzhan du mi sems pa'i yid kyis bzlas pa byas na/ zla ba gcig gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma rig pa chen mo bdag nyid ston te/ 'phag
98a2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'od dpag med kyang mthong ngo / / byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// skye ba dran pa dang thos pa 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der dam pa'i chos dang mi 'bral
98a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems
98a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
98a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang // dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus
98a6(rgyud 'bum): te/ skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta mA ta ni tra rA bi shwa karma b+ha ba tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod
98a7(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum sgrol ma las sna tshogs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ 'phag pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
98b1(rgyud 'bum): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa dpag tu med pa dang / ku ru kul+le dang / ri khrod ma
98b2(rgyud 'bum): lo ma can la sogs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa dpag tu med pa dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / man da ra ba la sogs pa lha rdzas kyi me tog dpag
98b3(rgyud 'bum): tu med pa dag dang / dung dang / pi wang dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / dgu po rgyud mangs la sogs pa lha'i rol mo dpag tu med pa dang / lha'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sog
98b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dpag tu med pa thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas bskor te mchod pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pha rol gyi sde rab tu
98b5(rgyud 'bum): 'joms pa rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ bzhag ma thag tu yangs chen po g.yos/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor yang 'pham par byas te 'od kyi snang ba chen po'ang
98b6(rgyud 'bum): bkye'o/ / de'ang 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / ljang khu dang / mthing kha dang / 'dres pa ste/ 'od sna tshogs bkye ste/ sdug bsngal dang bcas pa rnams sbyangs te/
98b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum sgrol ma ku ru kul+le'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// gtsug tu nub ma thag tu mchod pa'i sprin gyi char pa'ang bab par gyur to// de nas lha mo de dper na sprin dang
99a1(rgyud 'bum): bral ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur to/ / de'i tshe bstod pa'i tshogs su bcad pa 'dis bstod pa/ zhing khams thams cad yongs su dag pa la// rin chen me tog mang
99a2(rgyud 'bum): po char du phab/ / dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yum// yum gyur sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces gsungs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon
99a3(rgyud 'bum): nur gyur pa bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ / pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams
99a4(rgyud 'bum): cad zab pa'i phyir ci'i phyir bskyed/ gang gis na yum zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ 'jam dpal bden mod kyi/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ma skyes pa/
99a5(rgyud 'bum): ma 'gags pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba med pa/ 'grib pa med pa/ 'phel ba med pa/ rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o// de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rang
99a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin ni de'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dri ma med pa/
99a7(rgyud 'bum): dri ma dang bral ba med pa/ 'grib pa med pa/ 'phel ba med pa/ rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa de ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ 'jam
99b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o/ / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings so// yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig bla dgas so// snying rje chen po'o// /
99b2(rgyud 'bum): kun rdzob ngo bo 'khor ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de las 'das pa ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas skyed pa'i yum mo// de'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'o// 'jam dpal de ltar na yum
99b3(rgyud 'bum): du yid la bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ 'jam dpal de bas na chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid shes pas 'di bsgom par bya'o// gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// nan tan du
99b4(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ / 'di'i yon tan shes par bya'o// 'di mchod par bya'o// lung nod par bya'o// the tshom med par bya'o// las la nan tan du bya'o// 'di'i bsngags pa yid la bya'o// so so'i sgo
99b5(rgyud 'bum): nas bsgrub par bya'o/ / de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu la bstan to// des ni gleng gzhi'i le'u bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// // de nas byang chub sems
99b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ji ltar bsgom par bya/ 'di la ji ltar nan tan du bgyi zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
99b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis gsungs pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar yid la bya'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'o// chos thams cad ni ma 'gags pa'o// chos thams cad ni dri ma dang bral ba'o// chos
100a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad na mya ngan las 'das shing rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par bsgom pa skyo/ / 'jam dpal de'i phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ho/ sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba
100a2(rgyud 'bum): shud+d+hohaM/ zhes brjod par bya'o// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ mngal nas skyes pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dag la bltas te byams
100a3(rgyud 'bum): pa bsgom par bya'o/ / skyes pa dang / rgas pa dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'dus ma
100a4(rgyud 'bum): byas pa la dga' ba dang btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ / 'jam dpal de lta bas na rgyu ni tshad med pa bzhi'o// des bskyed pa ni byang chub kyi sems so// de'i phyir de la nan tan du yid la bya'o//
100a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal de'i phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta uta pA da ya a haM/ zhes brjod par bya'o// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ mchod pa 'di rnams kyis mchod par
100a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi// phye ma phur ma bdug pa'i bye brag rnams// rgyal ba skyed pa'i yum la
100a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya'o/ / gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum mchog sangs rgyas spyan// me tog sil ma 'phreng ba'i bye brag rnams// rgyal ba
100b1(rgyud 'bum): skyed pa'i yum la mchod par bgyi/ / gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum mchog rin po che// rin chen mar me 'phreng ba'i bye brag rnams//
100b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bskyed pa'i yum la mchod par bgyi// gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum mchog na bza' dkar// dri zhim chu gtsang spos
100b3(rgyud 'bum): ngad ldan pa'i chu/ / rgyal ba skyed pa'i yum la mchod par bgyi// gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// rgyal ba skyed pa'i yum mchog 'phrin las ldan//
100b4(rgyud 'bum): bza' dang bca' ba la sogs zhal zas rnams// rgyal ba skyed pa'i yum la mchod par bgyi// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa yi// klu dang rol mo sel snyan bcas pa'i sgra//
100b5(rgyud 'bum): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan 'phan gdugs bcas// phyogs bcu kun nas sprin bzhin gtibs gyur cig/ dpag bsam gyi ni shing dag dang // ljon pa'i shing dang shing dag gis//
100b6(rgyud 'bum): dri zhim lo 'dab bcas pa'i shing // phyogs bcu kun nas gtibs gyur cig/ spos kyi ngad dang ldan pa'i char// 'bru dang me tog la sogs pa'i// yid du 'ong ba'i dri zhim char// nges par
100b7(rgyud 'bum): kun tu 'bab par shog/ 'bab chu steng ka lu ma dang // mtsho dang rdzing bu dag dang ni// ro brgya dag dang ldan pa'i mtsho// ngang pa la sogs bcas pa yi// rin chen khang pa yid 'ong ba'i//
101a1(rgyud 'bum): dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang // shar nub 'od bcas nyi zla dag dang ni// khang pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba rnams// rgyal ba skyed pa'i yum la mchod par bya'o// 'jam dpal de'i
101a2(rgyud 'bum): phyir mchod pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ta ga ta
101a3(rgyud 'bum): A lo ka pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta nai wi d+ye pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA gta
101a4(rgyud 'bum): shap+da pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes brjod par bya'o// mchod pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
101a5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ 'jam dpal yum 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo// 'jam dpal de'i phyir dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa 'di 'jam dpal
101a6(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis yid la gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa'i gzungs sngags gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM na maHsU ka saM na maHtA ra ye tA ra mi tA/ na masta
101a7(rgyud 'bum): re tu re/ bI re/ k+Sha nai ra d+yu ti ni b+he k+Sha Ne/ trai lo kya nA thA na bak+ta a ba dza/ bi ka sata ke sha rod b+ha be/ na maHsha ta sha rats+tsha na dra/ saM pUr+N+Na ta pa Ta lA na Ne/ tA rA sa ha sra ni ka ra/ pra ha sa ta ki ra
101b1(rgyud 'bum): No a dz+wa le/ na maHka na ka nI la a ba dza/ pA Ni pad+ma bi b+hu Shi te/ dA na bIr+ya ta paHshAn ti/ ti ti k+Sha d+h+yA na go tsa re/ na ma sta thA ga toSh+NI Sha b+hi dza yA na na ta tsA ri NI/ a sheSha bA ra mi tA prAp+ta/ dzin
101b2(rgyud 'bum): pu tra ni se baM te/ na mas+t+yat+tA ra hUM ka ra/ pU ri tA sha di gan ta re/ sab+ta lo ka kra mA krAn ti/ a sheSh+Ta kaR+She Nak+Sha me/ na maHsha kra a na laM brah+ma/ ma rung bi shwe shwa ra a ran+ti te/ b+hu ta be tA la gan d+harma
101b3(rgyud 'bum): ga Na yak+Sha pU ra s+thi te/ na mastA Di ti phaT kA ra/ pa ra yan tra bA ma ra da ni/ pra t+yA lI D+ha ba da n+ya se/ shi khi dzA lA ku le k+Sha Ne/ na mastu re ma hA g+ho raM/ mA ra bI ra bi nA shA ni/ b+h+ri ku TI kri ta bAk+Sha a ba dza/ sarba sha tru
101b4(rgyud 'bum): ni sU da ni/ na maHtri rat+na mu d+h+waM ka/ prid+hA gu li bi b+hu Shi te/ b+hu Shi tA sheSh+Ta di ka tsakra/ ni ka ra swa ka rA ku le/ na maHpra mu di tA To pa mu ku Ta/ k+Ship+ta mA li ni/ ha sar+b+ba ha sat+tut+tA re/ mA ra lo ka ba shang+ga ri/ na maHsa maM ta b+hU
101b5(rgyud 'bum): pA la/ pa Ta lA kaR+Sha Ne k+Sha me/ tsa la da b+hI ku Ti hUM ka ra sarbA pa da bi mo tsa ni/ na maHshi khaN+Da/ khaN+Den du/ mu ku TA b+ha ra Nodz+dza le/ a mi tA b+ha dza Ta b+ha ra/ b+ha su re ki ra/ No D+hA be/ na ma/ kalpAn+ta hU ta b+hu ga/
101b6(rgyud 'bum): dzA lA mA lAn ta ras+thi te/ a lI D+ha mu di tA bo d+ha/ ri pu tsakra bi nA shA ni/ na maHka ra ta lA g+ha ta/ tsa ra na ha ta b+hu le/ d+hi ku r+thi/ kr-i ta hUM ka ra/ sab+ta pA tA la b+he di ni/ na maHni thaM shu b+he shAn te/ shAn ta nir+d+haH
101b7(rgyud 'bum): go tsa re sAH/ oM pra Na ba saM lu ka te/ ma hA pA ta ka nA sha ni/ na maHla mu ti ta ban u0f7f/ ri pra gA pa tra pra b+he de ni/ da shAk+Sha ka ra ba dkyus/ bid+ha hUM ka ra dI piti/ na maHsU re bA dA rbA ta/ bru~M kA ra kA ra bI dza~MH/
102a1(rgyud 'bum): me ru man dA ra kaM yA sa/ b+hu ba na tra la tsA li ni/ na maHsu ra sa rA kA ra/ ha ri NAM ka ka ras+thi te/ tA rA dI ru ta sU Ta kA ra/ a she Sha bi Sha nA sha ni/ na maHsu ra ga NA d+hak+Sha/ sur kin+da da sa
102a2(rgyud 'bum): te/ A baM d+ha mu di tA b+ho ga ka li/ duHswap+na nA sha ni/ na maHtsan dra arka saM bur+d+ha/ na ya na d+h+ya ti b+hA su re/ ha ra de ru ka tut+tA re/ bi Sha ma dza ra nA sha ni/ na mas+t+ri ta tra bi mA sa/ shi ba sha ka ma nI te/ gra ha be ta Ta ya
102a3(rgyud 'bum): k+Shau g+ha/ nA sha ni pra ba re tu re/ man tra mu la mi daM sto taM/ na maska raM ki baM sha kaM/ yaHba thi ta pra yat+ma d+hI maM/ de byA b+hik+ta sa man pa tri/ sha yam+ma b+he ta rud thA pA yaH/ sma reta sarbA b+ha ya pra daM/ sarba pA pa pra
102a4(rgyud 'bum): sha ma ni/ sarba durga ti nA shi naM/ a b+hi Shi ka to b+ha be ta tA ra n+taM/ sap+ta b+ha ri dzi na kro Ti b+hiHa smin ma hA tra mA sA d+ya/ soR+Shan te bod b+haM pa de pra dze ta/ bi Sha na ta s+ya ma hA g+ho raM/ s+thA pa ra ma ba tha dza ga maM/
102a5(rgyud 'bum): smAsma drar+N+Na ta pra la yaM yA ti/ khA hi taM bi tA me ba bA/ gra ha dz+wa ra ba ShA rat+na naM/ pa ra ma rat+ti bi nA sha naM/ a n+yeShAM tse ba satwA nAM/ dwi s+t+ri sap+ta b+hi ba ratI naM/ pu tra kA mo la b+he ta pu traM/ d+ha na kA mo la b+he ta d+ha naM/
102a6(rgyud 'bum): sarba kA mA na bA pa no to// na big+b+h+yAMHpra ti ha n+ye te/ ta ra g+ha ba ga ba tai ya su tra/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha ba she traM sarba ka ra/ sa ma yA u la ka ra ye/ bud+d+ha ni tsa/ d+harma Ni tsa/ saM g+ha ni tsa tA ra ye swAhA/
102a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzangs 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum sgrol ma la ma rungs pa
102b1(rgyud 'bum): 'joms pa'i sgo nas bstod pa ste/ phan yon ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'jam dpal de'i phyir brjod par bya'o// gzungs 'di brjod pa'i gang zag ni sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang /
102b2(rgyud 'bum): dud 'gro la sogs pa'i gnas su nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// yul mtha' 'khob dang / kla klo dang / dbang po ma tshang ba la sogs par nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rims dang / 'brum
102b3(rgyud 'bum): bu dang / nad 'go ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad las grol zhing nad kyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // 'jigs pa chen po brgyad la sogs pa las grol bar 'gyur ro// /
102b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag de ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'di 'dzin pa'i
102b5(rgyud 'bum): gang zag de ni mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa byang bar 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba mi 'byung zhing nam 'chi
102b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i tshe dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum sgrol ma mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag de ni yid la ci bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzugs
102b7(rgyud 'bum): phun sum tshogs pa dang / kha dog phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// rmi lam ngan pa dang / sdang ba dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi
103a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / dus gsum gyi bden pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// yum sgrol ma'i sku dngos su mthong bar 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta sa myaka saM bud+d+hA traM ya te tra
103a2(rgyud 'bum): tetra ra te tu tA ra/ zhes brjod par bya'o// bstod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nus/ bcom ldan 'das la
103a3(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa/ gzungs sngags 'di gang la brten nas yid la nan tan du bya zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdug bsngal las grol bar 'dod cing zab mo'i
103a4(rgyud 'bum): don la mos pas nan tan du bya'o/ / de nas taM las byung ba'i 'od zer las steng 'og thams cad du rdo rjer gyur te/ 'jam dpal sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra dz+wa la badz+ra ta na hUM
103a5(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ ces brjod par bya'o// de nas taM las byung ba'i yi ge a dkar po bsgom par bya'o// de'i steng du baM sngon po bsgom par bya'o// de'i steng du laM ser po bsgom par bya'o// de'i steng du yaM
103a6(rgyud 'bum): ljang khu bsgom par bya'o/ / de'i steng du raM dmar po bsgom par bya'o// de rnams kyi 'od 'od zer 'phro ba dang bsdu ba byas te/ oM d+harma d+hA tu bi shud+d+ha hUM/ oM A d+hA tu bi shuHhUM/ oM sa man+ta
103a7(rgyud 'bum): shud+d+ha hUM/ oM bAk+Sha bi shud+d+ha hUM/ oM k+Sha ta bu thA na bi shud+d+ha hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta maN+Da la sa man+ta bi shud+d+ha hUM/ 'jam dpal de ltar sngags de brjod pas dkyil 'khor khang pa bskyed par bya ste/
103b1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma 'dab bzhi kha dog sna tshogs pa la rdo rje ra bas bskor ba gru chad bzhi dang ldan pas/ gru bzhir 'dug cing sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa dra ba dra ba byed pa dang / rin po che'i chun 'phyang dang / tA ra Na la
103b2(rgyud 'bum): sogs pas mdzes pa'o/ / de ltar dkyil 'khor khang pa de 'dra ba de bskyed de/ dbus kyi ze 'bru la ni zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du taM ljang khu las byung ba'i ut+pal taM dang bcas pas 'jig rten gyi khams tham
103b3(rgyud 'bum): cad du 'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang / sgyu ma dang / 'ja' tshon dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo // de'i ut+pa la las byung ba'i sgrol
103b4(rgyud 'bum): ma'i sku ljang khu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas kyis mchog sbyin/ g.yon sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pal 'dzin pa/ mdzes pa'i sku/ rin po che'i do shal dang / rna cha dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan rnam
103b5(rgyud 'bum): pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ gzhon nu ma lang tsho la bab pa/ zhal 'dzum bag dang bcas pa/ mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung dang bcas pas zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa'o// shar du zla ba dang pad+ma'i
103b6(rgyud 'bum): steng du taM las bskyed pa'i ut+pa la mthing kha sa bon dang bcas pa las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste/ 'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang /
103b7(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma dang / 'ja' mtshon dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo // de'i ut+pal las byung ba'i sgrol ma mthing kha phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas kyis tri shU la 'dzin pa/
104a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag g.yon na sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pal 'dzin pa/ mdzes pa'i sku rin po che'i do shal dang / snyan cha dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/
104a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa/ zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pa/ mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung dang bcas pas/ zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa'o// lhor zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du re las skyes pa'i ut+pa
104a3(rgyud 'bum): la ser po sa bon dang bcas pa las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste/ 'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang / sgyu ma dang / 'ja' mtshon dang /

104a5(rgyud 'bum): bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la 'dzin pa/ mdzes pa'i sku rin po che'i do shal dang / snyan cha dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa/ zhal 'dzum bag

105b2(rgyud 'bum): dmar mo phyag gnyis lcags sgrog 'dzin pa/ khros pa'i sku rin po che'i do shal dang / snyan cha dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ gzhon nu lang tshol bab pa/ khros pa'i zhal

105b4(rgyud 'bum): 'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang / sgyu ma dang / 'ja' tshon dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo // de'i ut+pal las

105b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la sogs pa rnams ni ji lta bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'gro ba drug po rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i khams so// de lta bas na
106a1(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa lta bu dang / sgyu ma dang / 'ja' tshon dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur rig par bya'o// lha'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
106a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das lha des lha ji lta bus byin gyis brlab par bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sprul pa lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang /

106a4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ sprul pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ma yin zhing gnyis ka 'khrul pa'o// sgyu ma ni gzhan 'khrul pa'o// 'ja' tshon ni stong pa'o// smig rgyu ni yul 'khrul cing stong pa'o// chuzla
106a5(rgyud 'bum): ni rgyu 'bras so/ / gzugs brnyan ni dri za'i gro khyer te/ 'jam dpal 'khrul pa ni de bzhin te nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i khams dang de bzhin no// 'jam dpal de lta bas na lhas lha la
106a6(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlabs pa'ang 'dra'o/ / 'jam dpal sprul pa dang / sgyu ma dang / 'ja' tshon dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / gzugs brnyan ni thogs pa med cing thogs pa dang bral ba'o// /
106a7(rgyud 'bum): tha dad pa med cing tha dad pa dang bral ba'o// 'jam dpal de'i phyir rang bzhin ni de dang 'dra bar yid la gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad pa ni lag
106b1(rgyud 'bum): ba thal mo sbyar te gung gnyis brkyang ste rtse sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis gung mo la reg ste zur bcag nas/ mthe'u chung dang mtheb mo rtsa sprad nas nang sbyar ba ni rdo rje'i phyag/

106b3(rgyud 'bum): sbar te ma the'u chung dang srin lag phyir ba kan te gung mo bye sprad nas mthe bos mdzub mo gnyis mnan pa ni rin po che ri phyag rgyu ste/ mgo bori steng du bzhag nas sngags brjod pa ni/ oM

106b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyi rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te sor mo rnams phan tshun du so sor bsnol/ gung mo bsgreng ste/
106b6(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong dang mthe'u chung yang gzhibs te bsgreng ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni/ oM sarba ta ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ zhes brjod par bya'o// dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
106b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nus smras pa/ zla ba nyi ma'i su 'dra ba'i/ ljang khu'i mdog can 'gying bag can/ pad+ma zla ba'i steng na
107a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum// sems can kun gyi skyabs gyur pa'i// ut+pal bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ ces yum la bstod nas
107a2(rgyud 'bum): / smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags ni gang gis 'grub ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di'i gzungs sngags ni 'di'o// oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma s+yA d+hA sarba ta thA
107a3(rgyud 'bum): gad+hA nA/ na mastA rA yaM/ na mastA re tu re bI re/ k+Sha Na d+hU ti ni/ b+he k+Sha Ne/ trai lo kya na thA ba ka tA ba dzaM/ bi ka sata te sha rod b+ha be/ na maHsha ta sha rata tsan/ dra saM purna pa Ta lA na ne/ ta ra sa ha
107a4(rgyud 'bum): sra ni ka ra pra ha sa ta ka ri No dz+ha le na maH/ ka na kA nI lA ba dza pA Ni pad+ma bi b+hu Shi te/ dA na bId+ya ta ba/ sha na ti ti tik+Sha/ d+h+yA na go tsa re/ na maHsarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha/ bi dza yA nan+ta tsA ri Ni/ a she Sha pA
107a5(rgyud 'bum): / ra mi tA prAp+ta/ dzi na pu tra ni te tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bzlas par bya'o// gzungs sngags ni 'di'o// snying po ni 'di'o// i tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bzlas par bya'o// oM tut+tA re tu tA re swA hA/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi snying

107a7(rgyud 'bum): las sna tshogs pa'i snying po'o// oM tut+tA re tA re hUM kA ra bu ri ta sha de gaM tsa re saM b+ha lo ka kra ma kran+ti/ a b+hi Sha ka ra sha nak+Sha mi hriH/ dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags so// oM tA re tA re tut+tA rai tu re hUM kA
107b1(rgyud 'bum): / rA pu re sha te gany+tsa ri sa b+ha lo ka kra ma kr-I ti a she Sha puSh+Ti ku ru ka ra sha na k+Sha mi ho/ rgyas pa'i sngags so// oM tA re tut+tA re tu hUM ka ra pu ri ta sha te gaM tsa ri sa b+hA/ lo ki kra ma kran+ti/ uSh+NI Sha a kaR+Sha ya ka rA

108b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / 'jam dpal rgyas pa'i las ni 'di'o// spos kyi khang pa dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i gnas su ba ser skya'i rnam lngas skyang nul byas te dri zhim pos
108b7(rgyud 'bum): byugs pa'i maN+Dal bya'o/ / me tog gi chom bu'ang dgram par bya'o// rgyas pa las byung ba'i thang ka'ang dgram par bya'o// rin po che rnam pa lnga dang / 'bru dang / sman la sogs
109a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dag la ril bu nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ rin po che'i ga'ur bcug la maN+Dal gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o// bog bor bzhi'ang gzhag par bya'o// me tog la sog
109a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang bzhag par byas nas bsam gtan bsgom par bya ste/ yi ge taM las skyes pa'i myur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i yum sgrol ma dpa' mo gcig ma rnal 'byor ma'i lus su bsgom
109a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ pad+ma rgyas pa las byung zhing nyi zla'i steng du rgyas pa'i sku ston ka'i zla ba ltar gsal ba'i sprin dang bral ba'i nyi ma lta bur gzhon nu lang tshol bab pa lta bu'i sku mdog ser po do shal dang / dpung
109a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyan dang / rin po che'i chun 'phyang la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/ pany+tsa li ka'i gos kyis smad dkris pa/ ka shi ka'i ras kyis stod g.yogs pa/ skyil krung byed pa dang bcas pa/ zhal

109a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil na bdud rtsi'i rgyun sku las 'od 'phro ba lha'i tshogs dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang / nam mkha' lding gi tshogs dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang / dri za'i tshogs dang / lto 'phye chen po
109a7(rgyud 'bum): / tshogs dang / srin po'i tshogs kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa bsgoms te bzlas pa 'di bya'o// oM tA re tA re tut+tA re swA hA/ zhes bzlas par bya'o//
109b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas las kyi sngags dang bcas pas lan gcig gam/ bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad brjod nas gsol ba btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de'i phan yon ni lha'i tshogs/
109b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang / nam mkha' lding gi tshogs dang / mi'i tshogs dang / dri za'i tshogs dang / lto 'phye'i tshogs dang / srin po la sogs thams cad kyis
109b3(rgyud 'bum): de'i stobs thub par mi 'gyur la/ srung ba dang skyob pa'ang byed par 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang / rtsod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / rims dang / 'brum bu dang /
109b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yan pa la sogs pas mi tshugs so// nam 'chi ba'i tshe'ang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ngan song gsum du mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal las des yo byad dang / tshe dang / bkrag dang /
109b5(rgyud 'bum): stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang sto dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rgyas pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // 'jam dpal dbang du bsdu ba'i las
109b6(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di'o/ / dur khrod dam/ shing gcig gam/ chu chen po'i 'gram du'am/ gtsug lag khang du bya'o// khang pa der ba'i rnam lngas skyang nul byas te dri zhim pos byug pa'i maN+Dal la me tog
109b7(rgyud 'bum): sil ma dgram par bya'o/ / yum gyi sku gzugs kyang bzhugs te pog por dang me tog la sogs pa'ang bsham par bya'o// me tog dang 'bras bu nus pa dang ldan pa'i rdzas dag rin po
110a1(rgyud 'bum): che'i ga'ur bcug la maN+Dal gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas bsam gtan sgom pa ni taM las byung ba'i myur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i yum sgrol ma dpa'
110a2(rgyud 'bum): mo rnal 'byor ma'i lus su bsgom pa ni/ pad+ma las byung zhing nyi ma'i steng na sku mdog ban du ka'i me tog ltar dmar ba/ gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa lta bu'i sku/ do shal dang / dpung rgyan
110a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / rin po che'i chun 'phyang la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/ pany+tsa li ka'i gos kyis smad dkris pa/ ka shi ka'i ras kyis stod g.yogs pa/ 'gying bag gi tshul gyis bzhengs pa/ zhal
110a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig phyag gnyis pa/ zhal bzhad cing cher bzhad pa/ spyan 'khyug pa/ phyag g.yas kyis thugs ka na 'dud pa/ g.yon na sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pal 'dzin pa/ sku las 'od 'phro ba
110a5(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa las rang dang mthun pa'i 'od 'khrug pa dang bcas pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa bsams te bzlas pa 'di bya'o/ / oM tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes
110a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas las kyi sngags dang bcas pa la lan gcig gam/ bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gsol ba btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jam
110a7(rgyud 'bum): dpal de'i phan yon ni sa bdag gi rgyal po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / thams cad khugs par 'gyur ro// dbang gi las kyi le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o//
110b1(rgyud 'bum): / 'jam dpal drag po'i las bya bar 'dod na/ gnas ni dur khrod dam/ shing gcig gam/ chu bo chen po'i 'gram ma ma/ gtsug lag khang du bya'o// khang pa der ba'i rnam lngas
110b2(rgyud 'bum): chag chag btab ste dri zhim po'i chus maN+Dal bya'o/ / sku gzugs la sogs pa'ang dgram par bya'o// gro ga 'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la rgyal po la sogs pa'i gzugs nim pa'i chus bris
110b3(rgyud 'bum): la maN+Dal gyi steng du kham pa'i ga'ur gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas maN+Dal gyi steng du gzhag par bya'o// pog por la sogs pa'i mchod pa'ang bsham par bya'o// de nas bsam gtan bsgom par bya ste/
110b4(rgyud 'bum): yi ge taM las bskyed pa'i myur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i yum sgrolas dpa' mo rnal 'byor ma'i lus su bsgom pa ni/ pad+ma rgyas pa las byung zhing nyi zla'i steng na bzhugs pa/ sku mdog ljang khu kun
110b5(rgyud 'bum): nas gsal ba gzhon nu lang tshol bab pa'i sku/ do shal dang / dpung rgyan dang / rin po che'i chun 'phyang la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/ pany+tsa li ka'i gos kyis smad dkris pa/ ka shi ka'i
110b6(rgyud 'bum): gos kyis stod g.yogs pa/ g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pas bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ spyan ni rab tu 'bar zhing dbu skra gyen du badzes pa/ dbu'i
110b7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i steng na a mi de ba dang bcas pa bskal pa'i me dpung na bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas na 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon na sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i ut+pal 'dzin pa/ sku las khro bo 'phro ba khro
111a1(rgyud 'bum): mo dpag tu med pa dang lhan cig tu'o/ / de'i bzlas pa ni 'di'o// oM tu re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bzlas par bya'o// de nas las kyi sngags dang bcas pas lan gcig gam/
111a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum bzlas nas gsol ba btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di'i yon tan ni nyon mong
111a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / las dang / rnam par smin pa dang / ngan song la sogs pa thams cad 'joms pa'o// 'jam dpal ma rungs pa'i dgra dang / gdon dang / bgegs la sogs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur
111a4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / drag po'i 'phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// / 'jam dpal 'phrin las sna tshogs pa'i las ni 'di'o// dur khrod dam/ shing gcig gam/ mchod rten gyi mdun nam/
111a5(rgyud 'bum): chu bo chen po'i 'gram du khas bya'o// khang pa der ba'i rnam lngas skya nul byas te dri zhim pos byugs pa'i maN+Dal kha me tog sil ma dgram par bya'o// yum gyi sku gzugs kyang bzhugs te/ spra tshil
111a6(rgyud 'bum): las byas pa'i gzugs kyi snying khar dur khrod kyi ras la sngags bcug dang / gsal ba'i yi ge gnyis dang bcas pa la ming gi yi ge mtha' dang bcas pa bcug ste/ maN+Dal gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o//
111a7(rgyud 'bum): bopobogog por dang me tog la sogs pa'ang dgram par bya'o// de nas bsam gtan bsgom pa ni taM las byung ba'i myur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sku yum sgrol ma dpa' mo rnal 'byor ma'i lus su
111b1(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa ni/ pad+ma las byung zhing nyi zla'i steng na sku mdog nag po shin tu 'tsher ba gzhon nu lang tshol bab pa lta bu'i sku/ do shal dang / dbu brgyan dang / rin po che'i chu na 'phyang la sogs pas
111b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzes par byas pa/ pany+tsa li ka'i gos kyis smad dkris pa/ ka shi ka'i gos kyis stod g.yogs pa/ zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ mche ba zla ba phyed
111b3(rgyud 'bum): pa lta bu gtsigs pa/ zhal khro gnyer hUM sgra dang bcas pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du phyogs pa/ da bu la zla ba'i steng na a mi de ba bzhugs pa/ bskal pa'i me dbung dang bcas pa'i 'od las
111b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa brgyad las srung ba'i lha mo 'phro ba/ phyag gnyis ni g.yas na gri gug 'dzin cing / g.yon pa sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la'i steng na me tog gis bkang ba'i bram ze'i thod pa can
111b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa/ khro bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o// sngags ni 'di bzlas par bya'o// oM tA re tu re tut+tA re swA hA/ zhes bzlas par bya'o// de nas las kyi sngags dang bcas pa la lan
111b6(rgyud 'bum): gcig gam/ bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gsol ba btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de'i phan yon ni 'phrin las bzhi 'grub par 'gyur ro//
111b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa las srung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrin las sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum
112a1(rgyud 'bum): ni rigs lnga'i bdag nyid kyi yum ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal rdo rje'i rigs kyi yum ni zhal bzhi ma/ phyag brgyad ma/ dung gi mdog can/
112a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu lang tshol ba ba pa/ zhal dkar ba dang / gnag pa dang / dmar ba dang / ser ba'i zhal bzhi'o// rigs lngas dbu la mtshan pa/ spyan gsum pa'o// phyag brgyad ni rdo rje dang /
112a3(rgyud 'bum): mda' dang / mdung dang / tha ma la mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// ut+pa kha dang / gzhu dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags padang / sdigs mdzub ni g.yon gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje skyil krung gis
112a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs shing chos sku'i rang bzhin can no/ / 'jam dpal de'i sngags ni 'di'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya d+hA na sA ga rA ya ak+Sho b+h+ya b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha
112a5(rgyud 'bum): ya na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tu re tut+tA re swA hA/ zhes pas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis me tog dang / mar me dang
112a6(rgyud 'bum): dri chab dang / ba shos gtsang gis mchod do// 'jam dpal de'i las ni 'di'o// spu tshil la gang bya ba'i gzugs byas te skrod pa'i rdzas ni bya rog dang hu lu'i sha ming dang bcas pa'i snying khar bcug nas
112a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ / oM a mu kaM me sha ma na ya swAhA/ zhes brjod nas rlung gi phyogs su sbas na/ 'jam dpal 'thab cing 'bye bar 'gyur/ gzhan du 'bros par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs kyi
112b1(rgyud 'bum): yum gyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / / 'jam dpal pad+ma'i rigs kyi yum ni zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa/ rtsa ba'i zhal ni dmar mo// ban du ka'i me tog gi mdog gi sku/ gzhon nu
112b2(rgyud 'bum): lang tsho la bab pa/ g.yas dkar po// g.yon gyi zhal nag po// rgyab kyi zhal ser po// rigs bzhis dbu la mtshan pa/ spyan gsum pa'o// phyag brgyad na pad+ma dang / mda' dang / mdung dang / tha ma
112b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ / ut+pa la dang / gzhu dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / sdigs mdzub ni g.yon pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin can no//
112b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal de'i sngags ni 'di'o// na mo rat+na tA yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/ a mi ta de ba byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi
112b5(rgyud 'bum): satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tut+tA re tu re tu swA hA/ zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyis me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / dri chab dang / zhal zas
112b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis mchod do/ / 'jam dpal de'i las ni 'di'o// da du ra dang / nim pa dang / mya ngan 'tshang gi me tog btags te phye ma sbrang rtsi dang lde gu byas nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a mu ka a mi
112b7(rgyud 'bum): ta naM/ ku mA ri ma hA mu dra ba he na da s+ya ba ti pa ya tsa tu hUM hrI/ zhes brjod nas lus la byugs na rang dbang med par khugs par 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i rigs kyi yum gyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
113a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum ni zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa/ ser mo gser bsregs pa lta bu'i sku/ gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa/ rtsa ba'i zhal ser po/ g.yas
113a2(rgyud 'bum): dkar po/ g.yon dmar ba/ rgyab kyi zhal gnag pa/ rigs bzhis dbu la mtshan pa/ spyan gsum pa'o// phyag brgyad na 'khor lo dang / mda' dang / mdung dang / tha ma mchog sbyin mdzad pa'o//

113a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa la de'i sngags ni 'di'o/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya bai ro tsa na b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bya bas de
113a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyis mchod pa'i me tog dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / dri la sogs pas mchod do// 'jam dpal de'i las ni 'di'o// thal chen dang sa zhag la
113a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs byas te snying khar gsal byed gnyis kyi yi ge'i mtha' can bcug la sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ / oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ staM b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ dzaM b+ha ya dzaM b+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/
113a7(rgyud 'bum): laM laM laM laM laM/ zhes brjod nas lam rgya gram du sba bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / 'jam dpal rin po che'i
113b1(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi yum ni zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa/ rtsa ba'i zhal ni mthing kha/ gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa mthing kha'i sku/ zhal g.yas dkar po/ g.yon dmar ba/ rgyab kyi zhal ser ba/ rigs
113b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhis dbu la mtshan pa/ spyan gsum pa'o// phyag brgyad ni rin po che dang / mda' dang / mdung dang / tha ma mchog sbyin mdzad pa'o// ut+pa la dang / gzhu dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhag
113b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sdigs mdzub g.yon pa na 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin can no// 'jam dpal de'i sngags ni 'di'o// oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
113b4(rgyud 'bum): na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/ rat+na saM b+ha ba byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa mya ka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHAr+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/
