113b6(rgyud 'bum): stag pa'i rtsa ba rul pa dang / snying las skyes pa'i srin bu dang / sa bon gnyis su bsres pa kham pa'i ga'ur bcug nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a mu ka i bi Da naM/ A kan+ta
113b7(rgyud 'bum): ya A kaR+Sha ya/ a mu ki ma ye ba se traM/ srab nan ka tha hUM hri/ zhes bzlas te ma la 'og tu sbas na yon tan shes shing mi phyed par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i rigs kyi yum
114a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o/ / / 'jam dpal las kyi rigs kyi yum ni zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa/ rtsa ba'i zhal ni ljang khu/ gzhon nu khang tsho la
114a2(rgyud 'bum): bab pa/ g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar po/ rgya ba ni ljang khu/ rigs bzhis dbu la mtshan pa/ spyan gsum pa'o// phyag brgyad pa ral gri dang / mda' dang / mdung dang / tha ma
114a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog sbyin pa'o/ / ut+pa la dang / gzhu dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa g.yon pa'o// rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs shing chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin no//
114a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal de'i sngags ni 'di'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA a mo g+ha sid+d+hi b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta tha ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/
114a5(rgyud 'bum): bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tu re tut+tA re swAhA/ zhes brjod pas las kyi rigs thams cad kyis me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / dri chab kyis mchod
114a6(rgyud 'bum): do/ 'jam dpal de'i las ni phrag dog med par mo thams cad 'gugs pa ni phug ron gyi mig dang / lce dang / snying dang / go ro tsa na dang / dngul rdo dang / de rnams nim pas ril bu byas te 'di
114a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya'o/ / tsa la pra tsa la shI g+haM ga mi de ba dat+ta u tsa tA ya/ a mu khaM ba sa naM muk+taM ku ru na ya na ma hA ri had de hri/ zhes bzlas te byugs na mo thams cad khugs par 'gyur ro// dbang du 'gyur
114b1(rgyud 'bum): ro phrag dog med par 'gyur ro/ / las kyi rigs kyi yum gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de ltar las kyi bye brag bstan nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas las thams
114b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kun rdzogs par sbyin sreg ji ltar du bya zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'di thams cad kyi tron du 'gro zhing so sor las sgrub pa'i phyir sbyin sreg bya'o//
114b3(rgyud 'bum): de las dang po zhi ba'i las bya ba ni tshes gsum pa'i zla ba la kha dog dang mthun pa'i khang bu byas te rdo rje dkar po dgod par bya'o// bud shing ni tsan dan dkar po'i shing la sogs pas bya'o// de la me
114b4(rgyud 'bum): slar te sku gzugs mdun du bzhag ste/ 'bras dang / khre dang / cu rtse dang / til dkar po la sngags gdab pa ni/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te me'i nang
114b5(rgyud 'bum): du gtor bar bya'o/ / zho dang 'o ma la sngags btab ste/ shAn+ti ku ru dang bcas pas dbul bar bya'o// 'o ma can gyi shing dang mar dkar po la ni sarba pA paM dang bcas pas dbul lo// 'jam dpal me
114b6(rgyud 'bum): tog dkar po dang bcas pa'i me'i khang par tsan dan la sogs pa dri zhim po'i shing la me sbar te/ sku gzugs mdun du bzhag la chu dang yungs kar la bsngags te mer gtor ba'i sngags ni/
114b7(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags dang / sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ zhes bya bas chu khyod ma brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o// 'jam dpal de'i phan yon ni mtsham
115a1(rgyud 'bum): med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / nad 'go ba dang gdon la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// skye ba thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// 'jam
115a2(rgyud 'bum): dpal ba'i rnam pa lngas byug pa byugs te/ me'i khang pa dri dang ldan pa'i khang par spa/ tshil la gzugs bris pa dang bcas pa sngags 'dis sreg go// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ zhes bya bas sreg na
115a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur zhing tshar bcad par yang 'gyur ro/ / sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems
115a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu la 'khor lo'i rim pa bka' stsal to/ / 'khor lo le tse dgu pa la oM dang hA gnyis dbus su che ge mo dang bcas pa bri/ rak+ShaHrak+ShaH/ zhes bya ba ni srung ba'o// phyogs
115a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bya ba bris te kun la swA hA'i bar bcug pa gro ga la gur kum gyis bris nas dpung pa la btags pa ni srung ba'i mchog go// zhi ba'i srung ba'i 'khor lo'i
115a6(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas dbang gi srung ba ni 'khor le tse dgu pa oM dang ha gnyis dbus su che ge mo dang bcas pa bri/ rak+ShaHrak+ShaHzhes bya ba ni srung ba'o// phyogs
115a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bya ba bris te ku mu dang mu'i bar du sa bon no// de grog dmar po la rgya skyegs kyi khu bas bris te lte bar mi mngon par btags na srung ba'i mchog tu
115b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing dbang du sdud do/ / dbang gi srung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas rgyas pa'i srung ba ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa byas te/ oM tA re tut+tA
115b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad po dgod par bya'o/ / dbus su ni swA hA'i ming rak+ShaHrak+ShaHdang bcas pa gro ka la gur kum gyis bris pa dpung pa 'am mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// rgyas pa'i srung ba'i 'khor
115b3(rgyud 'bum): lo'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o/ / / de nas bar chod sel ba'i srung ba'i 'khor lo ni mu khyud gsum la tha ma le tse brgyad pa'o// dbus su ming gi mtha' can gyi swAhA rak+ShaHdang
115b4(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'o/ / mu khyud nang ma la u A u u zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o// le tse brgyad pa phyi ma la ni/ oM tA re tu re tut+tA re/ zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru rnams u dang U'i bar du bcug ste
115b5(rgyud 'bum): bkod la gro ga'am shing shu na la gu ra kum gyis bris te spyi bo 'am/ mtshan khung du mis mi mthong bar btags na gnod pa thams cad las thar ro// sngags ni ci mang du grangs dang ldan par
115b6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas so/ / shin tu rgyas pa'i srung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas 'phrin las thams cad grub pa'i 'khor lo ni gro ga'am ras la le tse dgu pa'i
115b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo la tsan dan dkar po'i chus bris te sngags dgod pa ni/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e AM/ o au/ raR+Sha/ mau lI/ aM aH/ zhes pa byi'i bu khrud la'o// nang gi mu
116a1(rgyud 'bum): khyud la ta re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ oM dang ha'i bar du rak+ShaHshAn+ti ku ru/ zhes pa ni steng gi 'khor lo la'o// 'og gi 'khor lo la ni sngags bzlog pas so// phyi'i dbyangs
116a2(rgyud 'bum): yig kyang bzlog par shes par bya'o/ / dbus su ni/ oM dang ha'i bar du rak+Sha/ shUn+tiM ku rba/ bri bar bya'o// zhi ba chen po'i 'khrul 'khor gyi srung ba ste le'u nyi shu n+ya gnyis pa'o//
116a3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas 'phrin las bzhi'i las so so'i 'khor lo ni/ zhi ba ni kham pa la ga'u kha sbyor byas te mer bsregs la kha dog dkar po byug par bya'o// de'i nang du 'khor lo
116a4(rgyud 'bum): le tse dgu pa bris te/ sngags dgod pa ni/ au tA re tut+tA re tu re/ zhes bya ba re mig brgyad la'o// ru ru au ru ru/ ru ru tA ru ru/ ru ru re ru ru/ ru ru tuta ru ru/ ru ru tA ru ru/ ru pu re ru ru/

116a7(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po'i las bya ba ni kham pa la ga lu kha sbyar byas te tsan dan dmar pos snag tsha byas la 'khor lo phyi nang bcas pa'i le tse dgu pa bri bar bya'o/ / sngags dgod pa ni/ swa shAn+ti ku ru hoH/
116b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba dbus su bri'o// mu khyud nang ma la ni/ a a zhes bya ba brgyad dgod par bya'o// mu khyud phyi ma la ni/ a au a/ a tA a/ a re a/ a tuta a/ a tA a/ a re a/ a
116b2(rgyud 'bum): tu a/ a re a/ zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o// me tog gi 'phreng bas bcings te maN+Dal gyi steng du dus bzhir mchod cing zhag bdun du sngags ma nor bar bzlas na zhi ba chen po'i las
116b3(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba chen po'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas rgyas pa'i las bya ba ni gur kum mam/ gi hang gis grog la 'khor lo'i phyi nang
116b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i la tse dgu pa bris te/ dbus su/ sarba puSh+Ti ku ru oM a/ zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o// le tse nang ma brgyad la oM brgyad bri bar bya'o// le tse phyi ma brgyad la/ oM oM au/
116b5(rgyud 'bum): oM tA oM/ oM re oM/ oM tuta oM/ oM tA oM/ oM re oM/ oM tu oM/ oM re oM/ zhes bya ba bris nas/ kham pa'i ga 'ur bcug ste me tog ser po na ga puSh+pa'i me tog dang mchod pa lngas dus
116b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhir zla ba rgyas pa nas bzung nas zhag bdun du mchod na tshe dang bsod nams thams cad rgyas par 'grub bo/ / rgyas pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//
116b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas dbang du bsdu bar 'dod na kan da ka'i shun pa dang / seng ldeng gi shun pa dang / mdzo mo shing gi shun pa bskus pa'i khu bas gse gab ba ma ga'u la 'khor lo bri ba ni le tse dgu

117a2(rgyud 'bum): a re a/ a tu a/ a re a/ zhes bris nas thod pa kha sbyor du bcug nas skud pa sngon pos dkris nas me tog dmar po dang / mchod pa lngas dus bzhir zla ba kham pa'i dus su mchod na thams
117a3(rgyud 'bum): cad dbang du 'du'o/ / dbang drag gi 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas dbang du 'du bar byed pa ni srin lag gi khrag dur khrod kyi sol ba dang kan da ka'i khu
117a4(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams kyis bris te/ dur khrod kyi sol pa dang mi shi ba'i gos la 'khor lo le tse dgu pa bri'o// dbus su/ a mo g+ha hrIHha/ zhes bya ba bri'o// rtsibs brgyad la/ oM de oM/ tA ba tA re da ta re/

117b1(rgyud 'bum): ka bA lar bcug ste skud pa sngon pos bcings te dur khrod du sbas na bskrad par 'gyur ro/ / bslad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas dbye ba'i

118a1(rgyud 'bum): thod pa la zis te sngags mang du bzlas nas dur khrod du sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / gsad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// // myos
118a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'khor lo ni da du ra'i chus ras sam shog shog la le tse dgu pa phyi nang dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo bris te/ dbus su/ ha ha de ba tad ta ha ha/ zhes pa bri'o// le tse na ma ya/ b+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ bri bar

118a6(rgyud 'bum): g+ha ha/ zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o// le tse brgyad pa la/ ga oM ga/ ga tA ga/ ga re ga/ ga tu rtag/ ga tA ga/ ga reg/ gtug/ ga reg/ zhes bya ba bris te/ 'khor lo kha sbyar nas lam rgya gram
118a7(rgyud 'bum): du sras na 'gul mi shes par 'gyur ro/ / mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas mnan pa chen po ni yung ba'i khu bas sdug tsha byas te
118b1(rgyud 'bum): kham pa'i ga'u'i nang du phyi nang le tse dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris la/ sngags dgod pa ni/ dbus su/ rga swa staM b+ha ya b+ha ya rka ha/ zhes bya ba zi'o// nang ma la/ ha ha ha ha/ ha ha ha ha/
118b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba brgyad zi'o// de'i phyi rol gyi le tse dgu la ni/ rga.oM rka/ rga tArbA/ rka re na/ rga tatarga/ rga ta rga/ rka ra na/ rka turga/ rka re rka/ zhes bya ba bris te/ sgrub pa 'phags ma la
118b3(rgyud 'bum): byas la dgra kang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs su sbas na srung bar 'gyur zhing / dgra'i sgor sbas na mnan par 'gyur ro// dgra mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o//
118b4(rgyud 'bum): / de nas rig sngags kyi sbyor ba gnon par byed pa'i 'khor lo ni yung ba'i khu bas g.yam pa 'am/ lgang tsher gnyis gang yang rung ba la 'khor lo bris te/ le tse dgu pa la
118b5(rgyud 'bum): byin pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ / sngags dgod pa ni/ dbus su ni/ wa swa staM b+ha ba staM b+ha ba ha/ 'khor lo nang ma la/ la wal wa/ wa la wa wa/ zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o//
118b6(rgyud 'bum): ma la/ wa oM la/ la thA la/ la re la/ la tuta la/ la tra la/ la re la/ la tu la/ la re la/ zhes bya ba bris te/ phan tshun g.yas g.yon du 'khor lo re re zas na mnan par 'gyur ro//
118b7(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags kyi sbyor ba mnan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'dapal byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nus// me tog man da ra ba dang /
119a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dang / ku mu da la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra du ma'ang bsgrags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ dam tshig kyang ga
119a2(rgyud 'bum): gis 'grub par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ so so'i dam tshig sdom gnas te// lha yi 'khor lo dang ldan pas// srog chags dag ni gsad pa spang // ma byin pa dag mi
119a3(rgyud 'bum): blang zhing / / bud med mi bsten smad mi bya// brdzun ni rnam pa kun tu spang // myos gyur dag dang sha dag dang // dku zhing rnam pa rtag tu spang // mo rnams thams cad kun la ni// chags pa'i sems kun spang ba ste//
119a4(rgyud 'bum): ma bzhin du ni kun la ni// phan pa'i sems kyis kun la bkur// dam tshig sdom pa gnas pa yi// las rnams kun la mthu yod 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan
119a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu la sogs pa'i 'khor
119a6(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rgyud las sna tshogs bstan
119a7(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / // rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI mi tra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// /
119b1(rgyud 'bum): gar skad du/ Ar+ya trar b+harba nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka/ bod skad du/ rje btsun ma 'phag ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan yid 'ong
119b2(rgyud 'bum): po Ta la/ / sna tshogs khams kyis rnam par spras// sna tshogs ljon pas bkram pa ste// skye gnyis du ma sgra 'byin pa// 'bab chu sna tshogs ku co che// ri dgas sna tshogs 'khrugs pa ste// me tog sna
119b3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rigs rnams kyis/ / kun tu dri yis bkang ba ste// sna tshogs yid 'ong 'bras bur ldan// rkang pa drug pa glu yi sgra// mi 'am ci yis glu snyan len// glang chen smyon pas yang dag khengs// rim
119b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin grub pa'i tshogs rnams dang / dri za rnams kyang glu len pa/ thub pa 'dod chags bral rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhan dang // sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams dang ni// /
119b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phags ma sgrol sogs lha mo rnams// rig pa'i rgyal mo stong rnams kyis// rtag tu legs par bsten pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po tshogs gzhan dang // rta mgrin la sogs kyis bskor ba//
119b6(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun la phan par brtson// bcom ldan 'das ni spyan ras gzigs// bzhugs te de phyir dpal dang ldan// pad+ma'i snying po thub pa'i gdan// dka' thub chen po dang ldan pa// byams
119b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ni snying rje ldan/ / lha yi 'khor ni chen po la// chos gsung po ni yang dag bzhugs// de ru nyer 'dug yang dag langs// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che// mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pas// spun ras
120a1(rgyud 'bum): gzigs la zhus pa ste/ / rkun po sbrul dang seng ge dang // glang po stag dang chu 'jigs pas// zhi mdzad thub pas sems can rnams// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnam//
120a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba'i zhags pas bcings pa rnams// chags sdang gti mug dri ma las// gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba// de gsungs bdag la thub chen po// de skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das//
120a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad gsungs// dpal ldan de ni spyan ras gzigs// phyag na rdo rje rab rtogs byed// snyan pa'i tshig ni 'di skad gsungs// nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po// /
120a4(rgyud 'bum): skyob pa 'od dpag med pa yi// smon lam stobs kyis byung ba ste// nga yis 'jig rten ma ru shes// snying rje che dang ldan pa yis// 'gro ba 'don par brtson pa mo// nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra/
120a5(rgyud 'bum): ba/ zla ba nya 'dra byad kyi 'od// lha bcas mi dang lha min dang // mi rnams thams cad gsal bar byed// 'jig rten gsum po g.yo bar byed// gnod sbyin srin po 'jig par byed// phyag na
120a6(rgyud 'bum): ut+pa kha sngon po ste/ / ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes brjod ma// khar snang du ni 'bar bar gnas// 'gro ba yang dag gzung don du// mtshon gyi bskal pa byung ba dang // 'jigs pa sna
120a7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs 'khrugs don du/ / rgyal ba rnams kyis bdag bskyed de// ming rnams dran pa nyid kyis ni// sems can thams cad bdag gis srung // sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho las// sems
120b1(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad bdag gis bsgral/ / des na bdag la 'jig rten du// rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis sgrol mar bsgrags// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol//
120b2(rgyud 'bum): gsung gcig mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' ra ba dga' ba'i// sdig pa spong byed bsod nams dang // bkra shis grags pa
120b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phel bar byed/ / gter dang nor rnams 'phel byed nyid// nad rnams thams cad rlag par byed// dpal dang shis pa 'jog par byed// nad med tshe ni 'phel bar byed// sems can rnams la
120b4(rgyud 'bum): byams bsgoms la/ / de dag sgrogs shig thub chen po// spyan ras gzigs dbang rab tu bshad// mchog rnams rab tu rnam gzigs nas// 'di lta bu yi byams pa spro// phyag ni g.yas pas
120b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag thab mdzad/ / bsod nams mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// de gsungs shes rab shin tu che// legs so leg so dka' thub che// sems can kun la gcig tu brtse// bskal pa chen po mi rnams nyon// /
120b6(rgyud 'bum): mi rnams gang zhig 'di sgrog pa// nor gyi dbang phyug yang dag 'gyur/ nad rnam thams cad yang dag grol// dbang phyug kun dang yang dag ldan// dus min 'chi ba nges par bsregs// 'chi ba bde ba
120b7(rgyud 'bum): can 'gro ba/ / de rnams bdag gis bshad par bya// lha yi dge 'dun bdag la nyon// 'di la rjes su yi rang gis// legs par bsdams par 'gyur la bstod// oM dge ba can ni gzi brjid che// /
121a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gso byed snyan pa che// dbyangs can ma ni spyan yangs ma// shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma// gso byed ma dang rgyas 'debs ma// swA hA/ oM gyi rnam pa 'dod gzugs
121a2(rgyud 'bum): ma sems can kun la phan par brtson/ / g.yul las sgrol byed rgyal ba mo// lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin// 'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma// rdza rnga dung can rgyas pa mo// rig pa'i rgyal mo tshig snyan
121a3(rgyud 'bum): ma/ zla ba'i gdong can dkar mo che// mi pham gos ni ser mo can// sgyu ma chen mo dkar mo che// stobs po che la pha rol phyin// rtsub mo chen mo gtum chen mo// sdang ba'i sems kyis rlag byed ma// rab
121a4(rgyud 'bum): tu zhi ba zhi ba'i gzugs/ / rnam par rgyal ba 'bar ba'i 'od// glog gi 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan can// ral gri 'khor lo gzhu thogs mtshon// 'chol byed rengs byed nag mo ni// mtshan mo nag mo
121a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan spyod ma/ / srung byed rmongs byed zhi ba mo// mdzes ma dge ma 'dra ba'i lding // tshangs pa mo dang rig byed mo// gsang ba mo ni brag phug gnas// bkra shis don byed zhi ba mo// skyes nas rig
121a6(rgyud 'bum): byed yid mgyogs ma/ / thod pa can ni shugs chen mo// tshangs ma bden ma gzhan mi rgyal// ded dpon chen mo snying rje gnas// chud zos pa la lam rab ston// mchog ster ster byed ston pa mo// bud
121a7(rgyud 'bum): med gzugs la dpag med gnon/ / ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor mo// grub ma gtum ma bdud rtsim// des ma nor ma bsod nams ma// skal chen skal bzang mdzes ston ma// mthar byed skrag byed
121b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig byed ma/ / drag dang brtul zhugs chen mo ma// 'gro la gcig tu phan par brtson// skyabs byed gus la gsong ba mo// ngag gi dbang phyug zhi phra ma// rtag ma kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma// don kun
121b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub byed bzang mo ma/ / gsang byed gso byed nor ster ma// mi 'jigs bsod nams gau ta ma// spyan ras gzigs dbang bdag nyid skyes// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// phan par byed par
121b3(rgyud 'bum): grags pa ste/ / mchog tu rmad byung gsang ba'o// lha yul na yang rnyed dka' ba// skal bzang skal ba dang ldan byed// dug ni thams cad nyams byed la// nad ni thams cad zhi byed ma// sems
121b4(rgyud 'bum): can kun la bde ster ma/ / blo ldan gang zhig lan gsum klog/ mnyam bzhag gtsang sbra byas pa yis// des ni dus mi ring ba ru// rgyal srid dpal yang thob par 'gyur// rtag tu sdug pa'ang
121b5(rgyud 'bum): bde bar 'gyur/ / bkren pa phyug por 'gyur ba'o// rmongs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur// yid gzhungs 'gyur ba the tshom med// bcings pa bcings las grol bar 'gyur// tha snyad las kyang
121b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bar 'gyur/ / dgra bo bshes por 'gyur ba ste// rwa can dang ni mche ba can// dog pa'i 'thab mo rgyal dka' dang // sna tshogs 'jigs pa 'khrug pa las// mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa
121b7(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / 'jigs pa kun las sgrol bar byed// dus min 'chi las sgrol bar byed// skyes bu snyan pa thob par byed// mi ni smra ba don dang bcas// ngagacag pu yi phan yon gyis// gang zhig 'di na
122a1(rgyud 'bum): sngar langs nas/ / skyes bu gang zhig klog byed pa// de yi dus ring tshe dang ldan// mi ni dpal gyis dga' 'gyur te// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang ni lus srul po
122a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po gshed byed srin po dang / / ma mo rtsub pa'i sems ldan pa// gnod sbyin mo dang yi dgas byed// spyo byed dang ni gdon chen rnams// grib gnon dang ni brjed byed dang // sha za la sogs
122a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / ro langs la sogs sna tshogs rnams// skul byed gzhan sems sdang ba rnams// grib ma yang ni 'gom mi 'gyur// ji ltar slar ni mchod par 'gyur// sdang ba'i sems can
122a4(rgyud 'bum): 'ching bar 'gyur/ / nad la sogs pas thebs mi 'gyur// phyug dang longs spyod yon tan ldan// bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar 'gyur// blo ldan skye ba dran par 'gyur// rigs dang ldan zhing
122a5(rgyud 'bum): mthong dgar 'gyur/ / gzi brjid ldan zhing tshig gsal ba// bstan bcos thams cad rig par 'gyur// dge ba shes bsnyen bkur yang dag bsten// byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa dang //
122a6(rgyud 'bum): gang dang gang du skyes pa der// rtag tu sangs rgyas kyis mi spong // dpal ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa
122a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa rdzogs so/ / // rgya gar skad du/ tA ra de bI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka na/ bod skad du/ lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/
122b1(rgyud 'bum): lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ba'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang / na bza' dang / sham thabs kyi gshal kas 'jig rten gyi khams chen po'i bla re byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
122b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas lha mo sgrol mas de'i tshe sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i gzungs kyi mchog brjod pa/ oM trai lo kya bi dza ya/ a tsit+ta dzA ya/ a ni ra tsi dza tA ya/ su dza ya/ bi dza ya/ ma hA dza ya/ bi dza ya/
122b3(rgyud 'bum): dza ya dza ya/ he he/ sma ra sma/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra da/ ma hA da bi/ bi la sa/ bi la sa/ bi la sa ba dza a mo ta ka ri bi dza ya de bi hI hI/ ki na ki na bi la ma ba se/ smar smar/ ma ya pradz+nyA a ni ba ta/
122b4(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bA gi ni hUM hUM/ s+phu ta s+phu ta/ s+pho to spa ta/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ kam+ba kam+ba/ kam+ba ya/ su ra b+hi gan d+ha/ a ti si ta/ mu khe ha la da ba la/
122b5(rgyud 'bum): saM ga rA dzA na bi ma bi gi/ bi nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya/ he b+ha ga ba ti/ san tra sa ya/ bi ga nA na/ ba ri ba lA ya/ asma kaM asma kaM/ mA da ni mA da ni/ saM bo d+ha ya saM bo d+ha ya/ ha ra ha ra/ hi ri hi ri/
122b6(rgyud 'bum): hu ru hu ru/ bi ta ra ka ba ra dza/ haM haM/ tro tA ya haM haM/ san tri tA ya/ san tro ya/ man+ta man+ta/ marda marba/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saM tsa ra saM tsa ra/ be ga be ga be ga ba ti/ na mo na mo na ma swA hA/ de nas lA dang
122b7(rgyud 'bum): lha min tshogs/ / srin po gnod sbyin mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams dang // 'byung po dri za log 'dren rnams// 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i mchog/ gsang sngags chen po
123a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di thos nas/ / skrag cing mgo bo smad gyur te// lag pa chen po yongs bskyod nas// gang gis 'di nas sa gsum 'di// mtshan dag khyab par bya ba'i phyir// 'dod par
123a2(rgyud 'bum): lha yi ngag zlog pa/ / sgrol ma spyan yangs phyag 'tshal lo// spyan ras gzigs kyi rig smos pa// che ba nyid kyi grags pa'o// spyan yangs khyod ni sems can rnams// phan bzhed slad du 'byung ba
123a3(rgyud 'bum): lags/ / de nas dbang phyug la sogs pa// lha dang lha min 'dus kun dang // rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po dang // de bzhin rig sngags 'chang ba rnams// bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te// bskor
123a4(rgyud 'bum): pab mchog ni byas nas kyang / / pus mo'i lha nga sa steng du// gtsugs nas tshig ni 'di skad smras// sgrol ma 'od 'bar de la ni// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yi//
123a5(rgyud 'bum): dpe med ming ni brjod par bgyi// bkra shis rnam rgyal dpal bzang ba// skye dgu'i dbang phyug mngon shes myur// dbang phyug rab dga' 'jigs la drag/ rgod bag med cing dregs pa med// pad+ma'i
123a6(rgyud 'bum): spyan dang pad+ma'i zhal/ / pad+ma'i lte ba rab gtsang sbyin// spyan bzang spyan ni yangs pa ste// sngo ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'od// skyob pa skyabs 'os bde ba sbyin// de bzhin stobs sbyin gzugs sbyin pa//
123a7(rgyud 'bum): mgon po mgon mdzad drag mo ste// dkon mchog gsum po rgyal mdzad ma// sgros dmar sen mo dmar ba ste// spyan rtsa dmar pos gzigs par mdzad// dga' mdzad dga' stobs
123b1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma lags/ / pad+ma'i mdog can par mdog dgyes// 'jig rten gsum 'dul zhi ba ste// 'jigs pa'i cha lugs stobs mo che// 'dul du 'jug ma 'dul mdzad ma// bstod ldan mi
123b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog dam pa lags/ / rab gsal 'dul ba rdo rje can// rnam par rgyal ba 'od gsal ba// byang chub rdul med dri ma med// zla ba lha mchog rnams kyi rje// sred bya dang ni sred bya'i bar//
123b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyu zhing gshegs la 'od zer mdzes// chu lnga g.yul 'gyed 'gying bag can// skyes mchog rang bzhin yid 'phros rgyas// gtsug bud gsum po lho tshil gsum// spyan gsum dri ma gsum
123b4(rgyud 'bum): sel ba/ / sred pa sel mdzad khong dge ba// tshig ldan mar yang de bzhin grags// rgyal ba sbyin pa bsod nams sbyin// sdig pa 'joms ma 'jigs pa med// nor sbyin mdog sbyin zhi
123b5(rgyud 'bum): ba ma/ / gzugs bzang phyal bzang nu ma bzang // sgyu 'phrul sgyu 'phrul ldan zhing 'dul// dul ba srung ba rdul sel ba// 'phreng ba thogs ma rgyags mdzad ma// rgyags pa sbyin ma dregs
123b6(rgyud 'bum): spong ma/ / drag mo lags te gzi bskyed ma// dkar mo zhi mdzad bde ba mo// skye dgu'i bdag mo tshangs par ldan// tshangs sbyin dbang phyug dam pa lags// zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i zhal//
123b7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i gzi ni 'phrog par mdzad// nyi ma'i gzi 'phrog dgyes pa mo// yid 'ong bzang zhing zhim mo// bde ma bde ldan mu dang stegs// bkra shis bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma// nor
124a1(rgyud 'bum): spel bsod nams rnam par rgyal/ / 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser dngul 'od// 'jigs pa sel ba 'jigs med sbyin// sgrol ma lags te zla ba'i zhal// sems can kun
124a2(rgyud 'bum): la med mi 'gyur/ / mchod gnas phyag gnas dga' mdzad ma// cha lugs sngo ba cha lugs bzang // rgyan dmar rgyan du thogs pa ste// na bza' gser mnabs gang+gA ma// dkar mo 'bar
124a3(rgyud 'bum): ba rnam par 'jigs/ / gi'u wang gi thig le spos// 'khor ldan rdo rje chu lha nyid// dkyil 'khor mchog mnga' 'jigs mdzad ma// tshems dkar bzhad cing tshems dkar 'dzum// dpung
124a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyan snyan cha gdub kor thogs/ / do shal 'bar ba'i chun po can// 'og pag bzang ldan zhal bzang ma// grog ni nim pa'i lo ma thogs// nor bu'i cod pan nor bu 'chang // nor bu'i
124a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyan rnams rgyan du thogs/ / nor bu'i 'od zer snang ba can// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba// 'bar ba'i mdog mnga' rdo rje can// skyes pa bud med sad par mdzad// zhi ba dbyigs
124a6(rgyud 'bum): thogs mche ba can/ / tshangs pa'i zhugs can rlung dang ldan// bud med lags te mkha' las gshegs// lha mo mchog gi 'od 'phro ma// 'od dang ldan pa 'dod pas 'dul// 'dod pa'i
124a7(rgyud 'bum): khro bo rab 'joms ma/ / drag po thor tsugs gtsug bud can// tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gsung ldan rgyal// ping ka'i skad 'dra pheg bzang ma// 'jig rten dbang phyug rigs mchog skye//
124b1(rgyud 'bum): dbyig pa'i shing lo rdo rje thogs// drag mo rin chen 'od kyis brgyan// gshegs na snyan cha dri med g.yo// gshin rje ba yi yid la 'jug/ rig sngags 'chang ma gzugs 'chang ma//
124b2(rgyud 'bum): stobs lnga stobs dang ldan par mdzad// stobs dang stobs med mnga' ba ste// shes rab mtshon gyis gcod par mdzad// sgyu rtsal lags te sgyu rtsal ldan// de bzhin brjod dang sma
124b3(rgyud 'bum): ba lags/ / steng nas khyams dang khyams bza' tshul// tsam pa ka yi chun pos gsal// ser mo cen pa legs pa'i rten// drag mo phyag na chun po thogs// skal ba bzang mo
124b4(rgyud 'bum): gshal ka can/ / de bzhin shin tu shas cher dgyes// rigs mtshan shin tu stobs dang ldan// rdo rje khro bo dga' mdzad ma// bde ldan blo ldan rdo rje'i thogs// blo mdzad shes rab
124b5(rgyud 'bum): skyed par mdzad/ / lha mo lam me cod pan can// lha rnams kun la tshul lhag ma// sred med bu mo sdig pa sel// bkra shis ngo tsha shes dang dgyes// rab tu dga' ma 'grogs na dga'//
124b6(rgyud 'bum): spyod tshul dga' la dga' dang ldan// dga' ma dga' bar mdzad pa ste// chos rnams kun gyi legs pa'i rten// sangs rgyas sprul pa sprul mdzad ma// nga rgyal sel bar mdzad pa ste// las dang
124b7(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs rab 'joms shing / / 'dod pa'i sde rnams rab 'joms ma// shes pa bcu mnga' sangs rgyas pa// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sa bcu dag la mnga' brnyes pa// stobs rnams
125a1(rgyud 'bum): bcu pos cher gsal ma/ / rdo rje cod pan rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje phra mo lnga min sel// dus kyi rdo rje rab tu rgyags// rdo rje lpags gru bde ba dpal// rdo rje zhags ba zhags pa bzang //
125a2(rgyud 'bum): sgeg mo rdo rje phyag na bsnams// yid 'ong yid la tshims par mdzad// pha rol bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma// tshim mdzad shas cher bde ba ste// rol cing gar thabs ston par mdzad// chos can
125a3(rgyud 'bum): hal ha la'i 'od/ / chos sbyin rnam par gzigs pa lags// khyod ni rdo rje 'phro ba dang // bdud rtsi rdo rjer brjod pa ste// rdo rje 'bar ba stobs mo che// lha mo chen mo khyod phyag 'tshal// bdag cag
125a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis bstod pa yi/ / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'di brjod// kye kye bcom ldan mchog nyid ni// smra ba rnams kyi mchog lags gsungs// de nas zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'bar la 'phro
125a5(rgyud 'bum): bar ldan pa yi/ / lha mo sgrol ma brjid bag can// 'dzum bzhin du ni rab smras pa// dbang phyug chen po la sogs kun// nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis// thams cad rtag tu 'thun par ni// stobs bcu
125a6(rgyud 'bum): dag la brtson par gyis/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul chen yang // dus kun tu ni srung bar gyis// zhi ba'i lam la dmigs pas ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad cing // 'jigs pa chen po'i
125a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhir gyur pa/ / rgal dka' khyed kyis rgal bar gyis// mya ngan 'das pa'i gro khyer la// dmigs nas brtson te 'jug par gyis// de nas nyi 'od 'bar ba yi// 'phreng ba lta bur mdzes pa'i zhal//
125b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug gi sgra// 'dra ba'i tshig ni bka' stsal pa// kye ma rig sngags sgrol ma'i mchog/ mun pa sel bar byed pa dang // mthu stobs rgya chen skyed byed pa// sgrib pa thams
125b2(rgyud 'bum): cad gcod byed pa/ / tshogs rnams bskyed pa'i gzi brjid kyis// dag par byas pa ma yin pas// shas cher dga' bar byed pa yi// gzungs 'di thos par mi 'gyur ro// sngon chad
125b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas brtson byas pa'i/ / brtan po gzi brjid dag rnams la// dam tshig chen po rig sngags kyi// dam tshig 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur// nyon mongs mtha' dag rab 'joms shing // sdig
125b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad sel byed pa/ / sems can thams cad rab 'byed pa'i// rdza sngags rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang // su zhig mnyam par bzhag pa yis// nyan tam 'chang ngam klog byed na// rang
125b5(rgyud 'bum): byung gis ni gsungs pa bzhin/ / de yi don kun 'grub par 'gyur// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing // sems can kun las lhag pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten dag tu chos shes la//
125b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzud pa'i de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs// su zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di// 'don cing sgrol ma zla ba'i zhal// de bzhin bstod byed de dag ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur//
125b7(rgyud 'bum): de yi don yang 'grub 'gyur zhing // rgyal po rnams dang stobs chen mi// gzhan yang sems can bgrang ba gang // thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur// lha mo sgrol ma zhal bzang ba'i// ming
126a1(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad grags pa 'di/ / 'jig rten dag na rgyags pa dang // nyon mongs mi rigs kun sel ba'o// de nas bdud ris gyen du g.yos pa'i ri bo 'khrug byed pa// de bzhin
126a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i ri bo mchog dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' ba/ / 'od gsal lha dang mi rnams legs par sad par mdzad pa po// rgyal sras thu bo rnams kyis khyad par stobs kyis brten pa yis// gsung
126a3(rgyud 'bum): rab rtag tu tshogs chen brda sprod la/ / don chen grags shing phan phyir zhugs pa gang // rab des chos de dang ni sdud byed dang // de bzhin khyad par sems pa'i rim sel bas// bzod med
126a4(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs sel ba dang / / zhi ba'i yid ni skyed pa'i tshig/ rgyal ba mchog gis bka' stsal nas// gzhes par gyur te mi gsung bzhugs// de nas sgrol mchog lha mos gtsor gyur dga' bar
126a5(rgyud 'bum): byed cing yid 'phrog la/ / dga' ba rgya chen skyed cing tshe dang bde sbyin bstan pa'i tshig thos pas// lha tshogs lha min tshogs bcas mtha' dag dka' ba rgyas shing rmad byung nas// rab tu dga'
126a6(rgyud 'bum): zhing spyi bos thal mo sbyar te smra ba zhi bar gyur/ / sgrol ma'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs te// lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//
126a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ b+ha Ta tA rA aSh+Ta shad ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rje btsun sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ rje btsun sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo// dab
126b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan dge ma gzi chen ma/ / 'jig rten ma ma grags chen mo// dbyangs can spyan ni dkyus ring la// blo dpal shes rab 'phel mdzad ma// swA hA brtan phyir rgyas sbyin zhing // 'dod pa'i
126b2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can yi ge oM/ / sems can kun la phan brtson zhing // g.yul las sgrol bar mdzad pa mo// lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin// 'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma// rnga chen dung gi sgra
126b3(rgyud 'bum): sgrog cing / / rig sngags rgyal mo spyan smra mo// zla ba'i zhal can dkar mo che// mi thub na bza' ser mo bsnams// sgyu 'phrul chen mo dkar mo che// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo// nag mo
126b4(rgyud 'bum): chen mo gtum pa che/ / gdug pa'i sems can 'dul ba mo// rab tu zhi zhing zhi ba'i sku// rnam rgyal 'bar ba'i 'od ldan ma// glog 'phreng rdo rje 'khor lo dang // gzhu dang mda' yi phyag mtshan
126b5(rgyud 'bum): can/ / nag mo gnon dang sdom byed cing // mtshan mo nag mo mtshan spyod ma// srung mdzad rmongs mdzad zhi mdzad ma// 'dzes ma dge ma 'gro lding ma// bram ze mo ste rigs byed yum// zab ma'i
126b6(rgyud 'bum): phug na bzhugs pa mo/ / zhi ba bkra shis ri khrod ma// rig pa bskyed cing yid ltar mgyogs// thod pa can te shugs chen zhing // gzhan gyis mi thub dus bden ma// ded dpon snying rjes gnon pa
126b7(rgyud 'bum): mo/ / lam brgyad ston par mdzad ma ste// mchog sbyin ston mdzad bstan chos ldan// ma pham bud med gzugs kyis gnon// grub pa rnal 'byor ri khrod ma// gtum mo bdud rtsi rtag pa mo//
127a1(rgyud 'bum): nor ldan bsod nams skal ba che// skal bzang mthong na dga' ba mo// mthar byed skrag byed 'jigs pa mo// shin tu drag cing cher 'bar ma// 'gro la gcig tu phan
127a2(rgyud 'bum): brtson zhing / / skyabs 'os mos la byams pa mo// tshig gi dbang phyug phra ba mo// rtag par kun tu 'dod sbyin la// don kun grub pa bzang mo ste// skas ma ma ma nor sbyin ma// 'jigs byed bsod
127a3(rgyud 'bum): nams go'u ta ma/ / dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug yum// sgrol ma yon tan mtha' yas shing // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad ma// ming ni brgya dang brgyad po 'di// tho rangs langs te
127a4(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig klog/ sgrol mas 'dod pa'i don thams cad// phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed// 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// // kha che'i
127a5(rgyud 'bum): paN+Di ta bud d+ha A ka ra dang / / bod kyi lo tsa ba ga rub chos kyi shes rab kyis kha che'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// dkon
127a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tuta tA re tu re sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta na ma/ ma kri taH
127a7(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta staM b+ha ni ta re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//
127b1(rgyud 'bum): gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA swa pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sgrol ma rang gis
127b2(rgyud 'bum): dam bcas pa'i gzungs smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA te tA re yai/ hUM hUM hUM/ sa ma ya s+thi te/ b+ha ra bA ra/ sarba b+ha ra Na/ bi b+hu Shi te/ pad+ma ni pad+ma/ mahA pad+mA/ a sa na s+thi te/ ha sa ha sa/ trai loH
127b3(rgyud 'bum): pab ra de/ sarba de ba da na pa/ pU dzi te sma rA hI/ b+ha ga ba te tA re/ sma rA hI/ b+ha ga ban ta/ ta thA ga tA s+ya/ pu ra taHsa ma yau d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA satwa a ba lo ki te/ ma Ni ka Ni ka/ bi tsi tra b+ha ra Ne/
127b4(rgyud 'bum): oM bi lo kA ya/ che ge mo/ b+ha ga bAn te/ tA re/ hrI hrI hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di yid kyis dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad thob
127b5(rgyud 'bum): pabar 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dkar po'i tshes brgyad dam bco lnga la 'phags ma sgrol ma la mchod pa chen po byas te/ sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong gi bar de tsam
127b6(rgyud 'bum): du bzlas par bya'o/ / gang 'dod pa de sbyin no// mchog thams cad ster ro// ma byin na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas so// gzhan yang phan yon dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// /
127b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mchog gi rgyud las btus/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ya sho ba tiH
128a1(rgyud 'bum): ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma a myas 'a
128a2(rgyud 'bum): ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dzA re ma hA dzA re/ du khe mu khe ma su pan ne/ ma hA saM pan ne/ saM pa ta ti/ ma hA saM bta ti/ ka se ma hA ka se/ kan+na dz+wa ra muka te saM swA hA/ skud pa 'am
128a3(rgyud 'bum): chul lan gsum sngags na rims las thar par 'gyur ro/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ AR+YA ba
128a4(rgyud 'bum): lo ki te shwa ra swA hA/ gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa 'am/ skud pa dmar po la lan gsum du bsngags te mdud pa gsum bor la bcings na bar du gcod pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA
128a5(rgyud 'bum): ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ki li ki li/ tsi li tsi li/ ni gi li swA hA/ 'bru mar la lan gsum bsngags te bskus na sman 'tsho'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
128a6(rgyud 'bum): na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa re sa re/ bi sa re bi sa re/ bi sa ra Na/ shi ni swA hA/ shi ba'i rna bar lan gsum bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na
128a7(rgyud 'bum): tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ke ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ni si ri ni si ri/ ka la ni mi re/ ka la r-i tsi rI bi tsi la swA hA/ lba ba dang / lkog ma'i lha gor dang / lce'i kyi ba nab dang /
128b1(rgyud 'bum): gdon na thams cad la 'dzem pa la khan gsum du bsngags te bskus na lan no// na mo rat+na tha pA la/ na mA swA r+yAb lo ki te shwa ra ya/ badz+ra rA NI d+ha ma/ A oM ka ra praH9/ thA ga pa tI bran te/ 8
128b2(rgyud 'bum): d+heshAn ti ki ri/ ha na ha na/ ma ma pA pa maM/ da ha ha/ ma ma pA pa de/ bcab tsa/ ma ma pA ba kan/ oM oM Te/ zas rba sa/ ri ke Te ri te Te/ shAn ti ka ri ye swAhA/ shu u0f7f ka ri ye swAH k
128b3(rgyud 'bum): +She ma ka ri ya swA hA/ rims nad kyis btab pa la byab pa byas na rims nad sos par 'gyur ro// sman la sngags kyis btab ste blud na nad pa sos par 'gyur ro// zas la sngags kyis btab ste/
128b4(rgyud 'bum): zos na dug mi gnod par 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gnod pas zin pa rnams la bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te bcings na thar par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa grags
128b5(rgyud 'bum): / ldan ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ur+d+ha dza TA ma hA kalpa ma hA bo d+hi satwa bi ku nar+b+ba Na pa Ta la bi sa rA b+ha ga ba tI Ar+ya tA rA mU la
128b6(rgyud 'bum): kalpa nA ma/ bod skad du/ ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa le'u rab 'byam las/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa
128b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'tshul lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma'i gru'i steng gi nam mkha'i mthil
129a1(rgyud 'bum): na rab tu bzhugs te/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan par bzhugs so// de nas
129a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu khyed rnams nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
129a3(rgyud 'bum): phyug gi rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sems can
129a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi gzhi sems can thams cad
129a5(rgyud 'bum): la phan pa'i ched du bshad kyis/ de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig/ ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes so// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
129a6(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bu de rnams thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par sa so sor thob par
129a7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ rdo rje'i gdan gnon par byed pa/ bdud 'dul bar byed pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar byed pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung bar byed pa/ lha dang ma
129b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams su skye bar byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dbul ba dang nad kyis btab pa thams cad kyi nad sel bar byed pa nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa tham
129b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa zil gyis mi non pa nyid dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gsung du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad
129b3(rgyud 'bum): ni don med par gsung bar byed pa ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i sems dang / bdag cag dang / sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba nye bar gzung nas de gsung du gsol
129b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas/ rnam par dag pa'i yul la 'od zer rnam
129b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'phro ba rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas me tog lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam
129b6(rgyud 'bum): kun tu skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor ba nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
129b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams mtha' yas pa 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char gang+gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das pa na/ bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rjes su
130a1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs te/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med bzhugs pa der/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang
130a2(rgyud 'bum): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa la so sor gnas pa rnams kyis thabs cig tu bzhugs pa de 'od zer gyi snang ba mthong bas cung zad rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal de nyid kyis/ byang chub
130a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal to/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'di ni bdag cag rnams kun tu skul bar byed pa'i 'od zer 'dir 'ongs pa yin par khyed cag gis shes par gyis shig/
130a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang sems dpa' chen po de rnams spyan 'dzum pa med par spyan gdangs nas 'di 'od zer gyi snang ba gang yin pa der mngon par phyogs te gnas so// de nas kun tu skul bar byed pa'i 'od zer
130a5(rgyud 'bum): des bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po kun tu snang bas kun tu snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems
130a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi ye shes kyi spyi bor nub par gyur to/ / de nas sems dpa' chen po de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
130a7(rgyud 'bum): med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dgongs su
130b1(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
130b2(rgyud 'bum): khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / rig sngags dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang / dkyil
130b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi cho ga'i rtog pa dang / gsang ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga dang / bzlas pa dang / rig pa'i dbang bskur ba thams cad khyad par du bstan pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par
130b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems
130b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po gang da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ nga'i tshig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ reg par gnas
130b6(rgyud 'bum): sam zhes rmed par bya'o/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di
130b7(rgyud 'bum): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i bye ma la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
131a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang khyod kyi rigs dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa dang / gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya dang / ras ris kyi cho ga dang / sbyin sreg
131a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / bzlas pa'i nges pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kun nas dga' bar byed pa/ rin po che snang ba'i le'u rab 'byam 'das pa dang / ma 'o
131a3(rgyud 'bum): bab dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i ye shes rnams kyis rang gi rig sngags dngagasang sngags la 'jug par byed pa ston pa mthar thug par zin pa dang / nang gi dus dang ldan pa dang / dam tshig rang
131a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byam gyi lo lu dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa mtha' dag ma lus par bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa 'an thos dang /
131a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la zhugs pa dang / spyod pa mthar thug pa gsung b.radang ldan pa dag gsungs pa la'ang 'di la rjes su yi rang ba kho ma'o// sems dpa' chen po nga
131a6(rgyud 'bum): de'i rdum la bab par shes ma khyod song zhig/ shAkya thub pa'i drung ngu de la mngon du phyogs pas dam pa'i chos kyi rnam mangs 'di nyon la khyod kyang smra bar 'gyur ro// 'di la'ang rtsa ba'i rig ma
131a7(rgyud 'bum): su 'gyur ba ni/ mthor d+ha tha mA ya/ na mo a ma~M thA d+da la~M/ Thab ga~M dz+wa ye/ arba te sa~M myag sa~M prat+pa la/ na ma a myas pa ma ga te shwa rA sa/ bo D+hos tA me/ ma this tA la/ ma mo lhag sa
131b1(rgyud 'bum): dA yaM/ bo d+hi satwA yai/ tad+ya thA/ tA re ri dzA kA d+harma nit+ya te/ tA re tut+tA re/ shAn+ta d+harma ni t+ya te/ tA re a na b+hi lA pya/ d+harma nir+yA te/ tut+tA re tu re tu re hi ni/ trA sa ni thA sa ni/ o ha ni/ mo ha nI/ dzam+ba nI/
131b2(rgyud 'bum): stam+ma ni/ pra b+he/ tsan+na pra b+he/ hi li hI li/ tsi li tsi li/ be ga sA mi ni/ kur+t+ti kuN+Di mahA kuN+Di/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha na pa ti tA re/ hu ru hu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ a haM yA yA/ tsin+ta yA mi tsin+ta d+hI mAM ku ru
131b3(rgyud 'bum): sA d+ha ya swA hA/ 'di ni sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa de yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi snying po'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
131b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis gsungs shing gsung bar 'gyur te/ khyod kyis kyang da lta smra bar 'gyur ro// mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dri rgyas pas rnam par phye ba'i mthar shAkya thub pa byon te/ shAkya
131b5(rgyud 'bum): thub pas rjes su gnang ba'o/ / 'di la mchog gi snying por 'gyur ba'ang / na mau rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 'di la nye ba'i snying
131b6(rgyud 'bum): po'ang / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ oM ku ru kul+le swAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis
131b7(rgyud 'bum): rjes su gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa byang chub kyi snying po kun tu thob par byed pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par
132a1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi rnams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka'i mthar thug pa'i tham cad dum+bi dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
132a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kun tu gang bar gyur to/ / rgyal ba'i sras po legs so legs so// gang khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin khyad par 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
132a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa sa bcu la rab tu bzhugs pa rnams kyis kyang snyoms par 'jug par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
132a4(rgyud 'bum): 'od dpag med sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis thabs cig byams pa dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mchog gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba don thams cad sgrub
132a5(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad byed ma/ rig sngags gzhan rnams kyis kyang rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i khyad par
132a6(rgyud 'bum): gyis sgrub par byed pa dang 'thun pa'i rig sngags gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yud tsam zhig ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur to// thams cad du thams
132a7(rgyud 'bum): cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis kun tu gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgongs pa byams pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems kyis rig sngags gsungs
132b1(rgyud 'bum): par gyur to/ / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ oM gIH'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
132b2(rgyud 'bum): phyug ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa dang se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis kyang mig 'byed
132b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzum sam/ skad cig tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mgyogs pa'i blo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa nyid ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten
132b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams su 'ongs nas kyang slar 'khod de steng gi nam mkha'i mthil du nor bu rin po che chen po la so sor 'khod pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por slar 'khod nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
132b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi dkyil 'khor du 'od zer chen po'i kun tu snang bas kun tu snang bar byas nas/ rin po che'i snang ba'i bdag po'i rgyan gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to//
132b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che du mas rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che'i gdug
132b7(rgyud 'bum): du mas dpag tshad brgya stong phrag tu khyab pa dang / lha'i gos dang dar gyi rgyan gyis nye bar mdzes par spras pa dang / lha'i me tog dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phreng ba dang / rin po che
133a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yer kha'i dra ba bcings pa sgra snyan pa 'khrol ba 'jug pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' so sor gnas par byed pa/ lha'i dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
133a2(rgyud 'bum): phye ma'i char 'bebs par byed pa mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i las ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul mthong ngo // /
133a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams dga' ba dang bcas pas spu zing zhes byed do// lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos pa dang ldan pa mthong nas skrag cing snying 'dar te/ 'on
133a4(rgyud 'bum): te 'byor pa yongs su nyams sam ci zhes phan tshun rings thabs su skad mthon pos smra bar rtsom zhing / 'di skad ces kyang smras so// bcom ldan 'das yongs su skyobs shig/ shAkya thub pa
133a5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su skyobs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor la bka' stsal to// ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
133a6(rgyud 'bum): s ems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas me tog can lta bu nas nga nyid lta ba dang phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur
133a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'dod de/ don chen po spyod pa dang / rig sngags kyi tshig dang / chos kyi tshig rmad du byung ba yangs pa nges par bstan pa'i phyir 'ongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan
133b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par bltas te zhabs gnyis la btud nas yi ge'i tshig rab tu smras pa 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
133b2(rgyud 'bum): bstod do/ / phyag 'tshal skyes bu mkhyen khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// spyod pa'i don kun sgrub pa po// phyag 'tshal skyes bu gtso khyod la// don med thams cad zlog pa po//
133b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal skyes bu seng ga khyod// ngan song thams cad 'joms pa po// dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// bsod nams dri ni mtha' yas pa// phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad dkar khyod//
133b4(rgyud 'bum): srid gsum 'dam ni rnam sbyong ba// phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad+ma khyod// sdug bsngal thams cad rnam grol byed// thams cad grol khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gdung ba thams cad legs 'dul
133b5(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / zhi ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sngags kyi spyod don sgrub pa po// thams cad grub khyod phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis kun gyis bkra shis pa// bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos rnam
133b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kun tu rtogs/ / sangs rgyas dam tshig khyod phyag 'tshal// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// spros pa med pa'i rnam pa ni// yang dag rjes 'jug ston pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa
133b7(rgyud 'bum): khyod phyag 'tshal/ / shes dang shes bya'i dngos po kun// legs par byas shing yang dag thos// theg gsum lam dang myang 'das la// rab tu gnas 'jug rab gnas pa// kun mkhyen
134a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / zhes yi ge'i tshig rab tu smras pa 'di rnams kyis bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces kyang
134a2(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di nas gang+gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char kun nas me tog ldan zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
134a3(rgyud 'bum): du gyur pa der/ bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
134a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa tshe dpag tu med pa bzhugs te/ de chos ston par mdzad pa ni thog mar dge ba/ bar du
134a5(rgyud 'bum): dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i tshangs par spyod pa/ yang dag par ston par mdzad cing / de 'di
134a6(rgyud 'bum): ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par mdzad do/ / rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi don gyi spyod pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod dang / lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i

134b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das de nyid kyi mdzad pas rjes su gnang nas bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung dang nye ba 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med des bcom ldan
134b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ bskrun mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes yongs su 'dri bar byed de/ 'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo // gang rnam
134b3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di lta bu'i snyigs ma'i dus gang du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku de'ang chos ston par mdzad cing rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i skye bo la lam gsum gyi byang grol dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye ba rnyed par

135a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis kyang brjod par yang ga la nus/ gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sgrub pa bsdus pa dang / so so ba ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas pa'i chos

136b1(rgyud 'bum): l a sogs pa rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang yin pa der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bskul ba'i 'od zer des rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bskul bas sgrub pa 'di lta ste
