157b7(rgyud 'bum): grub kyi zhing gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rmi lam du mthong ba bston pa la mkhas pa nyid dang / ser sna dang / gnyid dang / rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral bar byed cing / rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la sangs rgyas
158a1(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa las dang / mdor bsdus na dge ba'i rtsa ba la ngoms mi shes pa'i go cha bgos te bgegs thams cad rab tu sel bar 'dod
158a2(rgyud 'bum): pa las dang / byang chub kyi rgyud gnon par byed pa dang / longs spyod chen po dang / dbang che bar grags pa bdag nyid so sor 'dod pa dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la yang dag par 'grogs pa dang /
158a3(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang yang dag par 'grogs par byed pa ste/ chos brgyad po 'di ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub la yang dag par
158a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / grogs po dag mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing / dkon mchog gsum la lhag par mos la mchog tu tshul khrims 'chal pa la'ang skyo ba med pa'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par
158a5(rgyud 'bum): brtson pas nga'i sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ de las gzhan du rtogs par bya ba ma yin no//
158a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du gyur pas nyams sad pa'i rgyur yang bsgrub par bya ba yin no// de nas yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang
158a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams tshig 'di skad du rjod par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i
158b1(rgyud 'bum): don gyi bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i chos ston cing legs par bstan pa ni legs so legs so/ / e ma byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos ston pa'i rjes
158b2(rgyud 'bum): su 'jug par byed pa gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dge ba legs par gsungs so/ / rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang / g.yul du'ang
158b3(rgyud 'bum): thog mar glang po che'i steng du 'jog par 'gyur ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod par 'gyur ba de la bdag cag mtshungs par brtag par bgyi/ phyir
158b4(rgyud 'bum): rgol ba dang dgra bo dag dbang du bgyi/ pha rol gyi dmag dpung dag 'jig cing bzlog par bgyi/ glegs bam du bris nas rang gi khyim du 'jog par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am
158b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po 'am/ rgyal mo chen mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma de la bsrung ba chen po dang / longs spyod chen po dang / tshe ring por 'gyur ba dang / nad
158b6(rgyud 'bum): med pa dang / rtag tu longs spyod 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o// de skad smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur to// theg pa chen po'i rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa nges
158b7(rgyud 'bum): par bstan pa las/ ral pa gyon brjes kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u rab 'byam las/ bcom ldan 'dam 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog
159a1(rgyud 'bum): pa las 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang ba'o/ / // de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
159a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
159a3(rgyud 'bum): phyug snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kun nas
159a4(rgyud 'bum): snang bar byas nas/ sngar nyid du 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po kun tu snang bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ dag pa'i
159a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig la rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byams kyi spyod pa sgrub pa// sems can thams cad dang thun
159a6(rgyud 'bum): mong du gyur pa/ khyod kyi sngags kyi tshogs gang du sems can rnams yang dag par rjes su zhugs nas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yang dag par thob pa dang
159a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa khyod smros shig smros shig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog tu gsang ba'i
159b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud gsungs pa/ rig sngags thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par ston par byed cing lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor
159b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi dkyil 'khor la ston par byed cing / sor mo'i rtse mo der rig pa'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nges par phyung ste/ phyung nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de snang
159b3(rgyud 'bum): ba chen pos kun tu snang bar byas nas gnas par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i snying po las thams
159b4(rgyud 'bum): cad pa dpa' bo gcig pa spyan drangs pa dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / mngon spyod can dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa
159b5(rgyud 'bum): dang rkang pa rab tu rgyu ba dang / dgug pa dang / rnam par sdang ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / mar me thams cad rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis rab tu sbyin par byed de/ mdor na ji ltar
159b6(rgyud 'bum): / sbyar ba de bzhin de lta de ltar bsgrub par bya bzhin pa ni yi ge gsum zhes bya ba brtson 'grus chen pos don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'o// de gang zhe na/ oM AHhUM/ 'di ni khro bo
159b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po de'i snying po las thams cad pa ste/ dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / gsang sngags thams cad spyod pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nges par bstan te bgegs thams cad
160a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig par byed pa'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag g.yas pa bteg nas khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces kyang smras so/
160a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ gang la la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas
160a3(rgyud 'bum): shing mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po de bskor nas btang bar gyur to// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang ma thag tu
160a4(rgyud 'bum): t hams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas skad cig tsam gyis gdug sems can gyi sems can rdzu 'phrul chen po de rnams tshar bcad cing bkug nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dag pa'i
160a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can la yang dag par bcug ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par byas nas/ sems can gdug pa rnams kyi spyi bor kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs par gyur nasaganas par gyur to//
160a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas sems can khyed cag thams cad nyon cig/ gang yang nga'i dam tshig 'di
160a7(rgyud 'bum): las 'da' bar byed pa de la khro bo'i rgyal pos tshar gcod par 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rig sngags dang gsang sngags
160b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi don gyi tshig gsang chen ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa 'chad par byed do/ / de legs par nyon la legs par yid la zung zhig dang
160b2(rgyud 'bum): ngas bshad do/ / mamo rat+na tra lA ya/ na mo a mi tA d+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+tha te/ samya ka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki tre shwa rAya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ nA mo b+ha ga bat+taM/ Ar+ya thA R+sha ya~M
160b3(rgyud 'bum): bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ri dzu ka d+harma nar+yA twe/ tA re tut+tA re/ shAn+ta d+harma nir+Ya te/ tA re a na b+hi lA pya d+harma nir+ya te tut+tA re tu re hi ni/ trA sa ni/ bi tA sa ni/ o ha ni/ mo ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/
160b4(rgyud 'bum): stam+b+ha ni/ pra b+he/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he hi li hi li/ bi le bi le/ be ga gA mi ni/ kuN+Di ma hA kuN+Di/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha na paM ti/ tA re hu ru hu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ a haM yAM yAM/ tsin+ta lA mi/ tsit+ti taM me ku ru swAhA/ grog po
160b5(rgyud 'bum): dag 'di ni nga'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rig sngags las thams cad byed ma/ srid pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod ma/ ngan 'gro thams cad zlog par byed pa ma'o// phyag rgya'ang 'dir
160b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i rig sngags shes rnam par grags pa de la rab tu sbyar bar 'gyur ro/ / 'dir mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa/ zhi ba thams cad byed pa/ sangs rgyas
160b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ rang nyid nga'i grogs po byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mchog tu gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi ngo bo'i nye bar gnas pa/ bsam pa
161a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ gang dang gang dran pa nyid kyis las thams cad mthar byed pa/ 'jigs pa chen po rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed pa ste/ bzlas pas lta smos kyang
161a2(rgyud 'bum): cidagos/ de gang zhe na/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re swA hA/ phyag rgya'ang 'dir ut+pal zhes kyang rnam par grags pa longs spyod thams cad
161a3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o/ / 'dir nye ba'i snying por gyur pa'ang mchog tu dpal dang ldan pa'i dag byed chen po ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM ku ru kul+le swA hA/
161a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'ang 'dir pad+ma'i 'phreng ba zhes rnam par grags par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed ma'o// 'dir mchog gi snying por gyur pa'ang / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ oM gI/ 'di ni snying po'i
161a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog ste/ mdor bsdu na bya ba thams cad la yon tan chen po rgyas pa ste/ yon tan mur thug pa mthar thug par brjod par ni dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang mi nus so// phyag rgya'ang
161a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dir brtson 'grus chen po zhes rnam par grags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ / 'dir spyan drang ba'i rig sngags su gyur pa'ang / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ oM he he b+ha ga ba ti
161a7(rgyud 'bum): bi shwa rU pi Ni sa rbab la/ thA Shi ta/ tha bo ti na A yA ni/ b+ha ga ba ti/ gI Da ut+pa la d+hi ni/ ma ma shud+d+hA ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ sa pra ti hata/ shA sa na hU~M/ mA bi lam+ba ku ru ku ru
161b1(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma spyan drang ba'i rig sngags te/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang /
161b2(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sha za dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad
161b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi'ang yin no/ / tsan dan gyi tshul lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te phyogs bzhi dang / de bzhin du steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams cad du gtor bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
161b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi'ang gsang sngags 'di yin te/ 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad dang /
161b5(rgyud 'bum): / sems can thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hU ma bA si ni ma mA rtsi Sha hUM/ tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ bdug pa'i rig
161b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags te/ tsan dan dang / gur kum dang / ga pur gcig tu byas nas bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad byon pa rnam
161b7(rgyud 'bum): spos kyi bdug pas yid tshim nas khug par 'gyur ro/ / 'dir phyag rgyar gyur pa'ang pad+ma'i 'phreng ba zhes grags pa sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed cing zhi ba ste/ spyan drang ba'i rig sngags
162a1(rgyud 'bum): la'ang phyag rgya pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bzang po 'di nyid do/ / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad byon pa la'ang mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/
162a2(rgyud 'bum): ga pur dang / tsan dan dang / gur kum chu dang sbyar nas dzA ti'i me tog dang / mA li ka gsar pa dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / pun nA ka dang / ba ku la dang / rgya spos rnams te/ 'di dag gang
162a3(rgyud 'bum): yang rung ba'i me tog gam/ dus ji lta ba'i me tog gam/ dri bzang po'i me tog rnams dang bsres nas sngags 'dis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/
162a4(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ he he ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bi shwa rU pa d+hA ra Ni ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha de ba tA d+hiSh+ThA na/ ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a nu kaM pa ka/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ am+ba ri
162a5(rgyud 'bum): bi tsA ri Ni swA hA/ phyag rgya 'dir gang ba zhes grag+na te sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug cing brtan pa'o// 'dir dri'i rig sngags su 'gyur ba'ang / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ na maHsa man+ta gan+d+ha ab
162a6(rgyud 'bum): b+hU Shi ta shri yi ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ gan+d+he gan+d+he hA de gan+d+ha ma nor me pra tIts+tsha pra tIts+tshe daM gan+d+ha sa ma tA mutsA ri Ni swA hA/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba'ang lo ma zhes bya ba bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
162a7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'o/ / 'dir me tog go rig sngags su gyur pa'ang / na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ na maHsaM ku su mi ta rA dz+nyA s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku su me ku su me/
162b1(rgyud 'bum): ku su mA d+ho ku su mA sU ra bA si/ ku su mA pa ti swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyis sngar bshad pa'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o// rmad byung bsam mi khyab pa'i sku/ sangs rgyas sku la phyag
162b2(rgyud 'bum): / byas nas/ yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i// gtor ma'i rig sngags rab 'chad byed// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA/ tad+ya thA/ he he ga b+ha ga ba ti
162b3(rgyud 'bum): ma hA sa twe sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ki te/ mA bi lam+ba i daM ba liM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM hUM hUM sarba ra ra Ta phaT swA hA/ lha bshos kyang 'dis dbul bar bya ste/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor mar 'gyur
162b4(rgyud 'bum): / ro// 'dir yang phyag rgya ni dbyug pa ste/ gdug pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'o// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a pra tiha ta shA sa nA nAM/ sarba ta mo an+d+ra kA ra bi t+yaM si twA nAM/ na maHsa man+ta
162b5(rgyud 'bum): dz+yo ti gan+d+ha a ba b+hA sa pri yA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga bAn dz+yo te rasmi sha ta sa ha sra/ br-i ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ bi kurba bi kurba ma hA bo d+hi satwa man+ta dz+wa lo d+yo ta mur+t+ti/ khur+ha khur+tha/ a nga?
162b6(rgyud 'bum): lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya/ maN+Da laM sarba satwA nAM swA hA/ mar me'i rig sngags te/ 'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o// phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes bya ba sems can thams cad rnam par snang bar byed pa'o//
162b7(rgyud 'bum): namaHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sanA nA~M/ d+ya thA/ dz+wal dz+wa la/ dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya hUM bi bo d+ha ka pa gr-iSh+Na bing+ga swA hA/ me'i bya ba byed pa'i rig sngags su 'gyur ro// 'dir yang phyag rgyan
163a1(rgyud 'bum): kha sbyor zhes par 'jig rten grags/ / sems can kun 'od kyis gsal byed// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang // thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs pa'o// de nas yang
163a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngags kyi tshig 'di ni gsang chen dang bcas shing
163a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gsang ba yin te/ bu khyod la phan drag po'i mtha'// mi bzad pa yi rigs su grags// sngags rnams thams cad gang kho na// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya'o// spyi ba'i gdu
163a4(rgyud 'bum): buzhes grags pa/ / rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang // de ni nges par gzhig don du// rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/
163a5(rgyud 'bum): ma ma kar+yaM dzam+b+ha/ dzam+b+ha/ sarba da ha da ha/ sarba badz+ra bi nA shA ka/ mUr+d+ha DA ka dzI ban+taM ta ka rA ma hA bi tri ta rU bi ne pa tsa pa tsa sarba duSh+Nu ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI ban+d+ha ta ka ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ sarba gra hA/ Sha Da mu kha
163a6(rgyud 'bum): / ShaDa b+hu dza Sha Ta tsa ra Na ru tra mA na ya/ biSh+Nu ma na ya/ brah+ma t+yaM de ba na na ya mA bi lam+ba mA bi lam+ba b+hU She hrIHmaN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya sa ya ma nu sma ra hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni mchog tu
163a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba brtson 'grus chen po sgrol ma'i yan lag zhal drug pa zhes bya ba khro bo'i rgyal po chen po thams cad rnam par 'joms pa po ste/ 'di bklags pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas
163b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na/ ma rungs pa'i bgegs rnams lta ci smos/ 'di bklags pa tsam gyis srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'dir phyag rgya'ang rigs chen po zhes bya/
163b2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur te/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyi snying po ni/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA na na hUM sarba sha trUM stam+b+ha ya phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'dis dgra thams cad
163b3(rgyud 'bum): la gzer chen po'i nad dang / yang na rims nyin bzhi pas zin par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas pas ji srid snang bar byams pa nyid du mi 'gyur/ yang na snying rje'i sems 'thob par mi 'gyur te/ bzlas pa
163b4(rgyud 'bum): zin gyi bar du grol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro/ / dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa la bya'i/ zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan la ma yin no// phyag rgya mdung chen po'ang sbyar bar bya'o// 'dir
163b5(rgyud 'bum): nye ba'i snying por gyur pa'ang / oM hrIHka la rU paM hUM khaM swA hA/ snga ma'i mdung chen po'ang sbyar bar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro// mchog gi snying po sangs rgyas thams
163b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba ni/ hUM/ 'di ni las thams cad byed pa ste/ phyag rgya mdung chen po'ang sbyar bar bya'o// phung krol thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad
163b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byed pa ste/ mdor na khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas pas grub pa'i dus su'ang khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gshegs su
164a1(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba'i sngags su gyur pa'ang / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya/ su dzA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rU pi Ni/ gats+tsha gats+tsha swa b+hA ba naM/
164a2(rgyud 'bum): sarba bud+d+haM swa bi sardza ya/ sa pa rI bA rAM/ swa b+hA ba nAM tsA nu/ pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ sarba r+tha swa me sid+h+yaM tu/ bi d+h+ya sa dA/ ma nor thaM tsa me pa ri pU ra ya sA hA/ 'di ni gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/
164a3(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// phyag rgya bzang po'i gdan zhes grags pa ste/ 'dis gdan yang sbyin par bya'o// yid kyis lan bdun bzlas pas thams cad gshegs su gsol lo// 'jig
164a4(rgyud 'bum): rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang / sngags rnams nyid la'ang sngags kyi dngos grub dang / dam tshig dang / bzlas pa dang / dus dang / nges par sdom pa rnams la'ang
164a5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ / de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams la kun tu gzigs te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la rang gi rig pa'i tsho gas sngags kyi le'u rab
164a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byam gsungs par gyur to/ / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta ga tI nAM/ oM ni Ti swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa'i sgra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad pa ste/ dam tshig chen
164a7(rgyud 'bum): bo'i phyag rgya'i snying po dug gi las thams cad la kun tu sbyar ro/ / na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM nai Ti/ 'di ni nye bar spyod pa'i sgra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad pa
164b1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes pa gza'i las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM ni/ rig pa 'di ni sdong bu can zhes bya ba spyod pa'i dge ba'i las thams cad
164b2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa ste/ phyag rgya ni bzang po'i gdan gyis gnod sbyin mo rnams dgug par bya ba la sbyar ro// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+d+rAd+hA ta rU pa NAM/ oM Sh+T+r-i swA hA/ mkha' 'gro ma kun 'joms pa yi/ phyag rgya
164b3(rgyud 'bum): sbubs can yang dag sbyar/ / byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yi// rig sngags thod pa can zhes bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi pad+ma nyid// rab bsngags lha yi gzugs can ma// na maHsa man+ta puH
164b4(rgyud 'bum): / nAMnArAr a pra ta ha ta ga ti/ tsA ra NaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba ra de swA hA/ phyag rgya ut+pal nyid ni// dpal gyi bdag nyid spyan la sbyar// gzugs mang 'chang ba'i lha mo ni// myur du longs spyod rab sgrub pa'o// na maH
164b5(rgyud 'bum): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a tsin+d+rad+hA tA rU pa~M Ni/ oM su ri swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung dang yang dag ldan// rims rnams thams cad rnam 'joms pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA a tsin+d+rad+g+ha ta rA dzi dz+dza/ oM r+g+ha
164b6(rgyud 'bum): re swA hA/ bsam pa'o sgrol ma ldan pa zhes// rab bsngags las rnams thams cad pa// dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// bgegs rnams 'joms byed ma la sbyor// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/
164b7(rgyud 'bum): a tsin+nad+h+yA ta rU pi NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi lo ki ni swA hA/ rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba// 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed// bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa// pad+ma'i phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// na maH
165a1(rgyud 'bum): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+nad+b+hu ta rU bi NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi shwe/ bi shA saM b+ha be bi shwa rU pi NAM ka ha ka ha A bi sha a bi sha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ru ru tiSh+Tha swA hA/ rig pa brtson 'grus chen
165a2(rgyud 'bum): mo ni/ / 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa ste// snying po phyag rgya mnyam pa nyid// sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dge/ 'byung po kun la mchog sbyin ma// sna tshogs zhes bya yang dag bsgrag//
165a3(rgyud 'bum): na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+nad+b+ha ta rU bi NAM/ tad+ya thA/ au shwa te prA ba su swA hA/ pad+ma'i gdan gyis rnam pa ra dgod// las rnams thams cad byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha
165a4(rgyud 'bum): ta gA ti prA hi ri NaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM shrIH/ rig pa 'di ni dpal mo che// 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste// phyag rgya kha sbyor ldan pa yi// rgyal sring chen po rab sbyin byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/
165a5(rgyud 'bum): sarba satwa b+hab+hA ya pra dA yi kA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a dzi te ku ma ra rU pi NI/ e hi A gats+tsha ma ma kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA/ mi thub ma zhes rnam grags ma// gzhon nu bdud rtsi las 'byung ba// gang ba'i phyag rgyar
165a6(rgyud 'bum): / ldan pa yis/ dgra rnams thams cad zlog par byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ i tsin+nad+hA ta rU pi NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza yai swA hA/ bi dza ye swA hA/ a dzi te sA hA/ sring mo bzhi zhes rnam grags pa/
165a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i rjes 'gro ba// sa rnams mtha' dag yongs rgyu zhing // sems can rjes su 'dzin byed pa// ming po tum bu ru zhes grags// 'di rnams kyi ni rjes su spong // gru yi bzhon pa
165b1(rgyud 'bum): mnyam zhon nas/ / rgya mtsho la ni nges par gnas// khu tshur phyag rgyas rnam par dgod// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ lo kA krA d+hi pa tI nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku ma rim
165b2(rgyud 'bum): hA ku mA ri krI Da krI Da/ ma hA rAk+Sha si bo d+hi satwA nu dz+nyA ta ma yU ra sa ne sA sha/ sa ra shwA sA ni rak+taM gI rak+ShAM gan+d+ha nu le ba na pri yi pri ye/ kha kha khA hi khA hi hU~M na~M t+ya rak+Sha pud+d+ha rtsi ta mU rti sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma
165b3(rgyud 'bum): b+hU ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ hu lu hu lu mA bi lam+ba/ sarba karmA Ni me ku ru ku ru/ bi tsi tra rU pa d+hA ri Ni/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ hUM hUM sarba/ bud+d+hA nu dz+nyA te swA hA/ sems can rjes su 'dzin byed pa'i// byang chub
165b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpas bshad pa na/ / sa rnams ma lus kun nas ni// rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// sems can kun la phan don dang // gdug pa'i sems can zlog byed pa// bdag gi rig pa rtag tu grags
165b5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu srung bar yongs su grags/ / srung ba ltos 'gro de nyid kyi// 'jig rten mtshan mas legs par mtshan// snying rjes thugs ni brlan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' de nas gsungs// byang chub sems
165b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bdag nyid che/ / byis pa rnams la phan don du// gang las sems can spyod gsungs pa// 'gro ba rnams la rnam spyod ldan// phyag rgya dbyug pa'i srog shing ldan// bdag nyid chen pos sbyar nas ni// tshang
165b7(rgyud 'bum): ba la sogs 'gugs byed na/ / mi rnams 'bras bu smos ci dgos// gzhon nu'i sems su ma lus pa'i// rtog pa 'di ni bsdus nas su// srin po rnams su rnam grags pa'i// rig sngag 'di ni yang dag
166a1(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ / sems can rjes gzung 'dod pa yi// byang chub sems dpas de ltar bshad// yig gsum zhes bya'i snying po ni// rig sngags 'di ni yang dag bshad// sems can kun la
166a2(rgyud 'bum): phan don du/ / nye bar longs spyod 'gugs pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya dbyug pa'i srog shing ni// rnam bkod las rnams thams cad pa'o// oM hUM dzaH/ rig sngags 'di ni mdor bsdus nas// mi rnams 'bras bu byed pa yin/
166a3(rgyud 'bum): namaHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sa man+to d+yo ti ta mAn+t+ri nAM/ aM ba~M kr-i ta gra ha hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po 'di yang ni// phyag rgya dgra sta yang dag ldan// de bzhin 'byung po 'gugs par byed// de bzhin gza' dang ma mor
166a4(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / thams cad phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa// bkod na 'bras bu bcas par 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni rnam skrag byed// gdug pa zhugs pa rnam par grol// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags
166a5(rgyud 'bum): ma sgrol ma'i pho nya mo chen mo las thams cad pa ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba rjes su spyod pa las thams cad pa ste/ bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed do// 'byung po thams cad skrag par byed pa dang /
166a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad rdzogs par byed do// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bra h+ma su pra h+ma bra h+ma/
166a7(rgyud 'bum): brtsa se shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po ste// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin// 'byung po zhes pa rab tu 'thob// skad gcig nyid la bsil bar 'gyur// phyag rgya pad+ma yang
166b1(rgyud 'bum): dag ldan/ / myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur// mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams la// srid srung gi ni rig byed 'dod// 'di ni mdor bsdus brjod pa ste// cho ga 'di ni mdor bsdus pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/
166b2(rgyud 'bum): a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga ru Da ba ha na tsakra pA Ni tsa tur b+hu dza hUM hUM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ bo d+hi satwa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal bas// / zhi ba'i don ni myur du
166b3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ 'byung po rnams ni rnam 'jig byed// khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus can yin// phyag rgya'i 'khor lor yang dag ldan// brtan pa'i don ni myur du byed// gang 'di khyab 'jug rgyud du ni// cho ga rgyas
166b4(rgyud 'bum): par bstan pa de/ / sems can kun gyi sgrub byed do// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA ma he/ shwa ra b+hu tA d+hi pa ti br-i Sha b+ha/ d+ha dza
166b5(rgyud 'bum): pra lam+ba dza TA mu ku Ta d+hA ri NI/ sau ta b+hasma trA sa ra ta/ mUrti sa aM phaT phaT bo d+hi satwA A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// sngags 'di bdag gis rab tu brjod// mdung gi phyag
166b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya mnyam par ldan/ / 'byung po thams cad rnam 'jig pa// 'di yang sngar bstan cho ga 'di// sems can sa steng gnas pa la// sngon ni zhi ba'i rgyud du bstan// yon tan sna tshogs rgya che ba// zhi ba'i
166b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyis kyang rjod do/ / na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra tig ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM sha ku na pi ta ta bik+Sha Na/ sha ka kha kha/ khA hi khA hi hi sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra hUM tiSh+Tha bo b+hi satwa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA
167a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di brtson 'grus chen po ste/ / nam mkha' lding zhes rnam par grags// gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog/ gdengs ka can gyi dug rnams 'joms// phyag rgya che dang
167a2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ / phung krol mi bzad bcas pa 'joms// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dug rnams ni// gso bar byed par the tshom med// gdul bya'i sems can la brtse bas// byang chub sems dpa'i yang
167a3(rgyud 'bum): dag bka'/ / nam mkha' lding gi gzugs kyis sprod// 'dab chags rgyal po 'od chen ldan// ji srid nam mkha' lding rgyud du// bstan pa'i cho ga rgyas de rnams// sems can kun la phan pa'i rgyur// bdag
167a4(rgyud 'bum): gis kyang ni brjod pa yin/ / mkha' lding mngon par brjod rgyud du// khro bo'i rgyal po ma bstan na// gdengs can dug ni gzhom pa'i phyir// 'dab chags gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu// ji srid 'jig rten pa yi sngag/
167a5(rgyud 'bum): de rnams cho ga dper brjod pa// gdul bya'i sems can don du ni// de lta de ltar rnam par spyod// gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang // rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang // de rnams cho ga rab 'byam 'dir// snga ma
167a6(rgyud 'bum): kho nar gsungs pa yin/ / ji ltar ma ma rnams mang po// byis pa 'bad pas srung byed po// de bzhin byis mtha'i blo can la// nga ni rig sngags gzugs kyi rgyu// stobs bcu ldan pas sngon gsungs pa// da lta'
167a7(rgyud 'bum): ngayis bstan pa yin/ / sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa// rtogs pas rab gsungs 'od chen po// rgyal ba mchog gis gang gsungs dang // stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras kyis gsungs// rmad byung bsam mi khyab
167b1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can/ / spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang // 'khor gyi
167b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po de la kun tu gzigs nas/ dam tshig thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// gang du ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas sems can ma lus
167b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sgrub pa'i spyod pa'i yid sems can thams cad la rab tu gnas par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po gnas
167b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bkra ba'i phyag na rin po che'i snying po rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang
167b5(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sa bcu dang ldan pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug pa gnas pa rnams kyis kyang dkyil 'khor de bri ba'am 'drir 'jug par mi nus na/ so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci
167b6(rgyud 'bum): dgos/ 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i gnas skabs la gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / rang
167b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpalas bcu la rab tu gnas pa rgya kha tshab tu mngon par dbang bskur zhing dam tshig thob pa thams cad dang
168a1(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sems can thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas dang
168a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu 'thun pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyis thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to//
168a3(rgyud 'bum): so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de yid kyis dmigs par mi nus na/ bri ba 'am 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/
168a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig la rjes su rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag nyon cig/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang
168a5(rgyud 'bum): 'da' bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig yin na/ sems can rnams dang / 'phags pa gzhan rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos/ phyag na rdo rje gsang ba pa'i bdag
168a6(rgyud 'bum): po la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras mi las 'das pa'i dam tshig yid las byung ba ni nges par bstan to// mi rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang gang du sems can rnams
168a7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rjes su zhugs nas/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig pa dang sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na
168b1(rgyud 'bum): rdorjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gang da lta dus la bab par shes na gsungs shig gsungs shig/ shAkya seng ge
168b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mgon/ / yongs su mya ngan 'das pa na// mi rnams mchog gi sangs rgyas zhing // sems can sa stengs khyod dkyil 'khor// mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig rten na// sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu skye//
168b3(rgyud 'bum): mi shes cho ga nyams pa'am// dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na// tshangs pa bdag nyid chen pos kyang // rig sngags dngos grub mi 'gyur ro// sngags la mngon par mi brtson dang // dam tshig bstan pa ma mthong na// rnam
168b4(rgyud 'bum): pa du mar 'bad byas kyang / / rig pa'i dngos grub mi 'gyur ro// dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa na// brgya byin gyis kyang rab 'bad las// rig pa'i dngos grub mi 'gyur na// sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos// dam
168b5(rgyud 'bum): tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes/ / spyod pa'i las rnams sgrub pa de// 'jig rten pa dang 'phags pa'i sngags// bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du// rab zhugs las rnam
168b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed/ / byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pa la// de yi rig pa'i dngos grub rtag/ de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes// sems dpa' chen po de la gsol ba btab par gyur to// kye kye sems
168b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mdor bsdus pas gsungs shig ces so/ / gsang ba'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag baspyan
169a1(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs so/ / dang po re zhig cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam/ nag pa can nam/ sa gcan gyi zla ba'i dkar
169a2(rgyud 'bum): po'i phyogs la rab tu bsngags pa'i nyi ma dang gza' bzang po bltas te/ rgyu skar dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig dang / zla ba nya ba 'am/ dus gzhan la dbyar gyi zla ba
169a3(rgyud 'bum): spangs te/ snga dros rab tu gnas par bya'o// grong khyer chen po la brten pa 'am/ gang du dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid gnas par te/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'am/ chu klung la brten pa 'am/ rgya
169a4(rgyud 'bum): mtsho'i ngogs dang nye bar grong khyer chen po'i byang shar gyi phyogs kyi char ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song nas/ nyi ma bdun nam/ zla ba phyed du mtha' gcig
169a5(rgyud 'bum): tu smyung ba 'am/ nye bar byas nas so sor gnas par bya'o// gang gnas de rnams su'ang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / thal ba dang / sol ba dang / phub ma dang / thod pa dang / rus
169a6(rgyud 'bum): pa gnas pa dang bral ba/ shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sa phyogs su srog chags med pa'i tshul ba byung lnga dang bsres pa'i tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur kum gyi chus khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol
169a7(rgyud 'bum): mas non pa stong phrag brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags pa des bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po dang yang dag par ldan pas/ sa phyogs de la phyogs bzhi rnams su mngon par gtor zhing
169b1(rgyud 'bum): steng dang / 'og dang / zad ka dang / phyogs bral rnams su'ang kun nas gtor bar bya'o// de nas sa phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam/ khru bcu gnyis sam/ khru brgyad bya ste/
169b2(rgyud 'bum): de la chen po ni khru bcu drug go// bar ma ni khru bcu gnyis so// chung ngu ni khru brgyad do// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum po 'di// thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yin// rgyal srid 'dod phyir chen po ste/
169b3(rgyud 'bum): bar ma longs spyod 'phel bar byed// chung ngu sngags kyi dam tshig ni// las rnams kun byed zhi ba yin// de la yid la 'dod pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// de la sa'i phyogs der khru gnyis tsam
169b4(rgyud 'bum): brkos la/ der rdo ba dang / sol ba dang / thal ba dang / rus pa dang / sgra la sogs pa dang / srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pa gal te mthong na sa'i phyogs gzhan du brko bar bya'o// gnod pa med pa dang / 1
169b5(rgyud 'bum): pabar 'tshe ba med pa der 'gyur ro/ / ri'i rtse mo dang / chu klung gi ngogs dang / rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung chen po'i chu ngogs rnams su'ang gang rab tu 'bad pa chen pos shin tu so sor brtags te shin tu btsang zhing srog chag
169b6(rgyud 'bum): med par byas nas bri bar bya'o/ / sa'i phyogs der slar yang srog chags med pa'i tshul ba'i rnam lnga bsres pas chu klung gi 'gram gyis gtsang ma 'am/ grog mkhar gyi sa gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar
169b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas mnyam par byas la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum bya'o// seng ldeng gi pur bu bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis lan bdun mngon
170a1(rgyud 'bum): par bsngags par byas nas phyogs pani rnams su gdab par bya'o/ / tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro zar snying pos lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas kun nas dkyil 'khor
170a2(rgyud 'bum): gru bzhi pa'i rnam pas dkri bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas su nang du'ang zur bzhi'i rnam par bya'o// dbus kyi nang na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyisarba pa'i sa pa 'am/ rtsa ba'i snying po stong phrag
170a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ / phyag rgya chen po dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug tor bcings te khro bo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs bsrungs nas bdag nyid bsrungs par byas te/ bzlas pa byed bzhin du phyi rol du byung ste/

170b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams su theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i glegs bam bklag par bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin nu
170b4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su'o/ / 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa byang phyogs su'o// 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa shar phyogs su'o// de ltar glegs pam klog pa po med na mdo sde bzhi po lhag par rtogs pa'i gang zab

171b6(rgyud 'bum): na chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa kun tu bri'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis kun tu bris nas rjes su sgrub pa pos bdag nyid bsrung ba'i cho ga dang rig pa byas nas/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/

172a1(rgyud 'bum): dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ / de nas ku sha'i khres pa nye bar 'dug ste/ de nyid du bzlas pa byed cing de nyid du gnas par bya'o// yungs kar dkar po la khro bo

172a5(rgyud 'bum): no/ brgya byin yang myur du 'chin gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i mi 'am/ bgegs tha mal pa gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khro bo sgrol mas non pa'i 'jigs pas phan tshun du 'bros shing nges par rlag par

172b2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma bsnams nas g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o/ / de'i yang g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa pad+ma'i

174b6(rgyud 'bum): brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i

175a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon du gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri ste/ kun nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'o// de'i yang g.yon du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi sku rin po che'i ri la nye bar bzhugs
175a3(rgyud 'bum): pa chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ bai DUr+ya sngon po dang / mar gang dang / pad+ma rA ga rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'bar ba'i 'od 'byin pa/ kun nas kun tu 'od gsal ba bri'o// de'i yang g.yon du rgyal ba'i gtsu
175a4(rgyud 'bum): tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa kun tu bri'o/ / de'i yang g.yon du chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba dang ldan pa bri'o// de'i yang g.yon du ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang 'phreng dang /
175a5(rgyud 'bum): bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o// sgo'i gnas su rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis ka nas kun nas 'bar ba dri'o// bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu phyag rgya chen po dbyug pa can dang / uH
175a6(rgyud 'bum): la'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'di dag phan tshun ma 'byar bar kun tu bri'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa kun tu bris pa'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de'ang tshon sna lngas 'bar ba/ rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/
175a7(rgyud 'bum): zur bzhis rnam par mdzes pa/ rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhir ro// nang gi dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste/ gdong bzhi pa/
175b1(rgyud 'bum): gos dkar po bgos pa/ spyod g.yogs gos dkar po can/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ gser gyi mdog ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ g.yon na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs thogs pa/ phyag na
175b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'o/ / de'i yang g.yas su 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ lus dar la'i gos bgos pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ bzhin rab tu zhi ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar
175b3(rgyud 'bum): po can/ skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/ phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pa'o// de'i yang g.yas su 'og min pa'i lha'i bu bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i lus/
175b4(rgyud 'bum): sems bsam gtan la gnas pa/ dar la'i gos kyi bgo ba bgos pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar
175b5(rgyud 'bum): po can no/ / de'i rim pas dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'thab bral dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams bri bar bya ste/ go rims ji
175b6(rgyud 'bum): lta ba bzhin dang / cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin no// brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris te/ rtag myos dang / 'phreng thogs dang / lag na gnong thogs dang / bi wang gnyis pa dang /
175b7(rgyud 'bum): sa bla ba'i lha'i bu rnams go rims ji lta ba dang / cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / gya nom snang dang / dge chung dang
176a1(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs dang / de bzhin du yang byang gi phyogs su'ang ngo // nub
176a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyogs su de rnams kyi 'og tu 'phreng gnyis la brten nas bri bar bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur te/ phyogs bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go rims bzhin du
176a3(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ / byang phyogs su 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos su nor sbyin gter dang nye bar gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ cod pan cung zad bcom pa/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can no// de'i
176a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yas su nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dag bri'o// de bzhin du rim gyis gnod sbyin ma chen mo 'phrog ma bri ste/ gzhon nu dga' byed pang na 'dug pa/ dkyil 'khor la nges
176a5(rgyud 'bum): par rtog bzhin pa bri'o/ / lngas rtsen dmar ser 'jigs su rung ba'ang bri ste/ de rnams kyi nye logs su gnod sbyin rnams kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du rim gyis nub kyi phyogs su chu lha lag na zhags pa thogs
176a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / klu dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du 'phreng gnyis pa la brten nas go rims bzhin du gnod sbyin dang /
176a7(rgyud 'bum): srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / drang srong dang / grub pa dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / sman dang /
176b1(rgyud 'bum): nor bu rin po che'i byed brag dang / ri bo dang / chu bo dang / gling rnams go rims bzhin du gtso bor grags pa dang / mchog tu gtso bo thams cad kyang bri bar bya'o// lho phyogs su gshin rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas
176b2(rgyud 'bum): pa bri bar bya'o/ / shar lho'i phyogs su me lha kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrug pa/ dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang 'phreng lag na thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ gos dkar po bgos
176b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ gser gyi mdog thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/ sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang / mtshon cha dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs dang / kha dog
176b4(rgyud 'bum): de'ang 'phreng gnyis pa la brten nas bri bar bya'o/ / thams cad nas 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dka' bzlog gi bdag po khyu mchog la zhan pa/ lag na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa'o// lha mo dkar
176b5(rgyud 'bum): bzlog ma'ang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ / smin drug gi bu'ang rma bya la zhon pa/ lag na mdung thung thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ gdong drug pa/ lus dmar por snang ba/ gos ser po
176b6(rgyud 'bum): bgos shing stod g.yogs gos ser po can/ phyag g.yon pas dril bu thogs nas ba dan dmar po thogs pa'o// go rims bzhin du b+h+r-i gi ri Ti shin tu rid pa'i rnam pa dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang /
176b7(rgyud 'bum): dga' byed dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po dang / ma mo bdun po rgyan dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bri'o// nor lha brgyad dang / drang srong bdun dang / khyab 'jug phyag bzhi pa/
177a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag na 'khor lo dang / be con dang / dung dang / ral gri thogs pa/ nam mkha' lding gi bzhon pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// gza' brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa
177a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun dang / gang sa stengs kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu rgyu ba'i nye ba'i gza' brgyad po nyid kyang bri'o// go rims bzhin du dkar po dang / nag po'i tshes bco lnga dang / khyim bcu gnyis dang / dus drug
177a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang / lo tshogs dang / sring mo bzhi gru la zhon pa dang / lnga pa ming po chu la gnas pa rnams kyang ste/ mdor na phyag rgya rnams su rnam par gzhag par bya'o// lha rnams go rims bzhin du
177a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng gnyis su bya'o/ / mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum par yang dkyil 'khor gsum pa la brten nas mngon par bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gsum po rnams su'ang gru bzhir rnam par gzhug par bya'o// 'di rnam bcom ldan 'das so//
177a5(rgyud 'bum): mdor bsdus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo ni nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni g.yas su nges par bri bar bya'o//
177a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ni g.yon du nges par bri bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la nges par bri bar bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nges par
177a7(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ / lhag ma rnams ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su nges par bri bar bya'o// 'di dag ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bar ba la'ang shar gyi phyogs su mi mjed
177b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag po tshangs pa'ang nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du lho'i phyogs su 'od gsal ba'o// 'og min dang gzugs can min pa rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ro// 'du shes med
177b2(rgyud 'bum): 'du shes med min gyi skye mched mi gsal ba'i lha rnams ni ma yin no/ / byang gi phyogs su brgya byin lha'i rgyal po dang / rab 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /
177b3(rgyud 'bum): 'od chung la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha'i rgyal po re re nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su mngon par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dkyil

177b5(rgyud 'bum): la lag na mdung thung thogs pa/ lus dmar por snang ba/ gos ser po'i stod g.yogs bgos pa/ phyag g.yas na dril bu dang ba dan dmar po bregs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can dkyil 'khor la nges par

178a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du lho'i phyogs su lang ka'i grong gi srin po'i bdag po shin tu 'jigs su rung ba ste/ der shing pi tsu ma rtal brten nas gnas pa dang / rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po zhes bya ba gnod

178a3(rgyud 'bum): zo'i rgyal po rnam par g.yeng byed ces bya ba nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o/ / lhag ma phyag rgya rnams su'ang rnam par gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs su klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang nye dga' bo nges par mngon

179a1(rgyud 'bum): kun nas 'bar ba gzhag par bya'o/ / thams cad nas mngon par bris nas steng dang / 'og dang / thad kar phyag rgya gsum phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang nye bar phye ma nyid kyis bri bar bya

179a3(rgyud 'bum): ga 'di rnams kyis/ mdor bsdus 'dir ni bstan pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dang po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ste/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / yan lag thams cad mdzes pa'i bram

179a5(rgyud 'bum): dang rgyal srid chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang / longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang / longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / bzang zhing dul la tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang /

179a7(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa dang / rang bzhin gyis chos spyod pa/ nyin dang mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ skra dri zhim pa dang khrus gsum byas pa/ mi smra bar gyur pa/ de'i nyin mo ga'ur dang /
