179b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par 'phel ba dang / khyad par du'ang tshul khrims dang ldan pas rig pa'i dngos grub nges par gnas pa'i phyir ro// de ltar sngar bzhag pa byas nas grogs bzang po dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis ga pur gyi
179b7(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa bsregs te/ rgyab kyis phyogs pa ma yin par phyi rol tu 'byung bar bya ste/ byung nas kyang ji ltar bde ba'i chu shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa/ srog chags med pa/ rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgya mngon par bzlas
180a1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab pa'i chus khrus byas nas/ nye reg brus te gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang mas me thub tu song nas/ ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ byang
180a2(rgyud 'bum): shar du mngon par phyogs pas ga pur dang gur kum tsan dan dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ / sngar brjod pa'i cho gas spyan drangs pa dang gshegs su gsol lo// slar
180a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o/ / zhugs nas bum pa gang ba brgyad gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa/ shing sa ha ka ra'i yal 'dab dang 'bras bus rnam par brgyan pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che
180a4(rgyud 'bum): dang 'bru nang du bcug pa de lta bu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la so sor dbul bar bya'o/ / gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la'o// gsum pa ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la'o// bzhi
180a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'o/ / lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'o// drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o// bdun pa dang brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor
180a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'i sgo khang du gzhag par bya ste/ gcig ni 'byung po thams cad la'o// gnyis ni sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur par yongs su bsngos nas gzhag par bya'o// de nas sngar brjod pa'i
180a7(rgyud 'bum): chog nyid kyis bdug pa bsreg cing ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas slar yang spyan drang bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub
180b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis spyan drang bar bya'o// de bzhin du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mar me dang /
180b2(rgyud 'bum): lha bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis lha bshos thams cad kyis thams cad du go rims bzhin du bya'o// mar me smos pa nyid kyis mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa thams
180b3(rgyud 'bum): cad la lha bshos smos pas/ sA lu'i zan zho dang sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa/ 'o thug khyad par can khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar ba'i mar la bcos pa'i snum 'khur gyis mya ngan med pa 'khyil ba dang / khaN+Da la sogs pa thams
180b4(rgyud 'bum): cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o/ / phyi rol gang ba dang / tsan dan gyi thang chu sgrartsi dang 'o ma/ 'o thug tu btsos pa'i bza' ba rnams rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang
180b5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / 'phags pa'i lha rnams la me tog dri zhim po rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o// la du can dang / gar+b+hat+tA ra kI khyad par dang / sngar gyi yo byad rnams lha thams cad dang / 'byung po'i
180b6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs dang / sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i cho gas dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du sna ma dang / rgya spos kyi me tog dang / pun+d+ha ga la sogs pa rnams sngar nges par bstan pa rnams sangs rgyas
180b7(rgyud 'bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha rnams thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// khyad par du de bzhin
181a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i rigs la sna ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i rigs la pad+ma dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje'i rigs la ut+pal dang / gzhan rnams la tha mal ba'i sngags kyis so// de bzhin
181a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i rigs la ga pur gyi bdug pa'o/ / pad+ma'i rigs la tsan dan no// de bzhin du gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje can nyid kyi gu gul du shes par bya'o// sngags gzhan thams cad la bdug pa tha mal pa dbul bar
181a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / 'phags pa rnams ni thams cad la// mar gyi mar med dbul bar bya// 'phags pa min pa'i sngags rnams la// dri zhim til mar dbul du gzhug/ cho ga'i go rims bzhin du ni// bdug pa mthong
181a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyu yis so/ / de bzhin kho nar brjod pa'i dri// sngags rnams kun la rtag par de'o// de bzhin gshegs la gang brjod dang // phyag na rdo rje gang brjod pa// rang rang gi ni rgyud rnams so// sngags spyod don du
181a5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa pos/ / 'dir ni cho ga blta bar bya// kun nas rjes su 'jug pa'o// zhes pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sngar cho ga mthong bas spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bdug pa la sogs pa
181a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / lha bshos rab tu dbul ba rjes su 'jug pa'i bya ba byas nas/ de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog mkhas shing skyen pas/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sha med pa thams cad rnga pa Ta ha dang /
181a7(rgyud 'bum): dung gi dga' ba'i sgra dbyangs nges par sgrogs pas/ bdug pa dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / 'phreng bas rnam par spras pa phyogs bzhi rnams dang / phyogs bral rnams dang / steng dang / 'og da/
181b1(rgyud 'bum): thad ka thams cad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor la bskor ba byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas nas slar yang zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa'i 'bras
181b2(rgyud 'bum): spusA lu dang / thug po che'i sbyin sreg rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am snying pos stong phrag brgyad bya'o// sbyin sreg byas nas kyang sngar bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems dpa' chen po la srung ba'i
181b3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga rnams byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi slob ma nyid du khas blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid kyi lus
181b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyi don du phul ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa thun mong bar gyur pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par byed pa/ dge ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi
181b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa rnams la dkyil 'khor bstan pa nyid las sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa'i skye bo rnams kyang skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas
181b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gos ma nyams pa tha ga pas btags ma thag pa/ sgra dang bral ba/ rtsa ba'i rig pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa/ dri zhim po'i tsan dan dang gur kum gyis bgos pa'i
181b7(rgyud 'bum): dar gyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyi gdong g.yogs nas/ thog ma nas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa pos rab tu 'jug par bya'o// rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'am/
182a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal rigs kyi bu 'am/ gzhan yang spro ba chen po rgyal srid chen po 'dod pa'ang rab tu gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis par gnas pa gdong g.yogs nas dri bzang po'i
182a2(rgyud 'bum): me tog tsan dan dang gur kum dag gis rnam par bsres pa byin te/ shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa'i lag pa dag gis me tog 'thor du gzhug par bya'o// gang du de'i me tog babs pa de la de'i rig pa'i
182a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags sbyin par bya'o/ / skye ba gzhan dang gzhan rnams su de nyid dang 'di rjes su 'brel ba'o zhes kun tu grags pa yin zhing / de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / byang chub kyi snying po gnon
182a4(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa dang / byang chub chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o// de nyid 'di'i bsgrub par bya ba dang / longs spyod chen po dang /
182a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal srid chen po dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag dang 'grogs pa 'di'i mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o// skye ba 'di nyid du thub pa gang dang ldan pa lhag par spyod pa las/ las rnams thams cad
182a6(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du rim gyis de lta bu la sogs pa ji srid brgyad po rnams de srid de/ gzhan rnams ni ma yin no zhes so// sgrub par 'dod pa gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sdig pa zad
182a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don du dam tshig tsam du 'gyur zhes pa'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin na/ dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha cang mi ring / ha cang mi nye ba'i byang shar gyi
182b1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyi tsha'i sa phyogs rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs shing sngags kyis dag par byas nas/ de nas rgyal po mngon par dbang bskur ba de bzhin du sems bzhin pas mtha' gcig tu sangs rgyas
182b2(rgyud 'bum): dang chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dang ba'i dad pa dang spro ba chen po dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ dkon mchog gsum la bsnyen bkur byed
182b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dbang po ma tshang ba med cing ma smad pa/ skye ba 'di nyid la rig pa dang sngags sgrub par 'dod pa/ bsam pa bzang zhing sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ dge mtshan 'dod pa'i rang bzhin
182b4(rgyud 'bum): can sad pa'i rgyur yang rig pa'i don la rnam rtog med cing / der gtad pa'i yid can de lta bu la sogs pa lnga ji srid par mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams spang bar bya'o zhes so// shes
182b5(rgyud 'bum): rab can dang spyod pa la ma rmongs pa'i khyad par las te/ gzhan rnams bsten par bya ba ma yin no// de nas rgyal po thams cad dbang bskur ba bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsogs te/ slob dpon dang
182b6(rgyud 'bum): mkhan po mnyes par bya'o/ / de nas bla re bres te rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dkar po mgo bor 'dzin bzhin pa dang / rnga yab dkar po g.yo ba bzhin pa dang / bkur sti chen pos dung dang /
182b7(rgyud 'bum): rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga'i dga' ba'i sgra nges par sgrogs pa dang / rgyal ba'i sgra dang / bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bsngags pa dang / bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rgyal bas gsungs
183a1(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod bzhin pas bskor ba dang / bkra shis de byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//
183a2(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa mngon par sgrub pa la yang dag par rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten pa thams cad las 'das pa'i gsang chen rnam
183a3(rgyud 'bum): par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang dag par rjes su 'jug pa dang / chos kyi rgyal srid thams cad kyis sangs rgyas nyid mngon par rtogs par 'dod pa dang / mdor bsdus nas brjod na sangs rgyas
183a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid 'byung ba'i phyir bdag nyid spro bar bgyi'o zhes so/ / de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste shar du mngon par phyogs pas dkyil 'khor mthong zhing rtogs pa la/ dang po re zhig rig pa'i mngon
183a5(rgyud 'bum): par dbang bskur ba byin nas phyag rgya chen po rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas rig pa dang sngags dag gang gnas pa gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi haM gis bri bar bya'o// bris nas tsan dan dang gur kum dag
183a6(rgyud 'bum): gis lag pa dag dang kham phor kha sbyar ba bkrus nas/ de nas gro ga'i 'dab ma kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
183a7(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas der nye bar 'dug ste rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du brjod par bya'o// de nas der ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pa la
183b1(rgyud 'bum): mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o/ / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang bsgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs nas slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas shing spyi bor mngon
183b2(rgyud 'bum): par dbang bskur bar bya'o/ / slob ma ji ltar 'dod pa'i chus spyi bo nas mngon par dbang ba skur bar bya'o zhes so// de nas de la kham phor kha sbyar de de'i ched du sbyin par bya'o// mar me la klog tu gzhug par
183b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / gal te des bcom ldan 'das las rig pa 'am sngags bzung ba nyid yin par gyu na bklags pa nyid las kyang las byed do// rnam pa gzhan du na rim gyis 'bad pas bsgrub pas byed par 'gyur ro//
183b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan rnams ni sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par byed do// de nas sngags yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dang po sgrub pa kho nas 'grub par byed do zhes pa rnam par rtog pa med pa las so// de kho na sngar
183b5(rgyud 'bum): sa pa slob dpon gyi sgrub pa gsu ma gyis rjes par 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'dab pa med par ro// de bzhin du thog mar rig pa'i mngon par dbang bskar ba sbyin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis par mngon par
183b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gnyis par dkyil 'khor thams cad la dang / lha thams cad la gang rab tu bstabs pa'i bum pa gang ba des snga ma'i cho ga gang yin pa ji lta ba de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon par
183b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur bar byas nas sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /
184a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya bsgrub pa la'ang lhag par 'dod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis slob dpon du mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin no//
184a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gsum par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang ba cho ga de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// khyod la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul
184a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i sngags rnams dang / dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang / nye bar ston pa dang / rgyud dang rgyud kyi phyag rgya dang / spyad pa nges par
184a4(rgyud 'bum): ston pa dang / rang gi cho ga nges par ston par rjes su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// skye ba 'di nyid dam/ gang phyi ma gzhan dang gzhan rnams su sangs rgyas nyid nges par thob bo// de bzhin du rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal
184a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / sngar nges par bstan pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das la sngar phul ba'i bum pa gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum pa gang bas de bzhin kho nar mngon par dbang
184a6(rgyud 'bum): bskur ro/ / de bzhin du yang khyod la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang / lus can thams
184a7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis mi thub cing rnam par rgyal ba dang / khyod sngags rnams thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sgrubs shig ces rjes su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sems can
184b1(rgyud 'bum): lnga po nyid re re la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par dbang bskur ba lnga sbyin par bya'o/ / de nas de dag rim gyis dkyil 'khor du bcug nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul te/ dkyil
184b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ / de nas nyi ma gzhan la rim gyis rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa rnams la bslab par bya zhing / rnam par sbyar bar bya'o// skad cig/
184b3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid la song nas sngar brten par phul ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po la sngar phul ba'i chu bum pa gang ba blangs nas/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de rnams la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon par phyogs
184b4(rgyud 'bum): par byas nas 'thung du gzhug par bya'o/ / 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ kye byang chub sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig gang gis 'da' bar byed na bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyur ro//
184b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gang du'am/ der yang rigs dman pa gang gis dkyil 'khor du 'ongs pa de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas/ grogs byed pa'i lag par gos
184b6(rgyud 'bum): dkar po gtsang ma mgo bor bcings pa gzhan gyis sam gos kun tu g.yogs te gnas pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas rigs dman pa rnams kyis me tog gtor bar bya'o/ / de nas grogs byed pa de rnams
184b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis kyang rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis khrus bya'o/ / de rnams kyi'ang dam tshig tsam de 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'ang grub par 'gyur ro// de sngar byas pa'i me'i bya ba'i gnas su song
185a1(rgyud 'bum): na rtse mo ma nyams pa'i ku sha rnams kyis so/ / der yang me thab rnam pa gsum du brjod do// ni ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod do// ni ba'i don du pad+ma'i rnam pa'o// yang na tshim
185a2(rgyud 'bum): par byed pas dbang du byed pa'ang ngo / / mngon spyod la zur gsum mo// de la me'i bya ba'i cho ga thams cad la ku sha dgram par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas shar gyi rtse mor me'i bya ba
185a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nas me'i bya ba mdzad pa rnams la phyag byas nas lho'i rtse mor ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas byang gi rtse mor sbyin par
185a4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de bzhin du yang bya ba rnams grogs byed pas gnas pa'i ngang tshul can gyi sa me'i bya ba ku sha rnams kyis so// thog mar rtsa ba'i rig pas so// thog mar zho dang / spu rtsi dang / mar la btags pa'i 'bras
185a5(rgyud 'bum): yos kyi sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin par bya'o/ / zhi ba'i don du snying pos mar gyis so// rgyas pa'i don du shing a pa man gsum gyi sbyin sreg go// mngon spyod la ka Ta ke yis so// me'i bya ba'i cho ga 'di'ang
185a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du thun mong ba'i sgrub pa rnams la'ang ngo / / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nye bar spyod pa rnams su'ang ngo // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gnas gtsang mas gtso bo'i lha nyid bstan nas/
185a7(rgyud 'bum): me'i cho ga'i bya ba byas te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa rnams la/ de nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas mchod yon no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang
185b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha'i khyad par rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyang gsan du gsol/ gang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga
185b2(rgyud 'bum): las 'das par yang rung ste/ gus par byed pa dang / gzhan yang gang cung zad bdag nyid nyams par bya ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu gan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
185b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi spyod yul dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul dang ma bral bar thob par gyur cig/ myur du bde ba dang ldan pa thob par gyur cig/ de skad ces brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor du rab tu
185b4(rgyud 'bum): zhugs pa'i sems can rnams thams cad la/ mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o// sbyin pa la rab tu chags pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas
185b5(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa dang / mdor na lung dang / rig pa dang / gsang sngags sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa rnams blta bar bya/ byang chub kyi sems
185b6(rgyud 'bum): dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa de rnams thams cad la dri bzang po'i me tog gis mchod yon phul
185b7(rgyud 'bum): nas sam/ de nas yid kyis mchod yon phul nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas gats+tsha gats+tsha zhes pa dang / swA hA zhes pa kho na bzlas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa
186a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas gyen du nges par bsdus pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o zhes pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma
186a2(rgyud 'bum): ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rab 'byin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so// / de nas sems dpa' chen po des slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i
186a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas/ lha'i bu rnams thams cad la smras par gyur to// khyed rnams nyon cig/ mchog gi grub pa mchog tu gsang ba sgrub thabs thams cad kyi cho ga rig
186a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las thams cad byed pa/ rig pa'i las bzang po byed pa/ chen po nyid dang don chen po byed pa/ phung krol thams cad zlog par byed pa// don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ mchog tu bkra mi shis pa
186a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kun nas bkra shis pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ bdag gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par gyur pa/ las phran tshegs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba/ rig pa'i
186a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mo chen mo las chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa'i sgrol ma gang zhe na/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tA re tut+tA re tu/
186a7(rgyud 'bum): re swA hA/ grogs po dag 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma las chen po thams cad byed pa/ las phran tshegs thams cad bklags pas grub pa/ mchog tu gsang ba/ shin tu gsang ba/ mchog tu grub pa/ gzhan
186b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis rab tu sbyar ba'i las thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i rig pa 'di'ang dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga dang sgrub thabs su 'gyur te/ 'phags ma sgrol mas las chen po thams cad mdor bsdus pa dang
186b2(rgyud 'bum): las phran tshegs thams cad la'ang nye bar sbyar bar bya zhing / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga dang sgrub thabs rnams la'ang ngo // nyin mtshan gang du 'am der yang rung ste/ gtsang ma'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o/
186b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid nyes pa med pa dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gcig pus dang po re zhig gru bzhi mnyam pa/ sgo bzhi pa/ khru bzhi'i tshad dang ldan pa'i dbus su pad+ma'i phyag rgya/ de'i g.yas su ut+pa la sngon po dang / dbyug
186b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya dang / ril ba spyi blugs kyi phyag rgya/ g.yon du rdo rje rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya dang / gos dkar mo'i phyag rgya dang / rta mgrin dang dpal chen mo'i phyag rgya'o// shar sgor pad+ma byang du ut+pa la/ lho ru rdo rje/ nub
186b5(rgyud 'bum): tu 'jug pa'i rim pa las 'das par/ steng du 'khyil pa'i rnam pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o// de'i 'og tu phyi nas me'i bya ba byas nas sngar brjod pa'i cho gas mchod pa la sogs pa byas te/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug
186b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / de la rgyal srid 'dod pas hang+tha'i shing du'o// longs spyod 'dod pas rang gi khyim gyi lha'o// rta 'dod pas rta'i bres su'o// glang po che 'dod pas glang po che'i bres su'o// bu 'dod pas po de rtsi'i shing gi
186b7(rgyud 'bum): drung du'o/ / tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa la tshangs pas bskyangs pa ru'o// klus zin pa la klu shing dang nye ba ru'o// mkha' 'gro mas zin pa la lam bzhi mdo ru'o// gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la pa Ta'i shing gi
187a1(rgyud 'bum): drung du'o/ / srul pos zin pa la khron pa'i drung du'o// gzhan rnams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gang du'am de ru'ang nyes pa med do// grogs po dag mdor bsdus na rig pa 'di ni
187a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dang las thams cad pa ste/ sgrub thabs thams cad dang / las thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// gsang chen 'di dang lhan cig rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni sems can rnams
187a3(rgyud 'bum): la phan par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'o/ / longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa sgrub pa po rnams la phan pa'i don gyi phyir 'byor pa thams cad mngon par
187a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phel bar byed pa ste/ mdor na phyi ma'i lus can 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur par rab tu grags so// de nas dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa gang thob nas dpal med pa 'joms par
187a5(rgyud 'bum): par byed cing zhi bar byed/ nad dang dgra 'phrog pa de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang stobs sgrub par byed pa mthong zhing thos nas/ de nas cho ga la rab tu dang bskye bar 'gyur ba gang
187a6(rgyud 'bum): yin pa de rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub tu bdag gis lung ston par the tshom med do/ / gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ 'jig rten gyi 'dren pa de rnams kyang rjes su yi rang
187a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / sa steng dkyil 'khor smra ba ni// zhi ba'i las rnams thams cad byed// bkren pa rnams kyis phan pa thob// sems can mgon med sdug bsngal can// rnams kyis dkyil 'khor rab sbyar bya//
187b1(rgyud 'bum): in+d+ra nI la sogs phye mas// dkyil 'khor yang dag kun tu bri// in+d+ra nI la sogs med na// sA lu'i phye mas yang dag bri// sA lu'i phye ma sogs med na// so phag phye ma sogs kyis bri// so phag phye ma sogs
187b2(rgyud 'bum): med na/ / bye ma rnams kyis yang dag bri// de ltar yon tan kun bsdus pa'i// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba// 'jig rten mgon po'i yang dag bka'// byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa yin// zhes
187b3(rgyud 'bum): so/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang ldan pa theg pa chen po'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi
187b4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga rab 'byams kyi le'u ste gsum pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas sems dpa' chen pos slar yang dkyil 'khor chen po de la kun tu gzigs nas dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yang dag par
187b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs shing mngon par yi rang bar gyur pa/ mchog gi sgrub pa'i cho ga ras ris kyi cho ga
187b6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / dang po re zhig dge ba'i nyi ma la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i ras bal blangs nas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag pas ras bal byed du gzhug par bya'o// de nas ras bal de la lhag par gnas par bya ste/
187b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i rig pa dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyo ba'i dog pa blangs nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad lhag par gnas
188a1(rgyud 'bum): par mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams legs par 'tsho zhing bdag gi skye ba 'bras bu yod pa dang / sngags kyi dngos grub lhag par
188a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas par mdzod cika/ de'i dus su rnga pa Ta ha dang / rnga bo che dang / dung dang / pi wa nga dang / gling bu dang / 'khar rnga dang / rnga mu ra dza'i sgra thos par gyur pa 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rgyal rigs mo 'am/
188a3(rgyud 'bum): bud med dam/ khyi'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ mi rnams glo bur du 'di skad ces rgyal ba dang / grub pa dang / dngos grub sbyin pa dang / byin pa dang / zung zhig dang / dpal dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang /
188a4(rgyud 'bum): las kyi 'khor lo dang / mang po zhes pa de lta bu la sogs pa gzhan yang dge ba'i sgra rab tu 'don pa dang / dril bu'i sgra byung ba dang / dga' ba'i sgra'ang rung ste/ de rnams rig pa 'dzin pas sangs rgyas bcom
188a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o/ / gzhan du dngos grub 'bras bu med do zhes pas so// de'i dus su de rnams ma rungs pa'i sgra 'byin pa'am/
188a6(rgyud 'bum): zung zhig/ zo zhig/ 'dzin du chug cig/ nyams pa/ rnam par brlag pa/ kyi hud/ ring ba/ med pa/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i sgra 'byin par byed pa dang / mi dang / ma he dang / lce spyang dang / bong bu dang /
188a7(rgyud 'bum): byi la dang / dud 'gro dman pa rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi sgra 'don par gyur na/ de la sgrub pa pos bdag gi dngos grub med do zhes shes par bya zhing / skye ba 'di nyid la kun tu brtul bar bya'o// slar
188b1(rgyud 'bum): yang snga ma bzhin du byas nas brtsam par bya ste/ de lta bu lan bdun gyis mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'ang bdun pa'i las kyi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes so// de nas sgrub pa pos gzhon nu ma de la bsrung ba
188b2(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug tu bcug ste/ shar du mngon par phyogs pa 'am/ byang du mngon par phyogs par bzhag nas/ bdag nyid tsA ru'i ston mo bza' zhing gzhon nu ma de la'ang tsA ru'i ston mo
188b3(rgyud 'bum): bzar gzhug par bya'o/ / snga ma kho nar yongs su rtags pa'i ku sha'i khres la cho ga de nyid kyis ras bal 'khal du gzhug par bya'o// dog pa de 'jam pa dang legs par bsgrims pa sngar brlabs pa'i bu mos
188b4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par blangs te gcig dang / gsum dang / lnga dang / brgyad la sogs pa nas/ ji srid bcu drug tsam gyi bar du ka rA'i srang grangs legs par bgrangs pa dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu mas bya'o// de la rab ni bcu
188b5(rgyud 'bum): drug bya ba de bzhin 'bring ni brgyad pa ste/ / phran tshegs las rnams sgrub pa la// lnga dang gcig ni tha ma'o// sngags rnams kun la sngags rig pas// ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya// de nas brtsams te gang cung
188b6(rgyud 'bum): zad sdig pa'i las rnams sngon byas pa/ / dog pa la dmigs sems kyis ni// de yi skad cig nyid la 'jig/ dog pa 'di ni blangs nas su// gtsang ma'i snod du gzhug par bya// phyogs su gyur par bzhag
188b7(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ ga pur gyi ni bdug pas bdug/ srog chags yan lag min byung bsam// gur kum tsan dan la sogs sam// tsam pa ka sogs ma li ka/ dri zhim me tog rnams kyis bgos// gtsang
189a1(rgyud 'bum): ma'i phyogs su bzhag nas ni/ / srung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni// sngags rig las kun shes pa yis// shin tu mnyam bzhag bzlas par bya// de nas tha ga sar song nas// ji ltar
189a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i glu byin te/ / yan lag bral min skem min nyid// dkar po'i chos la rtag tu dga'// nad kyis gdungs min rgan po min// lud pa dbugs mi bde las grol// ma ning mtshan gnyis min pa
189a3(rgyud 'bum): dang de ni dman pa min nyid dang / / ngan par ltung ba spangs pa ni// kun nas mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// rab bsngags blta na sdug pa dang // blo yis kun tu spyod pa dge/ 'jig rten pa yi 'jug pa rten// dngo
189a4(rgyud 'bum): grub 'dod pas de la ni/ / ras mchog 'thag par byed pa la// rab bsngags dge ba'i stobs ldan nam// blo ldan bzo ni shin tu mkhas// shin tu khyad par mchog gyur pa'i// ras ni 'thag byed mchog
189a5(rgyud 'bum): gi ni/ rab kyis rab la bya ba yin// 'bring la 'bring po sgrub par byed// tha mas phran tshegs las rnams ni// dman pa nyid ni kun las so// bzo bos ji ltar smra ba bzhin// de las gru ni ji bzhin sbyin// /
189a6(rgyud 'bum): bzo bo yi ni dang po'i ngag/ smras pa de las sngags rig pas// myur du rin ni sbyin par gyis// dpa' bo'i tshong zhes de la brjod// don du gnyer ba nyid dang de'i// rin gyi dngos po zlog par byed// myur du
189a7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub byed gang 'di'o/ / ras ni bla na med pa'i mchog/ las rnams shin tu mchod par 'os// lha dang mi yi bde nyid dang // 'byung po kun gyi dpal yin zhes// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis
189b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pas tha ga pa la gso sbyong byin nas// shin tu dag pa'i rgyu skar la 'am/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed la 'am/ dkar po'i nyi ma 'am/ dkar po'i gza' nges par bltas te/
189b2(rgyud 'bum): dkar po'i zla phyed gzhan la'ang rung ste/ shing sa ha kA ra'i snye ma dang me tog skyes shing / shing gi me tog dang yal ga rgyas shing dpyid ka'i dus/ dus kyi mchog der snga dro nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe/ sngar bstan pa'i
189b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyu spun dang bcas pas tha ga pa tsA ru'i bza' ba zos shing gos dkar po gyon pa/ mgo la gtsug tor bcings nas legs par bkrus pa/ tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum dag gang yang rung bas legs par byug
189b4(rgyud 'bum): pa lus la rjes su byugs pa/ ga pur gyi dris kha bsgos pa/ yid dga' zhing bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral bar byas nas/ thags kyi snas la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad kyang sa dang ba lang gi lci
189b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dag gis bkrus te/ gsar pa rnams kyang slar yang ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o// de nas srog chags med pa'i chus bkru bar bya'o// tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum gyis mngon par gtor bar bya'o//

189b7(rgyud 'bum): dag par sbyong bar byed pa'i sngags nyid yungs kar dkar po la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas phyogs bzhi rnams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bral rnams su gtor bar bya'o// de nas
190a1(rgyud 'bum): thag pa la yungs kar gyis yang dag par bsnun nas phyag rgya chen po gtsug pud lnga pa bcings te/ gtsug tor bcing ba byas na bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// gal te ras rab yin na
190a2(rgyud 'bum): zheng du khru bzhi/ chur khru brgyad kyi tshad 'di tsam du tha ga pas bran par bya'o// 'bring bar gyur na zheng du khru do// chur khru lnga nyid do// tha ma ni bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad la/ chur ni sangs rgyas kyi khru gang nyid do//
190a3(rgyud 'bum): de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang ni yul dbus kyi skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/ 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'o zhes bsgrags te/ tshad 'dis tshad kun tu bshad do// 'di ni 'phur ba'i dngos
190a4(rgyud 'bum): grub tu/ skyes bu mchog gis gsungs pa yin// thub pa mi snang gyur 'og tu// rgyal srid 'dod la 'bring po ste// longs spyod chen po don gnyer ba'i// skyes bu lha dang lha min dang // gdengs can tha ma grub par
190a5(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ 'dring ba dngos grub 'bring po'o// ras 'bring po ni rtag pa ru// sems can kun gyi las rnams sgrub// phran tshegs las rnams bsgrub bya la// ras tha ma ni rtag pa ru// las rnams thams cad
190a6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par byed/ / rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni// las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed// ras ris gsum gyis nges bstan pa'i// dngos grub dpal don gnyer ba'i mi// brgya byin bde sogs bdag po yang /
190a7(rgyud 'bum): cho ga nyams na mi 'grub te// cho ga yang dag ldan gyur na// mi yi skye bo phal pa la'ang // 'bad pa yis ni las rnams kun// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal dang rgyal mchog sras rnams kyis//
190b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba 'di dag yang dag bshad// sems can bkren pa mgon med pa// sdug bsngal gyis gdungs kun gyi dpal// byang chub lam du gang 'di ni// de nyid gzigs pa rnams kyis bstan// chos 'di
190b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub rgyu yin par/ / sngags kyi lam gyis bstan pa yin// dkyil 'khor yang dag bstan pa gang // 'jig rten dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // 'jig rten 'dra ba'ang 'grub 'gyur te// 'bad pa med par
190b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams 'grub/ / gang zhig byang chub rgyur 'dod pa// de la rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur// rtag tu 'gro la mi phan pa// gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs// byang chub ched du 'jug kun la// ras ris/
190b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'grub par gsungs// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi/ dam tshig 'di ni khyad par du// myur du bya ba'i don bsgrub phyir// 'dir ni mtha' dag thob pa ru// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

190b7(rgyud 'bum): ba yongs su dor/ / 'ongs pa'i gos dang bcas bkrus nas// gzhan pa'i gos gzhan bgo bya zhing // gos dkar 'chang zhing 'phreng bar ldan// yang dang yang du nye reg bya// lus la tsan dan dkar po
191a1(rgyud 'bum): byug/ bzo bo'i lag pa gtsang bar bya// rtag tu 'jam zhing legs sbyangs pas// thar yang 'bad pas btag par bya// de la sogs pa'i rab sbyor ni// rgyal ba gzhan gyis gsu/

191a3(rgyud 'bum): po'i nyin zhag la/ / rgyud dang rgyud du mnyam par 'jug/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi mdzes pa la// ras ni yongs su bsal byas nas// kha tshar mdud pa'i mtha' mdzes la// 'od ma'i shing ni khru bzhi la// ras ni
191a4(rgyud 'bum): blangs nas de nas 'gro/ / nor ni rgya cher 'god pa yin// bzo bo bde legs byas nas ni// brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i// sngags pa ji ltar 'dod song nas// dri zhim me tog gis mchod de//
191a5(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ba'i phyogs su rnam par dgod// 'di nyid kyis ni sngags kyis ni// srung ba'i cho ga rab tu bya// gang zhig ras bal sngon du ni// slar yang rnam mang yongs sbyangs pa// de nyid kyis ni bdag nyid dang //

191a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis/ / rnam par spyod pa'i sngags kyi gzugs// brtson 'grus chen po gzi brjid che// sngags kyi don kun sgrub pa po// sna tshogs skyob pa'i rgyu rnams ni// rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur//
191b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam gling gnas pa'i sems can rnams// sems kyi spyod pa kun tu rmongs// dad pa med cing phyin ci log/ log pa'i kun spyod la rab brkam// sngags rnams sgrub par mi byed pa'i// de nyid phyir na slar
191b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ / 'khor ba mun pa'i btson rar 'khyams// gang yang rtag tu yid dag cing // dad ldan ltad mo bkra shis dang // sngags rnams kun la rtag tu spyod// bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'dod// rtag
191b3(rgyud 'bum): tu 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / / spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams gang // 'bad pa med par yang dag 'grub// dad pa med pa'i skye bo la// dkar po'i chos rnams
191b4(rgyud 'bum): mi skye ste/ / sa bon tsha sgor btab pa la// myu gu med cing 'bras med bzhin// dad pa rtag tu chos kyi rtsar// don kun gzigs pas gsungs pa yin// chos don ngang tshul can de rnams// sngags kyi
191b5(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub rtag tu brjod/ / de nas sgrub pos bzo bo no// ri mo mkhan nam bdag kyang rung // ri mo mkhas pas ma 'dres pa'i// tshon rtsi kha dog gsal ba dang // kha dog can gyi tshon blangs nas//
191b6(rgyud 'bum): ltar thag pa la ni// sngar gyi cho ga de nyid kyis// mtshan nyid yang dag ldan pa yis// ri mo mkhan la gong bzhin du// rgyas pa ru ni bya ba'o// ji ltar sngar bzhin tha ga pa'i// cho ga de nyid kyis ni de// ras la ri mo
191b7(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya/ / yang na rang gis ri mor bri// ga pur gur kum tsan dan las// so phag tshon la bsgo bar bya// bdug pa bsregs shing sngags nyid kyis// lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas// na ga ge sar pun+d+ha ga/
192a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ku lA dang tsam pa kA/ bA ri Shi kar+d+ha nu kA// mA la ti yi me tog sogs// ras de la ni mngon par gtor// shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yi// khres la nyer 'dug dang ba'i blos/
192a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// sems dpar gyur pas 'di phra mo// lag pas blangs nas ma 'khrugs pa'i// sems kyis ras la ri mo bri// dang po re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bri bar
192a3(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa'i sku rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od 'bar
192a4(rgyud 'bum): bkun nas 'od 'dom gang gis nye bar mdzes pa'i sku/ chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ rab tu dang pa'i sku/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma'i bai DUR+Ya'i sdong po can/ 'og
192a5(rgyud 'bum): na klu'i rgyal po sra gdan chen po pad+ma'i sdong bu de la 'dzin bzhin pas de bzhin gshegs pa la lta zhing lag pa g.yas pas phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lus
192a6(rgyud 'bum): phyed mi'i rnam pa can gyi dga' bo dang nye dga' bo bri bar bya'o/ / pad+ma'i mtsho de'i khor yug tu pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / cung zad kha bye ba dang / rnam par kha bye ba dang / chu las skyes pa'i bya dang nyal
192a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pas mngon par khyab pa/ ma lus par bkod pa shin tu sbas pa/ mdzes pa'i rnam par mngon par bri bar bya'o// gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i sdong bu dang 'dab ma de nyid las rnam par
192b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phros pa'i pad+ma'i me tog du ma rnams rim gyis mtho ba'o/ / g.yon gyi gzhogs su pad+ma'i me tog brgyad de/ de rnams la'ang pad+ma rnams la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi sku mngon
192b2(rgyud 'bum): par bri bar bya'o/ / dang po re zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pad+ma'i ze ba ltar cung zad dkar ba'i gur kum dang gser gyi mdog can/ 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan gyis dbu la rnam par brgyan
192b3(rgyud 'bum): paphyag na ut+pal sngon po 'dzin pa/ g.yas kyi phyag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa/ sku mdzes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa/ bzhin cung zad
192b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzum pa/ kun nas 'bar bas 'khrigs pas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa'o// pad+ma gzhan la ni 'phags pa zla 'od gzhon nu de bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la nor bzangs so//
192b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o// lnga pa la nam mkha' mdzad do// drug pa la sa'i snying po'o// bdun pa la 'jam dpal lo// brgyad pa la spyan bzangs te/ 'di dag thams cad gzhon nu'i
192b6(rgyud 'bum): cha byad can/ gzhon nu rgyan gyis mngon par brgyan pa mngon par bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad la/ byams pa ma togs pa rgyan thams
192b7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nye logs su 'phags pa byams pa tshangs par spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ dbu la ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa/ gser mdog ngur smrig dmar po
193a1(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba/ dar la dmar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ tshom bu gsum gyi mtshan ma byas pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ dbyig pa dang ril ba spyi blugs g.yon gyi phyag tu bkod pa/
193a2(rgyud 'bum): kriSh+Na sA ra'i pags pa phrag pa g.yon du bgos pa/ phyag g.yas pas bgrang 'phreng bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa/ der gtod pa'i lta ba bsam gtan la dmigs
193a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems kyi spyod pa can no/ / pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa kun tu bzang po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs kyi mdog/ sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin
193a4(rgyud 'bum): po che bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas dpal 'bras bsnams nas mchog sbyin pa/ mdzes pa'i gzugs can de bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
193a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba/ gser gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ thams cad mkhyen pa dbul byas pa/ 'phags pa 'od
193a6(rgyud 'bum): dpag med stobs bcu pa ral pa'i nang du nye bar bzhugs pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pa/ bsam gtan la dmigs par gyur pa'i sems kyi
193a7(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa can/ sku kun nas gsal bar gyur pa'o// bzhi pa la 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pas rdo rje bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas nye bar 'gog pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa bsnams nas mchog
193b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa/ gser mdog rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ mdzes pa'i gzugs can zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa/ do shal dang do shal phyed pas lus nye bar dkris pa/ mu tig gi do shal gyi
193b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba/ dar srab mo'i sham thabs dang / dar la dkar po'i bla gos byas pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang kun tu bzang
193b3(rgyud 'bum): po'i sham thabs dang bla gos kyang de bzhin no/ / lus kyi rnam pa ni sngar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma lnga pa la 'phags pa blo gros chen po/ drug pa la zhi ba'i blo gros/ bdun pa la
193b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'o/ / brgyad pa la ngan song spong ba zhes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams phyag na 'bras bu dang glegs bam bsnams pa/ rnam pa kun tu mdzes pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs
193b5(rgyud 'bum): can rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ g.yo ba dang ldan pa'i gos mnabs pa rnams mngon par bri bar bya'o// de rnams kyi yang steng du rang sangs rgyas brgyad mngon par bri bar bya ste/ dge slong gi cha byad
193b6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i sku/ ngur smrig dmar po gsol ba/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/ rin po che'i rdo lib la bzhugs pa/ zhi ba'i cha byad can/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'dreng
193b7(rgyud 'bum): bas 'khrugs pa/ dri zhim po'i me tog gis gcal du bkram pa la 'di lta ste/ mA la tI dang / bIR+Sha kA dang / d+hA nuska ri skA ri kA dang / pun+d+ha ga dang / nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis ras la kun
194a1(rgyud 'bum): nas gcal du bkram bzhin pas mngon par bri'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gang yin pa'i steng du rin po che du mas spras pa'i
194a2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu ring po'i rnam pa'i gzhal med kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ / brag ri'i rgyal po nye bar mdzes pa rin po che'i rdo leb kyis bkab pa ri bo'i rnam pa lta bur mngon par bri bar bya'o// der gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
194a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das brgyad mngon par bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ rin chen gtsug tor can rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba/ kun nas 'od 'dom gang ba/ pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / ma ra ka s+tha la sogs pa dang /
194a4(rgyud 'bum): bai DUR+Ya dang / rdo'i snying po la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po khyad par can rnams kyis kun nas rab tu 'bar bzhin pa/ cung zad nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos gos ser
194a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ sham thabs ser po mnabs pa/ sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyi go cha bgos pa/ dpe byad bzang
194a6(rgyud 'bum): po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa'i sgra/ rab tu zhi ba'i gzigs stangs can/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsu tor can mngon par bri'o// gnyis pa la de bzhin gshegs
194a7(rgyud 'bum): pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po gser gyi mdog tu mngon par bri bar bya'o/ / na ga ge sar ches bzang ba dang / ba ku la la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba mngon
194b1(rgyud 'bum): par bri bar bya'o/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal la mngon par gzigs bzhin pa kun nas 'od can rin po che'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba'i mthar thug pa'o// gsum pa la de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang
194b2(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyal po ngon par bri bar bya ste/ pad+ma'i ge sar gyi mdog tu snang ba/ chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa'o// bzhi pa la de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang mngon par bri bar bya'o// lnga pa la bzod par dka'
194b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / drug pa la rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'o// bdun pa la sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'o// brgyad pa la de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po
194b4(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bri bar bya ste/ thams cad gser gyi kha dog can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rnam pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par mdzad pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi steng du'ang bris sku'i zur gnyis ka nas
194b5(rgyud 'bum): sprin gyi go bar na gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gnyis me tog gi char 'bebs par byed bzhin pa bri'o/ / bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas
194b6(rgyud 'bum): dang 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa mngon par bri bar bya'o/ / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang du 'phags pa nyan thos chen po brgyad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
194b7(rgyud 'bum): dbu'i gnas spangs pa'i steng du mngon par bri bar bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / rab 'byor dang / sgra gcan 'dzin dang /
195a1(rgyud 'bum): dga' bo dang / bzang ldan dang / ka pi na zhes pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams 'di lta ste/ dri dad can dang / tsan dan dang / nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang / dkar po dang / si ka dang /
195a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang po dang / mu khyud dang / mu khyud bzang po zhes pa'o// thams cad mchog tu shin tu mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i cha lugs/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid/ rab tu dul ba'i rnam pa'o// nyan thos chen po rnams thal mo
195a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub la nges par rtog par byed pa'o// steng ngos su'ang gnas gtsang ma'i lha dang nye bar gnas pa'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis dar gyi bla re kun nas chung
195a4(rgyud 'bum): ring zhing shin tu mdzes pa bzung nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad kyi steng du 'dzin par byed bzhin pa lha'i 'phreng ba dang gos 'chang ba'i
195a5(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bu mngon par bri'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng ngos su dbu la mu tig gi do shal dang / rin po che'i skud pa la pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyus pa'i rin po che'i skud pa'i
195a6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs de la dar gyi bla re legs par bkod cing / khor yug tu'ang mu tig ga do shal rab tu 'phyang ba mdzes par gyur pa mngon par bri bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma'i gdan gyi 'og tu byang chub
195a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po dang nye bar klu'i rgyal po nye dga' bo'i gzhogs su rin po che'i ri bo pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par 'phags pa/ rin po che'i myu gu dang / phug dang / ri su la dang / byu ru'i 'khri shing yongs su dkris
195b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rin po che'i shing dang / drang srong chen po nye bar gnas shing bsnyen pa'i ri bo/ de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa drag po chen po'i gzug can/ phyag g.yon pas zhags pa bzung nas/ g.yas pas byu
195b2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dzin pa/ bzhin khro gnyer can// byang chub sems dpa' chen po la lta zhing bka' nod par byed bzhin pa/ gsus pa rlob/ spu gyen du brdzes pa/ mig sman nag po dang sprin dang mtshungs pa/ ag tshem ser rgya
195b3(rgyud 'bum): dang sgra ring zhing sen mo ring ba/ mig dmar ba/ mgrin pa'i phyogs sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ ches mi bzad pa chen po/ khro bo'i rgyal po
195b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po/ kun nas 'bar ba/ khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa rnam pa 'di nyid kho nas bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu ral pa can de dang de'o// ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng du nye bar 'dug pa/ pus mo sa la 'dud pa'i lus can
195b5(rgyud 'bum): lag pa spos phor thogs pa/ cha byad dang / dbyibs dang / 'jug pa dang / spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta bar gyur pa yang dag par bri'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'og
195b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas kyi gzhogs su klu'i dbang po'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye logs su pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par 'phags pa'i rin po che'i ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po gzhan gsungs pa de bzhin du gnas pa mngon par bri ste/ khro bo'i rgyal
195b7(rgyud 'bum): posgrol mas non pa phan pa lha'i me tog gcal du bkram pa mngon par bri ste/ ri de ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o// ri de ni shin tu mtho ba/ pad+ma rA ga'i rdo leb dang / de nyid kyi myu gu dang bai DUR+Ya'i
196a1(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyi rtse mo'i rnam par bri bar bya'o/ / de la brten pa'i lha mo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje/ 'phags ma sgrol ma lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar la dmar po'i stong
196a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yogs dang / daral khra bo'i sham thabs can/ bud med kyi rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon na ut+pal sngon po bsdams pa/ gser mdog can ma/ ha cang mi skem/ ha cang mi sbom/
196a3(rgyud 'bum): cang mi rgan pa/ sems bsam gtan la gnas pa/ bka' nod cing 'dug pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin par 'dod pa/ lus cung zad btud pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras
196a4(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug la cung zad lta bar gyur pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'o// de nyid du'ang rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i rtse mo de nyid du'ang pun+d+ha ga'i shing gis yongs su bskor ba/ yal ga thams
196a5(rgyud 'bum): cad la kun nas me tog gis spras shing kha bye bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la mngon par bkab pa/ yal gdud pa de nyid kyis kyang shin tu bkra ba'i byu ru'i myu gu 'brel ba rnam par bkra ba'i gzugs
196a6(rgyud 'bum): can gyi tshon rtsi 'bar ba na lha mo sgrol ma'i bzhin kun tu snang bar mngon par bri'o/ / lha mo bgegs kun 'joms pa mo// 'jigs pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog/ sgrub pa po ni srung don du// mchog sbyin dge ba bri
196a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo ni// thugs rje stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras// 'byung po kun gyi dpal yin te// mchog sbyin byed ma bri bar bya// lha mo las chen byed pa mo// byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po/
196b1(rgyud 'bum): bgegs kun rnam par 'joms don du// sgrub pa po ni kun tu 'dod// mi dbang rnams ni srung don dang // dpal gyi don du rab tu grags// khro rgyal dbang po gang yin de// ri yi rtse mor gnas 'dod pa// bgegs kun
196b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ / rgyal mchog sras rnams kyis gsungs so// drag po chen po brtson 'grus che// gtum chen 'od zer chen po ste// bstan pa la sdang sems can rnams// tshar gcad ched nyid rab tu
196b3(rgyud 'bum): brtag/ sgrub pa po ni srung don dang // bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms pa dang // mi bzang khro bo'i ngang tshul can// sngags kyi lha rnams 'gugs par byed// shin tu drag po drag gzugs can// brtse ba med cing nges par
196b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gog/ sdig pa drag po spyod pa rnams// dbang du ma gyur dbang du byed// mkha' spyod sa la spyod pa dang // kun nas 'og spyod pa dang // thub pa'i bstan la 'gal byed pa'i// gdug pa thams cad 'joms par
196b5(rgyud 'bum): byed/ ras ni kun nas gru bzhi dang // grwa bzhi dag tu bri bar bya// ras kyi 'og gi mtha' rnams su'ang // chu bo rgya cher bya ba yin// klu ni gdengs kas mtshan pa can// gcig nyid kun tu bya ba yin// yan lag
196b6(rgyud 'bum): dkar zhing bzang ba dang / / lus phyed mi yi rnam par skyes// rtag tu thal mo sbyor byed pa// mgo bo'i steng du bzhag byas nas// gdengs ka bdun pa brtson 'grus che// dbang chen ldan pa'i klu de ni// ming ni mtha'
196b7(rgyud 'bum): yas zhes bya yin/ / de bzhin gshegs la nges par blta// nor bu rin chen gyis mdzes shing // shin tu mdzes shing gzugs mdzes pa// rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ldan kun tu bri//
197a1(rgyud 'bum): klu dbang chen por rnam par grags// thub pa'i bstan la rab zhugs pa'i// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// bgegs kun rnam par gzhom don du// chu bo la brten bri bar bya// de la
197a2(rgyud 'bum): ras kyi cho ga 'di/ / mdor bsdus rgyal bas gsungs pa yin// rgyas par de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// kun nas bshad pa sngar gsungs so// mkhas pa gang zhig 'dri byed pa// de yi bsod nams mtha'
197a3(rgyud 'bum): yas so/ / sdig pa shin tu mi bzad pa// bskal pa bye bar byas pa gang // sa stengs bris sku mthong ba yis// de yis skad cig nyi la 'joms// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // tshul khrims 'chal dang smad pa dang /
197a4(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa kun la rab 'jug dang // 'khor bar yongs su rgyu ba yi// 'gro ba skye gnas dman pa rnams// de rnams ras ris 'dzin mi gzhug/ de rnams ras ris mthong bas ni// 'bras bu yod par thub dbang gsungs//
197a5(rgyud 'bum): de phyir mthong ba tsam gyis ni// skad cig de la sdig pa 'jig/ dag pas 'jug pa nyid dang ni// rjes su zlos pa dag 'jug pa// sngags mnyan pa la rtag brtson pa'i// mi rnams grub thob smos ci dgos// bskal pa bye bar
197a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun/ / mchod pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa// sa stengs ras ris 'dri ba yi// sngags pa bsod nams de thob 'gyur// gang+gA yi ni bye ma yi// tshad du grags pa gang yin pa// de yi tshad gyur sangs rgyas dang //
197a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal sras rang rgyal bse ru dang // nyan thos rnams la 'jig rten du// slar yang lan mang mchod ston gsol// 'bras bu thob pa gang yin de'i// sngags pa ras ris bris pa dang // mthong dang cho ga klog pa dang // rjes su yi rang
197b1(rgyud 'bum): ba nyid dang / / cho ga thams cad rab brtags pa// de yi sngags kyi dngos grub nges// ji srid 'jig rten pa yi sngags// gang zhig rgyal ba skyes mchog dang // de slob bse ru lnga rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid
197b2(rgyud 'bum): ches/ / gsungs pa'i sngags rnams thams cad ni// ras ris 'di yi spyan sngar 'grub// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che thag pa chen po'i mdo sde las/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa
197b3(rgyud 'bum): gyen du mdzes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byams kyi bris sku dang po rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
197b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga bar ma yod de/ de ngas bshad par bya yis/ de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig
197b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya'o/ / dang po re zhig sngar bstan pa'i dog pa dang / sngar brjod pa nyid kyi cho ga dang / sngar yongs su brtags pa'i bzo bo dang / sngar gyi tshang bar ma nyid kyi ras shin tu dag pa/ 'jam pa/ shin tu sbyangs pa/ kha
197b6(rgyud 'bum): tshar dang bcas pa/ tshon ma 'dres pa/ sgra dang 'dres pa dang bral ba la sogs pa rnams kyis tshad dang gzugs ma gtogs pa/ dang po ji lta ba de bzhin nyid kyis ras ris phyi ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o// dang po re zhig gnas
197b7(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma'i gnas kun nas mdzes pa'i rnam pa rin po che shel gyi rang bzhin lta bu/ mu tig dkar po'i ngo shal gyis brgyan pa/ de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ rin po che seng ge'i
198a1(rgyud 'bum): khri la nye bar bzhugs pa/ chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pad+ma'i ge sar
198a2(rgyud 'bum): du snang ba 'am/ gur kum mam/ nyi ma'i kha dog can/ phrag pa g.yon pa'i phyogs su pad+ma bsnams pa/ thal mo sbyar ba byas te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la nges par rtog bzhin pa/ bzhin cung zad 'dzum
198a3(rgyud 'bum): pabyang chub sems dpa' chen po bde legs dbus ma'i cod pan can/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dang mgo 'dud pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi gzhogs
198a4(rgyud 'bum): su phyag na rdo rje bri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du mngon par bri'o/ / 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par byed bzhin pa'o// de'i gzhogs su 'phags pa byams pa dang / kun tu ba#
198a5(rgyud 'bum): po dang phyag na rdo rje dang / blo gro chen po dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ste/ 'di rnams rim gyis mngon par bri bar bya ste/ dang po ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyan
198a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'drir gzhugs par bya'o/ / de rnams kyi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ bzhugs pa phyag g.yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ chos gos ser po'i
198a7(rgyud 'bum): bla gos mnabs pa'i sku can/ phyag g.yon pas chos gos kyi rna ba 'dzin pa/ cung zad dmar bar snang ba'i ngur smrig gi sham thabs can/ kun nas snang ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i 'di lta ste/
198b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po dang / rin chen gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs dang / spyan bzang zhes pa'i sangs rgyas
198b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'drir gzhug par bya'o//
198b3(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos chen po brgyad dang / rang sangs rgyas brgyad sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ 'on kyang 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la
198b4(rgyud 'bum): rnga yab g.yob par byed bzhin du 'khod pa'i lus su mngon par bri bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu mngon par bri bar bya'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rab 'thab bral dang /
198b5(rgyud 'bum): dga' ldan dang / 'phral dga' dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'od gsal dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang / 'og min te/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs
198b6(rgyud 'bum): na spyod pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams rim gyis mngon par bri bar bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang nye bar gnas pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar spras pa dgod de/ rang gi gzugs
198b7(rgyud 'bum): dang cha byad 'chang ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par 'phags pa'i kun nas rin po che'i ri bo ji srid du ras kyi mtha' mar 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ ras kyi
199a1(rgyud 'bum): mtha'i grwa'i phyogs gcig tu sgrub pa po cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba'i rnam pa pus mo dang mgo bo btud pa/ lag pa sbos phor thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// rin po che'i ri bo de la 'phas
199a2(rgyud 'bum): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa sngar ji ltar nges par bstan pa de bzhin du mngon par bri'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi gzhogs kyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras
199a3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung dang nye ba der rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa'i lha mo sgrol ma mngon par bri ste/ sngar ji ltar nges par bstan pa de bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya'o// ras de'i khor yug tu'ang me tog sil ma
199a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon par gtor te/ tsam pa ka dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / pad+ma dang / so'u gan+d+hi ka dang / mA lA tI dang / bi rA ka dang / d+hA nu kA rI kA dang / pun+da ga dang / na ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis kho ra khor yug
199a5(rgyud 'bum): tu gcal du dgram par bya'o/ / ras kyi steng ras kyi mtha'i grwa gnyis su lha'i bu gnyis me tog gi tshogs 'thor bar byed bzhin pa/ gzugs rnam par bkra ba/ bar snang la gnas pa'i char sprin gyi nang na lding ba/
199a6(rgyud 'bum): kha dog dkar por mngon par bri bar bya'o// 'di ni ras ris 'bring por brjod// rtag tu dge legs don 'byung ba// sa steng skye bo mi rnams la// dngos grub 'bring po sbyin par byed// 'khor bar kun tu 'khor ba na//
199a7(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa cung zad sngon byas gang // 'dir ni bris sku mthong ba yis// de yis skad cig nyid la 'jig/ sems can rmongs pa mi shes pa// de rnams 'gro ba lnga por 'khyams// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yi// bris sku//
199b1(rgyud 'bum): bar ma mthong ba yang // sdig pa byed par 'gyur ba dang // mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // tshul 'tshal gyis kyang 'grub par 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs sngags gsungs pa'ang // shin tu myur bar dngos
199b2(rgyud 'bum): glu ni/ / bzlas pa byas pas thob par 'gyur// nad can rnams ni nad las grol// bkren pas nor ni rnyed par 'gyur// bud med rnams ni bu thob 'gyur// bris sru bar pa blta ban// mthong ba tsam gyis de ma
199b3(rgyud 'bum): tshe/ bsod nams rgyas pa chen po thob// nges par lha dang mi rnams kyi// bde ba'i skal ba can 'gyur mi// de yi skye ba gzhan la yang // nges par sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// bri ba dang ni klog pa dang // lha mchod
199b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang 'drir 'jug dang / / de bzhin mthong dang reg nyid kyang // sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'di ltar 'od chen bris sku la// don du gnyer dang gsol 'debs pa// rjes su yi rang ba las kyang // skye ba
199b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bcas myur du thong / / bskal mchog bye rnams kyis kyang // skye bos bsod nams gang thob pa// tshig tu brjod par mi nus so// bris sku mthong ba 'bras bur bcas// zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
199b6(rgyud 'bum): phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las/ / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byam las le'u gsum pa yongs su rdzogs so//
199b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ slar yang sems dpa' chen po de la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga chung ngu zhes bya ba gzhan gsum pa'ang yod de/ gang
200a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bad pa med par dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba ste/ sngar bstan pa nyid kyi cho ga dang / bzo bos bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad tsam thad kar dang / de bzhin kho nar kun nas
200a2(rgyud 'bum): gru bzhi pa la sngar bzhin du ras ris sngar bstan pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / dang po re zhig byang chub sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i gdan la skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ byis pa khye'u sngar
200a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ kun nas 'od zer 'phro bar byed bzhin pa/ mdzes pa'i gzugs can 'drir gzhug par bya'o// g.yon gyi gzhogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rin po che'i rdo leb la
200a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa/ phyag na rnga yab thogs pa/ g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa/ kha dog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs so// g.yas kyi gzhogs su'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rin po che'i rdo leb
200a5(rgyud 'bum): leb la gnas pa/ phyag na rnga yab thogs shing / phyag g.yon pas pad+ma bsnams pa/ kun nA 'od dang ldan pa'i lus can/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o//
200a6(rgyud 'bum): seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu gser gyi ri bo ji srid ras kyi mtha'i bar du 'drir gzhug par bya'o// ras ris kyi mtha'i zur du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi seng ge'i khri'i 'og las g.yas kyi gzhogs su khro bo'i
200a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po sgrol mas non pa snga ma bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa snga ma bzhin du 'drar gzhug par bya'o// de thams cad snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du'o// de nas
200b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ rin po che'i ri'i phug sor bcu drug pa'i tshad na bzhugs pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'dra ba'i ri bo'i
200b2(rgyud 'bum): bya sgribs mtho ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / ras ris de'i khor yug tu ri bo'i rnam pas yongs su bskor ba mngon par bri'o// ras ris de'i steng gi zur du gan pa'i'i bo'i bya skyibs dang kun tu 'brel bar lding bzhin pa lta bu/
200b3(rgyud 'bum): me tog sna tshogs 'thor bar byed bzhin pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o// ras de la me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du bkram pa mngon par 'drir
200b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhug par bya'o/ / ras ris rnam gsum mtshan nyid ni// thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa las// 'di ni chung ngu zhe bya ste// ras ris phran tshegs las la shis// sdig las shin tu mi bzad pa// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu//
200b5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig byas sam byed 'gyu ba// ras ris mthong bas grol 'gyur te// ras ris mthong ba tsam nyid kyis// skad cig nyid las grol bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu// blo ldan sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur byas// ras
200b6(rgyud 'bum): ris tha ma mthong ba yi/ / bcu drug char par mi phod do// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad la// mchod byas bsod nam sa gang yin de// ras ris chung ngu mthong ba la// mkhas pas de yi bsod nams thob// mdzes pa
200b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ni las rnams dang / / longs spyod rgyud kyang 'di spyad do// rig dang gsang sngags ji snyed pa// tshangs dbang drang srong gis bshad dang // nam mkha' lding gis gang bshad dang // chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang // nor sbyin sog
201a1(rgyud 'bum): dang srin po dang / / lha min dbang po thams cad dang // lto 'phye che dang zla ba dang // rlung dang gshin rje la sogs dang // seng ge 'phrog byed sogs bshad pa'i/ sngags rnams thams cad 'dir drangs te/
201a2(rgyud 'bum): ras ris spyan sngar 'grub par 'gyur// zhi ba can dang de bzhin du// rgyas pa can rnams bya ba ste// de bzhin 'dir ni mi bzad pa// rgyal mchog gis smad spang bar bya// zhes byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen
201a3(rgyud 'bum): po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i cho ga bzhi pa ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
201a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldam 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
201a5(rgyud 'bum): to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pa ni legs so legs so// rig pa'i brtul zhugs thams cad nga byed pa'i don dang /
201a6(rgyud 'bum): phan pa'i phyir dang / bde ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse bas byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa'i chos lhag ma dang bcas pa/ nges par
201a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub la rgyun du mchog tu gzhol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rig pa dang sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ bdag gi rig pa gsang chen 'di nyid skye bo thams cad rgyas par byed par
201b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'jig rten gyi bla ma mya ngan las 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i rigs nub pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos
201b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis spangs shing thams cad bor te mun par gyur pa dang / snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par zhig ste/ 'phags pa'i lam dang / rig pa dang / sngags dang / sman dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad dang bral ba/
201b3(rgyud 'bum): skye bo legs pas yongs su gzung ba'i snang ba med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ le lo can dang / dran pa nyams pa dang / ma dad pa dang / mi srung ba dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
201b4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su zin pa/ sgyu dang / g.yo dang / rdzun dang / g.yo ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa de rnams/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di thos nas kun tu skrag par 'gyur te/ le lo dang snyoms las la mngon par dga' zhing dad
201b5(rgyud 'bum): pa med par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa tshol zhing gsang sngags tshol bar mi 'gyur te/ log par lta ba la dga' ba rnams kyang bsod nams ma yin pa mang po la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa
201b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / mnar med pa la mchog tu gzhol zhing drag po'i yang drag por 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa de rnams kyi don gyi phyir dang / dbang du ma gyur pa rnams dbang du gyur par bya ba dang / dbang du
201b7(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba rig pa dang / ras ris kyi cho ga da lha gsung ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das gsung du gsol/ de skad
202a1(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gsang ba/ rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga sgrub pa/ ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam mchog tu gsang ba 'dod pa'i don byed pa/ don chen
202a2(rgyud 'bum): po rnam par 'byor pa rig pa bdun cu po thams cad kyi mchog gi snying po/ rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dus der 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'ang sems can rnams 'dul ba'i don gyi thabs la mkhas pas 'khor bar
202a3(rgyud 'bum): kun tu 'jug pa rnams skyob pa/ nges par byang chub la mchog tu gzhol bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gis gsungs par gyur pa/ 'di la rig pa ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+tha
202a4(rgyud 'bum): ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ tA ren+ta tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/
202a5(rgyud 'bum): tA re tu re tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma bzhin bzang ma zhes bya ba'o// ne mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma dbus
202a6(rgyud 'bum): legs ma zhes bya ba'o/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ar+yA ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma legs spyod ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra
202a7(rgyud 'bum): yan ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bi d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma mtshan legs ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra mA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA
202b1(rgyud 'bum): yad+ham hA satwA ya/ tA re tA re tu re tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma lho chung ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re/ tu re tu re swAh+na/ 2
202b2(rgyud 'bum): ma sgrol ma legs gnas ma zhes bya ba'o/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA ra/ tu re tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma nye bar 'dud pa zhes bya ba'o// zhe
202b3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa chen po mchog gi snying po chen po dang mtshungs pa/ bya ba thams cad mchog tu grub pa/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas bzhin du skyes pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad
202b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis rjes su yi rang ba/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las skyob pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ byang chub kyi lam ston pa po/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi rig pa rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma la yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba/
202b5(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mdzes pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rab tu sbyin pa dang / bstan pa nub pa'i dus kyi tshe'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba'i ched du mnyam par 'jug cing 'grub par
202b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de rnams sbyor ba chung ngu nyid kyis rgyal srid chen po dang / longs spyod chen po'i dbang phyug gis don de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// de rnams shin tu myur bar de'i tshe de'i dus su dngos grub
202b7(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur te/ nyams sad pa'i rgyur yang mchog gi snying po 'di dag bsgrub par bya ste/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi cho ga mdor bsdus par
203a1(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po dang / snyigs ma lnga'i sems can bsod nams chung bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dbang chung bar grags pa/ tshe thung ba/ longs spyod
203a2(rgyud 'bum): chung ba/ brtson 'grus zhan pas ras ris kyi cho ga shin tu rgyas pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba la sogs pa'i las rnams rab tu rtsom par mi nus te/ de rnams kyi don du ches mdor bsdus te gsungs pa ni/ dang
203a3(rgyud 'bum): por re zhig dpa' bo'i rin gyis dog pa nyos/ srang tshad tsam mam srang phyed tsam dkyus su khru gang tsam la zheng du khru phyed tsam pa'i ras kha tshang ba'i ras kha tshar dang bcas pa tha ga pas btag par bya'o// yang na slar
203a4(rgyud 'bum): yang sgra dang bral ba'i ras kyi dum bu gsar pa steng 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa khru gnyis sam/ bzhi 'am/ drug gam/ lnga 'am/ bcu'am/ brgyad pa'i ras shin tu dkar ba blangs te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin
203a5(rgyud 'bum): du ri mo mkhan gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur kum gyis bsgos pa'i ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi de rnams dang / ras tsan dan dang / gur kum dang / ga pur rnams gcig tu
203a6(rgyud 'bum): byas pas srog chags med pa'i chu rnyog ma med pa dang bsres te/ snod gsar par ras spang du bcug nas nyi ma gsum du legs par mnan pas mnan la gzhag go// gtsang ba'i phyogs su bsrung ba byas te bdag
203a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyang gtsang mar byas nas/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi nya la ras kyi snod kyi mdun du kha shar du phyogs pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ sngags kyi tshig 'di lan stong phrag brgyad brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA
203b1(rgyud 'bum): oM he he b+ha ga bAn/ bA hu rU pa d+ha ra di bya tsak+Sha Sha/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya mAM sa ma ya ma nu wa ra/ ku mA ra rU pa d+hA riHNa/ ma hA bo d+hi satwe/ kiny+tsi rA ya si hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ sngags 'di bzlas pa byas
203b2(rgyud 'bum): la de nyid du nyal bar bya'o/ / rmi lam du grub pa'am mi 'grub pa ston par 'gyur ro// de nas langs nas grub pa'i mtshan ma'i rmi lam mthong na/ ring po mi thogs par ras ris bri bar bya'o// gal te grub pa'i mtshan
203b3(rgyud 'bum): ma'i rmi lam ma mthong na ras de snod de nas phyung ste nyi ma la bskam par bya'o/ / bskams nas slar yang snod gsar pa gzhan zhig tu legs par sbas la bsrung ba byas te gzhag par bya'o// de nas slar yang mchog gi snying po de
203b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams las sngags gang yang rung ba gcig bzung nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge drug po rnams las slar yang yi ge 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas ches myur bar ras ris 'grub par 'gyur ro// dang po re zhig ras de
203b5(rgyud 'bum): blangs nas/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam/ gzhan yang dkar po'i nyi ma dang / rgyu skar dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa/ dge ba'i tshe dkar po'i gza'i res kyi nyi ma la shin tu mdzes pa'i dge mtshan dang / bkra shis phun
203b6(rgyud 'bum): sum tshogs pa'i mtshan mo nam phyed kyi dus kyi tshe/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pas ras ris de 'drir gzhug par bya'o// gtsang ba'i phyogs su ga pur gyi bdug pa bsregs te/ dang po re zhig 'phags pa spyan
203b7(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa byas te/ dbu zur bud can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ gser gyi mdog can/ dar la sngon po g.yo bzhin pa'i sham thabs can/ dar la sngon rdos
204a1(rgyud 'bum): bla gos mnabs pa/ seng ge'i khri la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs te chos 'chang bzhin pa/ zhabs g.yas pa rin po che'i zhabs rten la bzhag pa/ seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ rnam pa thams cad
204a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ blta na sdug pa/ bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa/ sgrub pa po la gzigs par gyur pa bri bar bya'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/ rnga yab dkar po
204a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba bzhin pa/ phyag g.yon ni yang bzhin gyi nor bu bsnams pa/ lus thams cad mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar la sngon po g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa/ mu tig gi do shal
204a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas rnga yab dkar po gser gyi yu ba can bsnams nas g.yob par byed bzhin pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa can/ spyan ras
204a5(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug la lta bar gyur pa'o/ / de bzhin du 'phags pa kun tu bzang po pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste/ de dag gnyis ka'ang de ltar mngon par bri'o// pad+ma'i sdong bu gcig las 'thon pa'i
204a6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma gsum gyi dbu ma rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i ze 'bru la byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i seng ge'i khri dang rin po che'i zhabs rten no/ / pad+ma gzhan la ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'o// pad+ma gsum pa la ni 'phags
204a7(rgyud 'bum): pa mthu chen thob bo/ / pad+ma'i sdong bu de ni mdzes pa/ rin po che mar gad kyi rnam pa la pad+ma'i me tog du ma kha ma bye ba dang / phyed tsam kha bye ba dang / me tog kha bye ba dang ldan pa/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa
204b1(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis mtsho chen po las skyes pa'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin pa/ klu'i rgyal po de gnyis kha dog dkar ba/ gdengs ka bdun gyis brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis
204b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa/ lus phyed mi'i lus kha sbrul gyi gdengs ka sa mtshan pa/ phyed sbrul gyi lus 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la nges par rtog bzhin pa/ phyed chu'i nang du nub pa/ nor bu rin po che dang
204b3(rgyud 'bum): go kyis nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/ / mtshon chen po de'i khor yug gi 'og tu ras ris kyi mtha'i grwa g.yas kyi gzhogs su sgrub pa po/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi dkyil
204b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa/ lag na spos phor thogs pa/ lus dang pus mo'i lha nga 'dud pa/ cha byad dang kha dog ji lta ba de bzhin du mngon par bri'o// 'phags pa spu na ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
204b5(rgyud 'bum): steng du ras ris kyi mtha' gnyis su lha'i bu 'phreng ba 'dzin pa gnyis me tog gi 'phreng ba bzung nas nam mkha' la lding ba/ me tog gi tshogs chen po 'thor bar byed bzhin pa/ shin tu mdzes pa dag
204b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bri'o/ / ras ris de'i khor yug tu na ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rab tu bkram pa bri bar bya ste/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs gsum lhag par gnas pa 'am/ mngon par bri'o//
204b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa dang / 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang / 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje phyag na rnga yab thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// sgrub pa po ji
205a1(rgyud 'bum): ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs gsum po rnams gdon mi za bar 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang / dbyibs ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du 'am/ sgrub pa po ji lta ji ltar
205a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa de lta de ltar bri bar bya'o/ / dbus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mtha' gnyis su'ang phyag na rdo rje dang / kun tu bzang po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gdon mi za bar 'drir gzhug
205a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kyi dum bu mtho gang ngam/ khru gang tsam la bdag nyid dam/ gzhan gyis sam/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can nam/ gso sbyong med pa 'am/ dad pa med pa 'am/ dad pa
205a4(rgyud 'bum): can nam/ gtsang ma 'am/ mi gtsang ba 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'ang rung ste/ ri mo mkhan gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o// sgrub pa po bdag nyid ni gdon
205a5(rgyud 'bum): mi za bar sngon spyad pa byas pa/ dad pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gdon mi za bar 'gyur bas bya ste/ de ltar na sngags 'grub par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du sdig pa byed pas nams kyang ma yin no// de ltar
205a6(rgyud 'bum): dad par gyur pa yis/ / sngags kyi lha rnams bsgrub bya zhing // dad pa de yis gsang sngags rgyal// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni gzhan du min// gang phyir dad pa theg pa'i mchog/ gang gis 'dren pa 'gro bar byed//
205a7(rgyud 'bum): ngadang pa med pa'i mi rnams la// dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste// sa bon me yis tshig pa la// myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no// ngad dang ldan pa'i mi rnams la// sangs rgyas las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// lha
205b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun dang khyad par du/ / gsang sngags rnams ni thams cad ni// dad pa med na mi 'grub bo// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // gang yang 'jig rten 'das de bzhin// dad dang ldan par brjod pa dang //
205b2(rgyud 'bum): rnyog pa bral bas 'grub par 'gyur// yid ni byang chub der son pas// de rnams byang chub nges par 'grub// gzhan gyis grub par ma gsungs te// bstan pa 'di las zlog pa yin// ras ris chung dang chen po dang //
205b3(rgyud 'bum): bar ma yongs su bsgrags pa yin// las rnams thams cad sgrub byed pa// de ni rab tu bshad par bya// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las/ bcom ldan 'das
205b4(rgyud 'bum): ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi cho ga las/ / ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam lnga pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
205b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis sems can de rnams kyi don gyi phyir bstan pa gang yin pa de rnams ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam bshad pa 'di
