205b6(rgyud 'bum): thabs nyung ngu nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ de rnams kyi don gyi phyir sgrub par byed pa'i thabs yon tan rgyas pa rab tu dbye bas rnam par phye ba las rnam par dbye ba de yang dag par 'thun par bshad par bya yi//
205b7(rgyud 'bum): de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir bshad par bya'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
206a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'byor pa bsten par mdzad cing sngags kyi spyod pa'i yon tan sgrub pa'i mthu gsal bar mdzad pa legs par
206a2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa ni legs so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang da lta de'i dus la bab par dgongs nas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang
206a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel gyi kha
206a4(rgyud 'bum): dog la sogs pa byung bar gyur to/ / 'od zer de byung ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dud kyi gnas thams cad
206a5(rgyud 'bum): spa bkong bar mdzad nas/ rgyu skar gyi 'od dang / ri'i lha'i tshogs kyi 'od dang / gang du zla ba dang nyi ma 'di ltar mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag gi 'od kyang spa bkong bar mdzad nas/ de rnams mi gsal zhing
206a6(rgyud 'bum): 'od med par gyur te rnam par snang bar mi 'gyur zhing spa bkod par mdzad de/ nor bu dang / sngags dang / sman dang / rin po che'i 'od thams cad 'od med par byas nas/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya
206a7(rgyud 'bum): thub pa'i zhal gyi sgor nub par gyur to/ / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan las langs nas/ rings pa'i
206b1(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis po la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa
206b2(rgyud 'bum): mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje
206b3(rgyud 'bum): la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad kyi/ rgyu yod/ rkyen yod do// gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang
206b4(rgyud 'bum): / po bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa las sgrub par byed pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba/ chos kyi sprin la brten cing yang dag par rjes su
206b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar byed par 'gyur pa dang / 'dzin par 'gyur pa dang / klog par 'gyur ba dang / dad par 'gyur ba dang / glegs bam du bri bar byas nas mchong par 'gyur ba dang / tsan dan
206b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'am/ sil snyan gyi rnam pa'i khyad par ram/ rol po sna tshogs
206b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / pheg rdob pa dang / tha na rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgyun du thob pa 'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa skye bar byed par 'gyur ba 'am/ rig pa'i mthu dang nus pa thos nas dga' ba skye bar 'gar
207a1(rgyud 'bum): ba 'am/ rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ spyod pa so sor sgrub par 'gyur ba de rnams ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ de rnams thams
207a2(rgyud 'bum): cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su byed par 'gyur ro/ / de nyid kyi phyir rgyal ba 'dzum pa mdzad kyi/ rnam pa gzhan du ma yin no// dang po re zhig dam tshig mthong ba/ sngon spyad pa rnams byas pa/ mngon
207a3(rgyud 'bum): par dbang bskur ba thob pas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am/ snying po 'am/ nye ba'i snying po 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas yi ge gcig pa 'am/ ji ltar 'dod pa gzhan
207a4(rgyud 'bum): yang rung ste/ dgon pa chen por song nas lo bdun du bzlas pa bya ste/ 'bras bu dang / chu'i bza' ba dang / rtsa ba dang / 'dab ma bza' zhing / sngon spyod pa rnams byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ri'i rtse mor
207a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzegs te ras ris kyi thu bo zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag nas/ bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs te/ ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas pad+ma dkar po dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum gyis mngon par
207a6(rgyud 'bum): btags te/ 'bum phrag gcig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi ras ris kyi 'og nas
207a7(rgyud 'bum): dpral bar bya'o/ / ga pur gyi bdug par 'ji ltar 'byor pa bsreg go// lha'i bu rnams la ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gi mchod pa bya'o// de nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi dkar po'i nya'am/ nya so so la mtshan mo byed
207b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi dus kyi tshe ras ris kyi spyan sngar me thab pad+ma'i rnam pa lta bu byas nas/ tsan dan dkar po'i shing gis me sbar te/ gur kum dang ga pur gcig tu byas nas sreg blugs ji ltar 'byor pas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg
207b2(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ de nas bsrung ba bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las 'od zer byung ste/ ras ris kyi khor yug tu gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa 'byung ngo // de nas sgrub pa pos tsan dan dang gur kum
207b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis btags pa'i pad+ma dkar po'i me tog gis mchod yon dbul lo/ / de nas sgrub pa pos rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
207b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal nas sngar sgrub pa pos bris pa'i ras kyi mtha'i phyogs nas 'jigs pa med pas ras ris gzung bar bya'o// de nas
207b5(rgyud 'bum): bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur bar 'gyur te/ se gol gtogs pa tsam la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su kun tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang du bcom ldan
207b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par byed pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang mngon sum du
207b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong ste/ chos nyan par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/ de rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do// bskal pa chen po stong du rga ba med pa dang 'chi ba med par rol par 'gyur
208a1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / bris sku gnas pa de nyid du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyang shes so//
208a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing stong phrag kyang 'da' bar byed do// lus stong phrag ston par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu du ma yang dag par 'byin par byed par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge ba'i
208a3(rgyud 'bum): bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro/ / nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i sde snod// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol
208a4(rgyud 'bum): ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bris sku rab 'byam las/ mchog gi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga las kyi 'bras bu drug pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos
208a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'dug pa'i lha tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig/ las chen po dang bcas pa'i rig pa 'phags ma sgrol ma'i spyod
208a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa'i las kyi cho ga sgrub pa po srung ba'i don du gsang ba dam pa mchog gi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo gang gis bzlas
208a7(rgyud 'bum): pas sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro/ / kye kye lha'i tshogs rnams 'di ni 'da' bar byed pa ma yin pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu'i dbang phyug kyang rig pa 'dis 'gugs shing
208b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byed la/ yang dag par 'dod par gyur par byed na/ de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sngags thams
208b2(rgyud 'bum): cad dang bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa ste/ 'di ni brtson 'grus che ba dang / mthu che ba dang / gcig tu dpa' ba/ rig pa thams cad gcig kho nar sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bshad pa dang / gcig
208b3(rgyud 'bum): kho na rig pa'i rgyal po 'jigs pa chen po rnams las mchog tu bshad pa ste/ de gang zhe na/ las chen po thams cad byed pa/ don thams cad sgrub pa/ bya ba thams cad byed pa/ sngags thams cad gcod
208b4(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa/ gdug pa'i las rnams dang sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ sngags thams cad so sor rdzogs par byed pa/ dge bar byed pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
208b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rig pa dang sngags thams cad kyi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug pa/ thogs pa med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par gyur pa/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de
208b6(rgyud 'bum): / gang zhe na/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tA re tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ grogs po dag 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba dam pa/ las chen
208b7(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo sems can thams cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bkra shis pa/ rig pa dang sngags
209a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/ rig pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi dbang phyug/ rnam par sdang ba thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid/ skye bo
209a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams la snying brtse ba dang / bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa ste/ mdor ni ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar rab tu byed do// ma bsgrubs par yang las rnams byed do// rig pa bzlas nas gang
209a3(rgyud 'bum): la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / gos la mngon par bsngags nas gyon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// so shing la mngon par bsngags te zos na so nad sel bar 'gyur ro// ka ra bI ra dkar po la lan bdun
209a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bsngags nas zos na don du ma gnyer bar yang kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / mig gi nad la rgyam tsha phye mar byas pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas mig bkang na mig nad sel bar byed do//
209a5(rgyud 'bum): rna ba'i nad la glang po che'i rgyab nas thon pa 'brug sgrogs pa na 'byung ba'i tshe d+hi ka/ ka bu ka'i lo mar gtums te me chung ngus btso bar bya'o// tshos nas phyir btso ba byas la chu dro 'jam la rgyam tshwa dang sbyar ba byas
209a6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags te des rna ba dgang bar byas te skad cig de nyid la nye bar zhi bar byed do// bud med bu 'byung ba'i dus su mngal 'gags nas gzer bas zil gyis non par gyur na/ A Ta rlung Sha
209a7(rgyud 'bum): ka'i rtsa ba srog chags med pa'i chu la btags nas lte ba'i phyogs su byugs na bde blag tu btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ / skyes bu zug rngus nyams pa 'am mtshon nang du lus pa la mar rnying pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags
209b1(rgyud 'bum): nas blud par bya ba 'am/ de'i phyogs su byugs na/ de'i skad cig nyid la zug rngu med par 'gyur ro// ma zhu ba dang / gsud pa dang / tshad pa'i nad la kha ru tshwa dang / rgyam tshwa dang / tshwa gzhan gang yang rung ba la mngon
209b2(rgyud 'bum): par bsngags nas zos na nad de las grol bar 'gyur te/ nyi ma de nyid la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// ldan pa'i nad kyi tshad pa 'am/ 'phral gyi tshad pa la'ang rung ste/ ma tu lung ga'i rtsa ba btags nas srog
209b3(rgyud 'bum): chags med pa'i chu 'thung du gzhug ste gnod pa med par de las grol bar 'gyur te/ lan bdun bzlas pas sam/ gnyis bzlas pas so// bud med mo gsham mi skye ba'i chos rnams skye bar 'dod na
209b4(rgyud 'bum): a sho gan+ta'i rtsa ba ba'i mar dang lhan cig bskol te/ ba'i 'o mas bsres te lan nyi shu rtsa lnga yongs su bzlas te/ zla mtshan gyi dus su 'thung du bcug nas khrus byas pa'i mthar/ skyes pa gzhan spang zhing
209b5(rgyud 'bum): khyim pa'ang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongs su spangs na/ rang gi skyes pa 'am rang gi bdag po'i bu skye bar 'gyur ro// lo gsum mam/ lo lnga rab tu skye ba'i dus las lhag pa 'am/ lo du mar
209b6(rgyud 'bum): bu ma chags pa 'am/ gzhan gyi sngags dang / sman dang / gzhan gyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang / gzhan gyis gdug par byas pa 'am/ mngal 'dzin pa mi 'dzin par byas pa 'am/ nad kun tu langs pa
209b7(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ sbyor ba gzhan kun tu spangs pa'am/ nad gzhan gang yang rung ba cung zad kyis yongs su mi 'dzin par byas pa 'am/ brtan pa dang / g.yo ba dang / bcos ma dang / bcos ma ma yin pa la sogs
210a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dug la sogs pa rab tu zhugs pa 'am/ rtsa ba dang / sngags dang / sman dang / mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i sbyor ba byas pa la/ mar rnying pa dang rma bya'i mdongs gcig tu
210a2(rgyud 'bum): byas nas btags la/ sha ka ra dang lhan cig sbyar te lan nyi shu rtsa bdun mngon par bsngags nas a ru ra tsam bza' bar bya ste/ nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du sha ka ra dang ldan pa'i 'o ma bskol ba btung bar byazhing
210a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dang yang du sngags kyang bzlas so/ / klad pa na ba la bya rog gi gshog pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags te/ des bya bas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// bud med la ches spyad pa la sogs pa'i
210a4(rgyud 'bum): nad rnams la a lam bu sha'i rtsa ba 'o a dang lhan cig btag sa nas ni li ka'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas nas 'o mas skyo mar sbyar nas btung bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du rims
210a5(rgyud 'bum): nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / rgyun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / rims drag po la sogs pa rnams la 'o thug mar dang sbyar la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon
210a6(rgyud 'bum): par sngags te 'thung du bcug na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis zin pa la bdag nyid kyi 'dong la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas bltas na bde bar gnas par
210a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du ma mo dang / byis pa dang / srul po dang / ro langs dang / grul bum gyi gdon la sogs pa rnams dang / mi thams cad gdug pa can drag pos mngon par zin pa la bdag nyid kyi lag pa
210b1(rgyud 'bum): la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te/ zin pa de'i mgo bo la reg na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// lan gcig bzlas pas bdag nyid srung ngo // gnyis bzlas pas grogs po srung ngo // gsum bzlas pas khyim
210b2(rgyud 'bum): srung ngo / / bzhi bzlas pas grong srung ngo // lnga bzlas pas grong gi spyod yul du gyur pa srung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ji srid stong phrag gi bar du bzlas pas dmag gi tshogs bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// 'di rnams
210b3(rgyud 'bum): sam gzhan yang las phra mo rnams ma bsgrub par yang byed do/ / de nas sgrub par 'dod na phra mo'i las rnams mi bya bar mtha' gcig tu song nas rnam par dben pa'i phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung 'bab pa dang / rgya mtsho
210b4(rgyud 'bum): ngogs dang / gang+gA'i klung gi ngogs dang / gzhan yang chu klung chen po'i ngogs la brten nas/ phyogs gtsang ma phyag bdar byas nas khrus lan gsum bya zhing / gos lan gsum brjes te smra ba bcad de slong mo'i kha zas za zhing /
210b5(rgyud 'bum): lo ma dang / nas zan dang / 'o ma dang / 'bras bu za zhing 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas pa bya'o// grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na/ de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste phyogs de nyid du ras ris thu bo der bzhag la/ ras ris
210b6(rgyud 'bum): la mchod pa chen po byas nas gser dngul gyi rang bzhin nam/ zangs dang sa'i rang bzhin gyi mar me'i snod tu ru ka'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba 'am/ dri zhim po'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba 'am/ ba'i mar gyis bkang ba'i
210b7(rgyud 'bum): mar me'i snod du ras gsar pa dum bu dum bur byas pa'i mar me 'bum phrag gcig ras ris la dbul bar bya'o/ / de'i khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba rnams phul ma thag tu ras ris las 'od zer rnams 'byung ste/ 'od zer rnam
211a1(rgyud 'bum): byung ma thag tu ras ris kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bar 'gyur ro/ / steng gi bar snang la rnga bo che'i bla sgrogs shing legs so zhes pa'ang thos te/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ri
211a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtha'i zur du sgrub pa po sngar bris pa ras ris la brten pa la mchod yon phul nas bskor ba byas te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas la gzung bar bya'o// de nas bzung ba tsam gyis mar ma 'dzin pa de rnams
211a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis lhan cig tu 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ / gcig gis lhag pa'i gzhal med khang brgyar yang 'gro bar byed do// lha'i sil snyan dang so sor yang dag par ldan pa dang / sgra sbar pa'i glu dbyangs sgrogs shing
211a4(rgyud 'bum): gar byed pa'i rig pa 'dzin ma de rnams kyis khor yug tu kun tu khyab par snang ba sgrub pa po rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba byed do/ / mar me 'dzin pa de rnams kyis lhan cig rga ba med cing 'chi ba
211a5(rgyud 'bum): med par rol par byed do/ / bskal pa chen por gnas shing nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba dang / lha'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa dang / rnam par bkra ba'i gos kyis brgyan pa de rnams dbang du byas nas mngag gzhug par
211a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ de rnams dang lhan cig rnam par spyod par gyur te/ lha'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'di'i bran nyid du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur zhing ring du 'tshe zhing
211a7(rgyud 'bum): grub pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ / mchog tu skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing / rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// rdzas thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
211b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad la mchod pa byed pa la dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / skad cig tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mngon par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis kyang grangs su mi 'gro na/ de las gzhan pa'i
211b2(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi sa lta ci smos/ mthar yang 'di sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro// las sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan
211b3(rgyud 'bum): yang yod de/ ches dka' thub byas pa/ de nas mtha' gcig tu song nas lhag par gnas te 'du 'dzin med cing 'du 'dzi dang bral ba'i dgon pa chen por zhugs nas/ gnas gang na pad+ma'i mtsho chen po
211b4(rgyud 'bum): dang chu dang bcas pa/ ri bo gcig la brten pa'i ri de'i rtse mor 'dzegs te/ rig pa rnams kyis dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul nas/ de rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'o ma 'am/ nas zan dang
211b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu bza' zhing 'o ma las byung ba zos te rig pa 'bum phrag bcur bzlas par bya'o// bzlas pa'i mthar yang sngar bstan pa'i cho ga de nyid kyis ras ris kyi thu bo bzhugs nas/
211b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i me tog la tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum gyis btags te seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar nas/ sngar yongs su brtags pa'i pad+mas stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas sbyin
211b7(rgyud 'bum): sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ste/ des sgrub pa po kun tu snang bar byas nas spyi bor nub par 'gyur ro// reg ma thag tu sgrub pa po mngon par shes pa lngar
212a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob bo// lha'i gzugs kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu ste/ bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug tu 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
212a2(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa drug 'da' bar byed do/ / de rnams kyi mthu'ang yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa drug mnyes par byed do// de rnams kyang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bas mngon par dga' bar
212a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / mthar yang byang chub la mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// ji srid byang chub tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i
212a4(rgyud 'bum): mthar thug pa'i bar du'o/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ las mchog
212a5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bdun pa'i le'u rab 'byam yongs su rdzogs so/ / / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang sgrub pa'i las mchog gsungs te/ rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di/
212a6(rgyud 'bum): la rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sngags yongs su bzung nas gang+gA'i klung du zhugs nas gru'i bzhon pa la rab tu gnas te/ gang+gA'i dbus su 'o ma dang chu btung zhing / stong phrag sum cur ji ltar 'dod pa'i nyin zhag gi bzlas pa bya'o//
212a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bzlas pa'i mthar klu thams cad mthong ngo // de nas sgrub pa brtsam ste/ gru'i dbus de nyid du ma thab pad+ma'i rnam pa bya'o// de nas na ga ge sa ra la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis ras ris la mchod pa chen po bya'o//
212b1(rgyud 'bum): ras ris kyi thu bo zhal nub tu mngon par phyogs par gzhag ste/ bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs tu ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ na ga ge sar gyi me tog re re la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas seng ldeng gi
212b2(rgyud 'bum): shing gis me sbar te/ tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum bsres pa'i na ga ge sar gyi me tog rnams kyis stong phrag bcu'i bar ji srid par sbyin sreg bya'o// gzhan klu rnams mthong ba na nye bar bcings pa'i dngos grub
212b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdzas rnams rab tu chags pas blang bar mi bya'o/ / gang las sbyin sreg gi mthar gru'i bzhon pa dang lhan cig 'brar bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// klu'i dbang po rgyal po thams cad
212b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang rjes su 'brang zhing bran bzhin du gnas so/ / bar gyi bskal pa sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rang dbang du spyod par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba la thogs pa med do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum
212b5(rgyud 'bum): du mthong ste/ de'i spyi bo la reg par mdzad do// reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro// nges par sangs rgyas nyid du lhag par 'gro bar byed do// gzhan yang mchog gi sgrub pa'i cho ga'i sgrub thabs
212b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba ni sngar bzhin du gang+gA'i klung du zhugs nas bil ba'i shing gi rang bzhin gyis shing gcig nyid kyis gru'i bzhon pa byas nas shin tu brtan pa legs par byas pa der mngon par 'dzegs nas/ bde ba'i shing
212b7(rgyud 'bum): gi rang bzhin gyi skya ba nges gru de'i rjes su sgrub pa po ches mkhas shing gsal ba nyid kyis g.yab par bya ste/ gang+gA'i klung chen po yongs su mi dor bar kun nas thad kar ram rgyun rings su g.yab par bya'o// de nasaH
213a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rig pa bzung nas sam/ snying po 'am/ nye ba'i snying po 'am/ yi ge gcig pa 'am/ khro bo 'am/ pho nya 'am/ ring du rjes su 'brang ba 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags
213a2(rgyud 'bum): bzung nas ras ris kyi thu bo de nyid du zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag nas/ bdag nyid dang por shar du mngon par phyogs la/ phyis ni ji ltar 'dod par bya'o// 'o ma dang / nas zan dang / 'bras bu bza' ba 'am/
213a3(rgyud 'bum): chu 'am/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu bza' zhing smra ba bcad de/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / gos lan gsum du brjes te/ shin tu dkar ba'i las kun tu spyod cing shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pas/ dang
213a4(rgyud 'bum): po re zhig ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar nye bar bstan pa bzhin du sngar cho ga mthong bas rig pa 'bum phrag drug cu bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas gal te rtsa ba'i rig par 'gyur ro// de nas stong phrag drug cu bzlas
213a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mthar gru rgya mtsho chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas sgrub pa'i yo byad rnams bsdus te sngar gyi gnas de nyid du gzhag par bya'o// de nas gru'i bzhon pa rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba na/ 'jigs par mi bya zhing /
213a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlog par mi bya'o// sgrub pa po'i dbang las ma gtogs par bzlog par nub pa'ang ma yin no// de nas dpag tshad stong du gnas pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang yud tsam gyis 'jug par byed de/ lam thung
213a7(rgyud 'bum): na lta ci smos/ der zhugs nas chu'i steng du sgrub pa'i las brtsam par bya'o// de nas me thab sngar gyi rnam pa 'am/ rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i sa'i snod du seng ldeng gi me sbar la/ na ga ge sar gyi
213b1(rgyud 'bum): ze 'bru dang / me tog tsan dan dkar po dang ga pur dang bsres pa'i sreg blugs ches nyung ba 'am/ ches mang ba'i tshad kyang rung ste/ sngar bzhin du rtsa ba'i rig pas 'bum phrag drug cu sbyin sreg bya'o//
213b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg byed pa na/ lang ka'i grong na gnas pa'i srin po gzugs sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams hA hA zhes sgrogs pa dang / klu'i grong longs spyod ldan na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs
213b3(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba/ ches zhi ba dang / ches khro ba rnams langs te/ klu dang srin po rnams kyang 'di skad ces smra'o// khyed bzhengs shig khyed bzhengs shig/ bdag cag gi rje bo mdzod cig ces so// de bzhin du lha
213b4(rgyud 'bum): ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grub pa dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang rab tu chags par byed mod kyi/ ldang bar mi bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngags bzlas shing
213b5(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par bya'o/ / de nas rnam par 'byor zhing phan tshun du rab tu 'bros la 'jigs par byed do// de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar gru des sgrub pa po de khyer nas skad cig la
213b6(rgyud 'bum): 'og min gyi gnas su 'gro bar byed do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du'ang 'gro zhing 'ong bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i sems shes par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po
213b7(rgyud 'bum): dang mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// klu thams cad dang / srin po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang /
214a1(rgyud 'bum): lha thams cad dang / lha ma yin thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyang 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te/ bka' bzhin byed pa la bzhag nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
214a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams 'di'i sngags grub pa de rnams kyang 'di la byams pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro// rjes su 'dod par 'gyur ro//
214a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad kyis mi tshug par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang las kyi cho ga mchog gi sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni bil ba'i shing la gru bo che'i bzhon pa byed du gzhug ste/ shing gcig gi bzhon pa 'am/
214a4(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa'ang rung ste gnas chen po bya'o// gang+gA'i dbus kyi gling der gnas pa'i gru'i bzhon par skyes bu brgya nyi shu lag na sgron me thogs pa rnams gru'i bzhon pa la 'dzegs te/ gos dkar po gyon zhing
214a5(rgyud 'bum): bsrung ba byas pa ras ris kyi thu bo sngar gyi tsho gas kun tu bzhag pa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas na ga ge sar gyi bye ma rnams dang / gur kum dang /
214a6(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan dkar po dang / ga pur bsres pa dang / seng ldeng gi sreg blugs stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar gru de skad cig tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro zhing
214a7(rgyud 'bum): 'ong bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar byed do// mthong ba tsam las thob par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
214b1(rgyud 'bum): yun ring du 'tsho zhing / bskal ba chen por gnas par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// mar me 'dzin pa de rnams kyang 'di'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'grub
214b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / lhan cig spyod pa de rnams dang thabs cig tu ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu zhing / rang dgar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur gyis mngon par
214b3(rgyud 'bum): dgyes par 'gyur ro/ / mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang las kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs dam par 'gyur ba ni/ chu klung 'gram mam rgya mtsho'i ngogs// de bzhin kha ba can gyi ri// ri yi rgyal po
214b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bigs byed de/ / der ni las mchog bsgrub par bya// sa h+ye ma la ya nyid dang // ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang dang // bya rgo phung po'i ri rgyal du// las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya// rgya mtsho chen po'i brag dang ni// shing sogs
214b5(rgyud 'bum): me tog ldan pa ste/ / rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni// phyogs 'di rnams su bsgrub par bya// rnam par dben pa'i phyogs gtsang ma// bas mtha' grong pa'i chos spangs par// gsang sngags rgyal po
214b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / de bzhin kho nar thams cad du// ri bo dang ni tshang tshing dang // bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' ba// de bzhin rgyal bas spangs pa yi// gdug pa'i sems can rnams bral bar// gsang
214b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags rgyal po thams cad bsgrub/ / rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i yul// skye bo gtsang sbra spyod la dga'// ma dang phal gus pa dang // gnyis skyes rigs kyis dor ba ru// lha rnams dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
215a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas der yin gyi gzhan du min// nyams dga' skal ldan shing rta'i 'gras// yaman nyid rang mdzes pa// sin+d+hu nar ma bye'o// zla ba'i na ni gtsang ma'i 'jas// kA tre rI dang dbyangs
215a2(rgyud 'bum): can nyid/ / chu klung chen po shI ta nyid// 'di dag grub zhing gzhan min par// stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad// stobs bcu pa yis gsungs pa'i zhing // byang phyogs lam med ri bo dang // kha che dang ni rgya yul
215a3(rgyud 'bum): dang bal yul de bzhin mang yul dang / / rgyan ga che dang li yul nyid// de dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing // byang gi phyogs su brten pa yi// gang yang+ga ri dang chu bo yang // bsod nams yul du rab tu brjod// nas dAng
215a4(rgyud 'bum): gro ni za ba'o/ / gang du sems can snying rje ldan// de ru rtag par dngos grub 'gyur// dpal gyi ri bo brag ri che// lho phyogs yul du gnas pa yi// dpal ldan 'bras spungs mchod rten ni// sa stengs rgyal ba'i
215a5(rgyud 'bum): ring bsrel 'dzin/ / der ni sngags rnams bsgrub par bya// myur du las dang las rnams so// rdo rje gdan dang mchod rten che// chos kyi 'khor lo mdzes pa dang // gang du thub gtso zhi bar gshegs// der yang
215a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub blta bar bya/ / lha las babs pa'i mchod rten che// sa pak+She dang cho 'phrul che// ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog dang // lum pa'i tshal du 'khrungs pa der// gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur//
215a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bas bstod cing rab bsngags pa'i// bya rgod phung po'i ri der dang // de bzhin brag dang bsil ba'i tshal// me tog ces bya'i grong mchog dang // de bzhin rtag tu kA sha'i grong // bcom brlag ka bya
215b1(rgyud 'bum): kub dzaM dang / / sa stengs grong ni 'phags rgyal dang // mchod rten de bzhin yangs pa can// rtag tu sa stengs mi thi la// grong dang grong khyer gtso bo rnams// gang gzhan rgyal ba yang dag 'byung // rab
215b2(rgyud 'bum): bsngags bsod nams yul dag tu/ / de rnams su ni dngos grub sgrub// 'di rnams las gzhan yul rnams ni// grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang // gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni// 'o ma'am 'bab
215b3(rgyud 'bum): chu la brten pa/ / der ni rnam dben rjes 'jug cing // bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' bar 'gyur// gnas ni bla khab med pa dang // rtag tu khang pa stong pa ru// sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'o// sngags rnams
215b4(rgyud 'bum): rjes mthun las rnams ni/ / sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su// sngags bzlas yang dag 'dod par bya// bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson// sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms// tshul khrims
215b5(rgyud 'bum): spyod cing shin tu bden/ / 'byung po kun la phan par dga'// sngags kyi spyod pa la dad pa// btul zhugs can gyis sngar bzhin 'das// gtsang ma'i yul dang gtsang sbra can// kla klo rkun ma
215b6(rgyud 'bum): spangs pa dang / / sems can sdig sbrul la sogs pa// spangs pa'i sa phyogs 'dod par bya// 'bras bu me tog yang dag ldan// dri med chu ni rab bsngags pa// sngags rig pas ni sngags bsnyen
215b7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / yul gzhan rnams su bsgrag mi bya// lha yi gnas sam dur khrod dang // brtan pa'i mtshan ma gcig pa dang // rtags gcig de bzhin pas mtha' ru// sngags rig sngags ni bsnyen pa bya//
216a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag dang grogs rnams bsrungs byas nas// sngar spyad gsang sngags ldan pa dang // sngags pas rtag tu sngags bzlas bya// dgon pa che mchog shing chen dang // me tog/
216a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu la sogs 'byung // ri yi rtse dang khung bu dang // chu yi gnas ni gtsang mar bcas// 'bab chu che 'gram yid 'ong bar// sngags rig pas ni sngags bsnyen bya// sngags shes gnas 'di
216a3(rgyud 'bum): nges rtogs byed/ / shar phyogs su yang chu klung che// lu hi ta 'gram dge ba dang // de bzhin kA ma ru pa'i yul// grong mchog 'phel bar byed pa dang / dma' ba gang du 'di 'gro mchog/ 'dug pa dang /
216a4(rgyud 'bum): ni chu klung mchog/ gnas der rtag tu zlos pa dang // gtsang ma blo gros ldan pas bsten// sngon du bsnyen pa'ang der gyis shig/ gang+gA'i sgo ru las rnams kun// de bzhin rtag tu gang+gA dang // dug can
216a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ni phrad pa ru/ / rab tu sbyor ba kun nyid dang // gtsang ma'i sngags kyi bzlas pa bya// dur khrod che dang gzhan nyid ni// zlos pos der ni rtag tu bzlas// dri med chu dang 'bab chu ni// srog chags rnams
216a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis spangs pa ru/ / de nyid phyir ni shin tu ni// mnyam bzhag sngags kyi zlas pa bya// der ni 'jig rten bsam pa yi// bsod nams min pa cung zad mthong // 'on kyang sngags kyi nyer bstan pas// cung zad
216a7(rgyud 'bum): dus su 'dug par bya/ / de nas gzhan du 'gro bar bya// zla ba gzas zin dus der ni// dus la bab na dus cung zad// der 'dug bya yi gzhan du min// gzhan du sngags rig ci nus pas// de nas myur du 'gro
216b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / bde gshegs mchod rten bzhugs pa yi// sa steng rnams su kun tu 'dug/ 'jig rten mu stegs thams cad ni// lta ba ngan par lhung ba rnams// mu stegs can gzhan gnas rnams ni//
216b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags rig pas ni rtag tu spang // sngags shes der ni mi bsdad do// skyes mchog blo gros rgyu ngan pa// rgyal ba mchog gis gang bzhugs dang // rang rgyal bse ru lta bu dang // byang chub sems dpa'
216b3(rgyud 'bum): skal ba che/ / rgyal mchog sras po nyan thos rnams// de rnams kun bzhugs sa steng gi/ yul rnams kun tu sngags shes pas// 'bad pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya// mnyam par bzhag pas gsang
216b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni/ / gnas de ru ni bzlas par bya// gsungs pa'i gnas ni 'di rnams su/ gsungs pa'i las rnams thams cad dang // las kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs rnams//
216b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams rnyed par ma gyur na// gang yang rung ba'i gnas der ni// gtsang mas sngon du bsnyen pa bya// dad cing mos pas sgrub thabs kyi// cho ga mchog gi las brtsam mo// dang po re zhig bris sku'i thu bo zhal nub tu bstan
216b6(rgyud 'bum): nas bzhag ste/ bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs la grog mkhar gyi sa 'am/ gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram gyis blangs nas/ pu shel tsi dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum dang / ga pur rnams bsres la
216b7(rgyud 'bum): rma bya'i gzugs byas te/ de bris sku'i spyan sngar bzhag nas rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ku sha gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung bas 'khor lo'i rnam pa byas nas bris sku'i spyan sngar lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/
217a1(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yon pas ni rma bya'o// dkar po'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan phyed na bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ ga pur gyi bdug pa bsregs pa'i dri dang / ji srid ram langs pa'i bar
217a2(rgyud 'bum): de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe de rma bya'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// 'khor lo'ang 'bar ro// bdag nyid lha'i 'phreng ba dang gos 'chang zhing rnam par brgyan pa dang / nyi ma 'char ka 'dra
217a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas te ras ris la bskor ba byas la/ ras ris blangs nas rma bya'i gdan de la 'dug na yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
217a4(rgyud 'bum): las 'da' bar byed do/ / rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba'i 'og 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa drug cu'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar
217a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod par 'gro zhing rab tu spyod par 'gyur ro/ / thogs pa med par 'gro'o// lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro//
217a6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro// mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dbyig pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / ldong ros dang / gi'u wang
217a7(rgyud 'bum): dang ral gri dang / lcags mda' dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / dgra b+ha dang / mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ sa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi ba dang /
217b1(rgyud 'bum): bya dang / bzhon pa'i khyad par seng ge dang / b+ha ga dang / gzig la sogs pa rnams grog mkhar gyi sa las byas pa 'am/ dri zhim po'i dri zhim bsres pa las byas pa 'am/ stan dang / bzhon pa dang /
217b2(rgyud 'bum): mal cha dang / gdugs dkar po dang / cod pan dang / rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad dang / rin po che'i bye brag thams cad dang / rab tu byung ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag thams cad la bgrang 'phreng dang / mchil lham
217b3(rgyud 'bum): dang shing lham dang / lhung bzed dang / cho gos dang / khab dang / gri la sogs pa rgyal gyi lcags las byas pa 'am/ gzhan yang gang cung zad sems can gyi yo byad snod la sogs pa rgyal gyi lcags las
217b4(rgyud 'bum): byas pa 'am/ grog mkhar gyi sa 'am/ chu klung gi sa las byas pa de thams cad pa'i rnam lngas bkrus nas mngon par bsang gtor byas te snga ma bzhin du sbyong ba'i sngags sam/ yi ge gcig pa'i sngags sam/
217b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags gzhan gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs pa ma gtogs pa sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i rig pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar mngon par dga'
217b6(rgyud 'bum): bas bdag nyid srung zhing grogs po'ang yongs su bskyab par byas pa/ shin tu gsang thub cing sngags dang rgyud shes pa/ sngar bstan pa'i gnas su bris sku zhal nub tu bstan la gzhag ste bdag nyid
217b7(rgyud 'bum): sngar bzhin du'o/ / bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtso bo rag pur gyi bdug pa bsregs te sngar bstan pa'i mtshon cha dang / yo byad dang / sems can gyi khyad par rnams sngar bstan pa'i bcos mar
218a1(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ yar de'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo rdzas de rnams gang rung thangs te mtshan mo ji srid du bzlas pa byas na nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe bar skabs 'dir bris sku la 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba
218a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po kun tu mthong ngo / / gal te sgrub pa po bzhon pa'i khyad par blangs par gyur na/ de la zhon nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram/ mtshon cha'i khyad par blangs
218a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'am/ bcangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'gro zhing lha'i lus can nyi ma shar ba dang mtshungs pa/ 'od zer chen po'i 'phreng ba dang ldan pa/ glog ltar
218a4(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba'i sku/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/ ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba'i lha'i nor bu rin po
218a5(rgyud 'bum): che'i gzhal yas khang na spyod pa/ sngar yongs su brtag pa'i sa'i rang bzhin gyi bzhon pa gang gis grub pa de nyid mthu chen por 'gyur te/ de nyid 'di'i bzhon pa dang / de nyid 'di'i grogs po ste/ gzhan gyi
218a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi dngos grub bzlog par gyur pa/ bdag gi sngags kyi dngos grub kun tu sbyar bar byas pa/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can/ phan par 'dod pa/ rtag tu rjes su bcings pa/ de nyid 'di'i mtshon cha dang /
218a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyan dang / rin po che'i bye brag dang / stan dang / mal cha dang / sems can la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di'i bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba chen po rtag tu rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ro// mthu chen po dang /
218b1(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus chen po dang / lus chen por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mngon sum du mthong zhing / legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste spyi bor byugs nas ji srid byang chub snying po rjes su thob kyi bar du dge ba'i
218b2(rgyud 'bum): bshes gnyen mdzad de/ stobs bcu po rnams nges par kun nas thob ste/ mchod pa'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kyis zil gyis ma non pa dang / 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// yang
218b3(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i mtha'i rigs rgyun mi gcod pa dang / sa thob par yang 'gyur ro// stobs bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyid du nges pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro// mdor bsdus na las mchog thams cad dang /
218b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas mchog la gnas pas ras ris mchog gi spyan sngar mchod pa mchog la mngon par dga' bas las mchog gzhan nyid bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa nyid nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'dug
218b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa rjes su thob par byed pa nyid dang / lus 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams su kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang / stobs bcu'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
218b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa byams pa mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang / chos bstan pa don yod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu gnon cing rjes
218b7(rgyud 'bum): su thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos kyi sprin rnam par 'byor pa la rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang / nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba med cing bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun gyis rab tu zhi bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
219a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten rjes su 'dzin pa la rab tu 'jug cing nan tan byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung don
219a2(rgyud 'bum): yod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rab tu sgom pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan
219a3(rgyud 'bum): thos bdag nyid chen po rnams 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/ rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ sngags kyi mthu rab 'byam dang ldan pa ras ris thu bo spyan lnga dang nye bar 'dug nas/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las
219a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi cho ga dang / rgyud thams cad du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lam ste/ mdor na 'dir rtog pa gzhan du gsungs pa'i las rnams kyis kyang ras ris kyi rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya
219a5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ myur du de rnams kyi sngags kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ gang ngas bstan pa de dag gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/
219a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen badzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ ras ris mchog gi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom lda 'das
219a7(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pas slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga par ma'i las kyi cho ga'i sgrub
219b1(rgyud 'bum): thabs par ma yod do/ / de mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya yis/ legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
219b2(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ston pa 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa/ bdag cag la thugs
219b3(rgyud 'bum): brtse ba'i don dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas/ gang de'i dus la bab par dgongs na de gsung du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
219b4(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ dang po re zhig tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / gtsang sbra'i kun tu spyod pa
219b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / bsam gtan dang / cho ga dang / gang du rab tu gnas pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang bcas shing
219b6(rgyud 'bum): don med par mi 'gyur ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ de ngas bshad kyi/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ dang po re zhig rig pa'i brtul zhugs
219b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba dang po nyid du yang dag par blangs te/ dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis nye bar bstan pa'i dam tshig la yang dag par rjes su 'jug par bya'o//
220a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ sngar nges par bstan pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba thob pa/ khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho
220a2(rgyud 'bum): gshes pa/ mkhas pa gsal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ bden par smra ba/ spro ba che ba/ byas pa gzo ba/ brtan pa/ sems bzang ba/ ha cang mi rgan cing ha cang mi gzhon pa// rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad
220a3(rgyud 'bum): la 'dod pa med pa/ tshangs par spyod pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ rnyed pa tsam gyis sam/ longs spyod kyi rgyur ram/ rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang brdzun mi smra na/ shin tu chung ngu tsam nyid dang / rnyed pa dang / rmongs
220a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnam pa lta ci smos/ dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / 'byung po thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du snying brtse ba dang ldan pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sngar spyad pa byas pa khyod kyi gsang ba'i rig pa dang
220a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags rjes su zlos pa/ rig pa sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa/ khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten shes pa/ yang dag par rjes su 'dzin par byed pa/ 'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa/
220a6(rgyud 'bum): legs pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ mi 'jigs shing mi gnod la/ chags pa med pa/ dpa' ba/ brtson 'grus brtan pa/ nad med pa ste/ nad gang gis las su mi rung ba'i ngang tshul can dang / rigs che zhing mtho
220a7(rgyud 'bum): bar rab tu skyes pa zhes pa/ yon tan 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur te/ sgrub pa po'ang de dang 'dra ba 'am/ yan lag cung zad ma rdzogs pa'o// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob
220b1(rgyud 'bum): dpon la mchod pa byas nas 'di'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa dang / sngags dang / bcom ldan 'das ma de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig
220b2(rgyud 'bum): la rjes su 'jug par 'tshal na/ bdag cag la rjes su brtse ba'i don dang / phan pa'i thugs bskyed nas de slob dpon gyis gsung du gsol/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma
220b3(rgyud 'bum): ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis brtags nas gzhug par bya zhing / sngar bzhin du mngon par dbang bskur ba byin nas rig pa dang sngags byin la/ rim pa ji lta bar dam tshig bstan par bya'o// gsang chen dang / phyag rgya dang /
220b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyud dang / sngags dang / las rnams kyang dus ring mo nyid nas yongs su brtags te bsam pa shes nas rgyud dang sngags la sogs pa dang / las rnams thams cad bstan par bya'o// gzhan du ma yin no zhes
220b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho ga 'di rab tu bsgrags so/ / de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la ji ltar nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa'am bdag nyid dang longs spyod kyang dbul bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor
220b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ / bu bzhin du sbyang bar bya'o// ma bzhin longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o// de nas sgrub pa po des rig pa dang sngags gang yang rung ba zhig bzung
220b7(rgyud 'bum): nas mtha' gcig tu song ste/ sngar bstan pa'i gnas rgya cher gong ma bzhin du sbyar bas rig pa la sogs pa de rnams nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / mar me dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang /
221a1(rgyud 'bum): @#gtor ma dang / lha bshos dag dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i cho ga nyid kyis rgyas par byas te spyan drangs nas gdan phul te/ thun mtshams gsum du khrus gsum bya zhing / go sa lan
221a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum brjes te nyi ma so so la bzlas pa bya'o/ / de la thun mtshams kyi dus zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha' nas brtsams te ji srid nyi ma 'char ba'i dus tsam gyi bar 'di la dang por shad do// nyi ma gung ni nyi ma
221a3(rgyud 'bum): shar ba'i mthar dus tsam gyi tshad kyi mtshams nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la yang dag par brten pa ni cho ga shes pas gung gi thun mtshams su shes par bya'o/ / nub pa'i dus su'ang lhag ma bzhi cha
221a4(rgyud 'bum): tsam ni thun mtshams gsum par brjod par bya'o/ / slob dpon mkhas pa shes nyen can// tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan// chen po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang // kun nas brtson 'grus brtan pa
221a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / sngags dang rgyud sogs yang dag ldan// bya ba kun la blo gros byang // phra zhing mkhas la tshod shes pa// chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin// spro ba che zhing gzi brjid ldan// 'jig rten chos la ltos
221a6(rgyud 'bum): pa med/ / thub pa mchog gi chos la dad // 'jig rten pa rnams dor ba dang // bzlas pa byas shing rnam dben shes// sngon du bsnyen pa rjes brten pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gsangs sngags shes//
221a7(rgyud 'bum): de las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams mthong // sangs rgyas kyis gsung gsang sngags dang // 'jig rten pa yi rab sbyor shes// bsrung ba byas shing mthu brtan pa// gtsang sbra'i kun spyod la rtag dga'// sangs
221b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyus nyer bstan lam la ni/ / kun nas rjes su 'jug pa dang // rab bsngags rgyal bas gsungs pa yi// gsang sngags zlos la rtag tu brtson// rtag tu mthong chos 'bras bu dang // 'jig rten pa
221b2(rgyud 'bum): rol de bzhin nyid/ / sdig pa kun la 'jigs pa dang // phra mo tsam la'ang de bzhin no// gtsang zhing mkhas la le lo mong // yid gzhungs blta na sdug pa dang // stobs bcu pas bshad sngags
221b3(rgyud 'bum): gang dang / / de bzhin kho nar rgyal sras dang // 'jig rten pa yi sngags gang nyid// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag la la// de la rtag tu ngal bar byas// gzhung dang bstan bcos don 'dzin pa// nad med
221b4(rgyud 'bum): nus pa med min pa/ / rga dang nad ni rnam par spangs// de bzhin shes nyen can sngags grub// kun nas myur du byed pa dang // mtha' ring min zhing de bzhin du// nga rgyal chung zhing zur gyis go/ tshangs par
221b5(rgyud 'bum): spyod cing shes rab che/ / khyad par du ni shes pa dang // gcig tu 'du 'dzi med pa dang // dpa' zhing dbang bskur thob pa dang // de 'dir byang chub pha rol son// srid pa zhi bar byed la brtson// de bzhin nyid
221b6(rgyud 'bum): du rig sngags byas/ / mthu chen 'jig rten shes pa dang // 'gro ba sems can rjes sems pa// dpal nyid dang ni rab tu ldan// sbyin dang 'byung po phan la dga'// de bzhin khyad 'phags slob dpon la//
221b7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu gsol ba gdab par bya// des ni dkyil 'khor bris pa yi// sngags kyi dngos grub ster bar byed// de nyid kyis ni dbang bskur gyis// 'bras bu chen po sbyin par 'gyur// dngos grub 'dod pa'i slob mas
222a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / thub pa bzhin du rtag tu mchod// de yi gsung ni mi 'gom pa// slob mas 'bad pas bya ba yin// ji ltar 'byor cing bdog pa yi// longs spyod de la dbul bar bya// nyung ngu
222a2(rgyud 'bum): tsam mam mang yang rung / / gang gis mnyes par 'gyur ba dang // lus ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu yi phyir// pha la nor ni ster ba ltar// de bzhin slob ma chos shes pas// slob dpon la ni nor dbul bya// mtha' yi dbang
222a3(rgyud 'bum): phyuphyag dngos grub thob/ / tshe dang de bzhin nad med dang // rgyas pa'i 'gro ba thob par 'gyur// slob mas bla ma de mchod na// de yis sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur// lam dang cho ga nyer mthong dang // bsnyen pa
222a4(rgyud 'bum): las dang brten pa las/ / de bzhin ri mor byas mchod las// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par 'gyur// de bzhin rgyal mchog sras rnams dang // lha rnams thams cad dgyes par 'gyur// bla ma rtag tu
222a5(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen bkur na/ / bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba yi// 'di dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur// sgrub pos sngon dang thog mar ni// dam tshig la ni rjes 'jug bya// dman nam de dag mnyam yang rung // gal
222a6(rgyud 'bum): te ches mchog gyur pa 'am/ / rmongs pa'am lhag par khro ba yis// rtag tu bla ma brnyas mi bya// des kyang rgyud 'dir de la ni// man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya// gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byin//
222a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dis ni ser sna byas pa min// sngar bstan slob ma de la ni// lus can zhen pa 'phel byed pa'i// mig ni gang la yod gyur pa// de nyid slob ma nyid bya'o// slob dpon 'am ni slob ma'i rgyur// phan
222b1(rgyud 'bum): tshun rjes su 'jug byed pa/ / gang du zhen pa'i rgyun skyong ba// 'jam po'i rgyun ni 'dzin pa ste// de la sngags ni sbyin par bya// slob dpon de bzhin slob ma ni// thob ma bla mar mthong ba la// tag
222b2(rgyud 'bum): tu spro bar 'gyur ba 'am/ / gnyis kas dngos grub yang dag 'byor// de la rtag tu lam nyid dang // sngags kyi spyod pa rjes bstan bya// gnyis kas pa dang bur shes pas// sngags ni 'bras
222b3(rgyud 'bum): bcas rjes 'jug pa/ / brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob// rtag tu slob mas bla ma ni// rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya// du ni bdag nyid chen po rnams// sangs rgyas chos rgyun mi 'chad 'gyur//
222b4(rgyud 'bum): de med mgon med de rnams la// ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags rnams sbyin// sems can bkren dang ma ning la'ang // thams cad la ni khyad par du// sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags// tha ma mchog
222b5(rgyud 'bum): dang bar ma la/ / dus rnams kun tu bya ba'o// yongs su thob pa'i chos rnams la// rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur bya'o// 'gro ba blo gros nges pa yi// 'dod pa rnams la'ang rab sbyin bya// de phyir ji ltar 'dod
222b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sngags/ / slob ma nyid kyis blang bar bya// de nyid kyis ni nyer bstan pas// lam nyid yin no gzhan du min// dngos grub 'dod pas gang de la// pha ni pha rol song ba na// pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas
222b7(rgyud 'bum): te/ / de nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro// de nas 'dir ni song nas ni// mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas// slong me spong ba'i rjes 'jug cing // smra ba bcad de dus gsum bzlas// de ltar
223a1(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa nyid du 'gyur/ / ji ltar lam la rab 'jug pa// de tshe rnam 'gyur de gcod pa// khang stong dang ni dgon pa che// ri bo che dang chu klung ngogs// gtsab dang ba lang
223a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas mtsho chen/ / rnam dben skye bo spangs pa bsten// lha khang dang ni shing drung dang // mtshan gcig ri ni mthon po dang // rgya mtsho che 'gram nyams dga' dang // chu gling ngam ni gling rnams dang /
223a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs sngar bstan pa'i// yul rnams sna tshogs yid 'ong ba// 'di rnams las kyang phyogs gzhan du// mnyam par bzhag pas sngags bzlas bya// grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni//
223a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags don nges pa'i rtog ga pa// ltas kyi rnam pa de nyid shes// dpa' zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba// snying stobs ldan zhing bzod pa can// dad dang tshul khrims phun tshegs ldan// rgyal bas gsung
223a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yul 'dir ni/ / rab bsngags mtshan nyid dang ldan pa// bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po yis// 'bad pa med pa nyid kyis de'i// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni//
223a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bab chu mtsho chen las byung ba'i// srog chags med cing dri ma med// chu de nyid la khrus byas nas// sa dang ba byung phye ma yis// sngags shes lus ni dril phyis bya// de nas sngags kyis sbyang byas pa'i// chu nyid shin
223a7(rgyud 'bum): tu dri med la/ / zlos po brtson pas khrus bya'o// ha cang yun ring khrus mi bya// de nas langs la lag pa dag/ sa dag gis kyang bkru bar bya// bdun dang bdur dang yang lan bdun// nyi shu rtsa gcig nye reg bya// yang
223b1(rgyud 'bum): der so shing kun tu spyad/ / so sbyangs nas ni dor bar bya// de nas skyob la phyag byas shing // 'jig rten mgon la phyag byas nas// sngags rig mchod pa yid 'ong bya// rnam pa sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis// yang
223b2(rgyud 'bum): dang yang du yang dag bstod/ / de bzhin dri zhim me tog gis// ston pa skyob la mchod yon dbul// sangs rgyas rnams la mgos phyag byas// de tshe slob mar gyur pa rnams// 'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyi// spyan
223b3(rgyud 'bum): snga nyid du sdig pa bshags/ / bdag nyid dag kyang phul byas nas// ras ris spyan sngar 'khod par bya// ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug/ sngags rig gnyis ka 'dug nas ni// mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin te//
223b4(rgyud 'bum): der ni bgrang 'phreng nyid kyis ni// rab tu 'bad pas bzlas pa bya// de tshe sngags gzhan mi bzlas so// cho ga dman pa yang spang zhing // ha cang mchog kyang de bzhin no// bar ma bar ma'i las dag la// brtul
223b5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs can dag sngags bzlas bya/ / ha cang mthon po spang bar bya// gal te tshig ni dma' ba'ang min// bar ma bar ma'i las rnams la// rab tu bsngags par rgyal bas gsungs// ha cang mtho min dma' ba
223b6(rgyud 'bum): min/ / bar mar rtag tu bzlas pa bya// sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// tshig ni dpal dang ldan par gsungs// gzhan gyi drung du mi bzlas shing // gzhan gyi las lam rtag tu gsang // bdag nyid
223b7(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i yul du bzlas/ / sngags ni bar ma de bzhin du// bzlas pas rab tu 'byor par 'gyur// sngags don legs par thos pa 'ga'// dngos grub 'bring po 'dod pa nyid// sngags ni dge bar bzlas
224a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de phyir skye bo dang bral bar// sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos// tshogs dang bral zhing rnam dben par// zlos pa pos ni sngags bzlas bya// mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang //
224a2(rgyud 'bum): de yi phyed kyi phyed nyid kyi// skya rengs dmar po'i dus tsam ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba na// thun ni dang por de bzhin du// thub pa'i skyes mchog gis gsungs so// dus kyi tshad ni bzhi yin
224a3(rgyud 'bum): te/ / bar mar yongs su bsgrags pa yin// de nas nyi ma phyed nub na// sngags kyi bzlas pa de tshe btang // sngags zlos bor ba de yi tshe// mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol// brtul zhugs can
224a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis rnam gzhan spang / / de tshe bor ba'i dus lhag na// thub pa'i bstan la dge ba bya// shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// dam pa'i chos ni klog pa dang // sa bcu pa yi glegs bam ni// mchod dang
224a5(rgyud 'bum): / klog pa rtag tu'o// de nas dus la bab gyur na// rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang // thub pa skyes mchog phyag byas nas// de nas 'tsho ba la 'gro zhing // de bzhin dus su spyod par ldan// dus su
224a6(rgyud 'bum): za zhing dbang por thul/ / sgrub po chos dang ldan pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang brtson// grong gzhan du ni 'jug pa na// mi smra gtsang sbra spyod la dga'// sems can rtag tu chos ldan pa'i//
224a7(rgyud 'bum): khyim du bsod snyoms dag la 'jug/ zlos po srog chags med pa'i chu// tshos par grub pa gtsang mar 'dod// yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs// sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dad // de lta'i khyim du
224b1(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu ni/ / bsod snyoms don du slong mo bslang // dper na brtson pas gos bgos te// nyam nga'i g.yul du rab 'jug pa// rtag tu dgra ni 'joms par byed// dgra rnams kyis gzhom mi nus
224b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / de bzhin sngags pa slong mos 'tsho// rtag tu grong du 'jug pa na// de bzhin chags par 'os pa yi// gzugs sgra mthong nas mi dge ba// 'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir// mi sdug dge ba bsgom
224b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / lang tsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi// bud med lus ni mthong nas kyang // smad cing rul ba'i lus rnams ni// srin bus zos shing dur khrod gnas// lus ni mi rtag sdug bsngal ba// mi gtsang dri
224b4(rgyud 'bum): mi zhim par bsgom/ / gang la byis pa rmongs pa yi// 'gro ba lnga por 'gro zhing 'khor// las kyi srad bus brgyus pa ni// yun ring dus su mya ngan byed// mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pa ni// dmus long
224b5(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal rgyu can no/ / gang du blo ni phyin ci log/ chags pas skye ba 'phongs par 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs las lam gyis// rnam pa du mar chags gyur pa// ring nas khyogs kyis 'gro ba ni//
224b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro dang 'ong ba spyod par byed// rtag pa nyid phyir rjes chags pa// 'dzin pa'i kun tu spyod pa spyod// gang du sems can mi dge 'ga'// lam du yun ring rgyu bar byed// zo chun khyud mo'i rnam pa bzhin// srid
224b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtsho chu 'byung ba rnams/ / 'gro ba de rnams mi bzad pa'i// sdug bsngal chu bos kun tu g.yengs// de bzhin bud med sdug bsngal gyi// rtsa ba 'ba' zhig yin pa ru// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
225a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dang / / de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang // thub pa rnams kyis gsungs pa yin// srid pa'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa'i// mtsho chen 'di dag bskam par dka'// bud med sems
225a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis bslus pa yi/ / sems can gnas gang bying ba de// dmyal ba dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang // yi dgas 'jig rten lha ma yin// de bzhin mo yi 'jig rten nyid// lha yi 'gro bar 'gro bar bya// rtag tu kun nas
225a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su 'khor/ / bud med chags pas bslus pa ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yi// 'dam rdzab chen por bying bar 'gyur// bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi// ro la chags pa'i ce spyang bzhin// gang la
225a4(rgyud 'bum): sems can rtag dga' ba/ / mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod par byed// dkar po chos las nges par nyams// sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu gnas// srid pa'i mtsho yi sdug bsngal nyid// thams cad zlog par
225a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa yin/ / sngags zlos pa la dga' zhing brtson// dbang cher grags shing yid dang ldan// gzi brjid ldan zhing sngags thub pa// de rnams la ni sdug bsngal med// yang dag sdom dang tshangs bden shes// bla
225a6(rgyud 'bum): ma lha la mchod pa byed/ / ma dang pha la gus pa rnams// gsum po rnams la sdug bsngal med// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang // gzhan gyi don la rjes su bsnyen// bud med lus la 'byung po'i gzugs//
225a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin 'bras dang zug rngu dang // blo ngan phung po'i lcags kyus zin// 'khor ba las ni mi 'da' bar// rtag tu bud med chags gyur pa// de la dngos grub yod pa min// de la mchog 'gro yong ma yin//
225b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba 'bring yang yong ma yin// dngos grub chung ngu'ang yod ma yin// 'dir ni zlos po khrims 'chal na// tshul khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis// sngags kyi dngos grub ma bstan no// mya ngan 'das
225b2(rgyud 'bum): grong 'gro ba yi/ / lam yang med cing phyogs dang bral// 'dir ni byis pa smad pa la// sngag grub pa ni ga la yod// skye bo tshul 'chal 'di la ni// de la bde 'gro'ang yod ma yin// mtho ris reg pa
225b3(rgyud 'bum): yod ma yin/ / bde ba nyid la gzhol ba'ang med// de bzhin rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags// grub par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// ta la'i shing gi mgo bo ni// gang tshe bcad na slar yang ni// sngon po
225b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid du mi 'gyur zhing / / myu gu slar yang nam zhig 'gyur// de bzhin sngags grub rmongs pa ni// tshul khrims 'chal zhing sdig pa'i las// rtag tu slar yang bud med chags// mi dge'i grogs dang phrad
225b5(rgyud 'bum): pa la/ sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub// de bas gang tshe zlos pa pos// bde bar gshegs pas spangs pa yi// bud med nyes pa rnams spyad de// gang gi dngos grub bsgrub bya ste// byis pa bud
225b6(rgyud 'bum): med la rmongs pa/ / gzhan gyis grub par ma bstan no// de nas dang por blo ldan pa// gtsang zhing 'du 'dzi med la dga'// rigs ldan brtan zhing dpa' ba dang // sems bzang ldan zhing mthong na dga'
225b7(rgyud 'bum): chos dang chos min rnam dpyod shes/ / de rnams grub pa rnyed mi dga'/ de ltar sngags shes zhugs pa ni// grong du bsod snyoms phyir du 'jug/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin song nas// sngar ni brtags
226a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnas dag tu/ / mkhas pas dag pa'i blos bza' ba// bza' ba phyogs su bzhag nas ni// phyi rol song nas rkang pa bkru// de nas slar yang gnas de ru// srog chags
226a2(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i chu rnams kyis/ / dang po 'dren pa nyid yin te// gnyis pa la ni lag g.yon gyi// rked pa man chad dril phyis bya// kun tu g.yas pa slar byin nas// lag pa sa yis bkru bar bya// sngar gzhag
226a3(rgyud 'bum): pa yi dag pa dang / / gtsang ma rnams kyis bdun nyid du// bzang zhing dag chus gtsang sgrar byas// ser skya'i ba las byung ba yi// ba yi lci ba gsar pa dag/ gtsang zhing dri med snod blangs la// srog
226a4(rgyud 'bum): chags med pa'i chus sbyar te/ / dang por ston pa thub pa yis// mchog la dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// khyad par khru gang tsam du'o// gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la// gsum pa rigs kyi lha mo la//
226a5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig sngags pa zlos pa po// slar yang rtag tu bya ba yin// bzhi pa sems can thams cad kyi// nye bar longs spyod don du grags// g.yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag
226a6(rgyud 'bum): tu bya/ / dkon mchog gsum gyi ched du ni// dkyil 'khor de ni khru bzhi'o// gnyis pa rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras// dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di dag ni//
226a7(rgyud 'bum): kun nas gru bzhi pa ru'o// khru gang ngam ni khru phyed rung // nyin re zhing yang bya ba'o// zlos pos de tshe sbas pa'i phyogs// sdig pa 'joms byed nyin re bzhin// de nas sngags pa thub pa langs//
226b1(rgyud 'bum): lag gnyis 'bad pas bkrus nas ni// gtsang ma'i chu yis nye reg bya// dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi// dri ma med pa'i gtsang ma ni// 'bad pas gtsang ma'i snod du blangs// mtsho chen
226b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ni 'bab chu'am/ / chu mig chu bo la gnas pa// gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung ba yi// sems can gtsang ma lag gis bcus// sngags pas slar yang nye reg bya// gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang // de
226b3(rgyud 'bum): nas kha la reg bya zhing / / de bzhin nyid du rna ba'i rgyun// mig dang sna yi bu ga dang // spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya// dge ba spyod pas lan lnga 'am bdun// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya// gtsang sbra'i spyod
226b4(rgyud 'bum): pa phun sum tshogs/ / zlos po gtsang mar gyur nas ni// bsod snyoms snod ni blangs nas su// chu yi gnas su 'gro bar bya// gang du chu bo rab gnas pa// de bzhin dma' bar gyur pa dang // chu klung rab
226b5(rgyud 'bum): tu 'bab la sogs/ / rtag tu blangs pa bkru bar bya// slar yang de nas langs nas ni// gtsug lag khang ngam gnas su 'gro// gang du sngon ni yang dag bsten// gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya// song nas
226b6(rgyud 'bum): zlos pos phyogs de ru/ / lhung bzed de ni gzhag par bya// de nas myur du nye reg bya// de bzhin slar yang lhung bzed blang // lhung bzed sa 'am lo ma 'am// dngul lam de bzhin gser nyid dang // zangs sam
226b7(rgyud 'bum): shing shun dag kyang rung / / ston pa la ni lha bshos dbul// ston la lha bshos phul nas ni// slar yang rang rig sngags rgyal la'o// 'gron po gcig ni 'ongs gyur dang // sdug bsngal can la'ang ci nus sbyin//
227a1(rgyud 'bum): bshos nyid kyang ni thams cad du// kun nas nges par bza' ba nyid// gtsang mang po srin mi bya// sngags shes 'dir ni gdung mi bya// kun nas rigs pa ldan par bya// lto ba'i
227a2(rgyud 'bum): tsam bzhag nas ni/ / gzhan pa'i zan ni rtag tu'o// bkres dang skom pas nyen pa yis// sngags don sgrub par mi nus te// ha cang mang dang nyung zos na// sngags don bsten par mi nus so// de nyid phyir na rgyal
227a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis/ / sems can zas kyi gnas so zhes// lus can kun la gsung pa yin// gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang // lha dang lha min dri za dang // klu dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci// srin po yi dgas sha za
227a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / 'byung po skar ma gza' dag ni// gang zhig zas la mi ltos pa// de ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin// rtag tu kha zas rags pa ni// kham gyi zas zhes grags pa'o// sems can phra mo'i zas can
227a5(rgyud 'bum): yang / / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni// bsam gtan zas can rtag par ni// gzugs na spyod cing g.yo ba ste// gzugs med nyid kyi lha rnams kyang // ting 'dzin 'bras bu za ba'o// srid pa
227a6(rgyud 'bum): bar ma'i sems can yang / / dri za bar ni rab tu grags// de bzhin 'dod khams sems can rnams// zas ni rnam pa sna tshogs za// 'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dang mi// kham gyi zas ni za bar byed// de nyid
227a7(rgyud 'bum): phyir na thub dbang gis/ / sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes// chos kyi rgyu ru bstan pa yin// gang de rnams ni rab tu grags// zlos po rtag tu brtson pa ni// zas kyi tshod ni rig par bya// gang phyir rig
227b1(rgyud 'bum): pa bsnyen pa ni/ / zas 'di la ni rab tu gnas// kun spyod ma nor dag pa dang // dge zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang // zas kyi tshod kyang shes pa la// de yi dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// dper na khur ni nga
227b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyur/ / shing rta yun rings gnas don du// shing rta'i mig ni slu bar byed// de bzhin sngags pa sngags rig pas// zas ni gnas pa'i ched du spyad// lus ni gso ba'i don du ni// blos pos rtag tu
227b3(rgyud 'bum): gso bar bya/ / sngags rnams sgrub pa'i don phyir dang // byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu yi phyir// mi yi 'jig rten rjes gzung rgyur// de bzhin rtag tu sngags bzlas bya// de nyid phyir na thub pa'i gtses//
227b4(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus chen pos 'di gsungs so// mtshan ni 'od srungs zhes bya bas// sngon ni de tshe sa stengs der// sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir// 'byung po rnams la legs don du// sngags ni/
227b5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu gsungs pa yin// sdug bsngal gyur pa'i 'jig rten kun// dbul zhing skyo la sha thang pa// mchog tu nyon mongs gyur pa rnams// 'di rnams don du gsungs pa yin// 'byung po
227b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams la legs pa nyid/ / slar yang kun tu brten pa rnams// 'byung po kun gyi zas don du// gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsungs// nga yis gsang sngags 'di brjod kyi// byang sems la brten thams
227b7(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / / nyan thos rnams ni mnyan par gyis// nad kyis zin pa 'joms byed cing // bkres pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang // gang yang sems can sgom pa dang // sdug bsngal thams cad ni don dang // 'byor pa
228a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod rnams mnyan par gyis/ / 'od srungs 'od ni chen po pa// thub pa'i gtso bos de skad gsungs// nyan thos rnams ni yid mgu nas// khyab padag de la gsol ba bde bas// chos kyi//
228a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po thub pa che// chos mkhyen gsang sngags bshad du gsol// dam tshig mchog la nyer gnas pa'i// sems can rnams la rjes brtser mdzod// de skad gsol nas thub pa yis// sngags mchog
228a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par gsung bar byed/ / ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs dang // rnga bo che dang sprin gyi sgra// tshangs dbyangs brtson 'grus chen po dang // tshangs pa'i sras gang rgyal mchog gis// gang yang cung zad 'dir 'ongs
228a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / rkang med pa dang rkang mangs dang // rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa// 'byung po'i tshegs rnams kun nyon cig/ mdor na sems can kun don du// bde 'byung sngags ni bshad par bya// 'das dang
228a5(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ / sems can la sogs 'dir lhags pa// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// 'byor pa 'dod pa rnams nyon cig/ ra maHsa ran+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga ga ne/
228a6(rgyud 'bum): ga gA na gan+do/ A nA yA/ sarba la hu la hu/ sa ma ya ma nusma ra/ A kaR+Sha Ne/ mA bI lam+b+ha/ yA the bri ta me sAM pA dA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis de skad ces gsungs nas// cang mi gsung bar
228a7(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rgya cher gsungs pa'i bar skabs 'dir// nam mkha' thams cad chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi
228b1(rgyud 'bum): sprin gyis yongs su gang bar snang bar gyur to/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i mthil thams cad zas kyi sprin gyis kun tu g.yogs par snang bar gyur to// bsam pa ji lta ba
228b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa'i zas thams cad dang / ji ltar mngon par sred pa'i bza' ba de de rnams su char 'bab par gyur to// ji ltar mngon par sred pa'i bza' ba de rnams kyi zas kyi bya ba bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don
228b3(rgyud 'bum): dang skom pa rnams kyi btung ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu bo'i rgyun lta bu btung bar bya ba'ang yid la 'dod pa bzhin du de bab par gyur to/ / sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu
228b4(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba dang / skom pa thams cad bsal bar byas par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan po'i 'khor thams cad kyang ngo mtshar thob cing tshim pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes
228b5(rgyud 'bum): su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la yongs su bzhugs so// bcom
228b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ngas kyang de'i tshe gsungs pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang ngo / / rtog pa'i rgyal po'i mchog 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang // bkres pa dang skom pa bsal ba'i don gyi phyir dang /
228b7(rgyud 'bum): khyad par du sngags zlos pa po thams cad kyi phyir ro// dang po re zhig zlos pa pos sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya'o// gal te bsod snyom la 'gro bar mi spron/ ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya/
229a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas dkar gsum bza' ba 'am/ 'o ma btung ba'o// ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhag nas mchod pa chen po byas te/ gtor ma dang lha bshos
229a2(rgyud 'bum): ches rgya chen po byas nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing rnams kyi me sbar nas/ u dum pa ra'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang
229a3(rgyud 'bum): rtsi dang / mar la btags pa rlan dang bcas pa'am/ dpal 'bras kyi yam shing yang rung ste stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sprin nag po chen po dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor
229a4(rgyud 'bum): 'ong par 'gyur te/ 'jigs par mi bya/ langs nas 'gro bar yang mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying pos bdag nyid bsrung bar bya zhing / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang grogs rnams
229a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang sngar bzhin bsrung bar bya'o/ / de nas rlung nag po'i dkyil 'khor mi snang bar 'gyur te/ bud med kyang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od kyi 'phreng ba dang ldan pas phyogs rnams kyang kun tu snang bar
229a6(rgyud 'bum): byed bzhin pa sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug ste/ kye kye sems can chen po longs shig/ grub pa yin no zhes so// de nas sgrub pa pos snga ma'i me tog dang bsres pa'i dri chus mchod yon dngul lo// de nas de nyid du mi
229a7(rgyud 'bum): snang bar 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma de nas bdag nyid dam 'di'i grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga lade nas ji ltar mngon par 'dong pa'i bza' ba rnams rab tu ster bar byed do// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang kun tu sbyin par
229b1(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon phul nas shegs su gsol bar bya'o// ras ris la skor ba lan gsum byas nas ras ris blangs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/
229b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas ri'i rtse mo 'am mi med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o// der bdag nyid ngam grogs pos phyag bdar byas nas dgram par bya ba rnams bkram la/ gnas der nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las rnams
229b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas sgrub pa pos sngar bzhin du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhugs su gsol nas seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar la thun gsum du pad+ma dkar po'i me tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi
229b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / mar la btags pa rnams kyis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am/ snying po 'am/ nye ba'i snying pos las chen po thams cad kyi ched du 'am/ yi ge gcig pa'i ched du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg
229b5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa'i mchog gnang bar byed do// nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang ba 'am/
229b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam/ tshe ring ba nyid dam/ rgyal srid chen po dag yo spyod chen po nyid kyi sa ngag rgyal po chen po mnyes pa nyid dam/ 'phags
229b7(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rjes su rnam par spyod pa nyid dam/ mdor na yid la 'dod pa de thams cad gnang bar byed do// gang blangs kyang rung ste/ de mthun par gnang bar byed cing / grub pa'i rdzas
230a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad kyang thob bo/ / sems can chen po rnams 'gugs par byed pa 'am/ mdog ji lta ji ltar zhus pa de thams cad mdzad do// las kyi nyes pa rab tu sngags pa'ang
230a2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par sbyong bar byed do/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsungs so// las kyi cho ga gzhan pa bar ma'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni/ dang po re zhig khyad par gyi gnas sam/ gtsang ma'i phyogs
230a3(rgyud 'bum): sam/ chu klung ngam/ chu gling gi 'gram du sngar bzhin du thams cad byas nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par gzhag la/ bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs par gnas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ rgyas
230a4(rgyud 'bum): par gong bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/ thun gsum du 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o// bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dong ka'i me tog tsan dan dkar po dang bsres pa 'am/ gur kum dang bsres pas snga ma de bzhin
230a5(rgyud 'bum): kho nar me sbar nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ / sbyin sreg gi mthar ras ris 'gul na blon po nyid do// ras ris la 'od kyi snang ba byung na 'od las rgyal srid do// ras ris kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs
230a6(rgyud 'bum): na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyi rgyal srid do/ / ras ris la me byung na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid de brgya byin nyid do// ras ris chos ston par byed pa byung na byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyi dbang phyug
230a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid do/ / ras ris kyi phyag spyi bor reg na mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa bdun rjes su thob pa dang / stobs bcu nges pa nyid rim gyis thob par byed pa nyid do// de nas sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs
230b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrub te bkres pa dang skom pa phyir gzhil ba'i don rjes su thob pa de nyid kyis dang / cho ga de nyid kyi yo byad kyis rig pa'i spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i chos la
230b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par nan tan bya'i/ / gzhan du grub par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar rim gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug cing mdor na nan tan gyis nges par sgrub par byed de/ rdzas dang / sman dang / yo byad
230b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi khyad par dang / nor bu rin po che rnams ji ltar sngar nges par bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed do// sngags shes sngags ni zlos pa po'ang // cho ga bshad pa la sems pa// sngags pa de tshe de phyogs su//
230b4(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma'i 'gro bas zas kyang ni// zos nas yid ni dga' ba dang // dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang // lhung bzed lhag ma rtag blangs te// sems bzang chu bo gtsang mar 'gre// mtha' gcig tu ni bor nas ni//
230b5(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs can gyis dud 'gro sbyin// dud 'gro rnams la 'thun byin nas// 'bad pas lhung bzed bkru bar byed// lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba ni// snum med zas dang dri bral gang // lhung bzed lhag mar thub
230b6(rgyud 'bum): pas gsungs/ / gang du slong ba'i snod du ni// de ru zan ni mi bza' ste// der ni bza' ba 'bras bu dang // rdzas rnams rtag tu bza' mi bya// pad 'dab kyis kyang ma yin te// ut+pal las byung
230b7(rgyud 'bum): bas sam/ / dri bzang ldan rnams spangs pa ste// sngags pas der ni mi bza' 'o// gang yang sngags pas ku mu da// p+lak+Sha u dum ba ra las byung // ba Ta'i 'dab ma dang yang ni// tsher ma'i yal ka
231a1(rgyud 'bum): khrod byung / / A mra'i 'dab ma ru yang min// de bzhin pA Ta la las byung // sA la'i 'dab ma shi rI Sha// byang chub shing las byung ba dang // gang du bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni/
231a2(rgyud 'bum): shAkya seng ge bzhugs pa yi// shing de 'bad pas spang bar bya// shing de yi ni yal ga dang // na ga ge sar shing la'ang min// gang du nam yang bza' mi bya// mkhas pas de kun cis kyang spang //
231a3(rgyud 'bum): thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil po ni// rmongs pas nam yang 'gom mi bya// sngags pa dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// zas ni lo ma de rnams las// gzhan pa'i lo ma rnams su bza'// sa byung zangs su
231a4(rgyud 'bum): nges bstan dang / / de bzhin gser dang dngul las byung // shel dang rdo ba las byung ba// de bzhin bza' ba blangs nas ni// rtag tu sngags pas der mi bza'// lo ma'i rgyab tu mi bza' ste// de bzhin
231a5(rgyud 'bum): lag pa'i mthil du'ang min/ / stobs bcu pa yi sras rnams dang // rang rgyal bse ru lta bu gang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gtso// lo ma gzhan dang lha bshos 'byung // zlos pos de rnams
231a6(rgyud 'bum): spang bar bya/ / yi ge rkang pas kyang mi 'gom// sna tshogs bza' ba zlum 'khur dang // de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams// sngags pas babad pas blang bar bya// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams
231a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / de bzhin nyan thos skyes bu mchog/ dkon mchog gsum la phul ba yi// lha bshos thams cad nyid kyang ni// zlos pos rtag tu spang bar bya// chung ngu tsam yang lus can la// sngags rnams
231b1(rgyud 'bum): de yis mi 'grub ste/ / kun nas bkra shis thams cad dang // rtag tu dpal ni smos ci dgos// rgyas pa can dang zhi ba can// lha bshos gtor ma za byed pa// de tshe de yi kun mi 'grub// gtsang zhing
231b2(rgyud 'bum): mkhas la tshul khrims ldan/ / snying rje snying rje'i las can dang // gtsang sbra'i spyod pa la dga' ba// rig sngags kun tu sgrub par byed// sems can gzhan la byin pa'i zas// zlos pos de ni
231b3(rgyud 'bum): bza' mi bya/ / gzhan gyis rab tu ma brtags pa'i// zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o// rang la byin pa'i kha zas ni// cung zad tsam yang blang bar bya// sngags shes de ltar 'jug pa ni// de yi dngos
231b4(rgyud 'bum): grub sdig pa'i dgra/ / yongs su rdzogs par byed par gnas// zlos pos cho ga 'di yis ni// bza' ba len pa'i brtul zhugs can// thub pa rnams kyis legs par bsngags// sngags rnams thams
231b5(rgyud 'bum): cad sgrub pa la/ / mdor na cho ga mthong ba yis// bza' ba kun dang las rnams la'o// de nas gzhan yang rab 'chad byed// sngags ni thams cad sbyong bar byed// de nas zlos pos nye reg bya// de tshe sngags 'di
