231b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya/ / de tshe sngags pas lan bdun du// lus sbyong byed pa bzlas byas nas// 'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams 'dir// de don rgyas pa mnyan par gyis// lus kun nye reg byas nas su// thub pas
231b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di brjod par bya/ / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA/ A pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba kil+li Sha/ nA sha ni/ nA sha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta pra yuk+taM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM dzaHswA hA/ sngags 'dis bslangs pa'i
232a1(rgyud 'bum): zas gzhan gang yang rung ba yongs su spyod pa na sngags lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/ / zos nas snga ma bzhin du nye reg byas te spyi bo la
232a2(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i lus thams cad du byugs nas de nas ngal bso bar bya'o/ / ngal sos nas yud tsam phyed dam thun gcig la'o// de nas ras ris dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas/ dam
232a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o/ / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'phags pa sa bcu pa dang / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa dang /
232a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang / 'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs te/ 'di rnams las gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o// nyi ma'i dus kyi tshad bzhi cha tsam du'o// de nas yongs su zhi nas ji
232a5(rgyud 'bum): ltar 'dod pa bzhin du klag par bya ste/ glegs bam brtul nas gos gtsang ma bgos te dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas/ de nas khrus kyi ched du chu klung gi 'gram mam mtshe bran chen por 'jug pas song nas// srog
232a6(rgyud 'bum): chags med pa'i sa blangs te lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas rig pa 'dis chu la gdab bo/ / gang zhe na/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba duSh+Ta stam+b+ha ya hUM/ na dI ba ra d+hA
232a7(rgyud 'bum): ri Ne/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT swA hA/ 'dis bsrung ba byas nas phyogs rnams bcing ba dang / grogs rnams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / kha bcing ba dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa rnams
232b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / las thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang / bgegs bcing ba la'ang srad bu la lan bdun bzlas nas rked pa'i phyogs su bcings pas thams cad du yongs su 'chags pa dang / bzlas
232b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus thams cad dang / khrus kyi dus thams cad dang / gdug pa'i bgegs rnam par gzhom pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i don du sngags 'di stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad byed do//
232b3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i gdan la phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o// las rnams tham cad du thams cad byed kyi/ rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa pos sa las byung ba'i phye ma la sogs pa rnams blangs
232b4(rgyud 'bum): nas ji ltar bde bar khrus bya zhing srog chags med pa'i chus khrus byas te/ thams cad du las thams cad la sogs chags med pa nyid kyis bya'o// de nas khrus byas nas sa'i rang bzhin nam/ gzhan dri
232b5(rgyud 'bum): zhim po dang ldan pa'i dri dang yo byad kyi khyad par gyis rjes su byug par bya'o/ / chu'i nang du mchil ma dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba la sogs pa'ang dor bar mi bya'o// rtse bar yang mi bya'o// snying rje dang ldan
232b6(rgyud 'bum): pas bdag dang sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya ste/ bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal nye bar 'gags pa dang / tshor bas mngon par non pa dang / chu rlabs
232b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du mngon par 'byung ba'i rab tu sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'di ltar sgrub pa dang bral ba sngags shes pas gang de bzhin du dug dang / gcod pa dang / ltung ba dang /
233a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'bor ba dang / rnam pa 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags bsngal gyi phung po nye bar 'gog par bya bzhin pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thibs po gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong zhing gnas
233a2(rgyud 'bum): beded pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / shin tu dman pa'i yid can gyi bdag nyid du brtags nas sgom pa po mgrin pa nub tsam gyi chu na gnas pa 'am/ lte ba tsam du gnas pa'i chu de
233a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi nang du sems rtse gcig tu nye bar gzung bar bya'o/ / dang po re zhig pad+ma chen po'i 'dab ma la me tog chen po dang ldan pa/ pad+ma chen po'i lo mas nye bar mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che bai
233a4(rgyud 'bum): DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin las byung ba'i sdong bu dang / rin po che ma da ka las grub pa'i pad+ma'i ge sar dang / shel las byas pa'i 'dab ma stong legs par kha phye ba dang / de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang pad+ma rA
233a5(rgyud 'bum): ga'i me tog rnams kyis mdzes pa'o/ / de'i steng du seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa/ rin po che du mas nye bar mdzes pa ras bcos bu zung gis bkab pa'o// de'i steng du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
233a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya ste/ chos ston par mdzad cing bzhugs pa/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ tshad chen po nam
233a7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' lta bu mchog tu bris bzhin pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa/ g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ pad+ma chen po'i gangan
233b1(rgyud 'bum): la bzhugs pa/ rnga yab bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gran 'khod de/ lus dmar ser gur kum btags pa'i kha dog lta bu'o// g.yon du 'phags pa mthu chen po thob ston ka'i
233b2(rgyud 'bum): sprin ltar dkar ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brgyud la/ 'phags pa byams pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams
233b3(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang / nor bzang zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' bcu po 'di rnams kyi g.yas su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsam par bya
233b4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ tsan dan dang / spos ngad ldan dang / tog dang / tog dkar dang / 'dod pa dang / nye ba'i 'dod pa dang / chu khyung dang / mu khyud brgyad do// de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa mo'u
233b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang / ba lang bdag dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len dang / pi len da'i bu dang / 'phags pa sgra gcan zin dang / 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po dang /
233b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa kun dga' bo zhes pa'i nyan thos chen po de rnams dang nye bar dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nye bar rang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa bsgom
233b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po rnams kyi gnas su'ang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du kun nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor gyi
234a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas bzhin du lha dang mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la
234a2(rgyud 'bum): me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / d+hA ru s+phA ri ka dang / bA rI ka dang / in+d+ra ba ri'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshad chen po phung po chen por gnas pa ri rab
234a3(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyi me tog gi phur mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya zhing / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs
234a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / lha dang mi'i mar me mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mchod par bya'o// de bzhin du gtor ma dang / bdug pa dang / lha bshos
234a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yo byad lha dang mi'i nyer mkho rnams dbul bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer mngon par 'dro la'i
234a6(rgyud 'bum): pas bdag nyid dang phyogs thams cad kyang kun tu snang bzhin par bsgom par bya'o/ / sgom pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu/ tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu thob bo// nges par byang chub
234a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ / de lta bu sogs bsam gtan rnams// 'jig rten skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// 'byung po kun kyang legs pa dang // sngags pa rnams la phan don pa/
234b1(rgyud 'bum): de tshe bsam gtan dang po'i gtso// sngags pa kun la phan don du// sems can rnams kyi phyir gsungs so// de nas thub mchog bdun pa yi// dkyil 'khor rnam par brjod par bya// thub pas dang por
234b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa yin/ / gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang // gsum par yang ni de las gzhan// dang por mchog gi dngos grub ste// bar ma la ni de bzhin gzhan// chung ngu la ni phran tsheg 'grub// thub pa
234b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog gis nges par gsungs/ / de bzhin ras ris bsam gtan ni// thu bo bar ma chung ngu ste// thams cad sdig pa 'jig byed pa'o// de las gzhan yang mkhas pas ni// bsam gtan rnam pa rab bsgrub bya//
234b4(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan de la rab gnas na// sngags rnams de la 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bshad// zlos pos bsam gtan bsgoms nas ni// sngags kyi mchod yon der phul nas// ji ltar bde bar
234b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs su gsol/ / chu tshogs de las bsgral nas ni// de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro// gnas ni sngon du nges bstan par// cho ga mthong bas legs zhi bar// de tshe sngags pas gsang sngags bzlas// sngar
234b6(rgyud 'bum): las ji ltar brjod pa bzhin/ / rang gi g+ha ni spyan drangs pa// der ni sngags kyis gshegs su gsol// de nas bdag nyid de bzhin nyid// grogs po rnams ni bsrungs byas nas// dge ba'i las kyis de nyid shes//
234b7(rgyud 'bum): choga'i las la dga' zhing 'dud// rnam pa sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis// gang zag mchog la kun bstod nas// rang sngags sngags kyis mgon po dang // nyan thos rang rgyal bas ru dang // byang chub sems
235a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' che/ / 'jig rten gsum po rjes 'dzin bzod// de nas gsang sngags zlos pa po// stan de la ni slar langs nas// thag ring gnas su song nas ni// phyi rol rlung gi
235a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par spangs/ / snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor// bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin no// nyin par byang du kha phyogs shing // mtshan mo lho ru kha blta'o// sngags zlos pos ni nam yang der// don rnams
235a3(rgyud 'bum): bsam par mi bya'o/ / der ni rang las byed gsungs pa'i// sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya'o// rab bsngags 'gro ba mtshan sogs kyi// de tshe sa steng nyer 'dug ste// dag pa'i chu yis nye reg bya// gtsang ma'i gos
235a4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' chur gzhug bya/ / sa yi phung po bdun nyid kyis// 'bad pas rkang pa bkrus byas nas// rab tu 'dzag pa bdun blangs nas// bshang ba 'dzag la sum cu ste// gnyis ka'i mtha' la lag pa dag/ mchis
235a5(rgyud 'bum): mdor ba nyid dang ni/ / snabs la'ang gnyis te de bzhin no// de nas 'bang pas nye reg bya// gnas las ring du song ba'i sar// de bzhin zla tsam song nas ni// lam la sogs pa spangs pa ru// de nas
235a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyis ci 'dod bzhin/ / lho phyogs mtha' yi phyi rol tu// chu dang g.yang sa med pa dang // de bzhin bye mas khyab pa dang // chu klung spangs shing ngogs kyang spangs// 'bad pas mi gtsang chu spangs par//
235a7(rgyud 'bum): bsang zhing shin tu sbyangs pa dang // bas mtha' ljongs ni spangs pa dang // rnam par dben pa'i sar song nas// sngags pas mi gtsang dor bar bya// zlas po dus ni shes byas nas// ji ltar 'dod pa'i shugs
235b1(rgyud 'bum): dgag min/ / de nas dag pa'i phyogs song ste// bsam mthar de bzhin bshang ba dang // gci ba'i bya ba byas nas ni// de ru lus ni ci bde bar// gnyis ka'am gsang g.yogs sbas pa dang // skye bo med
235b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sa gzhi la/ / mi smra reg pa spangs nas ni// rtag tu gci ba bya ba yin// lus la lhag gnas bshang ba dang // gartul zhugs can rtag gtsang sbra bya// reg na gzhon sha can rnams 'dod// srog chags
235b3(rgyud 'bum): spangs pa'i sa rnams ni/ / gsum po de bzhin blangs nas ni// rtag pa kho nar bshang lam la'o// de bzhin gnyis ka'i mthar lag pa// sngags pas rtag tu sa dag ni// sngar bstan pa dag blangs nas ni//
235b4(rgyud 'bum): / zlos pos rtag tu rkang pa nyid// g.yas dang de las gzhan pa ni// phan tshun nyid du kun bzhag nas// 'bad pas rkang pa bkru bar bya// rgya cher sngar ni brjod pa bzhin// sngags zlos po yi gtsang sbra yang //
235b5(rgyud 'bum): dri nga med pa'i gtsang sbra ste// rtag tu thub pa nyid kyis gsungs// 'di dag mdor bsdus bstan pa yin// rgyud rnams kun tu mthong ngo zhes// mnga' bdag thub pa nyid kyis gsungs// de nas zlos pos nye
235b6(rgyud 'bum): / reg bya// sdom brtson dngos grub las la dga'// sngar brjod pa yi cho ga yis// yid kyis nang gi dag pa yin// gtsang sbra rnam pa lnga ru brjod// sngags pas sngags rnams thams cad du// lus kyi
235b7(rgyud 'bum): gtsang sbra de bzhin du/ / ngag yid kho nar rab tu bsgrags// bzhi pa bden pa'igatsang sbra ste// chu ni lnga par brjod par bya// bden pa'i chos ni khro ba thul// rgyud shes bstan bcos mthong
236a1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / phra mo'i de nyid don la mkhas// sngags shes las la grags pa dang // rgyu yis nang la mkhas pa ste// de la dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// bden pa'i chos ni rnams spangs pa'i//
236a2(rgyud 'bum): brdzun pa'i tshig ni smra mi bya// bden pa thams cad rnams spangs pa'i// ma rungs rab tu ma rungs nyid// rnam par sdang dang 'khrug bcas dang // gtsub cing gnad ni 'gems pa dang // bden pa'i chos ni rnam
236a3(rgyud 'bum): par nyams/ / sems can gzhan la gdung bar byed// phra ma nyon mongs can sems dang // chos rnams thams cad spangs pa dang // de bzhin 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu khrims 'chal chos min spyod//
236a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags zlos pa yis spang bar bya// de bzhin nyid du grong gi chos// khro ba brnab sems 'byung ba yi// 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa rnams// blo ldan rang rgyal bse ru dang // slar yang rtag tu nyan thos dang // /
236a5(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis smad// de bzhin rtag tu rdzun sma ba// 'jig rten dngos grub 'dod don gnyer// sa stengs rdzun smra nye bar smra// mi bzad dmyal ba chen por ltung // sngon gyi nges pa las de bzhin//
236a6(rgyud 'bum): dga' bas gshin rje'i 'jig rten du// rtag tu slar yang der gnas so// rtag tu rdzun smras nyer 'tsho ba// mi bzad ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur// thig nag rab tu tsha ba dang // yang sos ral gri lo ma dang /
236a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin shal ma li yi nags// der ni bskal pa mang por gnas// rdzun du smra ba'i skye bo na// gsang sngags log par smra ba dang // rmongs pas log par brjod pa yis// 'byung po rnams la bru byed pa// de la
236b1(rgyud 'bum): grub pa ga la yod/ / de phyir rmongs pa las 'di yi// sngags kyi dngos grub ma mthong nas// sngags pa'i dngos grub med de zhes// 'di skad du ni tshig sgrab// gang gis sangs rgyas bstan pa ni// sa stengs 'dir
236b2(rgyud 'bum): ni rab spangs pa/ / bskal pa bye ba mang po yis// de yis grub par ga la 'gyur// de phyir 'di ni mi bzad pa'i// 'jigs chen mnar med 'tshed par 'gyur// yang sos dang ni thig nag dang // rab tu tsha ba'i
236b3(rgyud 'bum): dmyal bar ni/ / der ni bskal pa chen por gnas// dam chos snang ba bral ba'i phyir// dmyal ba mi bzang mun pa ru// byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed par byed// dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa dang // mi shes mun pas
236b4(rgyud 'bum): bsgribs pa ste/ / ye shes byis pa'i ngo bo 'am// rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal can// rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa// mi bzad dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// de phyir sdig pa mi bya zhing // log par smra ba'ang
236b5(rgyud 'bum): smad pa yin/ / dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa dang // log par blta ba smad pa yin// de phyir rtag tu dang gyur nas// gsang sngags cho ga rtag tu bsten// bden par smra zhing chos shes pa// sems can rnams la rngag
236b6(rgyud 'bum): tu phan/ / sngags shes sngags ni sten par byed// de yis dngos grub nges par 'gyur// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yi// las ni rnam pa sna tshogs byed// las rnams bya ba rnams kyis byed// rtag tu phan pas
236b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba yis/ / bya ba'i las dang yang dag ldan// de la rtag tu grub par 'gyur// bya ba'i don dang don kun phyir// las don rtag tu bya ba'o// bya ba'i don du bya min gang // bya ba las la sbyar bar bya// 'bras bcas
237a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi byi don gyi/ / bya ba nyid ni rtag tu bya// bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid// bya ba las 'bras rtag tu'o// 'bras med 'bras bu nyid 'gyur zhing // 'bras bu nyid kyang rtag tu 'bras
237a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bras med 'bras bu bcas pa nyid/ / thams cad nyid kyang 'bras bur bcas// rnal 'byor sngags ni bsgrub bya ste// yang dag sbyor dang bral ba yang // bral dang yang dag ldan sgrub po// bsgrub bya sgrub byed med
237a3(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / de la grub pa yod ma yin// grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang // grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin// sngags kyi dngos grub ma grub pa// sngags ni sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu// byed par 'dod pa de las
237a4(rgyud 'bum): te/ / 'dod pa'i las ni bya bar 'gyur// las min las ni thams cad la// las kyi rgyud ni mi bya'o// sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i// las ni mtha' dag brtsam par bya// brtsams dang rtsom pas 'dud pa yi//
237a5(rgyud 'bum): las nyid brtsam par mi bya'o// bya ba ma brtsams sngags rnams ni// lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur// sems can kun rjes skyong ba yis// thub pa'i gtso bos sngon gsungs pa// gsang sngags smra bas bstan pa
237a6(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / rgyal ba'i sras kyis yang dag sdom// sgrub po sngags ni kun shes shing // rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la tshig/ sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin// lam ni byang chub rgyur gyur pa// sngags kun nyid ni
237a7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par byed/ / rig pa mnyam par 'gyur ba yin// de ni ring po mi thogs par// mkhas pas dngos grub 'gyur ba yin// 'byung po thams cad zhi don du// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsgrags//
237b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags tshul gyi lam 'das ni// mya ngan 'das thong 'gro ba yin// de bzhin d+hag byang chub lcas// chos ngan thams cad rdzogs par byed// de mi mthar thug dbyung gnyen ni// dang po'i banas
237b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas nyid/ / de bzhin 'dir ni lhun grub tu// 'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos zung thob// bla tshogs las dang chos shes pa// sngags rnams byed par 'gyur ba yin// tshul khrims bsams
237b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam thar rnams/ / 'di rnams mdor bsdus thob pa yin// dngos grub don kun sgrub byed pa// rgyal ba gtso bos gsungs pa yin// gang zag rkang pa'i don thob pa// dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang //
237b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin gtso// tha mas rgyal srid rgyu yin te// lha min lha yi 'jig rten gyi// de bzhin de rnams bdag po ni// sngags pas thams cad thob par 'gyur// bya ba 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur/
237b5(rgyud 'bum): gtsang sbra'i kun spyod yang dag ldan// tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'// sngags rnams kun tu gsungs pa yi// de nas sngags pas sngags bzlas bya// sngags pa 'byor pa 'dod pa yis//
237b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs las byas te// de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang // tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin// tha mas longs spyod 'phel ba ste// bar mas gong ma'i lus can nyid// mchog nyid kyis ni ldang ba
237b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / zlom pos rtag tu thob par byed// sngags pas bzlas mthar ngal bso zhing // ji srid dus su brtag par bya// bzlas pa'i dus la bab pa na// der ni bsgrub pa bya ba yin// de bzhin las rnams
238a1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par byed/ / de la rtag tu bzlas pas skyes bu rang gi sdig pa zad par byed do// sngags pas sngon las kyi cho ga gang byas pa skye ba brgyad pa rnams su grub par gnas pa de/ de
238a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du las tshogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de skyes pas sngags bzlas pas/ slar yang sngags zlos pa po'i sdig pa zad pa'i don dang / las de 'joms shing sngags grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du
238a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa dang bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus pa zad par byed cing / skye ba brgyud pa rnams su gang byas pa'i sdig pa de thams cad 'jig par byed de/
238a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas pas lus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / thub pa rnams kyis gnas pas dga' ba dang / yon tan thams cad kyi grags par
238a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi khang par gnas pa'i rgyal po nyid dang / rtag tu don thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob pa dang ldan no// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po shin tu
238a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byam ste dgu pa rdzogaso// / de nas
238a7(rgyud 'bum): yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pa
238b1(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rjes su spyod pa/ sems can mtha' dag gi don la brtson pa/ sems can rnams gang gis bzlas par bya ba'i
238b2(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i sngags dang / gang dang ldan pas bgrang bar bya ba'i bgrang 'phreng gi cho ga/ rgyud thams cad kyi thun mong gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga/ sngags thams cad kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga de legs par nyon pa legs par
238b3(rgyud 'bum): yid lazung zhig bshad par bya'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sems dpa' chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
238b4(rgyud 'bum): la rjes su brtse bas nye bar blangs nas rig pa'i sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / dam tshig la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yang de bka' stsal du
238b5(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po rnam
238b6(rgyud 'bum): par dbye ba rgyas par bshad par bya'o nyon cig/ gang gis sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa/ sems can gyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa de gang zhe na/ dang po re zhig sngags su 'gyur ba ni/
238b7(rgyud 'bum): na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+tud+hA ta/ rU bi nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku ru ku ru sarba ar+tha sA dA ya/ sarba duSh+Ta bi mo ha ni/ ga ga nA ba lam+be/ bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ rig pa 'dis bgrang 'phreng thams cad la las bya'o// sbyang
239a1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / dbug pa dang / blang ba dang / rgyu ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o// dang po bzang 'phreng shing la ni// lan grangs sum cu rtsa bdun du// de yis mngon par bsngags kyi
239a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / brtul zhugs can gyis bsrung ba bya// mtshan mo gcig tu gnyid log nas// der ni rmi lam brtag par bya// mi ma yin gzugs kun rdzogs pa// mi sdug lhag par mche ba gtsigs// sngags pa
239a3(rgyud 'bum): la ni des smras pa/ / bcom ldan sems pa ji bzhin long // sgrub po tho rangs langs nas ni// shing de ru ni 'gro bar byed// mi sdug gzugs ldan gtsigs pa che// rmi lam du yang ma mthong na// sngags
239a4(rgyud 'bum): pas shing de bor bar bya/ / de nas gzhan du 'gro bar gyis// dang po ru rak+Sha yin te// de las gzhan pa dbang po'i shing // bo de tse ni 'dod pa'o// gzhan yang 'bras bu 'byung ba yi// shing la 'dzegs pa
239a5(rgyud 'bum): legs rdzogs pa'i/ / grogs dang lhan cig 'dzeg par bya// grogs po med par gyur na ni// rang nyid de la 'dzeg par bya// steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su// 'dzegs nas phun tshogs
239a6(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs can/ / de la rtag tu bag yod pas// steng gi yal ga'i 'bras bu blangs// steng gi las la legs sbyar bya// steng ni mchog gi dngos grub tu// gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin//
239a7(rgyud 'bum): bar mar dngos grub 'bring po ste// tha ma la ni 'og ma'o// srog chags rnams kyis ma smad pa'i// 'bras bu de rnams yang dag blang // nub kyi yal ga las thob pa// rdzas kyi rgyur ni bsgrub par bya// byang
239b1(rgyud 'bum): gi gnod sbyin mo la sogs/ / lha rnams lhan cig 'gugs par byed// dgug pa'i bya ba bshad pa ni// kun gyi don du zhi phyir ro// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed dang // mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams// 'dod pa
239b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs byed/ / 'byung po thams cad rgyas pa'i phyir// 'bras bu dang bcas las rnams ni// ma lus spyod pa byed pa'o// shar gyi phyogs kyi yal ga la// der gnas 'bras bu 'byung ba rnams//
239b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin 'bad pas byas gyur na// tshe ring po yi don gyi rgyu// rtag tu sngags kyi dngos grub 'bras// rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin// gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yi// yal ga lo mar rab ldan pa// sems
239b4(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed/ / de ni zlos pos 'bad pas spang // lho ru brten pa'i yal ga la// 'bras bu gang du yang dag brjod// phyogs nges gdung byed dgra rnams kyi// srog ni 'jig par byed pa yi//
239b5(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu// de ni zlos pos 'bad pas spang // 'og tu 'phyang ba'i yal gar gnas// 'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa// lha ma yin dang ldan pa yi// sa yi 'og tu de rnams 'gro//
239b6(rgyud 'bum): de rnams 'bras bcas 'phreng ba ni// blangs nas yang dag rab bsgrags pa// 'og tu 'gro ba'i 'khri shing la// des na de ni sa 'og 'gro// de ru rab tu zhugs nas lha'i// bde nyid zlos pos dang 'gyur ro//
239b7(rgyud 'bum): lha min bu mo yang dag ldan// de ni bskal par gnas par byed// bgrang 'phreng 'bras bu kun blangs nas// de nas blos pos bzlas pa bya// lhan cig bsrung ba byas nas ni// de nas ji ltar bde bar
240a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro/ de nyid ring po'i gnas su ni// gtsang ma'i phyogs der sngags pa ni// de bzhin rtag tu 'dug par bya// bgrang phreng skyes pa sbyang bar bya// brtson pas bgrang 'phreng 'bras
240a2(rgyud 'bum): bu blang / / de nas kun tu yang dag sbyang // der ni 'phreng ba dbug par grags// gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig dang ni// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// sngags shes der ni sbyang bar bya// rtag tu snga
240a3(rgyud 'bum): ma'i sngags kyis ni/ / brgyad dam bdun du bzlas byas pa// de nas de ni dag par 'dod// pad+ma'i rtsa lag legs brjod pas// bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu yis// sum 'gyur lnga dang ldan pa yi// brtul
240a4(rgyud 'bum): zhugs can gyis 'phreng thag bya/ / sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgyu// 'bras bu phra mo zlum por bcas// rtag tu srog chags bu ga med// yan lag ma nyams ma smad pa// mdzes shing kha dog sdug pa
240a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / bu ga med cing gas pa med// ril bu zlum po ji bzhin pa// de bzhin ru rak+Sha dang ni// bo de tse dang in+d+ra k+Sha// 'bras nyid rtag tu lung thang mdzes// 'bras bu dam pa'am gang gi tshe// sngags pa mchog tu
240a6(rgyud 'bum): brtson pa yis/ / 'bad pas bgrang 'phreng ba rgyu bar bya// gser ram yang na dngul dag gam// nor bu shel las byung ba dang // mu tig dung nyid mu sa ra// byu ru yis kyang bya ba ste// 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs
240a7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / gzhan yang rin chen las byung ba'i// bgrang 'phreng bzang po bya ba dang // sa las byung ba'i zlum po yi// ril bus bgrang 'phreng can dag ni// mnyam par bzhag ste srang bu brgyu// gzhan yang ril bu
240b1(rgyud 'bum): 'ga' zhig gam/ / 'bras bu'am khams las byung ba yis// ku sha'i rtse mos brgyus pa yang // zlos pos 'bad de bya ba yin// brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu lnga// lnga bcu 'di dag par ma yin// sngags pa
240b2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ / 'bras bu'i tshad rnams brgyu bar bya// stong rtsa brgyad pa nyid bya ba// 'phreng ba 'di ni thu bo yin// 'phreng ba rnam pa 'di bzhi ni// sngags pas rtag tu brgyu bar bya// de nas brgyus
240b3(rgyud 'bum): te sngags rnams ni/ / phyi mo gsum mam gnyis nyid dang // rgya lcags las byung gdu bu dang // de bzhin gser dang dngul dag dang // de nas zangs byung gdu bus kyang // 'phreng ba kun nas brgyu bar bya// de nas
240b4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' ru yang mig bya/ / de la rim gyis dgod par bya// 'bad pas mdzes par dkri bar bya// sangs rgyas ma lus bzhugs par ni// yongs su gsal bar byas de nas// dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin//
240b5(rgyud 'bum): sbrul ci gdengs ka'i rnam pa bzhin// yongs su dkris pas brgyan pa yin// mu tig do shal rnams mtshungs shing // mgul rgyan rnam par sprul pa'o// de nas 'bab chu dge ba'i mthar// dri ma med la khrus byas
240b6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / go rims ji bzhin khrus byas te// chu yi gnas las ldang bar bya// de bzhin brtson pas nye rag bya// bgrang 'phreng srang bu blangs nas ni// ba yi rnam lngas rab tu bkru// sa yi phye mas rab bkrus
240b7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / gtsang ma'i gos la dri bzang gis// rjes su nye bar byugs pa dang // rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog kyang // tsan dan dkar po gur kum dang // 'bad pas dron mos bkru bar bya// de bzhin gnyis
241a1(rgyud 'bum): ka 'gro bar 'gyur/ / ji lta'i gnas su song nas ni// gang du ras ris bar ba ni// rgyal mchog thub pa'i gtso bo ni// shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/ ston pa'i gzugs brnyan
241a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du/ / sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can// mchod pa de yi spyan sngar dgod// de dang nye bar bzhag nas ni// de tshe de yi spyan snga ru// dam tshig la gnas stong rtsa brgyad// son pa'am brgya
241a3(rgyud 'bum): yang gcig tu ni/ / brgyad dang bcas pa bzlas byas nas// nyin mtshan smyung bar gnas gyur nas// bdun pa'i thub la 'phreng ba dbul// snga ma de bzhin bzlas bya ba// tshad nyid de dang mnyam par
241a4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de nas 'phreng la yongs su bzlas// mtshan mo de nyid du 'khod de// ku sha bting ba'i sa gzhi la// sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya// rmi lam gang dang gang mthong ba// dge ba'i rmi lam mthong na ni//
241a5(rgyud 'bum): rmi lam nges par bstan pa yi// dngos grub de yis bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru rnams// gal te rmi lam mthong gyur na// sngags pas 'bras bu bcas par 'grub// nges par de yi cho ga
241a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / dge slong gzugs dang bram ze yi// gzugs brnyan sna tshogs mdzes pa mthong // gal te rmi lam de mthong na// 'phreng ba dbul bya de bzhin du// sngags kyi don kun sgrub pa po// de yis gdon
241a7(rgyud 'bum): mi za bar 'grub/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ ras
241b1(rgyud 'bum): ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byam las bcu pa bgrang 'phreng gi cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so/ / / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang
241b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi
241b3(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u rdzogs pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang / sbyin sreg gi las la rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa'i sgrub pa yod de/ me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga las gang du rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon
241b4(rgyud 'bum): par brtson pa'i sems can rnams rab tu sbyor zhing gnas par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ rig pa'i sngags kyi tshigs gsang chen ni/ tad+ya thA/ oM tiSh+Tha ha ri ping+gi le/ hi rak+Sha di hi da dA pA ya hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ spyan
241b5(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad ster ba'o// dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pas mar gyi sreg blugs gsum me la
241b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bya ste/ me lha spyan drangs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rab tu sbyar te/ zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / drag po'i las rnams la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro// mya ngan med shing zhi don du// khyad
241b7(rgyud 'bum): par rlan dang bcas pa nyid/ / mtho gang ngam ni khru gang tsam// sor mo gsum du'ang mtho ba yi// snum pa'i rnam rab tu shis// cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin// bu ga med cing ser ka med// de bzhin ne tso'i gshog pa 'dra//
242a1(rgyud 'bum): ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam// kha dog nag po spang bar bya// srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spang // bu ga med pa'ang yang dag sbyin// gzhan yang kha dog mchog min pa// tha ma'i chos kyang
242a2(rgyud 'bum): spablangs pa'o/ / de rnams skam dang rlon pa'ang yin// de yi tshe yang brtsam par bya// ma rul yon po min nyid dang // shin tu ring ba'ang spang bar bya// de nas me thab byas nas ni// kun nas zur ni bzhi pa ru// log
242a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid du ni 'bad pas brko/ / khru bzhi pa yi tshad dang ni// khru gsum khru ni gnyis pa dang // de bzhin nyid du khru gcig pa// rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang // bye mas legs par sbyar ba de// de nas pad 'dra'i
242a4(rgyud 'bum): kha khyer ni/ / kun nas dkyil 'khor rnam pa'o// yang na 'bad pas zur bzhi pa// 'dab ma gsum du bya ba'o// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can// 'di yang yang dag bsgrags pa yin// mngon spyod la ni sa'i dbus su//
242a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bya zhing rtse gnyis su// rtse mo gsum du bya ba yin// me thab rgya la khru gnyis re// gtsang ma'i phyogs su de bzhin bdar// chu klung 'gram du de bzhin spyad// bstan pa gcig gi phyogs rnams dang // dur
242a6(rgyud 'bum): khrod khang pa stong pa ru/ / sbyin sreg legs par brtsam par bya// de bzhin ri bo'i rtse nyid dang // rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang // de bzhin nyid du dgon pa che// gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs rnams ni// gang zag
242a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog gis gsungs pa dang / / sbyin sreg las ni thams cad la// de rnams gnas su gsungs pa yin// khru gang tshad du gnas pa yi// ku sha'i khres la nyer 'dug nas// der ni sngags shes khyad
242b1(rgyud 'bum): par du/ / sbyin sreg gi ni las bya'o// gnas de nyid du rab gnas pas// myur du dngos grub the tshom med// shar dang byung du kha phyogs pas// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa bya// lho ru drag po'i las rnams te//
242b2(rgyud 'bum): de ni sngags pas spang bar bya// shar bltas zhi ba'i dngos grub ste// rgyas pa can yang byang du phyogs// de yis sngags ni dus rtag tu// rig pa'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya// bil ba arga p+lak+Sha dang //
242b3(rgyud 'bum): n+ya gro d+ha yis rgyas las bya// mngon spyod shing ni skam po dang // tsha ba myur dang rnon po rnams// de dag thams cad spang bya ste// thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bkag/ zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can// rlon pa'i
242b4(rgyud 'bum): shing gis rab tu shis/ / de bzhin drag las la shing skam// rtag tu thub pa rnams kyis spangs// yam shing de rnams med na ni// shing la de rnams su brtag bya// rtse mo gnyis su brtag par bya// sngo
242b5(rgyud 'bum): dang snum dang 'dra ba dang / / rma bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa'i// rnam pa de lha'i ku sha yis// kho ra yug tu ku sha ni// rtag tu dgram par bya ba ni// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can// mar gang dang ni mtshung
242b6(rgyud 'bum): pas so/ / de bzhin rtag tu skam po'i rdzas// sdig pa'i las ni bya ba ste// 'dir ni rgyal ba mchog gis bkag/ dri med chu ni dag pa la// rtag tu srin bus spangs pa yi// de nas kun nas bsang
242b7(rgyud 'bum): gtor bya/ / g.yas phyogs su ni bskor byas te// brtson pas me ni sbar bar bya// cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya// gtsang ma'i rtswa yi rtsa ba yis// sgron me tshad dang ldan byas nas// de nas khu tshur brtsams
243a1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ / 'bad pas me ni sbar bar bya// kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste// rtag tu gos kyi mthas kyang min// sham thabs bla gos mngon par spang // gos gzhan gyis kyang lag
243a2(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / rlung gis nye bar gzhom pa la// mngon par dga' bas ma yin no// gtsang ma'i rlung yab de bzhin gos// nor bus kyang ni rlung yab bya// rlung ni yang dag 'byung ba 'dis// me ni mnyam par
243a3(rgyud 'bum): byas pa la/ / sngags shes pas ni me sbar ro// sbyin sreg don du mnyam bzhag pas// de nas g.yas pa min pa yis// der ni bsang gtor byas nas ni// der ni ba yi mar gyis ni// sreg blugs gsum ni/
243a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyin par bya// de nas kyang ni phyag bya ste// sangs rgyas kun dang skyob pa dang // rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la// de nas ci 'dod phyag bya'o// de tshe me yi snying po yi// sngags ni lan brgya bzlas pa
243a5(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / brtson ldan dri zhim me tog gis// rtag tu me ni spyan drang bya// sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas// gnas la mkhas pas gdan dang gnas// sngags des dbul gyi gzhan gyis min// zho dang
243a6(rgyud 'bum): mar du bsgres pa dang / / sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing ni// me las lan gsum sbyin sreg bya// rgyas pa'i don du sngags dang las// kun nas bar ba'i 'phreng ba yis// 'khrugs pa der ni nges sbyar bya//
243a7(rgyud 'bum): skom pa tshim par bsam par bya// zhi ba'i las dang rgyas pa can// de la gsang sngags rig pa yis// lha yi gzugs ni dga' ba'o// mngon spyod las la thun mong ba'i// nges par 'byung ba'i lha
243b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams las/ / gzhan pa'i gzugs ni blta bar bya// rim pa ji bzhin me thab 'dir// ji ltar bsnyen pa'i me tog dang // mar la lan bdun yongs bzlas pas// de tshe spyan drang rnam pa der// ji ltar
243b2(rgyud 'bum): slar yang spyan drangs pas/ / lhag par gnas pas gnyis ka gnas// yam shing rdzas dang bsres pa dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam ldan pa// de bzhin nyid du zho bsres pas// stong ngam 'bum gyi tshad dang
243b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / brgya dang brgyad du'ang brtag par bya// de bzhin sngags pas rig pa gzung // lan re bzlas shing me la dor// 'bar ba'i me yi 'phreng ba dang // de bzhin me lce gcig gyur pa// zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg
243b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / du ba med la'ang rgyas pa can// du bcas drag po'i las rnams ni// rgyal bas smad cing spangs pa yin// me ni kha dog ldan gyur na// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sbyar// zhi ba can la kha dog dkar// rgyal ba mchog
243b5(rgyud 'bum): gis rtag tu bsngags/ / gal te me dkar sbyin sreg byed// de la sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin rtag tu kha dog dkar// rgyas pa can gyi dngos grub 'dod// nag po du ba'i kha dog dang // ser skya yang ni sdig
243b6(rgyud 'bum): pa can/ / kha dog rnam gsum rab bsgyur bas// dngos grub rnam gsum 'di dag yin// gzhan pa'i kha dog sbyin mdog gam// slar yang brtan pa'i sa steng der// sngags pa de la dngos grub med// de lha'i kha dog
243b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba 'am/ / rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog can// me ni 'bar ba de mthong na// slar yang las rnams brtsam par bya// phyir zhing bzlas pa bya ba yin// gal te sngags ni grub gyur na// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/
244a1(rgyud 'bum): slar yang sbyin sreg la rab 'jug/ gshegs gsol spyan drangs nyid la ni// me yi sngags ni brjod par bya// sngar ni rab tu brtags pas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'di ni gshegs gsol dang /
244a2(rgyud 'bum): spyan drang ba yi las rnams ni// de nyid du ni las rnams kyang // de nyid kyis ni bya ba yin// mi yi spyod pa de bzhin gzugs// ras ris kyi ni spyan sngar brtsam// der ni sngags rnams 'grub 'gyur bar// sngon gyi
244a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ / rgyal bas bsngags pa'i las rnams ni// thams cad de nyid du bya'o// gzhan pa'i las ni mi bya ste// sdig pa'i las ni khyad par du// gang du rgyal mchog gis smod dang /
244a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten 'gal dang smad rnams so// ldang dang 'khor los sgyur ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang // de bzhin mngon shes lnga dang ni// 'jig rten lha nyid ldan pa 'grub// rtag tu ras ris la
244a5(rgyud 'bum): brtson shes/ / sbyin sreg las la mkhas pa ni// sa yi 'og gi bdag po 'am// yang na bar snang spyod par 'gyur// sa bla'i lha dang gnod sbyin nyid// rtag tu gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs// rgyal srid bdag
244a6(rgyud 'bum): po nyid dang ni/ / yul dang yang na grong nyid dam// rig pa 'dzin dang lha min nyid// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed// sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid che//
244a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sa bcu la ni yang dag brten// sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs byed na// sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos// sde dpon bdag po de bzhin du// khyad par 'jig rten
244b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug dang / / 'byung po thams cad kun dbang byed// de bzhin nyid du mi bdag nyid// 'byung po thams cad dbang don dang // yang na sa steng rgyal po mnyam// de bzhin rtag tu las kun la// thams cad
244b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gis ni bya/ / kun nas kun tu brtson ldan pas// las kun yang dag bsten par bya// de ched nges par bsgrub par bya// dpal don las ni mchog yin te// bar ma nyid kyang sgrub par byed// yang
244b3(rgyud 'bum): na chung ngu nyid kyang ngo / / de bzhin du ni rdzas rnams kun// de bzhin slar yang 'grub par gsungs// sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas// 'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub mthong // phyag rgya bcing dang
244b4(rgyud 'bum): rig pa nyid/ / las rnams kun la rtag tu bya// sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas// bdag nyid bsrung bar byas par 'gyur// de nas sngags 'di bklag par bya// 'di ni rtag tu las rnams la// bdun bzlas
244b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'am brgyad bzlas so/ / na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta ga ti ga tA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM dz+wa la tiSh+Tha hUM/ ru ru bi shwa sam+b+ha be swA hA/ sngags kyi rab sbyor 'di yis ni// slar yang shing la bzlas bya ba// gnyis
244b6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa 'am bdun bzlas pa/ / sngags rig des mer sbyin sreg bya// me tog bdug pa dri dag gam// mdor na thams cad nyid kyang ni// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i chu rnams kyis// 'di nyid kyi ni bsang
244b7(rgyud 'bum): gtor bya/ / de nas las rnams thams cad ni// rgyu 'dis cho ga brtsam par bya// las rnams ngag ni thams cad la// snga ma'i rab sbyor nyid kyis bya// sngar gyi sgra can ma bcings nas// phyag rgya chen
245a1(rgyud 'bum): mor grags ldan ma/ / bsrung ba byas par gyur de nas// zlos pos rig pa gcig gis ni// las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya// dngos grub rgyu la mkhas pa yis// gal te
245a2(rgyud 'bum): dge mtshan mthong gyur pa/ / rtag tu dge ba'i sgra grags na// de la sngags kyi 'bras bu ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin mchog stsol 'gyur// dang po las la rab sbyor dang // sngags kyi rgyu la rab 'jug pas//
245a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras med 'bras bur bcas pa nyid// dngos grub de la brjod par bya// rgyal ba'i sgra 'am pa Ta ha// rnga bo che yi sgra grags na// brtson ldan kun 'gro'i dngos grub ste// sbyin sreg las la yang dag brten//
245a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang dge mtshan dpal dang ni// 'dab chags sgra ni bzang po dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sgra dbyangs sam// rgyal bas bsngags shing rab sngags pa// bkra shis bzang po yid 'ong dang // rnam pa sna
245a5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs sgra dang ni/ / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang // mchod yon mthong na dngos grub rgyu// kha dog rnam pa du ma dang // rab
245a6(rgyud 'bum): bsngags 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i/ / dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma// mthong nas de rnams blta ba la// gsang sngags spyod tshul sna tshogs 'grub// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg
245a7(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ bgrang 'brang srang bu'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam bcu gcig pa yongs su
245b1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
245b2(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang chen yod do// sngags thams cad kyi sgru ba thabs kyi cho ga'i dam tshig shes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
245b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi chos kyi mdzod las byung ba/ chos kyi sprin la 'thun par rab tu zhugs pa/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag ches gtso bor
245b4(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa sems dpa' chen po/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo/ ches gtso bor gyur pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang nas skyes bu'i khyu mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
245b5(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan cing gtso bo dam pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
245b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das brjod du med pa rnams kyis sngar gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi mchog gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba kun nas bkra shis par 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par
245b7(rgyud 'bum): bstod cing rab tu bsngags la/ sems can thams cad la dbugs 'byin pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gang zhe na/
246a1(rgyud 'bum): bar skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to// gang
246a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dir phyogs bcu steng 'og thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang zhing / sems can thams cad kyi yid kyang tshim par byas nas/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gtsug tor bya
246a3(rgyud 'bum): nub par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phro ba'i lus can blta bar mi nus pa/ sems can kun gang gis kyang mi thub pa/ 'od chen po yang dag par byung ba/ 'od kyi
246a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyis lus brgyan pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can/ 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to// byung nas
246a5(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu snang bar byas te/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas mdun du bdar nas mchod bzhin pa/ 'jig rten
246a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi bla ma/ rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos mngon par bsngags bzhin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mnga' sgyur bzhin pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la bzhugs
246a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyi rim gro byed bzhin pa'i blo gros chen po/ nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad kyi lha'i rin po ches nye bar mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i don du byas pas thams cad bkang ste/ mdzes pa'i
246b1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can mchog tu 'od gsal ba/ sprul pa po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong phrag 'byin bzhin pa/ yi ge gcig pa'i sgra 'don bzhin pa/ 'od zer chen po
246b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba rab tu 'phro bzhin pa/ bar snang gi phyogs su gnas par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la nye bar phyogs nas lta bar byed bzhin pa/ de thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i
246b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la kun tu lta zhing snang bar byed bzhin pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yi ge gcig pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/
246b4(rgyud 'bum): b+h+rUMbaka' stsal pa tsam nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad du rnam par 'gyur ba dru tu g.yos par gyur to// sems can gang la la bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i
246b5(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal bar skyes pa med par gyur to/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dang / sdig pa thams cad
246b6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i phyir dang / sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'i phyir dang / rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad yang dag par srung ba'i phyir dang / dmyal ba'i sdug
246b7(rgyud 'bum): bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba kun tu bstan pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
247a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul 'phrul gyi mthu kun tu bstan pa'i phyir rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa 'di bka' stsal to/ / sems dpa' chen po gang la la sngags
247a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po 'di sgrub par 'dod na de'i don gyi phyir cho ga 'dir 'gyur ro/ / dang por re zhig ma brtabs pa dang / mi smra ba dang / mi za bar brjod pa'i mod dang / sngags kyi 'dul ba la sogs pa la rab
247a3(rgyud 'bum): tu brtson pas 'byung po thams cad la rab tu brtse bas gzhan sdug na bdag sdug par legs par mthong bar byed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ dbang po rnams legs par bzung ste rnam par g.yeng ba
247a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna la sogs pa la 'jug pa/ rab tu dgag pa'i don du rdzas yongs su 'jal ba dang / lha gzhan la phyag mi byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la
247a5(rgyud 'bum): da pa shin tu mngon du gyur pa'i dad pa'i nor gyis bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la mngon par dad pa dang / snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid dang / legs par brtson pa'i bsam pas byang chub
247a6(rgyud 'bum): tu sems bskyed cing / mdor na byang chub chen por smon lam btab pa rgyun du sgrub par 'gyur bar bya'o// de la dang po re zhig bris sku'i cho gar 'gyur te/ rgyal po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor
247a7(rgyud 'bum): los gyur pa/ ma nyams pa'i ras lhag ma min pa/ kha dog can la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ gser ltar ser ba'i gzugs brnyan chos ston par byed bzhin pa/
247b1(rgyud 'bum): seng ge'i khri la nye bar bzhugs pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ lus thams cad kun nas 'bar ba'i do shal can bya'o// steng du ri'i rtse mor glog dang sprin dang bcas pa'o// 'og tu
247b2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i mtsho bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor 'od zer las byung bzhin pa bya'o// sgrub pa po'ang gnas dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs kyi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin dang / lag na spos por thogs pa
247b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa/ ras ris rnam pa de lta bur bris la/ sgrub pa po'ang dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ skye bo dang bral ba'i dben par rgyun chen por ras ris
247b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs su gsol la/ rnam pa thams cad du lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su skyo ba med par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/ zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas
247b5(rgyud 'bum): te sgrub pa rtsam par bya'o/ / lo ma dang / nas zan dang / 'o ma dang / slong mo'i bsod snyoms kyi bza' ba dang / chu dang / phye'i bza' ba 'am/ 'o ma dang nas zan bza' bar bya'o// a ka ru'i bdug pa bsregs
247b6(rgyud 'bum): te 'bum phrag bcur bzlas pa bya'o/ / sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa dang / sngon spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas mig sman sgrub par 'dod na dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i dpa' bo bzang po las byung ba'i mig sman
247b7(rgyud 'bum): srang gcig blangs nas/ bram ze'i bu mos pa byung lnga kha byang du bltas pas 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o// ming med kyi sor mos ril bu bzhi byas la pad+ma'i 'dab mas bkab la skam du gzhug par bya'o//
248a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cho ga bzhin du me sbar nas stong phrag rdzogs par sbyin sreg bya ste/ de nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la ras ris bzhugs nas mchod
248a2(rgyud 'bum): papargya chen po byas te/ phyogs brgyad du pa la sha'i shing gis me sbar nas zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa'i rnam par 'dren pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas phyogs bzhi rnams su dkyil 'khor byas nas phyogs
248a3(rgyud 'bum): skyong ba rnams gzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor gnyis par rab tu sad par byed pa lag tu yungs kar thogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor gsum par legs par grogs bzang po 'am/ grogs med kyang rung ste/ sngags
248a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi mchod pa chen po byas nas bsrung ba byas te/ kha shar du phyogs pas nye bar 'dug la ku sha bting zhing bkram nas a shwad+tha'i 'dab ma gsum gyi steng nas dang / bzhis 'og nas g.yogs te/ lag pas
248a5(rgyud 'bum): mnan la ji srid dro bar gyur pa dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / rab tu 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dang po dngos grub ni 'dis rgyal ba'i bdag nyid kyi spyan te/ gang mthong ba dang / gang rnams mthong ba de rnams
248a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / gnyis pa'i dngos grub ni glang po che dgu'i stobs dang / rlung ltar mgyogs pa dang / lo lnga brgyar 'tsho ba dang / glang po che bcu 'phrog pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis
248a7(rgyud 'bum): zil gyis gnon pa ma yin pa dang / 'bar zhing 'char ba'i nyi ma dang 'dra ba/ lus rin po ches brgyan pa/ bar gyi bskal par gnas shing gzhan 'dren par byed pa/ rig pa 'dzin pas zil gyis mi non pa'i
248b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba/ gsar du 'gro bzhin pa/ rlung gi lam bdun du rnam par rgyu bar byed par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i mig sman bsten pa dang / ldong ros la sogs pa'ang dngos grub rnam pa gsum mo//
248b2(rgyud 'bum): denas rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na thog phog pa'i shing gi shing blangs nas sor bcu drug pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje'i rnam pa bya'o// zlum skor du khru gang tsam gyi tshad kyi mchod rten byas/ de'i spyan sngar cho ga 'di mthong
248b3(rgyud 'bum): bas zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du sgrung bar gnas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/ rdo rje de nyid la nges par sems pas lta bzhin pa dang ldan pas rdo rje blangs te du
248b4(rgyud 'bum): khrod du 'gro bar bya'o/ / shar du rgyun 'bab pa dang 'thun pa'i rgyun bya'o// chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyi sa blangs nas pa byung lngas zlum bskor bya'o// zlum bskor byas nas khru gang tsam gyi tshad kyi mchod rten
248b5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas de'i spyan sngar cho ga 'di mthong bas mchod pa bya'o/ / de nas dur khrod du ras ris de'i drung du rdo rje bzhag ste/ de'i steng du bzhag nas lag pas mnan la ji srid du gong bu'i 'og gi khung bur ltung ba de
248b6(rgyud 'bum): srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas khrus byas nas de nyid du lag pas rdo rje blangs nas rab tu 'jug go// bslangs pa'i bsod snyoms blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la gtor mas nye bar mchod de/ khrus byas
248b7(rgyud 'bum): nas rdo rje nyid la dur khrod kyi thal ba ji srid sbags par so sor gzhag go/ / cho ga 'dis dur khrod kyi sha la bzlas par bya'o// mthar mtshan mo gsum du cho ga bzhin du gtor ma'i mchod pa dbul bar
249a1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas bdag nyid dam/ grogs bzang pos bsrung ba byas te/ lag pa gnyis kyis mnan te ji snyid du dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o// dngos grub
249a2(rgyud 'bum): dang po la gang bltas pa dang / gang gis mthong ba de rnams rab tu dga' zhing dang rku 'gyur ro// gnyis pa la ras ris kyi sa'i rdul phyis pa tsam gyis mi snang ba dang / glang po che stong phrag dgu'i stobs
249a3(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa dang / rlung ltar mgyogs pa dang / skal ba drug 'phrog pa dang / 'dod pas 'gro ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / rnam par snang bar byed pa dang / mthu chen por 'gyur ro// gsum pa la ni nyi
249a4(rgyud 'bum): ma 'char ka dang mtshungs pa dang / lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho zhing 'khor los sgyur ba'ang 'dren par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i lag par rnam par rgyu ste/ de bzhin du pad+ma dang / dgra sta lag pa'i cho gas kyang ngo //
249a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas ril bu sgrub par 'dod na sngon du bsnyen pa byas te lor skyes pa'i sdigs mdzub kyi sor mo blangs nas/ sngar gyi cho gas mchod rten byas te dur khrod du mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas kha shar du phyogs
249a6(rgyud 'bum): pas rab tu zhugs la/ de srid du sor mo nges par rig pa ston pas mnan nas rdo rje las 'od zer 'phro ba de srid du bzlas pa bya'o// nyin mo nam mkha'i rlung la bsrung ba bya zhing / mtshan mo gnyid mi
249a7(rgyud 'bum): log par tho rangs ji srid du sor mo rnams dgug par bya'o/ / bkug pa'i gnas der mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa/ ba dang be'u rgyud mtshungs pa grags pa dang ldan pa'i 'o ma blangs nas/ sangs
249b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan gyi maN+Dal dang / mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas sa'i snod du 'o ma blug par bya ni/
249b2(rgyud 'bum): thal bas kyang dkyil 'khor bcings la/ tho rangs khrus byas nas sngags 'di nyid kyis nges par bsrubs pa'i mar gsar blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te stong phrag brgyad du
249b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bsngags nas ma reg par zos nas mthong ba zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// grol bar 'dod na gnas la phan pa'i dri thams cad la sogs pa la dpa' bo'i rin gyis
249b4(rgyud 'bum): nyos te mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas par byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas rang nyid sngags zlos shing brtag par bya'o// de nas
249b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan byas nas a shwad+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji srid du rang gis rig pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas phye mar byas nas phye ma des kun tu reg pa de
249b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur ro/ / cho ga 'di nyid kyis na ga ge sar gyi phye ma la gzugs brnyan byas te/ bdug pa'i kham por brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg byas na gang la rjes su sems pa de dbang du byed do// cho ga 'di nyid kyis a
249b7(rgyud 'bum): pA mAna'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg bya'o/ / nor 'dod na pa lang gi gnas su song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis lag pas ma bzos pa'i mchod rten byas la/ cho ga
250a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du mchod nas gu gul bsregs te stong phrag brgyar bzlas pa bya'o/ / ba lang stong ngam nor rnyed par 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis mar dang sbrang rtsi sogs sreg cing stong phrag
250a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyar bzlas pa bya'o/ / grong bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba rnyed par 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis mchod rten byas nas tsan ngan gyis btags pa'i pad+ma'i gdan dang lha bshos stong phrag brgya dbul te yul gyi
250a3(rgyud 'bum): dpon po thob par 'gyur ro/ / cho ga 'di nyid kyis gu gul gyi bdug pa bsregs te tsam pa ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya dbul te gser stong rnyed par 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis na ga ge sar gyi me tog
250a4(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag brgyar dbul bar bya ste ras bcos bu'i gos stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du me tog thams cad 'dod pa'i cho ga thams cad dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i thal ba blangs nas zla ba nya la nyin
250a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan du smyung bar gnas te/ ming med kyi sor mo'i khrag gis zlum bskor byas nas gzugs brnyan bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na/ dang po gos bdun dang / mdor na
250a6(rgyud 'bum): rigs dang bcas pa thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / mchod rten byas nas shIng a d+hi ba la dza la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// gang ston pa'i bu mo des sbyin
250a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / mi sbyin na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// sA la'i rgyab nas byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la yungs mar gyis 'di bkang nas lcags kyi thur mas phug ste tsha ba'i til mar gyis byugs te dur khrod
250b1(rgyud 'bum): du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ / lus gcig pa'i bud med dam/ dmangs rigs dbang du 'gyur ro// gnyis pa la rje rigs dang / rgyal rigs ma'o// gsum pa la dge slong dang / bram ze ma'o
250b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes te/ mdor na ma bsgrubs par yang las byed par 'gyur ro// gi haM la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas khyad par du byas nas gang mthong ba dang / gang rnams kyang mthong ba de thams cad dga' bar
250b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du mig sman gyis so// tho rangs langs nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i chus bde bar khrus byas na gang la bltas pa de sbyin par byed cing de 'bangs su'ang 'gyur ro// de bzhin
250b4(rgyud 'bum): du til mar so la ma reg pa bza' bar 'dod pas khyer ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas 'thungs na don du ma gnyer bar yang bza' ba rnyed do/ / rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs nas chos
250b5(rgyud 'bum): gos kyi mtha' nas bzung ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu yongs su bzlas nas lag pa g.yon pas mdud pa bya'o/ / rgyab tu mi lta bar song na smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// chom rkun gyi nang du song bas
250b6(rgyud 'bum): kun tu 'phrog par bya ba nyid la bzlas pas gtsang bar byed do/ / gcod pa dang 'bugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags rnams so// sA lu'i 'bru dang / kA ra bI ra dkar po dang / don grub dang / kA pa rnams kyi
250b7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa g.yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na stong du langs par byas par 'gyur ro/ / rims gzhom par 'dod na gi ri kir+Na ka ra'i me tog la stong phrag brkyang bzlas pa
251a1(rgyud 'bum): byas na nyi ma bdun gyis sha za ba'i rims nyams par byed do/ / seng ldeng gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na gdon thams cad 'joms par byed do thal ba la lan bdun
251a2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pas pha rol gyi sngags rnams 'ching bar byed do/ / chu la lan cig bzlas pas grol lo// de lta bu la sogs pa'i las rnams so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang 'khor gyi
251a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni rigs kyi bdag po/ sangs
251a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rangs pa/ rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir sgrub thabs kyi cho ga bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gsang chen du gyur pa sgrub pa pos gdon mi za ba kho nar dran par bya ba ste/
251a5(rgyud 'bum): de sems dpa' chen po khyod la bshad do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa'i don du rigs kyi bdag
251a6(rgyud 'bum): po gsung du gsol/ 'dod pa phun sum tshogs byed pa// bcom ldan rdul mun rnam par grol// chags pa mngon par zhi ba dang // byang chub nges 'byin sdig pa las// kun tu gzigs pa'i zla ba la// 'phags
251a7(rgyud 'bum): paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ srid pa'i sa bon rnams 'joms par// phyag 'tshal mchod de khyod la brten// bshad bya gal te 'byung bar byed// slar yang srid par 'byung bar 'gyur// tad+yaH/
251b1(rgyud 'bum): shwe ti shwe te ge shre b+hu dze shwe ta/ mA l+ye ra laM kr-i te/ dza ye bi dza ye a dzi te a pa rA dzi te swA hA/ dran pa nyid las 'di'i sngags kyi dngos grub myur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di'i sngags ni tho rangs langs
251b2(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa pos gtsang mar gyur pa lan bdun byas nas/ rgya bor zhugs shing thal mo sbyar te yongs su bzlas nas shar du mngon par phyogs pas gtor bar bya'o//
251b3(rgyud 'bum): bgegs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing las kyi dngos grub kyang 'byung ngo // snying khar mthe bong byin nas lan cig bzlas na lha rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid rnam par dag par yang 'gyur ro//
251b4(rgyud 'bum): de'i phyag rgya'ang 'dir sbyar bar bya'o// de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te/ ma nyams pa'i ras sgra dang bral ba 'bras bu can nam/ ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis 'phags pa
251b5(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ ral pa gyen du brdzes pa de'ang rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa/ phyag na bya ma bum thogs pa 'am/
251b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dkar po'i 'dab ma bstims pa/ g.yon gyi gzhogs su lha mo 'phags ma dkar mo chen mo seng ge'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/ phyag na pad+ma dang / mchog sbyin ma dang / sgrub pa po ni sngon bzhin no// de nas rig
251b7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dzin pas 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing bris sku'i spyan sngar sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o/ / dri zhim po'i me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang / mar gyi mar me dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka'i bdug spos dang /
252a1(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma rang rig pa 'dzin pas de bzhin du dbul bar bya'o// na mo bud+d+ha s+ya/ na mo d+harmA s+ya/ nA maHsaM g+hA s+ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ra ma Ar+yA ya ya hA
252a2(rgyud 'bum): satwAk+ShaN thA/ su ru me su ru me/ ku ru ku ru/ su ru me karma sA d+hA ya/ bud+d+ha sat+ye na/ d+harmas t+ye na/ saM g+ha sa h+yen/ A ga ts+tsha shrIg+h+na de ba dat+te swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i rig pa'o// tad+ya the/ da me da me swA hA/ dri'i rig
252a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / tad+ya thA/ hu hu hu ra hu ma hA me de sA re swA hA/ me tog gi rig pa'o// tad+ya thA/ me g+ha bi hra te swA hA/ bdug pa'i rig pa'o// tad+ya thA/ tu tu tu tu tu ru ma hA tu ru Ne swA hA/ gtor ma'i rig pa'o// 'di rnams
252a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang mar me bdun gyi 'phreng ba gnas pa'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg bya ste 'bum phrag bdun de srid par ro// rang
252a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid 'gul ba dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / rang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis bil ba'i yam shing gis stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg
252a6(rgyud 'bum): byas na gang 'dod pa de yang dag par rdzogs par byed do/ / gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram du nye bar gnod pa med pa/ skye bo dang bral bar byed ma la mchod rten byas nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug spos la sogs pa phul
252a7(rgyud 'bum): testong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o/ / nyi ma so so re re zhing mchod rten bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa
252b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtog pa las/ le'u rab 'byam bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad
252b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lha'i spyan gyis gzigs nas/ yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te yangs pa dang ldan pa
252b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ bi ma le bi ma le/ bi pu la pra b+he/ bi pu la pri ye/
252b4(rgyud 'bum): bi pu la ma ti/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ tA me/ ba ru sAM/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ gardza gardza/ ha na ha na/ bi pu la ma ti/ hr-i da ya/ ma nu sma ra/ bu d+d+ha sat+ye na/ d+harma sat+ye na/ saM g+ha sat+ye na/ bo d+hi satwa sa t+ye na/
252b5(rgyud 'bum): / bi pu la ma ti sat+ye na/ badz+ra pA Ni sat+ye na/ sa t+ya bA ti sa t+ye na/ le le le le/ oM o oM/ b+hu ba b+hu ba b+hu ba/ ga gA ga/ ma tha ma tha ma tha/ hUM hUM hUM/ a ba lo ki ti/ mu tse swA hA/ 'di ni mthun chen po thob pa
252b6(rgyud 'bum): yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ bklags pas grub pa/ bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang
252b7(rgyud 'bum): grong srung ba dang / ri'i 'jigs pa dang / gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / sha za'i 'jigs pa dang / mdor bsdu na 'jigs pa thams cad bklags pa tsam gyis sel bar byed do// 'di las gzhan
253a1(rgyud 'bum): yang sngags kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ da de shAn+te/ pra san+na tsi te swAH
253a2(rgyud 'bum): / spyan drang ba'i sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa trA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ shwe te sa ma ye t+ye thA/ bi shud+d+ha bsti swA hA/ gos bge bo'i
253a3(rgyud 'bum): / sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ mu ne mu ne/ shAn+te bi shud+d+he ga ga na ta le su gan+d+he gan+d+ha/ u dA ka ba l-i tsa ha ra
253a4(rgyud 'bum): ha ra ka ra ka ra bi b+hu swA hA/ me tog dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / mar me thams cad la sngags 'dis lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas lan cig bzlas pas dbul bar bya'o// sa'i gong bu dkar
253a5(rgyud 'bum): pos rtag tu bdag nyid gtsang bar bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das la gur kum gyi chu dang / tsan dan dang / ga pur gyi dri dang / tu rurka la sogs pa dang / a ka ru'i bdug pa dang / bal+li ka 'am/ tsam pa
253a6(rgyud 'bum): ka'i me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / 'o ma sum cu rtsa gnyis su 'gro bar bya ste/ zan gyi gtor ma dang / ba'i mar gyi mar me rnams so// de nas 'di'i ras ris 'byung ste/ 'dod pa'i sku dang bra' ba kha
253a7(rgyud 'bum): tshar ma bcad pa ji ltar rnyed par gyur pa la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gur kum gyis bri bar bya'o/ / chu las skyes pa'i pad+ma'i gdan dang / phyag na pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i 'phreng bas brgyan par
253b1(rgyud 'bum): byas pa/ gos dkar po can/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ phyag mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa/ ral pa gyen du brdzes pa de lta bur bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das sngar brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris zhal shar du
253b2(rgyud 'bum): mngon par phyogs par bzhugs su gsol nas 'bum phrag bcur bzlas par bya'o/ / bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa na me sbar nas sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar bas dus gsum du sbyin sreg ji srid 'bum rdzogs kyi bar du byas
253b3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ gang mngon par 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro// rgyal srid kyi longs spyod 'dod na gur kum dang / tsan dan dang / me tog brgya pa dang / 'bras yos rnams gcig tu byas nas mar dang sbrang rtsi btags nas thun
253b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/ / sbyin sreg mtha'i nyi ma la mthong ba stsol bar byed do// mtshan ma 'di rnams kyang stsol te/ gtsug pud gyen du brdzes par 'gyur ro// skyon med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan dang / 'phreng ba
253b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i ras ris rab tu sbyin pa 'am smra bar byed do/ / rig pa 'dzin pas yid kyis bzlas pa bya/ nam mkhar lha'i ngag thos na grub pa yin no// de nas rgyal srid slar rnyed na chos kyis byed du gzhug go/ slar yang de
253b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid du ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya bzhin pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rkang pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs par gyur to/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam
253b7(rgyud 'bum): na.Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo bud+d+ha a b+hi she ka s+ya pra dz+wa li ta dIp+ta ne pra/ b+hu dzA ya pra dz+wa li taM/ dIp+ta ha pu ka man+ta lA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hr-i da ya mA brta yi d+ha mi g+hu Ta/
254a1(rgyud 'bum): ban+d+ha/ d+hu d+he d+ha r+d+ha r+d+ha/ tsa ra tsa ra ba ra ba ra ya sha sma/ oM ka raM pra ta/ bi d+yA te dza ya ma hA/ bi drA ya ya sA yaska pra brta ya ha ra Ne ra Ne ra ka ru Ne/ mu ni mu ni/ bi mu ne/ shAn+tats+tshin+ta sA hA/ 'di ni mthA
254a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po thob pa rkang pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po thogs pa med pa/ bzlas pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa la sogs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ dpag tu med pa'i stobs kyi
254a3(rgyud 'bum): pha rol gnon pa rig pa'i rgyal po ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub tu sems bskyed pas sgrub pa btsams te khrus gsum byas te thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du bcom ldan
254a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa chen po byas nas dpag tu med pa bzlas par bya'o/ / las phran tshogs rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// 'di rnams ni 'di'i 'khor du gyur pa'i sngags te/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
254a5(rgyud 'bum): nam Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ bi b+hu ri bi b+hu ri/ bi b+hu mi/ A kA ma b+h+yA mi A kA ma tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha bi dza ya brta/ sha sha shra sha sha sha/ tha tha tha tha tha tha thA tha/
254a6(rgyud 'bum): A kan+d+ha/ a kan+d+ha/ A kan+d+he/ pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ ras ris rab tu gnas par byed pa'i sngags so// dang por ri mo mkhan gyi las dang 'og tu ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur te/ ma 'dres pa'i kha dog gis spyan
254a7(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug zhabs gcig gnas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / me tog sna ma'i 'phreng ba'i mchod phyir thogs pa can/ me tog gi 'phreng ba'i 'od kyis brgyan pa/ dbyug pa dang ril ba spyi blugs

255a1(rgyud 'bum): ta d+ya thA/ shwe te pan+d+ha bA si ni rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swAhA/ 'dis thams cad du bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba le ki te shwa rA ya/ be d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA

256a1(rgyud 'bum): nam A rUb lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ taHthA/ b+ha ga ba te hr-id ya/ ma pra ga yi Sh+Tha mi/ oM ta ra ta ra/ oM a a oM b+hu ba a b+ha ya a b+ha ya ba ra
256a2(rgyud 'bum): ba.A n+yan ti u tsuSh+TA ti/ su kha ba ti su khA bA tI/ ra ra ra ra la la la lacu lun pa pag khag/ A gats+tsha A gar+b+ha d+hA te ma ma ba raM/ dA s+ya si/ a b+h+yA swa ra/ mad+ham+b+ha bi pu la ma ti samA d+hi bi dza tri swA hA/ 'jug pa zhes bya

258b7(rgyud 'bum): thos pa dang / sa rab tu g.yo ba dang / nam mkha' la me tog gi char dang / ras ris las kyang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bar skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa'
259a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byon te/ dmyal ba dang / yi dag sna dang / dud 'gro rnams skad cig de la zhi bar 'gyur ro// byon pa la mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung bar
259a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ ci 'dod pa de rnams sbyin par byed do// rig pa 'dzin pa de nyid dam/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po nyid dam/ rgyal srid chen por lus yongs su brje ba nyid dam/ sa 'og tu 'jug pa nyid dam/
259a3(rgyud 'bum): mig sman dang / ldong ros dang / gi haM ngam/ thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/ mngon par shes pa lnga'ang rung ste/ gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen
259a4(rgyud 'bum): brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po/ dkar mo chen mo'i rtog pa yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
259a5(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzugs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sems can thams cad la kun tu gzigs par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po
259a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rjes su son pa po zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po bka' stsal to/ / de la 'di rnams ni grub pa'i sngags kyi cho ga rnams so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ be d+hi
259a7(rgyud 'bum): sarbA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ bi muk+ti tse ta pA ya/ bi dza ya/ pa rA kra mA ya/ a pra ti ha ta/ grI yA ya/ a pa ri mi ta/ d+har+m+ma de sha ha nA ya/ duHkha bi sho d+ha nA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo
259b1(rgyud 'bum): teshwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ at+ta pa ri dra na hr-i da ya ma brta yi Sh+ya mi mi ti/ tad+ya thA/ laM be A laM be lam+ba pra muk+Sha lam+ba b+hi re/ lam+ba bid+ha ya te/ na maHkA ru Ni kA ru Ne/ kA ru Na ya ti/
259b2(rgyud 'bum): b+ho mu ne ku ru/ d+h+yAr+N+Na hr-i da ye kA ru NAn+na na maHtu te shAn+ta muk+She tsa/ shA ne ka ya bi b+h+yo/ s+yA ta shAn+ta pra d+hA twe/ ni t+yaM b+ha ga ba t+ya/ na ma stu te/ su ru su rA/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha b+ha ga bAn ma ma ba ra da dI s+ya si duH
259b3(rgyud 'bum): khi tA nA ma sa ra dri Ni ka raM swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa/ sems can thams cad mi 'gro bar byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po chen po dran pa tsam gyis phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa/ nyam thag pa rnams yongs
259b4(rgyud 'bum): su skyob par byed pa/ ngan 'gro rnam par zlog par byed pa/ bklags pas grub pa/ mdor na 'jigs pa thams cad la dran pa tsam gyis 'di'i grogs brgyad srung ba la sbyor ba/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rjod par
259b5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / yongs su 'jug par byed pa de nam yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// dbul por gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu gang la la byang chub tu sems bskyed de
259b6(rgyud 'bum): klog par byed/ bzlas par byed/ sgrub par byed/ sems la rjes su chags par byed pa'ang de shi 'phos nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni/ bcom ldan 'das
259b7(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon pa bri bar bya ste/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/ skul skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zla ba'i 'od zer rab tu babang ba/
260a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa brgyad po thams cad skyob pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can bri bar bya'o// sgrub pa po'ang sngar bzhin du'o//
260a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ras ris bris nas mchod pa chen po bya ste/ 'di nyid kyis dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma chogs dbul lo// gang byed pa la gcig tu dpa' bas rig pa'i rgyal
260a3(rgyud 'bum): p o chen po 'di dus ma yin par gso sbyong la gnas pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste byams pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi rjes su son pas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa
260a4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas grub par 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de thams cad dang / las phran tshegs la sogs pa byed do// chus dug 'joms par byed do// ku shas byabs pas rims nyin gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa
260a5(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa 'joms par byed do// sngags bzlas pa nyid me tog la yongs su bzlas te gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// mdor na byabs pas nad thams cad 'joms par byed do// 'di'i
260a6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub thabs su gyur pa ni ras ris sngar brjod pa'i gnas su bzhugs su gsol nas 'bum bzlas so/ / mthar mtshan mo gcig sbyang bar gnas pas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma dbul te/ gtor ma ni dkar
260a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum du 'gyur ro/ / mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ srong nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan mar gyur gyi bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o// ras ris rab tu 'gul ba dang /
260b1(rgyud 'bum): mar me'i rtse mo 'phel nas thams cad la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// ma grub na yul rnyed do// mi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu sbyin no// bzlas pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// nad thams
260b2(rgyud 'bum): cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ / 'ching ba thams cad gcod par byed do// yang na dran pas 'gro bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal
260b3(rgyud 'bum): por/ sems can thams cad rjes su son par byed pa po zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
260b4(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du/ gser 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por bcom ldan 'das ma'i yang rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po bka'
260b5(rgyud 'bum): stus+yA la to/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ pra dza li ta hasta ka maN+Da lu pri yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ su ra s+ya a mr-i ta a pra ti ha taM/ be be tsa tsa re tsan+da
260b6(rgyud 'bum): raM be be ru ru be ru ru twe thai the the/ sa ra d+he/ sa ra sa ra d+hi/ gu gu me g+ha ne g+ha na g+ha ne/ a pra ti ha ste bud+d+ha sat+ya d+har+m+ma sat+ye sa g+ha sat+yaM u pa ri sarbe na b+ha ga ban sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ pad+ma gar+N+Na swAhA/ pad+ma su bar+Na ti swA hA/ pad+ma dzas
260b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma pri yA ya swA hA/ pad+ma su pra tiSh+Thi ta tsa ra tA ya swA hA/ sarba b+ha ya da swA hA/ Ar+ya a mi tA b+ha sa mA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa gser 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas du mas
261a1(rgyud 'bum): rjes su gnang ba/ gser bzhin du sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa/ bklags pas grub pa/ gnod sbyin thams cad las grol bar byed cing 'pho bar byed pa/ bzlas pa tsam
261a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis nad thams cad sel bar byed pa'o/ / de nas 'di'i ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog ltar snang ba/ ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag
261a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ pad+ma'i 'phreng bas so sor brgyan pa/ ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams pa/ gos dkar po can/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa/ zhabs gnyis pad+ma la gnas pa'o// sgrub pa po'ang
261a4(rgyud 'bum): / spos phor lag na thogs pa ste sngar bzhin no// de lta bu'i ras ris kyi cho ga byas nas sngar brjod pa'i gnas su bzhugs nas 'bum phrag lnga bzla bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba le ki te shwa
261a5(rgyud 'bum): rA ya/ bo d+hi sat+kA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ dza le dza le da/ shu tsa durba tse a pra de shu tsi ni pra b+hu te swA hA/ nye bar byug pa'i sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA
261a6(rgyud 'bum): satwA ya/ pad+ma gar+b+he/ su gan+d+ha ya/ mu ru su ru swA hA/ dri'i sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ b+hU baHd+hA d+hU ba/ bi d+ha tsan+ta
261a7(rgyud 'bum): tsa le tsa le swA hA/ me tog gi sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki taM shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ pad+ma shrI ye ba ra ba ri le swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam
261b1(rgyud 'bum): Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ a mra te a mr-i te/ ga ha re su mu khe swA hA/ gtor ma'i sngags so// de ltar snga ma bzhin du byas te/ a ka ru'i sbyin sreg gis gang 'dod pa de rnyed do//
261b2(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis 'gugs so// sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i cho gas
261b3(rgyud 'bum): thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid zla ba nya ba'i bar du'o// mtshan mo gsum sbyang bar gnas pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram mam/ chu gling du ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa'i cho ga bya ste/
