261b5(rgyud 'bum): gi sgra thos pa'ang rung ste/ ras ris 'gul bas ni rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// mar me 'phel na grong gi rje bor 'gyur ro// me tog babs na yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// 'brug gi sgras grong bcu drug so sor
261b6(rgyud 'bum): rnyed do/ / ma grub na las dang yo byad thams cad yang dag par 'byor par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/
261b7(rgyud 'bum): yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal por// gser 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
262a1(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgya po tod pa'i rgyal po chen po'i mthu yang dag par b
262a2(rgyud 'bum): stan pa'i ched du/ sangs rgyas bcu gnyis kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po yid la byas nas bka' stsal pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi
262a3(rgyud 'bum): / satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba/ TA sa Ta sa ra sa rA Ni shud+d+hi bi tri mu khe bi dza ye swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa rig pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen
262a4(rgyud 'bum): po ste/ gang la klog par byed pa/ zlos par byed pa des sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis la phyag byas par 'gyur ro// 'di rtag tu bzlas pas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad du mi 'gyur ro// /

262a7(rgyud 'bum): kun nas bri bar bya'o/ / ral pa gyen du brdzes pa dkar po phyag na pad+ma ste g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag gis pad+ma bsnams pa/ de'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis bri bar bya'o//
262b1(rgyud 'bum): gser mdog mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o// 'di lta ste/ pad+ma'i bla ma dang / yon tan bla ma dang / ye shes dbang phyug dang / rtag par sgra dbyangs dang / rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang /

262b3(rgyud 'bum): 'drir bcug nas sngar gsungs pa'i gnas su bzhugs nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / 'di nyid kyis dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// gang byed pa la gcig tu dpa' bas 'bum

262b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma'i nang du gtums te/ ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ srod nas brtsams te ji srid dro bar gyur pa dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du zlas par bya'o// dro
262b6(rgyud 'bum): bar byed bzhin pas ni thig le byas na thams cad dbang du byed do/ / du ba 'thul bzhin pas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gre'o// ras ris rab tu 'gul na rgyal srid du 'gyur ro//
262b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa/ sangs rgyas bcu gnyis kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes

263a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' du ma'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag par skyed par byed pa 'di bsgrub par bya'o/ / dbul po gang la la bsgrub par bya ba ras ris zla ba'i nang du de'i 'byor pa rgyas par 'gyur ro// dbul po thob pa gang la la rig pa
263a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di don chen po sbyin pas mchod pa bya bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi rnam par 'byor pa sgrub par byed pa'i las so// de nas sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngar brjod pa'i
263a7(rgyud 'bum): ras ris bri bar bya'o/ / dgu pa nas brtsams te dkar po'i zla ba nya la yongasu rdzogs par byed du gzhug par bya'o// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/ 'phags pa 'od dpag med gnyis pa
263b1(rgyud 'bum): steng du'o/ / rang gi gzhogs su shAkya thub pa'ang ngo // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yas su dpal chen mo bri bar bya'o// g.yon gyi gzhogs su rdo rje sde bri bar bya'o// sku mdog dkar po ston ka'i sprin
263b2(rgyud 'bum): / ltar dkar ba/ phyag na ril ba spyi blugs dang chu snod bsnams pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog go/ 'phags pa 'od dpag med la brla'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'o//
263b3(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa la sna ma'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'o// dpal chen mo la na ga ge sar gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'o// rdo rje sde la me tog dkar po'i 'phreng ba dang bdug pa dri zhim po rnams ji ltar 'byor pa dbul bar bya'o// sngar
263b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas zla ba nya la ras ris la me tog gi 'phreng ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa chen po byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar
263b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dug ste/ 'di nyid kyis gang byed pa de thams cad la gcig tu dpa' bas bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo gang ji srid 'phreng ba thams cad rab tu g.yo ba'i mtshan ma 'byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o// dngos grub
263b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi tshe mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang thams cad du ras ris kyi spyan sngar til gyis mngon par btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag drug byas na rgyal srid rnyed do// yul
263b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi longs spyod 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar yungs kar dang / til dang / tse ka ta'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gsum byas na yul rnyed do// ras ris kyi spyan sngar mar dang sbrang rtsi btags pa'i til dang / gur kum dang /
264a1(rgyud 'bum): sra rtsi pog dang / na le sham dang / ru rta rnams 'bum phrag bdun sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid chen po rnyed do// ma grub na yul rnyed de nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das ma
264a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po/ lhag par mos pa'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po yongs su rdzogs so// /
264a3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
264a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ khyod kyi rigs kyi lha rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can rgyun du gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen mo dang / lha'i me tog dang / zla ba nyid dang / zhi bar
264a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i thabs de rnams kyang dgugs pa'i ched du sngags 'di mnga' bdag tu bya bar 'gyur ro/ / 'dir gnod sbyin thams cad dgug par byed pa'i sngags chen po'i tshig rnams ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya
264a6(rgyud 'bum): / namo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsarba sa nA pa ta ye/ na ma A rU ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ yak+Sha dz+ram+b+ha na muk+Sha ya/ sarba yak+Sho hr-i da yaM/ gu h+yaHsa d+hi pa tA ya b+ha ra
264a7(rgyud 'bum): b+han Ar+yA ba laM ka te shwa rA ya/ hr-i da ya/ ma nu sma ra/ sat+ya mu nu sA la ya/ tad+ya thA/ shI le shI la ba ti dAn pri ye shan+ti satwA nga R+sha nan ta thA ga ta sarba dz+nyA d+hA nA da~M R+sha na ma ma sa raM pra yan+d+ha sarba satwA rba tAd+ha ya swA hA/ stobs
264b1(rgyud 'bum): chen pos pha rol gnon pa'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang du gnas pa bkug nas/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa'i
264b2(rgyud 'bum): mthu las phyag na rdo rjes gsang ba'i dbang po phran tshogs ma yin pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pas tshig 'di smras so/ / sems can gyi don la brtson par sems pas gang la la sgrol ma sgrub pade'i dngos grub
264b3(rgyud 'bum): nges par byin cig/ phyed phyed rtag tu phan pas bya'o// sems can thams cad kyis de dran par byas nas lha mo sgrol ma 'di lus can rnams bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba bar bya'o// gang bdag gi bka' mi byed
264b4(rgyud 'bum): na phyag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po dang / rdo rje 'chang ba stobs chen pos mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sngon ma can 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa/ gnod sbyin ma thams cad
264b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po bklags pa tsam gyis gdug pa dang 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba'o/ / de nas 'di sgrub pa'i thabs brjod par bya ste/ sngar gsungs pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga
264b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ ral pa gyen du brdzes pa ril ba spyi blugs dang pad+ma'i sdong po phyag na bsnams pa/ phyag na pad+ma g.yang gzhi nag po 'phyang ba/ gos dkar po can/
264b7(rgyud 'bum): skyil krung gis bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs su gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dag bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / rtag tu re bo dang / gangs ldan gyi
265a1(rgyud 'bum): bu dang / nor bu bzang po dang / bzang 'gro'i bu dang / byams pa'i bu dang / dpa' bo bzang po'i bu dang / tshangs pa dang / chu la sems te/ de lta bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po
265a2(rgyud 'bum): mang po 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ khug ma dang sa bon gyis gang ba phyag na bsnams pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams nye bar 'dug par bya'o// g.yon gyi gzhogs su rnam par rgyal ba'i mtha' dang / sdong po dang
265a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam rgyal thob pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / mkha' lding rgyal po zhes pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon 'di rnams thams cad sngar bzhin kha dog ljang khu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas su rig pa 'dzin pa'ang lag
265a4(rgyud 'bum): na spos por thogs pa sngar bzhin no/ / rgyu skar skag la 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de nas ras ris ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ phyogs gtsang ma gzhan du bzhugs su gsol nas/ sngags
265a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dis spyan drang bar bya'o/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ na maHyak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma Ar+ya ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dza ya bi dza ye A gu ru e hi e hi s+thA nA/
265a6(rgyud 'bum): s+yA kra ma/ bi dza ye/ ba ha shAn+ti ka ra swAhA/ sngags 'dis bcom ldan 'das dang gnod sbyin thams cad spyan drung bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na maHsarba yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ na mo na ma Ar+yaH
265a7(rgyud 'bum): lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ye/ ra ra rar shAn+ti bi dza ye swA hA/ 'dis dri dang bdug pa la sogs pa thams cad dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum
265b1(rgyud 'bum): phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / zla ba nyab nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas bcom ldan 'das la zho dang 'o ma'i zan gyi gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs su gnas pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sdeng po/
265b2(rgyud 'bum): / chen po rnams la zho dang bu ram dbul bar bya'o// g.yon gyi gzhogs su bris pa rnams la til dang til gyi thug pa dbul bar bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul lo// dri
265b3(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan dbul lo/ / 'phreng ba sna ma'i me tog dbul bar bya'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs su gnas pa'i sde dpon rnams la thang chu lnga'i bdug pa dang / ka ra wI ra dkar po'i me tog go/ g.yon gyi gzhogs
265b4(rgyud 'bum): su sra rtsi pog gi bdug pa dang / a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog dbul bar bya'o// de ltar ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de nas dus gsum du de bzhin du mchod pa bya zhing 'o ma dang
265b5(rgyud 'bum): nas zan bza' zhing / pad+ma dkar po re re la yongs su bzlas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o// de ltar ji srid 'bum phrag gcig gi mthar bris pa'i gnod sbyin thams cad rdzu
265b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul smyon par byed do/ / ras ris 'gul ba dang / me tog g.yo ba blun mtshams su mthong ngo // de nas grub par 'gyur te gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la'ang grub bo zhes pa'i sgra
265b7(rgyud 'bum): so/ / rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog stsol bar byed do// tshol ba de gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bkas byed par 'gyur ro// ma grub na las thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// rtag tu rmi lam du gnod sbyin rnams dge
267a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi cha rnams su bzhag nas/ nag po'i bcu bzhi pa nas brtsams te mchod pa'i cho ga bya zhing 'di nyid kyis 'bum bzlas par bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// nyin mtshan du
267a2(rgyud 'bum): smyung bar gnas pa nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dkar po'i gtor ma dbul bar bya zhing / a ka ru dang du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
267a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug la 'o ma dang lhan cig pa'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing / kha dog thams cad du snang ba thams cad 'dod pa'i rigs la zho dang / bu ram gyi bza' ba dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o//
267a4(rgyud 'bum): ras ris kyi phyi rol du 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma dbul zhing / dge slong rnams la yon dang bcas pa'i ston mo dbul lo// phyugs bdag rnams la zho zan dbul zhing de'i zhi ba thob par bya'o// ji
267a5(rgyud 'bum): srid du zla ba nye ba'i bar du dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas srong nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan ma dbang ldan gyi mig 'phro bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//
267a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dir dngos grub kyi mtshan ma byung ba de nas me tog gi 'phreng ba dbul bar bya zhing gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo// gang dka' thub pa rnams kyis ji ltar byung ba zos nas yon dbul bar bya'o// de nas las thams
267a7(rgyud 'bum): cad byed do/ / me tog gam/ 'bras bu 'am/ dri dang / gos la sogs pa la mngon par bsngags nas gang la byin pa de bran nyid du nye bar gnas so// rgyal srid kyi longs spyod 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar
267b1(rgyud 'bum): zho dang / mar dang / bo thug gi sbyin sreg bya ste/ 'bum phrag gcig gi mthar rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtsug pud 'bar bar 'gyur ro// chad pa dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo gsum thun
267b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum du til dang til gyi thug pa'i sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bu mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo gsum thun gsum du dang po btsas pa'i ba'i 'o ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
267b3(rgyud 'bum): byas na rnyed do/ / phyugs kyi bdag po rnams dbang du bya bar 'dod na thal ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur te/ zhag bdun thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na de ji srid 'jig rten pa'i las las 'das pa rnam pa sna
267b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pa'i sa'i steng gi mi rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin thams cad byed de/ sngags 'di la the tshom med do// 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes
267b5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dbang ldan gyi rigs kun tu 'ong ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang
267b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du/ sems can la rjes su brtse bas bcom ldan 'das ma jog pa'i rgyal po chen por 'jug par byed bzhin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po rjes su dran nas gsungs pa
267b7(rgyud 'bum): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ na mo bid+ha rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ bi shud+d+ha pra ba/ karA karA b+ha shi She bid+yA d+ha ra gu h+ye ka ma nu sma ra bud+d+ha sat+ye na/ d+harma sat+ye na/ saM g+ha sat+ye na/
268a1(rgyud 'bum): Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA sat+ye na/ sid+d+han+t+ra me man+ta pa dA phaT phaT yA/ mu ni mu nA ya/ sa ma tha sa mA ya/ ud+d+ha raM te ko ka rAn+te ma nu smA ra tra/ hr-i da ta sa kA rA To TaM/ ka Ta TaM swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen
268a2(rgyud 'bum): po thob pa 'jug par byed bzhin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzlas pas gdug pa de thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ dug thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gdon dang rig pa thams cad zlog par byed
268a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ mdor na re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// de nas 'di'i sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ sku mdog dkar po/ ral pa dud
268a4(rgyud 'bum): kha/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma bsnams pa/ gser gyi them skas bzang po las 'jug par byed bzhin pa bri bar bya'o// ngang pa dang / bya ku ra ba dang / ngur
268a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / shang shang te'u dang / ne tso la sogs pa rab tu bsngags pa'i bya rnams g.yas kyi g.yas su 'jug pa skor ba byed pa bri bar bya'o// mi 'am ci gnyis glu len bzhin pa bri bar bya ste/ g.yon pas rna ba
268a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gebs pa bri bar bya'o/ / sgrub pa po'ang 'og tu kha phyogs pa/ spos phor lag na thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jug par byed bzhin pa la lta bar byed pa/ pus mo btsugs pa/ g.yas kyi 'og tu byang chub sems
268a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i lus las 'od kyis mnan pa bri bar bya'o/ / rnam pa de lta bu'i ras ris 'drir bcug nas sngar brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris bzhugs su gsol te/ yang dag par brtsam par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
268b1(rgyud 'bum): nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ dzA ti pra ti ma ma a ba tad+ya swA hA/ dkyil 'khor gyi sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sUr+ya.a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ do d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA
268b2(rgyud 'bum): satwA yA/ mu ne mu ne swA hA/ 'dis thams cad byed pa ste/ 'bum phrag lngar bzlas pa bya'o// sngon du brten pa byas par 'gyur ro// mthar zho dang / sbrang n+ti dang / mar gyis btags pa'i pad+ma tha~Mng phrag
268b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyar sbyin sreg bya'o/ / mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa ste/ dpag tu med pa bzlas pas dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ras ris rab tu 'gul na sa chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro// mi 'gul na yul gyi
268b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag por 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu bzlas pas gter mthong bar 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar pad+ma 'bum phrag bcu dbul bar bya ste grong rnyed do// stong phrag sum cu dbul bar bya ste grong lnga rnyed par 'gyur ro//
268b5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po'i sbyor bas rtag tu 'dod cing dran par byed na de dbul bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las
268b6(rgyud 'bum): nges par byung ba'i 'jug par byed bzhin pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so/ / // de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
268b7(rgyud 'bum): yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po yi ge bcu pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen por don chen po rmang du byung ba/ sangs rgyas bya ba
269a1(rgyud 'bum): phrag bcus rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/ phra mo thams cad sel bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad srung bar byed pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po gsungs par gyur to// na mo rat+na
269a2(rgyud 'bum): / tratra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM g+han+da ni phu ma ta na swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa yi ge bcu pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen
269a3(rgyud 'bum): po thogs pa med pa/ las thams cad pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcus rjes su gnang ba/ mngon par mdzes pa/ srung ba la rtag pa kho nar mchod pa bya'o// de nas 'di sgrub pa'i mchod par 'gyur te/
269a4(rgyud 'bum): ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas/ 'di nyid kyi dri dang bdug la sogs pa phul nas bye ba bzlas par bya'o// rgyal srid chen po rnyed do// 'bum phrag bcur bzlas na
269a5(rgyud 'bum): gser stong rnyed do/ / mchod rten gyi drung du dkyil 'khor stong nye bar byugs nas dri dang bdug pa la sogs pa phul te 'bum bzlas na gang 'dod pa'i rgyal srid dbang du 'gyur ro// chu klung chen po dang / chu gling dang
269a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad la 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pa bya'o/ / rgyal srid chen po rnyed de don chen po yang dag par 'gyur ro// gang zhig sngags 'di rtag tu dran par byed pa de ni sangs
269a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bye ba phrag bcus rjes su yi rang zhing / rab tu bsngags la thams cad son pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges
269b1(rgyud 'bum): par skyes pa/ yi ge bcu pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang
269b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du/ spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra
269b3(rgyud 'bum): / yA ya/ na mo ak+Sho b+h+ya ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo bi muk+ta/ daR+Sha nA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo gam+b+hI ra g+ho ShA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/
269b4(rgyud 'bum): ku mA ri/ ku mA ri/ ma no dzi be Shu nA dza ye/ sha ra da bi dza yA ya/ dum du b+hi swa rA ya/ de bi di bi de bi pU dzaM tA ya/ na masl-i ta gardzi tA ya/ ra ra la la kha gA ya swA hA/ ba ru NA ya swA hA/ a pra ti ha ta/ ba da nA ya sA hA/
269b5(rgyud 'bum): / brah+me shwa ra g+ho Sha ru trA ya swA hA/ bi sa ti/ sa ti rA dzA ya swA hA/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ mUr+d+ha nA ba ra Na swA hA/ ma ma kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya
269b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen por bdag gi spyi bor skyes pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag du mas gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas du ma'i phyag gis mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs
269b7(rgyud 'bum): pab 'od dpag med kyi gnas su gyur pa/ las phran tshegs thams cad myur du bklags pas grub pa'o// de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du gso sbyong
270a1(rgyud 'bum): la gnas pas 'bum bzlas so/ / glags tshol ba thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar sa ga'i nyi ma la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang me tog la sogs
270a2(rgyud 'bum): pa phul nas/ kha tshar ma bcad pa'i ras la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med thub pa la thal
270a3(rgyud 'bum): mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa bri bar bya'o/ / rig pa 'dzin pa lag na spos phor thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa'o// rnam pa de lta bu phyogs sam nyin zhag bcu gnyis kyi nang der
270a4(rgyud 'bum): 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / rnam pa de lta bu'i ras ris 'drir bcug nas mchod rten gyi drung du ras ris bzhugs su gsol te/ de la 'di nyid kyis thams cad byas la 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o// mthar
270a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo sbyang bar gnas te ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas sna ma'i me tog stong phrag brgyad la re re la yongs su bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bsnun par bya'o/ / de lta bu thun gsum du 'bum
270a6(rgyud 'bum): phrag gcig byas pa'i mthar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// gal te rig pa 'dzin pa nyid lus 'bar bar byed dam/ ras ris 'gul ba dang / ldeg pa dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel na
270a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal srid do/ / gang te sgrub pa byed par 'dod na thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/ smra ba'i mchog nyid dang / mig sman dang / ldong ros dang / gi hang la byas pa ras ris kyi spyan sngar thams cad sgrub par byed na dngos
270b1(rgyud 'bum): grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa/ spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes
270b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsung
270b3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por 'od dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ na ma bi pa sh+yaM/ shi Sh+Ti/
270b4(rgyud 'bum): bishwa b+hu/ na ma A ru a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA shAn+ta pra b+hA ya/ pra mu di ta/ kA ba tsa nA ya ni t+yo tA ba/ tsit+ta ya/ b+ha ga ban hr-i da ya ma nu sma ra/ a tsits+tsha N+ya
270b5(rgyud 'bum): lo kA d+h+ya to/ sarba bo d+hi satwA paR+Sha tA d+h+ye b+hU Shi tAM/ bud+d+ha sat+yaM/ d+harma sad+d+hi/ saM g+ha sat+yaM/ a na b+hU mi saM t+yaM/ sr-i ta A pan+ti sad+d+hi/ yak+Sha sarbaM/ ku bAd+d+ha sa t+yaM/ prarba bo d+hi satwA sat+yaM/ hr-i da ya ma nu smA ra he he he he
270b6(rgyud 'bum): hi tre tre te tre tre ra ra ra ra ra la la la la la/ oM kA ra pra be b+huM pany+tsa pra d+hA shi ta kar+dz+dza sarba bud+d+ha sa rA dzi taM tA me ba/ rak+ShaM bi da tA si ra sa pra tA mya haM kha ga kha ga/ bi dza a pa rA dza~M tA ya swA hA/ a ba lo ki te shwa rA
270b7(rgyud 'bum): bi dza ya swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa 'od zer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po las phran tshegs rnams thams cad bklags pas grub pa'o// de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur te/
271a1(rgyud 'bum): ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du'am/ ri'i rtse mo 'am/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram mam/ chu'i dbus sam/ gling du 'o ma dang nas zan za bas 'di
271a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi thams cad byas la 'bum bzla bar bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas mig sman dang / ldong ros dang / gi'u wang ste/ de rnams gcig tu byas la a shwat+tha'i 'dab mas
271a3(rgyud 'bum): gtums te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas nas/ thun gsum du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste rdzas la nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig kho nar bzlas par bya'o// dro bar gyur pa dang
271a4(rgyud 'bum): du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur na grub pa yin te/ dang pos ni dbang du byed do// gnyis pas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gsum pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro'o// ras ris rab tu 'gul na rgyal srid
271a5(rgyud 'bum): rnyed do/ / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa/ 'od zer dang ldan pa zhes pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po
271a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po rdzogs so/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po
271a7(rgyud 'bum): sgom par byed bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen por rtog pa'i rgyal por pad+ma kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so// na maHsu brna ba b+hA sA ya/ ta thA ga taH/
271b1(rgyud 'bum): arba te/ samya ka se bud+d+hA ya/ beSh+Ti ko Ti yak+Sha pa ri pri tA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bod+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+yathA/ ud+g+hadz+nyA Ta/ pra dz+wa li tA ya/ pan+d+ha a ba b+hA
271b2(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga tA ba tsa ne na tA ya b+ha shI ti/ kalpaM/ sarba k+Sha ya/ kIrta na ya/ sarba satwa hi ta/ a nu kar+ha/ sarba satwa pa rA dzi tA ya/ sarba satwa hi tAr+thA ya/ sarba sid+d+ha/ tsa t+ya yo gi naHna ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/
271b3(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ d+ha ma ni d+ha ma ni/ b+hUr+N+Na ba/ oM o au/ bi pu ri ri/ pra ne swA hA/ bi dza ya paT pa Ta pa Ta kA ra swA hA/ ma hA ya sha a nu mu ne swA hA/ a pra ti ha na pa tsi ne swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa pad+ma kun tu snang
271b4(rgyud 'bum): ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po pad+ma kun tu snang bas de bzhin du bdag gi snying po 'di gang de dran pa tsam gyis 'di'i 'jigs pa chen po thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ / gang yang nyin mtshan gsum du
271b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di byas na de yun ring po nas mtshams med pa lnga byas pa thams cad yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur ro// sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i
271b6(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten la dri dang bdug pa la sogs pa phul nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / mthar mtshan mo sbyang bar gnas pas zla ba bcu gnyis su 'o ma bcu gnyis dang / zho bcu gnyis dang / bum
271b7(rgyud 'bum): pa gang ba bcu gnyis dang / sbrang rtsi'i bum pa bcu gnyis dang / til dang thug pa'i bum pa bcu gnyis dang / kuSh+mAN+Da'i kham phor bcu gnyis su bdug pa dang / kham por bcu gnyis su pad+ma dang / slong mo'i
272a1(rgyud 'bum): zas bcu gnyis bza' bar bya'o/ / de nas srong der de lta bu la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas/ de nas gur kum byugs la der ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog dang mtshungs pa'i sra
272a2(rgyud 'bum): ma'i me tog gi 'phreng ba phul nas mchod rten gyi spyan sngar nag po'i bcu bzhi 'am/ zla ba nya ba la lag pa g.yas pas ral gri bzung nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o//
272a3(rgyud 'bum): mthar grub pa'i mtshan ma nam mkha' nas legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig thos par 'gyur ro// de nas ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur te skad cig de nyid la lha'i lus 'khor dang bcas par 'gyur ro//
272a4(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa chen por gnas so// de nas ral gri 'gul lam mchod rten g.yo bar byed na mi'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// yang na gang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba de rnyed cing / don du gnyer ba de 'grub ste dngos grub kyi
272a5(rgyud 'bum): yul rnyed do/ / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las nges par skyes pa/ pad+ma kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i
272a6(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
272a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po sgom bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rtog pa'i rgyal por dpe byad brgyad cu rjes su byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a pa
272b1(rgyud 'bum): lo ki te shA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ oM dri dzA n+d+rA ya/ na maHka mat+ta wa hastA ya/ na maHpad+ma bi d+hu Shi tA ya/ na maHpad+hA ya nA yAH/ na maHpad+mA ha stA ya/ na mo maN+Da la shi d+hA
272b2(rgyud 'bum): namo a shrI t+ya nA byai dza na/ la kA NA ya/ na mo a su rA/ re kuny+tsi tA ya swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dpe byad brgyad cu'i rjes su byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po sgrol ma'i rtog pa don chen po
272b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa pa ste/ gang la la 'di dran par byed pa de'i don thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung ngam/ chu gling ngam/ rgya mtsho'i chu gling du gang bde bar
272b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi bye ma'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten byas te/ srog shing btsugs nas dra dang bdug pa la sogs ji ltar 'byor pas re re'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// ji srid
272b5(rgyud 'bum): du mchod rten stong phrag brgyad po rdzogs kyi bar du'o/ / gal te phyis mchod rten 'bar na sa chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro// de nas 'bar na grub par 'gyur te/ de nas las thams cad du 'gyur ro// rgyal po
272b6(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po 'am/ bud med dam/ skyes pa dbang du bya bar 'dod na mchod rten gyi spyan sngar dri la sogs pa phul nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o// nyi ma bdun thun gsum du byas na dga' bar
272b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gang blangs pa de rnyed do// 'jigs pa la dam tshig la gnas te bzlas pa byas na 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// las phra mo rnams bklags pa tsam gyis grub te/ las thams cad byed do//
273a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa/ dpe byad brgyad cu'i rjes su byed pa
273a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom
273a3(rgyud 'bum): / bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po yon tan gyi rgyan ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/
273a4(rgyud 'bum): / ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ bi muk+ti te dza/ a b+ha ya d+harma/ ra si gu na sA ga ra pad+me ma na si/ brah+man+na pra ti pan+na ma ho t+ya ta/ tad+ya thA/ da ma na/ dA ma ni/ tu ru tu ru/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ti/ ma d+hu ma b+hu mad d+hi nga d+hi/ sarba
273a5(rgyud 'bum): kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa yon tan gyi rgyan ces bya ba/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i don thams cad sbyin pa/ gang rig pa'i rgyal po yon tan gyi rgyan 'di rtag tu dran par 'gyur ba de dus
273a6(rgyud 'bum): ring por mi thogs par las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te/ sngar brjod pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med thub pa'i ras ris 'drir gzhug go// 'dab
273a7(rgyud 'bum): ma stong pa la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ sku mdog dkar po
273b1(rgyud 'bum): ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na spos por thogs pa/ pus mo btsugs pa ste sngar bzhin no// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod ste/
273b2(rgyud 'bum): du ras ris de bzhug su gsol nas/ tshes grangs dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam dge bas gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa dang / byams pa la gnas te mchod pa rgya chen po byas te zla ba nya la stong phrag bcur bzlas par
273b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / 'dis sngon du bsnyen pa byas na mchod rten de nyid la pad+ma re re la yongs su bzlas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dbul bar bya'o// nyi ma re re la stong dbul bar bya ste/ gang tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid
273b4(rgyud 'bum): bcu gnyis kyi bar du'o/ / mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/ zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i pad+ma dkar po stong phrag gsum sbyin sreg bya'o// ras ris
273b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'phreng ba g.yo ba dang mar me 'phel te gzhan du 'phro bar byed na/ 'di ni dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ste rgyal srid chen po rnyed do// ma grub na yul rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi
273b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las nges par skyes pa/ yon tan gyi rgyan ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so// // de nas byang chub
273b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chen po sgom bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por bde ba
274a1(rgyud 'bum): can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po gsungs so/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samya ka sa bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/
274a2(rgyud 'bum): bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ur+d+ha pra dz+wa li ta dza nA ya/ su khA ba t+yaM/ bra mo tsa te/ tad+ya thA/ b+ha ga ba to/ a mi tA bA sa ya/ pA dA mU le/ ma ma tsa hr-i da ya/ pra ti gr-ih+Na tu b+hA ga bAn/ ma ma a nu/
274a3(rgyud 'bum): / kam+ma mu sa ta yi/ tad+ya thA/ sA d+hu sA d+hA/ suSh+ku pa ri ShA mi ti laM g+ha lad+b+haHdz+yo ti Sh+pa pa ti/ bi b+hu d+ha pad+ma hastA ya su me sa me/ bi su ma gi ri gi ri Ni swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba
274a4(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba'o/ / 'di'i cho ga ni bla gab med par shing gcig gi 'og tu bum pa tsam gyi mchod rten byas nas/ de'i spyan sngar a ka ru
274a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bum gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ / gang gi don du sbyin sreg byas pa de'i mchog rnyed do// rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod pas mchod rten gyi spyan sngar lan tshwa'i gzugs brnyan gyis gzugs brnyan
274a6(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ pA la sha'i me la nyi ma gsum la lan bdun thun mtshams gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na thang gi phyogs su yungs kar khrag gis btags pa
274a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams seng ldeng gi me la yungs kar dang seng ldeng btags pa rnams kyis nyi ma gsum du thun mtshams gsum du stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi bye ma la mchod
274b1(rgyud 'bum): rten sor bzhi tsam mam/ mtho gang tsam mam/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad tsam pa brgyad lhag pa'i stong byas la srog shing phul te/ mchod pa la sogs pa'i cho gas re re'i spyan sngar stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
274b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya ste/ ji srid stong rtsa brgyad gnas pa na dong tshe stong rnyed par 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho'i ngogs su mchod rten re re'i spyan sngar cho ga sngon du 'gro bas stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras
274b3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste/ mchog ci 'dod pa de stsol bar mdzad cing gang tshol ba de rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/ bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes
274b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang ting nge 'dzin de nyid sgom bzhin du/ bcom
274b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por dpa' bo ldan ma zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po gsungs so/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni
274b6(rgyud 'bum): kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ shi ri bi si ri smr-i ti ba tsa ne/ te dzo ban+d+ha ni ha ra ha ra a mu kaM me ba sa mA gats+tsha tu ra ma Ni/ bi ra ma Ni/ bi ra bA si/ mi ni sau/ ta mu ta khe bI ta bar+Na sA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas
274b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dpa' bo dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo sems can thams cad rjes su srung bar byed pa/ rgyal ba mchog gi sras rnams kyis gang dpa' ba dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'di rtag tu dran pa de nor gyi
275a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub nges par de'i brtson pa dang bcas pa dang / de'i 'dod pa las 'grub bo// 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
275a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi haM gis 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ pad+ma'i gdan phyag na pad+ma ste/ g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o// de'i g.yas su sgrub pa po ste sngar bzhin no//
275a3(rgyud 'bum): ras ris de ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba phul nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas zla ba nyal po thug gi kham phor bcu gnyis phul nas a ka
275a4(rgyud 'bum): ru'i bdug spos dbul lo/ / de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o// sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// las thams cad kyi dngos grub ni 'di nyid kyi cho gas 'bum bzlas
275a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / phyi nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te/ sna ma'i me tog re re la yongs su bzlas nas dkyil 'khor du gtor bar bya'o// de lta bu nyi ma bdun du thun gsum du ji srid stong rtsa
275a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad byas na nyi ma bdun pa la gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi spyan sngar a ka ru nag po 'bum phrag gsum sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid rnyed do// ma grub na grong ngo // bcom ldan 'das ma
275a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa/ dpa' bo ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo yongs su rdzogs so//
275b1(rgyud 'bum): / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po de nyid sgom bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po
275b2(rgyud 'bum): / chen por mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsung so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ dI b+ha ping+ga le
275b3(rgyud 'bum): ha ri ping+ga le a so ni tA d+ha drA e haM e hi/ ma ma ba raM pra yats+tsha swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po'o// de nas 'di'i cho ga ni ras sam
275b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu can la tshon rtsis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ pad+ma'i gdan la pad+ma'i phyag can/ mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o// sgrub pa po'ang sngar bzhin no// de'i spyan sngar
275b5(rgyud 'bum): thun gsum du mar gyis btags pa'i tsan dan dmar po'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gser brgya rnyed do/ / 'bum phrag bdun sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid rnyed do// 'dir pad+ma rA ga 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
275b6(rgyud 'bum): na mo A r+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ yi gets+tshe tA tsa pa ri pra Na/ e shru t+yaM/ da dA ti/ me badz+re Ni/ g+h+r-i Ni/ mo ha ni/ mo ha dza/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ a b+ha ya
275b7(rgyud 'bum): pra da/ a b+ha ya pra de/ la la la la/ la la la la swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa pad+ma rA ga sbyin pa'i sngags so// 'di'i cho ga ni tsan dan dmar pos 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya'o//
276a1(rgyud 'bum): de'i spyan sngar mar dang sbrang rtsis btags pa'i me tog dmar po'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na pad+ma rA ga brgya rnyed do// zas kyi sngags kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya sa
276a2(rgyud 'bum): ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ pra byA ka rI/ pra b+ha kA ri/ dz+yo tiSh+Tha ti su tsa~M bi mu tsA ya swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste/ zas gos sbyin pa'i sngags
276a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / 'di'i cho ga ni khrag dang ba bla las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya'o// de'i spyan sngar mar gyis btags pa'i 'o thug gi sbyin sreg ji srid 'bum phrag gcig byas na gnas thams cad du zas
276a4(rgyud 'bum): gos rnyed do/ / 'di ni dngul sbyin par 'gyur te/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ g+ha na g+ha na/ ha TA ya/ sA d+ha
276a5(rgyud 'bum): / ya sA d+ha ya/ e hi e hi/ phu phu bu phu/ b+hu g+hu/ phu ra swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa dngul sbyin pa'i sngags te/ 'di'i cho ga ni gur kum gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug
276a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya ste/ de'i spyan sngar zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i na ga ge sar gyi sbyin sreg 'bum byas na dngul brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro// yang 'dir gser rab tu sbyin pa'i sngags ni/ na mo rat+na tra ya
276a7(rgyud 'bum): / ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ga ru ru pha ra ba ra/ ba ri li swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste gser sbyin pa'i sngags so//
276b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di'i cho ga ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la mal+li ka'i me tog re re la yongs su bzlas nas mchod rten gyi drung du gtor bar byaro// thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad gtor na zla ba'i nang du gser brgya rnyed do//
276b2(rgyud 'bum): ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag na spyi blugs bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o//
276b3(rgyud 'bum): ras ris des grong ngam dgon par a shwat+tha'i shing gi 'og tu gtsang ma'i phyogs su bzhugs nas sra rtsi pog gi sreg blugs 'bum phrag bdun sbyin sreg byas na bcom ldan 'das kyis myur du rgyal srid stsol bar
276b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / zhes pa de rnam pa lnga po tsam ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa/ mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa rdzogs so// /
276b5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bsgoms nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i
276b6(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por oM yig rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA s+ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha s+ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo
276b7(rgyud 'bum): ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ a muk+te/ tsats+tsha da ne/ mA d+he ni ma d+he ni/ su ru d+hi/ ru ta mA ya/ d+hA/ rI/ hu hu/ hu hu/ ma tha ma tha ma the/ oM ra pra mu kha/ pA la/
277a1(rgyud 'bum): pA la/ ma hA ba ri bA la/ te dza/ na mo s+yA ta/ sarba duSh+Tata dA si sA twA N+Di mA ne swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'khor ba'i sna thag grol bar byed pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i
277a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po gang 'di rtag tu dran par byed na 'khor bar yun ring du mi 'khor ro/ / bzlas pa nyid kyis mtshams med pa lnga po rnams rnam par sbyong bar byed do// de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni sngar
277a3(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba/ pad+ma phyag na bsnams pa/ g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o// sgrub pa
277a4(rgyud 'bum): po yang dag pa'i lus kyi mgo bos bdug pa sreg pa cha byad dang rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / de nas ras ris de sngar brjod pa'i gnas su bzhugs nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa
277a5(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa 'di nyid kyis phul la 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga po rnams rnam par sbyong bar byed do// 'bum phrag drug bzlas pas dam
277a6(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / gdug pa dang / sha za dang / srin po rnams 'ching bar 'dod na ku sha'i sna thag gis bskor nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags te gdug pa gang na gnas pa'i shing ngam
277a7(rgyud 'bum): khyim la sogs pa la dkri bar bya'o/ / gdug pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// gdug pa'i sems dang sems can rnams zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i mig sman sgrub par 'dod na ras
277b1(rgyud 'bum): ris kyi spyan sngar stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs byas nas/ a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du bzhag nas du ba 'thul na de rnams rgyal ba'i spyan dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag gsum du 'tsho
277b2(rgyud 'bum): bar byed do/ / ras ris kyi spyan sngar pad+ma dkar po 'bum phrag gsum dbul bar bya'o// rgyal srid rnyed do// ma grub na yul rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i
277b3(rgyud 'bum): rtog par/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa/ 'khor ba'i sna thag grol bar byed pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// // de nas byang chub sems
277b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por yi ge bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i
277b5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di gsungs so/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ da sha ni/ ka ra Ni/ bi ka ra Ni/ di d+hu li/
277b6(rgyud 'bum): bI la ya swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa yi ge bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po rtag tu sangs rgyas bcu gcig la 'di bdag gis sngon bshad pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas gser rnyed do// de
277b7(rgyud 'bum): nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni sgrub pa'i ched du 'gyur te/ sngar brjod pa'i ras ris na ga ge sar gyi phye ma dang ba li ka bsres pas 'drir gzhug ste/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ bsam gtan sgom pa/ phyag na pad+ma
278a1(rgyud 'bum): bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas bgrang 'phreng bsnams pa/ sku mdog dkar po'o// rtsub pa po'ang sngar bzhin no// ras ris dang po'i gnas su bzhag nas 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o// sngon
278a2(rgyud 'bum): du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / ri'i rtse mor nyi ma gsum du mi bza' bar stong phrag nyi shu bzlas par bya ste/ gser stong rnyed par 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po'i tshon gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngar
278a3(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa bzhin 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / de'i spyan sngar tsan dan dkar po'i zhogs ma dang bcas pa 'bum phrag gsum sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid rnyed do// ma grub na grong rnyed de/ yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
278a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po sgom bzhin pa la'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par 'dod cing don du gnyer ba sbyin pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so//
278a5(rgyud 'bum): denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
278a6(rgyud 'bum): / por ras ris kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ka Te ni ka Te/ ka TaM ka Te/ dz+yo ti/
278a7(rgyud 'bum): tiSh+Tha tI/ bi pu le swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa ras ris kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'o// rtag tu bzlas pas don sbyin par byed cing sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa grub par
278b1(rgyud 'bum): yang 'gyur ro/ / yang 'di'i cho ga ni sngar brjod pa'i ras ris la 'od dpag med 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas su 'phags
278b2(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ dar dkar po'i stod g.yogs can/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyor bar byed bzhin pa'o// g.yon du 'phags pa mthu chen thob pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs
278b3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyor bar byed pa'o// de lta bu'i ras ris 'drir bcug nas gtsang ma'i phyogs su ba Ta'i shing la so so so sor bzhag nas 'di nyid kyis dri dang me tog la sogs pa
278b4(rgyud 'bum): phul la 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o/ / sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// mthar mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas te/ me tog dkar po stong phrag brgyad la re re la yongs su bzlas nas spyan ras gzigs dbang
278b5(rgyud 'bum): phyug gi drung du dbul bar bya'o/ / dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ni pad+ma stong rtsa brgyad po de rnams gcig tu gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di ni dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'o// 'di dag phye mar byas nas gzhan pa la dang bsres te rgyal po'am/
278b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i blon po 'am/ gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// nad kyis gdungs pa la byin na nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// phye ma des mtshan ma dang ldan pa mo la rdul btab na bu rnyed do// tho rangs bdag nyid kyi spyi
278b7(rgyud 'bum): bor phye ma des rdul btab na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / de ltar gang 'dod pa de thams cad phye ma des byed do// grol bar 'dod na nye bar bzhag pa'i nad dam/ khrag 'dzag pa 'am/ mtshan par rdol ba 'am/
279a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du dug la sogs pa thams cad la 'thung ngu bcug pa 'am/ cung zad drug par sbyin par bya ste/ nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// yang 'dir ras ris kyi gnas kyi phye ma'i tshe
279a2(rgyud 'bum): ga ni na ga ge sar dang / tsan dan dang / da ma na ka dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang / pu shel tsi dang / ru rta dang / me tog brgya pa ste/ 'di rnams ma mnyam par sbyar nas phye mar byed du gzhug go// 'di ni ras ris
279a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi gnas kyi phye ma ste/ brgya phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags nas gang la btung ba la sogs pa byin pa de dbang du 'gyur te/ bran nyid du nye bar gnas pa dang / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa med pa dang / gnyis mnyam
279a4(rgyud 'bum): du rnyed cing rab tu 'jug go/ / de bzhin du 'jigs pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar pad+ma dkar po 'bum phrag gsum dbul bar bya ste yul chen po rnyed do// arka'i shing gis me rab tu sngar nas pad+ma dmar pos 'bum phrag
279a5(rgyud 'bum): bdun sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid chen po rnyed do/ / ma grub na grong khyer chen po rnyed do// til gyi sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na grong gcig rnyed do// 'bum phrag lnga sbyin sreg byas na nor sbyin pa dang mchog sbyin par

279a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs so/ / / slar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du/

279b2(rgyud 'bum): / hate/ pad+ma ShaN+Da ni/ bA sI ni bud+d+he/ bud+d+hA ya/ pa raM pa rA ya/ sarba ga ti bi dza yA ya swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa pad+ma'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i rig pa chen po ste/ 'di rtag tu bzlas pas phyir zlog par 'gyur

280a1(rgyud 'bum): par bsngags nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dbul bar bya ste/ nyin zhag bdun thun gsum du dbul bar byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// bram ze dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar pA la
280a2(rgyud 'bum): sha'i me la nyin zhag bdun thun gsum du g.yang gzhi nag po'i pags pas sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi spyan sngar bil ba'i me la u dum ba ra'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na zhag gsum gyis

282a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bum bzlas so/ / mthar nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas srod nas brtsams nas bzlas par bya/ nam mkha' la grub bo zhes pa'i sgra thos par

282a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jigs rten gyi khams su byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dag pa'i yul rnam par 'phro/ zhing rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/

282b2(rgyud 'bum): tu sbyin pa bshad kyis/ kye lha'i tshogs rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad dang / gang yang gzhan rig pa'i
282b3(rgyud 'bum): sde dpon rnams nyon cig/ bdag gis rig pa'i rgyal po chen po khro gnyer can zhes bya ba'i rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal mo bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol mas gsungs pa/ rig pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/
282b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa/ gsol ba 'debs pa/ mngon par 'du byed pa nyid de dang 'thun par 'jigs pa chen po thams cad 'phrog pa dang / skems pa dang / gsod
282b5(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa/ rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir las kyi cho ga bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs kyi snga dro langs nas gtsang mar gyur pas shar la sogs par kun tu bltas te/ lag mthil
282b6(rgyud 'bum): la yongs su bzlas nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la'ang kun tu bltas nas/ der lag mthil la bzlas par bya'o// bgegs thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gdug pa'i bsam pa rnams la de
282b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du'ang nyi ma so sor byas na thams cad ring por mi thogs pa kho nar thams cad zhi ba'i las 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / rgyas pa can yang nyi ma nub pa'i dus tshod la de nyid kyi las bya'o// mngon spyod can
283a1(rgyud 'bum): la mtshan phyed na gnas gcig tu gtsug pud dgrol zhing lan bdun brjod cing nam mkha'i mthil du bltas nas blo rtse gcig tu bsgom par bya'o/ / de'i sems can mngon spyod can gyi
283a2(rgyud 'bum): las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / gang yang lha'i tshogs dang / 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad dang / log par 'dren pa'i tshogs rnams kyang 'di skad ces bdag gis gsungs pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po
283a3(rgyud 'bum): gsang chen gsang ba'i sbyor ba byed par 'gyur ba/ de'i dngos grub gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub pa po dang sngags kyi rtog pa 'dir gsungs pa'i sgrub pa pos gdon mi
283a4(rgyud 'bum): za bar byed par 'gyur ro/ / 'di ltar kun tu rtogs par bya'i/ gzhan ma yin no zhes so// kye lha'i tshogs rnams rig pa chen po gang ma mo'i gsang chen gsang ba rnams nyon cig/ de skyed par byed
283a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho ga'i rig pa'ang bshad par bya'o/ / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mtha' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
283a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/ / ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pas sems can thams cad kyang skye ba brjes te stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / rnam par
283a7(rgyud 'bum): shes pa dang ldan par gyur to/ / snyoms par zhugs pa de las mthu dang bcas par langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ngo // nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
283b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan
283b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig pa 'ong ba 'am 'gro bar ga la 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
283b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje gang khyod sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta bu yongs su zhus pa legs
283b4(rgyud 'bum): so legs so/ / des na rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi phyin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
283b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di nyid rab tu ston par gyur to/ / lho phyogs su de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom
283b6(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba de'ang sgrol ma'i rig pa 'di nyid gsung bar gyur to/ / nub phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
283b7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med ces bya ba des kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rig pa 'di gsung bar gyur to/ / byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
284a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lus mdzes zhes bya ba de'ang rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di nyid gsung bar gyur to/ / de ltar phyogs bcu rnams su'ang de lta bu la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
284a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang ldan pa de/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang snying po 'di nyid kun tu bshad par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las 'das pa na 'dzin
284a3(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
284a4(rgyud 'bum): po rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'ang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'byung gnas la rig pa 'di rab tu ston to// de nas
284a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing las 'das na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen rab snang zhes
284a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba bzhugs/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen
284a7(rgyud 'bum): rab snang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rig pa 'di sems can rnams kyi don gyi ched du ngas bshad kyis mchog tu zung zhig/ de nas byang chub
284b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs kyis rig pa mchog tu gzung bar gyur to/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
284b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba so/
284b3(rgyud 'bum): sor 'khod do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/
284b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i ched dang / lha dang mi rnams kyang rjes su gzung ba'i ched dang / sems can thams cad kyi ched du sems can thams cad la bshad par bya'i/ mchog tu zung
284b5(rgyud 'bum): zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rig pa mchog tu bzung bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu
284b6(rgyud 'bum): gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de gzhan ma yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
284b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug 'di der gyur pa'o/ / gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal zhes pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rab snang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lha mo gos dkar mo dang / de bzhin
285a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa 'ong dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing byas pa'i gnas su/ rigs kyi bu rig pa 'di 'gro ba dang 'ong ba nyid kyang / rigs kyi bu rig pa'i rgyal po ston par byed do// de nas
285a2(rgyud 'bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/

285a6(rgyud 'bum): can rnams la gcig tu snying brtse ba shin tu snying brtse ba can/ sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa rab tu stsol cig/ thub pas gsungs pa'i rig pa ston cig/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
285a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis 'jig par byed pa'i me lngar 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi
285b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing rnams thams cad kyang de'i 'od zer gyis kun tu skul bar byed pa byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i dpral bar spyan gsum pa byung ste/ spyan de las sna tshogs dbang du byed pa'i 'od zer byung bar gyur
285b2(rgyud 'bum): / / 'od zer de rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad du'ang rigs kyi bu gang khyod 'di lta bu'i rig pa smras pa legaso legs so zhes pa'i tshig thos
285b3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / put+tA rI ka dang / dri bzang ldan dang / ka To ra dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po'i me tog
285b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis mngon par gtor bar gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu rig pa'i rgyal po smos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
285b5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa gsungs pa/ na mangs rba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha te b+h+yaHsamyaka saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHoM b+ha ya nA sha ni trA sa ni trA sa twa sa ya/ b+h+r-i ku Ti/ ta Ti/ bai ta Ti bai ta Ti/ sau te/ dza Ti ni swA hA/ rig pa 'di gsungs ma thag tu'ang stong gsum
285b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma' ba dang / lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma' ba dang / byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma' ba dang / shar phyogs mtho na nub
285b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs dma' par gyur to/ / de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos te/ gzhal yas khang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang gdan las bskyod/ dri za rnams kha
286a1(rgyud 'bum): bub tu gyur/ lha ma yin rnams kyi dbyangs nyams pa dang / nam mkha' lding rnams kyi dbyangs nyams pa dang / nam mkha' lding rnams kyi sgyu ma'i mgyogs pa dang / srin po rnams kyi
286a2(rgyud 'bum): tru ta ta ra dang / gdug pa rnams nye bar 'gro bar gyur to// ma mo'i tshogs rnams ngu 'bod kyi nyam thag pa'i nga ro dang ngu 'bod kyi klag cor smra'o// de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
286a3(rgyud 'bum): skyabs med dpung gnyen med de/ ji srid 'og min pa'i lha'i ris rnams kyang sreg par gyur to// lha rnams thams cad rings pa rings par de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nye bar lhags so// de nas phyag na rdo rje
286a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyi 'od zer rnams kyis yid tshim nas stan las 'phos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung na nye bar lhags
286a5(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dbugs 'byin pa mdzad de/ ma 'jigs shig/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ de nas yang byang chub

286a7(rgyud 'bum): la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs
286b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbyangs su gyis shig/ de nas lha de rnams thams cad dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa dang / byang
286b2(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de nas 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa nyid ngo mtshar
286b3(rgyud 'bum): thob nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar lhags so/ / nye bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di lta bu'i
286b4(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags byang chub sems dpa' gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ / bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
286b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gtsug tor nas nges par 'thon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
286b6(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mthu lha rnams kyis sngon chad ma thos pa gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar ro// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
286b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// 'das pa'i dus na shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na rig pa 'dzin pa bye
287a1(rgyud 'bum): pa phrag brgyang rgyan pa'i po sor gnas so/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing den bung med ces bya ba ga gas pa med do// de rnams thams cad kyang rig pa 'dzin partson med pa kho n+da te/ rig pa 'dzin
287a2(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur ba las ma 'das te/ rigs kyi pra thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad dang / dri za dang / 'byung po dang / sha ba dang / mi 'am ci dang /

287a5(rgyud 'bum): yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ oM Tak+ki hUM dz+dza/ 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa/ rig pa mchog gi rgyal po'i snying po rig pa'i rgyal po
287a6(rgyud 'bum): stong bzlas par bya'o/ / rgyud phyi ma bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u dang po'o// / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / dri za dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
287a7(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skem byed dang / smyo byed dang / gnon po dang / log 'dren thams cad nas
287b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dang / lha dang / sgra 'am/ chu klung dang / rgya mtshor bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / sman chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar lhags so// nye bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
287b2(rgyud 'bum): zhabs la mgo bos mngon par phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ / de nas de rnams thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
287b3(rgyud 'bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu ba 'ga' zhig yongs su zhu bar 'tshal lo/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha rnams la 'di
287b4(rgyud 'bum): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bzhin bzangs dag legs so// gang dang gang 'dod pa dris shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
287b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rig pa rnams 'char ba 'am/ nub par 'gyur ba gdags pa dang / gang gi dus su rig pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ lha rnams kyis de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
287b6(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal to/ / kye lha rnams rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe rig pa rnams 'char bar 'gyur te/
287b7(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grub dang ldan pa dang / dal zhing dal ba'i brtson 'grus dang / snying stobs dang / le lo dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / tshig rtsub po dang / srog gcod pa dang / drag po can dang / sred pa dang /
288a1(rgyud 'bum): brkam pa rnams te/ de rnams rtag tu mar mi shes pa dang / par mi shes pa 'di lta bu rnams kyis rig pa'i dngos grub mi rnyed do// rigs kyi bu 'das pa'i dus na bskal
288a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bzang po 'di nyid la rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po bco brgyad 'das pa na rdzu 'phrul chen po can/ mthu chen po can/ de rnams rig pa 'dzin pa'i ming du grags par gyur to// de rnams thams
288a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang rig pa 'dzin pa nyid dang rig pa'i mthu yis rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su sdig med ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i
288a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag bzhi'i mnga' bdag go/ byang phyogs su ri rab lhun po zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag drug cu'i mnga' bdag go// ri rab
288a5(rgyud 'bum): lhun po ri'i rgyal po'i nye logs na glang po'i sde zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / gzhon pa dkar po zhes
288a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / cha byad bzang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / gser gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / pad+ma bkod pa'i rgyan
288a7(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje'i phyag ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / rin chen kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / zhags pa'i phyag rgya
288b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / me lce 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / sgyu 'phrul kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / rtag tu rab 'a
288b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po bco brgyad po 'di rnams rig pa 'dzin pa stong phrag bcu bzhi yongs su bskor ba/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ de rnams thams
288b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang bud med rnams kyis lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// rigs kyi bu rig pa 'dzin pa 'di rnams skye ba bdun gyi nang du rig pa'i rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa ste/
288b4(rgyud 'bum): gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de nyid du rig pa 'di'i mthus dran pa so sor rnyed do// rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i gnas su gnas pas rig pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas lha dang byang chub sems dpa'i
288b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor de rnams ngo mtshar thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog gis mngon par gtor bar gyur to// de nas lha thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rab tu dga'
288b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i yid kyis rig pas dga' ba'i don du cho ga gsungs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' des rig sngags gsungs pa/ oM pad+ma badz+ri hUM/ snying po'o// ga ga na bi dA ri Ni/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM b+ha ya nA sa ni
288b7(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ mgo bo'o// oM tra pa ni hUM/ gtsug tor du'o// oM taH hUM/ go cha'o// oM be ta Ti hUM/ gur ro// oM sa te dza Ti ni phaT/ ra ba'o// zhes pa 'di dag rig pa'i 'khor gyi lhag ma'o//
289a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rig pa nyid kyis dri dang / me tog dang // bdug pa la sogs pa'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
289a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das ma'i ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs so/ / dang po re zhig tshad med cing skra dang bral ba'i ras bkrus pa tsan dan dkar po dang a ka ru'i 'dab ma spang spos dang lhan cig sbyar ba/
289a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das mas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas lan bdun bkru bar bya'o// bkrus pa la'ang byug par bya'o// 'byung po'i skra dang / ga dza ha dang / sha tru g+ha ni dang / pri yang ku ste/
289a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams kyis bdug par bya'o// 'di rnams kyis gang 'dod pa de grub par mtshon no// mtshan mo gcig smyung bar gnas par gyur nas mi blo dang ldan pas mnyan par bya'o// de nas tho rangs dang
289a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo me sbar nas rang gi khrag gis btakra pa'i yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/ / cho ga 'di nyid kyis ras ris 'dri bzhin pa la bgegs mi 'byung ngo // de bas kyang byug par bya ste rnam pa
289a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du na log 'dren gyis byin gyis brlabs pas grub par mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pa rang nyid kyis rig sngags zlos bzhin pas ri mo mkhan khrus byed du gzhug go// bkrus nas de
289a7(rgyud 'bum): la'ang gos rab tu sbyin par bya ste ji srid 'dri ba'i bar ro/ / ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas par bya zhing / 'dri bzhin pa na'ang ras ris kyi mthar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya zhing / bum pa
289b1(rgyud 'bum): gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ / dbus su'ang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o// der yang bum pa gang ba gzhag par bya'o// bum pa de rnams thams cad kyang me tog gis brgyan par bya'o// mar me'i 'phreng
289b2(rgyud 'bum): dbul lo/ / rig pa 'dzin pas rig pa yid la byed cing bdug spos sreg par bya'o// de nas ri mo mkhan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas tshangs pa'i
289b3(rgyud 'bum): ri mo gdab par bya'o/ / de nas slar yang rig pa 'dzin pas kha shar du mngon par phyogs pas nye bar zhugs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar a pA mArga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// de nas ri momal
289b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis lha la phul ba'i ston mo zos pas ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / gser mdog pud
289b5(rgyud 'bum): dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ / g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba la ral pa'i cod pan 'phyang ba/ spyan gsum pa/ dpral ba nas 'od zer 'byung ba/
289b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma la gnas pa'o// de'i rgyab tu rig pa'i lha mo gos dkar mo rin po che'i 'od dkar po bgos pa/ pad+ma rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de'i bar ma chad par khro gnyer can ma gos dkar po
289b7(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma thugs rje chen po bri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs phyag na rin po che bsnams pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de rnams thams cad kyang bde bar
290a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad du bya zhing pad+ma la gnas shing so sor gnas pa'o/ / g.yon gyi gzhogs su phyag na rdo rje sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyag na

290a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khu tshur rdzo sangs rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa rdo rje bsnams pa'i drar gzhug par bya'o/ / rdo rje dbyug pa dbyug pa bsnams pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// blo gros rdo rje ma dang gnam
290a4(rgyud 'bum): lcags ma'ang rdo rje dbyug pa'i rgyab tu 'drar gzhug par bya'o/ / g.yon du lha skrag pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can rdo rje drag tu dgod pa 'drir gzhug cing / phyag na rdo rje'i
290a5(rgyud 'bum): nye logs su rdo rje sde dang gtsug 'phyang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / thams cad kyang pad+ma la so sor gnas pa'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi bya ste// log 'dren
290a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi rigs bzhi rnams rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can 'bros bzhin pa 'og tu bri bar bya'o/ / de rnams kyi 'og tu pad+ma'i mtsho bya'o// klu lag na pad+ma thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// lha'i
290a7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs thams cad kyang me tog rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / lha'i rnga bo che 'drir gzhug par bya'o// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams
290b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang mtshon cha dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lus med 'drir gzhug par bya'o// klu'i rgyal po'i nye logs su sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa 'dri

291b2(rgyud 'bum): bo che'i sgra sgrogs so/ / log 'dren rnams kyang rnam par 'bros te lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams gang du 'gro bar byed par rig pa 'dzin pa de rnams 'ong bar byed do// lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams

291b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kya me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs so// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas pad+ma mnan nas rig pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// pad+ma re re la pad+ma bye ba phrag bzhi pa ni 'byung bar

292a1(rgyud 'bum): sku las 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byung ste/ sgrub pa po la byugs nas pad+ma'i ze 'brur nub par 'gyur ro// de nas yang pad+ma la nye bar 'dug pa rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag brgyad
292a2(rgyud 'bum): cu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de'ang pad+ma'i bkod pa rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa 'byung ste/ dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir kun nas khyab pa'o// der de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
292a3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ lha rnams kyis kyang bstod par bya bzhin pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya bzhin pa/

292a5(rgyud 'bum): pas skye ba 'dzin par byed cing / rang gi 'dod pas 'chi bar byed do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po yod de/ des las

292a7(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug la dga' bas cho ga smras pa/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ gser ltar ser ba/ chos ston par mdzad
292b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin pa/ g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba/ dam par byas pa/ dmar ser mchod phyir thogs dkar po/ dar la'i stod g.yog dang smad g.yogs can/

292b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / dkar gsum za zhing ras ris kyi spyan sngar rig pa 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o// de lta bu sngon spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas las yang dag par brtsams te sngon
292b7(rgyud 'bum): du ldong ros blangs te gos kyi nang du 'o mas bkru bar bya'o/ / dkar po'i bco lnga la ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/ sgo bzhi rnams su bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o// tham
293a1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang me tog gis brgyan par bya/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis las thams cad bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ a shat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyis

293a3(rgyud 'bum): du ba 'thul ba dang 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / 'bar ba dang blangs nas sgra li zhing 'khyil ba/ lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can/ rig pa 'dzin pa bcu drug gi
293a4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskor bar 'gyur te/ lo stong phrag brgyad cu ru 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rdo rje'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// tshes grangs mi dgos// rgyu skar mi dgos//
293a5(rgyud 'bum): smyung bar gnas pa mi dgos te/ skyes bu rgya mtsho'i 'gram du mgo bo shar du bzhag nas shi ba'i ro blangs nas dri dang me tog la sogs pas brgyan par byas nas/ sgrub pa po kha shar du phyogs pas re

293b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / lo stong phrag drug cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad stong phrag bcu gcig tu 'phur bar 'gyur ro// thog phog pa'i shing las byung ba'i phyag na rdo rje byas la/ sman gyis
293b2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyi rnam pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma pri yang ku'i shing las byas pa snying po mnyam par 'gro ma byed du gzhug go/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nim pa'i shing las byung ba byed du gzhug go// thams cad
293b3(rgyud 'bum): kyang bad kan mthar byed kyi 'bras bu la so sor dgod par bya'o/ / sgrub pa po pus mo btsugs pa lag na pog por thogs pa byed du gzhug go/ de nas gos gtsang ma bgos te mi smra ba'i brtul
293b4(rgyud 'bum): zhugs kyis snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'bum phrag bcu gcig tu bzlas par bya'o/ / de lta bus sngon spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bco lnga pa la mtshan mo gsum spang bar gnas te maN+Dal dang

294a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i lus dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing / lo stong phrag brgyad cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir lding bar 'gyur ro/
