294a5(rgyud 'bum): ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas gcig pu thod pa la zhag chen po'i dud pa blangs nas snying po mnyam par 'gro ma'i rig pa bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pas slar yang ji srid du ba
294a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul ba dang 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du rig pa bzlas par bya'o/ / rgyal ba'i spyan gnyis pa lta bu dang / dbang phyug chen po'i mdung gi mtshon chas dbang phyug chen po rnams thams cad rig pa la
294a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur ro/ / de nas mig sman sgrub par 'dod na rgya mtsho'i 'gram du song nas// sngon du bsnyen pa ni chung nga rims khrus byas nas mi smra bar rig pa stong phrag drug brgyar bzlas par bya'o// de nas
294b1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te ba lang gi pags pa tsam gyi gzhi la nye bar byug pa byas nas/ der 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan rab tu so sor gnas pa byed du gzhug
294b2(rgyud 'bum): go/ / de nas mgo bo'i thod pa lnga blangs nas dri bzang po'i til mar gyis rab tu sbar bar bya ste du ba med par bya'o// de nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma byas nas mar gyi mar me phul te/ de nas mgo do/
294b3(rgyud 'bum): thod par so sor bzhag nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bsrung ba byas pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// mig sman de dro bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings
294b4(rgyud 'bum): thabs su rig pa lan bdun yongs su bzlas par bya'o/ / du ba 'thul ba dang 'bar bar byed do// 'bar ba na thod pa de blangs nas phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro'o// 'di zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa sngon
294b5(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i bye ba phrag dgu'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ / de nas rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can ma dang / bcom ldan
294b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ pri yang ku ltar sngo ba sangs rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa// snying po'i yang g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje'o// de nas bsgrub pa po
294b7(rgyud 'bum): ri'i rtse mor mngon par 'dzegs te mi smra bas grogs med par yang rung ste 'bum phrag bcu drug bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas bco lnga la gtsang ma gos gtsang bgos te/ ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po
295a1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas mar gyi mar me thar ye/ de nas sgrub pa pos bsrungs pa'i cho ga byas pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste// rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ku shas sor brgyad pa'i tshad kyi rtse
295a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'i rdo rje byed du gzhug go/ / rdo rje de lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas ji srid bcom ldan 'das ma la sa 'od zer byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// rdo rje tsa Ta tsa Ti'i sgra thos te 'jigs par
295a3(rgyud 'bum): mi bya bar slar yang yud tsam rig pa bzlas par bya'o/ / ji srid rnga bo che'i sgra thos pa na slar yang yud tsam du rig pa bzlas par bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pas ringa? tha bra su mar dang sbrang rtsis btags pa'i byang chub shing
295a4(rgyud 'bum): gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/ / sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs nas kyang ji srid rdo rje la 'od zer 'byung gi bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o// des dus gsum du khrus byas pas sgra li zhing 'khyil pa/
295a5(rgyud 'bum): lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa/ phyag na rdo rje gnyis pa lta bu sngo bsangs dang ba'i lus su gyur nas bskal par gnas so// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rdo rje'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas lcag
295a6(rgyud 'bum): kyu sgrub par 'dod na sngon bzhin du sgrub pa pos sngon spyad pa bya'o/ / 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing mi smra bas ba lang gi gnas su ku sha bting ba'i mal stan la gtsang zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus
295a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum du khrus byas la snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du song nas slong mo za zhing rked pa tsam gyi chur zhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o// dge 'dun
295b1(rgyud 'bum): la bza' ba dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs gser ltar ser ba spyan gsum/
295b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o// de'i nye logs su bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// thams cad
295b3(rgyud 'bum): kyang pad+ma'i gdan la rab tu gnas par bya'o/ / de nas sgrub pa pos mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas bcom ldan 'das mas ku sha'i khres la mngon par bsngags pa la nye bar 'dug par bya'o// de nas rig pa
295b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pas rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ku shas lcags kyu byas nas lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ ji srid lcags kyu las 'od zer byung ba de srid du dpag tu med pa bzlas par bya'o// 'od zer de sgrub pa po la bskor
295b5(rgyud 'bum): ba byas te nub par 'gyur te/ de bzung bas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// lcags kyu lag na thog pas rig pa 'dzin pa stong phrag gi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur//
295b6(rgyud 'bum): bskal par gnas pa dang / rlung ltar 'gro ba dang / lha'i lus dang / rang 'chi ba shes par byed do// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
295b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo le'u bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas yang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'
296a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der nye bar lhags so/ / nye bar lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la mgo bos phyag
296a2(rgyud 'bum): byas nas bskor ba byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ / de nas yang tshangs pa chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag rig pa
296a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mo'i cho ga 'chad do/ / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ tshangs pa chen po legs so legs so// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i ched du rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i cho ga gsungs
296a4(rgyud 'bum): shig/ de nas yang tshangs pa chen pos cho ga gsungs pa/ rigs kyi bu gang la la rig pa'i rgyal mo smra bar gyur pa 'am/ 'chang bar gyur pa de la bdag rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o// gang dang gang
296a5(rgyud 'bum): du skye ba de dang der bdag 'di la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rjes su sbyin par bgyi zhing / rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// rigs dma' bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro// bklags pas las rnams 'grub par
296a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / chom rkun gyi dbus su song bas yid la bya'o// sbrul gyi 'jigs pa dang // gnam lcags lhung ba la lan cig brjod par bya'o// khros pa'i mdun du dran par byas na dpal rab tu ster ro//
296a7(rgyud 'bum): gdon gso bar 'dod na lan bdun mngon par bsngags la srang gis bsdigs par byas na grol lo// phyag rgya dbye bar 'dod na gdong la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas blta bar bya ste/
296b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dbye ba byas par 'gyur ro// yungs kar la dkyil 'khor bcings pa'o// phur bus khang bzangs sbyong ba'o// phur bu nyid kyis mtshams bcing ba'o// gang du rdo rje gnas pa'i gnas der
296b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma lan brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o/ / rdo rje rnams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// rdo rje dbye bar bya bar 'dod na/ dug dang / ling ka dang / ka ra wI ra'i me
296b3(rgyud 'bum): tog dang / lug gi rA ste/ 'di rnams cha mnyam par byas la rig pa brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas rdo rje'i me la de rab tu byug par bya'o// rdo rje rnam par dbye ba byas par 'gyur ro// nor sgrub
296b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod na snga ma bzhin du sngon spyad pa byas la/ / ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas ma nyams pa'i ras sgra dang bral ba la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan chos ston par mdzad bzhin
296b5(rgyud 'bum): pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba la ral pa'i cod pan 'chang / 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa// rgyan thams
296b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o/ / g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin pa sngo ba sangs rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa phyag na rdo rje thogs pa'o// phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nye logs na
296b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can ma pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ma'i nye logs su rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o// tshangs pa'ang lag
297a1(rgyud 'bum): na ril ba spyi thugs thogs pa'o/ / 'og tu log 'dren sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can 'drir gzhug par bya'o// lha thams cad kyang pad+ma'i gdan la gnas par bya'o// sku
297a2(rgyud 'bum): pa po ni sngon bzhin no/ / de nas sgrub pa pos bco lnga la gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la sngar bzhin rgyu skar rgyal la bsgril ba'i mchod phyir thogs byas la// de nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas
297a3(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dbul la mar gyi mar me'ang sbar bar bya'o/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ku shar khris la nye bar 'dug ste mchod phyir thogs la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/
297a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas par dbul bar bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyang g.yas pa'i phyag brgyad kyis reg go// ji srid dro bar gyur pa 'am/ dub 'thul
297a5(rgyud 'bum): ba 'am/ 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o// 'bar ban yid kyis mchod yon dbul lo// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas tshangs pa yid la bya'o// dran pa tsam gyis dbyugs pa'i shing du
297a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / yungs kar la lan brgya bzlas pa bsnun par bya ste mchod phyir thogs su 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das ma dran pa nyid kyis rjes su blang bar bya ste/ blangs pa tsam gyis sbru li zhing 'khyil ba/ lo brgyad
297a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa/ dkar zhing dang ba'i lus/ rig pa 'dzin pa bcu gnyis kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro'o// gang gi tshe 'phos pa de'i tshe slar yang rig pa nyams su
297b1(rgyud 'bum): myong bar 'gyur ro/ / sgrub pa gzhan yang sngar bzhin du rig pa 'dzin pas dur khrod du bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bzlas par bya'o// de nas slong mo'i zas bzhing shi ba'i ras blangs nas rdzas
297b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ tsan dan dang / rgya spos dang / pu shel ci dang / bA la ka dang / rA dza ha ste/ rdzas 'di rnams gcig tu byas nas bkru bar bya'o// mi blo gros dang ldan pas bkrus pa de la nyi ma
297b3(rgyud 'bum): bdun du bdug spos dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pas bco lnga la dur khrod du song nas ba lang gi pags pa tsam gyi thang la nye bar byugs nas dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ 'byung po thams
297b4(rgyud 'bum): cad pa'i gtor ma byas nas/ de nas sgrub pa pos thod pa la nye bar 'dug ste ras des kun nas g.yogs pas bsrung ba byas pas ji srid dro ba'am/ du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du rig pa bzlas
297b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / dro bar gyur pas ni dbang du byed do// ngu ba 'thul bas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'bar bas ni skra li zhing 'khyil ba lus dkar po rig pa 'dzin pa drug bcu'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro//
297b6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar yang ras de kun tu g.yogs pa tsam gyis kyang bdag nyid du byed do// de tshe rig pa 'dzin pa rnams la'ang cha shas sbyin par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas
297b7(rgyud 'bum): bgrang 'phreng sgrub par 'dod na sngon bzhin du rgya mtshor 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas ku sha las byung ba'i 'grang 'phreng byas la mdzud pa nyi shu rtsa lnga rtsa'o// de nas du mthong du song nas kyi
298a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gru bzhi pa nye bar byugs te/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ro dang spyi bung bzhag nas bar du gzhag par bya'o// dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas gtor ma rgya chen
298a2(rgyud 'bum): po dbul lo/ / de nas sgrub pa pos ro'i brang khar nye bar 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bzlas pa bya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bgegs char lta bu la 'jigs par mi bya'o//
298a3(rgyud 'bum): ji srid tsam gsung du 'gyur te/ yid kyis mchod yon phul nas slar yang ji srid bgrang 'phreng du gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o// slar yang sgrub pa po 'chang bzhin pas bcom ldan 'das ma lan pa dun bzlas
298a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / de nas kun nas 'od zer 'byung ste rig pa dran pas gzung bar bya'o// bzung ba tsam gyis sgra li zhing 'khyil ba/ lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa 'dod pa'i gzugs can/ nyi ma 'char ka
298a5(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam pa'i 'od rig pa 'dzin pa stong phrag gis yongs su bskor ba/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro zhing tshangs par yang 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe dri ma med
298a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo la longs spyod par 'dod na slong mo bza' zhing ri'i rtse mor rig pa snying po mnyam par 'gro ma pa bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o// de nas
298a7(rgyud 'bum): ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan chos 'chang bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / de'i spyan sngar yid kyis sngags thams cad sten par byed na/ lha ma yin gyi
298b1(rgyud 'bum): rdzas rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo tshangs pas gsungs pa le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas glang po'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pas/ byang
298b2(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der nye bar lhags so/ / nye bar lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bskor ba byas nas// zhabs
298b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rig pa'i rgyal po 'di'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems
298b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ / glang po'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa la 'di skad ces smras so// glang po'i rgyal po gang khyod sems can gyi don du cho ga 'chad pa
298b5(rgyud 'bum): legs so legs so/ / des na gang khyod smros shig/ glang po'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pas smras pa/ tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/ smyung bar gnas pa med par bsgrub par bya ste/ bud med kyi ro
298b6(rgyud 'bum): blangs nas dur khrod du ba lang gi pags pa tsam gyi thang la nye bar byug pa byas nas/ shar du mgo bo bzhag nas dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyi mchod pas mchod de/ de'i b+ha gar mig sman bcug
298b7(rgyud 'bum): nas ji srid du 'gro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / des rgyal ba'i spyan dang mtshungs par 'gyur te lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nag po'i bcu bzhi la skyes bu shi ba de'i yan
299a1(rgyud 'bum): lag las skyes pa blangs nas skam por byas te bskabs bkru bar bya'o/ / dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas/ phyi ma'i nag po'i bcu bzhi la
299a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su song na/ / 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byas te dbang phyug chen po g.yas kyi lus la bzhag nas// kham po kha sbyar du gnas pa'i de'i yan lag las skyes pa
299a3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas dngos grub kyi mtshan ma kham por kha sbyar g.yo bar byed de// rig pa dran pas blangs par bya'o// blangs pa tsam la mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dpas
299a4(rgyud 'bum): tshad stong du 'gro'o/ / lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed de// nag po'i brgyad pa'am/ nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la dur khrod du song nas ma skyes par shi ba'i byis pa'i dbang po lnga blangs nas ril bur byas te lcag
299a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis yongs su dkris nas/ de nas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te thod pa'i nang du bzhag nas rig pa'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// ril bu khar bcug pa mi snang bar
299a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lo stong phrag drug 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgyar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ ma nyams pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das ma snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'drar
299a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhug par bya'o/ / glang po'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// bgegs kyi gzugs kha 'og tu bltas pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// 'og na sgrub pa
299b1(rgyud 'bum): po lag na spos phor thogs pa'o/ / de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas legs par nges pas skyes pa'i ro blangs nas dur khrod du dri dang me tog la sogs
299b2(rgyud 'bum): pas bcom ldan 'das ma mchod nas/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byas te grogs bzang pos bsrung ba byas pa/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te ro'i dpral bar rkang pa byin nas gnas pas rig pa bzlas
299b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / ji srid na ldang bar byed de/ 'jigs par mi bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas nas brdeg par bya ste gnon par 'gyur ro// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rig pa bzlas te lag
299b4(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yas pas reg par bya'o/ / reg pa tsam gyis kha ru dgra sta mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig pa bzlas la blang bar bya'o// blangs pa tsam gyis skal zhing 'khyil pa/ lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can lag pa
299b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa/ / glang po'i rig pa 'dzin pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa drug gis bskor ba/ rlung ltar 'gro ba/ bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
299b6(rgyud 'bum): ma rig pa'i rgyal mo phur bu gsum pas bshad pa le'u drug pa'o/ / // de nas dbang ldan 'byung po'i bdag po 'di'i rig pas dga' nas cho ga gsungs pa// ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la
299b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// g.yon du 'phags pa
300a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje zar ma'i me tog dang 'dra ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nye logs su bcom ldan 'das ma pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs rgyan
300a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / lha'i bu rnams kyang me tog rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa 'drir gzhug par
300a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pa zla ba gcig tu 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing ras ris kyi spyan sngar rig pa bzlas par bya'o// de nas mgo bo lnga'i thod pa blangs te gsum gyis skyed bu gsum byas te thod pa
300a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig zhag gis bkang nas/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byas/ thod pa lnga pa la nye bar 'dug nas yungs kar re re la lan bdun bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas
300a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/ / sbyin sreg de rdzogs pa na lbu ba 'byung ste lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o// de nas ngu ba'i sgra thos te 'jigs par mi bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas
300a6(rgyud 'bum): rings thabs su yungs kar dkar po la lan 'dun sbas par bsngags pas gzhu bar bya ste skyes bur 'gyur ro/ / rig pa dran pas sdod cig sdor cig ces brjod par bya'o// swa ti ka ru 'gyur ro// de nas rig pa 'dzin
300a7(rgyud 'bum): pas ldong ros la lan bdun bldag pas de la thig le byas pas glang po'i dbang por 'gyur ro/ / de la zhon te zhon pa tsam la sba li zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can/ dkar zhing
300b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ba'i lus/ glang po che la zhon pa/ lo stong phrag brgyad cu ru 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad stong phrag bco brgyad du 'phur bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe dga' ldan lha'i gnas su skye bar
300b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/ smyung bar gnas pa med de bsgrub par bya'o// skyes bu shi ba'i ro blangs te chu klung gi 'gram du dri'i chus khrus byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos gsar pa dang /
300b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyis brgyan par byas nas mgo bo shar du gzhag par bya'o// sgrub pa pos grogs bzang po bsrung ba byas la ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ yungs kar dkar po la lan bdun mngon par bsngags
300b4(rgyud 'bum): nas khar gzhug par bya zhing rig pa bzlas so/ / ji srid du mi ro'i kha gdangs par 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa po 'jigs pa med par gyur pas rkang pa g.yon pas brang khar mnan nas sgra drag po 'byung bar mi byed
300b5(rgyud 'bum): pa de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o/ / ji srid du ngu ba 'thul bar byed de/ 'jigs pa med pas dpral bar lan bdun bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis gzhu bar bya'o// kha nas sbrul mthong bar 'gyur te
300b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs par mi bya bar rig pa dran pas reg par bya'o/ / reg pa tsam gyis ral grir 'gyur ro// snying po dran pas gzung bar bya'o// bzung ba tsam gyis sgra li zhing 'khyil ba/ lo brgyad gnyis lon
300b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnam pa/ / glang po'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi bdag por thogs pa med par 'gyur te/ lo stong phrag drug cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// mdung thung gi sgrub par 'gyur te/ sngar bzhin du 'o ma dang nas
301a1(rgyud 'bum): ran shAng ri bo'i rtse mor 'dzegs te 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pAs dur khrod kyi thal ba dang grog mkhar gyi sa la 'o mas smras te/ sngar
301a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pas dur khrod kyi thal ba dang grog mkhar gyi sa la 'o mas spras
301a3(rgyud 'bum): te rma bya'i gzugs bya/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi sa ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de nas dur khrod du song nas ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te/
301a4(rgyud 'bum): dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pas mngon par mchod nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byas nas// de nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te thod pa la nye bar 'dug te/ thod pa gnyis
301a5(rgyud 'bum): par rma bya bzhag nas ji srid rma bya g.yo bar byed pa de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas rig pa 'dren pas sa la ma lhung ba'i me tog lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa rnams kyis mchod yon dbul lo//
301a6(rgyud 'bum): slar yang rig pa bzlas par bya'o// phyogs nas lhan cig 'ong bar byed de 'jigs par mi bya bar snying po dran pas rma bya la reg par bya ste/ bud med du 'gyur ro// des bu ci gyi zhes smras par 'gyur ro// de la bdag
301a7(rgyud 'bum): gi lus su gnas par mdzod cig ces brjod par bya'o/ / de nas de rig pa 'dzin pa'i lag mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// skad cig de nyid la sgra li zhing 'khyil ba// lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa/ lag
301b1(rgyud 'bum): na mdung thung can/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyis gang mthong nas lta bar byed pa ni ma gtogs so// de rnams kyis lhan cig 'phur bar byed de sum cu
301b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gsum du rnam par rgyu bar 'gyur ro/ / bskal par gnas shing gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe 'og min pa'i lha'i bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// seng ge sgrub par 'dod na sngar bzhin du rig pa 'dzin pas
301b3(rgyud 'bum): 'o ma'i zas dang mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs kyis rig pa'i spyod pa'i rig pa 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o/ de nas thog phog pa'i shing 'o mar zhag bdun gzhag par bya'o// sa dkar po dang tsam dan gyi chur mnye bar
301b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ste thog phog pa'i shing gis so/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rgyu skar rgyal la seng ge gnyis so// phyi nas sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa rgya chen po bya zhing rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
301b5(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma bya'o/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ lag pa g.yas pas seng ge mnan nas rig pa'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bzlas par bya'o//
301b6(rgyud 'bum): ji srid seng ge g.yo ba'i bar du'o// g.yos pa tsam la'ang sa 'gul te yang dag par bzlas la 'jigs par mi bya bar slar yang lha'i rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs kyi bar du rig pa bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas
301b7(rgyud 'bum): lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i me tog rnams kyis seng ge la bsnun par bya'o/ / kun tu bsnun pas seng ge seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed de/ sgrub pa po sbubs can gzhan gyis nges par bsam par 'gyur ro
302a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas rig pa slar yang bzlas par bya zhing seng ge la zhon nas 'gro bar bya'o/ / zhon pa tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog mngon par 'thor bar byed do// seng ge la zhon
302a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du rlung ltar 'gro'o/ / gang gi tshe seng ge sgra sgrogs par byed pa de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams stan las lhung ngo // lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa bye bas
302a3(rgyud 'bum): / yongs su bskor zhing bskal par gnas so// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// pri yang ku'i shing las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can ma
302a4(rgyud 'bum): ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas rgyu skar rgyal la ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir bcug nas/ de'i spyan sngar rig pa 'dzin pas mi smra bas rig pa 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o// de nas dur khrod
302a5(rgyud 'bum): nas skyes pa'i ro blangs nas dri bzang po'i dri rnams kyis khrus byas nas legs par bsdams pa shar du mngon par phyogs par gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas sgrub pa pos me tog la sogs pas mngon par
302a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod nas gtor ma rgya chen po byin te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas rin po ches bkang la/ bcom ldan 'das mas lan bdun bsngags pa byas la ro langs kyi khar sreg blugs lan nyi shu rtsa brgyad sbyin
302a7(rgyud 'bum): sreg bya'o/ / ro'i kha gdangs par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa pos rings thabs su rkang pa'i mthe bong la seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa bcom ldan 'das mas lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas gzugs par
302b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / slar yang sgrub pa pos ji srid khru gang gi tshad kyi lcer song gi bar du rig pa bzlas par bya'o// 'brug gi sgra grag kyang skrag par mi bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings thabs su bzlas pa bya zhing kar
302b2(rgyud 'bum): wI ra dkar po'i me tog gis ro langs kyi dpral ba'i phyogs su gzhu bar bya ste gnon par 'gyur ro/ / de'i lce'i rtse mo rin po che kun tu mthong ste 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba dang ldan pa mdzes bzhin pa rig pa
302b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas la blang bar bya'o/ / blangs pa tsam gyis sgra li zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ gang zhig bsam pa de thams cad du skyes pa ni
302b4(rgyud 'bum): ma gtogs so/ / zag pa zad pa nyid dang bskal par gnas shing rin po ches kyang mgo la brgyan par dpag tshad brgya stong phrag brgyad cur kun tu snang bar byed do// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang kun
302b5(rgyud 'bum): tu dbang bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe 'di 'pho ba'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ma yang dag par byon nas skul bar byed do// bu rin po che'i mthu de rnams zad nas slar yang bsgrub par bya'o zhes brjod
302b6(rgyud 'bum): nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / phyis rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di dran par 'gyur ro// ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su 'gro ba dang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi tshe yang 'di sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sbyin
302b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / dbang ldan gyis rab tu bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i rig pa'i rgyal mo'i le'u rdzogs so// / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis bcom ldan 'das ma'i cho ga gsungs//
303a1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di dran pa tsam gyis bgegs thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams 'din mar mi shes pa dang / par mi shes pa'ang yod de/ chos dang
303a2(rgyud 'bum): mi ldan pa sdig pa'i sems/ / shes rab chung ba/ srog chags gsod pa drag po/ kha dog ngan pa/ stobs chung ba/ kyog po/ sgrub po// rje ngar sgom pa/ gzhan yang bya rog gi rje ngar 'dra ba/ bongs
303a3(rgyud 'bum): thung dang / ri dgas dang // rnga mo dang / g.yag nag po lta bu/ skra ser skya/ sen mo ngan pa// bya rog gi skad dang / de bzhin du gzhan yang bum lho can dang / dri ma can dang / gang yang gzhan nad kyis
303a4(rgyud 'bum): gzir ba rnams te/ 'di rnams kyis ji skad bshad pa'i rig pa mi 'grub bo// bdag cag gis bden pa'i tshig gis ji ltar sngar gyi las zad par byas nas/ de nas rig pa bsgrub par
303a5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rgan po'am/ zhar ba 'am/ long ba 'am/ sgur po 'am/ kyog po 'am/ de lta bu rnams kyis so// slar yang tsan dan dkar po la byas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma bde bar
303a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i khru gang gi tshad du byed du gzhug ste/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de nas des rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bzhugs su
303a7(rgyud 'bum): gsol nas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / slong mo za zhing gu gul gyi bdug pa bsregs la 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o// bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa na gu gul dang kun dza
303b1(rgyud 'bum): ka'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bcom ldan 'das mas bya'o/ / de nas las zad par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ log 'dren la lta bzhin 'di skad smras so// kye log par 'dren pa khyod mnyan par
303b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis shig/ gang rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di 'chang bar byed pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa de la khyed cag rnams kyis nye ba 'gro bar mi bya'o// log 'dren gyis 'di skad ces smras so// rig pa 'dzin pa gang slar
303b3(rgyud 'bum): yang cho ga las 'das nas mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sgrub par mi 'gyur ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa de la bgegs kyi don du nye bar 'gro bar bya ste/ lo brgyar bsags pa 'di'i bsod nams kyang rnam par gzhom
303b4(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / lha'i rgyal pos smras pa/ kye kye gdug pa'i log 'dren khyed cag rnam par gzhom pa'i don du sman 'di rnams bshad par bya'o// zla bcas lto bar byams pa dang / stag 'joms pa dang
303b5(rgyud 'bum): lag bzhir bcas/ / phag gi rna ba glang po 'bod// spyod ral ru rta gur kum nyid// lcags kyi phye ma dang bcas pa// glang po che yi gcin gyis btab// btags nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// mkhas/
303b6(rgyud 'bum): pas ril bur bya ba'o// me tog sgron ma gtor mchi/ bshang ba gci bar song ba yis// khrus bya ma la stan gos bcing byas// dri dang me tog sogs thams cad// rab sbyar bya'o rnam gzhan du// log
303b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dren glags ni tshol bar 'gyur/ / gsungs pa'i de ma thag tu yang // log 'dren thams cad rnam 'khrugs par// gyur pa'i yid kyis phan tshun du// lha bzhin phyogs bzhir 'bros par byed// slar
304a1(rgyud 'bum): yang bgegs byed mi 'gyur ro/ / gang du sman mchog 'di gnas pa// der ni nye bar 'gro mi 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi nang du yang // 'di la bgegs ni byed mi 'gyur//
304a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di yi rtog pa thams cad kyi// dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin// rig pa 'dzin pa gang zhig slar// dus gsum mnyam par dmigs pa yis// sgrub po de la 'ga' zhig gis// glags skabs
304a3(rgyud 'bum): rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ / ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya ste// gser ltar ser ba chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa'o// g.yas su 'phags pa
304a4(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ sngo bsangs lus mchod phyir thogs kyis brgyan pa/ phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// phyag na rdo rje zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa/ phyag na
304a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bsnams pa/ kun nas 'od 'phro ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o// phyag na rdo rje'i nye logs su rgyal po chen po bzhi mtshon cha dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nye
304a6(rgyud 'bum): logs su bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can ma pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa'o// de nas sgrub pa pos ras ris kyi spyan sngar slong
304a7(rgyud 'bum): mo za zhing gtsang ma'i phyogs su 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas ras ris blangs nas ri'i rtse mo la 'dzegs te sa nag po la ma he byas la ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po dang 'byung po thams
304b1(rgyud 'bum): cad la gtor ma bya'o/ / de nas sgrub pos bsrung ba byas te gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos te/ ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas rig pa snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bzlas par bya'o// ji srid ma he'i rwa
304b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa la 'od zer 'phro ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas yid kyis mchod yon dbul lo// de nas ma he la zhon te zhon pa tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa bcu bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'i
304b3(rgyud 'bum): lha'i lus su 'gyur ro/ / dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu ru 'phur bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams kyang dbang du 'du bar 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag lnga brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
304b4(rgyud 'bum): lus sbyang ba byas nas ras ris la bskor ba'i lha'i mchod pa rgya chen po dang / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bya ste/ de nas sgrub pa pos ku sha las byung ba'i zhags pa byas nas lag pa g.yas
304b5(rgyud 'bum): pas mnan te/ ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// rig pa dran pas reg ste/ blangs pa de sgra li zhing 'khyil pa/ lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa// lag na zhags pa thogs pa/
304b6(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa bcu drug gis yongs su bskor ba/ dpag tshad stong phrag lngar 'phur bar 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag bcu bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
304b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te slong mo za zhing snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bye ba bzlas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa lngas yongs su bskor ba thogs pa med par 'gro
305a1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis mi mjed 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar byed cing song nas bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
305a2(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rgyal chen bzhi sa gsungs pa'i le'u brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad kyis bcom
305a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ma'i cho ga gsungs so/ / dug gso ba ni yal 'dab las 'bab pa'i chus tshon bya zhing se gol dang gar byed bzhin pas yid kyis bzlas pa byas pa'i me tog dkar po la lan bdun bzlas pas
305a4(rgyud 'bum): gdung ba gso bar byed do/ / srad bus gdon skrag par byed do// gu gul gyi bdug pas mche ba 'debs par byed do// sna ma'i me tog gis skrod par byed do// yungs kar khrag dang bcas pa la bzlas pas
305a5(rgyud 'bum): sdang ba rnams phyir zlog par byed do/ / ba lang gi shas skems par byed do// a riSh+Ta'i 'dab ma dang / khrag 'dzag pa dang / ske tshe rnams kyis dbang du byed do// arka'i me tog gis nor sbyin no// me tog
305a6(rgyud 'bum): brgya pas sha za rnams skrag pa'i yid kyis 'bros par byed/ 'khri shing gis rigs sam khyim skrod par byed do// klu rnams ni klu shing gi me tog gis so// phub mas rig pa gcod par byed de/ 'dis pha rol gyi
305a7(rgyud 'bum): rig pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ / gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos lan gsum du brje zhing // 'o ma dang nas zan za bas 'bum phrag bcur bzlas pa bya ste lus sbyong bar 'gyur ro//
305b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas sgrub pa pos rgyu skar rgyal la sa ser po dang / ba'i gcin dang / ljang khus nam mkha' lding 'drir gzhug pa ste/ 'di'i mgrin pa la pad+ma'i phreng pa sbyin par bya'o// de la sgrub pa pos rin po che gsum gyis
305b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byas nas/ de nas sgrub pa pos pa las byung bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te/ sgo bzhi rnams su bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o// bum pa gang ba bzhi po rnams la klu'i rgyal po bzhi 'drir gzhug
305b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / de nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar gsar blangs nas zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste/ lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas ji srid du du ba 'thul ba dang 'bar bar byed pa de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o// du ba
305b4(rgyud 'bum): 'thul ba na 'thungs pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / lo stong phrag bcu bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad stong du 'gro'o// 'bar na lha'i lus dang yid du 'gyur ro// thams cad dbugs la 'byin par byed do//
305b5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa bcus yongs su bskor ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du song nas slong mo zazhing kru shing gi me tog la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis
305b6(rgyud 'bum): btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na klu rnams lang ngo / / de nas sgrub pa pos 'jigs pa med pas dbus su me tog gis brgyan pa'i bum pa gnag par bya// de'i steng du 'khor ba gzhag par bya// de nas
305b7(rgyud 'bum): srusgru pa pos srung ba byas te klu'i stan la nye bar 'dug pas ji srid nam mkha' lding las 'od zer 'phro ba de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o/ / sgrub pa po la bskor ba byas nas de nyid kyi spyi bor nub par 'gyur
306a1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / rig pa bzlas pa blang bar bya'o// de la zhon pas rig pa 'dzin pa stong phrag drug cu nye bar 'gro ste/ yid kyis rlung ltar 'gro'o// nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang mtshungs pa
306a2(rgyud 'bum): klu'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang dpag tshad stong du 'bros par byed do/ / dri mnams pas lo stong phrag brgyad cur 'tsho bar byed do// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar
306a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sngon sprad pa byas nas de nas rig pa 'dzin pa dur khrod du song nas ba byung gis ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad tsam du sa gzhi byug par byas nas/ dri dang me togs la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod//
306a4(rgyud 'bum): pa byas te/ gtor ma rgya chen po bya'o// gzhan pa'i nag po'i tshes brgyad pa la dur khrod du song nas ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad tsam gyi sa gzhi nye bar byugs te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas sgrub pa
306a5(rgyud 'bum): pos rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo nam mkha'
306a6(rgyud 'bum): lding gis bshad pa'i le'u dgu pa'o/ / // de nas ma mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul dum dang /
306a7(rgyud 'bum): srul po dang / lus srul po rnams stan las langs nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der nye bar lhags so// nye bar lhags nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis
306b1(rgyud 'bum): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rig pa'i cho ga smras so/ / tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med pas sbyang bar gnas pa med pas bya ste/ rig pa gang kho na tshad ma'o// dur khrod du dbang phyug chen po'i
306b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas kyi lus la rig pa brgyad brgyar bzlas te khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / lo stong du 'chi bar 'gyur ro// sa'i cha drug 'phrog par 'gyur ro// 'od ma lhags pa blangs nas lcags gsum
306b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis de la dkri bar bya'o/ / de nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dur khrod du song nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa dang / 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma yang byas
306b4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ de nas sgrub pa pos thod pa lag pa g.yon pas blangs te/ lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas ji srid ca co'i sgra sgrogs pa de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o// rig pa dran pa blang bar bya ste blangs pa
306b5(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / sa'i cha drug 'phrog cing lo stong du 'tsho'o// lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do// nag po'i brgyad pa la bud med shi ba de'i lce blangs nas lcag
306b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis dkris te yid rlung lhar 'gro'o/ / 'di'i tshangs par spyad pas 'dod pa rnams la sems bskyed na de gcig pu 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing bskal pa chen por gnas so// yid kyis skye ba
306b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin par byed do/ / gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dur khrod du zla ba drug rig pa bzlas nas mi snang 'gyur ro// lo lnga brgyar 'tsho'o// 'ug pa'i mig mig sman dang lhan cig btag par bya// lcags
307a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis dkris pa'i ril bu byas nas/ dbang phyug chen po'i g.yas kyi lus la lam phor kha sbyar du bzhag par byas nas/ lag pa g.yas pas mnan te rig pa dam pa dpag
307a2(rgyud 'bum): med pa bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid du rnam par chad do'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// rig pa dran pas ril bu blangs te khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag gnyis su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
307a3(rgyud 'bum): mig sman dang / ldong ros dang / 'o ma dang / pad+ma ge sar mnyam par 'gro ba'i rdzas mnyam par byas te/ lcags gsum gyis dkri bar bya'o// rgyal la sbyor ba rnam par shes par bya zhing // de nas bsgrub
307a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / sha za sgrub par 'dod pas dur khrod du ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byug pa byas nas/ sha dang chang la sogs pa'i gtor ma byas te/ kha shar du phyogs
307a5(rgyud 'bum): pas mi'i skra la khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na sha za thams cad 'ong ste/ 'jigs par mi bya zhing bsrung bar yang mi bya bar 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// bdag gi dbang du gyur
307a6(rgyud 'bum): cig ces brjod pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod pa dang mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma re re la 'dis dong tshe lnga lnga ster bar byed do// de rnams kyang zad par bya'o// dur khrod
307a7(rgyud 'bum): du yi dgas dri med nyid kyi ming nas smos pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ / dur khrod du gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang pa la sogs pa la phur bus gdab par bya'o// de nas rig pa bzlas par bya'o// de la'ang ba lang gi pas
307b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar blugs nas/ / mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas rig pa 'bum bzlas par bya'o// dur khrod du til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste nyi ma bdun du mtshan mo sbyin sreg bya'o// nyi ma re re la
307b2(rgyud 'bum): dngul lnga lnga sbyin par byed do/ / ku mu ta la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nges par mthong ngo // dur khrod kyi thal ba la gzugs brnyan byas te/ de la nye bar 'dug nas arka'i
307b3(rgyud 'bum): shing la me sbar nas dri zhim po'i ti lamar gyis btags pa'i sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / cho ga 'di kho nas ming nas smos na lAn dza'i rgyal po dang blon po dbang du 'gyur ro//
307b4(rgyud 'bum): bud med dbang du byed na a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog gi sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur te/ nyi ma bdun nas yid kyis gang gi tshe bsams pa de'i tshe 'ong ngo // dur khrod du song nas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te/ sha chen
307b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis sbyin sreg byas nas nyi ma bdun pa la sha zas zin pa rnams bltas pas thar par 'gyur ro/ / dur khrod du sha chen gyis sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu byas na sha za thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ro// ne'u le'i spu'i sbyin
307b6(rgyud 'bum): sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na 'byung po thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ro/ / dur khrod du bshang ba'i sbyin sreg byas na srul pos zin pa rnams yid kyis kyang thar ro// khrag gi sbyin sreg byas na mkha' 'gro ma rnams dbang du
307b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / dur khrod du boT+Ta ka'i sbyin sreg byas na 'di la sha za mi 'ong ngo // sbrul gyi shun pa'i sbyin sreg byas na sgrub rnam par 'bros par byed do// de nas sgrub pa pos gtor ma byas nas arka'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg
308a1(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ / rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzug can gyi gnod sbyin ma 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jigri bar mi bya bar rig parlan pa rjod cig rjod cig ces so// de de'i tshe mchog gsum po rnams kyi gcig 'dam du snga
308a2(rgyud 'bum): tem dang / sring mo dang / chung mar 'gyur ba'o// ma ni bu'i bya ba thams cad byed do// sring mo ni nyi ma re re la dong che re ster bar byed do// chung ma ni de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed de/ lo lnga brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gang gi
308a3(rgyud 'bum): tshe rig pa 'dzin pa nyams pa de'i tshe 'di bya'o/ / mtshan mo gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te bsrung ba byas pas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje
308a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod pa byas nas/ shar du phyogs pas rig pa'i lha thams cad la bdug spos phul nas/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas dug la khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
308a5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / ku sha bting ba la nyal lo// gal te gzhon nu mdung thung thogs pa mthong na de'i tshe dri zas rdzas nyams par byas pa'o// gang gi tshe bram ze mthong na de'i tshe lha rnams kyis nyams par byas par 'gyur ro//
308a6(rgyud 'bum): gang gi tshe rdo rje sde mthong na de'i tshe rdo rje'i rig kyis rdzas nyams par byas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe dga' ba can mthong na de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gis nyams par byas pa'o// gang gi tshe lha min rnams kyis
308a7(rgyud 'bum): nyams par byas pa de'i tshe rgyu mi mthong ngo / / gang gi tshe klu rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po mthong ngo // gang gi tshe pha rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe mthong ngo // gang gi tshe mi
308b1(rgyud 'bum): gtsang bas nyams par byas pa de'i tshe glang po'i pags pa gyon pa'i dbang phyug chen po mthong ngo / / gang gi tshe gnod sbyin rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe nor bu bzang po mthong ngo // gang gi tshe sha za rnams kyis nyam
308b2(rgyud 'bum): par byas pa de'i tshe skyes bu gcer bu mthong ngo / / gang gi tshe 'byung po rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe sprin mthong ngo // arka'i yam shing gis me sbar nas mar dang sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong
308b3(rgyud 'bum): phrag brgyad bya'o/ / sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro// dri za rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te/ bcom ldan
308b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das la gtor ma'ang phul nas/ ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste kAm+bo dza'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa
308b5(rgyud 'bum): na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje'i rigs la'ang sbyin sreg ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod cing / bcom ldan 'das
308b6(rgyud 'bum): la'ang gtor ma'i cho ga byas la/ de nas sgrub pa pos kha shar du phyogs la gu gul gyi ril bus sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' lding rnams la dur khrod du
308b7(rgyud 'bum): maN+Dal la nye bar byugs pa byas nas mchod pa dang gtor ma'ang ji ltar 'byor pa bya ste/ ka ra wA ra'i me tog la sogs pa'i mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu
309a1(rgyud 'bum): byin par 'gyur ro/ / lha ma yin rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni dbang phyug chen po la dri sna tshogs kyis mchod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la'ang gtor ma byas nas g.yas kyi lus la shar
309a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs pas ka ra wI ra'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ / klu rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni klu'i gnas su song nas kha shar du phyogs pas klu'i pags pa tsha ba'i ti la
309a3(rgyud 'bum): mar gyis mngon par byugs nas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ / ma me'i sbyin sreg ni smin pa'i zas dang sha'i gtor ma phul nas phag pa'i rul ma la chang gis
309a4(rgyud 'bum): btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ / gnod sbyin rnams kyi sbyin sreg byas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma phul nas kha shar du
309a5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs nas arka'i me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ / sha za rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni dur khrod du dkyil 'khor nye bar byug pa byas nas kyis kyi til mar gyis bdagra
309a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nim pa'i me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ / 'byung po rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni dur khrod kyi thal bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas gtor ma'ang ci
309a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa phul te/ ba lang gi sha'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro// yi dgas rnams la nir ma le'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par
309b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ma mo dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u bcu pa rdzogs so//
309b2(rgyud 'bum): ma bsgrubs par yang las su 'gyur te// char ma babs pa la chur zhugs te rig pa bzlas na nyi ma bdun gyis char 'bab bo// khu ba 'ching ba la srad bus so// myos pa
309b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'joms pa rnams la dur khrod kyi thal bas so/ / gsung pa la ni rgya skyegs kyis so// gzer gyis nyam thag pa la ardza nas zug rngu dang bral bar byed do// til gyi til mar gyis bya rgod dang
309b4(rgyud 'bum): gcod par byed/ chu gri dang gsum gyis mche ba 'jug par byed do// gu gul gyi bdug pas gnas nas skrod par byed de/ 'di rnams ma bsgrubs par yang byed de/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis
309b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nyid bsgrub par bya'o/ / dper na 'di bdag dpe'i don du 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed pa de bzhin du 'di yang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/
309b6(rgyud 'bum): bklag par bya ste/ cho ga 'di nyi ma bdun du bklags pa byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro// char ches na grog mkhar la 'dzegs te bcom ldan 'das ma stong phrag brgyad nye bar bzlas na de nas nye bar zhi ba
309b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa gang la sbyin par bya ste/ rig pa thams cad 'gugs pa dang / 'ching ba dang / rengs pa dang / gcod pa dang / rig pa thams cad gsod pa dang / gdug
310a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yid skrag pa dang / kha 'ching bar byed do// des 'di'i las bya ste gur kum gyi chus rmongs par byed do// sor mos sbrul 'gugs par byed do// yungs kar dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba
310a2(rgyud 'bum): las skyes pa dang / me tog bzang po rnams kyis 'byin par byed do// bdug spos kyis smra bar byed do// ka ra wI ra'i me tog gis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byed do// a ka ru'i bdug pas 'phral du 'dug pa
310a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / bcom ldan 'das ma'i las stong rtsa brgyad po 'di rnams rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ yam shing gi mtshan nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba rtsa ba dang / rked pa dang / rtse mo'ang bskrad pa'i don gyis sdong bu dang rtsa bas sbyin
310a4(rgyud 'bum): sreg bya'o/ / rked pas ni nor 'dod pas so// rtse mos ni zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can la'o/ nor 'dod pas tho rangs kyi dus su gnod sbyin yongs su rgyu bar byed do// des na de'i nor sbyin pa'i las kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro//
310a5(rgyud 'bum): bskrad par 'dod pas bar du gnas pas mtshan mo'i snga ma la rtsa ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o// sdigs mdzub kyi tshad tsam la dug dang khrag gis btags pas dur khrod kyi me la sbyin sreg bya'o// mtshan mo phyed
310a6(rgyud 'bum): nas yi dgas rab tu rgyu ste/ des de las mngon spyod kyi las rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// sgrub pa chen po la khru'i tshad kyi yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pas kha shar du phyogs pas
310a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bya'o/ / des sgrub pa chen po sgrub par byed do// dbang du byed pa la byang chub kyi shing gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg bya'o// sdigs mdzub kyi tshad tsam 'dis so// nyin zhag bdun du nyi ma 'char
310b1(rgyud 'bum): kar a pA marga'i yam shing khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / rnam pa gzhan du ma yin no// nad bskyed par 'dod na pA na ya'i ril ma sbyin sreg nyi ma bdun du byas na nad skyed par
310b2(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / ming nas smos nas sgrub par 'gyur te rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i le'u bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag
310b3(rgyud 'bum): bzangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i cho ga gsungs so/ / sgrub pa pos phug gi sgo ru dur khrod du gos gtsang ma bgos pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ phug gi sgo la mngon par phyogs nas bcom
310b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste/ / thams cad gnas nas 'byor par 'gyur ro// dogs pa med par rab tu 'jug par bya ste/ lha ma yin sel ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa dran
310b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin pas rab tu blang bar bya'o/ / bud med la dga' ba dang bcas pas yongs su bzlas nas gtogs par bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa pos gsum pos 'di byed par 'dod pas ri'i rtse mor
310b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzegs te rig pa snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor la tsan dan dmar pos nye bar byugs te bsrung ba
310b7(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ phug gi sgo la mngon par phyogs pas rig pa'i snying po mnyam par 'gro mas a pA marga'i yam shing la dug dang khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg
311a1(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag dacu bya'o/ / de nas sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa nas thal ba la yongs su bzlas nas gtor bar bya'o// gsum po 'dir 'gyur te dogs pa med par rab tu
311a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jug par bya zhing / / lha ma yin gyi bu mo des mthong nas dbang du 'gyur ro// des sgrub pa'i rdzas de blang bar bya ste/ gang 'dod pa de rig pas mngon par bsngags nas blang bar bya'o// 'khor lo
311a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad dang rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma gnas kyi bar du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ldong ros dang / be da dang / dgra
311a4(rgyud 'bum): sta dang / paHka dang / shak+ti ste mdung thung dang / ral gri dang / ral gri'i yu ba dang / mchil lham dang / gri dang / srad bu dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / dgrang 'phreng dang / chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs
311a5(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis zla ba nyi ma dang / skar ma'i bar du 'tsho bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
311a6(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams su la'ang phyug 'tshal bar mi byed pa ma gtogs lha'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas rnam pa gzhan ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags 'di rnams thams cad
311a7(rgyud 'bum): bgags par byed pa ni grangs kar gyis so/ / de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag pa rangs ris kyis dam pa mchog tu gsang ba gsungs pa// lha ma yin gyi bra ga'i sgor song nas 'o mdang nas ngan pa
311b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ / lha ma yin bu mo mthong bar 'gyur ro// de rnams ral gri sbyin pa 'am/ grub pa'i rdzas gzhan snang bar byed de/ de blangs pas
311b2(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// /
311b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che las// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo'i skyed par byed pa'i gsang chen zhes pa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa' chen
311b4(rgyud 'bum): pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ bsam pa rnam par dag pas 'dir bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i don du rtog pa'i rgyal pos rig pa'i
311b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po gsungs so/ / bar skabs 'dir byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i thugs ka'i phyogs nas bdud rtsi thams
311b6(rgyud 'bum): cad yang dag par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to/ / 'od zer des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag yongs su bskor nas sems can rnams snang bar byas te/
311b7(rgyud 'bum): slar yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lus su nub par gyur ro// bar skabs 'dir gsungs par gyur pa de gang zhe na/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yas ba lo kau ti sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/
312a1(rgyud 'bum): A ro li ka/ 'di ni mchog gi snying po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba de yin te/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i cho ga gdon mi ra ba kho na sgrub pa'o/
312a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// don med pa thams cad zlog par byed pa// sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ bkra shis rab tu 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags pa de'i sngags so// tho rangs
312a3(rgyud 'bum): stan las langs nas gtsang mar gyur pas khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags te shar du mngon par phyogs te btung bar bya'o/ / las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
312a4(rgyud 'bum): ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal por zhi ba can gyi las thams cad 'grub par byed do/ / nye bar gnod pa med par dran par 'gyur zhing stobs dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / grags pa dang ldan pa dang
312a5(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du rgyas pa can na nyi ma gzhan la 'di rnams bya'o// bar ma la mngon spyod can/ bar+Na ta rab tu 'jug pa la ming med kyi sor mo lan bdun mngon par
312a6(rgyud 'bum): bsngags par bya'o/ / zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can la yang ngo // mngon spyod can la sdigs mdzub la bzlas pa nyid kyis de brtsam par bya'o// gang la la rnam pa de lta'i cho ga byed pa de la dngos grub 'byung
312a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / bzlas pa'i dus su bdag nyid kyi snying khar 'dir mngon par bsngags par bya'o// de'i dngos grub nges par brjod do// sgrol ma'i ched du sgrub pa ni nges par myur bar bshad pa de bzhin du
312b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / sgrub pa pos blo dang ldan pas rig pa thams cad la de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po stobs chen po bdag gi sngags kyi rig pa shin tu dge ba dga' bar rab tu bsgrags so// sgrub pa pos kyang bdag nyid
312b2(rgyud 'bum): bsrung ba dang dag pa byas la/ de rtag tu rig pa'i rgyal po chen po ya rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'ad bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i
312b3(rgyud 'bum): las 'ga' zhig bshad par bya'o/ / gang la la sgrub pa byed par 'gyur ba de rnams gdon mi za bar rig pa 'dzin pas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dang bas 'byung
312b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / yang 'di'i cho gar 'gyur te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ ri'i rtse mo 'am/ gzhan du'ang rung ste gtsang ma'i phyogs su gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar 'o ma dang nas zan bza'
312b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'am/ sha med pa'i bza' ba'am/ rig pa so sor sgrub pa'i ston mo'i bza' ba yongs su spangs la mchod pa yongs su rdzogs pas gso sbyong la gnas pa 'am/ gso sbyong la mi gnas pa'ang rung
312b6(rgyud 'bum): ste 'bum phrag phyed dang gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / sngon spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro// mchod pa byas nas bsnyen pa'ang sa ga'i nya'am/ cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi nya la mchod pa byas nas stong
312b7(rgyud 'bum): phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ / snying po sgrub par 'gyur ro// de nas las rnams su 'gyur te cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi nyal a ka ru'i yam shing no dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar las btags pa'i
313a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ / me tog stong phrag brgyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ro// me tog stong phrag brgyad po rnams kyis gzugs brnyan la
313a2(rgyud 'bum): bsnun par bya'o/ / yang na slar yang mtshan mo thams cad du bzlas na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas ma mthong na dong tshe lnga rtag tu rnyed do// mtshan mo bdun du thun mtshams gsum du mar
313a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/ / myos byed kyi shing la gzugs brnyan byas nas rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan la// rgyal po'i yam shing gis
313a4(rgyud 'bum): me sbar nas thur mas rkang pa phug ste thun mtshams gsum du brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma gnyis pa la rkang pa dag gis 'ong bar byed do/ / mya ngan med pa'i shing gis sor mo drug pa'i sha la b+hany+tsi ka
313a5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ri'i rtse mor gnas te/ 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// mthar zla ba nya la mchod pa bya ste mtshan mo gsum smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i
313a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten du a shwat+tha'i 'dab mar bzhag ste ji srid 'odra ba de srid bzlas par bya'o/ / legs par 'ongs sam zhes brjod par bya zhing mchog sbyin par bya'o zhes zer na chung ma 'am// sring mo 'am/ grogs mo'ang rung
313a7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ bdag nyid dang bcu gnyis la bza' ba dang / bgo ba dang / dong tshe 'ang rab tu stsol bar byed do// lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zla ba gza' yis zin pa na rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar gsar blang
313b1(rgyud 'bum): nas sor drug pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te/ zas bzhin dang smyung bar gnas pas a shwat+tha'i 'dab mar bzhag nas ji srid zla ba grol gyi bar bzlas par bya'o// de la dngos grub rnam pa gsum ste/
313b2(rgyud 'bum): dro bzhin pa la rkang pas rab tu rgyu ba dang / tshe lo lnga brgya thub pa dang / dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'gro bar byed do// thams cad du mi snang bar gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang
313b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhis sa la ma reg pa dang / lo stong du 'tsho ba dang / dpag tshad stong du 'gro bar byed do// skyes bu bcu'i stobs 'bar te lo stong phrag gnyis su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin
313b4(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu bya'o// sol ba'i dbus su dpal lha mo'i gzugs pad+ma phyag na bsnams pa kun tu bkod do//
313b5(rgyud 'bum): de mchog sbyin par byed de/ ma 'am/ sring mo 'am// grogs mo gyis shig ces bya bar brjod par bya'o// des dong tshe stong stsol bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gso sbyong la gnas
313b6(rgyud 'bum): pas 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams nas sngar gyi nas yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ / nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// lte btsam gyi chur zhug
313b7(rgyud 'bum): nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / gter thams cad mthong bar byed do// 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'gems par byed do// rengs par byed do// srung bar byed do// mi yang 'gugs par byed do// shi ba
314a1(rgyud 'bum): sos par byed do/ / dug med par byed do// zhi ba yang byed do// 'gugs par byed do// mo ga sham la bu ster bar byed do// stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags na srung
314a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po'i sgor bsrung bar byas na dgra rnams la mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o// ras
314a3(rgyud 'bum): dkar pos bgo ba byas nas ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / 'khor stong dang bcas par 'phur bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i las rnams byed do// ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba/
314a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa// ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa 'di la mchod
314a5(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po byas nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / yid kyis 'grub bo// gtsang ma'i phyogs su chu klung gi 'gram du gso sbyong la gnas pas mchod rten rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
314a6(rgyud 'bum): snying po can byas nas de la mchod pa byas te snying po bzlas par bya'o/ / bar ma la slar yang mchod rten byas nas nyi ma nub pa nas ji srid stong phrag brgyad de srid du bzlas so// de nas cho ga 'dis rig pa
314a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang thabs cig tu bde ba can du 'gro bar byed cing sangs rgyas mthong ngo // bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro//
314b1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pas rgyal po 'am// rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed na a pA marga'i yam shing la mar dang sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med
314b2(rgyud 'bum): dang skyes pa dbang du byed pa la thun gsum du gu gul gyi ril bu'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro/ / a ka ru'i rol bus stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste/ skye bo thams cad dga'
314b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po'i khab tu'ang smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// shu dag khar bcug nas ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o// dro bzhin pas ni yid gzhungs

314b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / slong mo za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas dpa' bo'i stan la nye bar 'dug ste 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o// de nas yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'byung ste/ lha rnams
314b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis lhan cig gnas shing gang 'dod pa de rnyed do/ / de nas za ma tog dkar po yi ges dkris par ldong ros bcug nas/ ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//
314b7(rgyud 'bum): dro bzhin pa la yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang ba dang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag
315a1(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug bzlas par bya'o/ / slong mo za zhing mi smra bar ku sha bting ba la nyal nas/ na ga ge sar gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// nyi ma bdun pa la 'dod pa'i tha
315a2(rgyud 'bum): mo rnyed do/ / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// nyi ma bdun pa la mchog tu yid gzhungs shing dpa' bar 'gyur ro// dga' ba 'khyil ba'i me tog gis stong phrag brgyad
315a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg byas na bud med dang skyes pa rnam par ldang bar 'gyur ro/ / dbang du byed pa la zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar
315a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub ging gi yam shing gis me sbar nas til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / seng ldeng la phur bu sor bzhi pa'i tshad byas nas phyogs bzhir gdab par byas
315a5(rgyud 'bum): te mtshams bcings pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / mig sman ldong ros grub par 'dod pas zla ba gcig tu'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas
315a6(rgyud 'bum): pas/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bzhi la bzhag nas gzhibs mnan te/ ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas

315b1(rgyud 'bum): mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar me tog dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya
315b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ gang don du gnyer ba de la mchog sbyin par byed do// yungs kar dkar pos mche ba can thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'ching ba ni// seng ge dang / stag dang / chom rkun dang / glang po che'i
315b3(rgyud 'bum): nang du song bas dran par bya zhing / / gso sbyong la gnas pas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byams pa la gnas pas// sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod
315b4(rgyud 'bum): pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag gsum bzlas so/ / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ mnyam

315b6(rgyud 'bum): thabs can no/ / ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang / gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// de nas zla ba nya la sangs rgyas
315b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ de nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung por gnas te/ a riSh+Ta'i yam shing la zho dang // sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag nyi shurtsa
316a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bya'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug las 'od zer 'byung ste/ sa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs par byed pa dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel
316a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / me tog gi chun po g.yo ba dang / ras ris 'gul bar byed de/ de nas grub par 'gyur ro// de nas las rnams dge bar 'gyur ro// nor sbyin par byed do// dngos grub thams cad kyis dag
316a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / dbang du gyur nas gnas so// de nas mig sman sgrub par 'dod na rnam pa'i mig sman a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du gtum par byas nas/ ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa

316b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba 'chang ba'o/ / de nas dkar po'i brgyad nas brtsams nas ring bsrel dang ba'i mchod rten dang / ras ris la pad+ma dkar po'i sbyin sreg bya zhing 'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas par bya'o// cho ga gzhan ni
316b2(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pas sgrub pa byed par 'dod pas/ / log 'dren rnam par 'joms pa'i cho ga'i rgyal po ni yungs kar la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/ dpag tshad stong du

316b4(rgyud 'bum): pab bcing bar bya'o/ / gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rang byung du byon yang / des kyang ji srid rig pa 'dzin pas bkrol gyi bar du dgrol bar mi nus so// zhi bar 'dod pa sna ma'i me tog stong phrag

316b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dis stong phrag bcur bzlas pas gzhan nad kyis btab pa rab tu 'joms par byed do/ / slong mo za zhing bye ba yongs su bzlas na bcom ldan 'das mthong ste mchog gsum stsol bar mdzad do// sems can
316b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / mi snang ba dang / lha ma yin gyi khyim du 'jug pa'o// ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas bye ba yongs su bzlas na lha thams cad dbang du gyur zhing rtag tu yang mthong bstsol bar byed/
317a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma can gyi mtshor pad+ma dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu bya'o// rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// bklags pa tsam gyis thams cad yongs su 'grub par 'gyur te/ 2
317a2(rgyud 'bum): pas nye bar gzhag pa ni ma gtogs so/ / mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te me long la yongs su bzlas nas sbyin sreg gi thal bas khye'u 'am bu mo la bstan par bya ste/ ma nyams ma zad par mthong
317a3(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ / mthe bo'i ser rtsi dang dri'i til mar gyis byugs nas byis pa rnams la bstan par bya'o// snod chus gang bar byas nas thams cad la bstan par bya ste// thams cad mthong zhing sems can thams cad
317a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byed do/ / lan bdun du bzlas pas dbang du 'gyur ro// grong du rab tu zhugs nas bza' ba don du gnyer na stong bzlas par bya'o// bza' ba rnyed par 'gyur ro// chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa la bzlas
317a5(rgyud 'bum): pas rengs par byed do/ / bye ba bzlas pa sa las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// zla ba gzas gzung ba na ba ra ha ka mi ka'i rtsa ba blangs nas lag pa kha sbyar bas mnan te ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum po
317a6(rgyud 'bum): de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / nyi ma gzas gzung ba na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// chu klung du song zhing 'o ma dang

317b1(rgyud 'bum): rang gi khyim bzhin du rnam par rgyu bar byed do/ / klu'i gnas su song nas 'o thug gis lhung bzed bkang nas/ ji srid klu mgo bo bdun pa 'ong bar byed pa de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o// rin po che rnams
317b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang sbyin par byed do/ / sa la rgyal po'i gter 'don pa 'am 'ching bar byed do// de nas gcig tu yang dag par blang bar bya ste// ma blangs na klu'i 'ching ba lnga 'ong bar byed do// sngags 'di nyid kyis stong phrag
317b3(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu rtsa gcig tu chu klung gi 'gram du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas ut+pal stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig chu la dbul bar bya'o// rgyun 'bab pa'i chu klung chen po'i me tog rnams g.yas su 'khor bar byed na/
317b4(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pas grub bo zhes shes par bya'o// de nas chu'i nang du 'ong ba dang 'gro bar byed do// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ byang chub kyi shing drung du bye ba bzlas par bya'o// tshul khrims
317b5(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba// rdzu 'phrul chen po dang mthu chen po can/ ji srid du sgrub pa gnyis
317b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o zhes pa sgrub pa gnyis pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas pad+ma 'byung ste/ 'dab ma dga' ba dang bcas pa dri yid du 'ong ba'i pad+ma de blangs pas zas su dga' ba za ba'i lang tshe dang ldan
317b7(rgyud 'bum): la/ sgra li zhing 'khyil ba/ lo brgyad gnyis lon pa rnam pa/ lha gzhon nu rnams las lhags pa'i gzi brjid dang / bde ba dang // yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro// lo bye ba brgya stong phrag tu 'tsho zhing 'phur bar
318a1(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / pA sha ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg bya ste gser stong rnyed do// seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar nas mya ngan med pa'i me tog mar la btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag
318a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad byas na gnod sbyin dbang du 'gyur ro/ / blos bzhin pas na yid kyis stong phrag brgyad cu sbyin sreg byas na yid rtse gcig pa nyid lus me dang mtshungs pa// stobs dang pha rol gnon pa thogs pa med pa'i rig
318a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / slar yang bye ba bzlas par bya ste/ mngon sum du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ngo // gang 'dod pa de rnyed do// yid kyis 'bum phrag brgyad cu rnams kyis mi snang bar 'gyur
318a4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / dpag tshad brgyad du 'phur bar byed do// 'og tu yang dpag tshad brgyar 'gro bar byed do// sa la yang steng du 'byin par byed do// gter thams cad mthong bar byed do// gnod sbyin mo rnams
318a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang du bya bar 'dod pas mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'og tu dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas 'di gsol cig ces brjod par bya'o/ / gzhan yang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
318a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i cho gar gyur te/ sngon spyad pa bya zhing gso sbyong la gnas pas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la dkyil 'khor byas nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o//
318a7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa na gso sbyong la gnas pa nyid kyis ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas chu stod can gyi zla ba nya la dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i bsod snyoms kyi zas bza' bar bya zhing / sha dang
318b1(rgyud 'bum): bral ba'i shin tu gya nom pa za bas dri gtsang khang du dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku'am gzugs brnyan la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas
318b2(rgyud 'bum): nas ku sha bting ba la skyil krung bcings te bsod snyoms kyi zas kyis las kyi dpag tu med pa'i bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o/ / ji srid sgrub pa gnyis pa'o zhes pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mthong bar byed do// gang
318b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod cing 'dod pa de rnyed do/ / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzerdzas kyi rtsa ba'i nog par/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba
318b4(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa rdzogs so/ / de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang rig pa thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
318b5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rig pa'i le'u gsungs par gyur to/ / bklags pas grub pa myur du grub cing rang gis bdag nyid grub pa gsang ba'i don grub pa// mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar 'grub
318b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ de ji lta ba bzhin rtog par bya bar 'gyur ro// yang 'dir rig pa ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ na mo ba~M d+ha de pa tA ya/ na mo ngi d+yA da
318b7(rgyud 'bum): ba tA nA na maH/ sarba s+yai ba/ bi d+hA ku la baM sha s+ya/ dad+ya thA/ sarba ar+tha big+h+na bi nA sha nA ya/ I ta ri/ ha re ha re/ bi ha re bi ta re ma hA te dza bi ma la~M/ a d+ha ye/ tsa lo// swam+b+ha ni/ pung+ka re/ shud+d+he mAH
319a1(rgyud 'bum): muk+te/ bi kur bi te/ pra b+hA sA re A lo ki taM// bi lA ka la/ sarba satwa/ a ba lo ki na swAhA/ rig pa 'dis las 'di rnams su 'gyur te/ bsnyen pa'i dus dang sgrub pa'i dus
319a2(rgyud 'bum): su'ang dang po nyid du bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o/ / bslab pas bcing ba'i grogs rnams kyang lan bdun nam lan gsum bzlas pa'i chu spyi bor blugs pas thams cad du bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro//
319a3(rgyud 'bum): dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / bsngags pa la sogs pa'ang 'di nyid kyis bya'o// ras ris blangs te lha rnams dang ras ris la kun tu srung ba dang / ras ris kyi gnas su tshon gzhan dang ma 'dres pa dang /
319a4(rgyud 'bum): spyan drangs pa'i lha rnams la mchod yon dbul ba dang // yang dag par gnas pa dang / bdag nyid dang grogs byed pa rnams kyang 'di nyid kyis khu ba bcing bar bya'o// khu ba bcings pas log 'dren thams cad
319a5(rgyud 'bum): 'joms pa dang gnas kun tu srung ba'o/ / 'di nyid kyis tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// bdag nyid dang grogs byed pa rnams kyang rung ste/ lan
319a6(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu rtsa gcig tu phyogs gang du sngon du bsnyen pa dang / sgrub pa dang / zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / mngon spyod can ci yin pa de nyid du gdon mi za bar bya'o// yang na gzhan du thang gi phyogs sam/ sa'i
319a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya ba 'am/ / gzhan las bya ba der byi dor dang por bya'o// rnam pa 'dis gtor ma sbyong ba dang / bdag nyid srung ba dang // gzhan srung ba dang / chu blugs pa dang //
319b1(rgyud 'bum): mdor na sgrub pa dang // las gang cung zad yin pa de 'dis bsrung ba la sogs pa bya'o// srung ba'i rig pa ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa mya ka sa bud+d+ha ya
319b2(rgyud 'bum): nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai/ tA rA yaM/ A gats+tsha de bi/ pad+ma haste na/ bar de/ pad+ma ha ste/ ya shwa pa kI/ rong shI g+h+raM A gats+tsha/ ma hA de bi gi/
