324b7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas nas sbyin du gzhug par bya ste/ gzir ba dang / mdoms kyi nad dang / gcin sri ba dang // rked pa bsdams pa la byin na nad med par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra lA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te
325a1(rgyud 'bum): shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ Sham/ 9 rig pa 'dis sha ba'i rims dang / 'byung po'i rims dang / gdon rnam par 'joms pa la srad bus thar par byed do// mim
325a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu btsa' bzhin pa la til mar la brgyad brgyar yongs su bzlas nas lte ba 'am rked par bskus na bug rngu med par 'gyur ro/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA
325a3(rgyud 'bum): ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tar+ya thA/ tA re muHswA hA/ rig pa 'dis brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas nas// kum+b+hi ra dang / bA ra Ni dang / a nan tA dang / be ta shi dang / tshangs ma dang / shu dag dang /
325a4(rgyud 'bum): bri ha ti rnams sbrang rtsi dang yang dag par ldan pa phangs kyi snod du bzhag nas zla ba mthong ba nas ji srid grol ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de zos pas mchog tu yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// rig par
325a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dis g.yul ngor 'jug pa la brgyad brgya mngon par bzlas nas lag pa la chings shig/ stobs chen por 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/
325a6(rgyud 'bum): tathA/ tA re tA re mu lu mu lu swA hA/ rig pa 'dis dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas a shat+tha'i shing gi 'og tu me tog yu ti ka dang / kaurti ka ra rnams 'om
325a7(rgyud 'bum): dang zho dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o// dngul brgya rnyed pa 'am/ yang na mthong ngo // zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum sbyang bar gnas te/ mtshan phyed nas chu klung du phyin nas dri
325b1(rgyud 'bum): zhim po'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste/ dong tshe lnga brgya rnyed pa'am/ yang na mthong ngo // 'dis zla ba gzas bzung ba'i dus su ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du so ma rA dza'i 'bras bu
325b2(rgyud 'bum): / rnams phye ma zhi ba bor byas nas mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i ril bu bya'o// a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du gtums nas lag pas mnan te ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de zo
325b3(rgyud 'bum): / zhig thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi sitwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tA re tA re/ hu re tu re/ da ra da ra sAH/ rig pa 'di nyin mtshan
325b4(rgyud 'bum): du sbyang bar gnas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas/ de nas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du song nas/ 'o ma dang nas zan za bas phyogs su gso sbyong byas te pad+ma dkar
325b5(rgyud 'bum): bopo kha bye ba 'bum dbul bar bya'o/ / gter mthong ngo // na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa mya ka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA
325b6(rgyud 'bum): satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ tA re tA re/ tut+ta re tut+ta re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma spobs pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya
325b7(rgyud 'bum): ar+ha te/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha ye/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai she rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tA re tA re/ tut+tA re tut+tA re tut+tA re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'od gnyis sbyin pa zhes bya
326a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rig pa'o/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samya ka saM bud+d+hA ya/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ tA re tu re/ tu re swA hA/
326a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni sgrol ma'i snying po'o// na mo rat+na tra mA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA la/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tid+ya thA/ tA re tA re tut+tA re swA hA/ 'di ni las chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa
326a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rig pa'o/ / de nas rig pa 'di rnams kyis mchog tu grub pa'i cho ga phyogs tsam du 'gyur te/ ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar sgrub par byed do// zhes pa de ji lta ba bzhin du
326a4(rgyud 'bum): rtogs par bya'o/ / mdor na 'jigs pa chen po rnams dang / las phran tshegs rnams la'ang bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di la yang rig pa sgrub par 'dod pas rig pa nges pa byung lngas
326a5(rgyud 'bum): lus kun tu sbyangs nas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas phun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// ji srid du zla ba nya la 'bum yang rung ngo // sngon du bsnyen pa byas
326a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas mthar nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas a ka ru nag po'i yam shing sor drug pa'i tshad la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa 'am/ tu rus
326a7(rgyud 'bum): til mar gyis btags pa'i seng ldeng gi me la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ / las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// de nas las su 'gyur te mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa/ gzhon nu mas bkal
326b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i skud pa ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du 'am/ / so so'i khyim du stong phrag bcur mngon par bsngags nas lag pa la bcings na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras
326b2(rgyud 'bum): ris bzhugs su gsol nas/ / pad+ma stong phrag sum cu seng ldeng gi sol bas me sbar nas sbyin sreg byas na rang gi gzugs kyi lha mo mthong ngo // gang bslangs pa de rnyed do// tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid bco

326b5(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten phyi ma 'bar ba de nas bcom ldan 'das byon par shes par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das byon pa nas g.yo ba dang dri zhim po'i rlung ldang ste/ ji srid du rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar gnas pa de srid du

326b7(rgyud 'bum): dgon par song nas rig pa bye ba bzlas par bya'o// slong mo bza' zhing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci bas sbyin sreg stong phrag nyi shu bya'o// ji srid lha rnams ri
327a1(rgyud 'bum): dgas mo'i gzugs su byas nas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de la 'jigs par mi bya'o// de yang gter stsol bar byed de blang bar bya'o// rang nyid longs shig ces brjod
327a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / rgyal srid dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / rin po che rnams ster bar byed de// rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la sbyar zhing // bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o// dgon par zhugs nas rigapa
327a3(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya zhing / a ka ru'i shing la rab tu gnas pa'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das la shing pat+sa lar+t+ti ka la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong byas
327a4(rgyud 'bum): na 'dod 'jo'i ba ser skyar 'ong ngo / / slar yang pat+sa laN+Di ka'i sbyin sreg stong phrag nyi shu bya'o// 'ongs nas kyang sgrub par 'asgyur te lo stong du 'o ma sbyin par byed do// sngar brjod pa'i ras ris

327b1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi dkar po'i bcu gsum la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas mchod pa byas nas me tog kha bye ba dang mar gyi sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// thal ba blangs nas
327b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi dpral bar thig le byas te/ grong dang grong khyer du rab tu 'jug par byed de thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// nag po'i bcu bzhi nas ji srid bco lnga'i bar du zhag gcig smyung bar gnas pas ba Da'i
327b3(rgyud 'bum): shing gi 'og tu dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa nye bar byugs te dri dang / / me tog dang / bdug pa phul nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing gnod sbyin rnams la gtor ma
327b4(rgyud 'bum): phul te mi'i rus pa blangs nas rtse gsum byed du gzhug go/ lag pa g.yon pas lan bdun 'phangs pa mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na

327b6(rgyud 'bum): kyikhang par ser skyar rgyud mtshungs pa'i mar srang gcig blangs nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gser gyi snod du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ zla ba mi lta ba nyid du ku shas steng

328a1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la 'gro'o/ / zla ba drug tu sngon spyad pa byas pa ba'i gcin dang nas phan bza' zhing mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma rtag tu bzlas pas ma bslangs

328b1(rgyud 'bum): 'am gzhon nu ma la bstan par bya'o/ / dus gsum nyid shes pa dang thams cad mthong ngo // rtag tu bzlas pas nye bar 'tsho ba thams cad las 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub shing gi yam shing la mar gsar gyis

328b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du nag po'i brgyad pa la dri gtsang khang du zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig pa stong du bzlas par bya'o// dri dang me tog la sogs pa dang / gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas// de nas rmi
328b7(rgyud 'bum): lam du bcom ldan 'das ral pa'i cod pan byas pa mthong bar byed do/ / sa ga'i zla ba'i dkar po'i phyogs la'o ma dang nas phan za zhing // ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang me tog
329a1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas nyi ma re re la ston mo bya'o/ / chus gang ba'i bum pa bzhi sman dang sa bon thams cad kyis yongs su bkanga' ba byas nas gzhag par bya'o// mtshan mo

329b2(rgyud 'bum): pa la rab tu 'jug ste ji srid bcom ldan 'das byon pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / sa g.yo ba 'am/ mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba 'am/ ras ris g.yo bar byed pa dang grub bo grub bo zhes tshig

329b5(rgyud 'bum): du stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o/ / 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'dod pas gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags

330a3(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe grub pa yin te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar sngon du stong phrag brgya bzlas te zla ba gzas bzung ba na til mar lan

330a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na grong rnyed do/ / bu mang po can gyi yam shing la me sbar nas shu dag stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o// thal ba des thig le bya'o// mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gal te ma gyur na
330a7(rgyud 'bum): na gsum du 'basgrub par bya'o/ / zla ba gzas bzung ba na chu klung gi 'gram du song nas bil ba'i yam shing gis ma sbar nas/ bil ba'i me tog la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas
330b1(rgyud 'bum): na gnod sbyin gzhon nu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / mtshan mo phyed na rig pa stong phrag bzlas nas de nas gcig 'ong bar byed de/ gter rnams sam nor gyi bdag po gang tshig gis brjod pa de byed do// nag po'i brgyad

330b4(rgyud 'bum): ras ris bcing ba'i las kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ba ru ra'i shing gis me sbar nas nyi ma so sor til dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg stong bya'o/ / blon po dbang du byed pa la yungs
330b5(rgyud 'bum): kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg gis dbang du 'gyur ro/ / sra rtsi pog gi sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med dang skye pa da'ang du byed pa la phub ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o//
330b6(rgyud 'bum): ar+ya ra'i shing gis me sbar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nyi ma so sor sgron shing gis sbyin sreg skyong bya ste/ dong tshe brgya rnyed do// slong mo za bas nyi ma so sor dus gsum du pa lA sha'i sbyin sreg
330b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / gser brgya so sor rnyed do// rgya mtshor song nas rig pa stong phrag brgya bzla ste/ ji srid rin po che rnams sbyin par byed do// blang bar bya ste dkon mchog gsum la dra bar sbyar bar bya'o//
331a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di nyid kyis sa ga'i zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa bar ma chad par brjod par bya'o// byang chub kyi shing drung du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas
331a2(rgyud 'bum): a pa mArga'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// bdag nyid ston pa yungs kar gyis grol bar 'gyur ro// zhi bar 'dod na 'bras yos kyi
331a3(rgyud 'bum): sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyas par 'dod na 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me sbar nas til dang 'bras thug po ches thun gsum du sbyin sreg brgyad brgyar bya'o//
331a4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma gsum du oM mra'i yam shing gis me sbar nas dur b+ha dang tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// rtsod par 'dod pa rnams kyi smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// nyi ma so sor 'bru rlon pa dang
331a5(rgyud 'bum): phu ma rnams lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg byas na ming nas smos nas mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po'i yam shing gis me sbar nas til dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg thun
331a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshams gsum du stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ / nyi ma gsum du a mra'i yam shing gis me sbar nas dur b+ha dang tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// nyi ma bdun gyis skyes bu chen po rnam
331a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur ro/ / 'o ma dang / ba lang gi gcin dang / nas zan dang / bsod snyoms za ba'am mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs kun tu spyad cing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma dang shing shun 'chang
331b1(rgyud 'bum): bas bsgrub pa byas te/ gang gar gtun shing gi sgra dang bral ba gtsang ma'i phyogs su chu bo'i 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas khru bdun pa'i sa'i gong bu bzhi byas nas dbus su 'dab ma stong
331b2(rgyud 'bum): gi pad+ma byas te/ de'i steng du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi lcags lnga las byas pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bris sku'i spyan sngar bsgrub par
331b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / dri zhim po'i dri rnams dang tsan dan dkar dmar gyis mchod nas man da ra ba'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba brgya phul nas bcom ldan 'das la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa
331b4(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i mchod pa bya'o/ / mar gyi mar me'i 'phreng ba bdun dbul bar bya'o// phyogs bzhir mar gyi bum pa bzhi rab tu sbar bar bya'o// phyogs bzhir bum pa bzhi sa bon thams cad kyis gang bar
331b5(rgyud 'bum): rin po che rnams bcug nas gzhag par bya'o/ / a ka ru dang / kun du ru ka dang / dpal rnams btags pa dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas phyogs bzhir sngar brjod
331b6(rgyud 'bum): pas zho zan sngon ma can dbul bar bya'o/ / lho ru ni na b+hU tak+Sha ra dar ba chu dang bsres pa sbyin par bya'o// byang phyogs su'o thug gis gang ba'i gtor mas nye bar mchod par bya'o// sems can thams cad la phyogs
331b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhir rgyun mi 'chad pa 'byung bar bya'o/ / bA la sha'i yam shing gis me sbar nas a pA mArga'i yam shing la mar gyis btags la lan bdun mngon par bsngags te sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o// ming nas smos pa de
332a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi yam shing gis me sbyar nas lan tsha las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas te/ mgo bo nas brtsams te ji srid rkang pa'i bar du sreg thugs re re la lan
332a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ / ming nas smos pa'i rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// dkar po'i bco lnga la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong can gyis
332a3(rgyud 'bum): nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te/ sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad kyis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
332a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du gser dngul gyi snod du ser skyar rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa blangs nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ lag pa g.yon pas snod gzung / lag
332a5(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yas pa'i ming med kyi sor mos dkrug par bya ste/ ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du'o// de nas btung bar bya ste/ yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// lan cig brjod pas thos pa 'dzin par byed do// de la du
332a6(rgyud 'bum): ba 'thul bas ni dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ / 'bar bas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yan lag thams cad na ba nye bar zhi bar 'dod pas dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis snga dro las brtsam par bya'o//
332a7(rgyud 'bum): shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gzhu'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byug nas dbus su nad pa'i so lag gzhag par bya'o// phyogs pa ni rnams su bum pa chus gang ba bzhi la brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas la gzhag
332b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / so phag rnams kyi steng du sen rtsi'i gos gzhag par bya'o// gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i tshon sna lnga'i skud pas yongs su dkris te dri zhim pos yongs su bkang bas so// phyi rol du dkyis
332b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bya'o/ / phyogs bzhir chang dang sha'i gtor ma dbul lo// dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod pa byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo// zangs kyi snod mar gyis bkang ba gzhag par bya'o//
332b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas nang pa so phag gi steng du gzhag par bya'o// de nas ku sha ljang khu bzung nas nad pa gos dkar po can la ji srid rkang pa'i bar du byab par bya'o// mar gyi steng du ku sha dor bar bya'o// de bzhin du
332b4(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ / de nas mar zos pas blta bar bya'o// de nas ku sha ljang khu blangs nas zlos bzhin du gzhag par bya'o// sbyangs pa las sbyang ba'i snod dang gos byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang
332b5(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byed du gzhug go/ de nas pri yang ku dang / na ga ge sar dang / sbrang rtsi can dang / bzhi po gcig tu byas nas mnyam par thob par byas la/ mar dang

333a1(rgyud 'bum): bar byugs nas/ dri bzang po'i me tog rnams kyis mchod pa byas te mar gyi mar me dbul lo// de nas byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar ro// sbar nas sra
333a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsi pog la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ / nad nye bar zhi bar byed do// rig pas bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed par 'dod pas rgya mtshor 'gro
333a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas seng ge dang / stag dang / phag dang / lug gi gdong pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyi shu rtsa gcig lhag pa'i brgya bya'o// de nas nag po'i
333a4(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis mtshan mo phyogs gtsang mar bla re dmar po bres la las yang dag par brtsam mo/ / sen rtsi'i gos bcu bzhi la bgegs gzhug par bya'o// dbus su bgegs
333a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi gtso bo log 'dren gzhag par bya'o/ / tshon sna lnga'i phye ma la lan cig mngon par bsngags pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bdun bya'o// dri dmar po'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par mchod

334a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang su 'gyur ro/ / nas dang / zho dang / lha la phul ba gcig tu byas nas sbyin sreg byas na rje'u rig dbang du 'gyur ro// dgral bltas nas bzlas pa byas

334a7(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yas pa la bcings pas ji srid smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ / gzhan gyis mi thul ba'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// gzhon
334b1(rgyud 'bum): nums bkal ba'i skud pa la mdud pa byas te lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas lag pa la bcing bar bya'o/ / brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug mi 'byung ngo // de nas ma rung bas mche ba'i ming nas smros te tshul

334b4(rgyud 'bum): dag par skal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'jani la snyoms par zhugs nas sgrub pa'i thabs tham cad kyi spyi'i rig pa gsungs so/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM
334b5(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ri dzu kaM/ tA re/ shAn+te/ tut+tA re/ a na b+hI/ la s+ye/ tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i spyi'i sgrol ma zhes bya'o// rig pa 'dis

335b1(rgyud 'bum): byA ste/ 'ching ba grol bar byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+d+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ri dzu ka/

336a1(rgyud 'bum): d+harma ni t+ye te/ tut+tA re/ a na bi lA s+ye/ d+harma ni t+yA twe tA re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste// 'dis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te/

336a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi ta b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA la/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ a gre tA re/ ri dzu ka d+harma tut+tA re/ an b+hi/

336b2(rgyud 'bum): / a mi tAb+hU ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaM ka saM prad+d+ha ya/ na a.Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti ThA ra laSho d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ a gre tA re/ shAn+te d+harme tut+tA re/ shAn+ta d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/ 'di ni zhi ba'i chos nges par 'byung ma'i rig pa ste/
336b3(rgyud 'bum): / rtag tu bzlas pa saM ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA yau/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM dud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/
336b4(rgyud 'bum): ma hA sAtwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a gre tA re/ ri dzu ka d+harma/ nir+yA te/ tut+tA re/ a na b+hi lA s+ye d+harma nir+yA te/ tut+tA re swA hA/ 'di ni drang po can gyi chos kyi mchog nges par 'byung ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas
336b5(rgyud 'bum): / don thams cad thob pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ma 'am/ rin po che rnyed do// ne mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tI b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA
336b6(rgyud 'bum): ya ma hA satwA ya/ a gre tA re/ ri dzu ke d+harma/ nir+yA te/ tut+tA re/ ri dzu ka d+harma/ nir+yA te tut+tA re swA hA/ 'di no 'phags ma sgrol ma thams cad drang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste// rtag tu bzlas pas skye bo thams
336b7(rgyud 'bum): cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA maM/ oMHta~M/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha bra la/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa la/ ma hA satwA ya/ a gri d+hamaNir+Ya
337a1(rgyud 'bum): te tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'phongs pa las sgrol ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste// rtag tu bzlas pas skye ba rgyun mi chad par byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo
337a2(rgyud 'bum): a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ a gre tA re/ a na b+hi lA s+ya tA re/ a na b+h+r-i la s+ye tut+tA re/ a na b+hi lA s+ye d+harma nir+yA
337a3(rgyud 'bum): / tetu swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste// rtag tu bzlas pas mchog gi 'bras bu ster ro// ni mo rat+na tra yA ye/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa mya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/
337a4(rgyud 'bum): / nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ shAn+te d+harme tut+tA re/ shAn+ta d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma zhi ba ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas zhi ba'i
337a5(rgyud 'bum): sems skyed par byed do/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha ta/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ri dzu ke tA re/ ri dzu ka d+harma
337a6(rgyud 'bum): tut+tA re/ ri dzu ka d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma drang por ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas drang po'i sems skyed par byed do// chos thams cad ces bya ba'i rig pa 'di rnam
337a7(rgyud 'bum): bklags pas 'grub pa/ bdag nyid srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / bde ba thams cad sbyin pa/ 'bum phrag gcig brjod pas sngar brjod pa'i las thams cad bsgrub par bya ste/ stong phrag bcu bzlas pas
337b1(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa/ / stong phrag sum cu bzlas pas bsod nams dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na mtshams med pa byas pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/ mdor na ma nor bar phan
337b2(rgyud 'bum): pa sgrub pa'i sems sbyin pa/ / snying rje'i bdag nyid can yang ngo // rtag tu bzlas pas nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro// yams thams cad mi 'byung ngo // nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'byung bar mi
337b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / zhes de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o// de nas 'di'i cho ga phyogs tsam du 'gyur te/ 'bum bzlas pas las thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas
337b4(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa zad par 'gyur ro/ / 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas mchog rnams sgrub par byed do// 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas pas mngon par shes pa so sor rnyed do// 'bum phrag lnga bzlas pas lha'i
337b5(rgyud 'bum): shes pa so sor rnyed do/ / 'bum phrag drug bzlas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed do// 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pas mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pas rgyal srid chen
337b6(rgyud 'bum): po so sor rnyed do/ / 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas mig sman ldong ros a shat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du gtums te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji srid dro ba
337b7(rgyud 'bum): dang du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de la dro bar gyur pas ni dbang du byed do// du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba'o// 'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro'o// mar gyi sreg blugs 'bum
338a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do/ / 'bum phrag bcu gsum bzlas par bya ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ngo // de mthong nas gang tshol ba de rnyed
338a2(rgyud 'bum): do/ / tsan dan dkar po'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// tshig gam zhabs 'ching ba thob cing yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// a ka ru nag po'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o// rgyal
338a3(rgyud 'bum): po dbang du 'gyur ro/ / rgya chen po rnyed do// tsan dan dmar po'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o// grub pa thams cad la grong stong phrag bsdus pa rnyed do// byang chub shing gi 'og tu 'bum
338a4(rgyud 'bum): phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o/ / bcud dang bcud kyis len rnams rnyed do// zos pas skra dkar dang gnyer ma spangs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas pas bya rgod sel bar byed do// 'bum phrag gnyis
338a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pas rgyal po'i btsun mo mchog dang rnam par 'phral bar byed do/ / yungs kar rgyal pos rtag tu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// til la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o//
338a6(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu nor rnyed do// gso sbyong can gyis 'bum bzlas par bya'o// bza' ba dang btung ba zhim po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// arga'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o// gser brgya rnyed do// pi N+ya kaM gi sbyin sreg
338a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// yid la byas nas bzlas pa bya ste// rtag tu bzlas pas nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / gdung ba thams cad dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / 'jigs pa
338b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'joms par byed do/ / gu gul gyi ril bu la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// nor 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum gyis rgyal srid rnyed do// rgyu skar gyis gnod pa la
338b2(rgyud 'bum): 'o ma dang phan tshun bsres pa'i zho'i sbyin sreg bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / bdag nyid dam gzhan gyis sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// dur ba'i myu gus sbyin sreg bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro//
338b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'dod na til dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg bya'o// nor chen po thob par 'gyur ro// bA la dang so so la ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas nas// 'byung po'i nye bar
338b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe bas btab pa'i sems can thams cad la ston du gzhug par bya'o/ / mthong ba las rang gnas 'gro'o// mig la brgyad brgyar bzlas na dang po gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// chu la yongs su bzlas nas
338b5(rgyud 'bum): gdong bkru bar bya ste/ / skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// bya rog ma 'phur ba la rtag tu bzlas pas gang 'dod pa de rnyed do// chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i khyor chu nyi ma so sor tho rangs btung bar bya'o//
338b6(rgyud 'bum): nad med par 'gyur ro// de nas bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod pas lan tshwa las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/ spyi bor stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro//
338b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa sgrub thabs kyi grub pa dang // yid la grub pa'i don thams cad sgrub pa 'di rnams sad pa'i rgyur yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du yang 'dir phyogs cung zad tsam zhig byas pa las sgrub thabs kyi nye bar sbyor
339a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i khyad par gyi stobs su 'gyur bar bya'o/ / tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs tsam gyis// sgrub pa'i yang dag dngos grub sbyong // shin tu stong min gang ba min// bza' ba kun nas sbyin
339a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / tsha ba mngar sbyar la sogs pa'i// ro las yul bral lnga la yang // sred pa ldan pas ro la ni// sred pa gang phyir skye bar 'gyur// sred pas bzlas dang sbyin sreg sogs// 'dir ni cung zad brtsam
339a3(rgyud 'bum): mi bya/ / 'dir spro 'dir ni rnam par shes// lag pa bldag la sogs brjod pa// dor bar bya'am dor bya min// nang du g.yog po'i lha rnams ni// phur bu gnas par yongs brtag bya// lha rnams kyi
339a4(rgyud 'bum): ni khang pa'am/ / khang stong dang ni phug gi nang // shing gcig gam ni dur khrod dang // ri bo dang ni tshang tshing du// bzlas dang sbyin sreg sgrub pa yang // rtse gcig yid kyis bya ba yin// ma dag ma dag
339a5(rgyud 'bum): kun dag la/ / dag pa rnam par sbyong ba yin// gnyis ka yis kyang gnyis ka la/ dngos grub smra bas bsgrub par bya// gang yang ro yi srad bu dang // lhag ma de nas 'gongs pa dang // zla mtshan
339a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pas kun tu reg/ gdol pa'i skye bos bskol ba yang // rul pa'i dri dang slar yang 'byung // legs byas 'dod pas sbyin par bya// lha rnams ched du bsnyen pa las// de lta la sogs yon tan
339a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / zas sam mal stan la sogs pa// sgrub po rang gis blangs pa'am// min pa nyid ni bsnyen par bya// btung ba ldan pas gnas dang dga'// skye bo ngan pa'i sems can bcas// phyi ru kun tu
339b1(rgyud 'bum): brtags pas blangs/ / mtshams med lnga po byed pa po// nad dang 'byung chen byed pa dang / med pa'am yang na mang na'ang // zas dang le los bcom pa dang // dge 'dun 'khu dang ngo tsha med// ser sna lhur
339b2(rgyud 'bum): len mtshon gyi 'bugs/ / rtag tu log par lta ba gzhan// de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan// kun tu gsungs pa mdzes pa'o// dus min khrus ni mi nus na// rang gis nus pa ma yin pa// rang gi rlung ni mchog
339b3(rgyud 'bum): tu bsgrags/ / dus gsum min par de yod pa// gcig tu theg gsum bral ba dang // khrus nyes pa dang chu bo'i nang // nyes pa gsum zhes bya ba 'joms// khrus ni mchog tu rab tu bsgrags// de phyir dus kyang
339b4(rgyud 'bum): kun bsams nas/ / me des sam ni de nas kyang // chu yis khrus ni dngos grub kun// sgrub pa po la bstan pa yin// de nas kun tu nad pa las// gsang ba'i sngags kyi khrus rnams ni// rab tu bsgrags par gyur pa/
339b5(rgyud 'bum): yin// yang 'dir sngags ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya// na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa mya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ bud+d+ha shu rtsi/ d+harma shu tsi/ saM g+ha shu tsi/ a ne na par+ya/ bA kye na/ a shu tsi shu tsa ra/ b+ha bA mi sAhA/
339b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'dis chu la lan cig yongs su bzlas nas bkru bar bya'o// sngon du bsnyen pa dang / sgrub pa'i dus su dang / nad pa'i sngags 'di khrus byas pas gtsang mar 'gyur ro// mtshan mo'i snod du thun gsum du dam pa'i
339b7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi kha ton la sogs pa rnams kyis dub pas mtshan mo'i gung la ku sha la sogs pa'i stan la gtsang sbra dang / srung ba'i cho ga dang / phyag rgyas yongs su brtags te sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bya'o// de'i tshe bsrung
340a1(rgyud 'bum): ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / seng ge'i mal du sgrub pa pos rtag tu seng ge'i stabs kyis lho 'am shar gyi phyogs su mgo bo bstan nas rmi lam du me zhi ba can nam rgyas pa can gyi sbyin sreg gal te
340a2(rgyud 'bum): gyur na/ / shar dang lho'i lho ru kun tu gnas nas rkang pa rab tu brkyang bar bya'o// nub kyi phyogs su mgo bo byas nas lho'i phyogs su kha bltas la nyal bar bya'o// rig pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan pas gang
340a3(rgyud 'bum): yang tsan dan dang / bil ba la sogs pa dang // n+ya gro d+ha dang / u dum pa ra la sogs pa rmi lam du mthong na/ bdag nyid yang dag par 'phags pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'o// ngang pa dang / bya ka raN+Da ba dang /
340a4(rgyud 'bum): khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / bya ro ha na rmi lam du byung na de'i dngos grub myur du bdag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gos dkar po dang mnyam par kun tu ston pa 'di yang bdag nyid kyang gang gi tshe 'phel bar mthong na gdon mi za
340a5(rgyud 'bum): bar dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal mtshan gyi 'phreng bas khyab pa dang / rmi lam du khang bzang la 'dzegs pa'am/ mnan pa la sogs pa byung na dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid de/ gru la mngon par 'dzegs pa dang /
340a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du de'i pi wang 'dzin pa'o// rgyal mtshan dang khyi la sogs pa rmi lam du reg pa byung ba dang / chu dang til mar gyis reg pa yang dag par grub pa'i mtshan nyid do// rmi lam du bong du dang // rnga mo dang /
340a7(rgyud 'bum): shing rta la sogs pa rnams mthong ba'am/ reg pa la sogs pa ni dngos grub la bar du gcod par shes par bya'o// nges par yang 'dod do// de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan// dge ba'i las dang
340b1(rgyud 'bum): dge las gzhan/ / de rnams thams cad sgrub pa ni// de phyir rmi lam shes nas bya// rmi lam srung dang phyag rgya ni// phan tshun nyid du rig pa 'dzin// bgegs rnams rtag tu gnyid log byed// rnam
340b2(rgyud 'bum): par gzhom bya rnam 'joms pa/ / yang dag gnyer nas de yi phyir// bzlas dang sbyin sreg la sogs kun// sngar brjod bsrung ba sbyar bar bya// srung ba'i cho ga'i dbye ba las// de 'dis yang dag 'grub
340b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod/ / mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha gnod sbyin// rang grub yi dgas srin po dang // kun tu rgyu byed rnam 'joms phyir// rang gi gnas dang sems kun g.yo// de phyir thog ma nas bya ba// bdag
340b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid srung dang mtshan ma ni/ / nye bar mtshon pa la sogs pa// sgrub pa kun gyi tshe na 'gyur// mtshan ma med par gyur na ni// bgegs de las 'bras skye ba la// khyi ni g.yon nas 'byin pa dang //
340b5(rgyud 'bum): ba lang sbyin dang mdzes pa yi// 'dab brgya can dang rna ba can// ri dgas ce spyang bya rog dang // khyim gyi phag pa de bzhin nyid// rtsangs pa gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang // ba dan la sogs thams cad
340b6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / gtso bor brjod bya dge ba'o// dge ba la sogs rig pa yis// mi dge ba yis mi dge la// de bzhin mchog dang mchog min dbye// shes nas dang por sbyang bar bya// bil ba arga'i me tog ni//
340b7(rgyud 'bum): min nyid 'dod dang a ram pa// khyad par las ni de byin cig/ blo ldan sngags pas las kun la// me thab rnam pa gsum bya'o// lho ru mngon par kha phyogs par// gyur pa'i hUM phaT yi ge ni// swA hA'i gnas
341a1(rgyud 'bum): su gzhag par bya/ / yid kyis kun tu bsams nas bya// mngon spyod cho ga la cig shos// mngon spyod can gyi cho gas bya// byang du mngon par phyogs gyur nas// swA hA'i yi ge dang
341a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan bzlas/ / yid kyis bsams nas zhi ba bya// dge ba mngon par mdzes pa can// shar du kha bltas nyid kyis bya// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can// bye brag tu ni brjod bya ste// 'og tu kha bltas byas nas
341a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / rgyas pa nyid la rab sbyar bya// mngon spyod stan la skyil krung ste// zhi dang rgyas pa can brjod pa'ang // rang gi stan la tsog pur brjod// mi dge'i las kyi kun spyod ni// skra dang sen mor brjod pa
341a4(rgyud 'bum): bcing bar mi bya gang gi phyir/ / gal te sgrub po tshangs spyod dang // ldan gyur de tshe nyes pa med// bzlas dang sbyin sreg sogs bya la// 'thab mo 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// yongs su dag par bya bzhin pa'i/
341a5(rgyud 'bum): skra rnams mkhas pas tshul de nyid// spu gris skra ni breg par bya// bsag par bya ba yang ma yin// dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni// lha rnams mchod par yongs su bsgrags// 'dod
341a6(rgyud 'bum): po'ang min yang stobs bsags pa/ / de nyid phyir yang nyes bcus 'gyur// sen mo'ang yongs su 'chang ba dang // de bzhin so dang spu la sogs// dri ma nyid ni bcang mi bya// shig la sogs
341a7(rgyud 'bum): parang skyes pa/ / de las sro ma la sogs 'byung // khron pa de ni blta mi bya// snang byed gzas zin gnas pa na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa ni// dngos grub 'dod pas nyams mi bya// lha
341b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams mchod pa'i dus su yang / / zas mngon ma gyur lha rnams la// shes rab can gyis mchod mi bya// gal te gzhan du bla ma'i bka'i// dam tshig las ni 'das par 'gyur// sngon dus chos rnams thams
341b2(rgyud 'bum): cad ni/ / nyan pa sogs kyis mchod par 'gyur// rig pas gzugs ni spros nas ni// bstod pa nyid dang bsngags par bya// de nas gcig tu bsams dmigs bya// brjod pa'i rim pas rang nyid kyis//
341b3(rgyud 'bum): tshig 'di kha nas smra bar bya// sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems// rdzu 'phrul che ldan srid pa yi// rgya mtsho 'di la dgongs su gsol// zhes pa nyid ni slar brjod nas// rmi lam rtag tu nyi ma yi// tho rangs
341b4(rgyud 'bum): yang rab bsngags 'gyur/ / mar gyi sbyin sreg hwags sbrang rtsi// don med mngon par bzlas byed pa// sbyin sreg mngon par mdzes pa ni// bgegs gzhom don du brjod par bya// so sor dgag pa'i don gyi phyir//
341b5(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i sems ni bsngags pa ste// dngos grub 'dod pa'i don du bya// rgyas pa can yang bshad bya ste// de bzhin kun tu yang dag bsams// sgrub pos legs par bsgrub par bya// de nas mdzes pa'i
341b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg ni/ / rtag tu 'bad pas bya ba yin// nges pa kho nas rdzu 'phrul 'gyur// skye ba 'di yi dbang skur don// bil ba mya ngan med la sogs// rab brjod pa la sha dang ni// a shwat+tha dang badz+ra kA/
341b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa can la sbyin sreg kun// de yi yam shing bya ba ni// u dum wa ra n+ya gro d+ha// a shat+tha dang 'o mar bcas// gang yang zhi la grags pa nyid// las rnams kun la yam shing don// sgrub pa seng ldeng
342a1(rgyud 'bum): a riSh+Ta/ / nim pa dang ni tsher can bshad// de bzhin gzhan du mngon mdzes pa// yang dag sgrub byed the tshom med// ba bla mig sman la sogs pa// rdzas rnams sgrub pa la
342a2(rgyud 'bum): yang ni/ ba byung lnga yi gtsang sbra dang // de tshe rig pa ldan pa yis// yang na lha yi chu la ni// dri zhim dri sogs yang dag sdom// u dum wa ra sher 'dab bsam// yang na a shwat+tha las byung //
342a3(rgyud 'bum): / me tog can gyi sngags kyi nang // bla na trai 'am bshol ldan la// yongs su srung ba'i cho ga ni// byas nas cho ga las bsgrub bya// gso sbyong can gyis ji srid du// 'char ba 'byung ba de srid du// nges
342a4(rgyud 'bum): par sgrub bam mug 'di ni/ / nye bar blang phyir blang bar bya// bar skabs 'dir bdag nyid la dgongs su gsol// zhes pa ni srog chags thams cad gsod pa dang // rtag tu gzhan gyi nor phrog pa las
342a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang mi tshangs par spyod pa las dang / / lag tu byin pa nyid las kyang rtag tu myos byed 'thung ba dang / skye bo rnams phan tshun gnyis 'thab par byed pa rim pa gang las 'phreng ba dang // kha dog dang /
342a6(rgyud 'bum): gar gyi don dang / rol pa dang / dregs pa dang / mal stan chen po dang / mthon po can las log ste/ gang da lha dgra bcom pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o// /
342a7(rgyud 'bum): bsdu bar bya'o zhes brjod par bya ba yod pa bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du'ang mgron du gnyer bar bya'o// zhes brjod nas byang chub kyi sems kyis bsdu bar bya'o// rtag tu dkon mchog
342b1(rgyud 'bum): gi rang bzhin gyi skyabs 'gro sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par bskyed nas/ sgrub pa po rim pa 'dis thams cad mtshams sbyar nas bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/
342b2(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya// su b+ha ge tA ra/ dan+te tu tA re/ a be brti ke swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skal
342b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas skal ba bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya
342b4(rgyud 'bum): a ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ su ga ta d+harma tA re/ dAn+ta d+harma tut+tA re/ a bai birta ka d+harma k+ShAn+ti/ ka d+harme tu re sAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba phyir
342b5(rgyud 'bum): mi ldog pa can gyi rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas gos kyi rnyed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mau a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo
342b6(rgyud 'bum): gi te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ su kha d+harma niR+Ye te/ tA re/ dAn+ta d+harma niR+shi te/ dAn+ta d+harma nir+yA te dud+ha re/ a baM brti ka/ d+harma nir+yA te tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma nor thams

348a2(rgyud 'bum): / ma bdud rtsi'i chos nges par 'byung ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas bdud rtsi dang ldan par 'gyur te bde ba thob bo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samya saM bud+d+hA ya/
348a3(rgyud 'bum): nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA la/ ma hA satwA ya/ a mra ta d+harma nir+yA te tA re sau mye d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/ a saM sl-i ta d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba nyid ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/
348a4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu bzlas pas 'dod chags nye bar zhi bar byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA
348a5(rgyud 'bum): / dr-i d+he tA re/ sha ra Ne tA re/ bo d+hi tut+tA re/ su rA se tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma brtan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas nad med cing lus brtan par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya~M/ na mo a mi trIH
348a6(rgyud 'bum): yata thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha ta/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha la/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ dr-i D+ha tA re/ sha ra Ne d+harma nir+yA te t+tA re/ bo d+hi d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/ bo d+hi d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/ pU rA sa d+harma nir+yAd+ha/
348a7(rgyud 'bum): re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma brtan par 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas tsher 'gyur te mchod rten gyi las la sogs pas tshe 'phel lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a
348b1(rgyud 'bum): samyaka sa~M prar+dz+dza ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ma/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA sa sa/ dr-its+tshet+tA re/ bo d+hi d+harma tud+hA re bo d+hi shwa ra Ne d+harma ni d+yA te/ pU rA se d+harmA hu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma brtan pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i ras pa
348b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas bcos ma dang / bcos ma ma yin pa'i dug thams cad sel bar byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samya ka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa
348b3(rgyud 'bum): / rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ dr-i D+ha tA re/ dr-i D+ha d+harme tut+tA re/ dr-i D+ha d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phag ma sgrob ma brtan pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas 'jigs pa chen po rnams
348b4(rgyud 'bum): sel bar byed do/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA/ d+harme tA ra

348b6(rgyud 'bum): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ma/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ sau mye tA ra

349a1(rgyud 'bum): mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ aHte/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ nA ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ d+harme tA re/ a mr-i te d+harme tA re/ sau

349b7(rgyud 'bum): cad la bltas pas grol bar byed do/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/

350b1(rgyud 'bum): re/ a ni daR+sha na tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa gsum gyi chos zhe bya ba ste// rtag tu bzlas pas mtha' mthong ba rnyed par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/

350b5(rgyud 'bum): / thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM brad+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tr-i bid+d+ha tA re/ a ni daR+Ya ni/ d+harme tut+ta re/

353a5(rgyud 'bum): ma hA satwA ya/ d+harma tA re/ d+harma d+harmA nir+yA te tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos kyi sems ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas sems can rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur
353a6(rgyud 'bum): / ro/ na mo rat+na tra yA/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ a mo g+he tA re/ saM g+he tut+tA re
353a7(rgyud 'bum): su kha ba ti tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste// rtag tu bzlas pas stobs dang gzi brjid rnams gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo
353b1(rgyud 'bum): a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+tha a ba lo ki tAM shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ a mo g+ha d+harma nir+yA te tA re/ saM g+ha d+harma nir+yA te tu re su kha ba ti d+harma nir+yA
353b2(rgyud 'bum): tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'chi ba 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste// rtag tu bzlas pas lha ma yin gyi gnas su rab tu 'jug pa rnyed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA d+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA
353b3(rgyud 'bum): an te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ a mo g+ha tA re/ a mo g+ha d+harma tut+tA re/ a mo g+ha d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma

353b6(rgyud 'bum): / rtag tu bzlas pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na hra yA yau/ na mo a mi tA b+hU ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa mya kaM saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa
353b7(rgyud 'bum): mahA satwA ya/ a tsin+yA tA ne/ a mo g+ha tA re/ su kha ba ti tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas rang gi khyim du gter mthong
354a1(rgyud 'bum): ste da mi shes par 'gyur ro/ / nA mo rat+natrA mA ya/ na mo a mi b+hA b+hAs/ b+hU gastAl/ an+teH/ sa myaka sa~M prat+tAs/ nam Ar+tha a hA s+pho ki) Tha rAm/ oMn
354a2(rgyud 'bum): / mahAsat+ta5/ a tsin+d+rat+tA re/ a tsin+te hut+tere/ a tsin+tad+harma ni r+yAN+De hu re swAH/ 'di na 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste// rtag tu brdzas
354a3(rgyud 'bum): bas lha'i btsud len du 'gyur ro/ / nA mo rot+na tra mA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aHte/ samya ka saM prad+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/

354a5(rgyud 'bum): bar zhi bar byed do/ / na mo rat+na tra yA yau/ na mo a mi sA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ a mo g+ha

354a7(rgyud 'bum): ra pra la/ na mo a mi N+Da b+ha ya/ ta thA ga hA ma/ aHte/ sa myaka sa~M praSh+ka la/ na ma Ar+ya a pa ma kau te shwa rI ma/ bo d+hi saN+Dal/ ma hAsaN+Da5/ a sh+tsi d+ha re/ sa b+ha byam sa re/ sat+taH

354b2(rgyud 'bum): yan mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ a tsan+ni tA re/ a mo g+ha d+harma tut+tA re/ a mo g+ha d+harma

354b4(rgyud 'bum): tra lA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ a tsin+ne tA re/ su kha ba ti d+harme tut+tA re/ su

355a3(rgyud 'bum): saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ a ba lo ki te tA re/ I she tut+tA re/ a naM gi na tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba'i

358a1(rgyud 'bum): ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyakA saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ e ta dz+wa li ni dz+wa la dz+wa la/ de ba swAhA/

358b2(rgyud 'bum): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA la/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aH te/ sa mya ka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA la/ tad+ya thA/ satwA ni ris+t+ri

358b5(rgyud 'bum): yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa mya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ shAs+dza dr-i d+he tA re sA hA/

375a7(rgyud 'bum): mar du byas nas/ / mar de la gdab par bya'o// de bzhin du zhos gang ba'i snod dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsis gang ba'i snod la'ang ngo // de nas bsrung ba byas te za ma tog tu ba gnas
375b1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba gzas zin pa na mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du ji ltar 'byor pa
375b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byas nas kha byang du mngon par phyogs pas snod bzhi ru bzhag nas/ / ji srid dro ba dang // du ba 'thul ba 'am/ 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dbang du byed pa dang
375b3(rgyud 'bum): mi snang ba dang / / nam mkha' la nye bar 'khrid par byed do// de bzhin du mig sman pa bla bskyed pa'i ched du rang nyid khyad par du dkar po'i bco lnga la pad+ma'i skud pa la bzhag nas// 'phags
375b4(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go zhabs kyi drung du lag pa kha sbyar nas blangs nas/ / ji srid dro da dang / du ba 'thul ba dang // 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o// 'di nyid la
375b5(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub rnam pa gsum mo/ / lcags lngas pad+ma byed du bcug nas gur kum dang / gi'u wang dang / ga pur nam mkha'i chus btags nas pad+mar bcug ste// de nas dkar po'i brgyad
375b6(rgyud 'bum): pa la gso sbyong can gyis dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du
375b7(rgyud 'bum): khag pa g.yas pas pad+ma blangs nas/ / ji srid du 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas blangs pa des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te// lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar
376a1(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / de bzhin du gdu bu dang / cod pan dang // lcags sgrog rnams kyang ngo // de bzhin du ri'i tsan dan dmar po dang / gu gul dang / dga' ba 'khyim
376a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtsa ba dang / / lcags lnga dang / gi ri kar+Ni ka dang // 'bru'i phub ma dang / ru rta dang // rgya spos dang // sbrang rtsi dang / pi pi ling dang / hu ru ka rnams cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhib 'o/
376a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhi ba bo byed du gzhug go/ de nas ser skya rgyud mtshungs par ba'i 'o ma blangs nas gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa'i mar gsar dang gcig tu byas pas phye ma la ril bu
376a4(rgyud 'bum): / byed du gzhug go/ arka'i til mar gyi phye mas mar me dbul bar bya'o// de nas dkar po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas gso sbyong can gyis a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi
376a5(rgyud 'bum): nang du bcug par byas nas/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar ji srid du dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas
376a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bar byed pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do/ / de nas cho ga gzhan ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar gso sbyong can gyis mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/
376a7(rgyud 'bum): me'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas zho dang // sbrang rtsi dang // mar gyis btags pa'i seng ldeng gi yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// dkar po'i bcu bzhi nas brtsams te
376b1(rgyud 'bum): ji srid bco lnga'i bar du'o/ / de nas grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gso sbyong can gyis rtag tu bzlas pa stong phrag gsum bya'o// phyi nas las thams cad du 'gyur ro// sngon du bsnyen
376b2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dis grub par 'gyur ro/ / yang na rgyal po 'am blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas// shing gi rgyal po'i yam shing la i rgu da'i til mar gyis btags
376b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ / bcu bzhi nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga'i bar du'o// las 'dis tshul khrims 'chal pa yin yang 'grub par byed do// de bzhin kho nar gsod pa
376b4(rgyud 'bum): dang bskrad pa la ni nim pa'i yam shing la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyar bya ste mtshan mo bdun gyis skrod par byed do/ / rigs bzhi dbang du byed par 'dod pas tsa ru
376b5(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa'i chu dang / / gnod sbyin gyi khams phor zhes pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro// mtshan mo pu tsi ra dza ti'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// bzlas pas 'ching ba
376b6(rgyud 'bum): las grol bar byed do/ / bgegs la phub ma dang til gyi sbyin sreg gis gzhan gang yang rung bas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas rigs kyi bu mo dbang
376b7(rgyud 'bum): du byed pa la til gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ / gos 'dod pas ngur ba dang tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg bya'o// stong phrag brgyad dam mtshan mo bdun du'o// shu dag la stong phrag brgyad lan bdun du mngon
377a1(rgyud 'bum): par bsngags par byas nas lag pa'o/ / nor 'dod pas gu gul gyi ril bu 'am sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad mtshan mo bdun du bya'o// khyim gyi bdag po 'dod
377a2(rgyud 'bum): pas dri'i sbyin sreg mtshan mo bdun du bya'o/ / mar gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste grong rnyed do// skrod pa la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i nim pa'i 'dab ma'i sbyin sreg
377a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / skyes bu'i sha ni skrod par byed pa las so// phub ma ni sdang bar byed pa las so// skrod par byed pa la sbrul gyi shun lpags dang thal bas so// skyes bu ma yin par byed pa la go ma i'o//
377a4(rgyud 'bum): phub ma ni mchu 'ching ba la'o// zhi ba'i don du shing sa mi'i 'dab ma rnams 'o ma dang lhan cig pas so// ji ltar nyi ma so sor tho rangs langs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar 'byor
377a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mchod pa byas nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ / ma grub pa sgrub par byed do// gzhan gyis bsgrubs pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa la ma nu la 'ching ba 'dzin par byed do// mtshan mo bdun du tsher
377a6(rgyud 'bum): ma can gyi sbyin sreg bya ste dgra 'joms par byed do/ / gos 'dod pas dur ba dang tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// khyim rab tu g.yo bar 'dod pas mi'i rus pa blangs nas sor brgyad
377a7(rgyud 'bum): tshad kyi phur bu byas nas khyim du gdab par bya'o/ / me tog la brgyad brgyar yongs su bzlas nas byin na dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor gur kum dang / rgya spos dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang
377b1(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa dang / / me tog brgya pa sdong bu dang bcas pa rnams kyis dpal dkris pa yang dag par ldan pa'i cho gas phye ma gos la btab pas mi'i dgra rab tu ldan pa la mi'i dgra dbang du 'gyur ro//
377b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yul du rnam par rgyal bar byed pa la rgyal mtshan la stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas nas dri dang // me tog dang / bdug pa la bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol mas mngon par bsngags nas me
377b3(rgyud 'bum): thab tu mchod yon lan bdun phul nas mngag gzhug pas pha rol gyi sde la ston du gzhug par bya'o/ / shing la rdo rje'i thog ji lta bar ro// til nag po la gzugs brnyan byas pa'i mdun du stong phrag bzlas

379a1(rgyud 'bum): pas dkar po'i phyogs 'byung 'gyur la lha mo'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar mkhas pas thun mtshams gsum du bsnun par bya'o/ / dkar po'i phyogs kyi nang du de la lha mo 'di

380a2(rgyud 'bum): dong tshe brgyad rnyed do// kun tu ru ka'i las 'di'o// bil ba'i yang las 'di'o// de ba dA rus grub pa'i don du rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// 'di ni rtsa ba'i rig pas a ka ru'i sbyin sreg stong phrag

380b1(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / mya ngan med pa'i shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg brgya bya'o// mngon sum du gzugs kyis 'ong bar byed do// bdug pa la lan stong phrag brgya bzlas nas/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma

381a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyer bar nor dang 'bru rnyed do/ / lha'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas de ba dA ru'i sbyin sreg stong bya'o// rang gi gzugs kyis 'ong bar byed do// mar gyi sbyin sreg gis zhi ba'o//
