381b1(rgyud 'bum): gis brgyad brgyas me rab tu sbar nas pad+ma stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg bya'o/ / gang gi ming nas 'bod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gi'u wang gi byug pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te mgo bo la byug
381b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / yang na gdong la thig le bya'o// skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i sa bon la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// ming smos
381b3(rgyud 'bum): pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drin las gzhan du 'gyur ro// pad+ma ma rnyed na ut+pa la sngon po stong phrag brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bya'o// dri 'am me tog gi sbyin sreg bya ste/
381b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag gcig gis lha rnams grub par 'gyur ro// khrus la sman thams cad dang / sa bon thams cad rtsa ba nag po med pa'i bum par bcug nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i chus
381b5(rgyud 'bum): khrus bya'o/ / bgegs kyis btab pa 'am bdag nyid zhi bar 'gyur ro// ut+pal dang / ru rta dang / a ka ru'i chu dang // stag sen dang / rgya spos bzhi 'gyur gyi cha rnams ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'phags
381b6(rgyud 'bum): pasman ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ ba'i mar gyis mar me rab tu sbar nas rdzas rnams thams cad me tog gi sbyor bas dus ma yin pa gang gi rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i
381b7(rgyud 'bum): blon po 'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'am/ sgrub pa po 'am/ tshe song ba rnams 'khrur gzhug par bya'o// tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// skal ba bzang po bgegs kyis btab pa rnams bgegs las grol
382a1(rgyud 'bum): bar byed do/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas// brah+ma dA ri 'am dzi ten+d+ha la dang / a ka ru dang / hu ru ka 'bum phrag
382a2(rgyud 'bum): gcig sbyin sreg bya ste/ de bzhin du yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// til nag po la zho dang // sbrang rtsi dang // mar gyis btags pa dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma 'am zhogs ma dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg
382a3(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag brgya bya ste grub par 'gyur ro/ / cho ga gzhan ni tsan dan gyi yam shing sor bzhi pa'i tshad la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas te grub par 'gyur ro// dkar
382a4(rgyud 'bum): po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te bil ba'i shing gi 'og tu me nye bar sba ra nas bil ba'i 'bras bu la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag brgyad bcu bya ste/
382a5(rgyud 'bum): rang gi gzugs kyis lha mo mthong zhing rgyal srid chen po gnang bar byed cing / gzhan yang gang zhus pa dag gnang bar byed do// 'byung po'i gdon grol bar byed pa la pad+ma'i phyag rgyas reg par
382a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ste 'bros par byed do/ / bsgrub par bya bzhin pa ma yin pa'i 'o ma'i shing gis me sbar nas zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang // mar gyis btags pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o// de bzhin du ut+pal
382a7(rgyud 'bum): dmar po dang sngon po 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg bya zhing / / yang na sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg go/ ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing 'phel bzhin pa'i mchod pa bya ste slong mo'i zas za bar bya'o// dri dang /
382b1(rgyud 'bum): me tog dang / bdug pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pa'i mthar dri zhim po'i me tog gis sbyin sreg bya'o// sgrub bzhin pa ma yin pa 'dis las rnams tshul khrims mchog tu 'chal pas
382b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'grub par byed do/ / yang na yungs kar til nag po dang bsres pa zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste/ de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// nor 'dod pa la a hA
382b3(rgyud 'bum): mArga'i yam shing gis yungs kar rgyal po'am ske tshe'i sbyin sreg go/ yang na blon po dbang du byed pa la til mar gyi sbyin sreg ste/ las thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// bu mo dbang du byed pa la sngar gyi sbyin sreg
382b4(rgyud 'bum): zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pas so// rgyal po'i btsun mo la las 'di'o// byang chub shing gis me sbar nas yongs su spyod pa'i sbyin sreg go/ dbang du byed pa la yungs kar rgyal po'i sbyin
382b5(rgyud 'bum): sreg go/ dbang du byed pa la kam+bo dzI ka'i me tog gi yam shing gis stong phrag brgya bya'o// zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas thab med pa'i me la lha dang lham
382b6(rgyud 'bum): la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas mngon par mchod cing mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/ 'o ma dang nas phan ba zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te gang bsrungs pa de ster bar byed do// ba sha ka'i me tog phrag brgya
382b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bya ste/ ming smos pa de dbang du byed do// na le sham gyi sbyin sreg gis log 'dren rnam par 'joms par byed do// byang chub shing gi 'og tu dri dang me tog gis mngon par mchod nas zla ba
383a1(rgyud 'bum): gzas bzung ba na ldong ros blangs nas a shwad+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag nas/ / ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o// blangs pa des rig pa 'dzin par
383a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ lha thams cad thogs pa med pa dang / lha'i gzhal yas khang mchog tu mdzes par myur zhing mgyogs par 'gro ste// nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog dang gzi brjid dang ldan zhing rig pa 'dzizhi
383a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad dang ldan par 'gro ste/ / lha'i 'gro ba brgya phrag gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// rna ba'i mig sman la las 'di kho na'o// gi'u wang sgrub par 'dod las 'o ma dang nas zan za bas sngon du
383a4(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o/ / zla ba gzas bzung ba'i dus su pi pi ling gi 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du 'am/ ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten du gi'u wang rnam pa brgyar bya ste btang nas rig pa yongs su
383a5(rgyud 'bum): bskor bas las bya'o/ / nye bar spyod pa la sogs pa can te/ des thig le byas nas rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus 'dod pa'i gzugs can gyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ lo stong
383a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho bar byed do/ / dpa' bo bzang po las byung ba'i mig sman gyi 'dab ma blangs nas mes gdung bzang por byas nas/ lan brgyar rab tu bcug nas zla ba gzas zin pa na chur
383a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ ji srid du grul bum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o// skad cig la bcag pa tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// 'di byugs pas gzi brjid dang ldan zhing cod pan dang rma
383b1(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba pad+ma'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa'i lus/ / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mthar thug par yang rab tu smon par 'gro'o// 'khor dang bcas pa lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do// rlung lha
383b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro zhing yid ltar mgyogs par 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / pad+ma dang ut+pa la stong phrag brgya'i sbyin sreg gis gser stong rnyed do// pa la sha'i las ni 'di kho na'o// yang 'dir
383b3(rgyud 'bum): las chen po'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni rgyal ba'i zhabs drung ngam/ ras ris kyi spyan sngar ram// rtog pa gzhan las gsungs pa'i cho gas kyang rung ste// rig pa 'di rnams kyi ming gsum brjod
383b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ras ris kyi go ga de'am/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du phyogs gtsang mar 'o ma dang nas zan za bas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / tsa ru
383b5(rgyud 'bum): dang rtsa ba dang / / zho'i bza' ba 'am/ chu dang / phye dang / zan dang / dri'i bza' ba 'am/ wa kra'i bza' ba 'am/ mar gyi bza' bas kyang rung ste/ yang na mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o//
383b6(rgyud 'bum): thog mar sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o// yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong dang yang dag par ldan pas nyi ma so sor mngon par brjod bzhin pa'i mchod pa bya'o// gsung rab ji lta ba bzhin du slong mo'i zas ba#
383b7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / byang chub kyi sems yongs su gzung zhing sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pas bza' bar bya'o// sgrub pa pos dus gsum du khrus byas pa'i 'og tu shis pa'i ku sha'i khres la 'dug
384a1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ sbyangs pa las byung ba'i gos bgo zhing 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas par bya'o// mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar nas 'o ma dang bcas
384a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i shing ngam/ a ka ru nag po'i yam shing sor bzhi pa'i tshad dam mdzub mo'i tshad la hu ru ka'i til mar gyis btags pa ru gsum du nyi ma gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas sgrub
384a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te bco lnga la phyogs bzhir sa las byung ba'i bum pa bzhi chu dang bcas pa a mra'i yal 'dab kyis kha g.yogs pa/ / rtsa ba dang nag po med pa gzhag par bya'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs
384a4(rgyud 'bum): sus las byung ba 'am/ / gser las byung ba rin po che dang sa bon thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba// sman thams cad dang / rtsa ba dang / rin po che'i snying po pad+ma dra ba'i me tog gis kha g.yogs pa/
384a5(rgyud 'bum): du gu la'i ras ma nyams pas mgrin pa bcings pa/ rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bum pa dbus su gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du shar gyi phyogs su 'char ba zhes bya ba'i bum pa'o// nub kyi phyogs
384a6(rgyud 'bum): su ha ri sa zhes bya ba'i bum pa'o/ / de lta bu la sogs pa bum pa rnams kyi ming smos te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhin gzhugs par bya'o// dri bzang po'i me tog dang / gtor ma dang /
384a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba nyi shu dbul bar bya zhing / dris bkang ba'i kham phor nyi shu phyogs bzhir dbul bar bya'o// 'o ma sa bkang ba'i kham phor nyi shu phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o// mar gyi mar me brgya dbul bar bya'o//
384b1(rgyud 'bum): bum pa'i sgron ma bzhi rab tu sbar bar bya'o// 'o thug gis bkang ba'i kham por bcu gnyis klu rnams la dbul bar bya'o// til gyi thug pa'i kham phor bcu gnyis srin po rnams la gtor mas mchod par bya'o//
384b2(rgyud 'bum): ban dron gyi kham phor brgyad 'byung po rnams la gtor mar sbyin no// hwags kyi bca' ba la sogs pa'i gtor ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bya'o// gzhan rnams la mar
384b3(rgyud 'bum): gsar dang zhos bkang ba dang / ji ltar 'os pa dang / ji ltar mtshungs pa'i kham por rnams phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o// a ka ru nag po'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o// ga pur dang /
384b4(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan dkar po dang / kun tu ru ka dang / shri bA sa can gyi bdug pa'i kham por phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o// de nas srod la las brtsam par bya ste nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas
384b5(rgyud 'bum): aNa'i yam shing ngam/ seng ldeng gi shing gis me rab tu sbar nas las 'di la sngags 'dis spyan drang ba byas par 'gyur ro// sngags ni// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kau te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sar+b+ba
384b6(rgyud 'bum): yA/ ma hA satwA ya/ hi ri hi ri/ su ru su ru// ma hA kA ru Ni kA A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa ra d+hi ri d+hi ri Ni/ ya thA sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swAhA/ gshegs su gsol ba'i dus su tra
384b7(rgyud 'bum): zhim po'i me tog gis bskul bas so/ / dngul las byung ba'i snod dam/ sa las byung bar mchod yon phul nas/ de nas a ka ru nag po'i yam shing ji skad gsungs pa'i tshad dang // gzhan
385a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa la til mar gyis btags pa rnams za ba gzas bzung ba 'am/ / nyi ma gzas bzung ba na stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs
385a2(rgyud 'bum): su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog tu thugs brtse ba/ phyag na ril ba spyi thugs dang dbyug pa bsnams pa// na bza' dkar po mnabs pa// ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba
385a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byon par 'gyur ro/ / de nas ji skad gsungs pa'i snod du dri zhim po'i me tog dkar po rnams snyim pas blangs nas chu'i mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
385a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug ci yin pa'i mchog de sbyin par bya'o zhes gsung bar byed do/ / gang mchog bslangs pa de ster ro// nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang ba 'am// rgyal po nyid dam/ rig pa'i dngos
385a5(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad dam/ / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po nyid dam// mtshon cha'am/ tshe ring po nyid dam// sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa 'am// gi'u wang sgrub pa 'am/ mig sman sgrub
385a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ / gter 'pho ba 'am/ phug tu 'jug pa 'am/ bcud len nam// ldong ros sgrub pa 'am// mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam// rang gi lus la rjes su 'dod pa'i cho ga'am/
385a7(rgyud 'bum): lha'i mig gam// nad 'joms pa 'am// lha'i shes pa 'am// lag pa dang rkang pa 'am// mig cha dang bral ba nyid dam// lha'i dbang po sbas pa nyid dam/ nad 'joms pa nyid dam/ mdze'
385b1(rgyud 'bum): lus la gang cung zad bsgrub bya min pa'i nad de dang de rnams las de las thar pa dang / / thos pa 'dzin pa dang / nor sgrub pa nyid dam/ gang bslangs pa'i mchog de sbyin par mdzad do// 'phags pa
385b2(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su 'ang 'gro'o/ / tshe bskal par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa pos ku sha'i khres yod pa la u dum wa ra'i cho ga shes pas
385b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ u dum wa ra'i shing gi shing lham gnyis sam// rdza mkhan gyi sa la de nas thams cad mnyam pa nyid do// sgrol ma'i mchog tu gsang ba'i nye ba'i snying po'i cho gar 'gyur te/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
385b4(rgyud 'bum): na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ oM ku ru ku ru kul+le swA hA/ 'di ni rig pa 'di thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i nye ba'i snying po ste/ bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jig
385b5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad gnon par byed do/ / nad thams cad zad cing 'joms so// 'jigs pa thams cad 'joms par byed do// las phran tshegs rnams kyang bklags pas 'grub po// 'jam
385b6(rgyud 'bum): phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu zlos par byed pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed pa'o/ / de nas mig sma ma ldong ros a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dro bar
385b7(rgyud 'bum): byed bzhin pas ni dbang du byed do/ / du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba'o// 'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro'o// til gyi sreg thugs 'bum gyi sbyin sreg bya'o// gang 'dod pa de ster bar byed do//
386a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar byed do// de mthong na gang brtsams pade 'grub par
386a2(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / tsan dan dkar po'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste/ nyi ma so so la dong che rnyed do// tsan dan dmar po'i yam shing gi sa sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste/ nyi ma re re la kar
386a3(rgyud 'bum): sha pa Na drug rnyed do/ / 'bum phrag bdun bdun bzlas par bya ste/ mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya ste/ nad 'joms par byed do// mtshan mo bdun du lan gsum
386a4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bzlas pas nad 'joms par byed do/ / 'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas par bya ste/ bcud len dang bcud rnyed do// de zos nas gnyer ma dang sgra dkar spangs par 'gyur ro// 2
386a5(rgyud 'bum): phrag gsum gyis gr-i d+ha shi sel bar byed do/ / lcags bsregs nas lan gsum bzlas pa'i til mar gyis rkang pa g.yas pa la bskus nas lcags des rkang pa la gdung bar bya zhing / gri d+ha sh+tsi
386a6(rgyud 'bum): chotsho cig ces brjod par bya'o/ / 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du byed do// yungs kar rgyal po'i sreg thugs byas pas dbang du 'gyur zhing mtshan mo bdun gyis nor gyi bdag por
386a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ 'dod pas nye bar gzhag pa ma gtogs so// murga la 'bum bzlas te bskus na bza' btung gang zangs pa de rnyed do// arga'i lam shing gi sbyin sreg byas na gser srang brgya rnyed do// shing bi N+ya ka
386b1(rgyud 'bum): gi sbyin sreg bya ste/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// tam+b+ha la'i phye mas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byad// cod pan 'ching bar 'gyur ro// bye ba bzlas par bya ste/ 'khor brgyas bskor ba
386b2(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / 'bras yos kyi sreg thugs stong phrag brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya ste/ nyi ma bdun gyis bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas par bya ste// palci skam
386b3(rgyud 'bum): po sngags kyi bca' bar 'gyur ro/ / rtsa ba med pa 'am/ dug med par brjod pas bslus na dri bzang por 'gyur ro// tum+b+ha la thams cad yang dag par sbyar te/ 'bum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o// tAm+b+ha la
386b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshang ba nyid med par 'gyur ro/ / a pA margas mig nad sel bar byed do// rims kyis btab pa la ku shas byabs pas so// srad bu la brgyad brgya bzlas nas bcing bar bya ste/ skal ba ba'ang
386b5(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur ro/ / zan dang zho lhan cig pa 'bum gyis sbyin sreg byas na ji srid 'dod pa'i phas ma tshang ba med par 'gyur ro// mar gyi sreg blugs stong gi sbyin sreg byas na yul gru gsum rnyed do//
386b6(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams kyis sgrub pa lan gsum gyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes so/ yu bral gyi ril bu ka par kha ri rus pa'i tshad kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste/ nyi ma re re la pa Na bcu drug rnyed ngo //
386b7(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma med pa zad par bya'o// dong ka'i me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste/ ma btags pa'i gos sna tshogs pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis rnyed do// snying rjes sbyin du bcug pa dang
387a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du dad pa dang / / lha bsnyen pa las gzhan ma yin pas 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// zhes de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o// rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'ang chos thams cad
387a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi nang du gtogs par rtog pa thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa'i rig pa 'di ni cho ga rgyas par bstan par lo brgya phrag gis kyang de dang 'dis mdor bsdus nas bstan par mi nus so/ / cho ga
387a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan rnams su'ang rig pa 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga de thams cad bsgrub par bya zhing / / de bzhin du gang nges par brjod pa'i las rnams sgrub par byed do// rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir rig pa'i sngag
387a4(rgyud 'bum): de rnams dang / gang sngags rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba de rnams kho na yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu gsal ba la sogs pa dang // rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang bsgrub par bya'o/
387a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa'o// de rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi spyod pa sbyin pa dang // sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa dang // dkyil 'khor gyi las dang // 'jig rten dang
387a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i rig pa dang / sngags rnams dang // rtog pa thams cad du rgyas par bstan pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga bcu rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
387a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i cho ga brgyad rnams kyang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i rtog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu bzhi po'i rtog pa dang / yangs pa'i rna
387b1(rgyud 'bum): bo dang / kun tu ri bo dang // 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud de/ rtog pa chen po thams cad kyi spyod pa'i cho ga rnams su mnyam pa nyid du 'gro bar byed do// de bzhin kho nar bdag gis brjod
387b2(rgyud 'bum): pa de dang / / sangs rgyas mtha' yas pas gsungs pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po bde blag tu bsgrub par bya ste/ mtha' yas pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu 'gro'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das
387b3(rgyud 'bum): ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par/ thams cad thun mong ba'i cho ga'i rig pa'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so// / phyag rgya'i le'u bri bar bya'o// de nas
387b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po phyag rgya yang dag par mgu bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga thun mong ba/ rgyud thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa// phyag rgya'i ri
387b5(rgyud 'bum): mo'i cho ga/ rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin du gyur pas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid gsungs par gyur to// bcing ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni// shes nas rab tu gzhag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
387b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi/ / rigs kyi phyag rgya cha gsum rnams// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor kun nas 'bar// gtsug tor phyag rgya rdzogs pa yi/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba ni// 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o// gtsug
387b7(rgyud 'bum): tor de nyid cung bar bteg/ gtsug tor steng 'gro'i phyag rgya'o// kun tu dkar ba gdugs dkar can// 'khor lo 'bar ba rnam par 'phro// gzi brjid phung po rdo rje snying // gzhan gyis mi thub
388a1(rgyud 'bum): lan gsum dkris/ / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya'o// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lte bar bcas// chos kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid do// pad+ma rin chen nor bu ni// rin
388a2(rgyud 'bum): chen snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid dkyilakhor so sor gnas// las kun byed pa'i gdu bu dang // dbus su son pa dbus ma yin// spyan de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan// de nyid rtsa ba
388a3(rgyud 'bum): can gyis dman/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'o// rtse mo'i steng 'og nus pa'i mtshan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa'o// 'bar ba'i tshogs pa gzhan mi thub// 'bar ba'i snying po'i
388a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor ni/ / thams cad lhung bzed sogs phyag rgya// sngags sam yid kyi bye brag las// de bzhin gshegs rig phyag rgya'o// pad+ma 'dab brgyad phyi ma la// 'dab ma can rdzogs gang ba yi//
388a5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i rnam pa cha dang bcas// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya pad+ma can// pad+ma g.yo ba'i steng du ni// nges zhugs nor bu 'dod pa ni// phun tshogs byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// rta mgrin dang ni sngon phyogs kyi// pad+ma yi ni re
388a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bru'o/ / pad+ma dkar po gos dkar can// ze'u 'bru de nyid grags ldan ma'i// ut+pal de nyid sgrol ma yi// ut+pa ya ni zla ba yi'o// cung zad rin chen khro gnyer can// sdong bu dang bcas dpas
388a7(rgyud 'bum): mo ste/ pho nya mo kun zhes bya'i rigs// kha bye rgyas pa rigs rgyal mo'o// lhag ma rnams kyi thun mong nyid// dbyug pa'am ril ba spyi thugs kyi// rnam pa de dag lhag ma ru// rig pa can rnam
388b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis shes bya/ / 'bar bas pad rigs phyag rgya'o// rtse mo lnga pa rdo rje mi// gdong gnyis lha mos sor gnas// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ldan rig pa mchog/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i rdo rje/
388b2(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig rdo rje thad kar gnas// bum dbus steng song mA ma kI// gtsug tor gcig pa rgyal ba ste// gtsug tor gnyis pa rnam par rgyal// gtsug tor gsum pa rdo rje'i mtshan// dbus su mdung gi rnam pa
388b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ rdo rje yi ni mtshan ma'o// dbus su 'khyil ba byas nas ni// mdung la 'khyil ba mngon phyogs pa'o// rdo rje'i dbus su dkyil 'khor la// kun nas 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// yod pa
388b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba can ma'o/ / rdo rje gnyis ka'i rtse mo la// 'phreng ba dag byed 'phreng ba 'chang // cung zad cod pan gzhogs su ni// lcags kyu rdo rje lcags kyu ma'o// dbyug pas dbyug pa'o de bzhin du/
388b5(rgyud 'bum): dgra sta dbus ma'i rtse mor gnas// rdo rje khu tshur bum can yang // de nas nges pa'i rnam pa ni// rdo rje rtse gcig 'bar bcas pa// rdo rje kha ma rung gi sna// pho nyi mo yi ring po ste// khro bo rnams kyi thung
388b6(rgyud 'bum): du'o/ / rnam par 'phro ba rig pa'i rgyal// cung zad dbus su gtsug tor ldan// rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o// 'og tu mdung la steng rdo rje// tshogs kyi'o steng du mdung dang ni// 'og tu rdo rje
388b7(rgyud 'bum): log 'dren kun/ / dbus su bi dI phyogs pa'i ru// mgo gsum rdo rje bi dI ni// rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du'o// de nyid 'dir yang de bzhin du// thams cad du ni 'bar bcas pa// bdun
389a1(rgyud 'bum): @lnga gsum gyis 'bar bar bya/ / rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad la// rdo rje lnga yi mtshan nyid rnams// phyag rgya bcas pa'o gtum po rnams// bi dI ka dang bcas pa'o// cig
389a2(rgyud 'bum): shos 'jig rten pa rnams ni/ / 'bar ba dang bcas gtum po ni// be dI med par so sor gnas// ji ltar 'gro bar bya ba yi// dge ba'i spyod pas 'jig rten pa// 'jig rten 'das pa
389a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyud shes pas/ / thams cad rtog pa dkyil 'khor gyis// zhes so// oM sa ra sa ra badz+ra prA ka raM hUM phaT swA hA// ra ba'o// oM bi phu rang / rak+Sha badz+ra pany+dza ra hUM phaT swA hA// rdo rje'i gur ro//
389a4(rgyud 'bum): e ki li ki la/ badz+ra badz+ra b+hu ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ phur pa'o// de ltar 'di rnams dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas sems dpa' chen po des slar yang phyag rgya yang dag par skul bar
389a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / sgrub thabs cad kyi spyi'i cho ga mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyag rgya dang rig pa thams cad la kun nas mnyam par 'jug pa de rnams gdon mi za ba
389a6(rgyud 'bum): kho nar dngos grub rtogs par 'gyur ro/ / zhes so// de nas thal mo dbu ma yi// gung mo'i sor mo gung mos gung mo la// de nyid sdigs mdzub rtse mo lta bar gnas// de bzhin gshegs rigs
389a7(rgyud 'bum): / dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya lhan cig par bsgrags so// dang po sngags bcas rdzogs par bya// bzlas pa la sogs par 'gyur ro// yang 'dir sngags ni/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHoM ta thA ga tA ud b+ha hA
389b1(rgyud 'bum): / ya swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su dam tshig gi sngags so// g.yon pa'i rgyab phyin ci log tu 'gyur te bkan la// lag pa'i mthe'u chung bzung la gang gis mthe bong gnyis cung zad brkyang ba mnan pa/
389b2(rgyud 'bum): byaste// sor mo dag ni mchog gi dam tshig gi sngags te/ rdo rje ri rigs su rab tu grags par 'gyur ro// yang 'dir sngags ni/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHoM badz+ra ud b+ha bA ya swA hA/ rdo rje'i rigs su dam tshig gi phyag
389b3(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i sngags so/ / gung mo'i sor mo gung mo can// byas nas thal mo sbyar byas pa// sor mo gnyis rtag bug pa med// dang por bcings nas de bzhin phyis// rdzogs nas bzlas pa la sogs 'gyur// yang
389b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dir sngags ni/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHzhes pa 'di rnams dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams la'o// oM pad+ma ud b+ha bA ya swA hA/ 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi sngags so// zhes pa dam
389b5(rgyud 'bum): tshig phyag rgya ni/ / gsum po 'di rnams kun tu bsgrag/ yon tan dpag med rnam pa ste// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa'o// dang por bcing bya rtag tu slar// sgrub pos lha yi spyan snga ru// de yi dngos grub
389b6(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur/ / myur du 'dod pa'i na sogs rnams// 'jig rten mgon po mtha' yas dang // de sras bdag nyid che rnams kyis// lus can kun gyi phyag rgya che// sgrub pa'i don du gsungs pa yin// rtag tu
389b7(rgyud 'bum): snga bar langs nas ni/ / nyin re nyin re bcing bar bya// gtsang zhing da dang tho gros ldan// de yi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// dam tshig phyag rgya gsum po 'di// gang gis shes pa po ldan pas/
390a1(rgyud 'bum): bzung ba'i 'phags pa'i man ngag gis// de yi dngos grub the tshom med// 'di rnams rnam par shes pa ni// cho ga nyams kyang sgrub pa pos// de yi dngos grub byed pa yin//
390a2(rgyud 'bum): stobs po che la sogs rnams kyis// phyag rgya kun tu srung don du// de nas dbugs 'byin chen po de// bdag gis kun nas snang ba yi// phyag rgya yang dag skul byed pa'i// sgom pas kun nas rtag tu ni//
390a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rab tu gsungs pa ste// sgrol ma kun gyi thun mong du// rtog pa gang du gsungs pa yin// rtog pa gzhan du rig pa gang // de rnams nyid kyang rab sbyar bya// yang 'dir phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'gyur//
390a4(rgyud 'bum): slar lang sor mo phan tshun du// lan gnyis kha sbyar gnas pa la// mdzub mo gnyis ni rab tu brkyang // tho ldan de bzhin mthe bong yang // sems ni legs par mnyam bzhag pas// bcing bya rtsa ba'i phyag
390a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / sgrol ma spyan drang ched du ni// 'di rnams rig pa lhan cig pas// zhes 'di sgrol ma thams cad kyi// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin// sgrub pa po ni don thams cad// rang gi rig pas
390a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba yin/ / cho ga nyams kyang dad pa yis// lha rnams 'phral du 'ong bar byed// de nyid mthe bong bkan byas nas// mchod yon dag ni dbul bar bya// de nas mchod yon can du 'gyur//
390a7(rgyud 'bum): mi rnams 'dod pa'i 'bras rab sbyin// mchod yon gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa bkan te bteg la brkyang // mthe bong gdan du rab brtag bya// de nyid 'dod pa sgrub pa'i don// lha rnams yongs su mnyes
390b1(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ / gdan gyi phyag rgya'o// mthe bong dag gi rtse mo'i cha// bskums nas tha dad gyur gang nyid// khrus bya bdag nyid don bzang sprug/ khrus kyi phyag rgya'o// sor mo'i rtsa ba'i nye logs su//
390b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa'i mthe bong rnam par dgod// sman dang srog chags yan lag ni// yongs su spangs te dri dag dbul// dri'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin g.yon pa'i mthe bong yang // mnyam par bzhag pas
390b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dgod/ / lha yi ni mchog dang ldan pa'i// me tog sna tshogs dbul bar bya// me tog gi phyag rgya'o// sdigs mdzub g.yas pa'i rtse mo ni// bskum ste gung mor gnas par 'gyur//
390b4(rgyud 'bum): gang gi mthe bong can gyis ni// de yis 'dug spos dbul bar bya// bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i mthe bong sdigs mdzub ni// gung mor gang gis gnas par bya// gtsang zhing dag par yang
390b5(rgyud 'bum): dag ldan/ / de nyid gtor ma'i mchod par bya// gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o// sdig mdzub rtse mor mthe bong gnyis// rnam par bkod pa byas nas ni// ba yi mar ni phul byung bas// sgron ma dbul
390b6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba'o/ / mar me'i phyag rgya'o// gung mo'i rtse mor mdzub mo ni// phyi yi rtse mo'i tshogs su sbyar// mthe bong dang ni ming med dag/ bgrang 'phreng srad bu yongs su 'dzin// 'phreng
390b7(rgyud 'bum): ba 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / rtag tu me ru mngon phyogs pas// lag pa g.yas pa'i ming med ni// gung mo'i tshigs su byas par gyur// lag gnyis sbyar ba'i gung mo la// mthe bong
391a1(rgyud 'bum): cud zad rnams 'dud pa'o/ / me spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// ming med mthe bong sbyar byas nas// sngags dang bcas pa rab sbyar bya// de nyid kyis brjod gshegs su gsol//
391a2(rgyud 'bum): / me lha spyan drangs pa bskul ba'i phyag rgya'o// zhes pa 'di sgrol ma thams cad kyi rig pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i phyag rgya ste// sgrub pa po dngos grub mnyam pa med pa 'dod pa rnams kyis thun
391a3(rgyud 'bum): mong du rtag tu sbyar bar bya'o/ / rkang pa 'khyog por byas nas ni// phyag rgya rnam par rgyas pa ni// lag gnyis brkyang byas 'khor lo dang // sngon du mthe bong bskum nas ni// khu tshur bcings te mthe bong
391a4(rgyud 'bum): dag/ mnyam par gshibs te brkyang bar bya// gung mo sbreng ba'i phyag rgya 'di// blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' yi// dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar grags pa yin// sgrub pos myur du sbyar bar bya// dngos
391a5(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad byed par 'gyur/ / dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o// legs par kha sbyar ba thal mo khong stong du 'gyur te// kha sbyar gyi phyag rgya'o// gang du mthe bong nang du bcug pa ni bzang po'i gdan no//
391a6(rgyud 'bum): bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya'o// thal mo khong stong des rab tu brjod pa'i kha sbyor gyi phyag rgya las ming med kyi sor mo yang dag par sbyar ba ni kha sbyor gyi phyag rgya'i gtso bo pad+ma'i rnam pa bod par zin ma kyi dz+ra
391a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes sgrub pa po tho dang ldan pas shes par bya'o/ / gdan gyi don du rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// phyag rgya 'di ni grags pa chen po'o// pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ni rab tu brjod pa de ut+pal de 'dir
391b1(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya'o/ / nas tsam rnam par grol ba ni phyag rgya pad+ma'i tog ni yan lag nyid do// ut+pa la'i phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang // sgrol ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya gang
391b2(rgyud 'bum): yin pa de phyag rgyar yongs su bsgrags so/ / tshogs gsum pa bcag pa ni khro gnyer can gyi'o// de kho na tshigs bar par gyur pa yang dag pa kho nar 'dod pa ni ting nge 'dzin yangs pa'i phyag rgyar gsungs so// sdigs
391b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzub dang mthe bong yang dag par sbyar ba'i phyag rgya ni ral gcig ma'i cod pan las so/ / dang po ting nge 'dzin yang dag par gsungs pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams phyag rgya gnyis pa ral gcig ma'i'o// phan
391b4(rgyud 'bum): tshun sbyar nas lhag ma phyi rol tu sgra'i rnam par rab tu brkyang nas dbus ma gnyis ni mdung gi rnam par legs par gnas pa'i phyag rgya ni mdung du yang dag par bshad do/ / lha'i 'bar bar byed pa dang yang dag
391b5(rgyud 'bum): par mtshungs pa 'di bstan pa tsam gyis gdug pa rnams thams cad rnam par 'joms pa mdung gi phyag rgya'o/ / zhes pa phyag chen 'di rnams ni// dam tshig don du rab tu sbyar// gang gi yang dag shes byas
391b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / de yis dngos grub thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya lhag ma thams cad nyid// tshad med grangs med nyid du bya// phyag rgya yang dag yongs su bsgrags// mdor na 'di ru brjod pa ni// sems can sems ni dul
391b7(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams/ / las chen byed par mi nus pa// mdor bsdus 'dir ni brjod par bya// zhes pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i
392a1(rgyud 'bum): rtog par/ phyag rgya'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so// de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin sgom
392a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing las thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir/ gos dkar mo zhes bya ba rang gi rigs kyi rig pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs srung ba'i don dang / bgegs zlog pa'i don du gsungs pa'o//
392a3(rgyud 'bum): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai sha rA ya/ bo d+hi sat+kA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ daR+sha na/ paR+Sha Na/ b+h+yo shra ba Na/ sma ra N+ye na/ bA s+ya ma haM/ sarba satwa nAM/ sarba bya d+hi/ tsa kit+sa ka/
392a4(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ oM ka To/ bi ka To/ ka TaM ka Te/ ka Tu/ bi ka n+ya/ bi ka Te/ b+ha ga ba ti/ bi dza ye swA hA/ 'di ni gos dkar mo zhes bya ba de'i rig pa chen mo ste
392a5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa thams cad dang sngags rnams kyi dngos grub byed pa/ pad+ma'i rigs su rigs kyi rig pa 'dis bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / g.yog bsrung ba dang / ras ris gnas pa dang /
392a6(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams bsrung bar bya ba dang // ras ris grub pa 'di'ang khyed kyis sgrub thabs gsum byas nas sam// 'dun byas nas bzlas par bya'o// de nas rang gi lha'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste/ myur du dngos grub
392a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / bzlas pa'i mthar yang bgegs rnams srid pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas pas kyang nad med par 'gyur ro// nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / ring du 'tsho bar byed do// bde ba'angs
392b1(rgyud 'bum): sor rnyed do/ / srad bus bdag nyid srung zhing phyir zlog pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo // de nas 'di'i phyag rgya nyid ni sgrol ma thams cad kyi spyi'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/ de nyid ni sdigs mdzub bcings nas 'khyil ba'i
392b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bya ste/ mthe bong phung yang kun tu btsar ba ni gos dkar mo'i phyag rgya'o// 'di'ang phyag rgya'i sgrub thabs kyi rig pa mnyam par 'gro ba gdon mi za ba ste/ dang por zhabs la phyag byas nas de nas
392b3(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad bya'o/ / yang rtog pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po chen po 'dir 'phags ma sgrol ma dang // sgrol ma thams cad kyi sgrub pa mngon par mdzes pa thams cad dang / srung ba dang / nyes pa byas pa
392b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rmog par byed pa/ 'phags ma sgrol ma thams cad kyi rtog pa'i cho ga rab tu sbyor ba sgrub nus par 'gyur te/ de'ang gang zhe na/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai sha rA ya/ bo d+hi sar+b+ba ya/
392b5(rgyud 'bum): mahA satwA ma/ tsan+de tsan+de ma ti sUN+ye/ sUr+ya ma tI/ d+hu ni g+hu na/ la ya/ le le/ sU te sU ta ni/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/ pa rA ba ma sAH/ a mi tA b+hA su u0f7f sAt+ma/ sarbe t+yai Ar+ya a ba lo ki he shwa rA ya sAhA/ 'di'ang 'phags pa b
392b6(rgyud 'bum): zang po zhes bya ba 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rig pa chen mo nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o/ / gang 'di sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i cho ga rab 'byam spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs dang / phyag rgya'i cho ga
392b7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa de thams cad 'phags ma sgrol ma'i tha bas bsgrub par bya'o/ / zhes kun tu rtog par bya'o// rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang sgrub par byed do// rtog pa med pas kyang mngon spyod kyi
393a1(rgyud 'bum): las 'di byed de/ phyag 'tshal ba'i yi ge spangs nas// rig pa 'ba' zhig gi swA hA'i gnas su hUM phaT sbyin par bya'o// rtog pa gzhan gyi tshogs kyang 'o// gang 'dod pa de
393a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ / yang na nye bar 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro// mdor na gang 'dod pa de sgrub par byed do// de nas sems dpa' chen po des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
393a3(rgyud 'bum): la gzigs nas/ / bsam pa rnam par dag pas sems dpa' chen po rnams la smras pa/ gang rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir sgrub par 'gyur ba dang // mchod par 'gyur ba dang // yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba de
393a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la kun nas dga' ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// srung bar byed
393a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / gang du rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ba mchod rten du 'gyur ba dang // sa phyogs de gang nyid kyi lag mthil du phyin par 'gyur ro// mchod pa 'di lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
393a6(rgyud 'bum): rten na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob pa des thams cad du rnal 'byor du bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi stobs dang stobs med pa shes nas rab tu gsal
393a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / 'di'ang gtsang ma'i phyogs su thams cad kyis rab tu spyod par 'gyur gyis/ gzhan du ma yin no// gang zhig byed pa de mngon par 'dod pa med pa sems can gyi bsam pa
393b1(rgyud 'bum): spangs pa dang / chos dang chos smra ba po la ma gus pa la mi 'jug pa'i rab tu sbyor bas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir sgrub po thams cad kyis bsrung ba'i don du lhag ma dang lhag ma mad
393b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang ru nga ste/ gtsang sbra byas pas bsrung ba'i don du rig pa'i rgyal po sngags su 'gyur ba ni// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ oM a mri ta ud b+ha
393b3(rgyud 'bum): pab hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni rta mgrin zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po ste/ thal ba la lan bdun mngon par sngags pas bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / g.yog bsrung ba la mdung ba'i spyod pa bya'o// rtog pa'i
393b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'di'ang rgyal lam/ tha skar yang rung ste dge ba'i sbyor ba la mchod pa dang / gtor ma'i cho gas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas chos dang chos yang dag par sdud pa po la'ang bsod snyoms dang / theg pa chen po
393b5(rgyud 'bum): pa la bza' ba gya nom pa dang / khyad par du yon dang bcas pa'o// de nas 'di rdzogs par bya'o// de bzhin du bya ste rtog pa'i rgyal po ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i gsang sngags bklag par byaste/
393b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du dman par mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar myur du dngos grub nyid kyang stsol bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
393b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'a'o/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che shin tu rgyas pa chen po nyid kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po ral pa gyen du brdzes pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mang
394a1(rgyud 'bum): ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ri'i rgyal po gru 'dzin na bzhugs te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/
394a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po de bshad do// de ni
394a3(rgyud 'bum): phyi ma'i rgyud gsang ba pa de gsang chen phyi ma dang bcas pa thabs sla ba bde blag tu bsgrub pa/ / cho ga dang bcas pa mngon du 'gro bas brjod pa// snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid can// skye bo mang po la phan padang
394a4(rgyud 'bum): skye bo mang po la bde ba'i ched dang / / sdug bsngal gyi sa gdungs pa rnams la snying brtse ba'i ched dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa// sgrol ma thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i
394a5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa/ / ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po nyid kyi sbyor ba rnams shod cig/ bcom ldan 'das la// sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
394a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba dang / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang bar mdzad na bshad par bgyi'o// dang po kho nar sgrub pos re zhig skyabs gsum yongs
394a7(rgyud 'bum): su bzung ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / ral pa gyen brdzas su ji skad gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong zhing dam tshig dang / slob dpon gyis rjes su gnang ba dang // sgrub pa'i thabs dang / mngon par
394b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba/ / bla ma la yon phul nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rig pa blangs te ras ris kyi spyan sngar ram/ sku gzugs kyi drung du slar yang sgrol ma gang yang rung ba'i rig pa blang bar
394b2(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te 'bum bzlas par bya'o// dus phyis mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas zla ba nya la sku gzugs sam/ ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa dang gtor ma'i
394b3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga byas nas/ 'o ma can gyi shing gis lam shing gis me sba ran/ seng ldeng ngam a ka ru nag po'i yam shing sor drug pa'i tshad kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// nam langs khar mtshan mo mchod pa ches rgya chen po
394b4(rgyud 'bum): dang gtor ma'i cho ga ji ltar 'byor pa byas nas/ slong mo'i zas zos nas dngos grub stsal bar bya'o// de nas rig pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas las thams cad bya'o// yang 'dir mchog tu gsang
394b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas// dkyil 'khor de nyid du dam tshig dang me'i bya ba gnas par ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas rig pa sgrub par 'dod
394b6(rgyud 'bum): pas sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rig pa rnam par gsang ba'i ji skad gsungs pas dkyil 'khor gzhan gsum bri ste/ / bla ma la yon rab tu phul nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rig pa blangs nas 'o ma can gyi shing
394b7(rgyud 'bum): gi yam shing gis me sbar nas/ dang por re zhig tu Ti'i tshad kyi gser gyi phye ma la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o// de nas a ka ru nag po'i yam shing mtho gang tsam gyi tshad dang mar
395a1(rgyud 'bum): @rnams kyi sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/ / tsan dan dkar po'i yam shing la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o// de nas slar yang gser gyi phye ma la mar gyis
395a2(rgyud 'bum): btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/ / de nas dngul gyi phye ma la sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o// de nas ra gan gyi phye ma la 'o mas btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o//
395a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas phangs kyi phye ma la zhos btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o// de nas mu tig gi 'bras bu'i phye mas sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o// de nas tsan dan dmar po'i phye mas sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o//

395a6(rgyud 'bum): lan re yongs su bzlas nas/ de nas gu gul dang / shri pA sa dang / gan+d+ha ra sa dang / kun tu ru ka dang / ga pur rnams gcig tu byas nas mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun dbul bar bya'o//
395a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas ji ltar rnyed pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa rnams kyi sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas dri bzang po'i me tog rnams kyi sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas dri bzang po'i me tog
395b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/ / de nas bza' ba mchog gi sreg zugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i sbud pa cha dang bcas par byas pa la mar gyis btags pa'i sreg

396b1(rgyud 'bum): de dang 'di kho na'i lag mthil du dngos grub so sor gnas par rjes su rtogs par bya'o// las 'di'ang gso sbyong can gyis sngon bzlas pa byas pas ngag 'phags pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya'o//

399b1(rgyud 'bum): dbyar gyi dus tshod la nges par sgrub par byed do// pu shel tsa dang / bA la kaM dang / sau ba tsa la dang / lan tshwa dang gzugs brnyan gcig tu byas pa la nam mkha'i chus btags nas srang nyi shu
