399b4(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu byas te nam mkha'i chus btags nas srang sum cu pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan bya ste/ mgo bo nas brtsams nas lag pa g.yas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing dong ka'i shing
399b5(rgyud 'bum): gis me sbar nas/ zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// 'di ni nges par ma ngag gzhug pa bzhin du kun tu sbyor ro// 'di ni cho ga gzhan te
399b6(rgyud 'bum): sardzi ka dang / 'o ma dang / nas kyi 'gyur byed dang / shu dag dang / sran ma mA sha dang / til rnams gcig tu bsres nas lus kyi chus btags te mi bdag gi gzugs brnyan srang sum cu pa
399b7(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ a mra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la lag pa g.yas pas mgo bo nas brtsams te gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag
400a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bya'o/ / rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// 'di ni cho ga gzhan mchog ste rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa dang sa la ma lhung ba'i 'byung gcig tu byas nas// nas kyi 'gyur byed dang lhan
400a2(rgyud 'bum): cig nam mkha'i chus btags te srang sum cu'i tshad kyis rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas te/ zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la u dum ba ra'i shing gi me la lag
400a3(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yas pas ral gri rnon pos rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams te gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/ / zhes pa 'di rnams ni dbyar gyi dus kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rnams te/
400a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di kho na la dngos grub nye bar 'gyur ro// yang 'dir gzhan 'byung ste/ dgun smad kyi du kyi sgrub pa ni gang du dus gcig tu sgrub par byed de/ 'bru'i phub ma dang / nas kyi tshogs dang / ga bi na dang //
400a5(rgyud 'bum): shu dag rnams gcig tu btags nas srang lnga bcu'i tshad kyis sa'i bdag po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas// zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod la nim pa'i shing gi me la nub tu mog
400a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhag nas rkang pa shar du phyogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi mgo bo nas brtsams te lag pa g.yas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong bya'o/ / rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro//
400a7(rgyud 'bum): cho ga gzhan ni a ru ra dang / skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu dang / shri bA sa ka dang / kun tu ru ka dang / ba las byung ba'i mar rnams lhan cig btags pa srang sum cu'i mi bdag gi gzugs brnyan byas
400b1(rgyud 'bum): nas gzugs brnyan nub tu mgo bzhag ste sngar bzhin du pA la sha'i me la zla ba gcig tu nyim so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod la me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ / rgyal po mngag gzhug pa
400b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ro/ / cho ga gzhan ni ba ru ra'i 'bras bu dang / nas dang / tsi ka sa 'dab ma dang / rtsa ba dang bcas pa dang / til dang / yungs kar dkar po rnams gcig tu byas
400b3(rgyud 'bum): te ba las byung ba'i mar dang lhan cig btags nas srang sum cus rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas te/ / mgo nub tu bstan nas sngar bzhin u dum ba ra'i shing gi me la zla ba gcig tu nyin zhag so
400b4(rgyud 'bum): sor sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ / sa'i bdag po gdon mi za bar dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni rgya mtsho nas byung ba'i lan tshwa dang / bu ram dang / skyu ru rA'i 'bras bu rnams dang / yungs
400b5(rgyud 'bum): kar dkar po gcig tu byas te yang dag par btags pa srang sum cus rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas te mgo bo nub tu'o/ / sngar bzhin du 'o ma can gyi shing gi me la zla ba gcig tu nyin zhag so sor ji ltar 'dod
400b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus tshod la me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal po bka' bsgo ba rjes su sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/ / cho ga gzhan ni rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa dang / nas dang / til dang /
400b7(rgyud 'bum): ram rnams gcig tu byas te ba'i mar gyis kun tu btags pa srang lnga bcu sa rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas/ nub tu mgo bo bzhag ste sngar bzhin du ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dus tshod la zla ba gcig tu
401a1(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma so sor sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad brgya bya'o/ / rtag tu mngag gzhug pa bzhin du nye bar 'gror// zhes pa 'di rnams ni dgun gyi dus kyi sgrub pa rnams grub par byed pa'o//
401a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid la'o// 'di rnams ni mchog tu gsang ba'o zhes pa ste/ slar yang rig pa 'dzin par gyur cig/ gsang ba'i sgrub pa la sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i dus can gyi dngos grub g.yo bar byed de/ ji skad
401a3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa'i dus nges par gyur pa so ga la sogs pa rnams la las byas pa'o/ / de nas gang gis rgyal po 'di rtag tu kun tu cings par 'gyur ro// dngos grub nyams pa'ang med de/ las gzhan
401a4(rgyud 'bum): dang lhan cig de yod pa'o/ / yang cho ga gzhan ni grub pa gang gis 'bor gyu yang yin pa de rnams ni sems can gyi bye brag las sam// cho ga med pa 'am/ 'byung ba nyid las sam/ dbang po
401a5(rgyud 'bum): ma tshang ba nyid las sam/ slob dpon gyi man ngag med par rang gi rig pa bzung ste ston pa'i bka' so sor 'brang bas mang po mi shes te bla ma dam pa med pa las sam/ nus pa dang bral ba las sam
401a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzas ma mthong bas rtog pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la phul ba dang / bla ma dam pa sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa la bdag nyid shes pa med do zhes ma zhum pa dang ldan pas rtogs pa'ang med cing / mthong ba'ang
401a7(rgyud 'bum): med par las chen po'i sgrub pa rnams shes par byed pa/ bsod nams ma yin pa smra ba/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam
401b1(rgyud 'bum): dge bsnyen ma'ang rung ste/ / rang gi bslab pa'i mtshams zhig la// lam par gyur pa'i ltung ba la zhugs pa 'am/ byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba 'am/ mtshams med pa byas pa 'am/ slob dpo/
401b2(rgyud 'bum): kha brnyas pa 'am/ mchod rten gyi gnas la rdog pas brdzis pa 'am/ slob dpon gyi grib ma la 'gom par byed pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la'ang brnyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
401b3(rgyud 'bum): la sdang bar gyur pa 'am/ lha thams cad la brnyas pa ste/ nyes pa 'di rnams kyis las gzhan byas pa de yang dag par byas pa ma yin// rnam pa gzhan du byas par 'gyur te/ de dngos grub dang
401b4(rgyud 'bum): bral ba ni de nyid kyi cho ga las 'das pa'i phyir ro/ / gang la la 'di rnams byed pa de'i dngos grub de skad cig la gcig la jig par byed de/ rig pa cung zad bzlas pa ni dus gzhan du kun tu gnas te
401b5(rgyud 'bum): gang yang sgrub pa'i dus can gyi dngos grub ma yin pa de 'dir 'gyur ro/ / slar yang rig pa 'dzin pa gang zhig gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i cho gas rgyal po'i rkang rjes kyis blangs la/ bar skabs 'dir brgyad brgya 'am/
401b6(rgyud 'bum): lnga brgyar sreg blugs mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg byed do// de nyid dus thams cad du byed pa'i rgyal po ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba la'ang ji skad gsung
401b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus kyi sgrub pa byed pa la nges par dngos grub mnyam pa med par 'gyur te/ dngos grub nyams yang mi 'gyur ro// de nas yang sems dpa' chen po stong phrag brgyad ci'ang mi gsung bar gnas par
402a1(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa ldan pa chen thob/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug skye bo du ma'i nang du lhung ba dge ba'i
402a2(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa'i mched chung ngu de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te mngon par phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag
402a3(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal te/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces smas so// sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can thams
402a4(rgyud 'bum): cad la kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsungs shig/ sems dpa' chen po gsungs shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / sems dpa' chen po des nying
402a5(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom zhing mig 'dzums pa'i bgegs dang bral bas/ bcom ldan 'das la kun tu lta zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la
402a6(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ gang khyod snying rje chen po don dam pa/ mchog tu gsang ba/ lhan cig pa'i rgyud thams cad kyi rjes su son pa gang yin pa 'di rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod par bya/
402a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur te/ mchog tu tshul khrims 'chal pa'ang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad kyi dpal yang gang la la bcom ldan 'das
402b1(rgyud 'bum): ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / shes par 'gyur ba dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur ba dang / 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang / sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod par 'gyur ba dang
402b2(rgyud 'bum): glegs bam du bris nas rang gi khyim du 'jog par 'gyur ba dang / nyal ba'i dus dang / mal nas ldang ba'i dus su mgo la 'jog par byed par 'gyur ba de'i phung krol chen po thams cad yongs su spangs
402b3(rgyud 'bum): te longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro/ / tshe ring po nyid du'ang 'gyur ro// mdor na gang yang bdag gi rgyud ma lus pa shes par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' chen po de lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la
402b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ro/ / de rnams 'dis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba des na bshad par byed do// de nas sems dpa' chen po skad cig gcig la ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal
402b5(rgyud 'bum): po sgom zhing rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin du gyur pas ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa/ mnyam par gsung ba
402b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i phyag can/ lha'i lus chen po/ lta bar mi dpogs pa'i sku/ sems can thams cad kyi grol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lte ba gang cung zad ldog par nus pa mthong nas/
402b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma yid la byas te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la rab tu btud de rin po che'i pad+ma la nye bar 'dug ste smras pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sbyor ba dang / sgrub pa so so dang
403a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' so so'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i myu gu rnams la nges par phan ma dang bde ba'i ched du/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi thabs mkhas pa'i bya ba gang
403a2(rgyud 'bum): gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i ched dang / sa dang por so sor thob pa'i ched dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i ched du/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha
403a3(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha la sgyur ba/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po rgyun du nye bar bskyed pa/ de bzhin kho nar bsod nams kyi mthus sems can rnams kyi
403a4(rgyud 'bum): gong du rab tu bsngags pa'i mtshan bzang pos brgyan pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por skye bar 'gyur ro// de yang byang chub sems dpa' rigs gang gis sngon byas pa'i las rnams kyis de bzhin du bya ba'ang rtag
403a5(rgyud 'bum): tu rang nyid 'khor los sgyur ba de'ang dbang du bya ste/ sngon brjod pa'i las rnams kho nas so// de las kyang sa thams cad pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par ma dang ba rnams rab
403a6(rgyud 'bum): tu dang ba nyid kyis dkyil 'khor par yang 'gyur ro/ / yul gyi dpon po 'am/ ji lta bu'i bsod nams des sems can rnams kyi gong du rgyal po byed du 'jug go// nye bar longs spyod dang yongs su longs spyad par bya/
403a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang rab tu byed do// de'ang gal te sngar brjod pa'i las kho nas des 'bangs bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang du byed pa'i sgrub par 'gyur te/
403b1(rgyud 'bum): sto dang / so ga dang / dbyar gyi dus rnams su nges par sgrub par byed do// rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed pa la ni de'i rkang pa'i rkang rjes kyi rdul dang skye tshe mnyam par byas pa zla ba gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i
403b2(rgyud 'bum): dus tshod la dus gcig tu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro/ / cho ga gzhan ni sna ma'i me tog dang til bsres pas sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni dur b+ha'i myu gu dang lhan cig pa'i
403b3(rgyud 'bum): ske tshes zla gcig tu sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro/ / cho ga gzhan ni nim pa'i sa bon rnams pa shi dang / kak+ShA kA ma dang / phye ma rnams lan tshwa dang bsres pas zla ba gcig tu ji
403b4(rgyud 'bum): ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro/ / cho ga gzhan ni til dang ardzu na'i me tog bsres pa la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad kyis dbang du 'gyur ro//
403b5(rgyud 'bum): chog gzhan ni nim pa'i sa bon rnams dang tshwa ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal po mdun na 'don dbang du byed par 'dod pas skye che la zho dang /
403b6(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad zla ba gcig la ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas brtsams nas dus gcig tu sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas nas dbang du 'gyur ro//
403b7(rgyud 'bum): cho ga gzhan ni sran ma tsa Na ka la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni irgu da'i til mar gyis sbyin sreg bya ste sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro//
404a1(rgyud 'bum): de rnams thams cad la dong ka'i lam shing gi me la sbyin sreg gam/ pa lA sha'i me la'ang rung ngo // zam ze dbang du byed pa la 'o ma can gyi shing gi me la til gyi sbyin sreg zla ba gcig tu
404a2(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas brtsams nas dus gcig la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar seng ldeng
404a3(rgyud 'bum): gi shing gi me la sbyin sreg byas na sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro/ / rje'u rigs dbang du byed pa la 'bras sA li'i zan zho dang lhan cig pa a mra'i shing gi me la sbyin sreg bya ste sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro//
404a4(rgyud 'bum): dman thams cad dbang du byed pa tsher ma can gyi yam shing gis me sbar nas ske tshe dang / dug dang // nim pa lhan cig pa'i sbyin sreg zla ba gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la brtsams nas dus
404a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig la stong phrag brgyad byas na de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang 'dir 'byung ba ni thun mong du mchog dang / 'bring dang / tha ma sgrub pa'i las ni yungs kar dkar po stong phrag
404a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad gang bstan bya'i sbyin sreg byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bud med dbang du byed pa la til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro// nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la yungs kar dkar
404a7(rgyud 'bum): po la mar dang / zho dang // sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o// gang bstan bya nyi ma gsum la dbang du 'gyur ro// gzhon nu ma dbang du byed par 'dod pas raM ga Na'i
404b1(rgyud 'bum): me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / spra tshil las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas bdag nyid kyi lag par bzhag ste stong phrag
404b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bzlas na gang bstan bya de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi spyan sngar me tog dkar po brgyad brgya dbul bar bya ste/ gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// dung dang / gla rtsi dang / shu dag dang / gi'u wang
404b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgya spos rnams gcig tu byas nas btags par bya'o// stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas 'di btungs pas sam/ gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// bram ze mo dbang du byed pa
404b4(rgyud 'bum): la ras ris kyi spyan sngar bil ba'i myu gu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / dur khrod du lan bdun bzlas pas bud med gang la skyes bu gang gis mdun du 'dug nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas
404b5(rgyud 'bum): pa byas pas dbang du 'gyur ro/ / sor mo bzhi pa'i shing blangs nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags te/ gang dang gang kun tu 'gugs par byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// me tog brgya pa stong phrag brgyad
404b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dbul bar bya'o/ / 'di la me tog gcig blangs nas bud med la bltas nas bskor bar bya ste 'ong bar byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro// 'o ma dang nas zan
404b7(rgyud 'bum): zhing phyogs gcig tu bzlas pa bya'o/ / de nas grog mkhar gyi sa las byung ba'i nor rgyas kyi bu byas nas de la nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid g.yo bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de lta bus grub par
405a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / nor rgyas kyi bu bdag nyid ma sha bcu gnyis kyi 'ba' ba sbyin par byed do// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i don ston par byed do// 'o ma
405a2(rgyud 'bum): dang nas zan za zhing sku gzugs kyi mdun du stong phrag brgya bzlas pas longs spyod so sor rnyed do/ / zla ba gcig tu bsod snyoms bza' zhing dkar po'i bcu bzhi la mtshan mo gcig tu smyung bar
405a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas pas sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mchod pa chen po byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang sku gzugs kyi zhabs dag la 'jus nas/ ji srid du sku gzugs g.yo bar gyur pade
405a4(rgyud 'bum): srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / g.yos pas gang mthong bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// yid kyis gang skyed par byed du 'jug go// lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gang+gA ra zhug
405a5(rgyud 'bum): te 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o/ / phyi nas de nyid du sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar bye ma las byung ba'i mchod rten byas nas sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma gcig tu byas te sbyin sreg bya'o// klu thams cad 'ong bar byed do// gang
405a6(rgyud 'bum): smras pa de thams cad byed do/ / ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas til mar gyis btags pa'i tsan dan gyi zhogs ma'i sbyin sreg bya ste/ gnod sbyin 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gang smras pa de thams cad
405a7(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / nags su ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling gcig tu byas pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'ong bar byed do// bka' bsgo ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//
405b1(rgyud 'bum): shing gcig tu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi mchod rten rab tu bzhugs nas 'bum phrag bzlas par bya'o// 'bum yongs su rdzogs pa na gso sbyong can gyi gzugs kyi rnam pas byang chub shing
405b2(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba rtse gsum mtshan nyid dang ldan pa byed du bcug nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste/ zla ba nya la dri bzang pos rab tu byugs nas ras ris la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas lag pa
405b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pas blangs te/ mtshan thog thag tu bsgrub par bya ste/ ji srid 'bar gyi bar du'o// 'bar bas 'byung po'i bdag po gnyis pa gdul dka' 'dul ba po sems can thams cad kyis mi
405b4(rgyud 'bum): tshugs pa'i lha chen por 'gyur ro/ / rgya mtshor zhugs te 'bum bzlas so// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa gang 'dod pa'i klu de mthong bar byed do// nor bu rin po che'ang 'di la rab tu stsol lo//
405b5(rgyud 'bum): de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ klu'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o// de nas gso sbyong can gyis
405b6(rgyud 'bum): las byed pas zangs kyi snod byed du bcug nas/ cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nya la 'bru dang sman thams cad kyis yongs su bkang bar byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar so sor bzhag ste/ ji srid 'bar
405b7(rgyud 'bum): bde srid du dazlas par bya'o/ / de dang der lag pa bcug nas gang 'dod pa de dang de 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snod bzang po'i sgrub thabs so// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas 'bum bzlas
406a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / phyi nas zla ba nya la nor bu'am sa las byung ba'i mchod rten byas te/ de nyid du ras ris byed du bcug nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nya la 'bru dang sman thams
406a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis yongs su bkang ba byas nas/ ras ris kyi spyan sngar so sor bzhag ste mchod pa chen po byas nas bzhag pa'i nor bu 'am sa las byung ba lag pa g.yas pas blangs te skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug la
406a3(rgyud 'bum): ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'chang ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas 'bum bzlas par
406a4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nya la mchod pa sna tshogs pa byas nas mar me'i 'phreng ba'ang rgya cher byas te/ lag pa g.yas pas rgyal mtshan gos dkar po 'phyang ba bzung nas ji srid
406a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / rgyal mtshan gyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gro'o// cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nya la ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas
406a6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam la dri bzang po'i dris so sor byugs nas/ dri zhim po'i me tog gi 'phreng ba dkris te lag pa g.yon pas bzung
406a7(rgyud 'bum): nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i
406b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu ma rab tu mdzes pa legs par khrus byas pa rgyan gyis brgyan par byas nas/ ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa bya ste/ lag pa g.yon pas rab tu bzung ste g.yas pa ji srid de
406b2(rgyud 'bum): dang thabs cig tu 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / ji lta ba bzhin du thabs cig tu rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// mtshan ma gcig pa'i steng du lag pa bzhag nas ji srid 'khor rnams mi mthong ba de srid du
406b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas par bya'o/ / ma mthong ba na sems can thams cad 'ongs nas grub pa gsum po thams cad sbyin par byed do// zla ba gzas bzung ba 'am/ nyi ma gzas bzung ba na ba bla byang chub shing gi 'dab ma'i nang du
406b4(rgyud 'bum): gtum par byas nas/ dbang phyug chen po'i lha khang du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// des thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'o ma
406b5(rgyud 'bum): dang nas zan bza' zhing rgya mtsho'i 'gram du 'am/ shing drung du thun gsum du stong phrag bzlas par bya'o// mtshan mo bdun du rgya mtshor gnas pa'i til rnams mthong bar byed do// ji ltar 'dod
406b6(rgyud 'bum): pa blang bar bya'o/ / mon sran sde'u za zhing ri la 'dzegs nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// mtshan mo nyi shu ri bo la gnas pa'i gser dang nor bu rin po che ston cing smra bar byed do// ji ltar
406b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa thang bar bya'o/ / rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i ngogs sam shing gi 'gram du zla ba gcig tu nyin mtshan du bzlas par bya'o// thams cad chu klung gi 'gras du mthong bar byed do// ji ltar 'dod pa nga
407a1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / skyes pa dang bud med dbang du byed pa la sol bas sa la gzugs brnyan bris te/ de'i steng du nye bar 'dug nas stong phrag brgyad nyin zhag gsumathun gsum
407a2(rgyud 'bum): du bzlas par bya'o/ / dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed par 'dod pas spra tshil gyis gzugs brnyan sor mo brgyad pa'i tshad byas nas seng ldeng gi sol ba'i bdug
407a3(rgyud 'bum): pa la zla ba gcig tu brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg bya'o/ / gos 'dod pas me tog dkar po yongs su mnyes pa rnams la lan cig yongs su bzlas pa'i chur gzhug par bya'o// mtshan mo bdun la gos rnams rnyed do//
407a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mar la stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa tsam gyis skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// bzlas pas brtan pa dang g.yo ba rnams khyad par du 'pho bar byed do// lcags las 'byung ba'i mdzub gang tsam gyi ral gri blangs
407a5(rgyud 'bum): nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste/ a shwat+tha'i 'dab mas g.yas nas bskor te ral gri rab tu bzhag nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par byas
407a6(rgyud 'bum): de blangs pas 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar 'gyur te/ rig pa 'dzin pa stong gis yongs su bskor ba rig pa 'dzin pa rnams thams cad kyis shes nas bar gyi bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// 'o ma
407a7(rgyud 'bum): dang nas zan bza' zhing 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o/ / sngon spyad pa byas pas nag po'i brgyad pa 'am/ nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dge 'dun gyi
407b1(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa can nam/ slong mo bos nas dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i ldong ros blangs te/ des ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du sa la pad+ma 'dab ma brgya pa bris nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma la nye bar 'dug ste/
407b2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma so sor ji srid du sa zos nas pad+ma gyen du 'gro ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// pad+ma'i 'dab ma la nye bar 'dug pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa nyi shu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i gzhal med khang yang 'byung
407b3(rgyud 'bum): ngo / / de nas de 'khor dang bcas pa de gzhal med khang la 'dzegs nas 'phur bar byed do// de'ang pad+ma rin po che du mas brgyan pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang du 'gyur ro// bar gyi bskal par 'tsho
407b4(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / bde ba can du'ang 'gro zhing sar yang 'ong bar byed do// lus tha dad 'dod ba dag tu skye ba so sor rnyed do// stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i chus shing skam po la gtor na ma chog
407b5(rgyud 'bum): radang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ / chu klung bskams par zhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya ste chu skye'o// chu klung rgyas par 'dzag par bzlas na thang du 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po
407b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byed par 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog rnams nag po'i brgyad pa la stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o/ / lan tshwa'i sreg blugs kyang stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// nges par
407b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/ / de nyid kyis brgyad pa nas brtsams te ji srid bcu gcig pa'i bar du ki'u wang la thun gsum du brgyad brgyar bzlas pa des thig le byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// khye'u 'am bu
408a1(rgyud 'bum): mo dbang du byed par 'dod pas gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar yungs kar stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ / gnas kyi thal ba blangs te gzugs brnyan byas na gang gis mings smos pa de dbang du
408a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gtsang ma'i don du ba'i mar blangs te zla ba gzas bzung ba 'am/ nyi ma gzas bzung ba'i dus su zangs kyi snod du bcug nas/ ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas
408a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / dro bzhin pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul bzhin pa la bcud kyis len no// 'bar bas mi snang ba dang skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// arka'i me tog 'bum gyi sbyin sreg
408a4(rgyud 'bum): byas na dong tshe 'bum sbyin par byed do/ / sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste rong tshe brgya rnyed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar 'bras sA lu dang / 'bras thug po che la mar gyis bta/
408a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dong tshe lnga brgya rnyed do// sngon spyad pa byas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// dong tshe sum
408a6(rgyud 'bum): brgya rnyed do/ / til nag po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// dong tshe brgya lhag par rnyed do// rigs kyi bdag po dang rigs kyi bdag mo dbang du byed par 'dod pas// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan
408a7(rgyud 'bum): sngar arga'i yam shing gis mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ / rigs kyi bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bdag po nyid du byed par 'dod pas sku gzugs kyi
408b1(rgyud 'bum): spyan sngar mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du dur b+ha'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/ rigs kyi bdag po nyid du 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dbang du byed par 'dod pas ras ris kyi
408b2(rgyud 'bum): spyan sngar arka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o/ / mtshan mo bdun du 'dod cing don du gnyer ba'i don gang yin pa smra bar bya'o// rtag tu bzlas pas nor rnams rnyed do// ras ris kyi spyan sngar gu gul gyi
408b3(rgyud 'bum): ril bu'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ / gser stong rnyed do// sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu kun tu ru'i bdug pa'i sbyin sreg stong bya'o// gter so sor rnyed do// sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar
408b4(rgyud 'bum): arka'i shing ga yam shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang // mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// dong che stong rnyed do// dgra bo dbang du byed par 'dod pas gso sbyong can gyis thun gsum du gzugs brnyan
408b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi spyan sngar pa la shA'i me la ske tshe'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ / dgra bo dbang du 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig gis dus la rgyu skegs kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// skye bo thams cad
408b6(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / 'bras sA li dang thug po che'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste thun gsum du kaR+sha pa Na brgya rnyed do// 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing 'bum bzlas par bya'o// sngon spyad pa byas
408b7(rgyud 'bum): pas nag po'i brgyad pa 'am nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la skyes bu'i ro ma nyams pa blangs nas bkrus te rgyan gyis brgyan pa bag mar blangs pa'i 'dod ma'i gzugs kyi cha byad 'dzin pa byas nas dri dang / me tog dang
409a1(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod de/ rkang pa g.yon pas brang khar yang dag par mnan nas spyi bor yang dang yang du rig pa bzlas te thal lcag gis bsnun par byas te langs pa de
409a2(rgyud 'bum): srid du'o/ / langs nas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ston par byed do// de nas rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i ral gris bsnun par bya'o// dngul dang gser gyi rang bzhin du
409a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas mi 'dod do zhes brjod par bya'o// 'dod pa byin cig ces so// de nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu skyug par byed do// de blangs nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ yid
409a4(rgyud 'bum): ltar mgyogs pa'i bar gyi bskal pa'i bar du gnas so/ / dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas nyin mtshan du spang bar gnas pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bor zhugs nas zla ba tsam mam/ ma Sha'i tshad kyi sna ma'i
409a5(rgyud 'bum): me tog 'bum rab tu 'bab par bya ste yul gru bcu rnyed do/ / dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas rgya mtsho r-i 'gro ba'i chu klung ngu pad+ma 'bum dbul bar bya ste gter sgrags ma rnyed do// sngon spyad pa byas pa
409a6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid chu klung du zhugs nas sna ma'i me tog 'bum dbul bar bya'o/ / mthar til nag po'i sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o// yul grur pa dang bcas pa bcu rnyed do// mya ngan med pa'i shing la sran ma tsa Na ka'i
409a7(rgyud 'bum): tshad tsam gyi ril bu byas nas sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg byas na gang cung zad tshol ba de rnyed do// a pA mArga'i yam shing la cho ga 'di kho nas gser
409b1(rgyud 'bum): stong rnyed do/ / mya ngan med pa dang De Di ka bsres la/ a pA mArga dang tan tu la gsum gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal po'i bu mo dang btsun mo rnyed do// rgyal po rnams blon po dang bcas
409b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dbang du byed par 'dod pas sku gzugs kyi mdun du mya ngan med pa'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas zla ba gcig tu mya ngan med pa'i me tog rnams kho na zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg
409b3(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag brgyad bya ste/ rang gi khyim du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du rked pa'i tshad kyi chur zhugs nas me tog brgya pa 'bum dbul bar bya'o// de nas me tog brgya pa la stong
409b4(rgyud 'bum): phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas nas gang gis bsnams pa'am mthong bar byin na de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed par 'dod pas zla ba gcig tu ske tshe zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang
409b5(rgyud 'bum): mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro/ / gang brjod pa de byed do// rgyal po'i nye ba dbang du byed pa la sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ske tshe zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / lhan
409b6(rgyud 'bum): cig pa rnams dang / de nas kyang li ta dang lhan cig pa dang / de nas kyang sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig pa rnams zla ba gcig tu thun gsum du ji ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal
409b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i mdun na 'don dbang du byed par 'dod pas mar dang lhan cig pa'i 'bras mos kyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ / rgyal rigs la'o thug dang bsres pas so// rje'u rigs la 'o ma dang lhan cig pas so// dmangs rigs la
410a1(rgyud 'bum): til la til mar gyis btags pa rnams kyis so/ / gsum po thams cad la lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis so// lugs mo la ma sha'i sbyin sreg gis so// sems can thams cad la tsha
410a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ti la mar gyis btags pa'i til rnams kyis dbang du byed do/ / thams cad la zla ba gcig tu dus gcig tu pA la sha'i me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad pa'o// gtsang mar gyur pas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas
410a3(rgyud 'bum): te gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar bil ba'i yam shing gis me sbar nas bil ba'i sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o/ / gter mthong bar 'gyur ro// mtshan mo nyi shur 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing pA la sha'i me la yungs ker dkar po'i
410a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bya ste nor rnyed do/ / 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing 'bum phrag lngar bzlas par bya'o// de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu thun gsum du yungs kar dkar po la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong
410a5(rgyud 'bum): phrag brgyad bya ste/ nor gyi rgyun gang du 'dod pa der ltung bar byed do// zas bzhir smyung bar gnas pas yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o// rgyu skar gyi gnod pa nye bar zhi bar byed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar
410a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan bdun du bil ba'i shing gis me sbar nas til gyi sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o/ / gter mthong bar byed do// yang na dbang phyug nyid rnyed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/
410a7(rgyud 'bum): dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig tu pA la sha'i ma le me ton brgya pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o// ji ltar 'dod pa'i nor rnyed do// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du pa lA sha'i shing gis me
410b1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu sbar nas zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// yul gru bcu la spyod pa rnyed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te 'o ma dang nas zan za
410b2(rgyud 'bum): zhing pad+ma 'bum dbul bar bya'o/ / gter rnyed do// yang na dbang phyug rnyed do// 'di rnams kho na ku mu da'i cho ga ste rgyal po la gang tshol ba de rnyed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar bil ba dang til phan
410b3(rgyud 'bum): tshun bsres pas 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o/ / gter mthong bar byed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas pri yang ku'i zhogs ma rnams zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis
410b4(rgyud 'bum): btags pa'i bil ba'i me la 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o/ / longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te pad+ma zho dang /
410b5(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa 'bum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o// dbang phyug nyid so sor rnyed do// ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// de nas bu ram gyi yam shing sor gcig pa'i
410b6(rgyud 'bum): tshad 'bum phrag gsum sbyin sreg bya'o/ / ras ris rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur ro// me tog chun po g.yo bar byed pa dang / de nas rgyal srid so sor rnyed pa 'am/ yang na gang yid kyis bsam pa'o//
410b7(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu chen po dbang du byed pa la gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa rnams zla ba gcig tu thun gcig la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// dbang du
411a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / yul dbang du byed pa la gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar ka ra wI ra'i me tog la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// yul so sor rnyed
411a2(rgyud 'bum): do/ / yul gyi dpon po byed par 'dod pas dong ka'i me tog la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa 'bum phrag gsum sbyin sreg bya'o// yul gyi rje bor 'gyur ro// pa lA sha'i ma la'o//
411a3(rgyud 'bum): sde dpon nyid byed par 'dod pas gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar kun da'i me tog la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste sde dpon nyid rnyed do// gzugs brnyan gyi
411a4(rgyud 'bum): sman sngar pa lA sha'i me la btang bzung gi me tog la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg bya'o// yul gru'i rje bor 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar ka ra wI
411a5(rgyud 'bum): ro'i me tog la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gsum byas te rtsod pan gsum bcings par 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar nyi ma so so la mchod pa sngon du
411a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bas ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas brtsams te/ de nas arka'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas dri'i til mar gyis btags pa'i shing gser gyi phye mtshon gang tsam gyis stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o//
411a7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba drug gis rgyal srid so sor rnyed do// ma skyes pa'i longs spyod skye bar 'gyur ro// lo gsum gyis rgyal srid chen po so sor rnyed do// cho ga 'di nyid kho nas lcags las byung ba'i phye ma'i sbyin sreg bya ste/
411b1(rgyud 'bum): lo gsum gyis mtshon cha bcings par 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis gur kum gyi sreg zugs dri'i til mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro// dr-i thams cad
411b2(rgyud 'bum): sreg blugs dang / mar gyi sreg blugs 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas su dpon po byed do// yang na ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i yul so sor rnyed do// pa lA sha'i me nyid lag pur gyi sreg
411b3(rgyud 'bum): blugs mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste rgyal po dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / pa lA sha'i me la tsan dan gyi yam shing dri'i til mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// yul chen po'i dpon por 'gyur ro//
411b4(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi ngang tshul gyi sreg thugs 'bum pa lA sha'i me la sbyin sreg bya'o// sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// a ka ru'i yam shing la mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste thos pa 'dzin
411b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / bA sha ka'i yam shing la dri'i til mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste nad chen po nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// nim pa'i 'bras bu la dri'i til mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste/
411b6(rgyud 'bum): gang 'dod pa'i bcings pa de grol bar byed do// rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar blangs te 'bum mngon par bsngags te 'thung zhig/ mchog tu yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// arka'i me la arka'i me tog dri'i til
411b7(rgyud 'bum): mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyi gnang chen por 'gyur ro// de rnams thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du sbyin sreg bya'o//
412a1(rgyud 'bum): me tog gam 'bras bul lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas de gang la byin pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro// gso sbyong can gyis dkar po'i bco lnga la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten

418b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo gcod pa las dkar po ste/ sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par 'gyur ro// nyi zla gzas bzung ba na smyung bar gnas pa byas nas til mar la yongs su bzlas te/ til mar gyis gdong la bskus

418b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis brjod pas btso bar bya ste ji srid du chos kyi bar du'o/ / de nas zas kham dang po la lan gsum yongs su bzlas nas dus ma yin par brgyad brgyar bzlas pa byas nas de bzhag par bya'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams
418b5(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ / ngag kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ nyi ma re re la sho lo ka brgya 'dzin par byed do// de bzhin du nyi ma bdun du tshul lan bdun bzlas pas so// ldong ros a shwat+tha'i
418b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma'i nang du gtums par byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar a pA mArga'i yam shing stong phrag brgyad kyi sbyin sreg

419a6(rgyud 'bum): nyal mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas shing gi dbyug pa lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dro bzhin pa la smra bar bya ba 'dod pa thams cad myur du smra
419a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / dub 'thul bas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'bar bas nam mkha' la 'gro'o// ras ris la gos dkar pos kun nas g.yog par byas nas ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o//
419b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor stong dang bcas pa 'phur bar byed do// ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing mi smra bar ku sha bting ba'i mal stan la tshes gcig nas brtsams nas/ ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du 'bum phrag bcu drug bzlas

419b5(rgyud 'bum): gang cung zad bsams pa ma tshang ba med par phun sum tshogs so// phyogs gang du 'gro ba der bong ba la lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas 'phang bar bya ste/ gdug pa thams cad gnon par 'gyur ro// gos la

420a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du 'dab mar bzhugs su 'jug par byed na de'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yon tan brjod pa gzhal du med pa skye'o// de nas zhi ba can
420a2(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'dod na zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i dri zhim po'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mchog tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// rgyas pa can la til dang / 'bras

422b1(rgyud 'bum): ma na srang gcig zangs nas mes gdung bzang por byas nas mig sman gyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ zla ba gzas bzung ba na chur rab tu zhugs nas ji srid grul bum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par

423a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis til gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// arka'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gser srang brgya rnyed de// shing pi

424a1(rgyud 'bum): skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / ma nyams pa'i 'bras sA la dang thug po che rnams 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ grong rnyed do// mya ngan med pa'i shing gis
424a2(rgyud 'bum): me rab tu sbar nas lha'i sreg blugs 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ yul phyogs kyi rgyal srid so sor rnyed do// sra rtsi pog gi sreg blugs 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nya ma so sor dong tshe re re so
424a3(rgyud 'bum): sor rnyed do/ / dzA ti'i snying po 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ bu mo gang don du gnyer ba de so sor rnyed do// ras ris kyi spyan sngar a ka ru'i bdug pa sregs te 'bum bzlas so// de nas yul de'i

424a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nad las grol lo// 'o ma'i snod kyis a mra'i 'dab ma stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// pri yang ku'i snying po tshad
424a7(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa 'bum sbyin sreg byed pa tshad de'i dong tshe rnyed do/ / 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nad grol lo// bza' ba don du gnyer na bza' ba'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/
424b1(rgyud 'bum): ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te slong mo za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas a shat+tha'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas til la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang
424b2(rgyud 'bum): mar gyis btags pa mtshan thog thag tu sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rgyal por 'gyur ro// til dang mar gyi sbyin sreg gis thams cad sgrub par byed do// sbrang rtsis sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skye bo thams
424b3(rgyud 'bum): cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// zho'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rgyas par
424b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / ri'i rtse mor rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten bzhugs nas pad+ma stong phrag brgya phul cig/ rgyal po'am yul gyi bdag por
424b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / las rnams grub par ma gyur na yul gru brgya rnyed do// rgyal po dbang du byed pa dang kun nas 'dug par byed pa la zla ba gzas bzung ba na ba ser skya'i mar zangs kyi snod kyi snod du 'jog tu bcug
424b6(rgyud 'bum): nas zangs kyi thur ma la ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur gyi bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / lbu ba 'byung bzhin pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang bar 'gyur ro//
424b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bas nam mkha' la 'gro'o// mngon spyad pa byas pas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du me tog gi phur ma dang bla re yongs su bre ba byas nas dri zhim po'i dris mtho gang
425a1(rgyud 'bum): gi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor byas nas/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dri dang me tog gi mchod pa byas nas gtor ma dbul zhing / mar gyi mar me stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o//
425a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas sa ga'i zla ba nya la skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid gang du bai g+hasta ni ta zhes pa'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas myur du mtshan ma skye bar 'gyur te/ me tog gi chun po
425a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang / 'od zer 'byung ba dang / ras ris 'gul ba ste/ 'di rnams mthong nas gang sgrub par byed pa de 'grub ste/ sdig pa zad par yang 'gyur ro//
425a4(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dbang du byed par 'dod pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar
425a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du seng ldeng gi sol bas me rab tu sbar nas lan tshwa dang / til dang / yungs ka ra rnams zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin
425a6(rgyud 'bum): sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// chu dang / thal ba dang / yungs kar gang yang rung ba la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas phyogs bzhir thor cig/ dkyil 'khor bcing
425a7(rgyud 'bum): ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi spyan sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma phul nas mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste/ pad+ma'i 'dab mar gi'u wang bzhag nas skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid
425b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / dro bzhin pa la sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa dang lo stong du 'tsho bar byed do// du ba 'thul bzhin pa la lo stong du 'tsho
425b2(rgyud 'bum): bar byed cing dpag tshad stong phrag tu 'gro zhing de nyid du 'ong bar byed do/ / grub pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhing yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang / yid kyis bza' ba skyed par byed do// de nas
425b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bar byed pa ni nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog ltar snang ba/ lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa/ sgra li zhing tshe bskal par gnas pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas gang du
425b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do/ / sngon spyad pa byas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar cho 'phrul gyi zla ba'i phyogs la dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / gos lan gsum brjes te thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas so/
425b5(rgyud 'bum): ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du'o// mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas snam sbyar bsgrub par bya ste/ dri thams cad kyis rab tu byugs te mar me stong phrag brgyad sbar nas skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/
425b6(rgyud 'bum): ji rnams kyis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas de'i steng du snam sbyar bzhag ste lag pa g.yon pas mnan nas/ ji srid du 'phur bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'phral du shing ta la'i tshad du
425b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phur bar byed cing gnas pa tshad 'di nyid kho nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas blang bar bya'o/ / blangs pa tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang /
426a1(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mdun du bdar nas phyag byas par 'gyur zhing rtsi bgyir yang 'gyur ro// rtag tu snam sbyar la yongs su bzlas
426a2(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa ni de'i tshe sems bskyed pas gdug pa'i sems de sa la ltung bar byed do/ / yid kyis slar yongs su bzlas pas ldang bar byed do// mar gsar las byung ba'i nor bu byas nas a shat+tha'i 'dab ma bzhi la
426a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhag ste/ ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sos ma reg par zo zhig/ zos pa tsam gyis gang sems par byed pa de thams cad skye bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa mang po dang / skyes bu
426a4(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i stobs dang / lo stong phrag brgyad cur 'tsho bar byed do// sngon spyad pa byas pas zla ba nya la ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du
426a5(rgyud 'bum): dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ ku sha las byung ba'i ral gri la a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun la bzhag nas khu tshur gyi mdzub mos blangs nas/ ji srid du 'phro bar byed pa de srid du
426a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas par bya'o/ / de blangs pas nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do// sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par 'gyur ro// thal bas me'i ra ba'o// chus sam gseg mas phyogs bcing ba'o//
426a7(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin can gyi mig sman blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas mig la bsku bar bya ste/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// mig sman dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / shu dag dang
426b1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i ge sar dang / gi'u wang dang / nag ge sar dang / gla rtsil stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pas kun nas byugs shig/ thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// lan tshul lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
426b2(rgyud 'bum): tu mngon par bsngags pas gang gi khyim du mngon par phyogs pas 'thor bar byed na nyi ma bdun gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / khyor ba'i tshul lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas na gang gis khrus dang 'thub
426b3(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bdag gis mthong ba la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas ji snyed mthong ba de dbang du byed do// gu gul gyi sbyin sreg 'bum gyis rgyal srid so sor rnyed do// ut+pa la dang /
426b4(rgyud 'bum): ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka la sogs pa rnams 'bul bar byed bzhin pas ni gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do// zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas/ mtshan ma gcig par mchod pa
426b5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas lus kyi g.yas su tsan dan dmar pos dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas/ lag pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khor mnan nas 'bod bzhin pa'am/ ji srid dkyil 'khor sa nag por skyes pa de srid du bzlas
426b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / lag pa grub par 'gyur ro// khu tshur bcings pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gtsug pud sgrub pa la dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid mtshams su gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//
426b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas gtsug pud la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ ji ltar bsod snyoms ster ba pos mthong ba de'i tshe grub par 'gyur ro// nyi ma dang po la slong mo gcig go// de bzhin
427a1(rgyud 'bum): / du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du'o// bsod nams dang mi ldan pas kyang 'grub par byed do// zla ba gzas bzung ba na 'o ma la yongs su bzlas nas 'thung zhig/ bcud kyi len chen por
427a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / ba sha ka'i yam shing gi sreg blugs brgyas gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do// ral gril brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags te phug gam/ lha'i khyim gyi sgo ru gzhag par bya'o// sgo glegs la
427a3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par 'dud pas sgo dbye bar byed do/ / lan cig bzlas pas bdag nyid srung bar byed do// 'o ma'i sreg blugs kyis bud med dbang du 'gyur ro// yid kyis grub pa'i gsang sngags rnams rengs par
427a4(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / gsang sngags thams cad phye mar byed do// lha ma yin gyi bu mo dbang du byed do// dri thams cad kyi sreg blugs rgyal rigs kyi bud med dbang du 'gyur ro// lha de dri med kyi sbyin sreg gis mu
427a5(rgyud 'bum): stegs kyi brtul zhugs pa dang / rab tu byung ba dbang du 'gyur ro// snying kha dang lag par lag pa brgyar bzhugs nas zlos shig/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sems can thams
427a6(rgyud 'bum): cad 'gugs par byed do/ / mgo bo la lag pa bzhag nas brgyad brgyar zlos shig/ sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa dang sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// bil ba la yongs su bzlas nas byin na
427a7(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed do/ / lha'i lus kyi gams su dpag tu med pa bzlas par bya'o// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / rgan po'ang dbang du 'gyur ro// thal
427b1(rgyud 'bum): la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas go char bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyis mi phyed do// tshul brgyad brgyar bzlas pas yan lag rnams la sbyin du chug cig/ nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin
427b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas seng ldeng la ral gri byas nas/ nag po'i bcu bzhi la blangs nas dur khrod du ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// blangs pa des thogs pa med par
427b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa skra li zhing 'khyil ba/ tshe bskal par gnas pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mang du 'dod par 'gyur ro// yang na nyi ma dang zla ba gzas
427b4(rgyud 'bum): bzung ba na sngon spyad pa byas pas tho rangs langs nas ras ris la mchod pa byas te/ slong mo'i zas za zhing yon dang bcas pas dngos grub brtsal bar bya'o// de nas ngag gi las rab tu 'grub par
427b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ du ra ba dang byi ru la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'ching ba rnams grol bar byed do// bdag nyid mchog tu byed pa la gi'u
427b6(rgyud 'bum): wang la stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas dpral bar thig le byas te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin na mchog tu bsngags par 'gyur ro// blangs pa dang brjod pa'ang ngo // bu mo dbang du byed pa la sna ma'i me
427b7(rgyud 'bum): tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg nyis shig/ bu mo rnyed do// 'di nyid kyis rnam par rgyas pa'i bu med rnyed do// rims thams cad dang / gdon thams cadadang / phyag rgya thams cad kyang dgades
428a1(rgyud 'bum): byin pas grol bar byed do/ / dug thams cad gso bar byed do// gdon las thar bar byed do// ngag nyid kyis las rnams ni glang po zlog par byed do// tsher ma zlog par
428a2(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / chom rkun dang dmag sde rengs par byed pa dang / mtshon cha rengs par byed pa dang / shing rta rengs par byed pa dang / me rengs par byed pa dang / gru rengs par byed pa dang / 'gugs par bya
428a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mche ba can rnams sam/ mche ba med pa'ang rung ste 'bebs par byed pa dang / shi ba slong ba dang / de dang rims mngag par byed pa'o// 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing 'bum bzlas te mtshan
428a4(rgyud 'bum): mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ mtshan ma gcig par ku sha'i steng du bzhag ste mchod pa chen po byas nas/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byas te lus kyi g.yas su gnas
428a5(rgyud 'bum): pas ba bla dang / ldong ros dang / mig sman dang / btsod dang / gi'u wang rnams gcig tu byas nas a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du gtums te/ ji srid dngos grub rnams pa gsum gyi bar de srid du bzlas
428a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / dro bar byed pa dang / dung 'phrul ba dang / 'bar bste/ rdo bzhin pa la rkang 'thung la spyod pa dang / le stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do// sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// du ba
428a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul bzhin pa la mi snang ba dang / tshe lo brgya phrag bcu thub bo// 'bar bas rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag gi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bskal pa'i tshe dang gong nas gong du bzlas pa 'bum
428b1(rgyud 'bum): ces dag mngon par shes par 'gyur ro/ / s+yAng dang / 'og dang / phyogs rnams bcing ba dang / nges par len pa dang / tshig de'ang thogs pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas ro langs sgrub
428b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na mo man lag mnyams bzungs nas drung khrod dam/ shing gcig gam/ lam la ni mdo ma/ mtshan ma gcig par yang sa ste/ 'byung po thams cad pa la gtor mnye bar mchod nas/
428b3(rgyud 'bum): po'i lus kyi g.yas su dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te gtor ma phul nas/ khrus dang rgyan gyis btsun par byas nas/ thal bas dkyil 'khor bris te/ de'i dbus su mgo bo shar du bstan la gzhag cing ras dkar
428b4(rgyud 'bum): pos lus la g.yog go/ / grogs bzang pos phyogs skyong bar byed pa gnas su bcug nas/ de'i steng du skyil krung byas pa nye bar 'dug ste/ de'i khar til dang yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg 'di'i kha nas nor bu 'byin par
428b5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i bar de srid du bya'o/ / kha'i nor bu de blangs pas sgra li zhing 'khyil ba/ nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can gyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ glang po che stong gi stobs dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa'i gzugs can/ lha'i
428b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas su 'gro bar byed pa/ tshe bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do// ro langs gzhan ni cho ga 'di nyid kyis skyes bu'i ro blangs nas seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bsngags te/
428b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid srung ba dang / phyogs skyong ba rnams kyang ngo // de'i steng du nye bar 'dug ste/ mar gyi sreg blugs ji srid de'i kha nas lce byung gi bar de srid du sbyin sreg bya'o// sngar mngon par bsngags
429a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ral gris gcad par bya ste/ ji srid lce brgya byung shib de srid du'o// lce de nyid blangs pas 'khor brgya dang bcas pa 'phur bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog dang
429a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshon char 'gyur ro/ / bskal pa chen por gnas par byed do// nag po'i brgyad pa'am/ nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la rang rung ste/ mtshan mo rna ba'i mig sman btag par bya'o// stong phrag brgyad du mngon
429a3(rgyud 'bum): par bsngags pas mig la bskus pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do/ / dri la bzlas nas bsku bar bya ste/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// bdug pa la yongs su bzlas nas bdag nyid la
429a4(rgyud 'bum): bdug par gyis shig/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// me tog la yongs su bzlas nas mgo bor byin cig/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa dang dga' bar byed do// gtsug tor la
429a5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bzlas nas chings shig/ thams cad du srung ba dang / sems can thams cad 'ching ba'ang ngo // yugs sa mo dbang du byed par 'dod pas ma Sha'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'phral
429a6(rgyud 'bum): du dbang du 'gyur ro/ / gnod sbyin mo dbang du byed pa la pad+ma stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mtshan mo gsum gyis 'ong ngo // de nas ma 'ongs na mtshan mo bdun gyis 'ong bar byed do// de
429a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rdzogs par byed do// bu mo 'dod na 'bras yos kyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'dod pa'i bu mo rnyed do// dpal mo 'dod na pad+ma'i sbyin sreg kyis
429b1(rgyud 'bum): shig/ pad+ma 'am dpal mo 'ong ngo // rgyal ba 'dod na zho'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyas par 'dod na mar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nor thob par 'gyur ro//
429b2(rgyud 'bum): dus rtag tu gtsang mas mtshan mo lngas sha za ba rnams dang / mtshan mo dgus gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams dang / mtshan mo badru gnyis kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams dang / zla ba phyed kyis dri za dang / chus
429b3(rgyud 'bum): byung dang / nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gis lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsaM dang / lha mo rnams dang / mtshan mo nyi shu rtsa bzhis tshogs thams cad dang / zla bas rgyal po'i
429b4(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo ste/ dbang du byed pa la ro zhim po'i snye ma zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// skyes pa dang bud med dbang du byed pa
429b5(rgyud 'bum): la yungs kar dkar po la zho btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nor rnyed do// ka ra wI ra dmar po dang / dong ka'i me tog 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rgyal po'i bu mo rnyed do// bil ba
429b6(rgyud 'bum): zhos btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ khyim du dpal mo 'byung ngo // me tog brgya pa la zhos btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dong tshe brgya rnyed do// gser mdog can gyi yam shing
429b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ ba langs stong so sor rnyed do// me tog 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ yul so sor rnyed do// arka'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dong tshe stong rnyed do//
430a1(rgyud 'bum): / mar gsar gyi sreg thugs 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ yul gru lnga so sor rnyed do// pit+tA ra ka'i me tog 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gos bye ba bzhi rnyed do/
430a2(rgyud 'bum): 'o ma'i sreg thugs 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ ba lang dang nor yongs su gzhal brnyed do// byang chub shing gi lam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mablangs par khyim phun sum tshogs par
430a3(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / sna ma'i me tog 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rnam par btags pa'i gos zung brgya rnyed do// pA man+t+ra'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgya'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mtshan mo bdun gyis bram ze
430a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byed do/ / ku mu da 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ chung ma dbyig dang bcas pa rnyed do// re'i rtse mor 'dzegs te 'bum zlos shig/ yul gang du bzlas pa byed pa'i yul de'i rgyal po de 'od
430a5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ don du ma gnyer bar bu nyid dang nor thams cad rnam par 'byor par 'gyur ro// bu dang bcas pa srung bar byed do// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te dri zhim po'i me tog 'bum lkug ci/
430a6(rgyud 'bum): phyis me tog rgyun las thog phyogs su 'ong ngo // sos ma reg par bza' bar bya'o// nyi ma re re la gzhung lnga brgya 'dzin par byed cing de rnams 'chang bar byed do// sngon spyad pa byas pas gzugs
430a7(rgyud 'bum): brtan gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzla'o/ / de nas gang du gter gnas pa der song nas rtsu ba dang nag po med pa'i bum pa thams cad dri zhom pos byugs par byas nas/ tsan dan dkar po dang chus yongs su
430b1(rgyud 'bum): bkang ba byas te stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa cho gas gnas su gzhag par bya'o/ / sa thams cad 'gas par byed do// gal te gter mi gang tsam du'ang gnas par byed do// chus mi
430b2(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa steng du gnas so/ / dran pa tsam gyis nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do// bud med gang mi 'dod pa de'i ming smos nas mar la yongs su bzlas nas 'thung zhig/ skal ba bzang
430b3(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje sgrub thabs ni rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i rdo rje sor bcu drug pa rtse mo gsum pa byas nas tsan dan dmar pos rjes su byugs nas/ cho 'phrul gyi phyogs la tshes gcig nas brtsa mA tre
430b4(rgyud 'bum): ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas nyi ma so sor phyag 'tshal bzhin pas bsod snyoms bza' bar bya'o/ / mthar mtshan mo smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas/
430b5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa rgya chen po byas te mar gyi mar me brgya rab tu sbar nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ rdo rje gnyis ka dag kyang lag pa dag gis bzung nas ji srid du bzung bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//
430b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su 'khor ba bdun du 'phur bar bya ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar byed do// rgyal gyi zla ba la mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'og tu mtshan mo gsum
430b7(rgyud 'bum): du smyung bar gnas pas na le sham stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya zhing / na le shi ma gcig khar bcug nas rnam par lta bar byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// nag po'i brgyad pa 'am nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin
431a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas gos gtsang ma 'gos te/ ras ris kyi spyan sngar mar me dang / rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi 'brang ba la sogs pa phul nas/ rang nyid kyimam
431a2(rgyud 'bum): sor btags pa'i chu zangs kyi snod du bzhag nas blun tshod gcig tu bzlas pa 'thungs nas/ slar yang cho ga de nyid kyis mtshan thog thag ji srid par ro// tho rangs dge 'dun gyis bstan pa can gyi slong mo bza'
431a3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / zos nas mar dang / phye dang / sa 'bru rnams kyang zos na gang gi tshe gnyid 'ong bar byed do// phyogs bzhir rig pa'i gnas rnam mkhar rab tu 'jug par byed de thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rgya
431a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcings nas nyi ma bcu gsum du zlos shig/ dug dang mche ba rnams kyis shi ba thams cad slong du 'jug par byed do// khu tshur gyis gdon thams
431a5(rgyud 'bum): cad 'jug par byed cing thar par yang byed do/ / sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis khru bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas/ nag po'i brgyad pa la sharka ra'i yam shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar
431a6(rgyud 'bum): gyis btags pa nyi ma re rer stong phrag brgyad brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ ji srid bcu bzhi pa'i bar du'o// las 'dis khros pa'i rgyal po'i pho zang rab tu dang bar byed do// grogs dang ldan pas nags su
431a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu zhugs te/ shing ku pi ta'i mol bas ming bris nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de nas khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sngon spyad pa byas pas klog par
431b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i shing sor mo drug pa blangs nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas phur bu de lcags gsum dang ldan pa byas nas bum
431b2(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhi sman thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba pad+ma bting ba la gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas phur bu de rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste/ ji srid lag pa nyams pa de srid du bzlas
431b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / de nas lag pa grol lo// de nas tho rangs gtor ma chen po byin nas se 'bru bza' bar bya ste/ de 'grub par 'gyur ro// khyim gzhan du phur bu de gdab par bya ste/ 'dod pa sbyin par 'gyur
431b4(rgyud 'bum): zhing yo byad thams cad kyang 'byung ngo / / bton pas thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sna ma'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas me tog rnams zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag
431b5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ / dong tshe lnga rnyed do// a mra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas chu klung gi 'gram du zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i arka'i yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o//

431b7(rgyud 'bum): ra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas dkar po'i brgyad pa nas brtsams te ji srid dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa'i bar du ka ra wI ra'i zhogs ma 'o mas btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg ces shig/ dong che stong so sor

432a2(rgyud 'bum): de'i 'o ma phyogs dben par bum pa bzhag la bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas dkrugs nas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag pas rdzas 'di rnams 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o// de nas ril bu lcags gsum gyis yongs su dkris
432a3(rgyud 'bum): pa byed du gzhug go/ ser skya de nyid kyi ba byung lnga'i ril bu rab tu badrug ste/ mtshan mo gcig gzhag par bya'o// de nas phyung ste ba'i chus bkru bar bya'o// pad+ma'i 'dab mar gi'u wang gis mngon par

432a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'adzin pas ril bu brgyad blangs nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha sbyor du pad+ma'i mtsho ru song nas ras ris bzhugs su gsol te pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dpal mo 'ongs te mchog sbyin par byed do// pad+ma'i sa bon dang /

432b1(rgyud 'bum): kuran+ta ka'o sa bon dang / 'bru dang / sran ma'i myu gu dang / ru rta dang / rtsa spos dang / tu ru skA dang / til rnams cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas nas pa ser skya'i mar gyis ril bu byed du gzhug go// sngon du sgrub pa
432b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad brtsams par bya'o/ / rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du byed par 'dod pas ku sha las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa g.yon pas mnan te zlos shig/ 'khor dang bcas pa

433a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i 'dab mas dkris pa'i ril bu blangs nas ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / bsnyen pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis ril bu de ji srid du ba 'thul ba dang 'bar ba de srid
433a2(rgyud 'bum): du'o/ / dro bzhin pa la ni dbang du byed pa'o// du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang ba'o// 'bar bas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do// shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar
433a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / yungs kar dkar po la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa gang gi mgo la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal po dbang du byed pa la gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa g.yon pas mnan nas

434a1(rgyud 'bum): @ji srid ral gril yod pa'i nang gi sngags kyi yi ge de rnams 'bar bar gyur pa dang / de blangs nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad
