436b7(rgyud 'bum): te.a pA mAn dkar po zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa rnams bil ba'i shing gis ma rab tu sbar nas 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// rgyal srid so sor rnyed do// mgrub na grong bsdus pa stong so sor rnyed do//
437a1(rgyud 'bum): @ras ris kyi spyan sngar gi su wang ngam/ sdong ros la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bskus te dgra po rnams kyi nang du zhugs na 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// dam po rnams
437a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'bebs pa la me tog dkar po dang bcas pa'i chu dron la lan gsum bzlas pa dang / ka ra wI ra'i me tog la lan gsum bzlas pas 'bebs pa la bsnun par bya'o// 'das pa
437a3(rgyud 'bum): dang ma 'ongs pa ston par byed do/ / 'ching ba ni se gol gyi phyag rgyas shis par byed do// mig sman sgrub par 'dod pas dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i so'u bi ra'i mig sman srang gcig blangs nas/ bram ze'i bu
437a4(rgyud 'bum): mo kha byang du bltas pas ba byung lngas 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o/ / ming med kyi sor mos ril bu bzhi byas nas pad+ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs te/ cho ga 'di nyid kyis mar dang sra rtsi pog sreg cing stong phrag brgyar
437a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas par bya'o/ / grong gi mchog bcu rnyed do// cho ga 'di nyid kyis mchod rten byas nas tsan dan gyis btags pa'i pad+ma stong phrag brgya dbul bar bya'o// yul gyi bdag po nyid so sor rnyed do// bde bar
437a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas bdug pa bsregs te/ tsam pa ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya dbul bar bya ste gser stong so sor rnyed do// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi
437a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten byas te me tog gi gisar stong phrag brgya dbul bar bya ste gos ta sor rnyed do/ / de bzhin du me tog thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i cho ga'o// dur khrod nas ro bsregs pa'i thal ba blangs te zla ba nyal
437b1(rgyud 'bum): nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas/ ming med kyi sor mo'i khrag gis zlum po byas nas gzugs brnyan bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong zlos shig/ rigs brgyud dang bcas pa dbang du byed do//
437b2(rgyud 'bum): bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas 'bras yos la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig/ gi'u wang la stong du mngon
437b3(rgyud 'bum): par bsngags pas thig le byas na gang mthong ba dang / gang rnams mthong ba de rnams dbang du byed do// bro rangs tu ru ska'i tshul lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te gdong bkrus pas gang mthong ba de sbyin
437b4(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / thams cad de kho na bzhin du til mar za bas khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te 'thung zhig/ don du ma gnyer bar bza' ba rnyed do// rgyal po'i pho brang du rab tu zhugs
437b5(rgyud 'bum): te chos gos de blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te lag pa g.yon pas mdud pa byas na thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ / chom rkun gyi nang du dran par byed cing bzlas pas 'ching ba grol bar byed
437b6(rgyud 'bum): do/ / gcod pa dang 'bugs pa la sogs pa'i sngags rnams la sA li'i 'bru dang / ka ra wI ra dkar po dang / yungs kar rnams kyis gzugs brnyan byas nas/ ras ris kyi spyan sngar lag pa g.yon
437b7(rgyud 'bum): bas mnan te stong phrag brgyad zlos shig/ sngags rnams slong bar byed par 'gyur ro// rims gzhom par 'dod pas gau ri ka Ni ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ sha za'i rims 'jom
438a1(rgyud 'bum): @#par 'gyur ro/ / seng ldeng gi yam shing gis brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gdon thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro// thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas gzhan gyi gsang
438a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags sgrub par byed do/ / chu la lan cig bzlas pas grol lo// ras sam gro ga la bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na pha rol gyi dmag sde rengs par 'gyur ro// chu dang phye za zhing nag po'i brgyad pa
438a3(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas mtshan ma gcig par song nas lus kyi g.yas su ras ris bzhugs te sgra bcing bar bya'o// khu tshur bcings nas ji srid khu ba byung ba de srid
438a4(rgyud 'bum): du bzlas par bya'o/ / 'chi bar byed do// zhes gsum pa la khu tshur sgrub par 'gyur ro// khu tshur byas na mi snang ngo // lo bdun brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po'ang ci 'gyir 'gyur ro//
438a5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs gtsang mar ras ris bzhugs te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas/ ras ris kyi spyan sngar gzugs brnyan byas te cho ga bzhin du mngon par mchod nas bil ba'i yam shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis
438a6(rgyud 'bum): btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi dpral ba nas 'od zer 'byung ngo // de nas grub par 'gyur ba ste rdzas sam gser dpag tu med pa rnyed do// nyin mtshan du sbyang
438a7(rgyud 'bum): bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar kar wA ra'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de nas ka ra wI ra'i me tog gcig blangs nas klu'i gnas su song ste/ me tog klu'i mtsho zan du bcug la sngags
438b1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas par bya'o/ / klu mo dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gang don du gnyer ba de thob par byed do// nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la lam sum mdor mchod pa byas nas nye bar 'dug ste
438b2(rgyud 'bum): sran ma'i tshad kyis ldong ros kyi ril bu byas nas khar bcug ste ji srid khags pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / ldong ros grub par 'gyur te dpral bar thig le byas pas mi snang ngo // 'dod pa'i gzugs can lo lnga
438b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyar 'tsho bar byed do/ / nag po'i brgyad pa la khri'i tshigs can blangs nas gzhan nag po'i brgyad pa la khri'i tshigs can la rtse gsum byed du gzhug go// gzhan pa'i nag po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar
438b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pas rur khrod du song nas rtse gsum la mchod pa chen po byas nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste/ lag pa g.yas pas rtse gsum blangs nas ji srid rtse gsum las 'od zer byung ba de srid du bzlas par
438b5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas grub par 'gyur te mtshan mo ma brtsigs par lha'i khyim 'byung te/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i bud med 'byung ngo // 'khor gyi skyes bu mang po'ang dgod pa dang sgeg pa la sogs
438b6(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis kun nas khyab par nye bar gnas te gang bsams pa de thams cad rnyed do/ / tho rangs ston pas thams cad 'jig go// dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas
438b7(rgyud 'bum): ras ris kyi spyan sngar tshangs ma'i khu ba zho gang la brgyad brgyar zlos la 'thung zhig/ nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bsrung ba byas te bza' ba pi Ti kA
439a1(rgyud 'bum): la ji srid pan du gyur pa de srid bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas grub par 'gyur te/ phyi nas zan 'pho bar byed do// 'bru la skyes pa'ang ngo // sngon spyad pa byas pas lcags gsum las byung
439a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'khor lo sor bcu drug pa'i rnam pa byas nas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas/ rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas 'khor lo a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun la bzhag ste/
439a3(rgyud 'bum): skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas blangs pa tsam gyis sgra li zhing 'khyil ba/ nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ gang
439a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis mthong ba dang gang mthong ba de rnams dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ / 'bar ba can legs par mthong ba blangs nas lag pas mnan te lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro//
439a5(rgyud 'bum): ku sha las byung ba'i 'khor lo byas nas lan bdun bzlas pa chur bcug ste klu rnams langs nas ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do// dong tshe 'bum byin cig ces brjod par bya'o// slong mo za zhing ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te stong
439a6(rgyud 'bum): phrag brgya bzlas par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mngon du 'gyur ro// de mthong nas sgrub par byed pa gang de 'grub par byed do// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas arka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gyis shig/
439a7(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma mchog skyon par 'gyur ro// chu klung de nyid du rked pa nub tsam du zhugs nas bil ba'i me tog rab tu lhug cig/ mes pos mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// man+dar ba'i me tog gi sbyin srog kyis shig/
439b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang pos mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nyid du chu la man+da ra ba'i me tog gis nor sbyin mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas par bya'o// rgyal por 'gugs par byed do// 'bum thag
439b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed do// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung ngu zhugs te mya ngan med pa'i shing gi me tog stong phrag brgya blugs par bya'o// mtshan mo bdun gyis gnod
439b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin mo rnams 'gugs par byed do/ / shing la mi smra bar zla ba drug tu bzlas par bya'o// mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas so sor rnyed do// arka las byung ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan sor drug pa byas nas kha dog ma
439b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dres pas rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i drir gzhug par bya'o/ / de'i mdun du zla ba drug tu bzlas par bya'o// dkyil 'khor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// yang na rig pa 'dzin pa nyid do// ras ris
439b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar zla ba drug tu lag pa g.yon pa la mngon par bsngags nas khri yongs su bzlas te nye bar gyur pa'i gter 'bum 'byung ngo / / 'bras yos la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong
439b6(rgyud 'bum): phrag bcu dang / a pA mArga'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btag pa stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gser stong phrag bcu so sor rnyed do// gi'u wang blangs te ril bu byas nas lcags
439b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis dkri'o/ / de nas gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos bgos te dur khrod du song nas dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin te/
440a1(rgyud 'bum): ril bu thod pa kha sbyar du bzhag nas/ ji srid 'jigs pa'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'jig par mi bya'o// grogs rnams la bsgos nas yang khar bcug pas
440a2(rgyud 'bum): mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// phag gi mig blangs nas phyugs dang lhan cig gzhon nu ma'i lag pas btag par bya'o// rol bu byas nas lcags gsum
440a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis dkris te lag pa kha sbyar du bzhag nas dbang phyug chen po'i sku'i g.yas phyogs su kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste/ lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas ji srid shi ta'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par
440a4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rig pa bzlas te grogs rnams la'ang byin nas khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sgrub par bya ba thams cad kun tu dga' ba dang lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar byed do// pad+ma ge sar dang /
440a5(rgyud 'bum): mig sman dang / ldong ros kyang rung ste/ cha mnyam par byas nas gso sbyong can gyi bu mo'i lag pas btag par bya'o// lcags gsum gyis dkris pa byas nas sngon spyad pa byas pa rgyal gyi sbyor bas dbang phyug
440a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i sku'i g.yas su 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma phul nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas te kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag nas/ lag pa yas pas mnan te ji srid
440a7(rgyud 'bum): kha Ta kha Ta nas sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gcig phul nas grogs rnams la'ang bgos te khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lo stong du 'tsho bar byed do//
440b1(rgyud 'bum): sngon spyad pa byas pas 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing ri'i rtse mor ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas gso sbyong can gyis grog mkhar gyis rtag tu blangs nas 'o mas sbyar te 'jam par
440b2(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi ngang pa bya'o// ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de nas rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su ras ris bzhug
440b3(rgyud 'bum): nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas mngon par mchod de/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin nas gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji srid ngang pa g.yo bar byed pa de srid du
440b4(rgyud 'bum): du bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngar yongs su bzlas pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog gis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// slar yang brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o// thams cad 'ong
440b5(rgyud 'bum): par byed de 'jigs par mi bya'o/ / sngags bzlas pa'i rma byas reg par bya'o// ci bgyi zhes smra bar bya'o// lus kyi nang du son par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// de nas sgrub pa po'i lus su mi snang
440b6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / skad cig de nyid la sprul zhing 'khyil ba/ lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa/ nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog ltar snang ba/ thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed do// gang mthong ba dang lta bar byed
440b7(rgyud 'bum): pade dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ / rig pa 'i'adzin pa thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te bskal par gnas shing / gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// sngon spyad pa byas pas ring
441a1(rgyud 'bum): bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o/ / gso sbyong can gyis mi smra bar thog phog pa'i shing blangs nas 'o mar nyin zhag bdun du
441a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas phyung ste sa dkar po dang tsan dan gyi chus mnyes pas ji srid rdo rje phog pa'i shing 'khrur gzhug par bya'o// de nas sgrub pa po gso sbyong can gyi bzo bos seng ge byed du gzhug par
441a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas rgyu skar snar ma la dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i slong mo bza' bar bya'o// ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/ rnam pa sna
441a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas sgrub pa po gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas lag pa g.yas pas seng ge mnan te/ ji srid seng ge g.yo bar byed pa de
441a5(rgyud 'bum): srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / g.yos pa dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan ma skye ste 'jigs par mi bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i yungs kar rnams kyis seng ge la gzhu bar bya'o//
441a6(rgyud 'bum): seng ge sgra chen po sgrogs par byed do// sgrub pa po'ang ma bsams par dgon pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa pos lan bdun brjod nas seng ge la 'dzegs te/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang
441a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dus na seng ge la zhon te 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ / yid kyis rlung ltar 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor du ma dang / bskal par gnas shing / gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe gang du 'dod
441b1(rgyud 'bum): pa der skye bar 'gyur ro/ / seng ge'i sgrub thabs so// nor sgrub par byed par 'dod na dkar po'i zla ba nya nas brtsams te mi smra bar 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing / ji srid phyi ma zla ba nya'i bar du ras ris kyi
441b2(rgyud 'bum): spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas ras ris g.yo bar 'gyur ro// yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan g.yo bar byed do// nor gyi dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro// ni lA Ta ka la brgyad
441b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyar mngon par bsngags te mdud pa bya'o/ / gyad g.yul du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te gyad kyi spyi bor bzhag par byas na g.yul du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ gyad kyi dngos
441b4(rgyud 'bum): grub bo/ dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas 'o ma dang lhan cig zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas pa byas nas 'thung zhig/ de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par
441b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas 'od zer 'byung ste sgrub pa pos bskor ba byas nas steng du 'gro ste rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i gzugs can lo brgya stong phrag
441b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum du 'tsho bar byed do/ / nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig smyung bar gnas pas gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du gi'u wang bzhag nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de'i tshe blang bar bya ste/
441b7(rgyud 'bum): blangs pa tsam la sred med bu'i stobs su 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi mtshon cha rnams mthu med par 'gyur ro// gang 'phreng ba dang ldan pa de gnas so// lo gsum brgya 'tsho bar byed do// nag po'i bcu bzhi
442a1(rgyud 'bum): pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bil ba'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas/ be kaM ka ta'i yam shing la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag
442a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dong tshe gcig rnyed do// dkar po'i bcu gsum pa la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas sa las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i lha byas nas/ de'i khar 'bras thug po che stong phrag 'gyur
442a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun la gang bu mo 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// nag po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas dur khrod du song ste/ sa la ma lhung ba'i ba glang gi lci bas dkyil
442a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor nye bar byug pa byas nas ma nyams pa'i thod pa blangs te tsan dan dmar po'i chus bkrus nas me tog dmar po dang / dri dang / me tog gis mngon par mchod cing / de nas thod pa la nye bar 'dug
442a5(rgyud 'bum): ste gsang sngags bzlas pas dgug par bya'o/ / ji srid thod pa g.yo bar gyur pa de srid du'o// de'i tshe grub par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sen mos gang bkug pa de 'ong ste/ gang brjod pa de byed do// zhi ba
442a6(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar pad+ma stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar mA la ti'i me tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyos btags stong phrag
442a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// sngon spyad pa byas pa nag po'i bco lnga pa la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma rgya
442b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po dbul bar bya'o/ / phyi rol tu 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin te/ de nas na ga ge sar gyi phye mas gzugs brnyan bris shig/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba'ang byas nas ku sha'i khres
442b2(rgyud 'bum): nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid du skar mda' lhung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// slar yang ji srid ras ris rab tu 'gul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dngos grub kyi mtshan ma gzhan rnams kyang 'byu
442b3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas 'phur ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i gzugs can dpag tshad stong nas mthong bar byed cing thos par
442b4(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med do// sngon spyad pa byas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas ma nyams pa'i lus blangs te dri
442b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / me tog dang / bdug pas mngon par mngon par mchod nas lag pa g.yas pas byin te/ ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'bar ba tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa stong gis yongs su bskor
442b6(rgyud 'bum): te nam mkha'i mthil du 'phur bar byed do/ / lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa/ sga li zhing 'khyil ba/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med pa'o// 'bebs pa la bdug pas so// dug 'jom pa
442b7(rgyud 'bum): la yal 'dab kyis so/ / bdag nyid bsrung ba la bzlas pas so// dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga'i bar du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar gso sbyong can gyis dag pa gos gtsang ma bgro
443a1(rgyud 'bum): pas bzlas par bya'o/ / gang 'dod pa de thob par byed do// mar la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas 'thung zhig/ nyi ma bdun gyis yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro//
443a2(rgyud 'bum): ras ris kyi spyan sngar mal+li ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mtshan mo bdun la rdzas skye bar 'gyur ro// dkar po'i bcu bzhi la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas u dum+ba ra'i shing gis
443a3(rgyud 'bum): me rab tu sbar nas/ u dum ba ra'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dong tshe lnga brgya rnyed do// nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gso sbyong can gyis
443a4(rgyud 'bum): mar me stong phrag brgyad sbar nas/ mar me 'khyil ba stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ phyi nas bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas mig thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam
443a5(rgyud 'bum): ril bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du bzhugs nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas/ nyi ma gcig la thun gsum
443a6(rgyud 'bum): du yongs su bzlas pa lan bcu gnyis su bzlas par bya'o/ / rna ba so sor rnyed do// nad la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin nges par skyes pa'i cho gas ras sam 'bras bu can la kha dog ma
443a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / de'i spyan sngar mchod pa chen po byas nas stong phrag brgyar bzlas par bya'o// ku sha'i stan la 'o ma dang nas zan pa zhing dus gsum du khrus byed cing gtsang mas
443b1(rgyud 'bum): gos gtsang ma bgos pas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong can gyis tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid bco lnga'i bar du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sngon spyad
443b2(rgyud 'bum): pa byas pa'i 'o ma dang nas zan za ba'am/ ba lang gi gcin dang nas zan za bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / gso sbyong can gyis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mar me
443b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad so sor sbar te pad+ma stong gis mchod par bya'o/ / nag po'i phyogs la bzlas par bya'o// dkar po'i tshes gcig nas bsgrub par bya'o// zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas mchod
443b4(rgyud 'bum): pa rgya chen po byas te/ mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o// gal te rgyal por 'gyur na sgrub pa po'i khang pa 'bar bar byed cing me tog gi chun po g.yo bar byed na dkyil 'khor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// ras
443b5(rgyud 'bum): ris kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor byas nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa dang / gtor ma'ang phul nas me tog gi ge sar brgya phrag gsum blangs te/ brgyad brgyar
443b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bsngags par byas nas mar gyi mar me gsum sbar te/ u dum ba ra'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas me tog re re la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas mar gyis byugs te sbyin sreg
443b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// mtshan mo bdun du dus gsum du yongs su bzlas par byed na de'i mtshams med pa lnga srabs par 'gyur ro// nyi ma so sor brgyad brgyar zlos par byed na sdig pa
444a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams bsrabs par 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu bzlas pas gang 'dod pa'i grong de so sor rnyed pa dang / mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang sgra
444a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ / til dang mA kha'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nor skyed par byed do// ba Ta'i myu gu zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dus ma yin
444a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mi bdag dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas yang shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
444a4(rgyud 'bum): la kun tu gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u mtha' dag rnam par bkod pa'i khyad par gyi cho gas
444a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gi las rab tu sbyar bas rig pa sgrub pa po'i me la rab tu spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang / gang du rab tu gnas pas rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can gyis rab tu sbyar bar bya ba yod de/
444a6(rgyud 'bum): de gang zhe na/ 'di'i rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM tiSh+Tha/ ha ri ping+ga la lo haM tak+Sha/ de hi/ da rA pa ya/ hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi me'i snying po ste/
444a7(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par bdag nyid dgongs so// sgrub pa pos 'dis me la sbyin sreg bya ste lan cig bzlas pa'i sreg blugs gsum me la sbyin sreg bya'o// me spyan drangs par 'gyur
444b1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de bzhin du zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / drag po'i las rnams rab tu sbyar ba la yam shing gi shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/ zhi ba'i don du mya ngan med pa cha shing dran dang bcas pas khyad par du rgyas pa
444b2(rgyud 'bum): mtho gang ngam/ khru gang tsam mam/ sor gsum pa'ang bsgreng ba dang / 'jam zhing mnyen pa rab tu bsngags pa ni cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya'o// bug pa med cing khong stong yang ma yin pa ne tso'i gshog pa 'dra
444b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / de bzhin du ljang khu dang / lo ma bskams pa'am/ kha dog nag po'ang spang bar bya'o// srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spangs nas bug pa med pa'ang kun tu 'jog pas/ kha dog gzhan mchog dang tha
444b4(rgyud 'bum): ma nyid kyang spangs nas skam po de rnams kyang spangs pa bsregs par kun tu spyod do/ / ma rul cing mi 'khyog pa nyid dang gzhan spang bar bya'o// de nas me zab kun nas gru bzhi pa byas nas 'og nyid du ba
444b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ste/ gzhu gang dang / khru gang gi tshad las khru gsum mam/ khru gnyis sam/ khru gcig ste/ de bzhin kho nar srog chags rnams spangs pa rtag tu bye ma bsngags te de la pad+ma'i rnam pas so//
444b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas kha khyer kun nas dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa gru bzhi pa'ang 'bad pas so// ras ris kyi spyan sngar zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can yang rung ste/ 'di rnams yang dag rab tu bsgrags/ mngon spyad du ni
444b7(rgyud 'bum): pal/ dbus su rdo rje bya ba ni// rtse mo gnyis ka rtse gsum pa// gzhan las me thab khru gnyis pa// thad kar yang ni bdun pa'o// de bzhin gtsang ma'i phyogs rnab tu// chu rlung ngog
445a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs gcig gam/ / brtan pa'i phyogs sam dur khrod dam// khang stong sbyin sreg legs brtsam bya'o// de bzhin kho nar ri rtser yang // lha yi khang pa stong pa dang /
445a2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu dgon pa chen po dang // de bzhin du yang gsum rnams ni// sgrub po'i phyogs su gsungs pa yin// gang zag mchog gi gnas de rnams// gsungs pa sbyin sreg las kun las// ku sha'i
445a3(rgyud 'bum): khris la nyer 'dug pas/ / gnas nas khru yi tshad las ni// sbyin sreg las rnams khyad par du// der ni sngags shes pas bya'o// dngos grub myur ba kho nar gnas// nyid du gnas par the tsom
445a4(rgyud 'bum): med/ shar du bltas dang byang bltas pa'ang // zhi dang rgyas pa can la bya// drag po la ni lho ru ste// de ni sngags pas rnam par spang // shar du kha bltas zhi ba 'phel// rgyas pa la yang byang bltas pa
445a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams sngags pas dus lhan cig/ rig pa bzlas pas yang dag brtsam// bil ba arka pa la k+Sha// n+ya gro d+ha yis rgyas las bya// mngon spyod can la shing rnams ni// dkar dang tshab sgyur dang rno//
445a6(rgyud 'bum): de rnams thams cad spang bya ste// thub pa rnams kyis bkag pa yin// rtag tu zhi dang rgyas las la// rlan bcas shing ni rab tu bsngags// de bzhin skam po drag las la'o// thub pa rnams kyis rtag
445a7(rgyud 'bum): tu spangs/ / de rnams med pa'i yam shing gis// shing de rnams su brtag par bya// ljang dang snum pa 'dra ba dang // rma bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa// de bzhin du ku sha'i rnam pa yin// zhi dang rgyas
445b1(rgyud 'bum): pa rtag tu bya/ / mar gad dang ni 'dra ba dang // de bzhin dkar po'i rtswa rnams kyis// sdig pa'i las rnams rtag tu bya// rgyal ba mchog gis bkag pa yin// 'dir ni dri med chu la yang // dag pa srin
445b2(rgyud 'bum): bu spangs pa las/ / rtag tu de nas mngon par bkru// kun nas bskor ba bya ba yang // rang snang phyi rol brtson pa 'am// cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya// gtsang mas rtswa yi rtsa ba yi// sgron ma'i tshad las bya ba'o// /
445b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas khu tshur tshad byas nas// 'bad pas me ni sbar bar bya// kha yi rlung gis bu mi bya// de bzhin gos kyi mtha'i yis dang // gos kyi chun po'am sham thabs dang // sgrib g.yogs dag ni spangs pa yis//
445b4(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i nor dang tha dad rlung // nye bar bcom dang mngon dga' ba'am// gtsang ma nyams pa bral bas dang // de bzhin gos dang nor bus kyang // rlung g.yab bya'o rlung bzang pos// me ni yang dag brtsam
445b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de las gyur pa'i rlung 'di yos// sngags shes me ni sbar bar bya// shin tu mnyam bzhag sbyin sreg don// bud med mchog gzhan brtag pa dag/ byas nas yang ni mtha' ru ni// ba yi mar gyi sreg
445b6(rgyud 'bum): blugs gsum/ / der ni sbyin bya de las ni// gang yang tshad du bya ba'o// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad dang // rang rang sngags kyi mgon po la// de nas ji bzhin 'dod phyag bya// de tshe me la sbyin sreg bya//
445b7(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas pa yis// rtag tu me ni spyan drang ngo // bdag nyid rtsom pas dri zhim po'i// me tog kho nas rtag tu bod// sngags shes gnas la mkhas pa yis// gdan ni gnas la phul
446a1(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ gsang sngags des so gzhan du min// zho ldan mar dang bsres pa la// sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing gsum// rgyas don me la sbyin sreg bya// sngags kyi las kyi
446a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du/ / pad+ma'i gdan la nyer 'dug pas// zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya// rgyas pa can la 'di rnams nyid// sbyin bya gzugs 'thun sngags rnams kyis// mngon spyod can du gnas pa la//
446a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi gzugs su blta bar bya// dri ma med pa'i lha rnams ni// rim pa bzhin du me thab tu// ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dri// bdun du yongs su bzlas pa yis// mngon par bos pa de yi tshe// 'byung
446a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas nges par gzhal ba rnams/ / ji ltar gnyis kar gnas de bzhin// yam shing rdzas dang bsres pa dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi yang dag ldan// de bzhin kho nas zho bsres pas// bya'o stong ngam 'bum
446a5(rgyud 'bum): tshad dam/ / yang na brgya rtsa brgyad rtag bya// sngags ni blangs nas de bzhin du// rig pa lan cig bzlas pa yis// mig dang gtsug pud 'bar ba yi// 'phreng ba'i me la me lce gcig/ de bzhin nyid du
446a6(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i las/ / sbyin sreg nges par bya ba yang // rgyas pa can la de dang dbang // drag po'i las ni smad pa ste// rgyas pas spangs so sbyin sreg las// rab sbyor me ni bsngags par 'gyur// sgra can brgyad
446a7(rgyud 'bum): chu'i stobs dang ldan/ / rgyal ba mchog gis rab tu bsngags// der ni gsang sngags rtag sgrub byed// dkar ba'o ma la sbyin sreg bya// gal te kha dog dmar de bzhin// rtag tu rgyas pa'i dngos grub
446b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod/ / nag po'i dur kha ser skya la'ang // g.yon pa can zhes bya ba nyid// kha dog rnam gsum rab 'jug pa// dngos grub rnam pa gsum yin no// sngags pa las gzhan kha dog gam// rnam pa sna
446b2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kha dog nyid/ / de la sngags kyi dngos grub med// slar yang sa yi mthil 'dir ni// rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog nyid// kha dog gsal ba de 'dra yod// me ni 'bar ba mthong nas ni// slar yang
446b3(rgyud 'bum): las rnams brtsam par bya/ / spyan drang byas la gzugs kha dog/ gal te sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur// slar yang sbyin sreg rab 'jug pa// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis// spyan drangs gshegs su
446b4(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba nyid/ / me la sngags ni brjod par bya// sngar ni rab tu brtags pas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'di ru'o rnam pa gzhan// cho ga de nyid kyis gyis shig/ sbyin sreg 'di la spyan drang dang //
446b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs su gsol ba'i las can gyis// las rnams de nyid kyis bya'o// der ni me yis spyod pa'i las// de bzhin gzugs dang ras ris kyi// spyan sngar brtsams nas 'grub par byed// de la
446b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni sngar brjod pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bas bsngags// las rnams kun nas der bya'o// gzhan pa'i las rnams mi bya ste// khyad par sdig pa can gyi las// rgyal ba mchog gis smad pa
446b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / gang du 'jig rten dang 'gal smad// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du langs// de nas byang sems sa yi bdag/ de bzhin mngon shes lnga thob pa// de nas lha nyid 'grub par byed// 'dir ni rtag
447a1(rgyud 'bum): tu sbyor shes pa/ / ras ris sbyin sreg las la mkhas// sa 'og bdag po nyid dang ni// bar snang la ni spyod par byed// de nas sa bla'i lha dang ni// gnod sbyin nyid dam gnod
447a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin mo/ / 'gugs par byed cing rtag tu yang // rgyal srid kyi ni bdag po nyid// yang na yul 'dir 'khor ba nyid// yang na rig dang rig 'dzin nyid// lha min nyid dang sems can kun// dbang byed rjes
447a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro 'gugs par byed/ / sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// sems chen sa bcur gnas bcas pa// sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs par byed// sa stengs mi
447a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams smos ci dgos/ / lhag ma'i bdag po nyid de bzhin// khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid// 'byung po kun la yang dag nges// mi bdag nyid dang de bzhin yang // dbang gi don du sems can kun
447a5(rgyud 'bum): me bdag des sam mi des ni/ / sa steng thams cad mnyam pa yis// las rnams de bzhin kun nas ni// rtag tu sbyin sreg gis bya'o// nges par las kun yang dag brten// bdag nyid brtson pas
447a6(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig sgrub/ / dpal gyi don du de yi las// mchog dang bar ma nyid dang yang // yang na chung ngu nyid bsgrub bya// de nyid du ni rdzas kun gyi// dngos grub brjod pa'i don du slar// lhan cig dngos
447a7(rgyud 'bum): grub blta bar bya/ / sbyin sreg las la legs 'jug pa// las rnams kun la phyag rgya bcing // bdag srung mar dang ldan pa yi// sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug byed// de nas ras ris gsang
447b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di/ / bdun bzlas pa'am brgyad bzlas pa// rtag tu las 'dis spyod lam bya// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAn/ a pra ti ha ta ga ti satwA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM dz+wa la tiSh+Tha ts+tsha/
447b2(rgyud 'bum): bi shwa sam+b+ha be swA hA/ shing la sbyor ba 'dis bzlas te// slar yang gnyis sam bdun bzlas pas// sngags rig ma la sbyin sreg gyis// me tog bdug pa dri yang rung // kun nas thams cad nyid la ni//
447b3(rgyud 'bum): lan bdun bzlas pa 'di nyid kyis// khyod kyis rab tu brjod par bya// las rnams thams cad rtsom byed pa// cho ga rgyu yis snga ma yis// rab sbyor nyid kyis bya ba'o// las rnams kun la sngar bcing
447b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ phyag rgya chen mo grags ldan ma// de bzhin bsrungs pa byas gyur nas// dngos grub rgyu la mkhas pa yis// las rnams thams cad brtson par byos// gal te nus pa mthong ba na// dge
447b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sgra rnams nyid dang ni/ / rtag tu 'bras bu bcas pa de'i// gsang sngags ji ltar 'dod bzhin du// nges par mchog 'di sbyin pa'o// dang po las kyi rab sbyor ba// gsang sngags rgyu yis rab
447b6(rgyud 'bum): zhugs pa/ / 'bras bur bcas pa kho na yi// dngos grub de rnams bsgrub par bya// rgyal ba'i sgra dang pa Ta ha// rnga bo che yi dngos grub nges// thams cad du ni smad par 'arjod// sbyin sreg las ni gnas
447b7(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa/ gzhan yang dge mtshan mchog dang ni// 'dab chag can na ma dge ba'i sgra// rnam pa cwa mo grangs klog pa'i// sgra yang rung ste rgyal bas bsngags// rab bsngags dus bcas lha rnams dang // yid 'ong rnam pa sna tshogs sgra/
448a1(rgyud 'bum): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // btsun mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang // mchod yon mthong na dngos grub rgyu// rnam pa 'di yis bsngags pa'am/
448a2(rgyud 'bum): rab bsngags 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i// dge slong dang ni dge slong ma// de rnams mthong na gsang sngags kyi// sna tshogs spyod yul dngos grub bo// zhes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che
448a3(rgyud 'bum): theg pa chen po'i mdo sde ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa las/ bgrang 'phreng srad bu'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam bcu gcig pa yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi
448a4(rgyud 'bum): me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mi'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro/ / nad thams cad las rkang shu dang gdug pa'i rma rnams la sa'i gong bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byin na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// sngon
448a5(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa byas pas ba byung lngas lus sbyang ba byas nas dus gsum du khrus byas te 'o ma btung bar bya'o/ / rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o// phyi nas nag po'i brgyad pa la ras ris kyi spyan
448a6(rgyud 'bum): sngar ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ bil ba'i yam shing la mar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi skye
448a7(rgyud 'bum): bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar byed do/ / des sgrub pa po la bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste mchog
448b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum po rnams gang 'dod pa de rnyed do/ / rig pa 'dzin pa nyid kyi rgyal srid dang / khyod ci 'dra ba'i bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba nga'o zhes so// dngos grub 'di ni bla ma mchod pa dang / snying rjes sems can
448b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la sems mnyam pas sbyin parang byi pa nyid kyi sgrub par byed do/ / nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas arka'i yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis
448b3(rgyud 'bum): shig/ gang 'dod pa de skad cig nyid la 'gugs par byed do// a ka ru dang / pri yang ku dang / na ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam pa phye mar byas te kham phor kha sbyar du byas nas/ stong phrag brgyad du mngon par
448b4(rgyud 'bum): bsngags pas lus la byugs te g.yul du zhugs na gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'bum
448b5(rgyud 'bum): phrag bcu gcig zlos shig/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong ngo // ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bdun zlos shig/ mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis btab pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag
448b6(rgyud 'bum): bco lnga zlos shig/ nad 'jom par byed do// sngon spyad pa byas pas 'bum phrag bcu gnyis zlos shig/ bcud dam bcud kyis len so sor rnyed do// de zos pas gnyer ma dang slaskra dkar spangs par 'gyur ro//
448b7(rgyud 'bum): lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas yungs kar rgyal po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du 'gyur ro// mtshan mo
449a1(rgyud 'bum): @bdun gyis 'di la nor rab tu sbyin te 'dod pa nye bar gzhag pa ni ma gtogs so/ / ras ris kyi spyan sngar arka'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gser srang brgya so sor
449a2(rgyud 'bum): rnyed do/ / 'bras yos stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mtshan mo bdun gyis bgegs med par 'gyur ro// pi d+h+ya ka'i shing stong sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'bum
449a3(rgyud 'bum): phrag gsum zlos shig/ rked pa'i nad med par 'gyur ro// rims kyis btab pa la ku shas phyag par bya'o// bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bcing bar
449a4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// dong ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gos bye ba bcu gnyis so sor rnyed do// rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i srang shin tu mdzes pa la 'khor la
449a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma bcu pa byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhus nas/ / nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ 'khor lo blangs nas ji srid du mtshan ma byung ba de srid du bzlas
449a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / gang gi tshe ma stag 'phro bar byed pa dang / ji srid du 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas grub par 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'dug par byed cing 'khor dang bcas
449a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'iphur bar byed do/ / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang / thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed do// snga bar langs nas lor bzlas par bya'o// mchog sbyin par byed do//
449b1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba drug tu lan cig brjod pas nad chen po grol lo// zla ba gcig tu zlos shig/ dus ma yin par gu gul gyi bdug pas mche ba'i dug 'bebs par byed do// nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa
449b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa rnams su 'ang ngo // bud med dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar lA pa na la sbrang rtsi btags pa mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu
449b3(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gcig gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// 'di ni yugs sa mos skyes bu yi'o// rgyal po ni ras ris kyi spyan sngar arka'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag
449b4(rgyud 'bum): brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i blon po la sogs pa la mtshan mo thun gsum du lan tshwa nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// mgo bo la lan gsum
449b5(rgyud 'bum): ma ma bdun du mngon par bsngags nas rgyal po'i sgor 'jug par byed na rgyal po'i gnang chen por 'gyur ro/ / brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i rma bya'i mdor kyis phyag par byas na dug 'joms
449b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / ldong ros a shAt+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du gtums par byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas yang dag par brtsam par bya ste skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes
449b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig nas brtsams te/ 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos lan gsum brjes te/ a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan dan rnams bsregs shing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dbul bar
450a1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma chu las skyes pa'am/ thang las skyes pa'i dri zhim po'i me tog dang / ba'i mar gyi mar me gsum mo// mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung
450a2(rgyud 'bum): bar gnas pas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ / gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do// thun mtshams su bza' ba'ang ji ltar nus pa sbyin no// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mtsho rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mtshan
450a3(rgyud 'bum): mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas a riSh+Tha'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de nas ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ba dang / sa 'gul ba dang
450a4(rgyud 'bum): mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang / 'phreng ba g.yo bar byed pa ste/ mtshan ma 'di rnams kyis grub par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i mig sman a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du gtums ste/ stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs
450a5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid grub pa rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'bras bu can la gang 'dod pa'i rdzas de'i ming bris te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa byas
450a6(rgyud 'bum): nas gang du klu gnas pa'i mtsho phran der dor bar bya'o/ / de'i klu des las thams cad rdzogs par byed do// nyi ma bdun gyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gos sbyin par byed do// 'bras bu can la mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas mngon
450a7(rgyud 'bum): par bris nas/ de bzhin du khron pa 'am mtsho phran du gzhug par bya'o// de nas skyes bu chur byi 'dzul byed du gzhug go// der yang sgra chen po skyes bus thos te phyogs che ge mo na rdzas la sogs pa gnas so// de nas thang
450b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ste chu klung gi mtha' sgrol bar byed pa 'grod dka' ba can gyi 'dun sa'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang rung ste/ lha rnams dran par byas te gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa dbang du bya'o//
450b2(rgyud 'bum): de ba phags pa'i zhal du'ang bcug nas cung zad yang dag par gsung bar mdzod cig/ ring por mi thogs par dbang du 'gyur ro// chu snod du byas nas de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bsams te stong phrag
450b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa'i chu des mche ba can la gtor bar bya'o/ / dug med par 'gyur ro// de la brjod pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor rab tu zhugs pa ni don med par mi 'gyur ro// sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung blang
450b4(rgyud 'bum): nas tsA ru bza' zhing mi smra bar dkyil 'khor byas nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te/ ji srid gsum pa'i bar de srid du bzlas par bya ste 'bum bzlas so// zla ba drug tu tshangs par spyod pa dang brtul zhugs 'di nyid spyad cing
450b5(rgyud 'bum): zla bas dngos grub dang / zla ba drug gis 'gro ba mtha' dag mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// lus kyis kyang mchog gi dngos grub thob par byed do// zla bas sngags thams cad sgrub par byed do// gang 'ded
450b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i klu'i rgyal po mngon par bris nas de'i steng du rkang pa g.yon pa bzhag ste g.yogs pa'i phyogs su 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ / klu'i rgyal po de 'ong ste/ de ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do// klu thams cad kyi gnas su rab tu
450b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o/ / der rab tu 'jug par byed do// gang tshol ba de rnyed do// de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po bris nas sgrub par byed na bka' bsgo ba byed de/ thams cad 'dzin pa'i gtsang ma'i
451a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas rdul chung ngu blangs te sbrul gyi steng du yongs su thor cig/ sbrul bzlog pa byas par 'gyur ro// slar yang gal te grol bar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste/ gos dkar po'i kha dog can
451a2(rgyud 'bum): sa las byung ba'i phyag rgya byas nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags te mche ba'i steng du 'jog tu bcug nas khug cig/ shi ba'ang slong bar byed do// ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje
451a3(rgyud 'bum): dang 'khor lo dang / b+hu Shuts+tsha la sogs pa rnams pa byung lngas sbyangs nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs bya ste/ rdzas gang yang rung ba blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar cho ga sngon du 'gro bas 'bum phrag lngar zlos
451a4(rgyud 'bum): shig/ phyi nas ji ltar byas pa'i rin gyis ldong ros blangs nas byang chub shing gi yem shing gI me sbar te/ ji srid me'i mdog tu gyur pa de srid du bsreg par bya'o// de nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba las byung ba'i 'o ma bu mos bsrubs
451a5(rgyud 'bum): pas mar du byas nas thal ba mar la gdab par bya'o/ / de bzhin du zhos bkang ba'i snod dang sbrang rtsis bkang ba la'ang ngo // de nas blangs te gur kum gyi za ma tog tu bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis bdag
451a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid bsrung ba byas te/ zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ras ros la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma gsum gyis kun tu dkris nas bzhis dgab par bya'o// ku sha'i khres
451a7(rgyud 'bum): la nye bar 'dug ste/ lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas/ dzaM srid dri ba dang / ru ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dro bzhin pa la thig le byas nas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do//
451b1(rgyud 'bum): dubs ma snang ba'o// 'ab bas nam mkha' la 'jog// lo stong phrag bcung 'tsha bar byed do// sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs sa// de bzhin du mig sman 'thasgru par byed pa dang / gsum lacha
451b2(rgyud 'bum): dkar po'i bco lnga la pad+ma'i 'dab mar bzhag ste ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pa kha sbyor gyis blangs te/ ji srid dro ba dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'di nyid
451b3(rgyud 'bum): la dngos grub rnam pa gsum mo/ / ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bcur zlos shig/ de nas bzo bo dbang po ma tshang ba min pa gso sbyong can gyis lcags gsum gyis pad+ma 'dab ma bcu pa 'am/ brgyad pa gdan dang
451b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyis brgyan pa byas nas/ de nas gur kum dang / gi'u wang dang / ga pur rnams nam mkha'i chus btags pa pad+mar chug cig/ dkar po'i brgyad pa la ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas mtshan mo gsum
451b5(rgyud 'bum): du smyung bar gnas pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste sdig pa bshags pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas nas lag pa g.yas pas pad+ma blangs nas/ ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas
451b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma des 'khor dang bcas pa rig par 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do// de bzhin du gdu bu dang / cod pan dang / lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje dang /
451b7(rgyud 'bum): dgra sta dang / 'khor lo'ang ngo zhes pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo'i khyad par te lcags lnga pa'i 'khor lo byas nas so rnon po 'khor lo mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa mtho gang gi tshad do// gang+gA'i 'gram gnyis
452a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis sa blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gong bur bya'o/ / de la 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas tsan dan dmar pos mchod de/ ka ra wI ra'i me tog dmar po dang 'phreng ba phul nas
452a2(rgyud 'bum): dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis smyung bar gnas pas slong mos dge 'dun la ston mo byas te dngos grub stsal bar bya'o/ / gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos pas snying rje'i sems kyis rab tu sbyar bar

452a4(rgyud 'bum): gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ / ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ tsan dan dmar pos btags pa rnams la lan re bzlas te re res bsnun par bya'o// ji srid stong phrag brgyad kyi bar du'o// de nas 'khor
452a5(rgyud 'bum): lo sgra dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang / de nas 'bar ro// gnyis pa la 'khor lo nges par 'gro ste/ de nas sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas rig pa zlos shig/
452a6(rgyud 'bum): de blang bar bya'o// blangs pa tsam gyis 'khor dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong phrag drug cur rig pa 'dzin pa chen po klu dang gnod sbyin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mang du 'dod par
452a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lo stong phrag lnga 'tshe bar byed do// shi na'ang bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas rol bu sgrub par 'dod na se le ta ka dang / can dan dmar po dang / rgya skyegs dang / gu gul dang / tA ra ba ra ta
452b1(rgyud 'bum): ka'i rtsa ba dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / gi ri kar+Ni dang / 'bru'i phub ma dang / ru rta dang / rgya spos dang / sbrang rtsi dang / pi pi ling dang / tu ru ska rnams gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhib mor byed du gzhug go/ de nas
452b2(rgyud 'bum): ser skya rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i 'o ma blangs nas bu mos bsrubs pa'i mar gsar gyis gcig tu byas nas phye ma des rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam gyi ril bu byed du gzhug go/ de nas dkar po'i brgyad pa'am dkar po'i bcu
452b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas/ yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong can gyis ril bu lnga tsam blangs te/ a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du gtum pa byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bgrang 'phreng dang / til mar

452b5(rgyud 'bum): khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / lha gzugs can rnams 'ong ngo // grub pa rnams thams cad 'thon nas mthong ngo // lo brgya phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do// de nas 'bar byed nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur
452b6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / dngos grub rnam pa gnyis so// 'di'i nga bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa'i las sgrub pa'i thabs su 'gyur ro// gsum pa'am bdun pa'i sgrub pa la mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro//
452b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i snying pos kyang las 'di rnams grub par byed pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed do// bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog par sgrub thabs thams cad ces bya ba 'di rdzogs so// /
453a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis yang dag par gzigs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil
453a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dbus su son pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ mi dang 'byung po'i dpung gnas pa'i/ sems can rnams la rjes brtse bas/ dkyil 'khor
453a3(rgyud 'bum): las can thams cad ni/ sems dpa' chen po smros shig smos// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang // phun tshogs thams cad mngon par 'phel// sgrub po rnams la phan pa yi// don phyir 'dren pas rgyas par
453a4(rgyud 'bum): smos/ ngo mtshar rmad byung thams cad kyi// lus can bar mar gyur pa rnams// khyod kyi tshig gi mchog gyur pa// 'byung 'gyur de dag thos nas ni// myur du lha rnams sgrub pa la// sems can gang du rab zhugs
453a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de nyid du ni sngar bshad pa// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang // sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnams kyis// thams cad de la rjes yi rang // dkyil 'khor sdig pa kun 'joms pa// dngos grub kun byed dge ba ni//

453a7(rgyud 'bum): shing zhi ba dang / / de bzhin nad dang dgra 'phrog cing // dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi// gzi brjid stobs ni rnam par 'phel// mthong ngam thos nas de nas ni// rab tu dad pa skyed par byed// gang
453b1(rgyud 'bum): yin de rnams bdag gis ni/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni// thob pa'i ched du'ang lung bstan to// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur ba// 'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyang // rjes su yi rang 'gyur ba yin//
453b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor phun tshogs 'phel byed pa// de bzhin yon tan kun sdud pa// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba// sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten mgon// yang dag bka' yis smros shig smros// de skad ces
453b3(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
453b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la tha mid pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa'i tshig gis mngon par bstod do// shAkya'i rgyal po lha yi rgyal// phun tshogs
453b5(rgyud 'bum): yon tan du ma can/ / rab bsngags rdzu 'phrul rab ma nyams// rgyun du dkar ba'i gos dang ldan// mchod sdong zhal ni 'dam skyes dri// blo bzang snying po brtan par 'dzin// gang phyir khyod ni phun tshogs nyid//
453b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni 'gro ba de dag gi/ dga' bas dga' bar byed pa ni// mgo bo lha rnams kyi ni ste// rang bzhin dran pas kun tu snang // de yi tshig ni rab rig pa// dpa' de chags pa zad pa nyid// 'bras bu gsum
453b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid 'dzin par byed/ / de de gzhan du de yis// lha yi mdzes mas kun bsrungs pa// brgyad kyis 'dir ni dbang zhal las// skyes pa'i dpa' bo rab stobs dang // g.yo ba'i spro dga'i dbang po dang // kun
454a1(rgyud 'bum): nas gser gyi ri dang ldan/ / cod pan yang ni lhan cig gdan// lha dang lha min lhar bcas pa'i// lhag pa'i theg pa thams cad kyi// 'jig rten par do'i srid pa dang // skye ba khyod
454a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi srog la sogs/ / byung ba mdzes ldan rang nyid kyi// 'di yi mig ni dga' ba ste// gang rnams zla ba lta bur dkar// lha rnams kyis bzung ri bong can// kun da du ku la dkar po yi// gos ni mnabs nyid
454a3(rgyud 'bum): tsa ko ra/ / brgya byin 'dab brgya pa yi mig/ sa srungs phrag par phyogs gcig 'gro// bla ma'i ri la ri bong can// rgyal po'i dpung ldan brgya byin ni// mig rgya brtson 'grus ma nyams pas// grangs nas chu
454a4(rgyud 'bum): gter chu 'byin pa/ / tshogs kyi sgra ni dga' ba dang // dri med spyan ni dga' ba la'ang // nyi ma'i 'od zer dam pa ni// rnam sad zas dang dri 'khor ba// bum dkar gang ba so so yi// bum pas de rnams
454a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur zhing / / tsan dan sa mchog yan lag bshad// gi'u wang thig le rnam par bkra// yan lag dam pa yongs 'du ba'i// dga' ba mchog gi yan lag dang // lus med gzhom pa'i ched
454a6(rgyud 'bum): du byas/ / yan lag chags pa byas mtha' las// khrus ni stug pos mi 'pho bas// gzhan du 'chi med legs pa ni// de 'og thal mo sbyar ba yi// dug gis btab pa smad pa ltar// de bzhin gshe
454a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchog brjod pa'i/ / char ldan khyod kyi zhal du ni// sngon las khyod ni lam gyi mgo/ dri ma bzhin du spangs pa yang // me tog ldan pa'i zla ba la// rnam par tshar phyin longs spyod ldan// bcings palta
454b1(rgyud 'bum): bur 'di rnams nyid/ / btsos nas sngar med cho ga yos// bcu par khyod ni zhi ba ste// mgo med 'gro ba mtha' yas las// gang phyir srid pa mtha' med kyi// dri mas lha dang lha min yang // de yi brtul
454b2(rgyud 'bum): zhugs kyis phan tshun/ / dam pa'i spyan gyi 'od kyi snang // 'khyil pa can spangs yan lag mchog/ phyogs su lha rnams gnas pa dang // mi rnams byang chub rnams sangs rgyas// rab tu byed 'gyur zhes
454b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ mi rnams 'byung dang sdud pa'i las// de phyir rnams chu skyes ni// lha yi yan lag dam par son// dpa' bo'i yan lag dkris chags bral// 'chi bzhin pa yi lus la 'khod// kun nas
454b4(rgyud 'bum): gtong dang kun nas sdud/ / yang dag sa dang phyogs dang ldan// rnam bzhi mnyam par byang chub ldan// byang chub shing drung bdud dpung las// rnam par rgyal ba thob pa dang // sangs rgyas go 'phang 'pho/
454b5(rgyud 'bum): med dang // klu yi shing gi rtsa ba ru// zhe sdang rtsub po'i nags rnams kyi// rkang pa sdong bu me yi ched// rmongs mun dri ma snang byed pa// khro bo'i ma ni 'bar ba la// me g.yo rab tu sbyin par byed// phyag rgya
454b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lta bu bsgom/ / gzhal ba'i 'khri shing gzugs brnyan brtan// dmar po'i me ni 'bar ba ni// 'jigs pa'i nyi ma ltar mdzes pa// yan lag stobs bskyed phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas yang byang chub sems
454b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis mngon par bstod nas rang gi stan la 'khod de/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin
455a1(rgyud 'bum): kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sems dpa' chen por zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma byung ste/ 'o
455a2(rgyud 'bum): zer de rnams kyis gang+gA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang bar byas par gyur to/ / dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de dang yud tsam de la sdug bsngal thams cad dang
455a3(rgyud 'bum): bral bar gyur to/ / gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs
455a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / sems dpa' chen po smros shig/ mthu chen po sems can sdig pa can thams cad dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba smros shig/ gang gis de lta bu de rnams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa mu med pa rnams su

456a1(rgyud 'bum): sems ni rjes zhig pa'i/ / dngos grub dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur// byang chub rtsa bar rig thob pa'i// sems de las ni yang dag brtsam// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis//

456b1(rgyud 'bum): dang snying rje dang ldan pa/ / dkyil 'khor gnas der yid kyis dmigs// dge ba'i rig pa gdon par bya// sgrol ma'i snying po dam pa dang // de bzhin dbyangs ni rjes su gdon// 'dir ni sangs rgyas mchod don du//

456b3(rgyud 'bum): du spyan drang ba'i/ / dbyangs kyi tshig 'di brjod par bya// slob dpon ming gi che ge bdag/ bcom ldan 'phags ma sgrol ma yi// dkyil 'khor dag na bri bar 'tshal// bdag dang sems can kun gyis gang /

457a1(rgyud 'bum): bsal nas ni/ / sa yi gong bu de nyid du// gzhan yang chu klung chen po yi// 'gram gnyis sa ni sbyang byas nas// rab tu bcug ste tho bas brdung // tsad nan chu yis yang yang gtar/

461a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jug par byed pa'o/ / gsum pa mtho gang ba de'i nyis 'gyur ro// de ltar thams cad du rim gyis zis nas nang gi dkyil 'khor du bris par 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang // byang chub

461a7(rgyud 'bum): dan gyi chus yongs su bkang ba/ / mA Sh+Ta'i lal 'dab kyis kha bkab pa// du ku la'i ras dkar pos mgrin pa bcings pa// gser dang dngul las byung ba/ dkyil 'khor de'i yo byad thams cad ras ris
461b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'i mthar me togagi 'phreng bas dkris nas rtsa ba'i rig pas bsngags pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa zhes bya ba ste/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o// de la 'di brjod par bya ste/

461b3(rgyud 'bum): thub thugs rje che/ / sangs rgyas byams pa spyan mar bcas// 'di rnams ming ni kun dran nas// de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya// bden par skyes dang rta mgrin dang // 'jig rten gsum rgyal dkar mor

473a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'o/ / zhes pa de lta bu sring mo bzhi'o// lnga pa ming po ni/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ar+ha te/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ oM kaM ni ko ni sarba ta thA ga ta ud+b+ha ba shAn+te/ ba ra de/ ut+ta ma
473b1(rgyud 'bum): ut+ta ma ta thA ga ta ud+b+ha ba hUM phaT swA hA/ ming po tum bu ru zhes pa'o// sngags kyi rgyal po yongs su bsgrags// mdor na nga rgyal can rlom pa// phyi ma'i rgyud kyi las rnams ni// ji lta ji ltar rab sbyar ba// de lta

474a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rjes slar yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / phyag na rdo rje snyoms par zhugs pa'i de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu

479a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i ched du ji ltar bya ba bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so//
479a4(rgyud 'bum): des na gang rig pa 'dzin pa bkrus bzhin pa rig pa de rjes su dran par byas nas rig pa med par khrus bya ba dang / rnam par dben pa'i phyogs ma yin par zlos pa nyid de rnams ni lus rtsub pa dang stobs chung
479a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / gang lam du 'gro ba grong ba'i chos kyis gos pa rnams la yid kyis bzlas pa byed do// rtag tu sems g.yo ba dang nad mang bar 'gyur ro// gang yang yang nas yang du rig pa thun mong du
479a6(rgyud 'bum): 'pho ba dang / gnas ma yin pa rnams la rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang / sbyin sreg dang bral bas bzlas pa byed pa ni rtag tu don nyams pa dang / grogs nyams par yang 'gyur ro// gang zhig slar yang rig
479a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'adzin pa rang gi rig pa la brnyas pa byed pa dang lha la spyo bar byed pa ni log par 'dren pa dang skrag par byed do/ / rtag tu 'jig rten dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ro// rtag
479b1(rgyud 'bum): du'ang rig pa 'dzin pas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyis gsungs pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa
479b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis mchod par bya/ bkur stir bya'o// dam tshig med pa dang / srog gcod par byed pa dang / sngags byed pa dang / dge slong ma sun 'byin par byed pa dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
479b3(rgyud 'bum): tshul dang bral bas dge 'dun gyi rdzas la yongs su longs spyod pa dang / 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang la yongs su 'gro ba dang / dge slong ngam dge slong ma gsod par byed pa dang / zas la rkang pas rdzi
479b4(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pa dang / dam tshig med par khro bas zas rdzi bar byed pa dang / 'thor bar byed pa dang / dam tshig med pa shi ba mthong nas 'gro bar mi byed pa dang / dam tshig med pa dang dkyil 'khor du ma
479b5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs pa la phyag rgya dang sngags sbyin par byed pa dang / de la'ang dam tshig med par sman rkang pas rdzi bar byed pa dang / dam tshig las nyams par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
479b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams dang / lha gzhan rnams la'ang ji med nyid kyis 'gom par byed pa dang / dam tshig med par dung dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang / be con dang / mdung dang / rdon
479b7(rgyud 'bum): dang phu ba dang / gzhu dang / gshol dang / gtun shing dang / mda' dang / mdung zung ngam/ glang po che dang / khyu mchog dang / bong bu dang / phag dang / sha ra b+ha dang / seng ge dang / bya gag
480a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / rma bya dang / ma he dang / rnga mo dang / ngang pa dang / mi dang / lha'i bzhon pa dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnams kyang 'gom par byed pa dang / sna tshogs byed pa mthong nas
480a2(rgyud 'bum): rkang pas gnon par byed pa dang / rnam pa gzhan du log par 'dren pa dang dngos grub ster bar mi byed do// bza' ba'i cho ga'ang 'dir til dang / sha dang / paR+Ya Ta dang / dzam+bA la ka dang / nya dang / pU pa li ka
480a3(rgyud 'bum): mang po dang / til gyi thug pa dang / lha bshos dang / dri mer nyid bza' ba'ang spang bar bya'o// lha'i dri med nyid gnon pa dang / pad+ma gnon pa dang / chu la gnas pa dang ldan pa dang / ut+pa la gnon pa dang /
480a4(rgyud 'bum): nags kyi bdag po gcod pa dang / rtsa ba 'byin par byed pa'ang spang bar bya'o// rig pa rjes su dran par byed pa nyid kyis rtag tu gos gtsang ma bgos pas bya ba thams cad la bstan pa nyid dang / gzhan rig pa'i cho ga
480a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la mchod par byed pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ slar yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po khyed rnams nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol
480a6(rgyud 'bum): ma'i rig pa'i yi ge rnams thabs dang bcas pas bde blag tu sgrub par byed pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar yid kyis grub pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams ni/ na mo rat+na
480a7(rgyud 'bum): tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ mahA sa twA ya/ g+hu ni g+hu ne la la la sid+d+hi sid+d+ha/ ba rA kra ma swAhA/ a mi tA b+hA su ta swA hA/ sar+b+be sh+tsa Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sAhA/ 'di ni 'phags parba
480b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ma zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i nu mo ste las thams cad byed pa'o/ / sgrub pa pos rtag tu gtsug bud bcing ba dang / phyag rgyabacing ba'ang bya'o// bgegs thams cad rnam par 'jom
480b2(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa'o/ / de la 'di ni tho rangs langs nas gtsang mar gyur pas dkyil 'khor byas nas/ me tog la sogs pa gtor te lnga la brtson pas brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o// mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs
480b3(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / yang na gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do// de nas dkyil 'khor du tse tA dzi ka rab tu gtor nas gang 'dod pa de smod par byed par 'gyur ro// bklags pas grub pa gang yin pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtog
480b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya bar 'gyur ro/ / yang 'dir rnam grangs kyi gter 'di der gang gcig tu reg pa de dran par byed do// de nas gshed byed skyed par byed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shing gis me rab tu sbar te/
480b5(rgyud 'bum): dar chen pos bskor la ji ltar skyes pa'i khrag gis sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun pa la 'jigs pa'i nga rog can gyi gshed byed mtshan mo phyed nas lang bar byed do// yang dag par bsngags pas ji ltar
480b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa'i gnas su yang na byin gyis brlabs pa sbyin par bya'o/ / 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i byin gyis brlabs pas ji ltar bde bar mngon par bde bar byed do// de nas gnas kha cig tu mi rnams 'chi ba
480b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / gnas kha cig tu me 'bar bar mthong ba dang / gnas kha cig tu lcags sgrog bcings pa mthong ngo // de ltar gshed byed de rnam par rgyu bar byed do// de zhi ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pad+ma/
481a1(rgyud 'bum): @#stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o// mchog tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// dgra rnams skyed par byed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shing gis me rab tu sbar te/ yungs kar dka
481a2(rgyud 'bum): po la til nag po'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'gro bar byed do// de nas rims kyis 'dzin par 'dod na dur khrod kyi me la dur khrod kyi thal ba stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis
481a3(rgyud 'bum): shig/ rims chen pos 'dzin no// zhi ba'i don du tshul brgya rtsa bzlas te mgo bor sbyin par bya'o// rims las grol lo// mgo bo zug rngus 'dzin par 'dod na ba byung gi gzugs brnyan la mi rus kyi phur bu
481a4(rgyud 'bum): la stong phrag brgyad bzlas la mgo bor phur bus gdab bo/ / mgo bo zug rngu chen pos 'dzin no// phur bu bton pas zhi bar 'gyur ro// dbang po la btab na ma ning du 'gyur ro// bton na thar ro// snying khar bta/

481a6(rgyud 'bum): btab na tho rangs 'azos par byed do/ / ji srid phur bu bton par ma gyur gyi bar du gang du'ang gnas par mi byed do// rgyal po skyed par 'dod na lha chen po'i khang par song nas/ lha la dug dang khrag gis byugs
481a7(rgyud 'bum): te sha chen po'i 'dug pa dbul bar bya'o/ / nim+pa'i 'dab mas kyang mchod par bya'o// de nas dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe rnams gcig tu byas nas brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig/ brgyad brgya dang pos
481b1(rgyud 'bum): nirang gi sha'o/ / gnyis pas me tog go/ gsum pas btsun mo'i 'khor ro// bzhi pas mtshon cha chen po'o// lnga pas glang po che'o// drug pas rta ste/ khro bo chen pos dkris pa'i las so// blo bzang po
481b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid nyams par byed par 'dod na nim+ba'i shing gis me sbar nas/ nim+ba'i lo ma dang dur khrod kyi thal ba phan tshun bsres pas sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skad cig la nyams par 'gyur
481b3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ de nas lkugs par byed par 'dod na tsi kA sa ma ya'i gzugs brnyan byas nas bangs kyi phur bu la brgyad brgya bzlas te/ dgra bo yid la byas nas kha la lur bu gdab par bya'o// lkugs par 'gyur
481b4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ phur bu bton na thar ro// mngon spyod can rdzogs so// / ma bsgrubs par las rnams 'byung ste/ so shing la lan bdun bzlas nas bza' bar bya'o// ma blangs par bza'

481b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bsngags nas mig la bskus na khro bas dkris pa rnams kyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / lam du zlos bzhin pas song na chom rkun rnams kyis 'joms mi nus so// sor mo la lan
481b7(rgyud 'bum): bdun bzlas pas mche ba can thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro/ / gseg ma la brgyad brgyar bzlas nas tshul gtor na chu la rgyu ba thams cad rengs par byed par 'gyur ro// bcings pa la'am/ 'gag pa
482a1(rgyud 'bum): la bzlas na thar ro/ / ka ra wI ra'i lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas pas dkyil 'khor du nye bar byugs nas sal mtshon cha sbyin par bya'o// gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar byed
482a2(rgyud 'bum): do/ khyor ba'i tshu la bsngags nas steng du gtor bar bya ste/ rus ma yin pa'i char rengs par byed do// thal ba la brgyad brgyar bzlas na thal ba des ra bar 'gyur ro// lcags kyi phye mas rdo rje'i ra bar

482a5(rgyud 'bum): Sha a na ba lo ki te mAr+ha ni te dzo rA shi hUM/ dzA la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra bi da ra/ tshan+da chen+da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ gzi brjid dang phung por rnam par bshad de/ 'dab ma chung ngu'i rgyab tu gnas par bya'o//
482a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gyi rgyud chung ngu las bris pa 'dab ma so so la rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la ras byed du bcug nas sam/ yang na dpa' bo'i rin gyis
482a7(rgyud 'bum): nyos pa ste/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kha tshar ma bcad pa sgra dang bral ba la/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can dbang po ma tshang ba min pas kha shar du phyogs pas ras rnams 'phrul 'khor la bzhag ste/ de'i mdun du
482b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad dang / khyad par du bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma spyan drang bar byas nas/ de nas arka'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas yungs kar

482b3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de nas tshes grangs dang / byed pa dang / rgyu skar dang / yud tsam dge ba la snod gsar par bzhag pa kha dog ma 'dres pa/ shin tu so sor btags pa'i kha dog can gyi chus sbyar nas ba lang gi spu'i pir gyis
482b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi shing ni sna tshogs pa'i gnas rab tu bsngags pa/ bya'i tshogs skad 'byin pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang mtshungs pa bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med 'drir gzhug

482b6(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi kha dog can 'gro ba/ pad+ma dkar po la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi gzhogs su dkar po rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ kha dog lnga pa'i gos kyi stod
482b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yogs bgos pa/ phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o// gzhan du rgyu skar me bzhi la 'phags pa dri ma med par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi
483a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su thams cad dkar po/ / gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ ral pa'i tshogs dang / phyag na ril ba spyi thugs dang / dbyug gu'i shing bsdams pa/ mchod phyir thogs zag pa la/
483a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phyang ba/ g.yang gzhi nag po can/ gung mo'i sor mos yongs su bzung ba'i bgrang 'phreng dang / phyag g.yas pa brkyang bas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis mnan pa'i ral

483a7(rgyud 'bum): nas rtsa ba'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bya'o/ / g.yon du 'phags pa dri ma med par 'gro ba'o// gzhan du bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i
483b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yas su klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas mgo bo bdun pa/ phyag na pad+ma'i sdong po bsnams pa/ thams cad dkar ba/ rnam par bkra ba'i gos dang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par

483b7(rgyud 'bum): byed bzhin pa bya'o/ / sprin las glog dang bcas pa bya'o// phyogs bzhi dang phyogs bral du rang bya'o// g.yas su ras ris kyi steng du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu me tog 'thor bar byed bzhin pa 'drir
484a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhug par bya'o/ / steng du zla ba dang nyi ma rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// steng du dung dang rnga bo che dag go/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang
484a2(rgyud 'bum): phyug gi g.yas su nag mo gsus pa 'phyang ba/ rgyan thams cad dang / mche ba gtsigs pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dang / go zhes bya ba'i pags pas dkris pa/ gtsug bud la thod pa'i
