484a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po'i bka' rab tu nod par byed bzhin par gyur pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i srin mo chen mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / de ltar ras ris 'drir bcug nas gtsang ma'i phyogs su dag pa dang / skyong ba
484a6(rgyud 'bum): dang tshad ma nyid kyi yan lag rnam par spangs pa/ ri bo dang chu klung gi 'gram mam/ gzhan du'ang rung ste/ gtsang ma'i gnas su'o// de nas du ba 'thul bas ni dbang du byed do// gang thabs cig gsang
484a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags byed pa de'o/ / lha thams cad gsal bar byed par 'dod pas dkar po'i brgyad pa'ang rung ste las brtsam par bya'o// gtsang ma'i sa'i phyogs su gzhu'i tshad kyis thang la yongs su byug par bya ste/ de'i
484b1(rgyud 'bum): dbus su so phag gzhag par bya'o/ / phyogs bzhi rnams sus las byung ba'i rtsa ba dang nag po med pa'i chu'i bum pa bzhi la brgyad brgyar bsngags pa gzhag par bya'o// gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu tshon sna lnga
484b2(rgyud 'bum): pas legs par dkris pa'o/ / dri zhim po'i phye mas dkyil 'khor byas nas/ phyogs bzhir chang dang sha med pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// dri bzang po'i me tog gi mchod pa bya'o// gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul
484b3(rgyud 'bum): lo/ zangs kyi snod mar gyis bkang ba bzhag nas 'gram gyi phye ma rnams la nye bar gnas par gzhag par bya'o// shar du mngon par phyogs pas phyi rol lam dkyil 'khor du ral pa gcig ma la mchod pa dang gtor
484b4(rgyud 'bum): ma dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas ku sha ljang khu blangs nas gos dkar po gcig 'chang bar byas te/ ji srid du rkang pa gnyis kyi bar de srid du byabs par bya'o// de nas mar gyi snod kyi steng du ku sha des dor bar bya'o//
484b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas mar chung ngu de la gal te dri ma dang / sen mo dang / skra mthong na de dor nas gang dang gang gcig tu bya'o// ji srid du rang 'dod pa dang smra ba lhag par skyes kyi bar du'o// de nas bum pa re re blangs te zlos bzhin
484b6(rgyud 'bum): pas gzhag par bya'o/ / sbyangs pa'i snod nges par gnas pa byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byed du gzhug go/ 'di la'ang 'di'i bsku mnye sbyin par bya'o// pri yang ku dang /
484b7(rgyud 'bum): nag ge sar dang / sbrang rtsi can dang / tu ru ska rnams gcig tu byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te bslu bar bya'o// ba'i mar dang bsres pa'i bza' ba mchog bza' bar bya'o// nad med par 'gyur ro//
485a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu sngon por btsos pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas rna ba la bcing bar bya ste mig gi nad zhi'o// mgrin pa la bcings na skyugs pa sel
485a2(rgyud 'bum): bar byed do/ / srad bu 'di nyid kyi ras yug 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o// stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa gyad kyi lus la bcing bar bya ste/ g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// khru bzhi pa'i tshad
485a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ma la dri bzang po'i me tog gi mchod pa byas nas pa'i mar gyi sgron me dbul bar bya'o// de nas byang chub shing gis me sbar nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug
485a4(rgyud 'bum): pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i sra rtsi bog gi sreg blugs thun gsum du sto 'phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun la gang 'dod pa de'i nad yun ring po nye bar zhi bar byed do// bgegs thams cad
485a5(rgyud 'bum): nye bar zhi bar byed par 'dod pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i seng ge dang stag gi gdong pa can gyi bgegs rnams nyi shu rtsa gcig lhag pa'i brgya bya'o// de
485a6(rgyud 'bum): nas nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas gtsang ma'i phyogs su khrag sgrub par byed pa nye bar thogs te las brtsam par bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu phyogs bzhir rgya skyegs kyi lo ma la 'dug pa'i
485a7(rgyud 'bum): bgegs rnams gzhag par bya'o/ / bgegs rnams kyi dbus su bgegs chen po log par 'dren pa gzhag par bya'o// lan cig mngon par bsngags pa'i tshon sna lnga'i phye ma de rnams kyis thog mar dkyil
485b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bdun bya'o/ / me tog dmar po dang dri dmar pos mngon par mchod par bya'o// phyogs bzhir mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o// phyogs bzhir sha'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// rgya skyegs kyi khu ba
485b2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ma stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa'am/ brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i srad bu dmar pos bgegs thams cad la g.yas
485b3(rgyud 'bum): skor du dkri bar bya'o/ / de nas bgegs kyi rgyal po chen po bcing bar bya ste/ de rnams kyi dbus su u dum+bA ra'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas bgegs bcing bar bya'o// zhes brjod nas swA hA'i yi
485b4(rgyud 'bum): ges be'u'i lci ba la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i mtshan mo stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de nas sgrub pa po de'i bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur
485b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ rig pa thams cad sgrub par byed bzhin pa na bgegs med par 'gyur ro// de rnams ni de rnams kyis byabs pas log par 'dren pa chen po gcig tu bzhags nas bgegs rnams thams cad lam
485b6(rgyud 'bum): tog thams cad dbul lo/ / srung ba thams cad kyang ngo // 'dug pa ni log 'dren chen po rnams la ka ra wi ra dmar po dang tsan dan dmar po dbul lo// bgeg thams cad dang nye bar che ba thams cad la
485b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod yon dbul lo/ / log par 'dren pa dang bcas pa la gu gul dang mar bsres pas mchod yon dbul lo// de nas lte ba'i tshad du dong brko bar bya'o// de ru so so so sor bcug nas slar yang sa'i sar
486a1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de ltar rig pa 'dzin pa'i bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byug
486a2(rgyud 'bum): te/ dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas u dum wa ra'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar te/ tshangs ma'i yam shing rnams kyis thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad kyis
486a3(rgyud 'bum): shig/ nyi ma bdun phrag gcig gam/ nyi ma bdun phrag gnyis su tsa ru bza' bas yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// khru bzhi'i tshad kyis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me rab tu
486a4(rgyud 'bum): sbaslar nas 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ bram ze dbang du 'gyur ro// tsa ru'i sreg blugs gyis shig/ rgyal rigs dbang du 'gyur ro// zho'i sreg blugs gyis shig/ rje'u rigs dbang du 'gyur ro// nas kyi
486a5(rgyud 'bum): sreg blugs kyis shig/ dmang rigs dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad du bsgrub bya bsgrub pa'i don du nyi ma bdun phrag gcig go/ dgral bltas nas bzlas par bya ste rengs par 'gyur ro// mA sha ka'i
486a6(rgyud 'bum): yam shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa rnams thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gang la bltas nas bzlas pa de las su mi rung bar 'gyur ro// tshu la lan bdun mngon
486a7(rgyud 'bum): par bsngags pas dug thams cad sel bar byed do/ / dug thams cad la 'dod pas byab par bya'o// zhu mkhan gyi ril bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas mig dgang bar bya ste/ mig nad nye bar zhi
486b1(rgyud 'bum): bar byed do/ / byis pa gdon gyis bon pa la srad bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bcing bar bya ste/ grol bar byed do// nad pa la bcing bar bya ste/ gdon thams cad mthu med par 'gyuraro/
486b2(rgyud 'bum): thal ba la lan bdun bzlas pas dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o// bu mthon pa la til mar la yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste/ bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro// rmongs pas mngal gyi dus tshod la 'das pa la
486b3(rgyud 'bum): khrus byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas btung bar sbyin no/ / bza' ba mchog dang ldan pa bza' bar bya'o// bu skye bar byed do// de nas bu mo mang po can gyi
486b4(rgyud 'bum): yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ thal ba de bum pa bzhi chus kun tu bkang nas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa dkyil 'khor du gsum gzhag par bya'o// skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro//
486b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di'i bu 'chi ba'ang med do// shu dag la brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas te lag pa g.yon la bcings na smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog thun gsum du stong
486b6(rgyud 'bum): phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ phyogs gcig la g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas nas mdud pa bdun bya'o//
486b7(rgyud 'bum): lag pa la bcings na brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug mthu med par 'gyur ro// de nas mi bzad pa'i sbrul gyi mche ba'i dug la swA hA'i yi ge'i bar du khyor bar chu blangs nas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags
487a1(rgyud 'bum): te btung ba sbyin par bya'o/ / drag nyal ba'ang spong bar byed do// de nas ma langs na phyogs bzhi rnams su mngon par bsngags pa byas te 'dung ba sbyin par bya'o// 'jog
487a2(rgyud 'bum): bos kyang mche ba'i drug slong bar byed do/ / stan gan+d+he kA la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas la byug pa sbyin par bya'o// ma bcings par yang de nyid du skam par byed do// tshor ba med par byed do//
487a3(rgyud 'bum): yams kyi nye bar 'tshe ba rnams la grong ngam grong khyer gyi dbus su mtshan mo byed nas ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad kyi thang la nye bar byug par bya ste/ dkar gsum gyi gtor ma byin nas dri dang me tog la
487a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i gtor ma byin te/ 'o ma'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'o ma'i sreg thugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma gsum gyis grong gsum gyi dang / nyi ma bdun gyis khang pa'i
487a5(rgyud 'bum): lams nye bar zhi bar byed do/ / de nas nye bar zhi bar ma gyur na 'dir nyi ma bdun du bad kan mthar byed kyi yam shing gis me sbar nas/ ak+Sha'i til mar gyis btags pa'i 'bras yos stong phrag brgyad
487a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma gsum la 'phrul gyi khams rab tu zhi bar byed do// thal bas 'gram bcings te thos bzhin pas gang mthong ba de dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang ma bsgrubs par yang bcom
487a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'gyur ro/ / cho ga gzhan ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar zla ba nya la gzugs brnyan la dang por nag
487b1(rgyud 'bum): / po'i phyogs la mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste/ arka'i yams shing gis me sbar nas zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du mdzub mo'i tshad kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad ji srid bco lnga
487b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bar du gyis shig/ de nas grub par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i sbyor bas stong phrag gsum du bzlas par bya'o// stong phrag gsum du bzlas pa bya ste las gzhan rnams su 'gyur ro// 'dis sngon du bsnyen
487b3(rgyud 'bum): pa byas pas grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod pa byas nas byang chub shing gi yam shing la ing+ku da'i til mar gyis
487b4(rgyud 'bum): btags pa thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun la dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis grul bum dbang du 'gyur ro// til btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg
487b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis shig/ 'byung po dbang du 'gyur ro// dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i dum bu can stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ sha za dbang du 'gyur ro// wa Ta'i shing gi yam shing stong phrag brgyad
487b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gnod sbyin dbang du 'gyur ro// bal gyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'o thug dang / tsa ru dang / til gyi thug pa rnams kyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rigs
487b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dbang du byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ / gu gul gyi ril bu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ lha chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba'i gdon dbang du 'gyur ro// mtshan ma gtsang mar langs nas
488a1(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg dang bzlas pa gyis shig/ phyogs gcig la 'ching ba las grol bar byed do// zla bas 'ching ba chen po las grol bar byed do// til dang pir+b+ha ka'i
488a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gis khro ba nye bar zhi bar byed do/ / yang na til gyi sbyin sreg gis so// gos 'dod pas ngur ba'i myu gu'i sbyin sred gyis shig/ gos zung brgya rnyed do// thun mong ba'i skyes bu dbang du byed
488a3(rgyud 'bum): pa la go be raM gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ sbrang bu mchu rings kyi mchu bcing ba la sa mI'i 'dab ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ stag gi mchu bcing ba la gi ri kar+Ni ka'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ seng ge'i
488a4(rgyud 'bum): mchu bcing ba la siM ha kar+Ni ka'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ sbrul rnams la na ga ge sar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ zhi ba'i don du sA mi'i lo ma dang 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i
488a5(rgyud 'bum): don thams cad la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du nyi ma bdun nam zla ba phyed du sbyin sreg bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lus dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
488a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byas nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ / ma grub pa sgrub par byed do// gzhan gyis bsgrubs pa'ang rnam par 'joms par byed do// klu la sogs pa'i gdon rnams la phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil
488a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bcing ba la sogs pa bzlas pa nyid kyis byed do/ / mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du cher ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dgra bcom par byed do// nim pa'i yam shing tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags
488b1(rgyud 'bum): pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mtshan mo bdun gyis skye bar 'gyur ro// sgra las khyad par du phung bar byed pa la a riSh+Ta'i yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skyes pa'i
488b2(rgyud 'bum): sha dang smyo byed la rtag tu bzlas par bya ste/ thams cad du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// gi'u wang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas thig le byas te rgyal po'i sgo ru dang / shu dag la stong phrag
488b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas lag pa la bcings nas gang blangs pa de rnyed do/ / gdon 'bros par 'dod pas mi'i rus pa blangs nas sor brgyad pa'i tshad byas nas brgyad brgyar mngon
488b4(rgyud 'bum): par bsngags pa gdon gyi gnas su gdab par bya ste/ gdon 'bros par byed do// me tog dang / dri dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas gang la byin pa de dbang
488b5(rgyud 'bum): du byed do/ / rig pas bgegs rnam par gzhom pa'i don du seng ldeng gi yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma gsum nas bgegs med par 'gyur ro// de lta bu la sogs pa'i las
488b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed do/ / thams cad du gso sbyong can gyis ras ros kyi spyan sngar bsgrub par bya ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o// stong phrag blangs nas g.yas kyi gzhogs su gzhag ste re re la
488b7(rgyud 'bum): lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas me la sbyin sreg bya'o/ / bar skabs 'dir ras ris rab tu 'gul bar byed pa dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel bar byed pa dang / nam mkha' la lha'i rnga
489a1(rgyud 'bum): ngo che'i sgra sgrog pa dang / dri zhim po'i rlung ldang ba dang / sa rab tu g.yo ba'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can// byang chub sems
489a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dang rig pa'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba/ ril ba spyi blugs dang / dbyug gu'i shing dang / g.yang gzhi nag po thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'phyang ba 'byon par byed do// 'phags
489a3(rgyud 'bum): baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku las 'od zer byung ste/ rnam par 'phro ba'i 'od zer de rnams kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas thams cad yud tsam gyi tshor ba las
489a4(rgyud 'bum): nyams so/ / rang nyid thugs rje chen po can sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar byed do// sgrub pa po pus mo gnyis btsugs pas
489a5(rgyud 'bum): shar du gzhag pa'i rnam rgyal gyi bum pas mchod yon dbul lo/ / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa/ mchog ci 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do// gang blangs pa de
489a6(rgyud 'bum): rnyed do/ / rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang / rgyal srid chen po dang / tshe ring po nyid dang / thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dang / lus la dbang po ma tshang ba med pa nyid dang / gso dka' ba'i
489a7(rgyud 'bum): nad 'joms pa'am/ gter 'pho bar byed do// phug tu 'jug par byed pa dang / rig pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / mi snang ba nyid dang / sa chen po'i dbang phyug gam/ gang blangs pa de
489b1(rgyud 'bum): rnyed do/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gang 'dod pa der yang 'gro'o// 'dis tshe bskal par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub
489b2(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa ni rig pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang / mang du 'dod pa dang / thogs pa med pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
489b3(rgyud 'bum): lding dang / mo 'am ci thams cad kyis mngon par 'dod pa sgrub pa bdun pa la mtshams med pa byed pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes pa de lta bu kho nas kun tu rtogs par bya'o// zhes pa sgrub
489b4(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po dang po'i cho ga bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba dang po las btus pa rdzogs so/ / // ras ris zhal shar du phyogs par bzhag nas/ de nas cho
489b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi dkar po'i brgyad pa 'am/ cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi bcu pa la las brtsam par bya ste/ lo ma dang / nas zan dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / tsa mra dang / 'dab ma dang /
489b6(rgyud 'bum): zho dang / 'o ma dang / phye dang / dri'i bza' ba'am/ slong mo blangs pa'i bza' bas kyang rung ste/ gso sbyong can gyis byams pa dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pas byang chub mchog tu sems
489b7(rgyud 'bum): bskyed de/ sems can rnams kyi don rjes su bsams nas nyi ma so sor 'phel bzhin pa'i mchod pa byed cing / ku sha bting ba'i mal stan la khrus lan gsum byed cing / gos lan gsum
490a1(rgyud 'bum): du brjes te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas/ nyi ma re re la ji ltar 'byor pas 'phel bar byed bzhin pas slong mo bza' bar bya'o// rkang pa g.yon pas bzod pa la sogs
490a2(rgyud 'bum): pa byed cing 'bum phrag bcu drug bzlas par bya'o/ / de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas dkar po'i brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi pa la sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dra ba rnams kyis btsal bar bya'o//
490a3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas ras ris kyi phyogs bzhir sa las byung ba bum pa rtsa ba dang nag po med pa bzhi bcu dang bcas pa/ a mra'i yal 'dab kyis kha bkab pa/ sa bon thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba'i bum pa gzhag
490a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / ras ris kyi spyan sngar khru bzhi pa'i tshad la zangs dang / gser dang / dngul las byung ba 'am/ sa las byung ba'i bum pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma dang 'khri shing gis spras pa/
490a5(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ smra ba thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang / ro dang / dri dang / rin po che'i snying po me tog gi bon pos kha bkab pa/ du gu la'i ras ma nyams pas mgrin pa bcings pa
490a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bum pa gzhag par bya'o/ / ras ris kyi g.yon gyi gzhogs su gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gzhag par bya'o// de nas dri zhim po'i me tog gi
490a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba bcu drug ras ris la dbul bar bya'o/ / mdun du dri bzang po'i tsan dan gyi chus yongs su bkang ba dang / 'o mas bkang ba'i brgyad po de rnams so// ba'i mar gyi mar me brgyad dbul bar bya'o//
490b1(rgyud 'bum): tsA ru dang / 'o thug dang / til gyi thug pa dang / zan dron dang / paN+Da ka dang / bca' bar bya ba rnams kyis kham phor bkang nas ras ris kyi phyogs bzhir dbul bar bya'o// thams cad du ras ris la bros
490b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha rnams la dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang / lha bshos dang / phyi rol du gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas 'bru thams cad dang 'bras bu thams cad ji ltar rnyed pas ras ris kyi phyogs bzhir
490b3(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma dbul lo/ / a ka ru nag po'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste yid rtse gcig pas phyogs su las brtsam par bya'o// 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing
490b4(rgyud 'bum): gis me rab tu sbar nas/ a ka ru nag po'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sprin sreg gyis shig/ sems can thams cad la kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i
490b5(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de'ang ting nge 'dzin las langs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lha'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
490b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po mthu chen thob la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad 'gyur ba/ rjes su dran pa tsam gyis bdag nyid srung ba la lan cig brjod pas
490b7(rgyud 'bum): gtsug bud bcing ba/ gnyis bzlas pas srung ba chen mo dang / gsum bzlas pas dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / bzhi bzlas pas mchu bcing ba dang / lnga bzlas pas rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa srung
491a1(rgyud 'bum): zhing dbang du byed pa dang / bcu drug bzlas pas dur khrod du 'jug pa dang / bdun 'azlas pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// zhi ba byed par 'dod pas ras ris kyi spyan
491a2(rgyud 'bum): sngar spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du a riSh+Ta dang 'o ma can gyi shing gau yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas/ 'thas yos kyi sreg blugs thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma gsum la
491a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig gi dang / bdun gyis skye bo chen po dang / phyogs kyi grong dang / grong khyer gyi dang / zla bas yul 'khor chen po zhi bar 'gyur ro// rgyas par 'dod na ras ros kyi spyan sngar 'o ma can gyi yam
491a4(rgyud 'bum): shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'bru dang 'azas thug po che thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun phrag gsum gyis rgyas par 'gyur ro// nyi ma bdun gyis rgyas pa chen por
491a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / a mra'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbyar nas ngur ba'i myu gu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ smra ba rnams la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// nyi ma shar ba nas ji srid nub kyi bar du
491a6(rgyud 'bum): arka'i shing gi me la ming nas smos te lag pa g.yon pas lan bdun du phub ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas me tog brgya pa dang /
491a7(rgyud 'bum): sha ta ba ri dang / shu dag dkar po dang / yungs kar dang / nas rnams thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun gyis skyes bu chen po dbang du byed do//
491b1(rgyud 'bum): mar gyi sbyin sreg gis rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa dbang du byed do// rgyal po'i arka'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i rgya skyegs kyi lo ma stong phrag brgyad sbyin
491b2(rgyud 'bum): sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun la dmag sde 'jig par byed do// seng ldeng gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas ku sha ljang khu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ phyogs kyi dgra'i 'gro ba gcod
491b3(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / 'o ma can gyi ya ma shing gis me rab tu sbar nas lha'i shing gi yam shing dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ zla ba gcig la 'og gi lha mo rnams dbang du byed do//
491b4(rgyud 'bum): tsa ru bza' zhing klu'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas na ga ge sar la mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma so sor 'phel bzhin pa'i mchod pa bya ste/ nyi ma
491b5(rgyud 'bum): bdun nam zla ba gcig la steng du 'gro ba'i lha mo rnams dbang du byed do/ / tsa ru bza' zhing byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i yungs
491b6(rgyud 'bum): kar rgyal po'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma gsum la rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du byed do// gang smras pa de thams cad rdzogs par byed do// 'dod pas nye bar gzhag pa
491b7(rgyud 'bum): ni ma gtogs so/ / byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas a mra'i 'dab ma rnams thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ khyim gyi gnod pa nye bar zhi bar byed do// ras ris kyi
492a1(rgyud 'bum): spyan sngar mda' rgyang gi tshad kyi thang la nye bar byugs te/ nas kyi ril bu stong phrag brgyad la gzugs brnyan byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i mtshon rnon pos
492a2(rgyud 'bum): gtub cing gtub cing sreg thugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ / ji srid rkang pa'i bar du ming nas smos nas khu tshur bcings te bdug pa'i steng du lag pas dbul lo// de nas khyim med
492a3(rgyud 'bum): bar kun tu snang ba'i ched du rtogs par bya'o/ / de'i mdun du khu tshur dgrol bar bya ste/ zhi ba nyid dbang du 'gyur ro// de ltar nyi ma gsum la 'ab ngas nyid kyis nye bar gnas so// a riSh+Ta'i yam
492a4(rgyud 'bum): shing gos ma rab tu sbar nas shing tA ra brta'i zhogs ma rnams la lan bdun bzlas pas thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ phyogs kyi bza' ba rgyun mi 'chad par skye'o// pA la sha'i
492a5(rgyud 'bum): yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas a pa marga'i yam shing mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du ming nas smos te stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun la gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// ba
492a6(rgyud 'bum): byung gi gzugs brnyan byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas pa'i mtshon rnon pos mgo bo nas brtsams nas/ rkang pa'i bar du gtubs nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun la
492a7(rgyud 'bum): ngargyal chen po dbang du 'gyur ro/ / dkar po'i bco lnga la sa lam lhung ba'i ba byung gis ba lang gi bags pa'i tshad kyi thang la nye bar byugs te/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs
492b1(rgyud 'bum): nas gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs kyi snod du ser skya rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i 'o ma gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa'i mar blangs nas ku sha'i khre sa la nye bar 'dug ste/ a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang la snod
492b2(rgyud 'bum): byas nas g.yas su bskor ba bzhi ru rab tu bzhag nas/ lag pa g.yon pas mnan te thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o// nyi ma bdun pa la lag pa g.yas pa'i ming med kyi sor mos
492b3(rgyud 'bum): dkrugs te ji srid du dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas btung bar bya ste go cha btsang ba'ang bcom ldan 'das ma nyid kyis bya'o// yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud
492b4(rgyud 'bum): / phyi mar zla ba'i cho ga'i nye bar spyod pa'o// / sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs kyi rig pa thams cad la sa la ma lhung ba'i ser skya'i ba byung gis gtsang ma'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o//
492b5(rgyud 'bum): ba byung des yang dag par rdzogs par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor der sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya'o// de'i yang gzhogs su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma gzhag par bya'o// de nas bil ba'i
492b6(rgyud 'bum): mgo bo'i 'dab ma rnams byas nas/ til dang / til gyi thug pa dang / til mar dang / smyo byed dang / 'o thug dang / bu ram dang / gang ba can dang / nas zan bza' ste/ ma rnyed pas a ka ru'i
492b7(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa sreg go/ der lho dang nub tu 'ang phyogs bzhir sngar brjod pa'i gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi maung smos nas brjod par bya'o// 'ongs pa dang / dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma so
493a1(rgyud 'bum): sor bzhes pa dang / 'di lta bu'i ming gi rig pa bzlas so// der bu ram dang / gang ba dang / 'o thug kyang shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o// dri za rnams la gtor ma dang /
493a2(rgyud 'bum): til dang / til gyi thug pa dang / chang gis bkang ba can lho'i phyogs su gzhag par bya'o// gnod sbyin dang grul bum rnams la gtor ma'o mas bkang dang / 'o thug nub kyi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o//
493a3(rgyud 'bum): klu dang 'dab bzang rnams la gtor ma rtsab mos bkang ba dang / zhos bkang ba dang / zan yang byang gi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o// gnod sbyin mo rnams la gtor ma dang / dar bas bkang ba dang /
493a4(rgyud 'bum): chu dang bsres pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma la dkar gsum gyi gtor ma phul nas me tog thams cad kyis kyang mchod par bya'o// de'i phyogs bzhir gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo// a ka ru dang /
493a5(rgyud 'bum): turu ska dang / ga pur ram/ dri'i sar dzA ra'i gtor ma 'am/ ban dron dang phye phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o// yod bzhin pa ma yin pas ji ltar 'byor pa dang / ji ltar yod pa'i gtor ma dbul bar
493a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mala'ang mar gyi mar me dbul lo// de nas myur du ril ba spyi blugs g.yas kyi gzhogs su gzhag par bya'o// ras ris sam/ bdun pa'am/ ku sha blangs nas lan
493a7(rgyud 'bum): bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ kha shar du phyogs te rig pa bzhi lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bor bar bya'o// brgyad brgyar mtshon las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de'i ming nas smos pa nyid kyis dus
493b1(rgyud 'bum): sum du bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas mtshungs par 'dor bzhin pa byas pa la bcom ldan 'das la gang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me'ang dor nas rnam pa gzhan gyi gtor ma thams cad blangs
493b2(rgyud 'bum): ta 'phang bar bya'o/ / rdzing skam po 'am khron par gzhug par bya'o// yang na gzhan gtsang ma'i phyogs bla ga ba dang bcas par yang rung ste rnam par dor bar bya'o// gang du wa dang / ce spyang dang / khyi
493b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis mi za bar ro/ / rkang pa dag kyang rung ste/ mnan par mi bya'o// yang na mas legs par bsreg par bya ba nyid do// dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa thams cad la'ang gtor ma gshegs pa'i
493b4(rgyud 'bum): / cho ga'o// phyi nas zla ba las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor phyogs su lnga byas pa zhes pa brtags pa ma yin pa la/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya'o// 'di rnams
493b5(rgyud 'bum): byab pa'i thabs so/ / cho ga gzhan ni thams cad du rdzogs pa'i rig pa dang snying po las chen po thams cad ji srid par de bzhin kho nar sa la ma lhung ba'i ba ser skya'i ba byung gis sngar brjod pa'i tshogs
493b6(rgyud 'bum): / dkyil 'khor byas nas/ de bzhin kho nas gtor ma gzhag par bya'o// bdug pa dang me tog kyang ji skad gsungs pa bzhin phul nas byab par bya'o// srad bu bcing bar bya'o// bdag nyid bsrung bar
493b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / gang zhig las chen por rgyas par byed par 'dod pas cho ga de nyid kyis bsgrub par bya'o// snga ma kho na de srid du'o// ji ltar rnyed pa'i gos sgra dang bral ba la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan ma
494a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / gzugs brnyan zhal nub tu phyogs pa de'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir
494a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhug par bya'o/ / phyag bzhi pa gi haM gi dpal be'u bya'o// ji srid du bsgrub par bya ba'i rig pa de'ang de'i dbus su rgya skyegs kyi mdog tu snang ba gur kum gyis bri bar bya'o// dpral bar
494a3(rgyud 'bum): yang rung ste/ gser las byung ba'i dar thod bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma gser dang sngo bsangs/ na bza' dkar po mnabs pa/ mchod
494a4(rgyud 'bum): phyir thogs pa can/ ut+pal sngon po phyag na thogs pa/ g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ de'i g.yas su rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya chen mo phyag bzhi pa'o// rma bya chen mo'i bar du rma bya'i rgyal po
494a5(rgyud 'bum): gser du snang ba zhes bya ba gser las byung ba'i gshog pa rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ / rig pa rma bya chen mo ni dkar zhing dag pa 'drar gzhug par bya'o// 'di'i g.yas kyi
494a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su 'dzam bu'i gling rtse mo gsum pa/ shing rta'i gdong gi rnam pa'o// nub tu nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling zlum por 'drir gzhug par bya'o// byang gi phyogs su byang sgra mi snyan gyi gling gru bzhi
494a7(rgyud 'bum): mnyams pa bya'o/ / shar du lus 'phags por rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dri za'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa'i'adrir gzhug par bya'o// 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzhogs su rgyal po chen po 'phags
494b1(rgyud 'bum): skyes po grul bum gyi bdag po bya'o/ / nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gzhogs su rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang klu rnams kyi bdag po sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi steng du gser gyi stan la gos dkar po can ba lang
494b2(rgyud 'bum): gi mig can bya'o/ / 'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi gzhogs su thal mo sbyar ba byas pa pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs pa bya'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs kyi gcig gi rgyab tu phyag na rdo rje
494b3(rgyud 'bum): / phyag na rnga yab thogs pa bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi khor yug thams cad du me tog dang 'bras bu phra mo rnams so// sangs rgyas kyi shar gyi phyogs su shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling ngo //
494b4(rgyud 'bum): byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling gi gzhogs su rgyal po chen po ngal sos po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de nas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te tshangs
494b5(rgyud 'bum): par spyod pa bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'o ma dang zan bza' zhing dus gsum du kun du ru'i bdug pa sreg cing ras ris de la rig pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod par bya'o// 'di skad ces
494b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya ste/ rig pa'i dngos grub bdag la gyur cig/ nyi ma phyi ma gsum la gso sbyong la gnas pa nyid kyis bco lnga la dga' bar bya'o// dkar po'i phyogs la sa bon btags pa las khang
494b7(rgyud 'bum): bapa can gyis nye bar sbyar ba dang / bram ze gzhon nus bkal ba'i srad bu dang / gzhon nu mas byas pa nye bar blangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi zhabs kyi drung du bya'o// lcags lnga rgya shug
495a1(rgyud 'bum): gi tshig gu'i tshad kyi gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / tshon mo ste nag po dang / lcags rnams sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o// rig
495a2(rgyud 'bum): ba grub pa la lcags de rnams la dbul bar bya'o/ / yang na sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i las rnams so// de nas sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung ba ser skya las byung bas ba lang gi pags pa'i rnam pa shar du
495a3(rgyud 'bum): mgo bo bstan par nye bar byugs nas/ kha'i rtsa bar shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling zlum po bya'o// lho'i rkang pa gnyis su 'dzam bu'i gling zur gsum pa/ lho nub tu ras ris kyi spyan sngar nub pa
495a4(rgyud 'bum): lang spyod kyi gling zlum po bya'o/ / nub kyi rkang pa'i mdun du byang sgra mi snyan gyi gling gru bzhi mnyam pa'o// ngag sbyin gyi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan zhal nub tu phyogs pa gzhag par bya'o// de'i
495a5(rgyud 'bum): g.yon gyi gzhogs su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ / ri mor byas pas sam/ sa las byung ba gzhag par bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas la gus pa dang bcas pas dri dang me
495a6(rgyud 'bum): tog la sogs pa ser po ji lta ba dang / tshad med pa'i mar gyi mar me rnams dbul bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma'i spyan sngar mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o// gling bzhi pa rnams su sbrang rtsis
495a7(rgyud 'bum): bkang ba dang / mar gyi mar me 'am/ til mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o// shar gyi phyogs su tsan dan btags pa'i bdug pa dri za rnams la dbul bar bya'o// bu ram gyis bkang ba dang / phye'i
495b1(rgyud 'bum): skyo ma dang / 'o thug rnams lho'i phyogs su bdug pa dang / 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / til dang / 'bras thug po che rnams bsres pa dang / til gyi thug pa dang / chang gis bkang ba'ang
495b2(rgyud 'bum): grul bum rnams la dbul bar bya'o/ / nub kyi phyogs su mar dang gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul zhing / 'o mas bkang ba dang 'o thug rnams kyang klu dang 'dab bzangs rnams la gtor ma dbul bar bya'o//
495b3(rgyud 'bum): byang gi phyogs su kun tu ru'i bdug pa dang / rtsa ba mo dang / zho zan yang gnod sbyin rnams la dbul bar bya'o// kun tu ru ka ma rnyed na tsan dan btags pa'am/ sra rtsi pog kyang rung ngo // phye'i skyo ma
495b4(rgyud 'bum): dang sbrang rtsis bkang ba'ang phyogs bzhir rab tu grags shing / ji skad brjod pa'i yul 'khor srung la sogs pa'i bza' ba shes pa'i gnas kyis brtags par byas pa/ chu klung 'khyil pas bkang ba'i
495b5(rgyud 'bum): bum pa re re 'bru dang / ji ltar rnyed pa'i rgya shug dang / u dum ba ra dang / khardzu ra dang / rgun 'brum la sogs pa rnams dbul bar bya'o// sa bon thams cad kyang nyung ngu nyung ngu lhag ma dang bcas pa
495b6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de la gal te rig pa bsgrub par bya bzhin pa la shar gyi phyogs su ce spyang mo'i sgra grags par gyur na/ de la gnas nas 'das pas shar gyi phyogs gang yin par gtor ma lhag ma dang bcas par
495b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhag ste/ rtag tu gtor bar bya'o// gal te lho'i phyogs su gtor ma lhag ma dang bcas pa bzhag pa can gyis gnas der 'jigs pa 'jigs pas gtor bar bya'o// de bzhin du nub dang byang gi
496a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su gtor bar bya ste/ 'di ni yongs su spyod pa pos bya'o// rig pa sgrub pa pos rig pa kun tu sgrub pa la drang bar bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa'i snga ma'i rtsa bar khA shar
496a2(rgyud 'bum): du phyogs te ku sha blangs nas nye bar 'dug cing / nye bar 'dug nas rig pa 'dzin pas gling bzhi rnams kyi phyi rol du phyogs bzhir khor yug gi ro'i ngos bzhi la zlum po ser skya'i ba byung de nyid kyis
496a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / blangs nas nye bar 'dug pa de'i stan la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi bar du sol ba dang / 'byung dang / pA la sha las byung ba rnams gzhag par bya'o// lhag ma la sogs pa'ang
496a4(rgyud 'bum): me la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ / bsgrub par bya bar bsgoms te dang por mtshon cha dang / de nas yongs su bzlas pa'i swA hA'i mthar rab tu gzhug par bya'o// sa mI'i yam shing dang arka
496a5(rgyud 'bum): ma rnyed na u dum ba ra dang / pA la sha dang / a ba mArga dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba kun nas sreg tu gzhug par bya'o// de nas gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu gang yin pa de la sngags 'dis ming nas
496a6(rgyud 'bum): / smos par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ a ba lo ki ni swAhA/ sngags 'di brgyad brgyar bzlas la mdud pa brgyad byas te rak+Sha swA hA
496a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya'o/ / srad bu de bdag nyid srung ba'i don du bdag nyid kyi lag pa la bcing bar bya'o// sangs rgyas de dang de dus grub pa la lhag ma srad bu dang / sa bon la sogs pa rnams blangs nas yongs su spyod pa
496b1(rgyud 'bum): pos lha'i khang pa nam mkha' la gzhag par bya'o/ / lha mchod pas mchod par bya'o// de nas nad pa rnams kyis lhung bzed du bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa rnams dbul bar bya'o// lhag ma yid
496b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis bgos te chu klung du rab tu thugs par bya'o/ / rdzing skam po'am/ khron pa'am/ bla gab can gyi sa phyogs su sa la bskor bar bya'o// mes legs par bsregs par bya'o// gang la la bcom ldan
496b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das ma sgrol ma sgrub par 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'dis dang po kho nar byang chub kyi sems lhan cig bskyed par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa thams cad kyang
496b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub chen po'i mchog gi dngos grub kyi gnas so/ / de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni rig pa 'gog pa dang / rig pa skye ba ste/ de'i phyir de la rig pa bsgrub par bya ste/ de la bgegs byed par mi nus so//
496b5(rgyud 'bum): thog ma kho nar gzhan du rig pa sgrub par byed pa'i dus ni sa ga'i zla ba'i bco lnga nya'am/ dbo'am/ chu stod dam/ smin drug gi dkar po'i bco lnga la rnam pa gang du'ang rung ste/ gang du 'dod pa der bsgrub
496b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / dbyar dang mtshan mo spangs te/ slob ma 'ongs pa'ang dbyar rig pa bsgrub par mi bya'o// dkyil 'khor gsar pa bris nas zhi ba'i sgrub pa 'di bya'o// gang zhig drag po sgrub par byed par
496b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa de rnam pa 'dis nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas nye bar blangs te/ nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la sngags 'dis so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ke te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA
497a1(rgyud 'bum): ya ma hA ka ru ti kA ya/ oM bed bid swA hA/ sngags 'dis sngon du srad bu dmar po bcings te dur khrod du ba lang gi pags pa'i rnam par ser skya'i ba byung gis nye bar byugs pa
497a2(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ de bzhin kho nar gtor ma'i cho gas 'byung po gzhan rnams la gtor ma sna tshogs bya'o// yongs su spyod par byed pa po bzhis mtshon cha dang bcas pa'i rnam pas yam shing sreg tu gzhug
497a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / srad bu la mdud pa brgyad brgya byas nas bdag nyid srung ba'i don du bcing bar bya'o// sangs rgyas des 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / tshangs pa'i srin po la sogs pa rnams dbang
497a4(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur ro/ / rig pa grub pa na de bzhin kho nar gtor ma'i cho ga gshegs su gsol lo// rig pa sgrub pa thams cad la gang rig pa sgrub par byed par 'dod pa des mtshan mo gtsang mas gtsang mar gyur
497a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gos bgos te/ rang bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro// kun tu ru 'am a ka ru nag po'i 'dug pa sreg cing kha shar du phyogs pas lan bcur brjod par bya'o// 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya ste/
497a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ma rang nyid byon nas me tog dang gtor ma'ang so sor bzhes nas bdag gi bya ba 'di mdzod cig ces so// de bzhin du lho shar du kha phyogs pas dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang /
497a7(rgyud 'bum): byang shar dang / steng dang / 'og tu'ang brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro// rang nyid kyis byon te 'dug pa dang / me tog la sogs pa dang / mar me so sor ba zhes nas bdag gi bya ba'ang bya'o zhes so//
497b1(rgyud 'bum): phyir zhing tho rangs zhi ba'ang lan bdun nam/ bcur de bzhin nyid du phyogs bcu rnams su spyan drang bar bya bar 'gyur ro// byon pa dang bdug spos la sogs pa'ang dbul bar bya'o// slar yang nyin mo
497b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par mnan te gtor ma'i las thams cad byas nas ku sha blangs te nye bar 'dug par 'dod pas de bzhin nyid du phyogs bcur spyan drang bar bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang / dri dang me
497b3(rgyud 'bum): tog la sogs pa'ang bzhes te bdag gi bya ba'ang mdzod cig ces so/ / de nas ku sha blangs te nye bar 'dug ste ji skad bshad pa'i bsgrub pa bya'o// rig pa sgrub pa la mtshan ma 'di rnams 'byung ste/
497b4(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i ched du rmi lam mthong ba ni glang po che dang / rta dang / lha'i khyim dang / khang bzang mthong ba dang / 'dzegs pa dang / rig pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid rnams kyang rta mthong bas rlung gi
497b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i dngos grub grub bo/ / de bzhin du ma dang / pha dang / mes po dang / yang mes dang / rgyal po chen po dang / bu mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ba dang / gos dkar po bgo ba dang / zan dang /
497b6(rgyud 'bum): ba glang dang / zam ze gzhon nu dang / gser dang / rlan dang / rma bya dang / sha dang / nya dang / 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar gyi gtor ma'i las la sogs pa rnams 'jug bzhin pas non
497b7(rgyud 'bum): par smra ba rnams dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa mthong na ji lta bar ldan pa'o// de nas so ka dang dbyar nye bar ma mthong ba dang / brlan la gnas pa'i nas dang gro rnams mthong na
498a1(rgyud 'bum): phyin ci log gi dus kyi char pa dang / ji ltar rab tu bsngags pa'i zhi ba 'dod pa ni bum pa gang ba dang / 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam
498a2(rgyud 'bum): mthong na rab tu 'jug par bya bzhin pa 'di rnams ni mchog las so/ / ba lang dang / bram ze dang / gzhon nu dang / gser dang / rma bya la sogs pa rnams mthong ba dang bltas nas dngos grub po
498a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes rig pa las rig pa thams cad sgrub pa'i bya ba rnams la las rnams brtsam par bya'o/ / phyin ci log 'di rnams mthong naganyid mi log ste/ rmi lam du sdig pa dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / phag dang
498a4(rgyud 'bum): spre'u dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rgod thams cad dang / byi ba dang / byi la dang / dpyid dang / gcer bu dang / pi ta ru k+Sha dang / snod stong pa dang / shing skam po dang / dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / chu klung
498a5(rgyud 'bum): bskams pa dang / log par 'dzin pa rnams te/ mi shis pa mthong na rig pa mi 'grub bo// bya ba thams cad la bgegs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de la sngags 'di bgegs thams cad la rab tu sbyar
498a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / oM badz+ra khu ra bi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT/ sngags 'di ni rta mgrin zhes bya ba khro bo'i rgyal po ste/ sngags 'di lhag par gnas pas bdag nyid bsrung ba byas pa dang / gang du las thams cad sgrub
498a7(rgyud 'bum): ba la 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / / de nas rims rnams dang / byis pa gdon gyis zin pa rnams la byabs pa dang / srad bu bcing bar bya ste/ dug byab pa'ang ji srid du rig pa lan cig bzlas pas 'grub
498b1(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / de la bum pa la 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu gtso bo'i sngags kyis mdud pa brgyad brgya byas nas bum pa de la bcing bar bya'o// rig pa de dngos grub dang dngos
498b2(rgyud 'bum): grub med par ston par byed do/ / nyi ma gnyis pa la mdud pa thams cad dgrol bar bya'o// rnam pa gzhan du na rig pas bcings te ma grol bzhin pa don med par byed pa de lta bu la sogs pa sngags des
498b3(rgyud 'bum): las bco brgyad du 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni lhag par gnas pa thams cad dang sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs te/ de la rig pa'i sngags kyi sbyor ba'i khyad par brjod par bya ste/ gang du bsgrub par bya
498b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin pa'i skyes bu la mthong ba sbyin par byed de/ de la skyes bu'i lhag pa'i lha de skyes bu la nye bar gnas par rtog par byed de/ sngags de gang gis bsgrub par bya bzhin pa la bud med mthong ba sbyin par byed do//
498b5(rgyud 'bum): lhag pa'i lha de nye bar gnas par rtog par byed do// 'di ni rig pa'i sngags kyi khyad par ro// / sngags 'di'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga ni dkyil 'khor grubazhi pa nye bar byugs te/ de'i dbus
498b6(rgyud 'bum): su sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhugs nas/ de'i g.yon gyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma gzhag par bya'o// g.yon du khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin no// de nas myur du shar du
498b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par phyogs pas gnas nas ku sha blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan la dri dang mar me la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas/ a ka ru dang / tu ru ka'i bdug pa bsreg te/ gtor ma thob pa'ang
499a1(rgyud 'bum): sbas pa'i phyogs bzhi rnams su phul nas/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar ku sha blangs nas nye bar 'dug ste/ nad thams cad la khyad par du byab par bya'o// nad thams
499a2(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam par thim zhing grol bar 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma bdun pa'i tho rangs sam mtshan mo gsum la'o// sgrol ma'i rgyud de thams cad kyi cho ga 'khor dang bcas pa 'chad par byed do// rgya mtsho dang / ri bo dang /
499a3(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod rnams su so sor gnas pa'i dge slong ma gzhan gang la las bdag nyid srung ba'i don du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o// sha za ba'i gnod sbyin la sogs pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi 'jigs pa mi
499a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ngo / / de la shar gyi phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas nas der dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa phul nas/ bdag nyid srung ba'i don du lan nyi shu rtsa bdun
499a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du mtshan mo'i dus la bab pa na lam du bzlas pas bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o// rtag tu yid la bya'o// srad bu'ang bdag nyid la bcing bar bya'o// sngar brjod pa de
499a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis kyang lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas bris par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du snying por gdon rnams la sngar brjod pa'i cho gas ku shas byab par bya'o// sngar brjod pa de rnams kyis kyang
499a7(rgyud 'bum): rig pa bdun po de rnams kyis so/ / de bzhin du lho'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod pas bdug pa dang me tog phul nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du grul bum gyi gdon
499b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams la sngar brjod pa'i cho gas byab par bya'o/ / srad bu'ang bcing bar bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod pas de bzhin du klu dang 'dab bzang gi gdon rnams la sngar
499b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod pas byab par bya'o/ / sngar brjod pa'i cho gas so// de zhin du byang gi phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod pas de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams la sngar brjod pa'i cho gas so// de bzhin du phyogs bral
499b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams su'ang ngo / / de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ slar yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa rnams la smras pa/ grogs po khyed rnams nyon cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
499b4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs mtshan thams cad rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong nas g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang / chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa 'am/ mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o// dar rig
499b5(rgyud 'bum): pa bsgrub par bya'o/ / mngon spyod can ni bsgrub par mi bya ste/ sgrol mas non pa'i khro bo dang nye bar bsgrub par bya'o// ji srid ral gcig ma'i mdun nam phyag na rdo rje dang nye bar ro// khro bo'i mtshan
499b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyang 'chad par byed do/ / mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa snum zhing sngo bsangs sngar brjod pa'i rnam pa las zhi ba'i gzugs can gyi mdun du rig pa gzhan yang bsgrub par bya'o// mngon
499b7(rgyud 'bum): spyod can gyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can du bya'o/ / zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can ni zhi ba'i gzugs can no// gang du sgrub pa po mngon par phyogs nas bltas pa der bsgrub par bya'o// ral pa gyen brdzes
500a1(rgyud 'bum): su brjod pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rjes su gnang ba'ang bud med gang yin pa'i bud med de'i mtshan nyid dang / gzugs dang / cha byad 'chang bar bya'o// skyes
500a2(rgyud 'bum): pa yod na skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa/ skyes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byas pa/ lag cha dang bcas pa ci 'dra ba 'am/ sngar brjod pa de 'dra ba bya'o// phyin ci log gi gzugs kyis
500a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub mi 'byung ngo / / ji srid du lha drag po de'i nye logs su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhag par bya'o// mchod rten nA ma/ slar yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po can/ ma gas shing dum
500a4(rgyud 'bum): bur ma gyur pa dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ / de la bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni dam tshig thams cad skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ rnam par rgyal ba mngon
500a5(rgyud 'bum): par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba bkra shis dang bsod nams kyi las thams cad byed pa dang / lo tog dang / tshe dang / nad med pa 'phel bar byed pa/ dam tshig nyams pa rnams kyang dam tshig skyed par byed
500a6(rgyud 'bum): pa por 'gyur ro/ / sna tshogs pa'i chu klung gi 'gram mam/ pad+ma'i mtsho'i 'gram du dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o// legs par sbyangs pa'i sa gzhi'i char byas nas sgra dang / phub ma dang / sol ba dang /
500a7(rgyud 'bum): thal ba dang / shing dang / so phag dang / gseg ma dang / thod pa dang / keng rus dang bral ba/ mgrin pa'am/ chu'i tshad gang du nye logs na chu yod pa'i g.yas kyi gzhogs sam nub tu gang du me tog dang
500b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bur ldan pa'i shing yod pa dang / gang yang yid du mngon par 'ong 'gang du nor yod pa'i phyogs su gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa/ tshon sna lnga pa'i sA li'i phye mas dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya'o// tshon sna lnga pa'i srad
500b2(rgyud 'bum): bu nyid kyis thig btab nas u dum ba ra'i phur bu rnams kyis kyang ngo / / dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes grangs dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam dang / rgyu skar dang / sbyor ba dge ba la de rnams kyis dang por dkar
500b3(rgyud 'bum): poganyis par dmar po/ gsum par ser po/ bzhi par sngon po/ lnga par nag po zhes so// lhag ma shar gyi dbus su lha rnams bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i dbus su 'bru dang / rin po che dang / sman dang /
500b4(rgyud 'bum): me tog thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba'i bum pa rab tu gzhag par bya'o// de'i shar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/ g.yon du dri ma
500b5(rgyud 'bum): med par 'gro ba'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhogs su sgrol ma bdun no// g.yon du dri ma med par 'gro ba'i bud med bdun no// dpal lha mo'i gzhogs su gos dkar mo'o//
500b6(rgyud 'bum): sgrol ma rnams kyi gzhogs su zla ba ma gzhag par bya'o// zla ba ma nas brtsams nas dpal mo grags ldan mo dang dkar mo'ang ngo zhes so// gzhogs su dkar mo chen mo dang khro gnyer can no// sgo'i phyogs su
500b7(rgyud 'bum): snying stobs ma dang nus pa'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi nang gi gzhogs gnyis kar tshangs pa dang drag po'ang ngo // drag po'i gzhogs su lha mo dbu ma'o// tshangs pa'i dbyangs can ma'o// sgo'i nang du dbyug gu dang
501a1(rgyud 'bum): ril ba spyi blugs so/ / gcig tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o// gcig tu zhi ba thob pa'o// sgo ru mngon phyogs dang rta mgrin zhes bya ba'i khro bo gzhag par bya'o// de'i gzhogs su srin mo
501a2(rgyud 'bum): ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o/ / 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ khru bzhi pa'am/ khru brgyad pa'am/ khru bcu gnyis pa 'am/ khru bcu drug pa'i dkyil
501a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor kun tu bri bar bya'o/ / gzugs sam phyag rgya rnams dgod par bya'o// thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya rgyas par bya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs bzang
501a4(rgyud 'bum): / po'o// 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ni ut+pa la'o// dpal mo'i ni me tog kha phye ba dang pad+ma dkar po'o// gos dkar mo'i de nyid sdong bu dang bcas pa mchog tu rgyas pa'o// 'phags ma grags ldan ma'i sdong bu
501a5(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa'i me tog go/ sgo rnams thams cad du dang ka shA re re la tsU ta'i yal 'dab bcu bkod de stod du ba dan bsgreng bar bya'o// de nas rang rang gi sngags kyis spyan drang bar bya ste/ gshegs su gsol
501a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang ngo / / yang na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying pos/ tshor rab rig pas so// yang na 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying pos me tog dkar pos spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol lo//
501a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo dzi dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar mes mchod pa byas nas tor mas nye bar mchod de/ bkra shis can dang / ukhro pi ka dang / mon sran ze'u dang / snum 'khur la sogs pa dang / mon
501b1(rgyud 'bum): sran sde'u'i la du dang / til gyi thug pa dang / 'o thug dang / zho'i zan dang / zho dang / dar ba dang / thug pa dang / 'byung po'i zas snum 'khur gzhan rnams dang / bya na bu ram dang / zho'ang ste/ gtor ma'i
501b2(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'o/ / de nas slar yang dri bzang po'i rwa dang me tog gi mchod pa byas nas chu las skyes pa ni khyad par du'o// de nas re re la sngags lan bdun bdun brjod par bya'o// yang na 'phags ma sgrol ma brgyad
501b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyar bzlas par bya'o/ / nang gi bum pa gang yin pa de la snying po yi ge lngas stong brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o// de nas me'i gnas su me nye bar bzung nas mar dang / tal mar dang / zas nyid kyi sbyin
501b4(rgyud 'bum): sreg gi cho ga ji ltar gzugs dang grangs med par de ltar sbyin sreg kyang bya'o/ / phyi nas slob ma legs par yongs su brtags pa'i snod dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos yang rab tu gzhug par bya'o//
501b5(rgyud 'bum): gos kyis gdong g.yogs te thal mo me tog gis bkang ba rab tu bcug ste gtor bar bya'o// gang du lhung ba de de'i rigs su 'gyur ro// de ltar dkyil 'khor du rab tu bcug ste slob ma dam tshig shes
501b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / dbang bskur gang 'dod pa de byin te lho dang nub nas shar du mngon par phyogs nas sra rtsi pog gi bdug pa mar dang bsres pas nye bar 'dug go/ nyi ma gung la bum pas so// sngags thams
501b7(rgyud 'bum): cad bdun bdun bzlas pa'i sreg blugs bsregs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i las chen pos slob ma g.yon gyi phyogs su gzhag ste/ de nas dkyil 'khor la skor ba byed du gzhug go/ snying po'ang
502a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin no/ / des 'phags ma sgrol ma 'di'i phyag rgya bcings nas bzlas par bya'o// de lta bum mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de rnams thams cad du thams cad byas na'
502a2(rgyud 'bum): myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das ma la rab tu dad par byed do// seng ge'i khri la gnas pa lta bu'i rgyal srid 'dod pas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// long spyod 'dod pas rgya skyegs kyi 'dab
502a3(rgyud 'bum): ma la gnas pa'o/ / log par 'dren pa nye bar phyung ba bdag gis so phag la kun tu gnas pa'o// tshe 'dod pas thung ngu bcu la g.yo ba'i sa'i snying po la gnas pa'o// slob dpon rgyas par 'dod pas a riSh+Ta dang
502a4(rgyud 'bum): thod pa la kun tu gnas pa can nye bar phyung ba mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o/ / lan bdun du mngon par dbang bskur bas ni dpal med pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// lan bcu gnyis su mngon par dbang bskur bas
502a5(rgyud 'bum): ni rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / lan lngar mngon par dbang bskur bas ni dbul po nor dang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyi nas slar yang mchod de gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// 'di ni'i'alags ma sgrol ma'i rnam par rgyal
502a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/ / dkyil 'khor 'di kun tu bris nas ring por mi thogs pa nyid du bcom ldan 'das ma rab tu dgyes par byed do// // de nas yang byang chub
502a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ ral pa gyen brjes kyi rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rjes su brtse bas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi bstan
502b1(rgyud 'bum): pakun tu bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i ched du/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad nyid du dngos grub byed pa/ snyigs ma lngas nyon mongs pa 'di la'ang chos kyi tshul thams cad lhag par gnas pa'i ched du sgrol
502b2(rgyud 'bum): mas non pa dang mtshungs pa/ las byed pa phyi ma 'di'i lam rab tu gnas pa'i ched du 'di skad du'ang smras so// bcom ldan 'das rab tu gnas pa dang smon lam brjod par bgyi'o// sngags kyi spyod pa de
502b3(rgyud 'bum): lta bu 'di ni ci nas de sems can rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyur yongs su 'gyur ba dang / ci nas de thams cad 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad kyi 'jigs pa dang / pha rol
502b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i char lhung ba dang / sdig pa'i char byed pa'i mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / dud 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / de la'ang bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam dang /
502b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma ngan pa dang / gdug pa'i gnod sbyin dang / skyes bu dang / ro dang bral ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / dri ngan pa dang / reg pa ngan pa dang / dug bsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma
502b6(rgyud 'bum): sgrol ma bud med kyi gzugs dang tshwa byad kyis de la chom rkun dang / chu dang / mu ge dang / rnam par 'tshe ba sel bar bgyi'o// rgyal po dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / ma he dang / spyang ki dang / dug dang /
502b7(rgyud 'bum): chom rkun dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// sems can thams cad kyang sngags sgrub pa'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ yongs su longs spyod pas rnam pa sna tshogs
503a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'bras bu dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i ro bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang / stan rnams rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sems can/
503a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang chos 'dod pa nyid dang / dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa la sbyar bar bgyi'o// 'di ni bdag gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan sngar smon lam mthar thug pa ste/ gang du bdag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan
503a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das thams cad kyis gnang bar gyur cig/ bdag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi dngos grub yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bdag dang skyes bu'i rnam pa 'di nges par sgrol ba'i
503a4(rgyud 'bum): ched du de lta bu'i gzugs kyis bdag dang phyag na rdo rje bud med kyi gzugs kyis dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang cha byad kyis sems can yongs su smin par bgyi'o// de nas yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
503a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rjes su brtse bas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba gzhan rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
503a6(rgyud 'bum): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa rnams dgug par byas nas de lta bu'i gzugs kyis skyes bu chen po'i rnam pa byed par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams
503a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug grub par 'gyur ro// de nas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
503b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni bdud dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba gzhan rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
503b2(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / gzi brjid che zhing gzi brjid che ba'i mi rnams yong bar byed cing / sangs rgyas thams kyis yongs su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs pa/ khyed kyi rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig rnams ni gang
503b3(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis nus pa de lta bu'i gzugs dang skyes bu'i rnam par byas pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyang skad cig gis tshangs pa'i cha byad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yang dag par sbyor bar byed do//
503b4(rgyud 'bum): yud tsam gyis dge slong gi cha byad kyis dang / skad cig gis sman dang rtsi'i gzugs kyis dang / yud tsam gyis brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug par byed do// skad cig gis bdud kyi
503b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyis gzhan gyi gzugs sprul te dbang sgyur gyi lha'i dbang po dang / dga' ldan dang / mtshe ma dang / 'og min dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'byung po thams cad pa dang / dur khrod dang / drag po dang

504a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ de bzhini gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras

504a6(rgyud 'bum): grangs med pa rnams yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs par gyur to// bsam pa ji lta ba'i gzugs kyis rang dang

504b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yo byad dang / yongs su longs spyod par 'dod pa de rnam kyi zhen pa spang ba'i chang dud rnams la kho byad rnams byin nas dz+har mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu 'jog par byed do// nges par sbyar

505a3(rgyud 'bum): sha tsa gra he Shu/ a pra ti ha to/ b+ha bi/ badz+ra kiny+tsa rA ya si/ au maM duSh+Ta gra ha duSh+Ta sar+b+baM bA/ d+hA na d+hu na/ ma tha maM tha/ pa Ta pa Ti/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma/ sad+g+ha/ a nu dz+nyA ka ra shI g+h+r-i/ ha ya grI ba phaT/ badz+ra gA twA ya phaT/
505a4(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra ne tA ya phaT/ badz+ra daSh+TA ya phaT/ badz+ra khu rA ya phaT/ badz+ra Ar+ya khu ra nir g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ pa ra man+ta bi nA sha nA ya phaT/ trai lokya b+ha yaM kA rA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Sh+Ta a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ badz+ra ku lo tra sa na

505b1(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba biShI pra Shi/ za bipra bi pra bi sha/ ha ya grI ba pri ya dz+wa la A bi sha A bi sha badz+ra khu ra/ mA bi lam+ba/ bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+ha ba tsa na/ ma nu sma ra/ dzA ti ma nu s+pha ra/ hr-i da ya ma nu s+phA ra/ bi ko ra bi ki ra/ ga dza ga dza/ nan+da nar+tha/
505b2(rgyud 'bum): gu lu gu lu/ mu lu mu lu/ ni ha na ni ha na/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT swA hA/ snying po'i sngags so// na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ 'di'ang stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa/ rig pa'i rgyal

506a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ / ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar la/ pad+ma'i lus dang ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba'i dbus su 'od dpag

506b1(rgyud 'bum): padang mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas 'grang 'phreng bzhag nas mar gyi mar me rgya chen po dang dkar po'i gtor ma phul nas/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngon spyad pa byas

506b6(rgyud 'bum): pas me'i ra ba dang / de nas srung ba'i cho ga byas nas yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas pas sa gzhi bcing ba dang / chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas nam mkha' bcing ba'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin

507a4(rgyud 'bum): nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa rings par ji srid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ / byon pa na'ang mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos mchod

507a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya che ba'i bla re g.yer kha'i dra ba 'phyang ba/ gser gyi 'dab mas rab tu 'phyang bzhin pas sgrol ma bcings pa/ in+d+ra nI la dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / so gan+d+hi ka dang / rgyan gyi khyad par gzhan rnams kyis
507b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang rdo rje'i nus pas rnam par spras shing nye bar smras pa/ bkra shis pa gzhan gyis kyang rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa/ glu len bzhin pa/ snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs nges par sgrogs pa/

508a7(rgyud 'bum): po yis ni ma yin pa kho na'o/ / ji srid du rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu sbyar bar mi bya ba'i gnas rnams su rab tu sbyar bar mi bya ste gang rab tu sbyor bar byed pa de'i mchog gi sgrub pa mi 'grub bo// dam tshig shes
508b1(rgyud 'bum): pamed par yang 'gyur ro/ / dngos grub 'di ni sgrub thabs thams cad dang / rgyud thams cad du'o// sor mo la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas sprin gnon par byed do// mgo reg byas nas rgyan
508b2(rgyud 'bum): po rgyal bar byed do/ / tha snyad thams cad nyid la'ang ngo // yungs kar la lan bdun bsngags pa byas nas ril bsnun par bya ste/ rnam par snyil bar byed do// mA la ri'i me tog la lan bdun mngon par bsngag

508b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams lan lngar yongs su bzlas te byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / rtsa ba'i sngags kyis skyes pa dang lhan cig bud med dbang du 'gyur ro// sgrub pa la zhugs pas gang dang der gnas pa de nyid kyis phye mas
508b6(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par brtsam par bya ste/ log 'dren rnams kyis zil gyis mi non no// 'di nyid kyis srin po dang yi dgas la sogs pa rnams kyis so// ku Tu dza'i sa bon dang / nag ge sar dang / pad+ma'i 'dab
508b7(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / shI Sha'i me tog dang / spang spos dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / lag skyes kyi sa bon dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po'i me tog dang / sa bon rnams gcig tu
509a1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas bser skya'i gcin gyis bu mo'i lag par btags par bya'o/ / de nas ril bu byas nas mib ma la mA la tI'i me tog dkar pos bgo bar bya'o// 'di rnams kyis lus byugs
509a2(rgyud 'bum): na log par 'dren pa dang / yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / sha za la sogs pa rnams gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro// gal te mi sbyin na ba lang gi gcin la lan bdun mngon par bsngag
509a3(rgyud 'bum): par byas pas nad rab tu 'joms par byed/ gu gul dang / pi tsu ma ra ta'i sa bon dang / tsan dan dang / tu ru ska dang / shrI bA sa ka 'di rnams phye mar byas nas gos la bdug par gyis shig/ gang gis kyang
509a4(rgyud 'bum): zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro/ / ldong ros dang / gi'u wang dang / lag skyes dang / ba ru ra dang / ka dam pa'i me tog dang / shing mngar dang / se pha li ka'i me tog dang / shing tsa dang / na le sha ma dkar
509a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i sa bon dang / yung ba gnyis dang / shu dag rnams pa ser skya'i gcin gyis bram ze'i bu mo'i lag par gso sbyong can gyis btags par bya'o// ril bu byas nas ut+pa las bsgo bar bya'o// a ti muk+ta
509a6(rgyud 'bum): ka dang / / sA la dang // me tog sngon pos bsgos par bya'o// log par 'dren pa rnams sam/ gzhan rnams sam/ yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / srin po la sogs pa rnams gang gis kyang
509a7(rgyud 'bum): zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro/ / nad med pa'i le'u rdzogs so// / de nas ro langs sgrub pa 'byung ste/ skyes pa'i ro ma nyams pa rab tu mdzes pa la dkar po'i bco lnga la thams
509b1(rgyud 'bum): byug pa byas nas sbyangs pa'i snod du bzhags nas/ gso sbyong can des kyang sgra gzhor du bcug nas me tog gi 'phreng ba mgrin pa la bcings te/ khron pa skam por zhugs nas ser skya'i ba byung gi ring bsrel
509b2(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa'i mchod rten de nyid du khron par bzhag nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te gtor ma dang / seng ldeng gyi phur bu bzhi rnams kyis bcing ba dang / phyogs skyong ba rnams gzhag par bya'o// ro de la 'bras
509b3(rgyud 'bum): los dang phye ba ser skya'i 'o ma dang sbyar te/ ji srid du ro de'i lce byung gi bar de srid du khar sreg blugs gyis shig/ de bcad nas ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dpa' bo chen po pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro//

509b7(rgyud 'bum): ser skya'i ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas mel sbyini sreg byas pa'i thal bas ro langs bris nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ de bzhin du yang dag par bzhag nas be kaM ka ta'i sreg thugs kyi sbyin sreg

515b1(rgyud 'bum): ras sgra dang bral ba la kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis bir gsar pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser ltar ser ba/ ral pa
515b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phyang ba/ 'od dpag med dbu la 'dzin pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o// 'og tu sgrub pa po spos phor lag na thogs pas pus mo gnyis btsug
515b3(rgyud 'bum): pa byang chub sems dpa' la nges par rtog bzhin pa'o/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te ras ris kyi spyan sngar nyi ma re re zhing rgyun mi 'chad pa'i
515b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa dang / gtor ma dang / mar me'ang ji srid zla ba nya ba'i bar du bya'o// zla ba nya la mchod pa rgya chen po dang / gtor ma dang / mar me'ang byas nas smon lam gdab par yang bya ste/ sangs
515b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas/ mA la ti'i me tog gis yongs su bkang ba'i dri'i chu'i snod lag pa gnyis kas blangs nas pus mo gnyis btsugs te/ rtsa ba'i
515b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags lan bdun brjod nas rang gi lha rnams spyan drang bar bya ste/ mchod yon dang gdan phul nas slar yang byabs te ba ser skya'i mar la btags pa'i mA la ti'i me tog sbyin sreg bya'o// lha
515b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams tshim par byed pa byas nas bsrung ba byas pa ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ nga rgyal dang bral ba mi smra bas g.yo ba bcom ste/ dran pa mchog gis dmigs par byas la/ ji srid 'phags
516a1(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang nyid pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba byon pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / sems dpa' chen po byon pa dang / sa
516a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba dang / ri'i rtse mo nyil ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / lha thams cad me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams
516a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char 'bebs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams rin po che chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa dang / lha ma yin thams cad ut+pa la'i char rab tu 'bebs par byed do//
516a4(rgyud 'bum): drag po thams cad khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba pa rnams kyang skad cig de la bde ba skyes te mchog tu 'jigs pa smra bar byed do// dri za rnams glu snyan pa'i sgra thos par byed do// rig pa 'dzin
516a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyang rang gi rig pas yongs su bskor te/ ji ltar rnam par 'phrul pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ong bar byed do// log 'dren thams cad dang / bgegs thams cad dang /
516a6(rgyud 'bum): srin po thams cad dang / yi dgas thams cad dang / ji srid du drag po sna tshogs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' byon pa mthong nas zhi ba'i sems su gyur to// sprin las ku lu gu lu'i sgra sgrogs pa
516a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / sa rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba dang / phyogs bzhi skyong ba rnams byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ong bar byed do// log par 'dren pa thams cad dang bgegs thams cad 'ong ste phyogs bzhi rab tu zhi
516b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / rlung 'gro ba dang / drag po rab tu 'gro bar byed/ dus ma yin par shing la me tog tu 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'ong ste/ phyogs gang du rig pa 'dzin bsgrung
516b2(rgyud 'bum): pab byed pa der sems dpa' chen po'i dga' ston la thams cad nyid 'dus so/ / sgrub pa pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong nas mchod yon phul nas phyag bya'o// lha thams
516b3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad la mchod yon dang gdan phul nas/ de nas lha thams cad dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis sgrub pa po byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
516b4(rgyud 'bum): srid pa gsum gyi chu bo chen po las bsgral bar byas pa de rnams nges par rgyal ba kun tu snang bas mnan pa byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang lhan cig 'tsho ba'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
516b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gis lha thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyag g.yas pa sgrub pa po'i spyi bor myug par mdzad do// de 'chi ba med pa mdzad do// de nas sgrub pa pos gang
516b6(rgyud 'bum): yid la snying po bsams pa der 'gyur ro/ / rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lha nyid dang / lha nyid gang 'dod pa de rnams ches gzhan du snang ste/ 'di skad ces brjod
516b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gru 'dzin de mthong bar 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpas skyes bu chen po phyag g.yas pas bzung ste rig pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin
517a1(rgyud 'bum): kha yang dag par gtad par gyur to/ / gru 'dzin du song zhig/ gang 'dod pa de sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po rig pa'i rgyal po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang bcas
517a2(rgyud 'bum): pa sgrub pa po'i lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung nas rgya mtsho'i dbus su lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa
517a3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po'i rig pa'i tshogs la me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang / rnga bo che dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga kha gcig pa dang / rdza rnga rnams sgra'i'abyin bzhin du gru 'dzin du 'gro bar byed do// rgya mtsho
517a4(rgyud 'bum): steng der rgya mtsho chen po rig pa'i rgyal pos mthong nas/ skyes bu dam pa de'ang chu klung thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i rin po che'i mchod yon rab tu stsol bar byed par 'gyur ro// legs so zhes
517a5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'ang gnang bar mdzad do/ / rigs kyi bu legs so legs par 'tsho ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas so// de nas rgya mtsho
517a6(rgyud 'bum): / chen po bsgral nas gru 'dzin du song ste mthong ba dang / der gang rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mo 'am tsi dang / lto 'phye

517b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis sna tshogs pa'i me tog nye bar mdzes pas rig pa'i rgyal po dang / sgrub pa po de la mngon par dbang bskur ba byas nas/ sgrub pa po la smras pa/ gnas 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags
517b3(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba/ khang pa dbus mar ji srid byang chub kyi bar du rang gi gnas bzhin du kun tu spyod cing gnas so// de nas rig pa 'dzin
517b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po la mngon par dbang bskur te/ rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu bgrod par gyur to// 'di ni dngos grub ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i mthu rnam par bsgyings pas mtshams med pa
517b5(rgyud 'bum): byed pas kyang 'di 'grub par byed do/ / rta mgrin rgyal pos/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad la smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas rin po che sna

517b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po 'di ni ma bsgrubs pa nyid du las thams cad byed de gtan pa gcod par byed pa dang / hUM yig gis rgya mtsho skams par byed pa dang / sor mo'i sdigs mdzub kyis thams cad
518a1(rgyud 'bum): rengs par byed pa dang / oM yig gis 'gugs par byed pa dang / phaT yig gis lhun po rnams kyang rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang / yid kyi bzlas pas sems can thams
518a2(rgyud 'bum): cad dbang du byed pa dang / oM yig gis spyan drang ba dang / hUM yig gis gshegs su gsol ba dang / phaT yig gis gsod pa dang / swA hA'i yi ges 'tsho bar byed pa ste/ mdor na rig pa rnams kyi
518a3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga ji snyed yod pa de thams cad rig pa 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa bsgrub par bya'o/ / 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi cho ga thun mong ba ste/ gang la cho ga med pa dang sdig pa byed
518a4(rgyud 'bum): pas kyang lan gsum du bzla'o/ / rta mgrin rig pa'i rgyal po brtson 'grus chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa chen po 'di lan gsum gyis mtshams
518a5(rgyud 'bum): med pa byed pas kyang 'grub par byed do/ / dad pas byang chub kyi sems yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa chen po dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ ser sna med pa dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / sangs rgyas
518a6(rgyud 'bum): dang chos la mngon par dang ba dang ma dang ba dang / ma dang phar shes pa dang / myur ba kho nar bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma bsgrubs par yang 'grub par byed de/ mdor na
518a7(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad pa 'di brjod nas rig pa gcod par 'dod pa dang / sel bar 'dod pas 'di brjod nas te/ 'di ni las thams cad pa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gzhan
518b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rdzogs pa'i ched du rta mgrin rgyal po'i mgul du'o// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu rnam par bsgyings pa nas
518b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so/ / // de nas 'od dpag med mthong bar 'dod na kha tshar ma bcad cing sgra dang bral ba'i ras la/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis
518b3(rgyud 'bum): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phags pa 'od dpag med gser ltar ser ba/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i gzhogs g.yon du rta mgrin rgyal po zhal

518b5(rgyud 'bum): 'od dpag med 'dzin pa/ sor mos log par 'dren pa la sdigs par byed bzhin pa/ de'i rgyab nas log par 'dren pa 'phros par byed bzhin pa'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs su rnam par brgyan pa sbyangs pa'i
518b6(rgyud 'bum): snod dang / gos dang / phyag g.yas pa sgrub pa po la dbugs 'byin par mdzad bzhin pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser ltar ser ba/ ral ba'i cod pan 'chang ba'i dbus su 'od
518b7(rgyud 'bum): dpag med mgo bos 'dzin par byed pa/ pha rol gnon pa'o// 'od dpag med kyi steng gi sprin de la sprin gseb nas gnas gtsang ma me tog rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// bcom
519a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi pad+ma de'ang klu gzhon nu rnams kyis 'dzin pa'o/ / 'og tu lag na spos phor thogs pa'i sgrub pa po pus mo gnyis btsugs pa/ 'od dpag med la rnam par lha
519a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin pa'o/ / ri mo'i las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sgrub pa pos gtor ma dang / mar me dang / mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ zla ba nyal mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas sbyangs pa'i
519a3(rgyud 'bum): snod dang gos 'di nyid kyis rig pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin bkug nas mchod yon phul te sgrub pa dang / slar yang gshegs su gsol te/ ba ser skya'i mar dang / pad+ma'i sa bon dang / na ga ge sar rnams
519a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu byas nas/ nyi ma bdun du sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lha rnams tshim par byed pa byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas smon lam gdab par bya ste/ ji srid dus
519a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yo ba dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang / sprin las gu lu gu lu'i sgra sgrogs pa dang / me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char 'bebs pa dang /
519a6(rgyud 'bum): dril bu'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa rings par bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid du rig pa'i rgyal po brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon pa rta mgrin rig pa
519a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis sgrub pa sa la 'ongs pa de srid du'o/ / de nas sgrub pa pos me tog dkar po dang dri'i chus yongs su bkang ba'i snod kyis mchod yon phul nas smon lam gdab bo// 'di skad ces
519b1(rgyud 'bum): smras so/ / khyed legs par 'ongs so// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pha rol tu phyin pa dang bcas pa'i ched du slar yang legs par 'ongs so// rta mgrin 'di ni brtson 'grus chen po
519b2(rgyud 'bum): stobs dang pha rol gnon pa rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa'o/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ pus mo btsugs

519b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po'i spyi bor myug par mdzad de/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// skyes bu dam pa brtson 'grus chen po stobs dang pha rol gnon pa khyod kyis gang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon pas

519b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ sgrub pa po phyag g.yas pas bzung nas rta mgrin rgyal po la yang dag par gtad par gyur to// rig pa'i rgyal po chen
520a1(rgyud 'bum): po skyes bu dam pa 'di bzung nas me tog gi char rab tu 'bab pa'i bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhig/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bcom ldan
520a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa der sdod du bcug nas/ slar yang gru 'dzin gang nang yod pa der shog cig/ de nas rta mgrin rig pa'i rgyal pos sgrub pa po bzung nas me tog gi char
520a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'bebs pa'i bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song ste/ sgrub pa po la smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston pa la

520a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams der 'phags pa 'od dpag med kyi drung du chos nyan no/ / dngos grub 'di ni gnas ma yin pa rnams la gang sbyar bar mi bya ste/ gang zhig byed na dam tshig las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod
520a6(rgyud 'bum): nas mchog gi sgrub pa rnams la 'di gnas pa ma yin pa rnams la rab tu mi sbyor te/ de'i dam tshig med do// las de rnams thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byed du gzhug go/ thal bas thal ba'i
520a7(rgyud 'bum): raba'o/ / sgron me gsum gyis me'i ra ba'o// chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas nam mkha' bcing ba'o// yungs kar dkar pos sa gzhi bcing ba'o// til gyi sbyin sreg gis log par
