520b5(rgyud 'bum): da par za bar byed pa dang / tha snyad las rgyal bar byed do// sngar brjod pa'i cho gas pa ser skya'i mar blangs nas lus la mngon par byugs te mer rab tu 'jug par byed do// seng ldeng las byung
520b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rdo rje blangs te/ hUM yig dang lhan cig pas phug gi sgor lha ma yin gyi bu mo byung ba dang / rab tu zhugs pa la 'khor lo'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // gal te 'khor lo rab tu 'jug par byed na
520b7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig dran pas hUM log gi phung pos 'khor lo phye mar byas par 'gyur ro/ / / de nas ril bu'i sgrub pa 'byung ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa ril bu sgrub par byed pas tsan dan dmar pa
521a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / me tog lnga pa dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / 'azas sA li dmar po'i lub ma dang / gaNi ka'i myu gu dang / DA ka'i ma bon dang / 'bru dang / ma sha'i myu gu dang /
521a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgya spos dang / tu ru ka'i til mar rnams gcig tu byas te/ cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba sar skya'i 'o ma la gso sbyong can gyis ser skya de la rnam par dben par rtsa
521a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags su bzlas nas khyim du btags te/ legs par btsags pa'i chu la mngon par bsngags nas nyi ma bdun du spyad par bya'o// khyim du'am rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su'ang rung ste/ de nas
521a4(rgyud 'bum): bsrung ba byas pa'i ba lang gi rdzi nges pa bzho bar bya'o/ / de nas 'o ma de dag gtsang ma'i phyogs rnam par dben par bum pa la bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag pas srub
521a5(rgyud 'bum): pabar byed du gzhug go/ mar des rdzas 'di rnams btags pa byas te/ lcags gsum gyis yongs su dkris pa byas nas/ de'ang ba ser skya'i ba byung lngar ril bu mtshan mo gcig tu bcug nas gzhag
521a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / de nas bton nas dri'i chu la gzhag par bya'o// bkrus te pad+ma'i 'dab mar gi'u wang gis byugs la gzhag par bya'o// de nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag nas srung ba'i tshe
521a7(rgyud 'bum): ga byas pas gtor ma dang / mar me dang / mchod pa'i cho ga rgya chen po byas te/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lag pa gnyis kas pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams kyi ril bu brgyad blangs te pad+ma kha sbyor du bzhag
521b1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ ba ser skya'i mar de nyid mAl ti'i me tog dang gcig tu byas nas sreg thugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rang gi lha spyan drang ba byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras
521b2(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar ji srid du ru ba 'thul bar byed pa dang 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / du ba 'phrul bzhin pas mi snang ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / nam mkha'
521b3(rgyud 'bum): la 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs pa'i 'od kyi rig pa 'dzin pa mtshan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis lhan cig rtse
521b4(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ dga' bar byed do// lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rgyal rigs kyi khyim du skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro// 'di nyid kyis
521b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i sa bon dang / par+t+ti ta ka ra'i sa bon dang / tu ru ska dang / a ka ru nag po dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / sau gan+d+hi ka dang / ma la'i me tog dang / gur kum dang / ldong ros
521b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / gi'u wang rnams pa ser skya'i ba byung lngas gzhon nu ma gso sbyong can dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pas btag par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas pri yang ku'i shing blangs nas khang pa brtseg
521b7(rgyud 'bum): pa gtsang mar shing bzo ba gso sbyong can byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa'i lag pas za ma tog byed du gzhug go// za ma tog der ril bu nyi shu rtsa gcig bcug

527b5(rgyud 'bum): shing sha mi'i yam shing gos me rab tu sbar nas gang ba'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad zun gsum du ji ltar nus pas sbyin sreg gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
527b6(rgyud 'bum): la mchod pa byas nas ri khrod lo ma can la'ang bya'o/ / de bzhin las byas pas nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed do// ba lang gi nye bar 'tshe ba la ba lang gi spu dang rus las sbyin sreg bya ste/ zhi bar 'gyur
527b7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / ma he'i nad thams cad la sgra dang rus pas nyi ma bdun du sbyin sreg bya ste/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar gyi gnod pa la nyi ma 'dun du'o ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o// dngos grub thams cad rtogs par 'dod pas nyi ma
528a1(rgyud 'bum): bdun du nye bar 'tshe ba la seng ldeng gi phye ma'i sbyin sreg go/ mgo bo na ba la dri bzang po'i me tog la yongs su bzlas nas bsnams nas mer gzhug par bya ste/ rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro//
528a2(rgyud 'bum): rims la srad bu bcing bar bya ste/ rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro// za ba dang sbyin sreg kyang bya'o// gdon la bag zan las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la lan bdun bzlas te nyi ma bdun nas grol bar 'gyur ro// mig
528a3(rgyud 'bum): na pa la mig sman gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun gyis grol lo// zhi bar 'dod pas dur g+ha'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// rgyas par 'dod pas yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rgyas par 'gyur ro//
528a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba la shu dag gi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lan tshwa las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa la yal 'dab kyi las so// sbrul lnga
528a5(rgyud 'bum): / byung ba'i nyi ma bdun la dbang du byed do// 'byung po dang sha za'i rgyas btab pa la lan nyi shur bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun par bya ste/ rang gi gnas su 'gro'o// rtag tu bzlas pas skye bo tham cad dga' bar 'gyur ro//
528a6(rgyud 'bum): / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdong la yongs su bzlas na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi las thams cad la nyi ma bdun du sbyin sreg bya'o// mdor na nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'jom
528a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis las thams cad byed do// las thams cad la dang por gang ba'i sreg blugs sbyin sreg gyis shig/ las thams cad la'ang las 'di nyid kyis shog ces bya'o//
528b1(rgyud 'bum): gso sbyong can gyis bya ba'o// sems can thams cad la sems kyis dmigs pas sa las byung ba'i ka ba la dang / sel+la ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas/ gzhon nu mas mdud pa brgyad brgya
528b2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas de dri'i chus bkrus nas shing la bzhag ste/ de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o// de bzhin du ma he rnams dang / ra rnams dang / phyugs rnams la chom rkun gyis nye bar 'tshe ba la ra ba la bcing bar bya'o//
528b3(rgyud 'bum): bum pa chus gang ba byas nas gtsang mas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas te nad pa'o rked pa la bcing bar bya'o// rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro// khyim du tshangs pa'i srin po dang sha zas nye bar 'tshe ba rnams
528b4(rgyud 'bum): lasbyin sreg gyis shig/ ji ltar nus pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga bya'o zhes te/ 'di ni ri khrod lo ma can zhes bya ba'i gzungs ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar gsungs pa byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjo/
528b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mdo sde'ang ngo // / slar yang dus de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor phyag g.yas
528b6(rgyud 'bum): pa rab tu brkyang nas myug par mdzad de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rin chen 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ 'di klog par byed pas 'grub par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang
528b7(rgyud 'bum): bas gsungs so/ / rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po phyi ma de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i chang dang / ral pa gyen brjes kyi rgyud dbyi mar bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa po'i dngos grub byed
529a1(rgyud 'bum): pa rtag tu byed du gzhug go/ blo gros dang ldan pas gang dge ba'i tshes grangs la bris nas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+ha la/
529a2(rgyud 'bum): namo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaMg+hA ya/ na maHsap+tA nAM/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ko Ti ni na mo me tri ya/ pra mu khA nAM/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ na maHsamyag+ha tA nAM/ na maHsamyak+Sha ti pan+d+ha nAM/ na mo arma tAM/ na mo nA gA mA~M nAM/ na maHsa kr-i dA gA mI nAM/ na ma
529a3(rgyud 'bum): pro tA pan+d+ha naM/ na mo ar+ha te/ mar+d+ha tu/ a pa ra dzi ta hr-i da yaM/ mA brta liSh+ya mi sa myaka saM bud+d+ha/ b+hU Shi ta/ ma nu ma~M da te/ de ba ga Ne s+sar+tha kar+m+ma ka raM/ shu d+haM/ be bai trany+tsaH/ maM ga l+yaM/ d+han+taM/ shu b+h+ya ka raM/ shu d+hi rak+Sho/ b+hU sarba
529a4(rgyud 'bum): satwA nAM/ de bany+tsa a pa ra dzi ta hr-i da yaM/ mA brta yi Sh+yA mi sar+b+ba pA pa/ pra sha ma nAM/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nAM/ d+ha n+yaM/ sarba gra ha bi nA sha nAM/ ni t+yaM dza ya/ ka ri h+ye Sha sha kra s+yai ba a pa ra dzi tA pa Sha kr-i t+ya/ nA sha nAM tse ba/ rA dza/
529a5(rgyud 'bum): ag+ni ri bu nA sha nI kr-i t+ya kar+m+ma Ni/ be tA Do duHsab+hA pi a tha swA ha na de ba/ rA na ba/ gan+d+harba/ yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ pan+d+ha ga/ rak+ShaM/ kurban+tu me ni t+yaM sa mAn+ta tsa/ te dza naM e hi kA/ di tI ya ka dza rA tri tI ya kA/ tsa tur+tha ke b+h+yo/ rak+Sha
529a6(rgyud 'bum): yaM gai ra ma dza ra kar+m+ma Ni bi ShaM b+huk+taM ga raM tsi ba b+h+yo dz+ya brdza yi Sh+ya ti ya s+ya bA na b+ha ba ta gar+b+ho hi yan+te ya s+ya dA ka ra ka/ ret+na mA la i yaM te ShAMk+Shi pra ma ma ba ha te/ dza ya mar+tha/ ka mo la pa tar+the/ shrI kA mo la b+ha te shri yaM/ bi tha te/
529a7(rgyud 'bum): raN/ saM gra he/ k+ShaM pra mA bA te/ dza paM/ a tra bi ts+ya/ pra bak+Sha mi/ rat+na mA la ti/ bi bru taM/ tA ba tra lo ka na tha hi dr-iSh+Ta satwA nu pa d+ha tAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha na ka ri bi pu la ka r-i ya sha ka ri/ bid+d+ha ka ri a yun+ta ti a lak+Shi pra sa ma ni
529b1(rgyud 'bum): d+hid+hod+hinir+thA n+ya bi bar+d+ha ni ba shrI ka ri/ sarba tha ha/ nak+Sha tra/ ba sha/ brti ni ma/ d+hA dza na ni/ su tra dza na ni pa ri bA ra ba d+h+ya ni/ A yun+da ni/ prI ti ka ri/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ a mo ha shak+ti kAny+tsa na/ mA la gra hA so mya/ ka ra Ni sar+b+ba kA li kA
529b2(rgyud 'bum): lA hA bi gra ha/ bi bA da pra sha ma ni/ ba ra tsaH/ ni bA ra Ni pa ra se n+ya stam+b+ha no tsit+ta narme lI ka ra Ni/ sar+b+ba pA ba pra sha ma ni sarba kil+li Sha na sha ni sAhA/ tsuTu tsu T+ya/ hu T+ya tu n+ya/ mu r+tha mu Tu swA hA/ san+d+hu de ba a nu d+hA ti swAhA/ sar+b+ba nA gas
529b3(rgyud 'bum): / rak+Shi te swA hA/ oM ni ri phaT/ ha na ha na phaT/ da ha da ha phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa phaH/ ye ShAM bi d+ha Shin+ta bi sha ma tsit+ta yan+ti/ ha ha ni/ kA khorda kurban+ti/ ka ra yan+ti/ kr-i tany+tsa a b+ha yA nu mo da nin+da ba phaT swAhA/ ag+ni stam+b+ha yA maM bo ShaM shas+t+ra ud kaM tsau ri
529b4(rgyud 'bum): sarba duSh+TAM sarba bA d+hi ta/ tsan dr-i dza na yA mi hUM hUM phaT phaHswA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'dab mas khrus byas te rin po che'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa las thams cad byed pa 'di ni rtag tu bsrung ba byed pa'o// de bzhin nyid
529b5(rgyud 'bum): durang gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris pa'am/ gang du 'am/ der yang rung ste/ la la'i bgegs srung ba dang / bsod nams mchog dang / sdig pa dang / dri ma 'joms pa dang / g.yul du 'am/ rtsod pa 'am/ thams cad du rgyal ba
529b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin zhing dge ba'o/ / gang 'di 'dzin pa la rig pa zhi ba bris pa dang / skyes pas rtag tu klog pa de la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// klog pa dang 'dzin pa thams cad rtag tu srung bar byed do// gsang ba ba rnams kyis yod
529b7(rgyud 'bum): su skyong bar byed do/ / cho ga'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu mthar byed pa ni ji ltar rin po ches spras pa'i 'brang ba steng du rnam par 'bar ba'i dpal gang yin pa de rig pa 'dzin par byed do// 'di la gdon de rnam par nyams par byed do//
530a1(rgyud 'bum): nad rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo // bu dang tsha bo rnams kyang 'phel lo// 'khor bzang po can rnam par gnas so// rig pa 'di ni thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can la
530a2(rgyud 'bum): phan pa'i don gyi ched dang / byis pa rnams khyad par du bsrung bar bya ba'i ched do// lha dang / rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas gzigs
530a3(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad do/ / dge ba'i don rnam par 'phel ba dang / sdig pa thams cad kun nas zad par 'gro ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa rnams dang / nyes par byas pa rnams las kyang grol te/ 'dir the tshom med do// ral pa gyen brdzes
530a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyud phyi ma'i gzungs so/ / / de nas 'di las rgyud 'dir byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid gsungs so// 'di lta ste/ gtsug pud dang / go cha dang / ra ba dang /
530a5(rgyud 'bum): snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po zhes pa ste rnam pa lnga'o// rtsa ba'i rig pa la ni drug cur bshad do// don thams cad sgrub pa de la dang por re zhig ra bi ta dang / bi Ni ka dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthar thug pa rnams so// mthe'u
530a6(rgyud 'bum): chung khab kyi rnam pas nges par btsir ba'i gung mo dang mthe bong dag tu bshad do/ / 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gang ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes rnam par grags te/ don thams cad sgrub pa'o// rig pa tshim par byed pa la
530a7(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung gnyis bsnun par bya ste/ rnam par tshim par 'gyur ro// lhag par gnas pa ni mthe bong gnyis ka khab kyi rnam pas so sor g.yo bar bya ste/ snying po rnam par shes par bya'o// bstod pa kho na'i mong gis
530b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / nye ba'i snying po la mthe bong gnyis 'di lta ste/ nang kho na'i khu tshur ro// mthe'u chung lcags sgrog gi cha'i sgra'i dang / sdigs mdzug kha phye ba khab tu byas pa 'di ni go cha'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid de/ rtag tu bdag
530b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ / sdigs mdzub gnyis nges par btsir nas gung mo dkris te khab kyi rnam pas bsdigs pa 'di ni gtsug phud kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ste/ bdag nyid kyis gtsug pud bcings pa'i dus
530b3(rgyud 'bum): su rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ / slar yang khu tshur bcings nas sdigs mdzub kha phya ba khab kyi rnam pa ste/ 'di ni bzlas pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do// de lta bu kho na yongs su gyur par sdigs mdzub khab kyi rnam pas ra
530b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyag rgya bya'o/ / khu tshur bcings nas sdigs mdzub gnyis lcags sgrog gi rnam pa ste/ mtshan ma 'di ni dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyag rgya'o// rkang pa mnyam pa la g.yas pa'i rkang pa rab tu bzhag nas gar gyi sbyor bas
530b5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskor bar bya ste/ gzhan du bskor nas lag pa gnyis kas rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i las sbyar ro// dpral bar yang las thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings pa dang / bzlas
530b6(rgyud 'bum): 'i dus dang / nyal ba'i dus dang / rnam pa gzhan du rang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// gdon gyi las dang las thams cad la rtsa ba'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de
530b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas ral pa rtsen brjes kyi rgyud phyi mar spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rjes su brtse bas/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'alags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i don du phyag rgya bcing ba gsungs so/
531a1(rgyud 'bum): @de la 'di rnams yang dag sbyar bya ba// yams ni bde bar bya dang mkhas pa phyag 'tshal ba// rig gsum la yang thun mong phyag rgya ni// de rnams nye bar drangs pa phyag 'tshal phyag rgya ni//
531a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa'i sor mo'i tshogs la tshogs kyi rtse mo kun// phyag rgya nyid ni rjes su bcings par gyis shig dang // rtag tu gsol ba 'debs la gtsang ma gsol 'debs pa'i// phyag rgya de bzhin kho nar g.yas pa sor mo che
531a3(rgyud 'bum): tshigs rnams tshigs su byas nas rjes su yi rang bya/ / mchod pa thams cad kho na gtsang mas rtag tu ni// mchod pa rtag tu rjes su yi rang byed pa dang // sor mo rnams kyi bdud rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan// tshigs kyis rtse mo
531a4(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong snying por yang dag ldan/ / 'di rnams rgyal ba yi ni phyag rgyar 'gyur// sor mo'i rtse mo yang dag sbyar ba gung mo dang // mthe bong gnyis kar gang du mi 'gyur phyag rgya yis// bzlas pas mchog sbyin yid kyi bzlas
531a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nas yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams thams cad rang rang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i mtshan ma ston par mdzad bzhin pas slar bzhengs pa'i mtshan ma mdzad do//
531a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / sems can rab tu 'gul ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa 'dir rang 'gul bas skrag cing me tog gi char 'bab pa dang / bar snang
531a7(rgyud 'bum): la spyod pa'i 'byung po bye bas thams cad du 'gro ba'i gdug pa rab tu btul lo/ / / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yongs su zhus pa/
531b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu des na ral pagyen brdzes zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rtog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ spyan ras gzig
531b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gis nus pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mdo sde zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i le'u rab 'byam zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ thabs kyi spyod pa zhes
531b3(rgyud 'bum): pabar yang zung zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam gyis de rnams yang dag par ldan par 'gyur/ chos du zhig gis lhags par gnas pa lag
531b4(rgyud 'bum): byams pa des gang chos bcus 'di lta bu mthong ba kho na ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / bri ma dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
531b5(rgyud 'bum): 'am ci dang / yi dgas la sogs pa rnams kyis kun bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs mnyam pa'i sems zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur pa dang / dge ba'i chos la kun tu gnas pas ji srid du 'dri bar
531b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur pa dang / zis nas 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / glegs bam du gyur par byas nas mchod par 'gyur pa dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bde ba phun gsum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / bde
531b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gror 'gro ba ste/ yon tan mang po nyid dang / phan yon chen po nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs/ lha dang bcas pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ rog pa dang sngags chen po 'dus pa/ 'khor ba'i pha rol
532a1(rgyud 'bum): tu song ba/ bdag gis kyang yang dag par rgyu skar dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / lor bde ba'i ched du mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// dge ba
532a2(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i las kyis lam dang grags pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / ral pa gyen brdzes 'chang ba po dang / khyim du gzhag pa dang / rab tu byung ba rnams la'o// de skad ces bka'
532a3(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
532a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'a'o/ / ral pa gyen brjes kyi rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so// / 'di ni jo bo chen po a ti sha'i phyag dper sgreng nas dka' thub chen
532a5(rgyud 'bum): pos gdan drangs nas/ shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis 'phar ba'i lo/ cho 'phrul chen po rta'i zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la rdzogs par bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni/ lo tsa ba chen po de nyid kyi
532a6(rgyud 'bum): zhabs drung du nye bar gnas pa/ shAkya'i dge slong bsod na mthun grub kyis bgyis so// paN+Di ta la ma gtugs shing // dpe dbang 'grel pa ma rnyed pas// sgra don log par
